original: yatpadāmbhoruhadhyānavidhvastāśeṣakalmaṣaḥ /
analyzed: yad pada ambhoruha dhyāna vidhvasta aśeṣa kalmaṣaḥ

original: vastutām upayāto 'haṃ yāmuneyaṃ namāmi tam //
analyzed: vastu tām upayātaḥ aham yāmuneyam namāmi tam

original: śriyaḥ patiḥ,
analyzed: śriyaḥ patiḥ

original: nikhilaheyapratyanīkakalyāṇaikatānaḥ,
svetarasamastavastuvilakṣaṇānantajñanānandaikasvarūpaḥ,
svābhāvikānavadhikātiśayajñānabalāiśvaryavīryaśaktitejaḥprabhṛtyasaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇamahodadhiḥ,
svābhimatānurūpaikarūpācintyadivyādbhutanityaniravadyaniratiśayāujjvalyasaundaryasaugandhyasaukumāryalāvaṇyayauvanādyanantaguṇanidhidivyarūpaḥ,
analyzed: sva abhimata anurūpa eka rūpa acintya divya adbhuta nitya niravadya niratiśaya aujjvalya saundarya saugandhya saukumārya lāvaṇya yauvana ādi ananta guṇa nidhi divya rūpaḥ

original: svocitavividhavicitrānantāścaryanityaniravadyāparimitadivyabhūṣaṇaḥ,
svānurūpāsaṃkhyeyācintyaśaktinityaniravadyaniratiśayakalyāṇadivyāyudhaḥ,
analyzed: sva anurūpa asaṃkhyeya acintya śakti nitya niravadya niratiśaya kalyāṇa divya āyudhaḥ

original: svābhimatānurūpanityaniravadyasvarūparūpaguṇavibhavāiśvaryaśīlādyanavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaśrīvallabhaḥ,
svasaṅkalpānuvidhāyisvarūpasthitipravṛttibhedāśeṣaseṣataikaratirūpanityaniravadyaniratiśayajñānakriyāiśvaryādyanantaguṇagaṇāparimitasūribhir
vāṅmanasāparicchedyasvarūpasvabhāvaḥ svocitavividhavicitrānantabhogyabhogopakaraṇabhogasthānasamṛddhānantāścaryānantamahāvibhavānantaparimāṇanityaniravadyākṣaraparamavyomanilayaḥ,
analyzed: vāc manasā aparicchedya svarūpa svabhāvaḥ svocita vividha vicitra ananta bhogya bhoga upakaraṇa bhoga sthāna samṛddha ananta āścarya ananta mahā vibhava ananta parimāṇa nitya niravadya akṣara parama vyoma nilayaḥ

original: vividhavicitrānantabhogyabhoktṛvargaparipūrṇanikhilajagadudayavibhavalayalīlaḥ,
paraṃ brahma puruṣottamo nārāyaṇaḥ,
analyzed: param brahma puruṣottamaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ

original: brahmādisthāvarāntam akhilaṃ jagat sṛṣṭvā ,
analyzed: brahma ādi sthāvara antam akhilam jagat sṛṣṭvā

original: svena rūpeṇāvasthito brahmādidevamanuṣyāṇāṃ dhyānārādhanādyagocaraḥ,
analyzed: svena rūpeṇa avasthitaḥ brahma ādi deva manuṣyāṇām dhyāna ārādhana ādi agocaraḥ

original: apārakāruṇyasauśīlyavātsalyāudāryamahodadhiḥ,
svam eva rūpaṃ tat tat sajātīyasaṃsthānaṃ svasvabhāvam ajahad eva kurvan teṣu teṣu
analyzed: svam eva rūpam tat tat sajātīya saṃsthānam sva svabhāvam ajahat eva kurvan teṣu teṣu

original: lokeṣv avatīryāvatīrya tais tair ārādhitas tat tad iṣṭānurūpaṃ dharmārthakāmamokṣākhyaṃ phalaṃ prayacchan,
analyzed: lokeṣu avatīrya avatīrya taiḥ taiḥ ārādhitaḥ tat tat iṣṭa anurūpam dharma artha kāma mokṣa ākhyam phalam prayacchan

original: bhūbhārāvatāraṇāpadeśenāsmadādīnām api samāśrayaṇīyatvāyāvatīryorvyāṃ sakalamanujanayanaviṣayatāṃ gataḥ,
analyzed: bhū bhāra avatāraṇa apadeśena asmat ādīnām api samāśrayaṇīya tvāya avatīrya urvyām sakala manuja nayana viṣaya tām gataḥ

original: parāvaranikhilajanamanonayanahāridivyaceṣṭitāni kurvan,
analyzed: parāvara nikhila jana manaḥ nayana hāri divya ceṣṭitāni kurvan

original: pūtanāśakaṭayamalārjunāriṣṭapralambadhenukakāliyakeśikuvalayāpīḍacāṇūramuṣṭikatosalakaṃsādīn
analyzed: pūtanā śakaṭa yamalārjuna ariṣṭa pralamba dhenuka kāliya keśi kuvalayāpīḍa cāṇūra muṣṭika tosala kaṃsa ādīn

original: nihatya anavadhikadayāsauhārdānurāgagarbhāvalokanālāpāmṛtair viśvam āpyāyayan,
analyzed: nihatya anavadhika dayā sauhārda anurāga garbha avalokana ālāpa amṛtaiḥ viśvam āpyāyayan

original: niratiśayasaundaryasauśīlyādiguṇagaṇāviṣkāreṇākrūramālākārādīn paramabhāgavatān kṛtvā,
analyzed: niratiśaya saundarya sauśīlya ādi guṇa gaṇa āviṣkāreṇa akrūra mālākāra ādīn parama bhāgavatān kṛtvā

original: pāṇḍutanayayuddhaprotsāhanavyājena paramapuruṣārthalakṣaṇamokṣasādhanatayā vedāntoditaṃ svaviṣayaṃ jñānakarmānugṛhītaṃ bhaktiyogam avatārayām  #
analyzed: pāṇḍu tanaya yuddha protsāhana vyājena parama puruṣa artha lakṣaṇa mokṣa sādhanatayā vedānta uditam sva viṣayam jñāna karma anugṛhītam bhakti yogam avatārayām

original: āsa /
analyzed: āsa

original: tatra pāṇḍavānāṃ kurūṇāṃ ca yuddhe prārabdhe sa bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ sarveśvareśvaro
analyzed: tatra pāṇḍavānām kurūṇām ca yuddhe prārabdhe sa bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ sarva īśvara īśvaraḥ

original: jagadupakṛtimartyaḥ āśritavātsalyavivaśaḥ pārthaṃ rathinam ātmānaṃ ca sārathiṃ sarvalokasākṣikaṃ cakāra /
analyzed: jagat upakṛti martyaḥ āśrita vātsalya vivaśaḥ pārtham rathinam ātmānam ca sārathim sarva loka sākṣikam cakāra

original: dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ uvāca

original: dharmakṣetre kurukṣetre samavetā yuyutsavaḥ /
analyzed: dharma kṣetre kurukṣetre samavetāḥ yuyutsavaḥ

original: māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva kim akurvata sañjaya // BhG_1.1 //
analyzed: māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ ca eva kim akurvata sañjaya

original: evaṃ jñātvāpi sarvātmanāndho dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ suyodhanavijayabubhutsayā sañjayaṃ papraccha /
analyzed: evam jñātvā api sarva ātmanā andhaḥ dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ suyodhana vijaya bubhutsayā sañjayam papraccha

original: sañjaya uvāca
analyzed: sañjayaḥ uvāca

original: dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavānīkaṃ vyūḍhaṃ duryodhanas tadā /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍava anīkam vyūḍham duryodhanaḥ tadā

original: ācāryam upasaṃgamya rājā vacanam abravīt // BhG_1.2 //
analyzed: ācāryam upasaṃgamya rājā vacanam abravīt

original: paśyaitāṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇām ācārya mahatīṃ camūm /
analyzed: paśya etām pāṇḍu putrāṇām ācārya mahatīm camūm

original: vyūḍhāṃ drupadaputreṇa tava śiṣyeṇa dhīmatā // BhG_1.3 //
analyzed: vyūḍhām drupada putreṇa tava śiṣyeṇa dhīmatā

original: atra śūrā maheṣvāsā bhīmārjunasamā yudhi /
analyzed: atra śūrāḥ mahā iṣvāsāḥ bhīma arjuna samāḥ yudhi

original: yuyudhāno virāṭaś ca drupadaś ca mahārathaḥ // BhG_1.4 //
analyzed: yuyudhānaḥ virāṭaḥ ca drupadaḥ ca mahā rathaḥ

original: dhṛṣṭaketuś cekitānaḥ kāśīrājaś ca vīryavān /
analyzed: dhṛṣṭaketuḥ cekitānaḥ kāśī rājaḥ ca vīryavān

original: purujitkuntibhojaś ca śaibyaś ca narapuṅgavaḥ // BhG_1.5 //
analyzed: purujit kuntibhojaḥ ca śaibyaḥ ca nara puṅgavaḥ

original: yudhāmanyuś ca vikrānta uttamaujāś ca vīryavān /
analyzed: yudhāmanyuḥ ca vikrāntaḥ uttamaujāḥ ca vīryavān

original: saubhadro draupadeyāś ca sarva eva mahārathāḥ // BhG_1.6 //
analyzed: saubhadraḥ draupadeyāḥ ca sarve eva mahā rathāḥ

original: asmākaṃ tu viśiṣṭā ye tān nibodha dvijottama /
analyzed: asmākam tu viśiṣṭāḥ ye tān nibodha dvijottama

original: nāyakā mama sainyasya saṃjñārthaṃ tān bravīmi te // BhG_1.7 //
analyzed: nāyakāḥ mama sainyasya saṃjñā artham tān bravīmi te

original: bhavān bhīṣmaś ca karṇaś ca kṛpaś ca samitiñjayaḥ /
analyzed: bhavān bhīṣmaḥ ca karṇaḥ ca kṛpaḥ ca samitiñjayaḥ

original: aśvatthāmā vikarṇaś ca saumadattis tathaiva ca // BhG_1.8 //
analyzed: aśvatthāmā vikarṇaḥ ca saumadattiḥ tathā eva ca

original: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ /
analyzed: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrāḥ mad arthe tyakta jīvitāḥ

original: nānāśastrapraharaṇās sarve yuddhaviśāradāḥ // BhG_1.9 //
analyzed: nānā śastra praharaṇāḥ sarve yuddha viśāradāḥ

original: aparyāptaṃ tad asmākaṃ balaṃ bhīṣmābhirakṣitam /
analyzed: a paryāptam tat asmākam balam bhīṣma abhirakṣitam

original: paryāptaṃ tv idam eteṣāṃ balaṃ bhīmābhirakṣitam // BhG_1.10 //
analyzed: paryāptam tu idam eteṣām balam bhīma abhirakṣitam

original: ayaneṣu ca sarveṣu yathābhāgam avasthitāḥ /
analyzed: ayaneṣu ca sarveṣu yathābhāgam avasthitāḥ

original: bhīṣmam evābhirakṣantu bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi // BhG_1.11 //
analyzed: bhīṣmam eva abhirakṣantu bhavantaḥ sarve eva hi

original: duryodhanaḥ svayam eva bhīmābhirakṣitaṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ balam,
analyzed: duryodhanaḥ svayam eva bhīma abhirakṣitam pāṇḍavānām balam

original: ātmīyaṃ ca bhīṣmābhirakṣitaṃ balam avalokya,
analyzed: ātmīyam ca bhīṣma abhirakṣitam balam avalokya

original: ātmavijaye tasya balasya paryāptatām ātmīyasya balasya tadvijaye cāparyāptatām ācāryāya nivedya antarviṣaṇṇo 'bhavat // BhGR_1.211 //
analyzed: ātma vijaye tasya balasya paryāpta tām ātmīyasya balasya tad vijaye ca a paryāpta tām ācāryāya nivedya antar viṣaṇṇaḥ abhavat

original: tasya saṃjanayan harṣaṃ kuruvṛddhaḥ pitāmahaḥ /
analyzed: tasya saṃjanayan harṣam kuruvṛddhaḥ pitāmahaḥ

original: siṃhanādaṃ vinadyoccaiḥ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pratāpavān // BhG_1.12 //
analyzed: siṃhanādam vinadya uccais śaṅkham dadhmau pratāpavān

original: tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca paṇavānakagomukhāḥ /
analyzed: tatas śaṅkhāḥ ca bheryaḥ ca paṇava ānaka gomukhāḥ

original: sahasaivābhyahanyanta sa śabdas tumulo 'bhavat // BhG_1.13 //
analyzed: sahasā eva abhyahanyanta sa śabdaḥ tumulaḥ abhavat

original: tataḥ śvetair hayair yukte mahati syandane sthitau /
analyzed: tatas śvetaiḥ hayaiḥ yukte mahati syandane sthitau

original: mādhavaḥ pāṇḍavaś caiva divyau śaṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ // BhG_1.14 //
analyzed: mādhavaḥ pāṇḍavaḥ ca eva divyau śaṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ

original: pāñcajanyaṃ hṛṣīkeśo devadattaṃ dhanañjayaḥ /
analyzed: pāñcajanyam hṛṣīkeśaḥ devadattam dhanañjayaḥ

original: pauṇḍraṃ dadhmau mahāśaṅkhaṃ bhīmakarmā vṛkodaraḥ // BhG_1.15 //
analyzed: pauṇḍram dadhmau mahā śaṅkham bhīma karmā vṛkodaraḥ

original: anantavijayaṃ rājā kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ /
analyzed: anantavijayam rājā kuntī putraḥ yudhiṣṭhiraḥ

original: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca sughoṣamaṇipuṣpakau // BhG_1.16 //
analyzed: nakulaḥ sahadevaḥ ca sughoṣa maṇipuṣpakau

original: kāśyaś ca parameṣvāsaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ /
analyzed: kāśyaḥ ca parama iṣvāsaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca mahā rathaḥ

original: dhṛṣṭadyumno virāṭaś ca sātyakiś cāparājitaḥ // BhG_1.17 //
analyzed: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ virāṭaḥ ca sātyakiḥ ca aparājitaḥ

original: drupado draupadeyāś ca sarvataḥ pṛthivīpate /
analyzed: drupadaḥ draupadeyāḥ ca sarvatas pṛthivīpate

original: saubhadraś ca mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak // BhG_1.18 //
analyzed: saubhadraḥ ca mahā bāhuḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak

original: tasya viṣādam ālakṣya bhīṣmas tasya harṣaṃ janayituṃ siṃhanādaṃ śaṅkhadhmānaṃ ca kṛtvā,
analyzed: tasya viṣādam ālakṣya bhīṣmaḥ tasya harṣam janayitum siṃhanādam śaṅkha dhmānam ca kṛtvā

original: śaṅkhabherīninādaiś ca vijayābhiśaṃsinaṃ ghoṣaṃ cākārayat //
analyzed: śaṅkha bherī ninādaiḥ ca vijaya abhiśaṃsinam ghoṣam ca akārayat

original: tataḥ taṃ ghoṣam ākarṇya sarveśvareśvaraḥ pārthasārathī rathī ca pāṇḍutanayas trailokyavijayopakaraṇabhūte mahati syandane sthitau
analyzed: tatas tam ghoṣam ākarṇya sarva īśvara īśvaraḥ pārtha sārathī rathī ca pāṇḍu tanayaḥ trailokya vijaya upakaraṇa bhūte mahati syandane sthitau

original: sa ghoṣo dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ hṛdayāni vyadārayat /
analyzed: sa ghoṣaḥ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇām hṛdayāni vyadārayat

original: nabhaś ca pṛthivīṃ caiva tumulo 'py anunādayan // BhG_1.19 //
analyzed: nabhaḥ ca pṛthivīm ca eva tumulaḥ api anunādayan

original: atha vyavasthitān dṛṣṭvā dhārtarāṣṭrān kapidhvajaḥ /
analyzed: atha vyavasthitān dṛṣṭvā dhārtarāṣṭrān kapidhvajaḥ

original: pravṛtte śastrasaṃpāte dhanur udyamya pāṇḍavaḥ // BhG_1.20 //
analyzed: pravṛtte śastra saṃpāte dhanuḥ udyamya pāṇḍavaḥ

original: hṛṣīkeśaṃ tadā vākyam idam āha mahīpate /
analyzed: hṛṣīkeśam tadā vākyam idam āha mahīpate

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: senayor ubhayor madhye rathaṃ sthāpaya me 'cyuta // BhG_1.21 //
analyzed: senayoḥ ubhayoḥ madhye ratham sthāpaya me acyuta

original: trailokyaṃ kampayantau śrīmatpāñcajanyadevadattau divyau śaṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ //
analyzed: trailokyam kampayantau śrīmat pāñcajanya devadattau divyau śaṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ

original: tato yudhiṣṭhiro vṛkodarādayaś ca svakīyān śaṅkhān pṛthak pṛthak pradadhmuḥ /
analyzed: tatas yudhiṣṭhiraḥ vṛkodara ādayaḥ ca svakīyān śaṅkhān pṛthak pṛthak pradadhmuḥ

original: sa ghoṣo duryodhanapramukhānāṃ sarveṣām eva bhavatputrāṇāṃ hṛdayāni bibheda /
analyzed: sa ghoṣaḥ duryodhana pramukhānām sarveṣām eva bhavat putrāṇām hṛdayāni bibheda

original: “adyaiva naṣṭaṃ kurūṇāṃ balam” iti dhārtarāṣṭrā menire /
analyzed: adyā eva naṣṭam kurūṇām balam iti dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ menire

original: evaṃ tadvijayābhikāṅkṣiṇe dhṛtarāṣṭrāya sañjayo 'kathayat // BhGR_1.1219 //
analyzed: evam tad vijaya abhikāṅkṣiṇe dhṛtarāṣṭrāya sañjayaḥ akathayat

original: atha yuyutsūn avasthitān dhārtarāṣṭrān dṛṣṭvā laṅkādahanavānaradhvajaḥ pāṇḍutanayo
analyzed: atha yuyutsūn avasthitān dhārtarāṣṭrān dṛṣṭvā laṅkā dahana vānaradhvajaḥ pāṇḍu tanayaḥ

original: yāvad etān nirīkṣe 'haṃ yoddhukāmān avasthitān /
analyzed: yāvat etān nirīkṣe aham yoddhu kāmān avasthitān

original: kair mayā saha yoddhavyam asmin raṇasamudyame // BhG_1.22 //
analyzed: kaiḥ mayā saha yoddhavyam asmin raṇa samudyame

original: yotsyamānān avekṣe 'haṃ ya ete 'tra samāgatāḥ /
analyzed: yotsyamānān avekṣe aham ye ete atra samāgatāḥ

original: dhārtarāṣṭrasya durbuddher yuddhe priyacikīrṣavaḥ // BhG_1.23 //
analyzed: dhārtarāṣṭrasya durbuddheḥ yuddhe priya cikīrṣavaḥ

original: sañjaya uvāca
analyzed: sañjayaḥ uvāca

original: evam ukto hṛṣīkeśo guḍākeśena bhārata /
analyzed: evam uktaḥ hṛṣīkeśaḥ guḍākeśena bhārata

original: senayor ubhayor madhye sthāpayitvā rathottamam // BhG_1.24 //
analyzed: senayoḥ ubhayoḥ madhye sthāpayitvā ratha uttamam

original: bhīṣmadroṇapramukhataḥ sarveṣāṃ ca mahīkṣitām /
analyzed: bhīṣma droṇa pramukhatas sarveṣām ca mahīkṣitām

original: uvāca pārtha paśyaitān samavetān kurūn iti // BhG_1.25 //
analyzed: uvāca pārtha paśya etān samavetān kurūn iti

original: tatrāpaśyat sthitān pārthaḥ pitQn atha pitāmahān /
analyzed: tatra apaśyat sthitān pārthaḥ pitū atha pitāmahān

original: jñānaśaktibalāiśvaryavīryatejasāṃ nidhiṃ svasaṅkalpakṛtajagadudayavibhavalayalīlaṃ
analyzed: jñāna śakti bala aiśvarya vīrya tejasām nidhim sva saṅkalpa kṛta jagat udaya vibhava laya līlam

original: hṛṣīkeśaṃ parāvaranikhilajanāntarabāhyakaraṇānāṃ sarvaprakāraniyamane 'vasthitam
analyzed: hṛṣīkeśam parāvara nikhila jana antara bāhya karaṇānām sarva prakāra niyamane avasthitam

original: āśritavātsalyavivaśatayā svasārathye 'vasthitam,
analyzed: āśrita vātsalya vivaśa tayā sva sārathye avasthitam

original: “yuyutsūn yathāvad avekṣituṃ tad īkṣanakṣame sthāne rathaṃ sthāpaya” ity acodayat //
analyzed: yuyutsūn yathāvat avekṣitum tat īkṣana kṣame sthāne ratham sthāpaya iti acodayat

original: ācāryān mātulān bhrātQn putrān pautrān sakhīṃs tathā // BhG_1.26 //
analyzed: ācāryān mātulān bhrātūn putrān pautrān sakhīn tathā

original: śvaśurān suhṛdaś caiva senayor ubhayor api /
analyzed: śvaśurān suhṛdaḥ ca eva senayoḥ ubhayoḥ api

original: tān samīkṣya sa kaunteyaḥ sarvān bandhūn avasthitān // BhG_1.27 //
analyzed: tān samīkṣya sa kaunteyaḥ sarvān bandhūn avasthitān

original: kṛpayā parayāviṣṭo viṣīdann idam abravīt /
analyzed: kṛpayā parayā āviṣṭaḥ viṣīdan idam abravīt

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: dṛṣṭvemaṃ svajanaṃ kṛṣṇa yuyutsuṃ samupasthitam // BhG_1.28 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā imam sva janam kṛṣṇa yuyutsum samupasthitam

original: sīdanti mama gātrāṇi mukhaṃ ca pariśuṣyati /
analyzed: sīdanti mama gātrāṇi mukham ca pariśuṣyati

original: vepathuś ca śarīre me romaharṣaś ca jāyate // BhG_1.29 //
analyzed: vepathuḥ ca śarīre me romaharṣaḥ ca jāyate

original: gāṇḍīvaṃ sraṃsate hastāt tvak caiva paridahyate /
analyzed: gāṇḍīvam sraṃsate hastāt tvac ca eva paridahyate

original: na ca śaknomy avasthātuṃ bhramatīva ca me manaḥ // BhG_1.30 //
analyzed: na ca śaknomi avasthātum bhramati iva ca me manaḥ

original: nimittāni ca paśyāmi viparītāni keśava /
analyzed: nimittāni ca paśyāmi viparītāni keśava

original: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave // BhG_1.31 //
analyzed: na ca śreyaḥ anupaśyāmi hatvā sva janam āhave

original: na kāṅkṣe vijayaṃ Kṛṣṇa na ca rājyaṃ sukhāni ca /
analyzed: na kāṅkṣe vijayam kṛṣṇa na ca rājyam sukhāni ca

original: kiṃ no rājyena govinda kiṃ bhogair jīvitena vā // BhG_1.32 //
analyzed: kim naḥ rājyena govinda kim bhogaiḥ jīvitena vā

original: yeṣām arthe kāṅkṣitaṃ no rājyaṃ bhogāḥ sukhāni ca /
analyzed: yeṣām arthe kāṅkṣitam naḥ rājyam bhogāḥ sukhāni ca

original: ta ime 'vasthitā yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā dhanāni ca // BhG_1.33 //
analyzed: te ime avasthitāḥ yuddhe prāṇān tyaktvā dhanāni ca

original: ācāryāḥ pitaraḥ putrās tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ /
analyzed: ācāryāḥ pitaraḥ putrāḥ tathā eva ca pitāmahāḥ

original: mātulāḥ śvaśurāḥ pautrāḥ syālāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā // BhG_1.34 //
analyzed: mātulāḥ śvaśurāḥ pautrāḥ syālāḥ saṃbandhinaḥ tathā

original: sa ca tena coditas tatkṣaṇād eva Bhīṣmaḍroṇādīnāṃ sarveṣām eva mahīkṣitāṃ paśyatāṃ yathācoditam akarot /
analyzed: sa ca tena coditaḥ tad kṣaṇāt eva bhīṣma ḍroṇa ādīnām sarveṣām eva mahīkṣitām paśyatām yathācoditam akarot

original: īdṛśī bhavadīyānāṃ vijayasthitir iti cāvocat // BhGR_1.2025 //
analyzed: īdṛśī bhavadīyānām vijaya sthitiḥ iti ca avocat

original: sa tu Pārtho mahāmanāḥ paramakāruṇiko dīrghabandhuḥ paramadhārmikaḥ sabhrātṛko
analyzed: sa tu pārthaḥ mahāmanāḥ parama kāruṇikaḥ dīrgha bandhuḥ parama dhārmikaḥ

original: etān na hantum icchāmi ghnato 'pi madhusūdhana /
analyzed: etān na hantum icchāmi ghnataḥ api madhusūdhana

original: api trailokyarājyasya hetoḥ kiṃ nu mahīkṛte // BhG_1.35 //
analyzed: api trailokya rājyasya hetoḥ kim nu mahī kṛte

original: nihatya dhārtarāṣṭrān naḥ kā prītiḥ syāj janārdana /
analyzed: nihatya dhārtarāṣṭrān naḥ kā prītiḥ syāt janārdana

original: pāpam evāśrayed asmān hatvaitān ātatāyinaḥ // BhG_1.36 //
analyzed: pāpam eva āśrayet asmān hatvā etān ātatāyinaḥ

original: tasmān nārhā vayaṃ hantuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān sabāndhavān /
analyzed: tasmāt na arhāḥ vayam hantum dhārtarāṣṭrān sa bāndhavān

original: svajanaṃ hi katham hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava // BhG_1.37 //
analyzed: sva janam hi katham hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava

original: yady apy ete na paśyanti lobhopahatacetasaḥ /
analyzed: yadi api ete na paśyanti lobha upahata cetasaḥ

original: kulakṣayakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ mitradrohe ca pātakam // BhG_1.38 //
analyzed: kula kṣaya kṛtam doṣam mitra drohe ca pātakam

original: kathaṃ na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpād asmān nivartitum /
analyzed: katham na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpāt asmāt nivartitum

original: kulakṣayakṛtaṃ doṣaṃ prapaśyadbhir ñanārdana // BhG_1.39 //
analyzed: kula kṣaya kṛtam doṣam prapaśyadbhiḥ ñanārdana

original: kulakṣaye praṇaśyanti kuladharmāḥ sanātanāḥ /
analyzed: kula kṣaye praṇaśyanti kula dharmāḥ sanātanāḥ

original: dharme naṣṭe kulaṃ kṛtsnam adharmo 'bhibhavaty uta // BhG_1.40 //
analyzed: dharme naṣṭe kulam kṛtsnam adharmaḥ abhibhavati uta

original: adharmābhibhavāt kṛṣṇa praduṣyanti kulastriyaḥ /
analyzed: adharma abhibhavāt kṛṣṇa praduṣyanti kulastriyaḥ

original: strīṣu duṣṭāsu vārṣṇeya jāyate varṇasaṅkaraḥ // BhG_1.41 //
analyzed: strīṣu duṣṭāsu vārṣṇeya jāyate varṇa saṅkaraḥ

original: saṅkaro narakāyaiva kulaghnānāṃ kulasya ca /
analyzed: saṅkaraḥ narakāya eva kula ghnānām kulasya ca

original: patanti pitaro hy eṣāṃ luptapiṇḍodakakriyāḥ // BhG_1.42 //
analyzed: patanti pitaraḥ hi eṣām lupta piṇḍa udaka kriyāḥ

original: doṣair etaiḥ kulaghnānāṃ varṇasaṅkarakārakaiḥ /
analyzed: doṣaiḥ etaiḥ kula ghnānām varṇa saṅkara kārakaiḥ

original: utsādyante jātidharmāḥ kuladharmāś ca śāśvatāḥ // BhG_1.43 //
analyzed: utsādyante jāti dharmāḥ kula dharmāḥ ca śāśvatāḥ

original: utsannakuladharmāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ ñanārdana /
analyzed: utsanna kula dharmāṇām manuṣyāṇām ñanārdana

original: narake niyataṃ vāso bhavatīty anuśuśruma // BhG_1.44 //
analyzed: narake niyatam vāsaḥ bhavati iti anuśuśruma

original: aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam /
analyzed: aho bata mahat pāpam kartum vyavasitāḥ vayam

original: yad rājyasukhalābhena hantuṃ svajanam udyatāḥ // BhG_1.45 //
analyzed: yat rājya sukha lābhena hantum sva janam udyatāḥ

original: yadi mām apratīkāram aśastraṃ śastrapāṇayaḥ /
analyzed: yadi mām a pratīkāram a śastram śastra pāṇayaḥ

original: dhārtarāṣṭrā raṇe hanyus tan me kṣemataraṃ bhavet // BhG_1.46 //
analyzed: dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ raṇe hanyuḥ tat me kṣemataram bhavet

original: bhavadbhir atighorair māraṇair jatugṛhadāhādibhir asakṛdvañcito 'pi paramapuruṣasahāyenātmanā haniṣya
analyzed: bhavadbhiḥ ati ghoraiḥ māraṇaiḥ jatu gṛha dāha ādibhiḥ asakṛt vañcitaḥ api parama puruṣa sahāyena ātmanā haniṣya

original: sañjaya uvāca
analyzed: sañjayaḥ uvāca

original: evam uktvārjunaḥ saṃkhye rathopastha upāviśat /
analyzed: evam uktvā arjunaḥ saṃkhye rathopasthe upāviśat

original: visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ śokasaṃvignamānasaḥ // BhG_1.47 //
analyzed: visṛjya sa śaram cāpam śoka saṃvigna mānasaḥ

original: māṇān bhavadīyān vilokya bandhusnehena parayā kṛpayā dharmabhayena cātimātrasannasarvagātraḥ
analyzed: māṇān bhavadīyān vilokya bandhu snehena parayā kṛpayā dharma bhayena ca atimātra sanna sarva gātraḥ

original: sarvathāhaṃ na yotsyāmīty uktvā bandhuviśleṣajanitaśokasaṃvignamānasaḥ saśaraṃ cāpaṃ
analyzed: sarvathā aham na yotsyāmi iti uktvā bandhu viśleṣa janita śoka saṃvigna mānasaḥ sa śaram cāpam

original: visṛjya rathopastha upāviśat //
analyzed: visṛjya rathopasthe upāviśat

original: sañjaya uvāca
analyzed: sañjayaḥ uvāca

original: taṃ tathā kṛpayāviṣṭam aśrupūrṇākulekṣaṇam /
analyzed: tam tathā kṛpayā āviṣṭam aśru pūrṇa ākula īkṣaṇam

original: viṣīdantam idaṃ vākyam uvāca madhusūdanaḥ // BhG_2.1 //
analyzed: viṣīdantam idam vākyam uvāca madhusūdanaḥ

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam /
analyzed: kutas tvā kaśmalam idam viṣame samupasthitam

original: anāryajuṣṭam asvargyam akīrtikaram arjuna // BhG_2.2 //
analyzed: an ārya juṣṭam asvargyam a kīrti karam arjuna

original: mā klaibyaṃ gaccha kaunteya naitat tvayy upapadyate /
analyzed: mā klaibyam gaccha kaunteya na etat tvayi upapadyate

original: kṣudraṃ hṛdayadaurbalyaṃ tyaktvottiṣṭha parantapa // BhG_2.3 //
analyzed: kṣudram hṛdaya daurbalyam tyaktvā uttiṣṭha parantapa

analyzed: evam upaviṣṭe pārthe kutas ayam asthāne samupasthitaḥ śokaḥ iti ākṣipya tam imam viṣama stham

analyzed: śokam a vidvas sevitam para loka virodhinam a kīrti karam ati kṣudram hṛdaya daurbalya kṛtam

analyzed: parityajya yuddhāya uttiṣṭha iti śrī bhagavān uvāca

analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṃkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana /
analyzed: katham bhīṣmam aham saṃkhye droṇam ca madhusūdana

analyzed: iṣubhiḥ pratiyotsyāmi pūjā arhau ari sūdana

original: gurūn ahatvā hi mahānubhāvān śreyaś cartuṃ bhaikṣam apīha loke /

analyzed: hatvā artha kāmān tu gurūn iha eva bhuñjīya bhogān rudhira pradigdhān

original: punar api pārthaḥ snehakāruṇyadharmādharmabhayākulo bhagavaduktaṃ hitatamam ajānann idam uvāca bhīṣmadroṇādikān gurūn bahumantavyān katham
analyzed: punar api pārthaḥ sneha kāruṇya dharma adharma bhaya ākulaḥ bhagavat uktam hitatamam a jānan idam uvāca bhīṣma droṇa ādikān gurūn bahu mantavyān katham

original: kathaṃtarāṃ bhogeṣv atimātrasaktān tān hatvā tair bhujyamānāṃs tān eva bhogān tadrudhireṇopasicya teṣv āsaneṣūpaviśya bhuñjīya? // BhGR_2.45
analyzed: kathaṃtarām bhogeṣu atimātra saktān tān hatvā taiḥ bhujyamānān tān eva bhogān tad rudhireṇa upasicya teṣu āsaneṣu upaviśya bhuñjīya

original: na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ /
analyzed: na ca etat vidmaḥ katarat naḥ garīyaḥ yat vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ

analyzed: yān eva hatvā na jijīviṣāmaḥ te avasthitāḥ pramukhe dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ

analyzed: kārpaṇya doṣa upahata svabhāvaḥ pṛcchāmi tvā dharma saṃmūḍha cetāḥ

analyzed: na hi prapaśyāmi mama apanudyāt yat śokam ucchoṣaṇam indriyāṇām

analyzed: avāpya bhūmau asapatnam ṛddham rājyam surāṇām api ca ādhipatyam

original: evaṃ yuddham ārabhya nivṛttavyāpārān bhavato dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ prasahya hanyur iti cet, astu /
analyzed: evam yuddham ārabhya nivṛtta vyāpārān bhavataḥ dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ prasahya hanyuḥ iti ced astu

original: tadvadhalabdhavijayād adharmyād asmākaṃ dharmādharmāv ajānadbhiḥ tair hananam eva garīya iti me pratibhātīty uktvā,
analyzed: tad vadha labdha vijayāt adharmyāt asmākam dharma adharmau a jānadbhiḥ taiḥ hananam eva garīyaḥ iti me pratibhāti iti uktvā

original: yan mahyaṃ śreya iti niścitam,
analyzed: yat mahyam śreyaḥ iti niścitam

original: tac śaraṇāgatāya tava śiṣyāya me brūhīty atimātrakṛpaṇo bhagavatpādāv upasasāda // BhGR_2.68 //
analyzed: tat śaraṇa āgatāya tava śiṣyāya me brūhi iti atimātra kṛpaṇaḥ bhagavat pādau upasasāda

original: sañjaya uvāca
analyzed: sañjayaḥ uvāca

original: evam uktvā hṛśīkeśaṃ guḍākeśaḥ parantapaḥ /
analyzed: evam uktvā hṛśīkeśam guḍākeśaḥ parantapaḥ

original: na yotsya iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha // BhG_2.9 //
analyzed: na yotsye iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīm babhūva ha

original: “evam asthāne samupasthitasnehakāruṇyābhyām aprakṛtiṃ gatam,
analyzed: evam asthāne samupasthita sneha kāruṇyābhyām aprakṛtim gatam

original: kṣatriyāṇāṃ yuddhaṃ paramadharmam apy adharmaṃ manvānaṃ dharmabubhutsayā ca śaraṇāgataṃ pārtham uddiśya,
analyzed: kṣatriyāṇām yuddham parama dharmam api adharmam manvānam dharma bubhutsayā ca śaraṇa āgatam pārtham uddiśya

original: ātmayāthātmyajñānena yuddhasya phalābhisandhirahitasyātmaprāptyupāyatājñānena ca vinā asya moho na śāmyati” iti matvā,
analyzed: ātma yāthātmya jñānena yuddhasya phala abhisandhi rahitasya ātma prāpti upāya tā jñānena ca vinā asya mohaḥ na śāmyati iti matvā

original: bhagavatā paramapuruṣeṇa adhyātmaśāstrāvataraṇaṃ kṛtam /
analyzed: bhagavatā parama puruṣeṇa adhyātma śāstra avataraṇam kṛtam

original: taduktam - “asthānasnehakāruṇyadharmādharmadhiyākulam /
analyzed: tat uktam asthāna sneha kāruṇya dharma adharma dhiyā ākulam

original: pārthaṃ prapannam uddiśya śāstrāvataraṇaṃ kṛtam” // iti // BhGR_2.9 //
analyzed: pārtham prapannam uddiśya śāstra avataraṇam kṛtam iti

original: tam uvāca hṛśīkeśaḥ prahasann iva bhārata /
analyzed: tam uvāca hṛśīkeśaḥ prahasan iva bhārata

original: senayor ubhayor madhye sīdamānam idaṃ vacaḥ // BhG_2.10 //
analyzed: senayoḥ ubhayoḥ madhye sīdamānam idam vacaḥ

original: evaṃ dehātmanor yāthātmyājñānanimittaśokāviṣṭam,
analyzed: evam deha ātmanoḥ yāthātmya ajñāna nimitta śoka āviṣṭam

original: dehātiriktātmajñānanimittaṃ ca dharmaṃ bhāṣamāṇam,
analyzed: deha atirikta ātma jñāna nimittam ca dharmam bhāṣamāṇam

original: parasparaviruddhaguṇānvitam,
analyzed: paraspara viruddha guṇa anvitam

original: ubhayos senayor yuddhāyodyuktayor madhye akasmān nirudyogaṃ pārtham ālokya paramapuruṣaḥ
analyzed: ubhayoḥ senayoḥ yuddhāya udyuktayoḥ madhye akasmāt nirudyogam pārtham ālokya parama puruṣaḥ

original: prahasann ivedam uvāca parihāsavākyaṃ vadann iva ātmaparamātmayāthātmyatatprāptyupāyabhūtakarmayogajñānayogabhaktiyogagocaraṃ
analyzed: prahasan iva idam uvāca parihāsa vākyam vadan iva ātma paramātma yāthātmya tad prāpti upāya bhūta karma yoga jñāna yoga bhaktiyoga gocaram

original: “na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsam” ityārabhya “ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ”
analyzed: na tu eva aham jātu na āsam iti ārabhya aham tvā sarva pāpebhyaḥ mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ

original: ityetadantaṃ vacanam uvācetyarthaḥ // BhGR_2.10 //
analyzed: iti etad antam vacanam uvāca iti arthaḥ

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñāvādāṃś ca bhāṣase /
analyzed: a śocyān anvaśocaḥ tvam prajñā vādān ca bhāṣase

original: gatāsūn agatāsūṃś ca nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ // BhG_2.11 //
analyzed: gatāsūn agatāsūn ca na anuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ

original: aśocyān prati anuśocasi /
analyzed: aśocyān prati anuśocasi

original: “patanti pitaro hy eṣāṃ luptapiṇḍodakakriyāḥ” ityādikān dehātmasvabhāvaprajñānimittavādāṃś ca bhāṣase /
analyzed: patanti pitaraḥ hi eṣām lupta piṇḍa udaka kriyāḥ ityādikān deha ātma svabhāva prajñā nimitta vādān ca bhāṣase

original: dehātmasvabhāvajñānavatāṃ nātra kiṃcic chokanimittam asti /
analyzed: deha ātma svabhāva jñānavatām na atra kiṃcid śoka nimittam asti

original: gatāsūn dehān agatāsūn;
analyzed: gatāsūn dehān a gata asūn

analyzed: ātmanaḥ ca prati tad svabhāva yāthātmya vidaḥ na śocanti

original: atas tvayi vipratiṣiddham idam upalabhyate,
analyzed: atas tvayi vipratiṣiddham idam upalabhyate

original: yad etān haniṣyāmīty anuśocanam,
analyzed: yat etān haniṣyāmi iti anuśocanam

original: yac ca dehātiriktātmajñānakṛtaṃ dharmādharmabhāṣaṇam /

analyzed: atas deha svabhāvam ca na jānāsi

analyzed: tad atiriktam ātmānam ca nityam

analyzed: idam ca yuddham phala abhisandhi rahitam ātma yāthātmya avāpti upāya bhūtam

original: ātmā hi na janmādhīnasadbhāvaḥ;
analyzed: ātmā hi na janma adhīna sadbhāvaḥ

original: na maraṇādhīnavināśaś ca,
analyzed: na maraṇa adhīna vināśaḥ ca

original: tasya janmamaraṇayor abhāvāt /
analyzed: tasya janma maraṇayoḥ abhāvāt

original: ataḥ sa na śokasthānam /
analyzed: atas sa na śoka sthānam

original: dehas tv acetanaḥ pariṇāmasvabhāvaḥ;
analyzed: dehaḥ tu acetanaḥ pariṇāma svabhāvaḥ

original: tasyotpattivināśayogaḥ svābhāvika iti so 'pi na śokasthānam ityabhiprāyaḥ // BhGR_2.11 //
analyzed: tasya utpatti vināśa yogaḥ svābhāvikaḥ iti saḥ api na śoka sthānam iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: prathamaṃ tāvad ātmanāṃ svabhāvam śṛṇu
analyzed: prathamam tāvat ātmanām svabhāvam śṛṇu

original: na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ /
analyzed: na tu eva aham jātu na āsam na tvam na ime janādhipāḥ

original: na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam ataḥ param // BhG_2.12 //
analyzed: na ca eva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam atas param

original: ahaṃ sarveśvaras tāvat,
analyzed: aham sarva īśvaraḥ tāvat

original: ataḥ vartamānāt pūrvasmin anādau kāle,
analyzed: atas vartamānāt pūrvasmin anādau kāle

original: na nāsam api tv āsam /
analyzed: na na āsam api tu āsam

original: tvanmukhāś caite īśitavyāḥ kṣetrajñāḥ na nāsam; api tv āsan /
analyzed: tvad mukhāḥ ca ete īśitavyāḥ kṣetrajñāḥ na nāsam api tu āsan

original: ahaṃ ca yūyaṃ ca sarve vayam,
analyzed: aham ca yūyam ca sarve vayam

original: ataḥ parasmin anante kāle,
analyzed: atas parasmin anante kāle

original: na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ;
analyzed: na ca eva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ

original: api tu bhaviṣyāma eva /
analyzed: api tu bhaviṣyāmaḥ eva

original: yathāhaṃ sarveśvaraḥ paramātmā nitya iti nātra saṃśayaḥ,
analyzed: yathā aham sarva īśvaraḥ paramātmā nityaḥ iti na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: tathaiva bhavantaḥ kṣetrajñā ātmāno 'pi nityā eveti mantavyāḥ // BhGR_2.12 //
analyzed: tathā eva bhavantaḥ kṣetrajñāḥ ātmānaḥ api nityāḥ eva iti mantavyāḥ

original: evaṃ bhagavataḥ sarveśvarād atmanām,
analyzed: evam bhagavataḥ sarva īśvarāt

original: parasparaṃ ca,
analyzed: parasparam ca

original: bhedaḥ pāramārthika iti bhagavataivoktam iti pratīyate;
analyzed: bhedaḥ pāramārthikaḥ iti bhagavatā eva uktam iti pratīyate

original: ajñānamohitaṃ prati tannivṛttaye pārmārthikanityatvopadeśasamaye aham,
analyzed: ajñāna mohitam prati tad nivṛttaye pārmārthika nitya tva upadeśa samaye aham

original: tvam, ime,
analyzed: tvam ime

original: sarve,
analyzed: sarve

original: vayam iti vyapadeśāt /
analyzed: vayam iti vyapadeśāt

original: aupacārikātmabhedavāde hi ātmabhedasyātāttvikatvena tattvopadeśasamaye bhedanirdeśo na saṃgacchate /
analyzed: aupacārika ātma bheda vāde hi ātma bhedasya atāttvika tvena tattva upadeśa samaye bheda nirdeśaḥ na saṃgacchate

original: bhagavaduktātmabhedaḥ svābhāvika iti śrutir apy āha,
analyzed: bhagavat ukta ātma bhedaḥ svābhāvikaḥ iti śrutiḥ api āha

original: “nityo nityānāṃ cetanaś cetanānām eko bahūnāṃ yo vidadhāti kāmān” iti /
analyzed: nityaḥ nityānām cetanaḥ cetanānām ekaḥ bahūnām yaḥ vidadhāti kāmān iti

original: nityānāṃ bahūnāṃ cetanānāṃ ya eko nityaś cetanas san kāmān vidadhātītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: nityānām bahūnām cetanānām yaḥ ekaḥ nityaḥ cetanaḥ san kāmān vidadhāti iti arthaḥ

original: ajñānakṛtabhedadṛṣṭivāde tu paramapuruṣasya paramārthadṛṣter nirviśeṣakūṭasthanityacaitanyātmayāthātmyasākṣātkārān
analyzed: ajñāna kṛta bheda dṛṣṭi vāde tu parama puruṣasya paramārtha dṛṣteḥ nirviśeṣa kūṭastha nitya caitanya ātma yāthātmya sākṣātkārān

original: nivṛttājñānatatkāryatayā ajñānakṛtabhedadarśanaṃ tanmūlopadeśādivyavahārāś ca na saṃgacchante /
analyzed: nivṛtta ajñāna tad kārya tayā ajñāna kṛta bheda darśanam tad mūla upadeśa ādi vyavahārāḥ ca na saṃgacchante

original: atha paramapuruṣasyādhigatādvaitajñānasya bādhitānuvṛttirūpam idaṃ bhedajñānaṃ dagdhapaṭādivan na bandhakam ity ucyate naitad upapadyate;
analyzed: atha paramapuruṣasya adhigata advaita jñānasya bādhita anuvṛtti rūpam idam bheda jñānam dagdha paṭa ādi vat na bandhakam iti ucyate na etat upapadyate

original: marīcikājalajñānādikaṃ hi bādhitam anuvartamānaṃ na jalāharaṇādipravṛttihetuḥ /
analyzed: marīcikā jala jñāna ādikam hi bādhitam anuvartamānam na jala āharaṇa ādi pravṛtti hetuḥ

original: evam atrāpy advaitajñānena bādhitaṃ bhedajñānam anuvartamānam api mithyārthaviṣayatvaniścayān nopadeśādipravṛttihetur bhavati /
analyzed: evam atrā api advaita jñānena bādhitam bheda jñānam anuvartamānam api mithyā artha viṣaya tva niścayāt na upadeśa ādi pravṛtti hetuḥ bhavati

original: na ceśvarasya pūrvam ajñasya śāstrādhigatatattvajñānatayā bādhitānuvṛttiḥ śakyate vaktum;
analyzed: na ca īśvarasya pūrvam ajñasya śāstra adhigata tattva jñāna tayā bādhita anuvṛttiḥ śakyate vaktum

original: “yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit“,
analyzed: yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva vid

original: “parāsya śaktir vividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca“,
analyzed: parā asya śaktiḥ vividhā eva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñāna bala kriyā ca

original: “vedāhaṃ samatītāni vartamānāni cārjuna /
analyzed: veda aham samatītāni vartamānāni ca arjuna

original: bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni māṃ tu veda na kaścana” iti śrutismṛtivirodhāt /
analyzed: bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni mām tu veda na kaścana iti śruti smṛti virodhāt

original: kiṃ ca paramapuruṣaś ca idānīṃtanaguruparamparā ca,
analyzed: kim ca parama puruṣaḥ ca idānīṃtana guru paramparā ca

original: advitīyātmasvarūpaniścaye sati anuvartamāne 'pi bhedajñāne,
analyzed: advitīya ātma svarūpa niścaye sati anuvartamāne api bheda jñāne

original: svaniścayānurūpam advitīyātmajñānaṃ kasmā upadiśatīti vaktavyam //
analyzed: sva niścaya anurūpam advitīya ātma jñānam kasmai upadiśati iti vaktavyam

original: pratibimbavatpratīyamānebhyo 'rjunādibhya iti cet naitad upapadyate;
analyzed: pratibimba vat pratīyamānebhyaḥ arjuna ādibhyaḥ iti ced na etat upapadyate

original: na hy anunmattaḥ ko 'pi maṇikṛpāṇadarpaṇādiṣu pratīyamāneṣu svātmapratibimbeṣu,
analyzed: na hi an unmattaḥ kaḥ api maṇi kṛpāṇa darpaṇa ādiṣu pratīyamāneṣu sva ātma pratibimbeṣu

original: teṣāṃ svātmano 'nanyatvaṃ jānan,
analyzed: teṣām sva ātmanaḥ ananya tvam jānan

original: tebhyaḥ kim apy upadiśati /
analyzed: tebhyaḥ kim api upadiśati

original: bādhitānuvṛttir api tair na śakyate vaktum;
analyzed: bādhita anuvṛttiḥ api taiḥ na śakyate vaktum

original: bādhakenādvitīyātmajñānenātmavyatiriktabhedajñānakāraṇasyānāder vinaṣṭatvāt /
analyzed: bādhakena advitīya ātma jñānena ātma vyatirikta bheda jñāna kāraṇasya anādeḥ vinaṣṭa tvāt

original: dvicandrajñānādau tu candraikatvajñānena pāramārthikatimirādidoṣasya dvicandrajñānahetor avinaṣṭatvād bādhitānuvṛttir yuktā;
analyzed: dvi candra jñāna ādau tu candra eka tva jñānena pāramārthika timira ādi doṣasya dvi candra jñāna hetoḥ avinaṣṭa tvāt bādhita anuvṛttiḥ yuktā

original: anuvartamānam api prabalapramāṇabādhitatvenākiṃcitkaram /
analyzed: anuvartamānam api prabala pramāṇa bādhita tvena akiṃcitkaram

original: iha tu bhedajñānasya saviṣayasya sakāraṇasyāpāramārthikatvena vastuyāthātmyajñānavinaṣṭatvān na kathañcid api bādhitānuvṛttiḥ saṃbhavati /
analyzed: iha tu bheda jñānasya sa viṣayasya sa kāraṇasya apāramārthika tvena vastu yāthātmya jñāna vinaṣṭa tvāt na kathañcid api bādhita anuvṛttiḥ saṃbhavati

original: ataḥ sarveśvarasyedānīṃtanaguruparamparāyāś ca tattvajñānam asti cet,
analyzed: atas sarveśvarasya idānīṃtana guru paramparāyāḥ ca tattva jñānam asti ced

original: bhedadarśanatatkāryopadeśādyasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: bheda darśana tad kārya upadeśa ādi asaṃbhavaḥ

original: nāsti cet, ajñānasya taddhetoḥ sthitatvenājñatvād eva sutarām upadeśo na saṃbhavati //
analyzed: na asti ced ajñānasya tad hetoḥ sthitatvena ajña tvāt eva sutarām upadeśaḥ na saṃbhavati

original: kiṃ ca guror advitīyātmavijñānād eva brahmājñānasya sakāryasya vinaṣṭatvāc śiṣyaṃ praty upadeśo niṣprayojanaḥ /
analyzed: kim ca guroḥ advitīya ātma vijñānāt eva brahma ajñānasya sa kāryasya vinaṣṭa tvāt śiṣyam prati upadeśaḥ niṣprayojanaḥ

original: gurus tajjñānaṃ ca kalpitam iti cet,
analyzed: guruḥ tad jñānam ca kalpitam iti ced

original: śiṣyatajjñānayor api kalpitatvāt tad apy anivartakam /
analyzed: śiṣya tad jñānayoḥ api kalpita tvāt tat api anivartakam

original: kalpitatve 'pi pūrvavirodhitvena nivartakam iti cet,
analyzed: kalpita tve api pūrva virodhi tvena nivartakam iti ced

original: tad acāryajñāne 'pi samānam iti tad eva nivartakaṃ bhavatīty upadeśānarthakyam eva iti kṛtam asamīcīnavādaiḥ // BhGR_2.12 //
analyzed: tat acārya jñāne api samānam iti tat eva nivartakam bhavati iti upadeśa ānarthakyam eva iti kṛtam asamīcīna vādaiḥ

original: dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā /
analyzed: dehinaḥ asmin yathā dehe kaumāram yauvanam jarā

original: tathā dehāntaraprāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati // BhG_2.13 //
analyzed: tathā deha antara prāptiḥ dhīraḥ tatra na muhyati

original: ekasmin dehe vartamānasya dehinaḥ kaumārāvasthāṃ vihāya yauvanādyavasthāprāptau ātmanaḥ sthiratvabuddhyā yathā ātmā naṣṭa iti na śocati,
analyzed: ekasmin dehe vartamānasya dehinaḥ kaumāra avasthām vihāya yauvana ādi avasthā prāptau ātmanaḥ sthira tva buddhyā yathā ātmā naṣṭaḥ iti na śocati

original: dehād dehāntaraprāptāv api tathaiva sthira ātmeti buddhimān na śocati /
analyzed: dehāt deha antara prāptau api tathā eva sthiraḥ ātmā iti buddhimān na śocati

original: ata ātmanāṃ nityatvād ātmano na śokasthānam // BhGR_2.13 //
analyzed: atas ātmanām nitya tvāt ātmanaḥ na śoka sthānam

original: etāvad atra kartavyam ātmanāṃ nityānām evānādikarmavaśyatayā tattatkarmocitadehasaṃsṛṣṭānāṃ
analyzed: etāvat atra kartavyam ātmanām nityānām eva anādi karma vaśya tayā tad tad karma ucita deha saṃsṛṣṭānām

original: tair eva dehair bandhanivṛttaye śāstrīyaṃ svavarṇocitaṃ yuddhādikam anabhisaṃhitaphalaṃ
analyzed: taiḥ eva dehaiḥ bandha nivṛttaye śāstrīyam sva varṇa ucitam yuddha ādikam anabhisaṃhita phalam

original: karma kurvatām avarjanīyatayā indriyair indriyārthasparśāḥ śītoṣṇādiprayuktasukhaduḥkhadā bhavanti,
analyzed: karma kurvatām avarjanīya tayā indriyaiḥ indriyārtha sparśāḥ śīta uṣṇa ādi prayukta sukha duḥkha dāḥ bhavanti

original: te tu yāvacchāstrīyakarmasamāpti kṣantavyā iti /
analyzed: te tu yāvacchāstrīya karma samāpti kṣantavyāḥ iti

original: imam artham anantaram evāha
analyzed: imam artham anantaram eva āha

original: mātrāsparśās tu kaunteya śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkhadāḥ /
analyzed: mātrā sparśāḥ tu kaunteya śīta uṣṇa sukha duḥkha dāḥ

original: āgamāpāyino 'nityās tāṃs titikṣasva bhārata // BhG_2.14 //
analyzed: āgama apāyinaḥ anityāḥ tān titikṣasva bhārata

original: śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ sāśrayāḥ tanmātrākāryatvān mātrā ity ucyante /
analyzed: śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandhāḥ sa āśrayāḥ tanmātra kārya tvāt mātrāḥ iti ucyante

original: śrotrādibhis teṣāṃ sparśāḥ śītoṣṇamṛduparuṣādirūpasukhaduḥkhadāḥ bhavanti /
analyzed: śrotra ādibhiḥ teṣām sparśāḥ śīta uṣṇa mṛdu paruṣa ādi rūpa sukha duḥkha dāḥ bhavanti

original: śītoṣṇaśabdaḥ pradarśanārthaḥ /
analyzed: śīta uṣṇa śabdaḥ pradarśana arthaḥ

original: tān dhairyeṇa yāvadyuddhādiśāstrīyakarmasamāpti titikṣasva /
analyzed: tān dhairyeṇa yāvat yuddha ādi śāstrīya karma samāpti titikṣasva

original: te cāgamāpāyitvād dhairyavatām kṣantuṃ yogyāḥ /
analyzed: te ca āgama apāyi tvāt dhairyavatām kṣantum yogyāḥ

original: anityāś ca te /
analyzed: anityāḥ ca te

original: bandhahetubhūtakarmanāśe sati āgamāpāyitvenāpi na vartante ityarthaḥ // BhGR_2.14 //
analyzed: bandha hetu bhūta karma nāśe sati āgama apāyi tvena api na vartante iti arthaḥ

original: tatkṣamā kimarthety atrāha
analyzed: tad kṣamā kimarthā iti atra āha

original: yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha /
analyzed: yam hi na vyathayanti ete puruṣam puruṣa ṛṣabha

original: samaduḥkhasukhaṃ dhīraṃ so 'mṛtatvāya kalpate // BhG_2.15 //
analyzed: sama duḥkha sukham dhīram saḥ amṛta tvāya kalpate

original: yaṃ puruṣaṃ dhairyayuktam avarjanīyaduḥkhaṃ sukhavan manyamānam,
analyzed: yam puruṣam dhairya yuktam avarjanīya duḥkham sukhavat manyamānam

original: amṛtatvasādhanatayā svavarṇocitaṃ yuddhādikarma anabhisaṃhitaphalaṃ kurvāṇaṃ tadantargatāḥ śastrapātādimṛdukrūrasparśāḥ na vyathayanti;
analyzed: amṛta tva sādhanatayā sva varṇa ucitam yuddha ādi karma anabhisaṃhita phalam kurvāṇam tad antargatāḥ śastra pāta ādi mṛdu krūra sparśāḥ na vyathayanti

original: sa evāmṛtatvaṃ sādhayati /
analyzed: saḥ eva amṛta tvam sādhayati

original: na tvādṛśo duḥkhāsahiṣṇur ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na tvādṛśaḥ duḥkha a sahiṣṇuḥ iti arthaḥ

original: ātmanāṃ nityatvād etāvad atra kartavyam ityarthaḥ // BhGR_2.15 //
analyzed: ātmanām nitya tvāt etāvat atra kartavyam iti arthaḥ

original: yat tu ātmanāṃ nityatvaṃ dehānāṃ svābhāvikaṃ nāśitvaṃ ca śokānimittam uktam,
analyzed: yat tu ātmanām nitya tvam dehānām svābhāvikam nāśi tvam ca śoka a nimittam uktam

original: “gatāsūn agatāsūṃś ca nānuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ” iti,
analyzed: gatāsūn a gatāsūn ca na anuśocanti paṇḍitāḥ iti

original: tad upapādayitum ārabhate
analyzed: tat upapādayitum ārabhate

original: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ /
analyzed: na asataḥ vidyate bhāvaḥ na abhāvaḥ vidyate sataḥ

original: ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ // BhG_2.16 //
analyzed: ubhayoḥ api dṛṣṭaḥ antaḥ tu anayoḥ tattva darśibhiḥ

original: asataḥ dehasya sadbhāvo na vidyate /
analyzed: asataḥ dehasya sadbhāvaḥ na vidyate

original: sataś cātmano nāsadbhāvaḥ /
analyzed: sataḥ ca ātmanaḥ na asadbhāvaḥ

original: ubhayoḥ dehātmanor upalabhyamānayor yathopalabdhi tattvadarśibhir anto dṛṣṭaḥ nirṇayāntatvān nirūpaṇasya nirṇaya iha antaśabdenocyate /
analyzed: ubhayoḥ deha ātmanoḥ upalabhyamānayoḥ yathopalabdhi tattva darśibhiḥ antaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ nirṇaya anta tvāt nirūpaṇasya nirṇayaḥ iha anta śabdena ucyate

original: dehasyācidvastuno 'sattvam eva svarūpam;
analyzed: dehasya acit vastunaḥ asattvam eva svarūpam

original: ātmanaś cetanasya sattvam eva svarūpam iti nirṇayo dṛṣṭa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ātmanaḥ cetanasya sattvam eva svarūpam iti nirṇayaḥ dṛṣṭaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: vināśasvabhāvo hy asattvam /
analyzed: vināśa svabhāvaḥ hi asattvam

original: avināśasvabhāvaś ca sattvam /
analyzed: avināśa svabhāvaḥ ca sattvam

original: yathā uktaṃ bhagavatā parāśareṇa,
analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā parāśareṇa

original: “tasmān na vijñānam ṛte 'sti kiṃcit kvacit kadācid dvija vastujātam“,
analyzed: tasmāt na vijñānam ṛte asti kiṃcid kvacid kadācid dvija vastu jātam

original: “sadbhāva evaṃ bhavato mayokto jñānaṃ yathā satyam asatyam anyat“,
analyzed: sadbhāvaḥ evam bhavataḥ mayā uktaḥ jñānam yathā satyam asatyam anyat

original: “anāśī paramārthaś ca prājñair abhyupagamyate /
analyzed: anāśī parama arthaḥ ca prājñaiḥ abhyupagamyate

original: tat tu nāśi na saṃdeho nāśidravyopapāditam“,
analyzed: tat tu na saṃdehaḥ

original: “yat tu kālāntareṇāpi nānyasaṃjñām upaiti vai /
analyzed: yat tu kāla antareṇa api na anya saṃjñām upaiti vai

original: pariṇāmādisaṃbhūtāṃ tad vastu nṛpa tac ca kim” iti /
analyzed: pariṇāma ādi saṃbhūtām tat vastu nṛpa tat ca kim iti

original: atrāpi “antavanta ime dehāḥ“,
analyzed: atra api antavantaḥ ime dehāḥ

original: “avināśi tu tad viddhi” iti hy ucyate /
analyzed: avināśi tu tat viddhi iti hi ucyate

original: tad eva sattvāsattvavyapadeśahetur iti gamyate //
analyzed: tat eva sattva asattva vyapadeśa hetuḥ iti gamyate

original: atra tu satkāryavādasyāprastutatvān na tatparo 'yaṃ ślokaḥ;
analyzed: atra tu satkārya vādasya aprastuta tvāt na tad paraḥ ayam ślokaḥ

original: dehātmasvabhāvājñānamohitasya tanmohaśāntaye hy ubhayor nāśitvānāśitvarūpasvabhāvaviveka eva vaktavyaḥ /
analyzed: deha ātma svabhāva ajñāna mohitasya tad moha śāntaye hi ubhayoḥ nāśi tva anāśi tva rūpa svabhāva vivekaḥ eva vaktavyaḥ

original: sa eva “gatāsūn agatāsūn” iti ca prastutaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva gatāsūn a gata asūn iti ca prastutaḥ

original: sa eva ca, “avināśi tu tad viddhi“,
analyzed: saḥ eva ca avināśi tu tat viddhi

original: “antavanta ime dehāḥ” iti anantaram upapādyate /
analyzed: antavantaḥ ime dehāḥ iti anantaram upapādyate

original: ato yathā ukta evārthaḥ // BhGR_2.16 //
analyzed: atas yathā uktaḥ eva arthaḥ

original: ātmanas tv avināśitvaṃ katham avagamyata ity atrāha
analyzed: ātmanaḥ tu avināśi tvam katham avagamyate iti atra āha

original: * avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam /
analyzed: avināśi tu tat viddhi yena sarvam idam tatam

original: * vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaścit kartum arhati // BhG_2.17 //
analyzed: vināśam avyayasya asya na kaścid kartum arhati

original: tad atmatattvam avināśīti viddhi,
analyzed: tat ātma tattvam avināśi iti viddhi

original: yena ātmatattvena cetanena tadvyatiriktam idam acetanatattvaṃ sarvaṃ tataṃ vyāptam /
analyzed: yena ātma tattvena cetanena tad vyatiriktam idam acetana tattvam sarvam tatam vyāptam

original: vyāpakatvena niratiśayasūkṣmatvād ātmano vināśānarhasya tadvyatirikto na kaścit padārtho vināśam kartum arhati,
analyzed: vyāpaka tvena niratiśaya sūkṣma tvāt ātmanaḥ vināśa anarhasya tad vyatiriktaḥ na kaścid padārthaḥ vināśam kartum arhati

original: tadvyāpyatayā tasmāt sthūlatvāt /
analyzed: tad vyāpya tayā tasmāt sthūla tvāt

original: nāśakaṃ hi śastrajalāgnivāyvādikaṃ nāśyaṃ vyāpya śithilīkaroti /
analyzed: nāśakam hi śastra jala agni vāyu ādikam nāśyam vyāpya śithilīkaroti

original: mudrādayo 'pi hi vegavat saṃyogena vāyum utpādya taddvāreṇa nāśayanti /
analyzed: mudrā ādayaḥ api hi vegavat saṃyogena vāyum utpādya tad dvāreṇa nāśayanti

original: ata ātmatattvam avināśi // BhGR_2.17 //
analyzed: atas ātma tattvam avināśi

original: dehānāṃ tu vināśitvam eva svabhāva ityāha
analyzed: dehānām tu vināśi tvam eva svabhāvaḥ iti āha

original: antavanta ime dehā nityasyoktāḥ śarīriṇaḥ /
analyzed: antavantaḥ ime dehāḥ nityasya uktāḥ śarīriṇaḥ

original: anāśino 'prameyasya tasmād yudhyasva bhārata // BhG_2.18 //
analyzed: anāśinaḥ aprameyasya tasmāt yudhyasva bhārata

original: “diha upacaye” ityupacayarūpā ime dehā antavantaḥ vināśasvabhāvāḥ /
analyzed: upacaye iti upacaya rūpāḥ ime dehāḥ antavantaḥ vināśa svabhāvāḥ

original: upacayātmakā hi ghaṭādayo 'ntavanto dṛṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: upacaya ātmakāḥ hi ghaṭa ādayaḥ antavantaḥ dṛṣṭāḥ

original: nityasya śarīriṇaḥ karmaphalabhogārthatayā bhūtasaṃghātarūpā dehāḥ,
analyzed: nityasya śarīriṇaḥ karma phala bhoga artha tayā bhūta saṃghāta rūpāḥ dehāḥ

original: “puṇyaḥ puṇyena” ityādiśāstrair uktāḥ karmāvasānavināśinaḥ /
analyzed: puṇyaḥ puṇyena ityādi śāstraiḥ uktāḥ karma avasāna vināśinaḥ

original: ātmā tv avināśī; kutaḥ ?
analyzed: ātmā tu avināśī kutas

original: aprameyatvāt /
analyzed: aprameya tvāt

original: na hy ātmā prameyatayopalabhyate,
analyzed: na hi ātmā prameya tayā upalabhyate

original: api tu pramātṛtayā /
analyzed: api tu pramātṛ tayā

original: tathā ca vakṣyate,
analyzed: tathā ca vakṣyate

original: “etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ” iti /
analyzed: etat yaḥ vetti tam prāhuḥ kṣetrajñaḥ iti tad vidaḥ iti

original: na cānekopacayātmaka ātmopalabhayate,
analyzed: na ca aneka upacaya ātmakaḥ ātmā upalabhayate

original: sarvatra dehe “aham idaṃ jānāmi” iti dehasya cānyasya ca pramātṛtayaikarūpeṇopalabdheḥ /
analyzed: sarvatra dehe aham idam jānāmi iti dehasya ca anyasya ca pramātṛ tayā eka rūpeṇa upalabdheḥ

original: na ca dehāder iva pradeśabhede pramātur ākārabheda upalabhyate /
analyzed: na ca deha ādeḥ iva pradeśa bhede pramātuḥ ākāra bhedaḥ upalabhyate

original: ata ekarūpatvena anupacayātmakatvāt pramātṛtvād vyāpakatvāc ca ātmā nityaḥ /
analyzed: atas eka rūpa tvena anupacaya ātmaka tvāt pramātṛ tvāt vyāpaka tvāt ca ātmā nityaḥ

original: dehas tu upacayātmakatvāt,
analyzed: dehaḥ tu upacaya ātmaka tvāt

original: śarīriṇaḥ karmaphalabhogārthatvāt,
analyzed: śarīriṇaḥ karma phala bhoga artha tvāt

original: anekarūpatvāt,
analyzed: aneka rūpa tvāt

original: vyāpyatvāc ca vināśī /
analyzed: vyāpya tvāt ca vināśī

original: tasmād dehasya vināśasvabhāvatvād atmano nityatvāc ca ubhayāv api na śokasthānam iti,
analyzed: tasmāt dehasya vināśa svabhāva tvāt atmanaḥ nitya tvāt ca ubhayau api na śoka sthānam iti

original: śastrapātādipuruṣasparśān avarjanīyān svagatān anyagatāṃś ca ghairyeṇa soḍhvā amṛtatvaprāptaye anabhisaṃhitaphalaṃ yuddhākhyaṃ karmārabhasva
analyzed: śastra pāta ādi puruṣa sparśān avarjanīyān sva gatān anya gatān ca ghairyeṇa soḍhvā amṛta tva prāptaye anabhisaṃhita phalam yuddha ākhyam karma ārabhasva

original: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainan manyate hatam /
analyzed: yaḥ enam vetti hantāram yaḥ ca enat manyate hatam

original: ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate // BhG_2.19 //
analyzed: ubhau tau na vijānītaḥ na ayam hanti na hanyate

original: enam uktasvabhāvam ātmānaṃ prati,
analyzed: enam ukta svabhāvam ātmānam prati

original: hantāraṃ hananahetuṃ kam api yo manyate;
analyzed: hantāram hanana hetum kam api yaḥ manyate

original: yaś cainaṃ kenāpi hetunā hataṃ manyate;
analyzed: yaḥ ca enam kena api hetunā hatam manyate

original: tāv ubhau na vijānītaḥ,
analyzed: tau ubhau na vijānītaḥ

original: uktair hetubhir asya nityatvād eva enam ayaṃ na hanti asyāyaṃ hananahetur na bhavati /
analyzed: uktaiḥ hetubhiḥ asya nitya tvāt eva enam ayam na hanti asya ayam hanana hetuḥ na bhavati

original: ata eva cāyam ātmā na hanyate /
analyzed: atas eva ca ayam ātmā na hanyate

original: hantidhātur apy ātmakarmakaḥ śarīraviyogakaraṇavācī /
analyzed: hanti dhātuḥ api ātma karmakaḥ śarīra viyoga karaṇa vācī

original: “na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni“,
analyzed: na hiṃsyāt sarvā bhūtāni

original: “brāhmaṇo na hantavyaḥ” ityādīny api
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ na hantavyaḥ ityādīni api

original: śāstrāṇi avihitaśarīraviyogakaraṇaviṣayāṇi // BhGR_2.19 //
analyzed: śāstrāṇi avihita śarīra viyoga karaṇa viṣayāṇi

original: na jāyate mriyate vā kadācin nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ /
analyzed: na jāyate mriyate vā kadācid na ayam bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyas

original: ajo nityaḥ śāśvato 'yaṃ purāṇo na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre // BhG_2.20 //
analyzed: ajaḥ nityaḥ śāśvataḥ ayam purāṇaḥ na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre

original: uktair eva hetubhir nityatvenāpariṇāmitvād ātmano jananamaraṇādayaḥ sarva evācetanadehadharmā na santīty ucyate /
analyzed: uktaiḥ eva hetubhiḥ nitya tvena apariṇāmi tvāt ātmanaḥ janana maraṇa ādayaḥ sarve eva acetana deha dharmāḥ na santi iti ucyate

original: tatra jāyate,
analyzed: tatra jāyate

original: mriyate iti vartamānatayā sarveṣu deheṣu sarvair anubhūyamāne jananamaraṇe kadācid apy ātmānaṃ na spṛśataḥ /
analyzed: mriyate iti vartamānatayā sarveṣu deheṣu sarvaiḥ anubhūyamāne janana maraṇe kadācid api ātmānam na spṛśataḥ

original: nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ ayaṃ kalpādau bhūtvā
analyzed: na ayam bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyas ayam kalpa ādau bhūtvā

original: bhūyaḥ kalpānte ca na na bhavitā;
analyzed: bhūyas kalpa ante ca na na bhavitā

original: keṣucit prajāpatiprabhṛtideheṣv āgamenopalabhyamānaṃ kalpādau jananaṃ kalpānte ca maraṇam ātmānaṃ na spṛśatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: keṣucid prajāpati prabhṛti deheṣu āgamena upalabhyamānam kalpa ādau jananam kalpa ante ca maraṇam ātmānam na spṛśati iti arthaḥ

original: ataḥ sarvadehagata ātmā ajaḥ,
analyzed: atas sarva deha gataḥ ātmā ajaḥ

original: ata eva nityaḥ /
analyzed: atas eva nityaḥ

original: śāśvataḥ prakṛtivadaviśadasatatapariṇāmair api nānvīyate,
analyzed: śāśvataḥ prakṛti vat aviśada satata pariṇāmaiḥ api na anvīyate

original: purāṇaḥ purāpi navaḥ;
analyzed: purāṇaḥ purā api navaḥ

original: sarvadā apūrvavad anubhāvya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sarvadā apūrva vat anubhāvyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: ataḥ śarīre hanyamāne na hanyate 'yam ātmā // BhGR_2.20 //
analyzed: atas śarīre hanyamāne na hanyate ayam ātmā

original: vedāvināśinaṃ nityaṃ ya enam ajam avyayam /
analyzed: veda avināśinam nityam yaḥ enam ajam avyayam

original: kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam // BhG_2.21 //
analyzed: katham sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kam ghātayati hanti kam

original: evam avināśitvenājatvena vyayānarhatvena ca nityam enam ātmānaṃ yaḥ puruṣo veda,
analyzed: evam avināśi tvena aja tvena vyaya anarha tvena ca nityam enam ātmānam yaḥ puruṣaḥ veda

original: sa puruṣo devamanuṣyatiryaksthāvaraśarīrāvasthiteṣv ātmasu kam apy ātmānaṃ kathaṃ ghātayati ?
analyzed: sa puruṣaḥ deva manuṣya tiryak sthāvara śarīra avasthiteṣu ātmasu kam api ātmānam katham ghātayati

original: kaṃ vā kathaṃ hanti /
analyzed: kam vā katham hanti

original: kathaṃ nāśayati;
analyzed: katham nāśayati

original: kathaṃ vā tatprayojako bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: katham vā tad prayojakaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: etān ātmano ghātayāmi hanmīty anuśocanam ātmasvarūpayāthātmyājñānamūlam evetyabhiprāyaḥ // BhGR_2.21 //
analyzed: etān ātmanaḥ ghātayāmi hanmi iti anuśocanam ātma svarūpa yāthātmya ajñāna mūlam eva iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: yady api nityānām ātmanāṃ śarīraviśleṣamātraṃ kriyate tathāpi ramaṇīyabhogasādhaneṣu śarīreṣu naśyatsu tadviyogarūpaṃ śokanimittam asty evety
analyzed: yadi api nityānām ātmanām śarīra viśleṣa mātram kriyate tathā api ramaṇīya bhoga sādhaneṣu śarīreṣu naśyatsu tad viyoga rūpam śoka nimittam asti eva iti

original: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naro 'parāṇi /
analyzed: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti naraḥ aparāṇi

original: tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāny anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī // BhG_2.22 //
analyzed: tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāni anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī

original: dharmayuddhe śarīraṃ tyajatāṃ tyaktaśarīrād adhikatarakalyāṇaśarīragrahaṇaṃ śāstrād
analyzed: dharma yuddhe śarīram tyajatām tyakta śarīrāt adhikatara kalyāṇa śarīra grahaṇam śāstrāt

original: avagamyata iti jīrṇāni vāsāṃsi vihāya navāni kalyāṇāni vāsāṃsi gṛhṇatām iva harṣanimittam
analyzed: avagamyate iti jīrṇāni vāsāṃsi vihāya navāni kalyāṇāni vāsāṃsi gṛhṇatām iva harṣa nimittam

original: evātropalabhyate // BhGR_2.22 //
analyzed: eva atra upalabhyate

original: punar api “avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam” iti pūrvoktam avināśitvaṃ sukhagrahaṇāya vyañjayan draḍhayati
analyzed: punar api avināśi tu tat viddhi yena sarvam idam tatam iti pūrva uktam avināśi tvam sukha grahaṇāya vyañjayan draḍhayati

original: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ /
analyzed: na enam chindanti śastrāṇi na enam dahati pāvakaḥ

original: na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ // BhG_2.23 //
analyzed: na ca enam kledayanti āpaḥ na śoṣayati mārutaḥ

original: acchedyo 'yam adāhyo 'yam akledyo 'śoṣya eva ca /
analyzed: acchedyaḥ ayam adāhyaḥ ayam akledyaḥ aśoṣyaḥ eva ca

original: nityas sarvagataḥ sthāṇur acalo 'yaṃ sanātanaḥ // BhG_2.24 //
analyzed: nityaḥ sarva gataḥ sthāṇuḥ acalaḥ ayam sanātanaḥ

original: śastrāgnyambuvāyavaḥ chedanadahanakledanaśoṣaṇāni ātmānaṃ prati kartuṃ na śaknuvanti,
analyzed: śastra agni ambu vāyavaḥ chedana dahana kledana śoṣaṇāni ātmānam prati kartum na śaknuvanti

original: sarvagatatvād ātmanaḥ sarvatattvavyāpanasvabhāvatayā sarvebhyas tattvebhyas sūkṣmatvād asya tair vyāptyanarhatvāt;
analyzed: sarvagata tvāt ātmanaḥ sarva tattva vyāpana svabhāva tayā sarvebhyaḥ tattvebhyaḥ sūkṣma tvāt asya taiḥ vyāpti anarha tvāt

original: vyāpyakartavyatvāc ca chedanadahanakledanaśoṣaṇānāṃ /
analyzed: vyāpya kartavya tvāt ca chedana dahana kledana śoṣaṇānām

original: ata ātmā nityaḥ sthāṇur acalo 'yaṃ sanātanaḥ sthirasvabhāvo 'prakampyaḥ purātanaś ca // BhGR_2.23 //24//
analyzed: atas ātmā nityaḥ sthāṇuḥ acalaḥ ayam sanātanaḥ sthira svabhāvaḥ aprakampyaḥ purātanaḥ ca

original: avyakto 'yam acintyo 'yam avikāryo 'yam ucyate /
analyzed: avyaktaḥ ayam acintyaḥ ayam avikāryaḥ ayam ucyate

original: tasmād evaṃ viditvainaṃ nānuśocitum arhasi // BhG_2.25 //
analyzed: tasmāt evam viditvā enam na anuśocitum arhasi

original: chedanādiyogyāni vastūni yaiḥ pramāṇair vyajyante;
analyzed: chedana ādi yogyāni vastūni yaiḥ pramāṇaiḥ vyajyante

original: tair ayam ātmā na vyajyata ity avyaktaḥ;
analyzed: taiḥ ayam ātmā na vyajyate iti avyaktaḥ

original: ataḥ chedyādivisajātīyaḥ /
analyzed: atas chedya ādi visajātīyaḥ

original: acintyaś ca sarvavastuvijātīyatvena tattatsvabhāvayuktatayā cintayitum api nārhaḥ;
analyzed: acintyaḥ ca sarva vastu vijātīya tvena tad tad svabhāva yuktatayā cintayitum api nā arhaḥ

original: ataś cāvikāryaḥ vikārānarhaḥ /
analyzed: atas ca avikāryaḥ vikāra anarhaḥ

original: tasmād uktalakṣaṇam enam ātmānaṃ viditvā tatkṛte nānuśocitum arhasi // BhGR_2.25 //
analyzed: tasmāt ukta lakṣaṇam enam ātmānam viditvā tad kṛte na anuśocitum arhasi

original: atha cainaṃ nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam /
analyzed: atha ca enam nitya jātam nityam vā manyase mṛtam

original: tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho/
analyzed: tathā api tvam mahā bāho

original: naivaṃ śocitum arhasi // BhG_2.26 //
analyzed: na evam śocitum arhasi

original: atha nityajātaṃ nityamṛtaṃ deham evainam ātmānaṃ manuṣe,
analyzed: atha nitya jātam nitya mṛtam deham eva enam ātmānam manuṣe

original: na dehātiriktam uktalakṣaṇam;
analyzed: na deha atiriktam ukta lakṣaṇam

original: tathāpi evam atimātraṃ na śocitum arhasi;
analyzed: tathā api evam atimātram na śocitum arhasi

original: pariṇāmasvabhāvasya dehasyotpattivināśayor avarjanīyatvāt // BhGR_2.26 //
analyzed: pariṇāma svabhāvasya dehasya utpatti vināśayoḥ avarjanīya tvāt

original: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca /
analyzed: jātasya hi dhruvaḥ mṛtyuḥ dhruvam janma mṛtasya ca

original: tasmād aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi // BhG_2.27 //
analyzed: tasmāt aparihārye arthe na tvam śocitum arhasi

original: utpannasya vināśo dhruvaḥ avarjanīya upalabhyate;
analyzed: utpannasya vināśaḥ dhruvaḥ avarjanīyaḥ upalabhyate

original: tathā vinaṣṭasyāpi janma avarjanīyam /
analyzed: tathā vinaṣṭasya api janma avarjanīyam

original: katham idam upapadyate vinaṣṭasyotpattir iti;
analyzed: katham idam upapadyate vinaṣṭasya utpattiḥ iti

original: sata evotpattyupalabdheḥ,
analyzed: sataḥ eva utpatti upalabdheḥ

original: asataś cānupalabdheḥ /
analyzed: asataḥ ca anupalabdheḥ

original: utpattivināśādayaḥ sato dravyasyāvasthāviśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: utpatti vināśa ādayaḥ sataḥ dravyasya avasthā viśeṣāḥ

original: tantuprabhṛtīni hi dravyāṇi santy eva racanāviśeṣayuktāni paṭādīny ucyante /
analyzed: tantu prabhṛtīni hi dravyāṇi santi eva racanā viśeṣa yuktāni paṭa ādīni ucyante

original: asatkāryavādināpy etāvad evopalabhyate /
analyzed: asatkārya vādinā api etāvat evā upalabhyate

original: na hi tatra tantusaṃsthānaviśeṣātirekeṇa dravyāntaraṃ pratīyate /
analyzed: na hi tatra tantu saṃsthāna viśeṣa atirekeṇa dravya antaram pratīyate

original: kārakavyāpāranāmāntarabhajanavyavahāraviśeṣāṇām etāvataivopapatteḥ na dravyāntarakalpanā yuktā /
analyzed: kāraka vyāpāra nāma antara bhajana vyavahāra viśeṣāṇām etāvatā eva upapatteḥ na dravya antara kalpanā yuktā

original: ato utpattivināśādayaḥ sato dravyasyāvasthāviśeṣāḥ /
analyzed: atas utpatti vināśa ādayaḥ sataḥ dravyasya avasthā viśeṣāḥ

original: utpattyākhyām avasthām upayātasya dravyasya tadvirodhyavasthāntaraprāptir vināśa ity ucyate /
analyzed: utpatti ākhyām avasthām upayātasya dravyasya tad virodhi avasthā antara prāptiḥ vināśaḥ iti ucyate

original: mṛddravyasya piṇḍatvaghaṭatvakapālatvacūrṇatvādivat pariṇāmidravyasya pariṇāmaparamparā avarjanīyā /
analyzed: mṛd dravyasya piṇḍa tva ghaṭa tva kapāla tva cūrṇa tva ādi vat pariṇāmi dravyasya pariṇāma paramparā avarjanīyā

original: tatra pūrvāvasthasya dravyasyottarāvasthāprāptir vināśaḥ /
analyzed: tatra pūrva avasthasya dravyasya uttara avasthā prāptiḥ vināśaḥ

original: saiva tadavasthasya cotpattiḥ /
analyzed: sā eva tad avasthasya ca utpattiḥ

original: evam utpattivināśākhyapariṇāmaparamparā pariṇāmino dravyasyāparihāryeti na tatra śocitum arhasi // BhGR_2.27 //
analyzed: evam utpatti vināśa ākhya pariṇāma paramparā pariṇāminaḥ dravyasya a parihāryā iti na tatra śocitum arhasi

original: sato dravyasya pūrvāvasthāvirodhyavasthāntaraprāptidarśanena yo 'lpīyān śokaḥ,
analyzed: sataḥ dravyasya pūrva avasthā virodhi avasthā antara prāpti darśanena yaḥ alpīyān śokaḥ

original: so 'pi manuṣyādibhūteṣu na saṃbhavatīty āha
analyzed: saḥ api manuṣya ādi bhūteṣu na saṃbhavati iti āha

original: avyaktādīni bhūtāni vyaktamadhyāni bhārata /
analyzed: avyakta ādīni bhūtāni vyakta madhyāni bhārata

original: avyaktanidhanāny eva tatra kā paridevanā // BhG_2.28 //
analyzed: avyakta nidhanāni eva tatra kā paridevanā

original: manuṣyādīni bhūtāni santy eva dravyāṇi anupalabdhapūrvāvasthāni upalabdhamanuṣyatvādimadhyamāvasthāni
analyzed: manuṣya ādīni bhūtāni santi eva dravyāṇi anupalabdha pūrva avasthāni upalabdha manuṣya tva ādi madhyama avasthāni

original: anupalabdhottarāvasthāni sveṣu svabhāveṣu vartanta iti na tatra paridevanānimittam
analyzed: anupalabdha uttara avasthāni sveṣu svabhāveṣu vartante iti na tatra paridevanā nimittam

original: asti // BhGR_2.28 //
analyzed: asti

original: evaṃ śarīrātmavāde 'pi nāsti śokanimittam ity uktvā śarīrātirikte āścaryasvarūpe ātmani draṣṭā vaktā śravaṇāyattātmaniścayaś ca durlabha ity
analyzed: evam śarīra ātma vāde api na asti śoka nimittam iti uktvā śarīra atirikte āścarya svarūpe ātmani draṣṭā vaktā śravaṇa āyatta ātma niścayaḥ ca durlabhaḥ iti

original: āścaryavat paśyati kaścid enam āścaryavad vadati tathaiva cānyaḥ /
analyzed: āścarya vat paśyati kaścid enam āścarya vat vadati tathā eva ca anyaḥ

original: āścaryavac cainam anyaḥ śṛṇoti śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaścit // BhG_2.29 //
analyzed: āścarya vat ca enam anyaḥ śṛṇoti śrutvā api enam veda na ca eva kaścid

original: evam uktasvabhāvaṃ svetarasamastavastuvisajātīyatayā āścaryavad asthitam ananteṣu jantuṣu mahatā tapasā kṣīṇapāpaḥ upacitapuṇyaḥ kaścit paśyati
analyzed: evam ukta svabhāvam sva itara samasta vastu visajātīya tayā āścarya vat asthitam ananteṣu jantuṣu mahatā tapasā kṣīṇa pāpaḥ upacita puṇyaḥ kaścid paśyati

original: tathāvidhaḥ kaścit parasmai vadati /
analyzed: tathāvidhaḥ kaścid parasmai vadati

original: evaṃ kaścid eva śṛṇoti /
analyzed: evam kaścid eva śṛṇoti

original: śrutvāpy enaṃ yathāvad avasthitaṃ tattvato na kaścid veda /
analyzed: śrutvā api enam yathāvat avasthitam tattvataḥ na kaścid veda

original: cakārād draṣṭṛvaktṛśrotṛṣv api tattvato darśanaṃ tattvato vacanaṃ tattvataś śravaṇaṃ durlabham ityuktaṃ bhavati // BhGR_2.29 //
analyzed: cakārāt draṣṭṛ vaktṛ śrotṛṣu api tattvataḥ darśanam tattvataḥ vacanam tattvataḥ śravaṇam durlabham iti uktam bhavati

original: dehī nityam avadhyo 'yaṃ dehe sarvasya bhārata /
analyzed: dehī nityam avadhyaḥ ayam dehe sarvasya bhārata

original: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi // BhG_2.30 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvam śocitum arhasi

original: sarvasya devādidehino dehe vadhyamāne 'py ayaṃ dehī nityam avadhyo mantavyaḥ /
analyzed: sarvasya deva ādi dehinaḥ dehe vadhyamāne api ayam dehī nityam avadhyaḥ mantavyaḥ

original: tasmāt sarvāṇi devādisthāvarāntāni bhūtāni viṣamākārāṇy apy uktena svabhāvena svarūpatas samānāni nityāni ca /
analyzed: tasmāt sarvāṇi deva ādi sthāvara antāni bhūtāni viṣama ākārāṇi api uktena svabhāvena svarūpataḥ samānāni nityāni ca

original: dehagataṃ tu vaiṣamyam anityatvaṃ ca /
analyzed: deha gatam tu vaiṣamyam anitya tvam ca

original: tato devādīni sarvāṇi bhūtāny uddiśya na śocitum arhasi;
analyzed: tatas deva ādīni sarvāṇi bhūtāni uddiśya na śocitum arhasi

original: na kevalaṃ bhīṣmādīn prati // BhGR_2.30 //
analyzed: na kevalam bhīṣma ādīn prati

original: svadharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasi /
analyzed: svadharmam api ca avekṣya na vikampitum arhasi

original: dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate // BhG_2.31 //
analyzed: dharmyāt hi yuddhāt śreyaḥ anyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate

original: api cedaṃ prārabdhaṃ yuddhaṃ prāṇimāraṇam api agnīṣomīyādivat svadharmam avekṣya na vikampitum arhasi /
analyzed: api ca idam prārabdham yuddham prāṇi māraṇam api agnīṣomīya ādi vat svadharmam avekṣya na vikampitum arhasi

original: dharmyān nyāyataḥ pravṛttād yuddhād anyan na hi kṣatriyasya śreyo vidyate /
analyzed: dharmyāt nyāyataḥ pravṛttāt yuddhāt anyat na hi kṣatriyasya śreyaḥ vidyate

original: “śauryaṃ tejo dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ yuddhe cāpy apalāyanam /
analyzed: śauryam tejaḥ dhṛtiḥ dākṣyam yuddhe ca api apalāyanam

original: dānam īśvarabhāvaś ca kṣātraṃ karma svabhāvajam //
analyzed: dānam īśvara bhāvaḥ ca kṣātram karma svabhāva jam

original: ” iti hi vakṣyate /
analyzed: iti hi vakṣyate

original: agnīṣomīyādiṣu ca na hiṃsā paśoḥ,
analyzed: agnīṣomīya ādiṣu ca na hiṃsā paśoḥ

original: nihīnataracchāgādidehaparityāgapūrvaka
analyzed: nihīnatara chāga ādi deha parityāga pūrvaka

original: kalyāṇataradehasvargādiprāpakatvaśruteḥ saṃjñapanasya /
analyzed: kalyāṇatara deha svarga ādi prāpaka tva śruteḥ saṃjñapanasya

original: “na vā u etan mriyase na riṣyasi devāṃ ideṣi pathibhis surebhiḥ /
analyzed: na vai u etat mriyase na riṣyasi devān id eṣi pathibhiḥ surebhiḥ

original: yatra yanti sukṛto nāpi duṣkṛtaḥ tatra tvā devas savitā dadhātu” iti hi śrūyate /
analyzed: yatra yanti su kṛtaḥ na api duṣkṛtaḥ tatra tvā devaḥ savitā dadhātu iti hi śrūyate

original: iha ca yuddhe mṛtānāṃ kalyāṇataradehaprāptir uktā,
analyzed: iha ca yuddhe mṛtānām kalyāṇatara deha prāptiḥ uktā

original: “vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti” ityādinā /
analyzed: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya navāni gṛhṇāti ityādinā

original: ataḥ, cikitsakaśalyādikarma āturasyeva,
analyzed: atas cikitsaka śalya ādi karma āturasya iva

original: asya rakṣaṇam evāgnīṣomīyādiṣu saṃjñapanam // BhGR_2.31 //
analyzed: asya rakṣaṇam eva agnīṣomīya ādiṣu saṃjñapanam

original: yadṛcchayā copapannaṃ svargadvāram apāvṛtam /
analyzed: yadṛcchayā ca upapannam svarga dvāram apāvṛtam

original: sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam // BhG_2.32 //
analyzed: sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam

original: ayatnopanatam idaṃ niratiśayasukhopāyabhūtaṃ nirvighnam īdṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ sukhinaḥ puṇyavantaḥ kṣatriyā labhante // BhGR_2.32 //
analyzed: ayatna upanatam idam niratiśaya sukha upāya bhūtam nirvighnam īdṛśam yuddham sukhinaḥ puṇyavantaḥ kṣatriyāḥ labhante

original: atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi /
analyzed: atha ced tvam imam dharmyam saṃgrāmam na kariṣyasi

original: tataḥ svadharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi // BhG_2.33 //
analyzed: tatas svadharmam kīrtim ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi

original: atha kṣatriyasya svadharmabhūtam imam ārabdhaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ mohān na kariṣyasi cet tataḥ prārabdhasya dharmasyākaraṇāt svadharmaphalaṃ niratiśayasukham,
analyzed: atha kṣatriyasya svadharma bhūtam imam ārabdham saṃgrāmam mohāt na kariṣyasi ced tatas prārabdhasya dharmasya akaraṇāt svadharma phalam niratiśaya sukham

original: vijayena niratiśayāṃ ca kīrtiṃ hitvā pāpaṃ niratiśayam avāpsyasi // BhGR_2.33 //
analyzed: vijayena niratiśayām ca kīrtim hitvā pāpam niratiśayam avāpsyasi

original: akīrtiṃ cāpi bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti te 'vyayām /
analyzed: akīrtim ca api bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti te avyayām

original: saṃbhāvitasya cākīrtiḥ maraṇād atiricyate // BhG_2.34 //
analyzed: saṃbhāvitasya ca akīrtiḥ maraṇāt atiricyate

original: na te kevalaṃ niratiśayasukhakīrtihānimātram /
analyzed: na te kevalam niratiśaya sukha kīrti hāni mātram

original: “pārtho yuddhe prārabdhe palāyitaḥ” iti avyayāṃ sarvadeśakālavyāpinīm akīrtiṃ ca samarthāni asamarthāny api sarvāṇi bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti /
analyzed: pārthaḥ yuddhe prārabdhe palāyitaḥ iti avyayām sarva deśa kāla vyāpinīm akīrtim ca samarthāni asamarthāni api sarvāṇi bhūtāni kathayiṣyanti

original: tataḥ kim iti cet śairyavīryaparākramādibhis sarvasaṃbhāvitasya tadviparyayajā hy akīrtiḥ maraṇād atiricyate /
analyzed: tatas kim iti ced śairya vīrya parākrama ādibhiḥ sarva saṃbhāvitasya tad viparyaya jā hi akīrtiḥ maraṇāt atiricyate

original: evaṃvidhāyā akīrter maraṇam eva tava śreya ityarthaḥ // BhGR_2.34 //
analyzed: evaṃvidhāyāḥ akīrteḥ maraṇam eva tava śreyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: bandhusnehāt kāruṇyāc ca yuddhān nivṛttasya śūrasya mamākīrtiḥ katham āgamiṣyatīty atrāha
analyzed: bandhu snehāt kāruṇyāt ca yuddhāt nivṛttasya śūrasya mama akīrtiḥ katham āgamiṣyati iti atra āha

original: bhayād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante tvāṃ mahārathāḥ /
analyzed: bhayāt raṇāt uparatam maṃsyante tvām mahā rathāḥ

original: yeṣāṃ ca tvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā yāsyasi laughavam // BhG_2.35 //
analyzed: yeṣām ca tvam bahu mataḥ bhūtvā yāsyasi laughavam

original: yeṣāṃ karṇaduryodhanādīnāṃ mahārathānām itaḥ pūrvaṃ tvaṃ śūro vairīti bahumato bhūtvā,
analyzed: yeṣām karṇa duryodhana ādīnām mahā rathānām itas pūrvam tvam śūraḥ vairī iti bahu mataḥ bhūtvā

original: idānīṃ yuddhe samupasthite nivṛttavyāpāratayā lāghavaṃ sugrahatāṃ yāsyasi,
analyzed: idānīm yuddhe samupasthite nivṛtta vyāpāra tayā lāghavam sugraha tām yāsyasi

original: te mahārathās tvāṃ bhayād yuddhād uparataṃ maṃsyante /
analyzed: te mahā rathāḥ tvām bhayāt yuddhāt uparatam maṃsyante

original: śūrāṇāṃ hi vairiṇāṃ śatrubhayād rte bandhusnehādinā yuddhād uparatir nopapadyate // BhGR_2.35 //
analyzed: śūrāṇām hi vairiṇām śatru bhayāt rte bandhu sneha ādinā yuddhāt uparatiḥ na upapadyate

original: kiṃ ca,
analyzed: kim ca

original: avācyavādāṃś ca bahūn vadiṣyanti tavāhitāḥ /
analyzed: avācya vādān ca bahūn vadiṣyanti tava ahitāḥ

original: nindantas tava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim // BhG_2.36 //
analyzed: nindantaḥ tava sāmarthyam tatas duḥkhataram nu kim

original: śūrāṇāṃ asmākaṃ sannidhau katham ayaṃ pārthaḥ kṣaṇam api sthātuṃ śaknuyāt,
analyzed: śūrāṇām asmākam sannidhau katham ayam pārthaḥ kṣaṇam api sthātum śaknuyāt

original: asmatsannidhānād anyatra hy asya sāmarthyam iti tava sāmarthyaṃ nindantaḥ śūrāṇām avācyavādāṃś ca bahūn vadiṣyanti tava śatravo dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ;
analyzed: asmad sannidhānāt anyatra hi asya sāmarthyam iti tava sāmarthyam nindantaḥ śūrāṇām avācya vādān ca bahūn vadiṣyanti tava śatravaḥ dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ

original: tato 'dhikataraṃ duḥkhaṃ kiṃ tava ?
analyzed: tatas adhikataram duḥkham kim tava

original: evaṃvidhāvācyaśravaṇān maraṇam eva śreya iti tvam eva maṃsyase // BhGR_2.36 //
analyzed: evaṃvidha avācya śravaṇāt maraṇam eva śreyaḥ iti tvam eva maṃsyase

original: ataḥ śūrasya ātmanā pareṣāṃ hananam,
analyzed: atas śūrasya ātmanā pareṣām hananam

original: ātmano vā parair hananam ubhayam api śreyase bhavatīty āha
analyzed: ātmanaḥ vā paraiḥ hananam ubhayam api śreyase bhavati iti āha

original: hato vā prāpsyase svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm /
analyzed: hataḥ vā prāpsyase svargam jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm

original: tasmād uttiṣṭha kaunteya yuddhāya kṛtaniścayaḥ // BhG_2.37 //
analyzed: tasmāt uttiṣṭha kaunteya yuddhāya kṛta niścayaḥ

original: dharmayuddhe parair hataś cet,
analyzed: dharma yuddhe paraiḥ hataḥ ced

original: tata eva paramaniḥśreyasaṃ prāpsyasi;
analyzed: tatas eva parama niḥśreyasam prāpsyasi

original: parān vā hatvā akaṇṭakaṃ rājyaṃ bhokṣyase;
analyzed: parān vā hatvā akaṇṭakam rājyam bhokṣyase

original: anabhisaṃhitaphalasya yuddhākhyasya dharmasya paramaniḥśreyasopāyatvāt tac ca paramaniḥśreyasaṃ prāpsyasi;
analyzed: an abhisaṃhita phalasya yuddha ākhyasya dharmasya parama niḥśreyasa upāya tvāt tat ca parama niḥśreyasam prāpsyasi

original: tasmād yuddhāyodyogaḥ paramapuruṣārthalakṣaṇamokṣasādhanam iti niścitya tadartham uttiṣṭha /
analyzed: tasmāt yuddhāya udyogaḥ parama puruṣa artha lakṣaṇa mokṣa sādhanam iti niścitya tad artham uttiṣṭha

original: kuntīputrasya tavaitad eva yuktam ityabhiprāyaḥ // BhGR_2.37 //
analyzed: kuntī putrasya tava etat eva yuktam iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: mumukṣor yuddhānuṣṭhānaprakāram āha
analyzed: mumukṣoḥ yuddha anuṣṭhāna prakāram āha

original: sukhaduḥkhe same kṛtvā lābhālābhau jayājayau /
analyzed: sukha duḥkhe same kṛtvā lābha alābhau jaya ajayau

original: tato yuddhāya yujyasva naivaṃ pāpam avāpsyasi // BhG_2.38 //
analyzed: tatas yuddhāya yujyasva na evam pāpam avāpsyasi

original: evaṃ dehātiriktam aspṛṣṭasamastadehasvabhāvaṃ nityam ātmānaṃ jñātvā yuddhe cāvarjanīyaśastrapātādinimittasukhaduḥkhārthalābhālābhajayaparājayeṣv
analyzed: evam deha atiriktam a spṛṣṭa samasta deha svabhāvam nityam ātmānam jñātvā yuddhe ca avarjanīya śastra pāta ādi nimitta sukha duḥkha artha lābha a lābha jaya parājayeṣu

original: avikṛtabuddhiḥ svargādiphalābhisandhirahitaḥ kevalakāryabuddhyā yuddham ārabhasva /
analyzed: avikṛta buddhiḥ svarga ādi phala abhisandhi rahitaḥ kevala kārya buddhyā yuddham ārabhasva

original: evaṃ kurvāṇo na pāpam avāpsyasi pāpaṃ duḥkharūpaṃ saṃsāraṃ nāvāpsyasi;
analyzed: evam kurvāṇaḥ na pāpam avāpsyasi pāpam duḥkha rūpam saṃsāram na avāpsyasi

original: saṃsārabandhān mokṣyase ityarthaḥ // BhGR_2.38 //
analyzed: saṃsāra bandhāt mokṣyase iti arthaḥ

original: evam ātmayāthātmyajñānam upadiśya tatpūrvakaṃ mokṣasādhanabhūtaṃ karmayogaṃ vaktum ārabhate
analyzed: evam ātma yāthātmya jñānam upadiśya tad pūrvakam mokṣa sādhana bhūtam karmayogam vaktum ārabhate

original: eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṅkhye buddhir yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu /
analyzed: eṣā te abhihitā sāṅkhye buddhiḥ yoge tu imām śṛṇu

original: buddhyā yukto yayā pārtha karmabandhaṃ prahāsyasi // BhG_2.39 //
analyzed: buddhyā yuktaḥ yayā pārtha karma bandham prahāsyasi

original: saṅkhyā buddhiḥ;
analyzed: saṅkhyā buddhiḥ

original: buddhyāvadhāraṇīyam ātmatattvaṃ sāṅkhyam /
analyzed: buddhyā avadhāraṇīyam ātma tattvam sāṅkhyam

original: jñātavye ātmatattve tajjñānāya yā buddhir abhidheyā “na tv evāham” ity ārabhya “tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi” ityantena saiṣā  #
analyzed: jñātavye ātma tattve tad jñānāya yā buddhiḥ abhidheyā na tu eva aham iti ārabhya tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvam śocitum arhasi ityantena sā eṣā

original: te 'bhihitā /
analyzed: te abhihitā

original: ātmajñānapūrvakamokṣasādhanabhūtakarmānuṣṭhāne yo buddhiyogo vaktavyaḥ,
analyzed: ātma jñāna pūrvaka mokṣa sādhana bhūta karma anuṣṭhāne yaḥ buddhi yogaḥ vaktavyaḥ

original: sa iha yogaśabdenocyate /
analyzed: saḥ iha yoga śabdena ucyate

original: “dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhiyogāt” iti hi vakṣyate /
analyzed: dūreṇa hi avaram karma buddhi yogāt iti hi vakṣyate

original: tatra yoge yā buddhir vaktavyā,
analyzed: tatra yoge yā buddhiḥ vaktavyā

original: tām imām abhidhīyamānāṃ śṛṇu,
analyzed: tām imām abhidhīyamānām śṛṇu

original: yayā buddhyā yuktaḥ karmabandhaṃ prahāsyasi /
analyzed: yayā buddhyā yuktaḥ karma bandham prahāsyasi

original: karmaṇā bandhaḥ karmabandhaḥ;
analyzed: karmaṇā bandhaḥ karma bandhaḥ

original: saṃsārabandha ityarthaḥ // BhGR_2.39 //
analyzed: saṃsāra bandhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: vakṣyamāṇabuddhiyuktasya karmaṇo māhātmyam āha
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇa buddhi yuktasya karmaṇaḥ māhātmyam āha

original: nehābhikramanāśo 'sti pratyavāyo na vidyate /
analyzed: na iha abhikrama nāśaḥ asti pratyavāyaḥ na vidyate

original: svalpam apy asya dharmasya trāyate mahato bhayāt // BhG_2.40 //
analyzed: su alpam api asya dharmasya trāyate mahataḥ bhayāt

original: iha karmayoge nābhikramanāśo 'sti /
analyzed: iha karma yoge na abhikrama nāśaḥ asti

original: abhikramaḥ ārambhaḥ /
analyzed: abhikramaḥ ārambhaḥ

original: nāśaḥ phalasādhanabhāvanāśaḥ /
analyzed: nāśaḥ phala sādhana bhāva nāśaḥ

original: ārabdhasyāsamāptasya vicchinnasyāpi na niṣphalatvam /
analyzed: ārabdhasya a samāptasya vicchinnasya api na niṣphala tvam

original: ārabdhasya vicchede pratyavāyo 'pi na vidyate /
analyzed: ārabdhasya vicchede pratyavāyaḥ api na vidyate

original: asya karmayogākhyasya dharmasya svalpāṃśo 'pi mahato bhayāt saṃsārabhayāt trāyate /
analyzed: asya karma yoga ākhyasya dharmasya su alpa aṃśaḥ api mahataḥ bhayāt saṃsāra bhayāt trāyate

original: ayam arthaḥ;
analyzed: ayam arthaḥ

original: “pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya vidyate” iti uttaratra prapañcayiṣyate /
analyzed: pārtha na eva iha na amutra vināśaḥ tasya vidyate iti uttaratra prapañcayiṣyate

original: anyāni hi laukikāni vaidikāni ca sādhanāni vicchinnāni na phalāya bhavanti;
analyzed: anyāni hi laukikāni vaidikāni ca sādhanāni vicchinnāni na phalāya bhavanti

original: pratyavāyāya ca bhavanti // BhGR_2.40 //
analyzed: pratyavāyāya ca bhavanti

original: kāmyakarmaviṣayāyā buddher mokṣasādhanabhūtakarmaviṣayāṃ buddhiṃ viśinaṣṭi
analyzed: kāmya karma viṣayāyāḥ buddheḥ mokṣa sādhana bhūta karma viṣayām buddhim viśinaṣṭi

original: vyavasāyātmikā buddhir ekeha kurunandana /
analyzed: vyavasāya ātmikā buddhiḥ ekā iha kuru nandana

original: bahuśākhā hy anantāś ca buddhayo 'vyavasāyinām // BhG_2.41 //
analyzed: bahu śākhāḥ hi anantāḥ ca buddhayaḥ avyavasāyinām

original: iha śāstrīye sarvasmin karmaṇi vyavasāyātmikā buddhir ekā /
analyzed: iha śāstrīye sarvasmin karmaṇi vyavasāya ātmikā buddhiḥ ekā

original: mumukṣuṇānuṣṭheye karmaṇi buddhir vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ /
analyzed: mumukṣuṇā anuṣṭheye karmaṇi buddhiḥ vyavasāya ātmikā buddhiḥ

original: vyavasāyaḥ niścayaḥ /
analyzed: vyavasāyaḥ niścayaḥ

original: sā hi buddhir ātmayāthātmyaniścayapūrvikā /
analyzed: sā hi buddhiḥ ātma yāthātmya niścaya pūrvikā

original: kāmyakarmaviṣayā tu buddhir avyavasāyātmikā /
analyzed: kāmya karma viṣayā tu buddhiḥ avyavasāya ātmikā

original: tatra hi kāmādhikāre dehātiriktātmāstitvajñānamātram apekṣitam,
analyzed: tatra hi kāma adhikāre deha atirikta ātma astitva jñāna mātram apekṣitam

original: nātmasvarūpayāthātmyaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: na ātma svarūpa yāthātmya niścayaḥ

original: svarūpayāthātmyāniścaye 'pi svargādiphalārthitvatatsādhanānuṣṭhānatatphalānubhavānāṃ saṃbhavāt,
analyzed: svarūpa yāthātmya aniścaye api svarga ādi phala arthi tva tad sādhana anuṣṭhāna tad phala anubhavānām saṃbhavāt

original: avirodhāc ca /
analyzed: avirodhāt ca

original: seyaṃ vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ ekaphalasādhanaviṣayatayaikā;
analyzed: sā iyam vyavasāya ātmikā buddhiḥ eka phala sādhana viṣaya tayā ekā

original: ekasmai mokṣākhyaphalāya hi mumukṣoḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi vidhīyante /
analyzed: ekasmai mokṣa ākhya phalāya hi mumukṣoḥ sarvāṇi karmāṇi vidhīyante

original: ataḥ śāstrārthasyaikatvāt sarvakarmaviṣayā buddhir ekaiva;
analyzed: atas śāstra arthasya eka tvāt sarva karma viṣayā buddhiḥ ekā eva

original: yathaikaphalasādhanatayā āgneyādīnāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ setikartavyatākānām ekaśāstrārthatayā tadviṣayā buddhir ekā,
analyzed: yathā eka phala sādhanatayā āgneya ādīnām ṣaṇṇām sa itikartavya tākānām eka śāstra artha tayā tad viṣayā buddhiḥ ekā

original: tadvad ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tadvat iti arthaḥ

original: avyavasāyināṃ tu svargaputrapaśvannādiphalasādhanakarmādhikṛtānāṃ buddhayaḥ phalānantyād anantāḥ /
analyzed: avyavasāyinām tu svarga putra paśu anna ādi phala sādhana karma adhikṛtānām buddhayaḥ phala ānantyāt anantāḥ

original: tatrāpi bahuśākhāḥ;
analyzed: tatra api bahu śākhāḥ

original: ekasmai phalāya codite 'pi darśapūrṇamāsādau karmaṇi,
analyzed: ekasmai phalāya ca udite api darśa pūrṇamāsa ādau karmaṇi

original: “āyur āśās te” ityādyavagatāvāntaraphalabhedena bahuśākhatvaṃ ca vidyate /
analyzed: āyuḥ āśāḥ te ityādi avagata avāntara phala bhedena bahu śākha tvam ca vidyate

original: ataḥ avyavasāyināṃ buddhayo 'nantā bahuśākhāś ca /
analyzed: atas avyavasāyinām buddhayaḥ anantāḥ bahu śākhāḥ ca

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati nityeṣu naimittikeṣu karmasu pradhānaphalāni avāntaraphalāni ca yāni śrūyamāṇāni,
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati nityeṣu naimittikeṣu karmasu pradhāna phalāni avāntara phalāni ca yāni śrūyamāṇāni

original: tāni sarvāṇi parityajya mokṣaikaphalatayā sarvāṇi karmāṇy ekaśāstrārthatayānuṣṭheyāni;
analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi parityajya mokṣa eka phala tayā sarvāṇi karmāṇi eka śāstra artha tayā anuṣṭheyāni

original: kāmyāni ca svavarṇāśramocitāni,
analyzed: kāmyāni ca sva varṇa āśrama ucitāni

original: tattatphalāni parityajya mokṣasādhanatayā nityanaimittikair ekīkṛtya yathābalam anuṣṭheyāni iti // BhGR_2.41 //
analyzed: tad tad phalāni parityajya mokṣa sādhana tayā nitya naimittikaiḥ ekīkṛtya yathābalam anuṣṭheyāni iti

original: atha kāmyakarmādhikṛtān nindati
analyzed: atha kāmya karma adhikṛtān nindati

original: yām imām puṣpitāṃ vācaṃ pravadanty avipaścitaḥ /
analyzed: yām imām puṣpitām vācam pravadanti a vipaścitaḥ

original: vedavādaratāḥ pārtha nānyad astīti vādinaḥ // BhG_2.42 //
analyzed: veda vāda ratāḥ pārtha na anyat asti iti vādinaḥ

original: kāmātmānaḥ svargaparāḥ janmakarmaphalapradām /
analyzed: kāma ātmānaḥ svarga parāḥ janma karma phala pradām

original: kriyāviśeṣabahulāṃ bhogāiśvaryagatiṃ prati // BhG_2.43 //
analyzed: kriyā viśeṣa bahulām bhoga aiśvarya gatim prati
