original: bhogāiśvaryaprasaktānāṃ tayāpahṛtacetasām /
analyzed: bhoga aiśvarya prasaktānām tayā apahṛta cetasām

original: vyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ samādhau na vidhīyate // BhG_2.44 //
analyzed: vyavasāya ātmikā buddhiḥ samādhau na vidhīyate

original: yām imāṃ puṣpitāṃ puṣpamātraphalām,
analyzed: yām imām puṣpitām puṣpa mātra phalām

original: āpātaramaṇīyāṃ vācam avipaścitaḥ alpajñāḥ bhogāiśvaryagatiṃ prati vartamānāṃ pravadanti,
analyzed: āpāta ramaṇīyām vācam a vipaścitaḥ alpa jñāḥ bhoga aiśvarya gatim prati vartamānām pravadanti

original: vedavādaratāḥ vedeṣu ye svargādiphalavādāḥ teṣu saktāḥ,
analyzed: veda vāda ratāḥ vedeṣu ye svarga ādi phala vādāḥ teṣu saktāḥ

original: nānyad astīti vādinaḥ tatsaṅgātirekeṇa svargāder adhikaṃ phalaṃ nānyad astīti vadantaḥ,
analyzed: na anyat asti iti vādinaḥ tad saṅga atirekeṇa svarga ādeḥ adhikam phalam na anyat asti iti vadantaḥ

original: kām ātmānaḥ kām apravaṇamanasaḥ,
analyzed: kām ātmānaḥ kām apravaṇa manasaḥ

original: svargaparāḥ svargaparāyaṇāḥ,
analyzed: svarga parāḥ svarga parāyaṇāḥ

original: svargādiphalāvasāne punarjanmakarmākhyaphalapradāṃ,
analyzed: svarga ādi phala avasāne punarjanma karma ākhya phala pradām

original: kriyāviśeṣabahulāṃ tattvajñānarahitatayā kriyāviśeṣapracurām /
analyzed: kriyā viśeṣa bahulām tattva jñāna rahita tayā kriyā viśeṣa pracurām

original: bhogāiśvaryagatiṃ prati vartamānāṃ yām imāṃ puṣpitāṃ vācaṃ ye pravadantīti saṃbandhaḥ /
analyzed: bhoga aiśvarya gatim prati vartamānām yām imām puṣpitām vācam ye pravadanti iti saṃbandhaḥ

original: teṣāṃ bhogāiśvaryaprasaktānāṃ tayā vācā bhogāiśvaryaviṣayayā apahṛtajñānānāṃ yathoditavyavasāyātmikā buddhiḥ,
analyzed: teṣām bhoga aiśvarya prasaktānām tayā vācā bhoga aiśvarya viṣayayā apahṛta jñānānām yathā udita vyavasāya ātmikā buddhiḥ

original: samādhau manasi na vidhīyate,
analyzed: samādhau manasi na vidhīyate

original: notpadyate,
analyzed: na utpadyate

original: samādhīyate 'sminn ātmajñānam iti samādhir manaḥ /
analyzed: samādhīyate asmin ātma jñānam iti samādhiḥ manaḥ

original: teṣāṃ manasy ātmayāthātmyaniścayapūrvakamokṣasādhanabhūtakarmaviṣayā buddhiḥ kadācid api notpadyate ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām manasi ātma yāthātmya niścaya pūrvaka mokṣa sādhana bhūta karma viṣayā buddhiḥ kadācid api na utpadyate iti arthaḥ

original: ataḥ kāmyeṣu karmasu mumukṣuṇā na saṅgaḥ kartavyaḥ //
analyzed: atas kāmyeṣu karmasu mumukṣuṇā na saṅgaḥ kartavyaḥ

original: evam atyalpaphalāni punarjanmaprasavāni karmāṇi mātāpitṛsahasrebhyo 'pi vatsalataratayā ātmojjīvane pravṛttā vedāḥ kim arthaṃ vadanti,
analyzed: evam ati alpa phalāni punarjanma prasavāni karmāṇi mātā pitṛ sahasrebhyaḥ api vatsalatara tayā ātma ujjīvane pravṛttāḥ vedāḥ kim artham vadanti

original: kathaṃ vā vedoditaṃ tyājyatayocyate ity ata āha
analyzed: katham vā veda uditam tyājya tayā ucyate iti atas āha

original: traiguṇyaviṣayā vedā nistraiguṇyo bhavārjuna /
analyzed: traiguṇya viṣayāḥ vedāḥ nistraiguṇyaḥ bhava arjuna

original: nirdvandvo nityasattvastho niryogakṣema ātmavān // BhG_2.45 //
analyzed: nirdvandvaḥ nitya sattva sthaḥ niryogakṣemaḥ ātmavān

original: trayo guṇās traiguṇyaṃ sattvarajastamāṃsi /
analyzed: trayaḥ guṇāḥ traiguṇyam sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi

original: sattvarajastamaḥpracurāḥ puruṣās traiguṇyaśabdenocyante;
analyzed: sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ pracurāḥ puruṣāḥ traiguṇya śabdena ucyante

original: tadviṣayā vedāḥ tamaḥpracurāṇāṃ rajaḥpracurāṇāṃ sattvapracurāṇāṃ ca vatsalataratayaiva hitam avabodhayanti vedāḥ /
analyzed: tad viṣayāḥ vedāḥ tamaḥ pracurāṇām rajaḥ pracurāṇām sattva pracurāṇām ca vatsalatara tayā eva hitam avabodhayanti vedāḥ

original: yady eṣāṃ svaguṇānuguṇyena svargādisādhanam eva hitaṃ nāvabodhayanti,
analyzed: yadi eṣām sva guṇa ānuguṇyena svarga ādi sādhanam eva hitam na avabodhayanti

original: tadaite rajastamaḥpracuratayā sāttvikaphalamokṣavimukhāḥ svāpekṣitaphalasādhanam ajānantaḥ kāmaprāvaṇyavivaśā anupādeyeṣu upādeyabhrāntyā praviṣṭāḥ  #
analyzed: tadā ete rajaḥ tamaḥ pracura tayā sāttvika phala mokṣa vimukhāḥ sva apekṣita phala sādhanam a jānantaḥ kāma prāvaṇya vivaśāḥ anupādeyeṣu upādeya bhrāntyā praviṣṭāḥ

original: pranaṣṭā bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: pranaṣṭāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: atas traiguṇyaviṣayā vedāḥ,
analyzed: atas traiguṇya viṣayāḥ vedāḥ

original: tvaṃ tu nistraiguṇyo bhava idānīṃ sattvapracuras tvaṃ tad eva vardhaya;
analyzed: tvam tu nistraiguṇyaḥ bhava idānīm sattva pracuraḥ tvam tat eva vardhaya

original: nānyonyasaṅkīrṇaguṇatrayapracuro bhava;
analyzed: na anyonya saṅkīrṇa guṇatraya pracuraḥ bhava

original: na tatprācuryaṃ vardhayetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: na tad prācuryam vardhaya iti arthaḥ

original: nirdvandvaḥ nirgatasakalasāṃsārikasvabhāvaḥ;
nityasattvasthaḥ guṇadvayarahitanityapravṛddhasattvastho bhava /
analyzed: nitya sattva sthaḥ guṇa dvaya rahita nitya pravṛddha sattva sthaḥ bhava

original: katham iti cet,
analyzed: katham iti ced

original: niryogakṣemaḥ ātmasvarūpatatprāptyupāyabahirbhūtānām arthānāṃ yogaṃ prāptānāṃ ca kṣemaṃ parityajya ātmavān bhava ātmasvarūpān veṣaṇaparo bhava
analyzed: niryogakṣemaḥ ātma svarūpa tad prāpti upāya bahis bhūtānām arthānām yogam prāptānām ca kṣemam parityajya ātmavān bhava ātma svarūpān veṣaṇa paraḥ bhava

original: aprāptasya prāptir yogaḥ prāptasya parikṣaṇaṃ kṣemaḥ /
analyzed: a prāptasya prāptiḥ yogaḥ prāptasya parikṣaṇam kṣemaḥ

original: evaṃ vartamānasya te rajastamaḥpracuratā naśyati,
analyzed: evam vartamānasya te rajaḥ tamaḥ pracura tā naśyati

original: sattvaṃ ca vardhate // BhGR_2.45 //
analyzed: sattvam ca vardhate

original: yāvān artha udapāne sarvataḥ saṃplutodake /
analyzed: yāvān arthaḥ udapāne sarvatas saṃpluta udake

original: tāvān sarveṣu vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vijānataḥ // BhG_2.46 //
analyzed: tāvān sarveṣu vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vijānataḥ

original: na ca vedoditaṃ sarvaṃ sarvasyopādeyam;
analyzed: na ca veda uditam sarvam sarvasya upādeyam

original: yathā sarvārthaparikalpite sarvataḥ saṃplutodake udapāne pipāsor yāvān arthaḥ yāvad eva prayojanam,
analyzed: yathā sarva artha parikalpite sarvatas saṃpluta udake udapāne pipāsoḥ yāvān arthaḥ yāvat eva prayojanam

original: tāvad eva tenopādīyate,
analyzed: tāvat eva tena upādīyate

original: na sarvam; evaṃ sarveṣu ca vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vijānataḥ vaidikasya mumukṣoḥ yad eva mokṣasādhanaṃ tad evo=
analyzed: na sarvam evam sarveṣu ca vedeṣu brāhmaṇasya vijānataḥ vaidikasya mumukṣoḥ yat eva mokṣa sādhanam tat eva u

original: pādeyam; nānyat // BhGR_2.46 //
analyzed: pādeyam na anyat

original: ataḥ sattvasthasya mumukṣor etāvad evopādeyam ity āha
analyzed: atas sattva sthasya mumukṣoḥ etāvat eva upādeyam iti āha

original: karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadācana /
analyzed: karmaṇi eva adhikāraḥ te mā phaleṣu kadācana

original: mā karmaphalahetur bhūḥ mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi // BhG_2.47 //
analyzed: mā karma phala hetuḥ bhūḥ mā te saṅgaḥ astu akarmaṇi

original: nitye naimittike kāmye ca kenacit phalaviśeṣeṇa saṃbandhitayā śrūyamāṇe karmaṇi nityasattvasthasya mumukṣos te karmamātre 'dhikāraḥ /
analyzed: nitye naimittike kāmye ca kenacid phala viśeṣeṇa saṃbandhi tayā śrūyamāṇe karmaṇi nitya sattva sthasya mumukṣoḥ te karma mātre adhikāraḥ

original: tatsaṃbandhitayāvagateṣu phaleṣu na kadācid apy adhikāraḥ /
analyzed: tad saṃbandhi tayā avagateṣu phaleṣu na kadācid api adhikāraḥ

original: saphalasya bandharūpatvāt phalarahitasya kevalasya madārādhanarūpasya mokṣahetutvāc ca /
analyzed: sa phalasya bandha rūpa tvāt phala rahitasya kevalasya mad ārādhana rūpasya mokṣa hetu tvāt ca

original: mā ca karmaphalayor hetubhūḥ /
analyzed: mā ca karma phalayoḥ hetu bhūḥ

original: tvayānuṣṭhīyamāne 'pi karmaṇi nityasattvasthasya mumukṣos tava
analyzed: tvayā anuṣṭhīyamāne api karmaṇi nitya sattva sthasya mumukṣoḥ tava

original: akartṛtvam apy anusandheyam /
analyzed: akartṛ tvam api anusandheyam

original: phalasyāpi kṣunnivṛttyāder na tvaṃ hetur ity anusandheyam /
analyzed: phalasya api kṣudh nivṛtti ādeḥ na tvam hetuḥ iti anusandheyam

original: tadubhayaṃ guṇeṣu vā sarveśvare mayi vānusandheyam ity uttaratra vakṣyate /
analyzed: tat ubhayam guṇeṣu vā sarveśvare mayi vā anusandheyam iti uttaratra vakṣyate

original: evam anusandhāya karma kuru /
analyzed: evam anusandhāya karma kuru

original: akarmaṇi ananuṣṭhāne,
analyzed: akarmaṇi an anuṣṭhāne

original: na yotsyāmīti yat tvayābhihitam,
analyzed: na yotsyāmi iti yat tvayā abhihitam

original: na tatra te saṅgo 'stu;
analyzed: na tatra te saṅgaḥ astu

original: uktena prakāreṇa yuddhādikarmaṇy eva saṅgo 'stv ityarthaḥ // BhGR_2.47 //
analyzed: uktena prakāreṇa yuddha ādi karmaṇi eva saṅgaḥ astu iti arthaḥ

original: etad eva sphuṭīkaroti
analyzed: etat eva sphuṭīkaroti

original: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanañjaya /
analyzed: yoga sthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgam tyaktvā dhanañjaya

original: siddhyasiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṃ yoga ucyate // BhG_2.48 //
analyzed: siddhi asiddhyoḥ samaḥ bhūtvā sama tvam yogaḥ ucyate

original: rājyabandhuprabhṛtiṣu saṅgaṃ tyaktvā yuddhādīni karmāṇi yogasthaḥ kuru,
analyzed: rājya bandhu prabhṛtiṣu saṅgam tyaktvā yuddha ādīni karmāṇi yoga sthaḥ kuru

original: tadantarbhūtavijayādisiddhyasiddhyos samo bhūtvā kuru /
analyzed: tad antarbhūta vijaya ādi siddhi asiddhyoḥ samaḥ bhūtvā kuru

original: tad idaṃ siddhyasiddhyos samatvaṃ yogastha ity atra yogaśabdenocyate /
analyzed: tat idam siddhi asiddhyoḥ sama tvam yoga sthaḥ iti atra yoga śabdena ucyate

original: yogaḥ siddhyasiddhiyos samatvarūpaṃ cittasamādhānam // BhGR_2.48 //
analyzed: yogaḥ siddhi asiddhiyoḥ sama tva rūpam citta samādhānam

original: kim artham idam asakṛd ucyata ity ata āha
analyzed: kim artham idam asakṛt ucyate iti atas āha

original: dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhiyogād dhanañjaya /
analyzed: dūreṇa hi avaram karma buddhi yogāt dhanañjaya

original: buddhau śaraṇam anviccha kṛpaṇāḥ phalahetavaḥ // BhG_2.49 //
analyzed: buddhau śaraṇam anviccha kṛpaṇāḥ phala hetavaḥ

original: yo 'yaṃ pradhānaphalatyāgaviṣayo 'vāntaraphalasiddhyasiddhyos samatvaviṣayaś ca buddhiyogaḥ;
analyzed: yaḥ ayam pradhāna phala tyāga viṣayaḥ avāntara phala siddhi asiddhyoḥ samatva viṣayaḥ ca buddhi yogaḥ

original: tadyuktāt karmaṇa itarat karma dūreṇāvaram /
analyzed: tad yuktāt karmaṇaḥ itarat karma dūreṇa avaram

original: mahad idaṃ dvayor utkarṣāpakarṣarūpaṃ vairūpyam /
analyzed: mahat idam dvayoḥ utkarṣa apakarṣa rūpam vairūpyam

original: uktabuddhiyogayuktaṃ karma nikhilasāṃsārikaduḥkhaṃ vinivartya paramapuruṣārthalakṣaṇaṃ ca mokṣaṃ prāpayati /
analyzed: ukta buddhi yoga yuktam karma nikhila sāṃsārika duḥkham vinivartya parama puruṣa artha lakṣaṇam ca mokṣam prāpayati

original: itarad aparimitaduḥkharūpaṃ saṃsāram iti /
analyzed: itarat aparimita duḥkha rūpam saṃsāram iti

original: ataḥ karmaṇi kriyamāṇe uktāyāṃ buddhau śaraṇam anviccha /
analyzed: atas karmaṇi kriyamāṇe uktāyām buddhau śaraṇam anviccha

original: śaraṇaṃ vāsasthānam /
analyzed: śaraṇam vāsa sthānam

original: tasyām eva buddhau vartasvetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasyām eva buddhau vartasva iti arthaḥ

original: kṛpaṇāḥ phalahetavaḥ phalasaṅgādinā karma kurvāṇāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ saṃsāriṇo bhaveyuḥ // BhGR_2.49 //
analyzed: kṛpaṇāḥ phala hetavaḥ phala saṅga ādinā karma kurvāṇāḥ kṛpaṇāḥ saṃsāriṇaḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: buddhiyukto jahātīha ubhe sukṛtaduṣkṛte /
analyzed: buddhi yuktaḥ jahāti iha ubhe sukṛta duṣkṛte

original: tasmād yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam // BhG_2.50 //
analyzed: tasmāt yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam

original: buddhiyogayuktas tu karma kurvāṇaḥ ubhe sukṛtaduṣkṛte anādikālasañcite anante bandhahetubhūte jahāti /
analyzed: buddhi yoga yuktaḥ tu karma kurvāṇaḥ ubhe sukṛta duṣkṛte anādi kāla sañcite anante bandha hetu bhūte jahāti

original: tasmād uktāya buddhiyogāya yujyasva /
analyzed: tasmāt uktāya buddhi yogāya yujyasva

original: yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam karmasu kriyamāṇeṣv ayaṃ buddhiyogaḥ kauśalam atisāmarthyam /
analyzed: yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam karmasu kriyamāṇeṣu ayam buddhi yogaḥ kauśalam ati sāmarthyam

original: atisāmarthyasādhya ityarthaḥ // BhGR_2.50 //
analyzed: ati sāmarthya sādhyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: karmajaṃ buddhiyuktā hi phalaṃ tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ /
analyzed: karma jam buddhi yuktāḥ hi phalam tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ

original: janmabandhavinirmuktāḥ padaṃ gacchanty anāmayam // BhG_2.51 //
analyzed: janma bandha vinirmuktāḥ padam gacchanti anāmayam

original: buddhiyogayuktāḥ karmajaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā karma kurvantaḥ,
analyzed: buddhi yoga yuktāḥ karma jam phalam tyaktvā karma kurvantaḥ

original: tasmāj janmabandhavinirmuktāḥ anāmayaṃ padaṃ gacchanti hi prasiddhaṃ hy etat sarvāsūpaniṣatsv ityarthaḥ // BhGR_2.51 //
analyzed: tasmāt janma bandha vinirmuktāḥ anāmayam padam gacchanti hi prasiddham hi etat sarvāsu upaniṣatsu iti arthaḥ

original: yadā te mohakalilaṃ buddhir vyatitariṣyati /
analyzed: yadā te moha kalilam buddhiḥ vyatitariṣyati

original: tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca // BhG_2.52 //
analyzed: tadā gantāsi nirvedam śrotavyasya śrutasya ca

original: uktaprakāreṇa karmaṇi vartamānasya tayā vṛttyā nirdhūtakalmaṣasya te buddhir yadā mohakalilam atyalpaphalasaṅgahetubhūtaṃ moharūpaṃ kaluṣaṃ
analyzed: ukta prakāreṇa karmaṇi vartamānasya tayā vṛttyā nirdhūta kalmaṣasya te buddhiḥ yadā moha kalilam ati alpa phala saṅga hetu bhūtam moha rūpam kaluṣam

original: tadā asmattaḥ itaḥ pūrvaṃ tyājyatayā śrutasya phalādeḥ itaḥ paścāc chrotavyasya ca kṛte svayam eva nirvedaṃ gantāsi gamiṣyasi // BhGR_2.52
analyzed: tadā asmattaḥ itas pūrvam tyājya tayā śrutasya phala ādeḥ itas paścāt śrotavyasya ca kṛte svayam eva nirvedam gantāsi gamiṣyasi  /

original: “yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu” ityādinoktasyātmayāthātmyajñānapūrvakasya buddhiviśeṣasaṃskṛtasya dharmānuṣṭhānasya lakṣabhūtaṃ yogākhyaṃ phalam āha
analyzed: yoge tu imām śṛṇu ityādinā uktasya ātma yāthātmya jñāna pūrvakasya buddhi viśeṣa saṃskṛtasya dharma anuṣṭhānasya lakṣa bhūtam yoga ākhyam phalam āha

original: śrutivipratipannā te yadā sthāsyati niścalā /
analyzed: śruti vipratipannā te yadā sthāsyati niścalā

original: samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasi // BhG_2.53 //
analyzed: samādhau acalā buddhiḥ tadā yogam avāpsyasi

original: śrutiḥ śravaṇam /
analyzed: śrutiḥ śravaṇam

original: asmattaḥ śravaṇena viśeṣataḥ pratipannā sakaletaravisajātīyanityaniratiśayasūkṣmatattvātmaviṣayā,
analyzed: asmattaḥ śravaṇena viśeṣataḥ pratipannā sakala itara visajātīya nitya niratiśaya sūkṣma tattva ātma viṣayā

original: svayam acalā ekarūpā buddhiḥ asaṅgakarmānuṣṭhānena nirmalīkṛte manasi yadā niścalā sthāsyati,
analyzed: svayam acalā eka rūpā buddhiḥ asaṅga karma anuṣṭhānena nirmalīkṛte manasi yadā niścalā sthāsyati

original: tadā yogam ātmāvalokanam avāpsyasi /
analyzed: tadā yogam ātma avalokanam avāpsyasi

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati śāstrajanyātmajñānapūrvakakarmayogaḥ sthitaprajñatākhyajñānaniṣṭhām āpādayati;
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati śāstra janya ātma jñāna pūrvaka karmayogaḥ sthita prajña tā ākhya jñāna niṣṭhām āpādayati

original: jñānaniṣṭhārūpā
sthitaprajñatā tu yogākhyam ātmāvalokanaṃ sādhayati iti // BhGR_2.53 //
analyzed: sthita prajña tā tu yoga ākhyam ātma avalokanam sādhayati iti

original: etad uktaḥ pārtho 'saṅgakarmānuṣṭhānarūpakarmayogasādhyasthitaprajñatāyā yogasādhanabhūtāyāḥ svarūpam,
analyzed: etat uktaḥ pārthaḥ asaṅga karma anuṣṭhāna rūpa karma yoga sādhya sthita prajña tāyāḥ yoga sādhana bhūtāyāḥ svarūpam

original: sthitaprajñasyānuṣṭhānaprakāraṃ ca pṛcchati
analyzed: sthitaprajñasya anuṣṭhāna prakāram ca pṛcchati

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: sthitaprajñasya kā bhāṣā samādhisthasya keśava /
analyzed: sthita prajñasya kā bhāṣā samādhi sthasya keśava

original: sthitadhīḥ kiṃ prabhāṣate kim āsīta vrajeta kim // BhG_2.54 //
analyzed: sthita dhīḥ kim prabhāṣate kim āsīta vrajeta kim

original: samādhisthasya sthitaprajñasya kā bhāṣā ko vācakaś śabdaḥ ?
analyzed: samādhi sthasya sthita prajñasya kā bhāṣā kaḥ vācakaḥ śabdaḥ

original: tasya svarūpaṃ kīdṛśam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasya svarūpam kīdṛśam iti arthaḥ

original: sthitaprajñaḥ kiṃ ca bhāṣādikaṃ karoti ? // BhGR_2.54 //
analyzed: sthita prajñaḥ kim ca bhāṣā ādikam karoti

original: vṛttiviśeṣakathanena svarūpam apy uktaṃ bhavatīti vṛttiviśeṣa ucyate
analyzed: vṛtti viśeṣa kathanena svarūpam api uktam bhavati iti vṛtti viśeṣaḥ ucyate

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha manogatān /
analyzed: prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha manaḥ gatān

original: ātmany evātmanā tuṣṭaḥ sthitaprajñas tadocyate // BhG_2.55 //
analyzed: ātmani eva ātmanā tuṣṭaḥ sthita prajñaḥ tadā ucyate

original: ātmany evātmanā manasā ātmaikāvalambanena tuṣṭaḥ tena toṣeṇa tadvyatiriktān sarvān manogatān kāmān yadā prakarṣeṇa jahāti,
analyzed: ātmani eva ātmanā manasā ātma eka avalambanena tuṣṭaḥ tena toṣeṇa tad vyatiriktān sarvān manaḥ gatān kāmān yadā prakarṣeṇa jahāti

original: tadāyaṃ sthitaprajña ity ucyate /
analyzed: tadā ayam sthita prajñaḥ iti ucyate

original: jñānaniṣṭhākāṣṭheyam // BhGR_2.55 //
anantaraṃ jñānaniṣṭhasya tato 'rvācīnādūraviprakṛṣṭāvasthocyate
analyzed: anantaram jñāna niṣṭhasya tatas arvācīna adūra viprakṛṣṭa avasthā ucyate

original: duḥkheṣv anudvignamanāḥ sukheṣu vigataspṛhaḥ /
analyzed: duḥkheṣu anudvigna manāḥ sukheṣu vigata spṛhaḥ

original: vītarāgabhayakrodhaḥ sthitadhīr munir ucyate // BhG_2.56 //
analyzed: vīta rāga bhaya krodhaḥ sthita dhīḥ muniḥ ucyate

original: priyaviśleṣādiduḥkhanimitteṣu upasthiteṣu anudvignamanāḥ na duḥkhī bhavati;
analyzed: priya viśleṣa ādi duḥkha nimitteṣu upasthiteṣu anudvigna manāḥ na duḥkhī bhavati

original: sukheṣu vigataspṛhaḥ priyeṣu sannihiteṣv api vigataspṛhaḥ,
analyzed: sukheṣu vigata spṛhaḥ priyeṣu sannihiteṣu api vigata spṛhaḥ

original: vītarāgabhayakrodhaḥ anāgateṣu spṛhā rāgaḥ,
analyzed: vīta rāga bhaya krodhaḥ anāgateṣu spṛhā rāgaḥ

original: tadrahitaḥ;
analyzed: tad rahitaḥ

original: priyaviśleṣāpriyāgamanahetudarśananimittaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhayam,
analyzed: priya viśleṣa apriya āgamana hetu darśana nimittam duḥkham bhayam

original: tadrahitaḥ;
analyzed: tad rahitaḥ

original: priyaviśleṣāpriyāgamanahetubhūtacetanāntaragataduḥkhahetubhūtasvamanovikāraḥ krodhaḥ,
tadrahitaḥ;
analyzed: tad rahitaḥ

original: evaṃbhūtaḥ muniḥ ātmamananaśīlaḥ sthitadhīr ity ucyate // BhGR_2.56 //
analyzed: evaṃbhūtaḥ muniḥ ātma manana śīlaḥ sthita dhīḥ iti ucyate

original: tato 'rvācīnadaśā procyate
analyzed: tatas arvācīnadaśā procyate

original: yaḥ sarvatrānabhisnehas tat tat prāpya śubhāśubham /
analyzed: yaḥ sarvatra anabhisnehaḥ tat tat prāpya śubha aśubham

original: nābhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā // BhG_2.57 //
analyzed: na abhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā

original: yaḥ sarvatra priyeṣu anabhisnehaḥ udāsīnaḥ;
analyzed: yaḥ sarvatra priyeṣu anabhisnehaḥ udāsīnaḥ

original: priyasaṃśleṣaviśleṣarūpaṃ śubhāśubhaṃ prāpyābhinandanadveṣarahitaḥ,
analyzed: priya saṃśleṣa viśleṣa rūpam śubha aśubham prāpya abhinandana dveṣa rahitaḥ

original: so 'pi sthitaprajñaḥ // BhGR_2.57 //
analyzed: saḥ api sthita prajñaḥ

original: tato 'rvācīnadaśām āha
analyzed: tatas arvācīna daśām āha

original: yadā saṃharate cāyaṃ kūrmo 'ṅgānīva sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: yadā saṃharate ca ayam kūrmaḥ aṅgāni iva sarvaśas

original: indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyas tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā // BhG_2.58 //
analyzed: indriyāṇi indriya arthebhyaḥ tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā

original: yadendriyāṇīndriyārthān spṛṣṭum udyuktāni,
analyzed: yadā indriyāṇi indriyārthān spṛṣṭum udyuktāni

original: tadaiva kūrmo 'ṅgānīva,
analyzed: tadā eva kūrmaḥ aṅgāni iva

original: indriyārthebhyaḥ sarvaśaḥ pratisaṃhṛtya mana ātmany avasthāpayati,
analyzed: indriyārthebhyaḥ sarvaśas pratisaṃhṛtya manaḥ ātmani avasthāpayati

original: so 'pi sthitaprajñaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ api sthita prajñaḥ

original: evaṃ caturvidhā jñānaniṣṭhā /
analyzed: evam caturvidhā jñāna niṣṭhā

original: pūrvapūrvā uttarottraniṣpādyā // BhGR_2.58 //
analyzed: pūrva pūrvā uttara uttra niṣpādyā

original: idānīṃ jñānaniṣṭhāyā duṣprāpatāṃ tatprāptyupāyaṃ cāha
analyzed: idānīm jñāna niṣṭhāyāḥ duṣprāpa tām tad prāpti upāyam ca āha

original: viṣayā vinivartante nirāhārasya dehinaḥ /
analyzed: viṣayāḥ vinivartante nirāhārasya dehinaḥ

original: rasavarjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate // BhG_2.59 //
analyzed: rasa varjam rasaḥ api asya param dṛṣṭvā nivartate

original: indriyāṇām āhārā viṣayāḥ;
analyzed: indriyāṇām āhārāḥ viṣayāḥ

original: nirāhārasya viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛtendriyasya dehino viṣayā vinivartamānā rasavarjaṃ vinivartante;
analyzed: nirāhārasya viṣayebhyaḥ pratyāhṛta indriyasya dehinaḥ viṣayāḥ vinivartamānāḥ rasa varjam vinivartante

original: rasaḥ rāgaḥ /
analyzed: rasaḥ rāgaḥ

original: viṣayarāgo na nivartata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya rāgaḥ na nivartate iti arthaḥ

original: rāgo 'py ātmasvarūpaṃ viṣayebhyaḥ paraṃ sukhataraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate // BhGR_2.59 //
analyzed: rāgaḥ api ātma svarūpam viṣayebhyaḥ param sukhataram dṛṣṭvā nivartate

original: yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ /
analyzed: yatataḥ hi api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ

original: indriyāṇi pramāthīni haranti prasabhaṃ manaḥ // BhG_2.60 //
analyzed: indriyāṇi pramāthīni haranti prasabham manaḥ

original: ātmadarśanena vinā viṣayarāgo na nivartate,
analyzed: ātma darśanena vinā viṣaya rāgaḥ na nivartate

original: anivṛtte viṣayarāge vipaścito yatamānasyāpi puruṣasyendriyāṇi pramāthīni balavanti,
analyzed: a nivṛtte viṣaya rāge vipaścitaḥ yatamānasya api puruṣasya indriyāṇi pramāthīni balavanti

original: manaḥ prasahya haranti /
analyzed: manaḥ prasahya haranti

original: evam indriyajayaḥ ātmadarśanādhīnaḥ,
analyzed: evam indriya jayaḥ ātma darśana adhīnaḥ

original: ātmadarśanam indriyajayādhīnam iti jñānaniṣṭhā duṣprāpā // BhGR_2.60 //
analyzed: ātma darśanam indriya jaya adhīnam iti jñāna niṣṭhā duṣprāpā

original: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīta matparaḥ /
analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yuktaḥ āsīta mad paraḥ

original: vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā // BhG_2.61 //
analyzed: vaśe hi yasya indriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā

original: asya sarvasya parijihīrṣayā viṣayānurāgayuktatayā durjayānīndriyāṇi saṃyamya,
analyzed: asya sarvasya parijihīrṣayā viṣaya anurāga yukta tayā durjayāni indriyāṇi saṃyamya

original: cetasaś śubhāśrayabhūte mayi mano 'vasthāpya samāhita āsīta /
analyzed: cetasaḥ śubha āśraya bhūte mayi manaḥ avasthāpya samāhitaḥ āsīta

original: manasi madviṣaye sati nirdagdhāśeṣakalmaṣatayā nirmalīkṛtaṃ viṣayānurāgarahitaṃ mana indriyāṇi svavaśāni karoti /
analyzed: manasi mad viṣaye sati nirdagdha aśeṣa kalmaṣa tayā nirmalīkṛtam viṣaya anurāga rahitam manaḥ indriyāṇi sva vaśāni karoti

original: tato vaśyendriyaṃ mana ātmadarśanāya prabhavati /
analyzed: tatas vaśya indriyam manaḥ ātma darśanāya prabhavati

original: yathoktam, “yathāgnir uddhataśikhaḥ kakṣaṃ dahati sānilaḥ /
analyzed: yathā uktam yathā agniḥ uddhata śikhaḥ kakṣam dahati sa anilaḥ

original: tathā cittasthito viṣṇur yogināṃ sarvakilbiṣam //
analyzed: tathā citta sthitaḥ viṣṇuḥ yoginām sarva kilbiṣam

original: BhGR_2.” iti /
analyzed: iti

original: tadāha “vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā“+iti // BhGR_2.61 //
analyzed: tat āha vaśe hi yasya indriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā iti

original: evaṃ mayy aniveśya manaḥ svayatnagauraveṇendriyajaye pravṛtto vinaṣṭo bhavatīty āha
analyzed: evam mayi a niveśya manaḥ sva yatna gauraveṇa indriya jaye pravṛttaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ bhavati iti āha

original: dhyāyato viṣayān puṃsaḥ saṅgas teṣūpajāyate /
analyzed: dhyāyataḥ viṣayān puṃsaḥ saṅgaḥ teṣu upajāyate

original: saṅgāt saṃjāyate kāmaḥ kāmāt krodho 'bhijāyate // BhG_2.62 //
analyzed: saṅgāt saṃjāyate kāmaḥ kāmāt krodhaḥ abhijāyate

original: krodhād bhavati saṃmohaḥ saṃmohāt smṛtivibhramaḥ /
analyzed: krodhāt bhavati saṃmohaḥ saṃmohāt smṛti vibhramaḥ

original: smṛtibhraṃśād buddhināśo buddhināśāt praṇaśyati // BhG_2.63 //
analyzed: smṛti bhraṃśāt buddhi nāśaḥ buddhi nāśāt praṇaśyati

original: anirastaviṣayānurāgasya hi mayy aniveśitamanasa indriyāṇi saṃyamyāvasthitasyāpi anādipāpavāsanayā viṣayadhyānam avarjanīyaṃ syāt /
analyzed: a nirasta viṣaya anurāgasya hi mayi a niveśita manasaḥ indriyāṇi saṃyamya avasthitasya api anādi pāpa vāsanayā viṣaya dhyānam avarjanīyam syāt

original: dhyāyato viṣayān puṃsaḥ punar api saṅgo 'tipravṛddho jāyate /
analyzed: dhyāyataḥ viṣayān puṃsaḥ punar api saṅgaḥ atipravṛddhaḥ jāyate

original: saṅgāt saṃjāte kāmaḥ /
analyzed: saṅgāt saṃjāte kāmaḥ

original: kāmo nāma saṅgasya vipākadaśā /
analyzed: kāmaḥ nāma saṅgasya vipāka daśā

original: puruṣo yāṃ daśām āpanno viṣayān abhuktvā sthātuṃ na śaknoti, sa kāmaḥ //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ yām daśām āpannaḥ viṣayān a bhuktvā sthātum na śaknoti sa kāmaḥ

original: kāmāt krodho 'bhijāyate /
analyzed: kāmāt krodhaḥ abhijāyate

original: kāme vartamāne,
analyzed: kāme vartamāne

original: viṣaye cāsannihite,
analyzed: viṣaye ca asannihite

original: sannihitān puruṣān prati,
analyzed: sannihitān puruṣān prati

original: ebhir asmadiṣṭaṃ vihitam iti krodho bhavati /
analyzed: ebhiḥ asmad iṣṭam vihitam iti krodhaḥ bhavati

original: krodhād bhavati saṃmohaḥ /
analyzed: krodhāt bhavati saṃmohaḥ

original: saṃmohaḥ kṛtyākṛtyavivekaśūnyatā /
analyzed: saṃmohaḥ kṛtya akṛtya viveka śūnyatā

original: tayā sarvaṃ karoti /
analyzed: tayā sarvam karoti

original: tataś ca prārabdhe indriyajayādike prayatne smṛtibhraṃśo bhavati /
analyzed: tatas ca prārabdhe indriya jaya ādike prayatne smṛti bhraṃśaḥ bhavati

original: smṛtibhraṃśād buddhināśaḥ ātmajñāne yo vyavasāyaḥ kṛtaḥ,
analyzed: smṛti bhraṃśāt buddhi nāśaḥ ātma jñāne yaḥ vyavasāyaḥ kṛtaḥ

original: tasya nāśaḥ syāt /
analyzed: tasya nāśaḥ syāt

original: buddhināśāt punar api saṃsāre nimagno vinaṣṭo bhavati // BhGR_2.62 //63//
analyzed: buddhi nāśāt punar api saṃsāre nimagnaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ bhavati

original: rāgadveṣaviyuktais tu viṣayān indriyaiś caran /
analyzed: rāga dveṣa viyuktaiḥ tu viṣayān indriyaiḥ caran

original: ātmavaśyair vidheyātmā prasādam adhigacchati // BhG_2.64 //
analyzed: ātma vaśyaiḥ vidheya ātmā prasādam adhigacchati

original: uktena prakāreṇa mayi sarveśvare cetasaś śubhāśrayabhūte nyastamanāḥ nirdagdhāśeṣakalmaṣatayā
analyzed: uktena prakāreṇa mayi sarveśvare cetasaḥ śubha āśraya bhūte nyasta manāḥ nirdagdha aśeṣa kalmaṣa tayā

original: rāgadveṣaviyuktair ātmavaśyair indriyaiḥ viṣayāṃś caran viṣayāṃs tiraskṛtya vartamānaḥ
analyzed: rāga dveṣa viyuktaiḥ ātma vaśyaiḥ indriyaiḥ viṣayān caran viṣayān tiraskṛtya vartamānaḥ

original: vidheyātmā vidheyamanāḥ prasādam adhigacchati nirmalāntaḥkaraṇo bhavatītyarthaḥ // BhGR_2.64 //
analyzed: vidheya ātmā vidheya manāḥ prasādam adhigacchati nirmala antaḥkaraṇaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: prasāde sarvaduḥkhānāṃ hānir asyopajāyate /
analyzed: prasāde sarva duḥkhānām hāniḥ asya upajāyate

original: prasannacetaso hy āśu buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate // BhG_2.65 //
analyzed: prasanna cetasaḥ hi āśu buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate

original: asya puruṣasya manaḥprasāde sati prakṛtisaṃsargaprayuktasarvaduḥkhānāṃ hānir upajāyate /
analyzed: asya puruṣasya manaḥ prasāde sati prakṛti saṃsarga prayukta sarva duḥkhānām hāniḥ upajāyate

original: prasannacetasaḥ ātmāvalokanavirodhidoṣarahitamanasaḥ tadānīm eva hi viviktātmaviṣayā buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: prasanna cetasaḥ ātma avalokana virodhi doṣa rahita manasaḥ tadānīm eva hi vivikta ātma viṣayā buddhiḥ paryavatiṣṭhate

original: ato manaḥprasāde sarvaduḥkhānāṃ hānir bhavaty eva /65//
analyzed: atas manaḥ prasāde sarva duḥkhānām hāniḥ bhavati eva

original: nāsti buddhir ayuktasya na cāyuktasya bhāvanā /
analyzed: na asti buddhiḥ ayuktasya na ca ayuktasya bhāvanā

original: na cābhāvayataḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham // BhG_2.66 //
analyzed: na ca abhāvayataḥ śāntiḥ aśāntasya kutas sukham

original: mayi sannyastamanorahitasya svayatnenendriyaniyamane pravṛttasya kadācid api viviktātmaviṣayā buddhir na setsyati/
analyzed: mayi sannyasta manaḥ rahitasya sva yatnena indriya niyamane pravṛttasya kadācid api vivikta ātma viṣayā buddhiḥ na setsyati

original: ata eva tasya tadbhāvanā ca na saṃbhavati /
analyzed: atas eva tasya tad bhāvanā ca na saṃbhavati

original: viviktātmānam abhāvayato viṣayaspṛhāśāntir na bhavati /
analyzed: vivikta ātmānam a bhāvayataḥ viṣaya spṛhā śāntiḥ na bhavati

original: aśāntasya viṣayaspṛhāyuktasya kuto nityaniratiśayasukhaprāptiḥ // BhGR_2.66 //
analyzed: aśāntasya viṣaya spṛhā yuktasya kutas nitya niratiśaya sukha prāptiḥ

original: punar apy uktena prakāreṇendriyaniyamanam akurvato 'nartham āha
analyzed: punar api uktena prakāreṇa indriya niyamanam akurvataḥ anartham āha

original: indriyāṇāṃ hi caratāṃ yan mano 'nuvidhīyate /
analyzed: indriyāṇām hi caratām yat manaḥ anuvidhīyate

original: tad asya harati prajñāṃ vāyur nāvam ivāmbhasi // BhG_2.67 //
analyzed: tat asya harati prajñām vāyuḥ nāvam iva ambhasi

original: indriyāṇāṃ viṣayeṣu caratāṃ vartamānānāṃ vartanam anu yan mano vidhīyate puruṣeṇānuvartyate,
analyzed: indriyāṇām viṣayeṣu caratām vartamānānām vartanam anu yat manaḥ vidhīyate puruṣeṇa anuvartyate

original: tan mano 'sya viviktātmapravaṇāṃ prajñāṃ harati viṣayapravaṇāṃ karotītyarthaḥ;
analyzed: tat manaḥ asya vivikta ātma pravaṇām prajñām harati viṣaya pravaṇām karoti iti arthaḥ

original: yathāmbhasi nīyamānāṃ nāvaṃ pratikūlo vāyuḥ prasahya harati // BhGR_2.67 //
analyzed: yathā ambhasi nīyamānām nāvam pratikūlaḥ vāyuḥ prasahya harati

original: tasmād yasya mahābāho nigṛhītāni sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt yasya mahā bāho nigṛhītāni sarvaśas

original: indriyāṇīndriyārthebhyas tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā // BhG_2.68 //
analyzed: indriyāṇi indriya arthebhyaḥ tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā

original: tasmād uktena prakāreṇa śubhāśraye mayi niviṣṭamanaso yasyendriyāṇi indriyārthebhyaḥ sarvaśo nigṛhītāni,
analyzed: tasmāt uktena prakāreṇa śubha āśraye mayi niviṣṭa manasaḥ yasya indriyāṇi indriyārthebhyaḥ sarvaśas nigṛhītāni

original: tasyaivātmani prajñā pratiṣṭhitā bhavati // BhGR_2.68 //
analyzed: tasya eva ātmani prajñā pratiṣṭhitā bhavati

original: evaṃ niyatendriyasya prasannamanasaḥ siddhim āha
analyzed: evam niyata indriyasya prasanna manasaḥ siddhim āha

original: yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī /
analyzed: yā niśā sarva bhūtānām tasyām jāgarti saṃyamī

original: yasyāṃ jāgarti bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ // BhG_2.69 //
analyzed: yasyām jāgarti bhūtāni sā niśā paśyataḥ muneḥ

original: yā ātmaviṣayā buddhiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ niśā niśevāprakāśā,
analyzed: yā ātma viṣayā buddhiḥ sarva bhūtānām niśā niśā iva aprakāśā

original: tasyām ātmaviṣayāyāṃ buddhau indriyasaṃyamī prasannamanāḥ jāgarti ātmānam avalokayan āsta ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasyām ātma viṣayāyām buddhau indriya saṃyamī prasanna manāḥ jāgarti ātmānam avalokayan āste iti arthaḥ

original: yasyāṃ śabdādiviṣayāyāṃ buddhau sarvāṇi bhūtāni jāgrati prabuddhāni bhavanti,
analyzed: yasyām śabda ādi viṣayāyām buddhau sarvāṇi bhūtāni jāgrati prabuddhāni bhavanti

original: ; sā śabdādiviṣayā buddhir ātmānaṃ paśyato muner niśevāprakāśā bhavati // BhGR_2.69 //
analyzed: sā śabda ādi viṣayā buddhiḥ ātmānam paśyataḥ muneḥ niśā iva aprakāśā bhavati

original: āpūryamāṇam acalapratiṣṭhaṃ samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat /
analyzed: āpūryamāṇam acala pratiṣṭham samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat

original: tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmī // BhG_2.70 //
analyzed: tadvat kāmāḥ yam praviśanti sarve sa śāntim āpnoti na kāma kāmī

original: yathā svenaivāpūryamāṇam ekarūpaṃ samudraṃ nādeyya āpaḥ praviśanti,
analyzed: yathā svena eva āpūryamāṇam eka rūpam samudram nādeyyaḥ āpaḥ praviśanti

original: āsām apāṃ praveśe 'py apraveśe ca samudro na kañcana viśeṣam āpadyate evaṃ sarve kāmāḥ śabdādayo viṣayāḥ yaṃ saṃyaminaṃ praviśanti indriyagocaratāṃ
analyzed: āsām apām praveśe api a praveśe ca samudraḥ na kañcana viśeṣam āpadyate evam sarve kāmāḥ śabda ādayaḥ viṣayāḥ yam saṃyaminam praviśanti indriya gocara tām

original: sa śāntim āpnoti /
analyzed: sa śāntim āpnoti

original: śabdādiṣv indriyagocaratām āpanneṣv anāpanneṣu ca svātmāvalokanatṛptyaiva yo na vikāram āpnoti,
analyzed: śabda ādiṣu indriya gocara tām āpanneṣu an āpanneṣu ca sva ātma avalokana tṛptyā eva yaḥ na vikāram āpnoti

original: sa eva śāntim āpnotītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva śāntim āpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: na kāmakāmī /
analyzed: na kāma kāmī

original: yaḥ śabdādibhir vikriyate,
analyzed: yaḥ śabda ādibhiḥ vikriyate

original: sa kadācid api na śāntim āpnoti // BhGR_2.70 //
analyzed: sa kadācid api na śāntim āpnoti

original: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati nisspṛhaḥ /
analyzed: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumān carati nisspṛhaḥ

original: nirmamo nirahaṅkāraḥ sa śāntim adhigacchati // BhG_2.71 //
analyzed: nirmamaḥ nirahaṅkāraḥ sa śāntim adhigacchati

original: kāmyanta iti kāmāḥ śabdādayaḥ /
analyzed: kāmyante iti kāmāḥ śabda ādayaḥ

original: yaḥ pumān śabdādīn sarvān viṣayān vihāya
analyzed: yaḥ pumān śabda ādīn sarvān viṣayān vihāya

original: tatra nisspṛhaḥ tatra mamatārahitaś ca,
analyzed: tatra nisspṛhaḥ tatra mamatā rahitaḥ ca

original: anātmani dehe ātmābhimānarahitaś carati;
analyzed: anātmani dehe ātma abhimāna rahitaḥ carati

original: sa ātmānaṃ dṛṣṭvā śāntim adhigacchati // BhGR_2.71 //
analyzed: saḥ ātmānam dṛṣṭvā śāntim adhigacchati

original: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha naināṃ prāpya vimuhyati /
analyzed: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha na enām prāpya vimuhyati

original: sthitvāsyām antakāle 'pi brahmanirvāṇam ṛcchati // BhG_2.72 //
analyzed: sthitvā asyām anta kāle api brahma nirvāṇam ṛcchati

original: eṣā nityātmajñānapūrvikā asaṅgakarmaṇi sthitiḥ sthitadhīlakṣā brāhmī brahmaprāpikā /
analyzed: eṣā nitya ātma jñāna pūrvikā asaṅga karmaṇi sthitiḥ sthita dhī lakṣā brāhmī brahma prāpikā

original: īdṛśīṃ karmaṇi sthitiṃ prāpya na vimuhyati punaḥ saṃsāraṃ nāpnoti,
analyzed: īdṛśīm karmaṇi sthitim prāpya na vimuhyati punar saṃsāram na āpnoti

original: asyāḥ sthityām antime 'pi vayasi sthitvā brahmanirvāṇam ṛcchati nirvāṇamayaṃ brahma gacchati;
analyzed: asyāḥ sthityām antime api vayasi sthitvā brahma nirvāṇam ṛcchati nirvāṇa mayam brahma gacchati

original: sukhaikatānam ātmānam avāpnotītyarthaḥ //
analyzed: sukha ekatānam ātmānam avāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: evam ātmayāthātmyaṃ yuddhākhyasya ca karmaṇas tatprāptisādhanatām ajānataḥ śarīrātmajñānena mohitasya,
analyzed: evam ātma yāthātmyam yuddha ākhyasya ca karmaṇaḥ tad prāpti sādhanatām a jānataḥ śarīra ātma jñānena mohitasya

original: tena ca mohena yuddhān nivṛttasya mohaśāntaye nityātmaviṣayā sāṅkhyabuddhiḥ,
analyzed: tena ca mohena yuddhāt nivṛttasya moha śāntaye nitya ātma viṣayā sāṅkhya buddhiḥ

original: tatpūrvikā ca asaṅgakarmānuṣṭhānarūpakarmayogaviṣayā buddhiḥ sthitaprajñatāyogasādhanabhūtā dvitīye adhyāye proktā; tad uktam,
analyzed: tad pūrvikā ca asaṅga karma anuṣṭhāna rūpa karma yoga viṣayā buddhiḥ sthita prajña tā yoga sādhana bhūtā dvitīye adhyāye proktā tat uktam

original: “nityātmāsaṅgakarmehāgocarā sāṅkhyayogadhīḥ /
analyzed: nitya ātma āsaṅga karma īhā gocarā sāṅkhya yoga dhīḥ

original: dvitīye sthitadhīlakṣā proktā tanmohaśāntaye” iti // BhGR_2.72 //
analyzed: dvitīye sthita dhī lakṣā proktā tad moha śāntaye iti

original: tad evaṃ mumukṣubhiḥ prāpyatayā
analyzed: tat evam mumukṣubhiḥ prāpya tayā

original: vedāntoditanirastanikhilāvidyādidoṣagandhānavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaparabrahmapuruṣottamaprāptyupāyabhūtavedanopāsanadhyānādiśabdavācyatadaikāntikātyantikabhaktiṃ
analyzed: vedānta udita nirasta nikhila avidyā ādi doṣa gandha anavadhika atiśaya asaṃkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa para brahma puruṣottama prāpti upāya bhūta vedanā upāsana dhyāna ādi śabda vācya tad aikāntika ātyantika bhaktim

original: vaktuṃ tadaṅgabhūtaṃ “ya ātmāpahatapāpmā” ityādiprajāpativākyoditaṃ prāptur ātmano
analyzed: vaktum tad aṅga bhūtam yaḥ ātmā apahata pāpmā ityādi prajāpati vākya uditam prāptuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: yāthātmyadarśanaṃ tannityatājñānapūrvakāsaṅgakarmaniṣpādyajñānayogasādhyam uktam /
analyzed: yāthātmya darśanam tat nityatā jñāna pūrvaka asaṅga karma niṣpādya jñāna yoga sādhyam uktam

original: prajāpativākye hi daharavākyoditaparavidyāśeṣatayā prāptur ātmanas svarūpadarśanam,
analyzed: prajāpati vākye hi dahara vākya udita para vidyā śeṣa tayā prāptuḥ ātmanaḥ sva rūpa darśanam

original: “yas tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānāti” ity uktvā jāgaritasvapnasuṣuptyatītaṃ pratyagātmasvarūpam aśarīraṃ pratipādya,
analyzed: yaḥ tam ātmānam anuvidya vijānāti iti uktvā jāgarita svapna suṣupti atītam pratyagātma svarūpam aśarīram pratipādya

original: “evam evaiṣa saṃprasādo 'smāc charīrāt samutthāya paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate” iti daharavidyāphalenopasaṃhṛtam /
analyzed: evam eva eṣa saṃprasādaḥ asmāt śarīrāt samutthāya param jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate iti daharavidyā phalena upasaṃhṛtam

original: anyatrāpi, “adhyātmayogādhigamena devaṃ matvā dhīro harṣaśokau jahāti” ity evam ādiṣu,
analyzed: anyatra api adhyātma yoga adhigamena devam matvā dhīraḥ harṣa śokau jahāti iti evam ādiṣu

original: devaṃ matveti vidhīyamānaparavidyāṅgatayā adhyātmayogādhigameneti pratyagātmajñānam api vidhāya,
analyzed: devam matvā iti vidhīyamāna para vidyā aṅga tayā adhyātma yoga adhigamena iti pratyagātma jñānam api vidhāya

original: “na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit” ityādinā pratyagātmasvarūpaṃ
analyzed: na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit ityādinā pratyagātma svarūpam

original: viśodhya, “aṇor aṇīyān“,
analyzed: viśodhya aṇoḥ aṇīyān

original: ity ārabhya,
analyzed: iti ārabhya

original: “mahāntaṃ vibhum ātmānaṃ matvā dhīro na śocati“,
analyzed: mahāntam vibhum ātmānam matvā dhīraḥ na śocati

original: “nāyam ātmā pravacanena labhyo na medhayā na bahunā śrutena /
analyzed: na ayam ātmā pravacanena labhyaḥ na medhayā na bahunā śrutena

original: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyas tasyaiṣa ātmā vivṛṇute tanūṃ svām //
analyzed: yam eva eṣa vṛṇute tena labhyaḥ tasya eṣaḥ ātmā vivṛṇute tanūm svām

original: BhGR_3.” ityādibhiḥ parasvarūpaṃ tadupāsanam upāsanasya ca bhaktirūpatāṃ pratipādya,
analyzed: ityādibhiḥ para svarūpam tad upāsanam upāsanasya ca bhakti rūpa tām pratipādya

original: “vijñānasārathir yas tu manaḥpragrahavān naraḥ /
analyzed: vijñāna sārathiḥ yaḥ tu manaḥ pragrahavān naraḥ

original: so 'dhvanaḥ pāram āpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam //
analyzed: saḥ adhvanaḥ pāram āpnoti tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam

original: BhGR_3.” iti paravidyāphalenopasaṃhṛtam /
analyzed: iti para vidyā phalena upasaṃhṛtam

original: ataḥ param adhyāyacatuṣṭayena idam eva prāptuḥ pratyagātmano darśanaṃ sasādhanaṃ prapañcayati
analyzed: atas param adhyāya catuṣṭayena idam eva prāptuḥ pratyagātmanaḥ darśanam sa sādhanam prapañcayati

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te matā buddhir janārdana /
analyzed: jyāyasī ced karmaṇaḥ te matā buddhiḥ janārdana

original: tat kiṃ karmaṇi ghore māṃ niyojayasi keśava // BhG_3.1 //
analyzed: tat kim karmaṇi ghore mām niyojayasi keśava

original: vyāmiśreṇaiva vākyena buddhiṃ mohayasīva me /
analyzed: vyāmiśreṇa eva vākyena buddhim mohayasi iva me

original: tad ekaṃ vada,
analyzed: tat ekam vada

original: niścitya yena śreyo 'ham āpnuyām // BhG_3.2 //
analyzed: niścitya yena śreyaḥ aham āpnuyām

original: yadi karmaṇo buddhir eva jyāyasīti te matā,
analyzed: yadi karmaṇaḥ buddhiḥ eva jyāyasī iti te matā

original: kim arthaṃ tarhi ghore karmaṇi māṃ niyojayasi /
analyzed: kim artham tarhi ghore karmaṇi mām niyojayasi

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati jñānaniṣṭhaivātmāvalokanasādhanam;
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati jñāna niṣṭhā eva ātma avalokana sādhanam

original: karmaniṣṭhā tu tasyāḥ niṣpādikā;
analyzed: karma niṣṭhā tu tasyāḥ niṣpādikā

original: ātmāvalokanasādhanabhūtā ca jñānaniṣṭhā sakalendriyamanasāṃ śabdādiviṣayavyāpāroparatiniṣpādyety abhihitā /
analyzed: ātma avalokana sādhana bhūtā ca jñāna niṣṭhā sakala indriya manasām śabda ādi viṣaya vyāpāra uparati niṣpādyā iti abhihitā

original: indriyavyāpāroparatiniṣpādyam ātmāvalokanaṃ cet siṣādhayiṣitam,
analyzed: indriya vyāpāra uparati niṣpādyam ātma avalokanam ced siṣādhayiṣitam

original: sakalakarmanivṛttipūrvakajñānaniṣṭhāyām evāhaṃ niyojayitavyaḥ /
analyzed: sakala karma nivṛtti pūrvaka jñāna niṣṭhāyām eva aham niyojayitavyaḥ

original: kim arthaṃ ghore karmaṇi sarvendriyavyāpārarūpe ātmāvalokanavirodhini karmaṇi māṃ niyojayasīti //
analyzed: kim artham ghore karmaṇi sarva indriya vyāpāra rūpe ātma avalokana virodhini karmaṇi mām niyojayasi iti

original: ato miśravākyena māṃ mohayasīva pratibhāti /
analyzed: atas miśra vākyena mām mohayasi iva pratibhāti

original: tathā hy ātmāvalokanasādhanabhūtāyāḥ sarvendriyavyāpāroparatirūpāyāḥ jñānaniṣṭhāyāḥ tadviparyayarūpaṃ karma sādhanam,
analyzed: tathā hi ātma avalokana sādhana bhūtāyāḥ sarva indriya vyāpāra uparati rūpāyāḥ jñāna niṣṭhāyāḥ tad viparyaya rūpam karma sādhanam

original: tad eva kurv iti vākyaṃ viruddhaṃ vyāmiśram eva /
analyzed: tat eva kuru iti vākyam viruddham vyāmiśram eva

original: tasmād ekam amiśrarūpaṃ vākyaṃ vada,
analyzed: tasmāt ekam amiśra rūpam vākyam vada

original: yena vākyenāham anuṣṭheyarūpaṃ niścitya śreyaḥ prāpnuyām // BhGR_3.12 //
analyzed: yena vākyena aham anuṣṭheya rūpam niścitya śreyaḥ prāpnuyām

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: loke 'smin dvividhā niṣṭhā purā proktā mayānagha /
analyzed: loke asmin dvividhā niṣṭhā purā proktā mayā anagha

original: jñānayogena sāṅkhyānāṃ karmayogena yoginām // BhG_3.3 //
analyzed: jñāna yogena sāṅkhyānām karma yogena yoginām

original: pūrvoktaṃ na samyagavadhṛtaṃ tvayā /
analyzed: pūrva uktam na samyak avadhṛtam tvayā

original: purā hy asmin loke vicitrādhikāripūrṇe,
analyzed: purā hi asmin loke vicitra adhikāri pūrṇe

original: dvividhā niṣṭhā jñānakarmaviṣayā yathādhikāram asaṅkīrṇaiva mayoktā /
analyzed: dvividhā niṣṭhā jñāna karma viṣayā yathā adhikāram asaṅkīrṇā eva mayā uktā

original: na hi sarvo laukikaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃjātamokṣābhilāṣas tadānīm eva jñānayogādhikāre prabhavati,
analyzed: na hi sarvaḥ laukikaḥ puruṣaḥ saṃjāta mokṣa abhilāṣaḥ tadānīm eva jñāna yoga adhikāre prabhavati

original: api tv anabhisaṃhitaphalena kevalaparamapuruṣārādhanaveṣeṇānuṣṭhitena karmaṇā vidhvastasvāntamalaḥ,
analyzed: api tu an abhisaṃhita phalena kevala parama puruṣa ārādhana veṣeṇa anuṣṭhitena karmaṇā vidhvasta svānta malaḥ

original: avyākulendriyo jñānaniṣṭhāyām adhikaroti /
analyzed: avyākula indriyaḥ jñāna niṣṭhāyām adhikaroti

original: “yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam /
analyzed: yatas pravṛttiḥ bhūtānām yena sarvam idam tatam

original: svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ” iti paramapuruṣārādhanaikaveṣatā karmaṇāṃ vakṣyate /
analyzed: sva karmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhim vindati mānavaḥ iti paramapuruṣa ārādhana eka veṣa tā karmaṇām vakṣyate

original: ihāpi, “karmaṇy evādhikāras te” ityādinā anabhisaṃhitaphalaṃ karma anuṣṭheyaṃ vidhāya,
analyzed: iha api karmaṇi eva adhikāraḥ te ityādinā anabhisaṃhita phalam karma anuṣṭheyam vidhāya

original: tena viṣayavyākulatārūpamohād uttīrṇabuddheḥ “prajahāti yadā kāmān” ityādinā jñānayoga uditaḥ /
analyzed: tena viṣaya vyākula tā rūpa mohāt uttīrṇa buddheḥ prajahāti yadā kāmān ityādinā jñāna yogaḥ uditaḥ

original: ataḥ sāṅkhyānām eva jñānayogena sthitir uktā /
analyzed: atas sāṅkhyānām eva jñāna yogena sthitiḥ uktā

original: yogināṃ tu karmayogena /
analyzed: yoginām tu karma yogena

original: saṅkhyā buddhiḥ tadyuktāḥ sāṅkhyāḥ ātmaikaviṣayayā buddhyā saṃbandhinaḥ sāṅkhyāḥ;
analyzed: saṅkhyā buddhiḥ tad yuktāḥ sāṅkhyāḥ ātma eka viṣayayā buddhyā saṃbandhinaḥ sāṅkhyāḥ

original: atadarhāḥ karmayogādhikāriṇo yoginaḥ /
analyzed: atadarhāḥ karmayoga adhikāriṇaḥ yoginaḥ

original: viṣayavyākulabuddhiyuktānāṃ karmayoge 'dhikāraḥ;
analyzed: viṣaya vyākula buddhi yuktānām karmayoge adhikāraḥ

original: avyākulabuddhīnāṃ tu jñānayoge 'dhikāra ukta iti na kiṃcid iha viruddhaṃ vyāmiśram abhihitam // BhGR_3.3 //
analyzed: avyākula buddhīnām tu jñāna yoge adhikāraḥ uktaḥ iti na kiṃcid iha viruddham vyāmiśram abhihitam

original: sarvasya laukikasya puruṣasya mokṣecchāyāṃ jātāyāṃ sahasaiva jñānayogo duṣkara ity āha
analyzed: sarvasya laukikasya puruṣasya mokṣa icchāyām jātāyām sahasā eva jñāna yogaḥ duṣkaraḥ iti āha

original: na karmaṇām anārambhān naiṣkarmyaṃ puruṣo 'śnute /
analyzed: na karmaṇām anārambhāt naiṣkarmyam puruṣaḥ aśnute

original: na ca saṃnyasanād eva siddhiṃ samadhigacchati // BhG_3.4 //
analyzed: na ca saṃnyasanāt eva siddhim samadhigacchati

original: na śāstrīyāṇāṃ karmaṇām anārambhād eva,
analyzed: na śāstrīyāṇām karmaṇām anārambhāt eva

original: puruṣo naiṣkarmyaṃ jñānaniṣṭhāṃ prāpnoti /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ naiṣkarmyam jñāna niṣṭhām prāpnoti

original: na cārabdhasya śāstrīyasya tyāgāt;
analyzed: na ca ārabdhasya śāstrīyasya tyāgāt

original: yato 'nabhisaṃhitaphalasya paramapuruṣārādhanaveṣasya karmaṇaḥ siddhiḥ sā /
analyzed: yatas an abhisaṃhita phalasya paramapuruṣa ārādhana veṣasya karmaṇaḥ siddhiḥ sā

original: atas tena vinā tāṃ na prāpnoti /
analyzed: atas tena vinā tām na prāpnoti

original: anabhisaṃhitaphalaiḥ karmabhir anārādhitagovindair avinaṣṭānādikālapravṛttānantapāpasañcayair avyākulendriyatāpūrvikā ātmaniṣṭhā dussaṃpādā
analyzed: an abhisaṃhita phalaiḥ karmabhiḥ an ārādhita govindaiḥ a vinaṣṭa anādi kāla pravṛtta ananta pāpa sañcayaiḥ a vyākula indriya tā pūrvikā ātma niṣṭhā dussaṃpādā

original: etad evopapādayati
analyzed: etat eva upapādayati

original: na hi kaścit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty akarmakṛt /
analyzed: na hi kaścid kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhati a karma kṛt

original: kāryate hy avaśaḥ karma sarvaḥ prakṛtijair guṇaiḥ // BhG_3.5 //
analyzed: kāryate hi avaśaḥ karma sarvaḥ prakṛti jaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: na hy asmin loke vartamānaḥ puruṣaḥ kaścit kadācid api karmākurvāṇas tiṣṭhati;
analyzed: na hi asmin loke vartamānaḥ puruṣaḥ kaścid kadācid api karma a kurvāṇaḥ tiṣṭhati

original: na kiṃcit karomīti vyavasito 'pi sarvaḥ puruṣaḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavaiḥ sattvarajastamobhiḥ prācīnakarmānuguṇaṃ pravṛddhair guṇaiḥ svocitaṃ karma  #
analyzed: na kiṃcid karomi iti vyavasitaḥ api sarvaḥ puruṣaḥ prakṛti saṃbhavaiḥ sattva rajaḥ tamobhiḥ prācīna karma anuguṇam pravṛddhaiḥ guṇaiḥ svocitam karma

original: prati avaśaḥ kāryate pravartyate /
analyzed: prati avaśaḥ kāryate pravartyate

original: ata uktalakṣaṇena karmayogena prācīnaṃ pāpasaṃcayaṃ nāśayitvā guṇāṃś ca sattvādīn vaśe kṛtvā nirmalāntaḥkaraṇena saṃpādyo jñānayogaḥ // BhGR_3.5
analyzed: atas ukta lakṣaṇena karmayogena prācīnam pāpa saṃcayam nāśayitvā guṇān ca sattva ādīn vaśe kṛtvā nirmala antaḥkaraṇena saṃpādyaḥ jñāna yogaḥ

original: anyathā jñānayogāya pravṛtto mithyācāro bhavatīty āha
analyzed: anyathā jñāna yogāya pravṛttaḥ mithyā ācāraḥ bhavati iti āha

original: karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran /
analyzed: karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya yaḥ āste manasā smaran

original: indriyārthān vimūḍhātmā mithyācāraḥ sa ucyate // BhG_3.6 //
analyzed: indriya arthān vimūḍha ātmā mithyā ācāraḥ saḥ ucyate

original: avinaṣṭapāpatayā ajitāntaḥkaraṇaḥ ātmajñānāya pravṛtto viṣayapravaṇatayā ātmani vimukhīkṛtamanāḥ viṣayān eva smaran ya āste,
analyzed: a vinaṣṭa pāpa tayā ajita antaḥkaraṇaḥ ātma jñānāya pravṛttaḥ viṣaya pravaṇa tayā ātmani vimukhīkṛta manāḥ viṣayān eva smaran yaḥ āste

original: anyathā saṃkalpya anyathā caratīti sa mithyācāra ucyate /
analyzed: anyathā saṃkalpya anyathā carati iti sa mithyācāraḥ ucyate

original: ātmajñānāyodyukto viparīto vinaṣṭo bhavatītyarthaḥ // BhGR_3.6 //
analyzed: ātma jñānāya udyuktaḥ viparītaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: yas tv indriyāṇi manasā niyamyārabhate 'rjuna /
analyzed: yaḥ tu indriyāṇi manasā niyamya ārabhate arjuna

original: karmendriyaiḥ karmayogam asaktaḥ sa viśiṣyate // BhG_3.7 //
analyzed: karmendriyaiḥ karma yogam asaktaḥ sa viśiṣyate

original: ataḥ pūrvābhyastaviṣayasajātīye śāstrīye karmaṇi indriyāṇy ātmāvalokanapravṛttena manasā niyamya taiḥ svata eva karmapravaṇair indriyair asaṅgapūrvakaṃ  #
analyzed: atas pūrva abhyasta viṣaya sajātīye śāstrīye karmaṇi indriyāṇi ātma avalokana pravṛttena manasā niyamya taiḥ svatas eva karma pravaṇaiḥ indriyaiḥ asaṅga pūrvakam

original: yaḥ karmayogam ārabhate,
analyzed: yaḥ karma yogam ārabhate

original: so 'saṃbhāvyamānapramādatvena jñānaniṣṭhād api puruṣād viśiṣyate // BhGR_3.7 //
analyzed: saḥ asaṃbhāvyamāna pramāda tvena jñāna niṣṭhāt api puruṣāt viśiṣyate

original: niyataṃ kuru karma tvaṃ karmaṃ jyāsayo hy akarmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: niyatam kuru karma tvam karmam jyā sayaḥ hi akarmaṇaḥ

original: śarīrayātrāpi ca te na prasiddhyed akarmaṇaḥ // BhG_3.8 //
analyzed: śarīra yātrā api ca te na prasiddhyet a karmaṇaḥ

original: niyataṃ vyāptam;
analyzed: niyatam vyāptam

original: prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭena hi vyāptaṃ karma,
analyzed: prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭena hi vyāptam karma

original: anādivāsanayā prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭas tvaṃ niyatatvena suśakatvād asaṃbhāvitapramādatvāc ca karmaṇaḥ,
analyzed: anādi vāsanayā prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭaḥ tvam niyata tvena su śaka tvāt asaṃbhāvita pramāda tvāt ca karmaṇaḥ

original: karmaiva kuru;
analyzed: karma eva kuru

original: akarmaṇaḥ jñānaniṣṭhāyā api karmaiva jyāyaḥ /
analyzed: akarmaṇaḥ jñāna niṣṭhāyāḥ api karma eva jyāyaḥ

original: “naiṣkarmyaṃ puruṣo 'śunute” iti prakramād akarmaśabdena jñānaniṣṭhaivocyate /
analyzed: naiṣkarmyam puruṣaḥ a śunute iti prakramāt akarma śabdena jñāna niṣṭhā eva ucyate

original: jñānaniṣṭhādhikāriṇo 'py anabhyastapūrvatayā hy aniyatatvena duḥśakatvāt sapramādatvāc ca jñānaniṣṭhāyāḥ,
analyzed: jñāna niṣṭhā adhikāriṇaḥ api anabhyasta pūrva tayā hi aniyata tvena duḥśaka tvāt sa pramāda tvāt ca jñāna niṣṭhāyāḥ

original: karmaniṣṭhaiva jyāyasī;
analyzed: karma niṣṭhā eva jyāyasī

original: karmaṇi kriyamāṇe ca ātmayāthātmyajñānenātmano 'kartṛtvānusandhānam anantaram eva vakṣyate /
analyzed: karmaṇi kriyamāṇe ca ātma yāthātmya jñānena ātmanaḥ akartṛ tva anusandhānam anantaram eva vakṣyate

original: ata ātmajñānasyāpi karmayogāntargatatvāt sa eva jyāyān ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas ātma jñānasya api karmayoga antargata tvāt saḥ eva jyāyān iti arthaḥ

original: karmaṇo jñānaniṣṭhāyā jyāyastvavacanaṃ jñānaniṣṭhāyām adhikāre saty evopapadyate /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ jñāna niṣṭhāyāḥ jyāyaḥ tva vacanam jñāna niṣṭhāyām adhikāre sati eva upapadyate

original: yadi sarvaṃ karma parityajya kevalaṃ jñānaniṣṭhāyām adhikāro 'pi,
analyzed: yadi sarvam karma parityajya kevalam jñāna niṣṭhāyām adhikāraḥ api

original: tarhi akarmaṇaḥ jñānaniṣṭhasya jñānaniṣṭhopakāriṇī śarīrayātrāpi na setsyati /
analyzed: tarhi akarmaṇaḥ jñāna niṣṭhasya jñāna niṣṭhā upakāriṇī śarīrayātrā api na setsyati

original: yāvat sādhanasamāpti śarīradhāraṇaṃ cāvaśyaṃ kāryam /
analyzed: yāvat sādhana samāpti śarīra dhāraṇam ca avaśyam kāryam

original: nyāyārjitadhanena mahāyajñādikaṃ kṛtvā tacchiṣṭāśanenaiva śarīradhāraṇaṃ kāryam,
analyzed: nyāya arjita dhanena mahāyajña ādikam kṛtvā tad śiṣṭa aśanena eva śarīra dhāraṇam kāryam

original: “āhāraśuddhau sattvaśuddhiḥ sattvaśuddhau dhrutvā smṛtiḥ” ityādiśruteḥ /
analyzed: āhāra śuddhau sattva śuddhiḥ sattva śuddhau dhrutvā smṛtiḥ ityādi śruteḥ

original: “te tv aghaṃ bhuñjate pāpā ye pacanty ātmakāraṇāt” iti vakṣyate /
analyzed: te tu agham bhuñjate pāpāḥ ye pacanti ātma kāraṇāt iti vakṣyate

original: ato jñānaniṣṭhasyāpi karmākurvato dehayātrāpi na setsyati /
analyzed: atas jñāna niṣṭhasya api karma a kurvataḥ dehayātrā api na setsyati

original: yato jñānaniṣṭhasyāpi dhriyamāṇaśarīrasya yāvatsādhanasamāpti mahāyajñādi nityanaimittikaṃ karma avaśyaṃ kartavyam,
analyzed: yatas jñāna niṣṭhasya api dhriyamāṇa śarīrasya yāvatsādhanasamāpti mahāyajña ādi nitya naimittikam karma avaśyam kartavyam

original: yataś ca karmayoge 'py ātmano 'kartṛtvabhāvanayātmayāthātmyānusandhānam antarbhūtam,
analyzed: yatas ca karmayoge api ātmanaḥ akartṛ tva bhāvanayā ātma yāthātmya anusandhānam antarbhūtam

original: yataś ca prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasya karmayogaḥ suśako 'pramādaś ca,
analyzed: yatas ca prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭasya karma yogaḥ su śakaḥ apramādaḥ ca

original: ato jñānaniṣṭhāyogyasyāpi jñānayogāt karmayogo jyāyān /
analyzed: atas jñāna niṣṭhā yogyasya api jñāna yogāt karmayogaḥ jyāyān

original: tasmāt tvaṃ karmayogam eva kurv ityabhiprāyaḥ // BhGR_3.8 //
analyzed: tasmāt tvam karma yogam eva kuru iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: evaṃ tarhi dravyārjanādeḥ karmaṇo 'haṅkāramamakārādisarvendriyavyakulatāgarbhatvenāsya puruṣasya karmavāsanayā bandhanaṃ bhaviṣyatīty atrāha
analyzed: evam tarhi dravya arjana ādeḥ karmaṇaḥ ahaṅkāra mamakāra ādi sarva indriya vyakula tā garbha tvena asya puruṣasya karma vāsanayā bandhanam bhaviṣyati iti atra āha

original: yajñārthāt karmaṇo 'nyatra loko 'yaṃ karmabandhanaḥ /
analyzed: yajña arthāt karmaṇaḥ anyatra lokaḥ ayam karma bandhanaḥ

original: tadarthaṃ karma kaunteya muktasaṅgas samācara // BhG_3.9 //
analyzed: tad artham karma kaunteya mukta saṅgaḥ samācara

original: yajñādiśāstrīyakarmaśeṣabhūtād dravyārjanādeḥ karmaṇo 'nyatra ātmīyaprayojanaśeṣabhūte karmaṇi kriyamāṇe ayaṃ lokaḥ karmabandhano bhavati /
analyzed: yajña ādi śāstrīya karma śeṣa bhūtāt dravya arjana ādeḥ karmaṇaḥ anyatra ātmīya prayojana śeṣa bhūte karmaṇi kriyamāṇe ayam lokaḥ karma bandhanaḥ bhavati

original: atas tvaṃ yajñārthaṃ dravyārjanādikaṃ karma samācara /
analyzed: atas tvam yajña artham dravya arjana ādikam karma samācara

original: tatrātmaprayojanasādhanatayā yaḥ saṅgaḥ tasmāt saṅgān muktas tam samācara /
analyzed: tatra ātma prayojana sādhanatayā yaḥ saṅgaḥ tasmāt saṅgāt muktaḥ tam samācara

original: evaṃ muktasaṅgena yajñādyarthatayā karmaṇi kriyamāṇe yajñādibhiḥ karmabhir ārādhitaḥ
analyzed: evam mukta saṅgena yajña ādi artha tayā karmaṇi kriyamāṇe yajña ādibhiḥ karmabhiḥ ārādhitaḥ

original: paramapuruṣo 'syānādikālapravṛttakarmavāsanām ucchidya avyākulātmāvalokanaṃ dadātītyarthaḥ // BhGR_3.9 //
analyzed: ucchidya

original: yajñaśiṣṭenaiva sarvapuruṣārthasādhananiṣṭhānāṃ śarīradhāraṇakartavyatām,
analyzed: yajña śiṣṭena eva sarva puruṣa artha sādhana niṣṭhānām śarīra dhāraṇa kartavya tām

original: ayajñaśiṣṭena śarīradhāraṇaṃ kurvatāṃ doṣaṃ cāha
analyzed: a yajña śiṣṭena śarīra dhāraṇam kurvatām doṣam ca āha

original: saha yajñaiḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā purovāca prajāpatiḥ /
analyzed: saha yajñaiḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā purā uvāca prajāpatiḥ

original: anena prasaviṣyadhvam eṣa vo 'stv iṣṭakāmadhuk // BhG_3.10 //
analyzed: anena prasaviṣyadhvam eṣa vaḥ astu iṣṭa kāmadhuk

original: “patiṃ viśvasya” ityādiśruter nirupādhikaḥ prajāpatiśabdaḥ sarveśvaraṃ viśvasya sraṣṭāraṃ viśvātmānaṃ parāyaṇaṃ nārāyaṇam āha /
analyzed: patim viśvasya ityādi śruteḥ nirupādhikaḥ prajāpati śabdaḥ sarveśvaram viśvasya sraṣṭāram viśvātmānam parāyaṇam nārāyaṇam āha

original: purā sargakāle sa bhagavān prajāpatir anādikālapravṛttācitsaṃsargavivaśāḥ upasaṃhṛtanāmarūpavibhāgāḥ
analyzed: purā sarga kāle sa bhagavān prajāpatiḥ anādi kāla pravṛtta acit saṃsarga vivaśāḥ upasaṃhṛta nāma rūpa vibhāgāḥ

original: svasmin pralīnāḥ sakalapuruṣārthānarhāḥ cetanetarakalpāḥ prajāḥ samīkṣya paramakāruṇikas
analyzed: svasmin pralīnāḥ sakala puruṣa artha anarhāḥ cetanā itara kalpāḥ prajāḥ samīkṣya parama kāruṇikaḥ

original: tadujjīvayiṣayā svārādhanabhūtayajñanirvṛttaye yajñaiḥ saha tāḥ sṛṣṭvaivam uvāca
analyzed: tad ujjīvayiṣayā sva ārādhana bhūta yajña nirvṛttaye yajñaiḥ saha tāḥ sṛṣṭvā evam uvāca

original: anena yajñena prasaviṣyadhvam,
analyzed: anena yajñena prasaviṣyadhvam

original: ātmano vṛddhiṃ kurudhvam;
analyzed: ātmanaḥ vṛddhim kurudhvam

original: eṣa vo yajñaḥ paramapuruṣārthalakṣaṇamokṣākhyasya kāmasya tadanuguṇānāaṃ ca kāmānāṃ prapūrayitā bhavatu // BhGR_3.10 //
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ yajñaḥ paramapuruṣa artha lakṣaṇa mokṣa ākhyasya kāmasya tad anuguṇānām ca kāmānām prapūrayitā bhavatu

original: katham?
analyzed: katham

original: devān bhāvayatānena te devā bhāvayantu vaḥ /

original: parasparaṃ bhāvayantaḥ śreyaḥ param avāpsyatha // BhG_3.11 //

original: anena devatārādhanabhūtena devān maccharīrabhūtān madātmakān ārādhayata /

original: “ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca” iti hi vakṣyate /

original: yajñenārādhitās te devā madātmakāḥ svārādhanāpekṣitānnapānādikair yuṣmān puṣṇantu /
analyzed: yajñena ārādhitāḥ te devāḥ mad ātmakāḥ sva ārādhana apekṣita anna pāna ādikaiḥ yuṣmān puṣṇantu

original: evaṃ parasparaṃ bhāvayantaḥ paraṃ śreyo mokṣākhyam avāpsyatha // BhGR_3.11 //
analyzed: evam parasparam bhāvayantaḥ param śreyaḥ mokṣa ākhyam avāpsyatha

original: iṣṭān bhogān hi vo devā dāsyante yajñabhāvitāḥ /
analyzed: iṣṭān bhogān hi vaḥ devāḥ dāsyante yajña bhāvitāḥ

original: tair dattān apradāyaibhyo yo bhuṅkte stena eva saḥ // BhG_3.12 //
analyzed: taiḥ dattān a pradāya ebhyaḥ yaḥ bhuṅkte stenaḥ eva saḥ

original: yajñabhāvitāḥ yajñenārādhitāḥ madātmakā devāḥ iṣṭān vo dāsyante uttamapuruṣārthalakṣaṇaṃ
analyzed: yajña bhāvitāḥ yajñena ārādhitāḥ mad ātmakāḥ devāḥ iṣṭān vaḥ dāsyante uttamapuruṣa artha lakṣaṇam

original: mokṣaṃ sādhayatāṃ ye iṣṭā bhogās tān pūrvapūrvayajñabhāvitā devā dāsyante uttarottarārādhanopekṣitān
analyzed: mokṣam sādhayatām ye iṣṭāḥ bhogāḥ tān pūrva pūrva yajña bhāvitāḥ devāḥ dāsyante uttara uttara ārādhana upekṣitān

original: sarvān bhogān vo dāsyante ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sarvān bhogān vaḥ dāsyante iti arthaḥ

original: svārādhanārthatayā tair dattān bhogān tebhyo 'pradāya yo bhuṅkte cora eva saḥ /
analyzed: sva ārādhana artha tayā taiḥ dattān bhogān tebhyaḥ a pradāya yaḥ bhuṅkte coraḥ eva saḥ

original: couryaṃ hi nāma anyadīye tatprayojanāyaiva parikḷpte vastuni svakīyatābuddhiṃ kṛtvā tena svātmapoṣaṇam /
analyzed: couryam hi nāma anyadīye tad prayojanāya eva parikḷpte vastuni svakīya tā buddhim kṛtvā tena sva ātma poṣaṇam

original: ato 'sya na paramapuruṣārthānarhatāmātram;
analyzed: atas asya na parama puruṣa artha anarha tā mātram

original: api tu nirayagāmitvaṃ ca bhaviṣyatītyabhiprāyaḥ // BhGR_3.12 //
analyzed: api tu niraya gāmi tvam ca bhaviṣyati iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: tad eva vivṛṇoti
analyzed: tat eva vivṛṇoti

original: yajñaśiṣṭāśinas santo mucyante sarvakilviṣaiḥ /
analyzed: yajña śiṣṭa āśinaḥ santaḥ mucyante sarva kilviṣaiḥ

original: te tv aghaṃ bhuñjate pāpā ye pacanty ātmakāraṇāt // BhG_3.13 //
analyzed: te tu agham bhuñjate pāpāḥ ye pacanti ātma kāraṇāt

original: indrādyātmanāvasthitaparamapuruṣārādhanārthatayaiva dravyāṇy upādāya vipacya tair yathāvasthitaṃ paramapuruṣam ārādhya tacchiṣṭāśanena ye śarīrayātrāṃ
analyzed: indra ādi ātmanā avasthita paramapuruṣa ārādhana arthatayā eva dravyāṇi upādāya vipacya taiḥ yathā avasthitam paramapuruṣam ārādhya tad śiṣṭa aśanena ye śarīrayātrām

original: te tv anādikālopārjitaiḥ kilbiṣaiḥ ātmayāthātmyāvalokanavirodhibhiḥ sarvair mucyante /
analyzed: te tu anādi kāla upārjitaiḥ kilbiṣaiḥ ātma yāthātmya avalokana virodhibhiḥ sarvaiḥ mucyante

original: ye tu paramapuruṣeṇendrādyātmanā svārādhanāya dattāni ātmārthatyopādāya vipacyāśnanti,
analyzed: ye tu paramapuruṣeṇa indra ādi ātmanā sva ārādhanāya dattāni vipacya aśnanti

original: te pāpātmano 'gham eva bhuñjate /
analyzed: te pāpa ātmanaḥ agham eva bhuñjate

original: aghapariṇāmitvād agham ity ucyate /
analyzed: agha pariṇāmi tvāt agham iti ucyate

original: ātmāvalokanavimukhāḥ narakāyaiva pacante // BhGR_3.13 //
analyzed: ātma avalokana vimukhāḥ narakāya eva pacante

original: punar api lokadṛṣṭyā śāstradṛṣṭyā ca sarvasya yajñamūlatvaṃ darśayitvā yajñānuvartanasyāvaśyakāryatām ananuvartane doṣaṃ cāha
analyzed: punar api loka dṛṣṭyā śāstra dṛṣṭyā ca sarvasya yajña mūla tvam darśayitvā yajña anuvartanasya avaśya kārya tām an anuvartane doṣam ca āha

original: annād bhavanti bhūtāni parjanyād annasaṃbhavaḥ /
analyzed: annāt bhavanti bhūtāni parjanyāt anna saṃbhavaḥ

analyzed: yajñāt bhavati parjanyaḥ yajñaḥ karma samudbhavaḥ

original: karma brahmodbhavaṃ viddhi brahmākṣarasamudbhavam /
analyzed: karma brahma udbhavam viddhi brahma akṣara samudbhavam

original: tasmāt sarvagataṃ brahma nityaṃ yajñe pratiṣṭhitam // BhG_3.15 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarva gatam brahma nityam yajñe pratiṣṭhitam

original: evaṃ pravartitaṃ cakraṃ nānuvartayatīha yaḥ /

analyzed: aghāyuḥ indriya ārāmaḥ mogham pārtha sa jīvati

original: yajñāt parjanyo bhavatīti ca śāstreṇāvagamyate,
analyzed: yajñāt parjanyaḥ bhavati iti ca śāstreṇa avagamyate

original: “agnau prāstāhutiḥ samyagādityam upatiṣṭhate /

original: ādityāj jāyate vṛṣṭiḥ” ityādinā /
analyzed: ādityāt jāyate vṛṣṭiḥ ityādinā

analyzed: yajñaḥ ca dravya arjana ādi kartṛ vyāpāra rūpa karma samudbhavaḥ

analyzed: iha api mama yoniḥ mahat brahma iti vakṣyate

analyzed: anna pāna ādinā tṛpta akṣara dhiṣṭhitam śarīram karmaṇe prabhavati iti karma sādhana bhūtam śarīram akṣara samudbhavam

original: tasmāt sarvagataṃ brahma sarvādhikārigataṃ śarīraṃ nityaṃ yajñe pratiṣṭhitaṃ yajñamūlam ityarthaḥ /

analyzed: evam paramapuruṣeṇa pravartitam idam cakram annāt bhūta śabda nirdiṣṭāni sa jīvāni śarīrāṇi

original: paryjanyād annam,
analyzed: paryjanyāt annam

original: yajñāt parjanyaḥ,
analyzed: yajñāt parjanyaḥ

original: yajñaś ca kartṛvyāpārarūpāt karmaṇaḥ,
analyzed: yajñaḥ ca kartṛ vyāpāra rūpāt karmaṇaḥ

analyzed: karma ca sa jīvāt śarīrāt

analyzed: sa jīvam śarīram punar api annāt iti anyonya kārya kāraṇa bhāvena cakra vat parivartamānam iha sādhane vartamānaḥ yaḥ karmayoga adhikārī jñānayoga adhikārī

original: vā nānuvartayati na pravartayati,
analyzed: vā na anuvartayati na pravartayati

original: aghārambhāyaiva yasyāyuḥ,
analyzed: agha ārambhāya eva yasya āyuḥ

analyzed: ubhaya rūpam vā saḥ aghāyuḥ

original: ata evendriyārāmo bhavati,
analyzed: atas eva indriya ārāmaḥ bhavati

original: nātmārāmaḥ;

original: indriyāṇy evāsyodyānāni bhavanti;
analyzed: indriyāṇi eva asya udyānāni bhavanti

analyzed: a yajña śiṣṭa vardhita deha manaḥ tvena udrikta rajaḥ tamaskaḥ ātma avalokana vimukha tayā viṣaya bhoga eka ratiḥ bhavati

original: ato jñānayogādau yatamāno 'pi niṣphalaprayatnatayā moghaṃ pārtha sa jīvati //
analyzed: atas jñāna yoga ādau yatamānaḥ api niṣphala prayatna tayā mogham pārtha sa jīvati

original: asādhanāyattātmadarśanasya muktasyeva mahāyajñādivarṇāśramocitakarmānārambha ity āha
analyzed: asādhana āyatta ātma darśanasya muktasya iva mahāyajña ādi varṇa āśrama ucita karma anārambhaḥ iti āha

original: yas tv ātmaratir eva syād ātmatṛptaś ca mānavaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ tu ātma ratiḥ eva syāt ātma tṛptaḥ ca mānavaḥ

original: ātmany eva ca saṃtuṣṭas tasya kāryaṃ na vidyate // BhG_3.17 //
analyzed: ātmani eva ca saṃtuṣṭaḥ tasya kāryam na vidyate

original: naiva tasya kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaścana /
