analyzed: na ca asya sarva bhūteṣu kaścid artha vyapāśrayaḥ

original: yas tu jñānayogakarmayogasādhananirapekṣaḥ svata evātmaratiḥ ātmābhimukhaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ tu jñāna yoga karma yoga sādhana nirapekṣaḥ svatas eva ātma ratiḥ ātma abhimukhaḥ

original: ātmanaiva tṛptaḥ nānnapānādibhir ātmavyatiriktaiḥ,
analyzed: ātmanā eva tṛptaḥ na anna pāna ādibhiḥ ātma vyatiriktaiḥ

original: ātmany eva ca santuṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: ātmani eva ca santuṣṭaḥ

original: nodyānasrakcandanagītavāditranṛttādau,
analyzed: na udyāna sraj candana gīta vāditra nṛtta ādau

original: dhāraṇapoṣaṇabhogyādikaṃ sarvam atmaiva yasya,
analyzed: dhāraṇa poṣaṇa bhogya ādikam sarvam atmā eva yasya

original: tasyātmadarśanāya kartavyaṃ na vidyate,
analyzed: tasya ātma darśanāya kartavyam na vidyate

original: svata eva sarvadā dṛṣṭātmasvarūpatvāt /
analyzed: svatas eva sarvadā dṛṣṭa ātma svarūpa tvāt

original: ata eva tasyātmadarśanāya kṛtena tatsādhanena nārthaḥ na kiṃcit prayojanam;
analyzed: atas eva tasya ātma darśanāya kṛtena tad sādhanena na arthaḥ na kiṃcid prayojanam

original: akṛtenātmadarśanasādhanena na kaścid anarthaḥ;
analyzed: akṛtena ātma darśana sādhanena na kaścid anarthaḥ

original: asādhanāyattātmadarśanatvāt /
analyzed: asādhana āyatta ātma darśana tvāt

original: svata evātmavyatiriktasakalācidvastuvimukhasyāsya sarveṣu prakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣeṣv ākāśādiṣu sakāryeṣu na kaścit prayojanatayā sādhanatayā vā
analyzed: svatas eva ātma vyatirikta sakala acit vastu vimukhasya asya sarveṣu prakṛti pariṇāma viśeṣeṣu ākāśa ādiṣu sa kāryeṣu na kaścid prayojanatayā sādhanatayā vā

original: yatas tadvimukhīkaraṇāya sādhanārambhaḥ;
sa hi mukta eva // BhGR_3.17 //18//
analyzed: sa hi muktaḥ eva

original: tasmād asaktas satataṃ kāryaṃ karma samācara /
analyzed: tasmāt asaktaḥ satatam kāryam karma samācara

original: asakto hy ācaran karma param āpnoti puruṣaḥ // BhG_3.19 //
analyzed: asaktaḥ hi ācaran karma param āpnoti puruṣaḥ

original: yasmād asādhanāyattātmadarśanasyaiva sādhanāpravṛttiḥ,
analyzed: yasmāt asādhana āyatta ātma darśanasya eva sādhana a pravṛttiḥ

original: yasmāc ca sādhane pravṛttasyāpi suśakatvāc ca apramādatvād antargatātmayāthātmyānusandhānatvāc
analyzed: yasmāt ca sādhane pravṛttasya api su śaka tvāt ca apramāda tvāt antargata ātma yāthātmya anusandhāna tvāt

original: ca jñānayogino 'pi mātrayā karmānuvṛttyapekṣatvāc ca karmayoga evātmadarśananirvṛttau śreyān,
analyzed: ca jñāna yoginaḥ api mātrayā karma anuvṛtti apekṣa tvāt ca karmayogaḥ eva ātma darśana nirvṛttau śreyān

original: tasmād asaṅgapūrvakaṃ kāryam ity eva satataṃ yāvadātmaprāpti karmaiva samācara /
analyzed: tasmāt asaṅga pūrvakam kāryam iti eva satatam yāvadātmaprāpti karma eva samācara

original: asaktaḥ, kāryam iti vakṣyamāṇākartṛtvānusandhānapūrvakaṃ ca karmācaran puruṣaḥ karmayogenaiva param āpnoti ātmānaṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_3.19
analyzed: asaktaḥ kāryam iti vakṣyamāṇa akartṛ tva anusandhāna pūrvakam ca karma ācaran puruṣaḥ karma yogena eva param āpnoti ātmānam prāpnoti iti arthaḥ  /

original: karmaṇaiva hi saṃsiddhim āsthitā janakādayaḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇā eva hi saṃsiddhim āsthitāḥ janaka ādayaḥ

original: yato jñānayogādhikāriṇo 'pi karmayoga evātmadarśane śreyān;
analyzed: yatas jñāna yoga adhikāriṇaḥ api karmayogaḥ evā ātma darśane śreyān

original: ata eva hi janakādayo rājarṣayo jñāninām agresarāḥ karmayogenaiva saṃsiddhim āsthitāḥ ātmānaṃ prāptavantaḥ //
analyzed: atas eva hi janaka ādayaḥ rājarṣayaḥ jñāninām agresarāḥ karmayogena eva saṃsiddhim āsthitāḥ ātmānam prāptavantaḥ

original: evaṃ prathamaṃ mumukṣor jñānayogānarhatayā karmayogādhikāriṇaḥ karmayoga eva kārya ity uktvā jñānayogādhikāriṇo 'pi jñānayogāt karmayoga eva  #
analyzed: evam prathamam mumukṣoḥ jñānayoga anarha tayā karmayoga adhikāriṇaḥ karmayogaḥ eva kāryaḥ iti uktvā jñānayoga adhikāriṇaḥ api jñānayogāt karmayogaḥ eva

original: śreyān iti sahetukam uktam /
analyzed: śreyān iti sa hetukam uktam

original: idānīṃ śiṣṭatayā vyapadeśyasya sarvathā karmayoga eva kārya ity ucyate
analyzed: idānīm śiṣṭa tayā vyapadeśyasya sarvathā karma yogaḥ eva kāryaḥ iti ucyate

original: lokasaṃgraham evāpi saṃpaśyan kartum arhasi // BhG_3.20 //
analyzed: loka saṃgraham evā api saṃpaśyan kartum arhasi

original: yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhas tat tad evetaro janaḥ /
analyzed: yat yat ācarati śreṣṭhaḥ tat tat eva itaraḥ janaḥ

original: sa yat pramāṇaṃ kurute lokas tad anuvartate // BhG_3.21 //
analyzed: sa yat pramāṇam kurute lokaḥ tat anuvartate

original: lokasaṃgrahaṃ paśyann api karmaiva kartum arhasi /
analyzed: loka saṃgraham paśyan api karma eva kartum arhasi

original: śreṣṭhaḥ kṛtsnaśāstrajñātayānuṣṭhātṛtayā ca prathito yad yad ācarati,
analyzed: śreṣṭhaḥ kṛtsna śāstra jñātayā anuṣṭhātṛ tayā ca prathitaḥ yat yat ācarati

original: tat tad evākṛtsnavij jano 'py ācarati;
analyzed: tat tat eva akṛtsna vid janaḥ api ācarati

original: anuṣṭhīyamānam api karma śreṣṭho yat pramāṇaṃ yadaṅgayuktam anutiṣṭhati tadaṅgayuktam evākṛtsnavilloko 'py anutiṣṭhati /
analyzed: anuṣṭhīyamānam api karma śreṣṭhaḥ yat pramāṇam yat aṅga yuktam anutiṣṭhati tat aṅga yuktam eva a kṛtsna vid lokaḥ api anutiṣṭhati

original: ato lokarakṣārthaṃ śiṣṭatayā prathitena śreṣṭhena svavarṇāśramocitaṃ karma sakalaṃ sarvadā anuṣṭheyam;
analyzed: atas loka rakṣā artham śiṣṭa tayā prathitena śreṣṭhena sva varṇa āśrama ucitam karma sakalam sarvadā anuṣṭheyam

original: anyathā lokanāśajanitaṃ pāpaṃ jñānayogād apy enaṃ pracyāvayet // BhGR_3.21 //
analyzed: anyathā loka nāśa janitam pāpam jñāna yogāt api enam pracyāvayet

original: na me pārthāsti kartavyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃcana /
analyzed: na me pārtha asti kartavyam triṣu lokeṣu kiṃcana

original: nānavāptam avāptavyaṃ varta eva ca karmaṇi // BhG_3.22 //
analyzed: na anavāptam avāptavyam varte eva ca karmaṇi

original: na me sarveśvarasyāptakāmasya sarvajñasya satyasaṅkalpasya triṣu lokeṣu devamanuṣyādirūpeṇa svacchandato vartamānasya kiṃcid api kartavyam
analyzed: na me sarveśvarasya āpta kāmasya sarvajñasya satya saṅkalpasya triṣu lokeṣu deva manuṣya ādi rūpeṇa svacchandataḥ vartamānasya kiṃcid api kartavyam

original: yato 'navāptaṃ karmaṇāvāptavyaṃ na kiṃcid apy asti /
analyzed: yatas anavāptam karmaṇā avāptavyam na kiṃcid api asti

original: athāpi lokarakṣāyai karmaṇy eva varte // BhGR_3.22 //
analyzed: atha api loka rakṣāyai karmaṇi eva varte

original: yadi hy ahaṃ na varteyaṃ jātu karmaṇy atandritaḥ /
analyzed: yadi hi aham na varteyam jātu karmaṇi atandritaḥ

original: mama vartmānuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśaḥ // BhG_3.23 //
analyzed: mama vartma anuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśas

original: utsīdeyur ime lokā na kuryāṃ karma ced aham /
analyzed: utsīdeyuḥ ime lokāḥ na kuryām karma ced aham

original: saṃkarasya ca kartā syām upahanyām imāḥ prajāḥ // BhG_3.24 //
analyzed: saṃkarasya ca kartā syām upahanyām imāḥ prajāḥ

original: ahaṃ sarveśvaraḥ satyasaṅkalpaḥ svasaṅkalpakṛtajagadudayavibhavalayalīlaḥ chandato
analyzed: aham sarveśvaraḥ satya saṅkalpaḥ sva saṅkalpa kṛta jagat udaya vibhava laya līlaḥ chandataḥ

original: jagadupakṛtimartyo jāto 'pi manuṣyeṣu śiṣṭajanāgresaravasudevagṛhe 'vatīrṇas tatkulocite
analyzed: jagat upakṛti martyaḥ jātaḥ api manuṣyeṣu śiṣṭa jana agresara vasudeva gṛhe avatīrṇaḥ tad kula ucite

original: karmaṇy atandritas sarvadā yadi na varteya,
analyzed: karmaṇi atandritaḥ sarvadā yadi na varteya

original: mama śiṣṭajanāgresaravasudevasūnor vartma akṛtsnavidaḥ śiṣṭāḥ sarvaprakāreṇāyam eva dharma ity anuvartante;
analyzed: mama śiṣṭa jana agresara vasudeva sūnoḥ vartma akṛtsna vidaḥ śiṣṭāḥ sarva prakāreṇa ayam eva dharmaḥ iti anuvartante

original: te ca svakartavyānanuṣṭhānena akaraṇe pratyavāyena ca ātmānam alabdhvā nirayagāmino bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: te ca sva kartavya ananuṣṭhānena akaraṇe pratyavāyena ca ātmānam a labdhvā niraya gāminaḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: ahaṃ kulocitaṃ karma na cet kuryām,
analyzed: aham kula ucitam karma na ced kuryām

original: evam eva sarve śiṣṭalokā madācarāyattadharmaniścayāḥ akaraṇād evotsīdeyuḥ naṣṭā bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: evam eva sarve śiṣṭa lokāḥ mad ācara āyatta dharma niścayāḥ akaraṇāt eva utsīdeyuḥ naṣṭāḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: śāstrīyācārānanupālanāt sarveṣāṃ śiṣṭakulānāṃ saṃkarasya ca kartā syām /
analyzed: śāstrīya ācāra an anupālanāt sarveṣām śiṣṭa kulānām saṃkarasya ca kartā syām

original: ata evemāḥ prajāḥ upahanyām /
analyzed: atas eva imāḥ prajāḥ upahanyām

original: evam eva tvam api śiṣṭajanāgresarapāṇḍutanayo yudhiṣṭhirānujo 'rjunas san yadi jñānaniṣṭhāyām adhikaroṣi;
analyzed: evam eva tvam api śiṣṭa jana agresara pāṇḍu tanayaḥ yudhiṣṭhira anujaḥ arjunaḥ san yadi jñāna niṣṭhāyām adhikaroṣi

original: tatas tvadācārānuvartino 'kṛtsnavidaḥ śiṣṭā mumukṣavaḥ svādhikāram ajānantaḥ karmaniṣṭhāyāṃ nādhikurvanto vinaśyeyuḥ /
analyzed: tatas tvad ācāra anuvartinaḥ akṛtsna vidaḥ śiṣṭāḥ mumukṣavaḥ sva adhikāram a jānantaḥ karma niṣṭhāyām na adhikurvantaḥ vinaśyeyuḥ

original: ato vyapadeśyena viduṣā karmaiva kartavyam // BhGR_3.23 //24//
analyzed: atas vyapadeśyena viduṣā karma eva kartavyam

original: saktāḥ karmaṇy avidvāṃso yathā kurvanti bhārata /
analyzed: saktāḥ karmaṇi a vidvāṃsaḥ yathā kurvanti bhārata

original: kuryād vidvāṃs tathāsaktaś cikīrṣur lokasaṃgraham // BhG_3.25 //
analyzed: kuryāt vidvān tathā asaktaḥ cikīrṣuḥ loka saṃgraham

original: na buddhibhedaṃ janayed ajñānāṃ karmasaṅginām /
analyzed: na buddhi bhedam janayet ajñānām karma saṅginām

original: joṣayet sarvakarmāṇi vidvān yuktaḥ samācaran // BhG_3.26 //
analyzed: joṣayet sarva karmāṇi vidvān yuktaḥ samācaran

original: avidvāṃsaḥ ātmany akṛtsnavidaḥ,
analyzed: a vidvāṃsaḥ ātmani a kṛtsna vidaḥ

original: karmaṇi saktāḥ karmaṇy avarjanīyasaṃbandhāḥ ātmany akṛtsnavittayā tadabhyāsarūpajñānayoge 'nadhikṛtāḥ karmayogādhikāriṇaḥ karmayogam eva yathā  #
analyzed: karmaṇi saktāḥ karmaṇi avarjanīya saṃbandhāḥ ātmani akṛtsna vittayā tad abhyāsa rūpa jñāna yoge anadhikṛtāḥ karmayoga adhikāriṇaḥ karmayogam eva yathā

original: ātmadarśanāya kurvate,
analyzed: ātma darśanāya kurvate

original: tathā ātmani kṛtsnavittayā karmaṇy asaktaḥ jñānayogādhikārayogyo 'pi vyapadeśyaḥ śiṣṭo lokarakṣārthaṃ svācāreṇa śiṣṭalokānāṃ dharmaniścayaṃ  #
analyzed: tathā ātmani kṛtsna vittayā karmaṇi asaktaḥ jñāna yoga adhikāra yogyaḥ api vyapadeśyaḥ śiṣṭaḥ loka rakṣā artham su ācāreṇa śiṣṭa lokānām dharma niścayam

original: cikīrṣuḥ karmayogam eva kuryāt /
analyzed: cikīrṣuḥ karma yogam eva kuryāt

original: ajñānām ātmany akṛtsnavittayā jñānayogopādānāśaktānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ karmasaṅginām anādikarmavāsanayā
analyzed: ajñānām ātmani akṛtsna vittayā jñāna yoga upādāna aśaktānām mumukṣūṇām karma saṅginām anādi karma vāsanayā

original: karmaṇy eva niyatatvena karmayogādhikāriṇāṃ karmayogād anyad ātmāvalokanasādhanam
analyzed: karmaṇi eva niyata tvena karmayoga adhikāriṇām karmayogāt anyat ātma avalokana sādhanam

original: astīti na buddhibhedaṃ janayet /
analyzed: asti iti na buddhi bhedam janayet

original: kiṃ tarhi? ātmani kṛtsnavittayā jñānayogaśakto 'pi pūrvoktarītyā,
analyzed: kim tarhi ātmani kṛtsna vittayā jñāna yoga śaktaḥ api pūrva ukta rītyā

original: “karmayoga eva jñānayoganirapekṣaḥ ātmāvalokanasādhanam” iti buddhyā yuktaḥ karmaivācaran
analyzed: karmayogaḥ eva jñānayoga nirapekṣaḥ ātma avalokana sādhanam iti buddhyā yuktaḥ karma eva ācaran

original: sakalakarmasu akṛtsnavidāṃ prītiṃ janayet // BhGR_3.25 //26//
analyzed: sakala karmasu akṛtsna vidām prītim janayet

original: karmayogam anutiṣṭhato viduṣo 'viduṣaś ca viśeṣaṃ pradarśayan karmayogāpekṣitam ātmano 'kartṛtvānusandhānaprakāram upadiśati
analyzed: karmayogam anutiṣṭhataḥ viduṣaḥ aviduṣaḥ ca viśeṣam pradarśayan karmayoga apekṣitam ātmanaḥ akartṛ tva anusandhāna prakāram upadiśati

original: prakṛteḥ kriyamāṇāṇi guṇaiḥ karmāṇi sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛteḥ kriyamāṇāṇi guṇaiḥ karmāṇi sarvaśas

original: ahaṅkāravimūḍhātmā kartāham iti manyate // BhG_3.27 //
analyzed: ahaṅkāra vimūḍha ātmā kartāham iti manyate

original: tattvavit tu mahābāho guṇakarmavibhāgayoḥ /
analyzed: tattva vid tu mahā bāho guṇa karma vibhāgayoḥ

original: guṇā guṇeṣu vartanta iti matvā na sajjate // BhG_3.28 //
analyzed: guṇāḥ guṇeṣu vartante iti matvā na sajjate

original: prakṛter guṇaiḥ sattvādibhiḥ svānurūpaṃ kriyamāṇāni karmāṇi prati ahaṅkāravimūḍhātmā,
analyzed: prakṛteḥ guṇaiḥ sattva ādibhiḥ sva anurūpam kriyamāṇāni karmāṇi prati ahaṅkāra vimūḍha ātmā

original: ahaṃ karteti manyate;
analyzed: aham kartā iti manyate

original: ahaṅkāreṇa vimūḍha ātmā yasyāsāv ahaṅkāravimūḍhātmā;
analyzed: ahaṅkāreṇa vimūḍhaḥ ātmā yasya asau ahaṅkāra vimūḍha ātmā

original: ahaṅkāro nāma anahamarthe prakṛtāv ahamabhimānaḥ;
analyzed: ahaṅkāraḥ nāma an ahamarthe prakṛtau aham abhimānaḥ

original: tena ajñātasvarūpo guṇakarmasu ahaṃ karteti manyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tena ajñāta svarūpaḥ guṇa karmasu aham kartā iti manyate iti arthaḥ

original: guṇakarmavibhāgayoḥ sattvādiguṇavibhāge tattatkarmavibhāge ca tattvavit,
analyzed: guṇa karma vibhāgayoḥ sattva ādi guṇa vibhāge tad tad karma vibhāge ca tattva vid

original: guṇās sattvādayaḥ guṇeṣu sveṣu kāryeṣu vartanta iti matvā guṇakarmasu ahaṃ karteti na sajjate // BhGR_3.27 //28//
analyzed: guṇāḥ sattva ādayaḥ guṇeṣu sveṣu kāryeṣu vartante iti matvā guṇa karmasu aham kartā iti na sajjate

original: prakṛter guṇasaṃmūḍhāḥ sajjante guṇakarmasu /
analyzed: prakṛteḥ guṇa saṃmūḍhāḥ sajjante guṇa karmasu

original: tān akṛtsnavido mandān kṛtsnavin na vicālayet // BhG_3.29 //
analyzed: tān akṛtsna vidaḥ mandān kṛtsna vid na vicālayet

original: akṛtsnavidaḥ svātmadarśanāya pravṛttāḥ prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭatayā prakṛter guṇair yathāvasthitātmani saṃmūḍhāḥ guṇakarmasu kriyāsv eva sajjante,
analyzed: akṛtsna vidaḥ sva ātma darśanāya pravṛttāḥ prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭa tayā prakṛteḥ guṇaiḥ yathā avasthita ātmani saṃmūḍhāḥ guṇa karmasu kriyāsu eva sajjante

original: na tadviviktātmasvarūpe /
analyzed: na tad vivikta ātma svarūpe

original: atas te jñānayogāya na prabhavantīti karmayoga eva teṣām adhikāraḥ /
analyzed: atas te jñāna yogāya na prabhavanti iti karmayogaḥ eva teṣām adhikāraḥ

original: evaṃbhūtāṃs tān mandān akṛtsnavidaḥ kṛtsnavit svayaṃ jñānayogāvasthānena na vicālayet /
analyzed: evaṃbhūtān tān mandān akṛtsna vidaḥ kṛtsna vid svayam jñāna yoga avasthānena na vicālayet

original: te kila mandāḥ śreṣṭhajanācārānuvartinaḥ karmayogād utthitam enaṃ dṛṣṭvā karmayogāt pracalitamanaso bhaveyuḥ /
analyzed: te kila mandāḥ śreṣṭha jana ācāra anuvartinaḥ karmayogāt utthitam enam dṛṣṭvā karmayogāt pracalita manasaḥ bhaveyuḥ

original: ataḥ śreṣṭhaḥ svayam api karmayoge tiṣṭhan ātmayāthātmyajñānenātmano 'kartṛtvam anusandhānaḥ,
analyzed: atas śreṣṭhaḥ svayam api karmayoge tiṣṭhan ātma yāthātmya jñānena ātmanaḥ akartṛ tvam anusandhānaḥ

original: karmayoga evātmāvalokane nirapekṣasādhanam iti darśayitvā tān akṛtsnavido joṣayed ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: karmayogaḥ eva ātma avalokane nirapekṣa sādhanam iti darśayitvā tān akṛtsna vidaḥ joṣayet iti arthaḥ

original: jñānayogādhikāriṇo 'pi jñānayogād asyaiva jyāyastvaṃ pūrvam evoktam /
analyzed: jñāna yoga adhikāriṇaḥ api jñāna yogāt asya eva jyāyaḥ tvam pūrvam eva uktam

original: ato vyapadeśyo lokasaṃgrahāyaitam eva kuryāt // BhGR_3.29 //
analyzed: atas vyapadeśyaḥ loka saṃgrahāya etam eva kuryāt

original: prakṛtiviviktātmasvabhāvanirūpaṇena guṇeṣu kartṛtvam āropya karmānuṣṭhānaprakāra uktaḥ guṇeṣu kartṛtvānusandhānaṃ cedam eva ātmano na svarūpaprayuktam  #
analyzed: prakṛti vivikta ātma svabhāva nirūpaṇena guṇeṣu kartṛ tvam āropya karma anuṣṭhāna prakāraḥ uktaḥ guṇeṣu kartṛ tva anusandhānam ca idam eva ātmanaḥ na svarūpa prayuktam

original: idaṃ kartṛtvam,
analyzed: idam kartṛ tvam

original: api tu guṇasamparkakṛtam iti prāptāprāptavivekena guṇakṛtam ity anusandhānam idānīm
analyzed: api tu guṇa samparka kṛtam iti prāpta aprāpta vivekena guṇa kṛtam iti anusandhānam idānīm

original: ātmanāṃ paramapuruṣaśarīratayā tanniyāmyatvasvarūpanirūpaṇena bhagavati puruṣottame
analyzed: ātmanām paramapuruṣa śarīra tayā tad niyāmya tva svarūpa nirūpaṇena bhagavati puruṣottame

original: sarvātmabhūte guṇakṛtaṃ ca kartṛtvam āropya karmakartavyatocyate
analyzed: sarvātma bhūte guṇa kṛtam ca kartṛ tvam āropya karma kartavya tā ucyate

original: mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasyādhyātmacetasā /
analyzed: mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya adhyātma cetasā

original: nirāśīr nirmamo bhūtvā yudhyasva vigatajvaraḥ // BhG_3.30 //
analyzed: nirāśīḥ nirmamaḥ bhūtvā yudhyasva vigata jvaraḥ

original: mayi sarveśvare sarvabhūtāntarātmabhūte sarvāṇi karmāṇy adhyātmacetasā saṃnyasya,
analyzed: mayi sarva īśvare sarva bhūta antarātma bhūte sarvāṇi karmāṇi adhyātma cetasā saṃnyasya

original: nirāśīr nirmamaś ca vigatajvaro yuddhādikaṃ sarvaṃ coditaṃ karma kuruṣva /
analyzed: nirāśīḥ nirmamaḥ ca vigata jvaraḥ yuddha ādikam sarvam coditam karma kuruṣva

original: ātmani yac cetaḥ tad adhyātmacetaḥ /
analyzed: ātmani yat cetaḥ tat adhyātma cetaḥ

original: ātmasvarūpaviṣayeṇa śrutiśatasiddhena jñānenetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: ātma svarūpa viṣayeṇa śruti śata siddhena jñānena iti arthaḥ

original: “antaḥ praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānāṃ sarvātmā ..... antaḥ praviṣṭaṃ kartāram etam” “ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmano 'ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ  #
analyzed: antar praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām sarva ātmā  antar praviṣṭam kartāram etam ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmanaḥ antaraḥ yam ātmā na veda yasya ātmā śarīram  /

original: ya ātmānam antaro yamayati,
analyzed: yaḥ ātmānam antaraḥ yamayati

original: sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtaḥ” ity evam ādyāḥ śrutayaḥ paramapuruṣapravartyaṃ taccharīrabhūtam enam ātmānam,
analyzed: sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ iti evam ādyāḥ śrutayaḥ paramapuruṣa pravartyam tad śarīra bhūtam enam ātmānam

original: paramapuruṣaṃ ca pravartayitāram ācakṣate /
analyzed: paramapuruṣam ca pravartayitāram ācakṣate

original: smṛtayaś ca “praśāsitāraṃ sarveṣām” ityādyāḥ /
analyzed: smṛtayaḥ ca praśāsitāram sarveṣām ityādyāḥ

original: “sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi sanniviṣṭo mattaḥ smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca“,
analyzed: sarvasya ca aham hṛdi sanniviṣṭaḥ mattaḥ smṛtiḥ jñānam apohanam ca

original: “īśvaras sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśe 'rjuna tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ sarva bhūtānām hṛd deśe arjuna tiṣṭhati

original: bhrāmayan sarvabhūtāni yantrārūḍhāni māyayā //
analyzed: bhrāmayan sarva bhūtāni yantra ārūḍhāni māyayā

original: BhGR_3.” iti vakṣyate /
analyzed: iti vakṣyate

original: ato maccharīratayā matpravartyātmasvarūpānusandhānena sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayaiva kriyamāṇānīti mayi paramapuruṣe saṃnyasya,
analyzed: atas mad śarīra tayā mad pravartya ātma svarūpa anusandhānena sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayā eva kriyamāṇāni iti mayi paramapuruṣe saṃnyasya

original: tāni ca kevalaṃ madārādhanānīti kṛtvā tatphale nirāśīḥ,
analyzed: tāni ca kevalam mad ārādhanāni iti kṛtvā tad phale nirāśīḥ

original: tata eva tatra karmaṇi mamatārahito bhūtvā vigatajvaro yuddhādikaṃ kuruṣva svakīyenātmanā
analyzed: tatas eva tatra karmaṇi mamatā rahitaḥ bhūtvā vigata jvaraḥ yuddha ādikam kuruṣva svakīyena ātmanā

original: kartrā svakīyaiś copakaraṇaiḥ svārādhanaikaprayojanāya paramapuruṣaḥ sarvaśeṣī sarveśvaraḥ
analyzed: kartrā svakīyaiḥ ca upakaraṇaiḥ sva ārādhana eka prayojanāya paramapuruṣaḥ sarva śeṣī sarva īśvaraḥ

original: svayam eva svakarmāṇi kārayatīty anusandhāya,
analyzed: svayam eva sva karmāṇi kārayati iti anusandhāya

original: karmas mamatārahitaḥ,
analyzed: karmas mamatā rahitaḥ

original: prācīnenānādikālapravṛttānantapāpasañcayena katham ahaṃ bhaviṣyāmīty evaṃbhūtāntarjvaravinirmuktaḥ,
analyzed: prācīnena anādi kāla pravṛtta ananta pāpa sañcayena katham aham bhaviṣyāmi iti evaṃbhūta antar jvara vinirmuktaḥ

original: paramapuruṣa eva karmabhir ārādhito bandhān mocayiṣyatīti sukhena karmayogam eva kuruṣv ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: paramapuruṣaḥ eva karmabhiḥ ārādhitaḥ bandhāt mocayiṣyati iti sukhena karma yogam eva kuruṣu iti arthaḥ

original: “tam īśvarāṇāṃ paramaṃ maheśvaraṃ taṃ daivatānāṃ paramaṃ ca daivatam“,
analyzed: tam īśvarāṇām paramam maheśvaram tam daivatānām paramam ca daivatam

original: “patiṃ viśvasya” ,
analyzed: patim viśvasya

original: “patiṃ patīnām” ityādiśrutisiddhiṃ hi sarveśvaratvaṃ sarvaśeṣitvaṃ ca /
analyzed: patim patīnām ityādi śruti siddhim hi sarva īśvara tvam sarva śeṣi tvam ca

original: īśvaratvam niyantṛtvam,
analyzed: īśvara tvam niyantṛ tvam

original: śeṣitvaṃ patitvam // BhGR_3.30 //
analyzed: śeṣi tvam pati tvam

original: ayam eva sākṣād upaniṣatsārabhūto 'rtha ityāha
analyzed: ayam eva sākṣāt upaniṣad sāra bhūtaḥ arthaḥ iti āha

original: ye me matam idaṃ nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ /
analyzed: ye me matam idam nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ

original: śraddhāvanto 'nasūyanto mucyante te 'pi karmabhiḥ // BhG_3.31 //
analyzed: śraddhāvantaḥ anasūyantaḥ mucyante te api karmabhiḥ

original: ye mānavāḥ śāstrādhikāriṇaḥ ayam eva śāstrārtha iti etan me mataṃ niścitya tathānutiṣṭhanti,
analyzed: ye mānavāḥ śāstra adhikāriṇaḥ ayam eva śāstra arthaḥ iti etat me matam niścitya tathā anutiṣṭhanti

original: ye cānanutiṣṭhanto 'py asmin śāstrārthe śraddadhānā bhavanti,
analyzed: ye ca an anutiṣṭhantaḥ api asmin śāstra arthe śraddadhānāḥ bhavanti

original: ye cāśraddadhānā api evaṃ śāstrārtho na saṃbhavatīti nābhyasūyanti asmin mahāguṇe
analyzed: ye ca aśraddadhānāḥ api evam śāstra arthaḥ na saṃbhavati iti na abhyasūyanti asmin mahā guṇe

original: śāstrārthe doṣam anāviṣkurvanto bhavantītyarthaḥ te sarve bandhahetubhir anādikālārabdhais
analyzed: śāstra arthe doṣam an āviṣkurvantaḥ bhavanti iti arthaḥ te sarve bandha hetubhiḥ anādi kāla ārabdhaiḥ

original: sarvaiḥ karmabhir mucyante;
analyzed: sarvaiḥ karmabhiḥ mucyante

original: te 'pi ity apiśabdād eṣāṃ pṛthakkaraṇam /
analyzed: te api iti apiśabdāt eṣām pṛthakkaraṇam

original: idānīm ananutiṣṭhanto 'py asmin śāstrārthe śraddadhānā anabhyasūyavaś ca śraddhayā cānasūyayā ca kṣīṇapāpāḥ acireṇemam eva śāstrārtham anuṣṭhāya  #
analyzed: idānīm an anutiṣṭhantaḥ api asmin śāstra arthe śraddadhānāḥ anabhyasūyavaḥ ca śraddhayā ca anasūyayā ca kṣīṇa pāpāḥ acireṇa imam eva śāstra artham anuṣṭhāya

original: mucyanta ityarthaḥ // BhGR_3.31 //
analyzed: mucyante iti arthaḥ

original: bhagavadabhimatam aupaniṣadam artham ananutiṣṭhatām aśraddadhānānām abhyasūyatāṃ ca doṣam āha
analyzed: bhagavat abhimatam aupaniṣadam artham an anutiṣṭhatām aśraddadhānānām abhyasūyatām ca doṣam āha

original: ye tv etad abhyasūyanto nānutiṣṭhanti me matam /
analyzed: ye tu etat abhyasūyantaḥ na anutiṣṭhanti me matam

original: sarvajñānavimūḍhāṃs tān viddhi naṣṭān acetasaḥ // BhG_3.32 //
analyzed: sarva jñāna vimūḍhān tān viddhi naṣṭān acetasaḥ

original: ye tv etat sarvam ātmavastu maccharīratayā madādhāraṃ maccheṣabhūtaṃ madekapravartyam iti me mataṃ nānutiṣṭhanti naivam anusandhāya sarvāṇi  #
analyzed: ye tu etat sarvam ātma vastu mad śarīra tayā mad ādhāram mad śeṣa bhūtam mad eka pravartyam iti me matam na anutiṣṭhanti na evam anusandhāya sarvāṇi

original: karmāṇi kurvate,
analyzed: karmāṇi kurvate

original: ye ca na śraddadhate,
analyzed: ye ca na śraddadhate

original: ye cābhyasūyanto vartante tān sarveṣu jñāneṣu viśeṣeṇa mūḍhān tata eva naṣṭān,
analyzed: ye ca abhyasūyantaḥ vartante tān sarveṣu jñāneṣu viśeṣeṇa mūḍhān tatas eva naṣṭān

original: acetaso viddhi;
analyzed: acetasaḥ viddhi

original: cetaḥkāryaṃ hi vastuyāthātmyaniścayaḥ;
analyzed: cetaḥ kāryam hi vastu yāthātmya niścayaḥ

original: tadabhāvād acetasaḥ;
analyzed: tad abhāvāt acetasaḥ

original: viparītajñānāḥ sarvatra vimūḍhāś ca // BhGR_3.32 //
analyzed: viparīta jñānāḥ sarvatra vimūḍhāḥ ca

original: evaṃ prakṛtisaṃsargiṇas tadguṇodrekakṛtaṃ kartṛtvam,
analyzed: evam prakṛti saṃsargiṇaḥ tad guṇa udreka kṛtam kartṛ tvam

original: tac ca paramapuruṣāyattam ity anusandhāya karmayogayogyena jñānayogayogyena ca karmayogasya suśakatvād apramādatvād antargatātmajñānatayā nirapekṣatvāt,
analyzed: tat ca paramapuruṣa āyattam iti anusandhāya karma yoga yogyena jñāna yoga yogyena ca karma yogasya su śaka tvāt apramāda tvāt antargata ātma jñāna tayā nirapekṣa tvāt

original: itarasya duśśakatvāt sapramādatvāc śarīradhāraṇādyarthatayā karmāpekṣatvāt karmayoga eva kartavyaḥ;
analyzed: itarasya duśśaka tvāt sa pramāda tvāt śarīra dhāraṇa ādi artha tayā karma apekṣa tvāt karma yogaḥ eva kartavyaḥ

original: vyapadeśyasya tu viśeṣataḥ sa eva kartavyaḥ iti coktam /
analyzed: vyapadeśyasya tu viśeṣataḥ saḥ eva kartavyaḥ iti ca uktam

original: ataḥ param adhyāyaśeṣeṇa jñānayogasya duśśakatayā sapramādatocyate
analyzed: atas param adhyāya śeṣeṇa jñāna yogasya duśśaka tayā sa pramāda tā ucyate

original: sadṛśaṃ ceṣṭate svasyāḥ prakṛter jñānavān api /
analyzed: sadṛśam ceṣṭate svasyāḥ prakṛteḥ jñānavān api

original: prakṛtiṃ yānti bhūtāni nigrahaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati // BhG_3.33 //
analyzed: prakṛtim yānti bhūtāni nigrahaḥ kim kariṣyati

original: prakṛtiviviktam īdṛśam ātmasvarūpam,
analyzed: prakṛti viviktam īdṛśam ātma svarūpam

original: tad eva sarvadānusandheyam iti ca śāstrāṇi pratipādayantīti jñānavān api svasyāḥ prakṛteḥ prācīnavāsanāyās sadṛśaṃ prākṛtaviṣayeṣv eva ceṣṭate;
analyzed: tat eva sarvadā anusandheyam iti ca śāstrāṇi pratipādayanti iti jñānavān api svasyāḥ prakṛteḥ prācīna vāsanāyāḥ sadṛśam prākṛta viṣayeṣu eva ceṣṭate

original: prakṛtiṃ yānti bhūtāni acitsaṃsṛṣṭā jantavo 'nādikālapravṛttavāsanām evānuyānti;
analyzed: prakṛtim yānti bhūtāni acit saṃsṛṣṭāḥ jantavaḥ anādi kāla pravṛtta vāsanām eva anuyānti

original: tāni vāsanānuyāyīni bhūtāni śāstrakṛto nigrahaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati // BhGR_3.33 //
analyzed: tāni vāsanā anuyāyīni bhūtāni śāstra kṛtaḥ nigrahaḥ kim kariṣyati

original: prakṛtyanuyāyitvaprakāram āha
indriyasyendriyasyārthe rāgadveṣau vyavasthitau /
analyzed: indriyasya indriyasya arthe rāga dveṣau vyavasthitau

original: tayor na vaśam āgacchet tau hy asya paripanthinau // BhG_3.34 //
analyzed: tayoḥ na vaśam āgacchet tau hi asya paripanthinau

original: śrotrādijñānendriyasyārthe śabdādau vāgādikarmendriyasya cārthe vacanādau prācīnavāsanājanitatadanububhūṣārūpo yo rāgo 'varjanīyo vyavasthitaḥ;
analyzed: śrotra ādi jñāna indriyasya arthe śabda ādau vāc ādi karmendriyasya ca arthe vacana ādau prācīna vāsanā janita tad anububhūṣā rūpaḥ yaḥ rāgaḥ avarjanīyaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: tadanubhave pratihate cāvarjanīyo yo dveṣo vyavasthitaḥ,
analyzed: tad anubhave pratihate ca avarjanīyaḥ yaḥ dveṣaḥ vyavasthitaḥ

original: tāv evaṃ jñānayogāya yatamānaṃ niyamitasarvendriyaṃ svavaśe kṛtvā prasahya svakāryeṣu saṃyojayataḥ /
analyzed: tau evam jñāna yogāya yatamānam niyamita sarva indriyam sva vaśe kṛtvā prasahya sva kāryeṣu saṃyojayataḥ

original: tataś cāyam ātmasvarūpānubhavavimukho vinaṣṭo bhavati /
analyzed: tatas ca ayam ātma svarūpa anubhava vimukhaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ bhavati

original: jñānayogārambheṇa rāgadveṣavaśam āgamya na vinaśyet /
analyzed: jñāna yoga ārambheṇa rāga dveṣa vaśam āgamya na vinaśyet

original: tau hi rāgadveṣau asya durjayau śatrū jñānābhyāsaṃ vārayataḥ // BhGR_3.34 //
analyzed: tau hi rāga dveṣau asya durjayau śatrū jñāna abhyāsam vārayataḥ

original: śreyān svadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt /
analyzed: śreyān svadharmaḥ viguṇaḥ para dharmāt su anuṣṭhitāt

original: svadharme nidhanaṃ śreyaḥ paradharmo bhayāvahaḥ // BhG_3.35 //
analyzed: svadharme nidhanam śreyaḥ para dharmaḥ bhaya āvahaḥ

original: ataḥ suśakatayā svadharmabhūtaḥ karmayogo viguṇo 'py apramādagarbhaḥ prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasya
analyzed: atas su śaka tayā svadharma bhūtaḥ karmayogaḥ viguṇaḥ api apramāda garbhaḥ prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭasya

original: duśśakatayā paradharmabhūtāj jñānayogāt saguṇād api kiṃcit kālam anuṣṭhitāt sapramādāc chreyān;
analyzed: duśśaka tayā para dharma bhūtāt jñāna yogāt sa guṇāt api kiṃcid kālam anuṣṭhitāt sa pramādāt śreyān

original: svenaivopādātuṃ yogyatayā svadharmabhūte karmayoge vartamānasyaikasmin janmany aprāptaphalatayā nidhanam api śreyaḥ,
analyzed: svena evā upādātum yogyatayā svadharma bhūte karmayoge vartamānasya ekasmin janmani aprāpta phala tayā nidhanam api śreyaḥ

original: anantarāyahatatayānantarajanmany api avyākulakarmayogārambhasaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: anantara āya hata tayā anantara janmani api avyākula karma yoga ārambha saṃbhavāt

original: prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasya svenaivopādātum aśakyatayā paradharmabhūto jñānayogaḥ pramādagarbhatayā bhayāvahaḥ // BhGR_3.35 //
analyzed: prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭasya svena evā upādātum aśakya tayā para dharma bhūtaḥ jñāna yogaḥ pramāda garbha tayā bhaya āvahaḥ

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: atha kena prayukto 'yaṃ pāpaṃ carati pūruṣaḥ /
analyzed: atha kena prayuktaḥ ayam pāpam carati pūruṣaḥ

original: anicchann api vārṣṇeya balād iva niyojitaḥ // BhG_3.36 //
analyzed: an icchan api vārṣṇeya balāt iva niyojitaḥ

original: athāyaṃ jñānayogāya pravṛttaḥ puruṣaḥ svayaṃ viṣayān anubhavitum anicchann api kena prayukto viṣayānubhavarūpaṃ pāpaṃ balān niyojita iva carati
analyzed: atha ayam jñāna yogāya pravṛttaḥ puruṣaḥ svayam viṣayān anubhavitum an icchan api kena prayuktaḥ viṣaya anubhava rūpam pāpam balāt niyojitaḥ iva carati

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: kāma eṣa krodha eṣa rajoguṇasamudbhavaḥ /
analyzed: kāmaḥ eṣa krodhaḥ eṣa rajaḥ guṇa samudbhavaḥ

original: mahāśano mahāpāpmā viddhy enam iha vairiṇam // BhG_3.37 //
analyzed: mahā aśanaḥ mahā pāpmā viddhi enam iha vairiṇam

original: asyodbhavābhibhavarūpeṇa vartamānaguṇamayaprakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasya jñānāyārabdhasya rajoguṇasamudbhavaḥ prācīnavāsanājanitaḥ śabdādiviṣayaḥ kāmo  #
analyzed: asya udbhava abhibhava rūpeṇa vartamāna guṇa maya prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭasya jñānāya ārabdhasya rajaḥ guṇa samudbhavaḥ prācīna vāsanā janitaḥ śabda ādi viṣayaḥ

original: mahāśanaḥ śatruḥ viṣayeṣv enam ākarṣati /
analyzed: mahā aśanaḥ śatruḥ viṣayeṣu enam ākarṣati

original: eṣa eva pratihatagatiḥ pratihatihetubhūtacetanān prati krodharūpeṇa pariṇato mahāpāpmā parahiṃsādiṣu pravartayati /
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva pratihata gatiḥ pratihati hetu bhūta cetanān prati krodha rūpeṇa pariṇataḥ mahā pāpmā para hiṃsā ādiṣu pravartayati

original: enaṃ rajoguṇasamudbhavaṃ sahajaṃ jñānayogavirodhinaṃ vairiṇaṃ viddhi // BhGR_3.37 //
analyzed: enam rajaḥ guṇa samudbhavam sahajam jñāna yoga virodhinam vairiṇam viddhi

original: dhūmenāvriyate vahnir yathādarśo malena ca /
analyzed: dhūmena āvriyate vahniḥ yathā ādarśaḥ malena ca

original: yatholbenāvṛto garbhas tathā tenedam āvṛtam // BhG_3.38 //
analyzed: yathā ulbena āvṛtaḥ garbhaḥ tathā tena idam āvṛtam

original: yathā dhūmena vahnir āvriyate,
analyzed: yathā dhūmena vahniḥ āvriyate

original: yathā ādarśo malena,
analyzed: yathā ādarśaḥ malena

original: yathā ca ulbenāvṛto garbhaḥ,
analyzed: yathā ca ulbena āvṛtaḥ garbhaḥ

original: tathā tena kāmena idaṃ jantujātam āvṛtam // BhGR_3.38 //
analyzed: tathā tena kāmena idam jantu jātam āvṛtam

original: āvaraṇaprakāram āha
analyzed: āvaraṇa prakāram āha

original: āvṛtaṃ jñānam etena jñānino nityavairiṇā /
analyzed: āvṛtam jñānam etena jñāninaḥ nitya vairiṇā

original: kāmarūpeṇa kaunteya duṣpūreṇānalena ca // BhG_3.39 //
analyzed: kāmarūpeṇa kaunteya duṣpūreṇa analena ca

original: asya jantoḥ jñāninaḥ jñānasvabhāvasyātmaviṣayaṃ jñānam etena kāmakāreṇa viṣayavyāmohajananena nityavairiṇā āvṛtam;
analyzed: asya jantoḥ jñāninaḥ jñāna svabhāvasya ātma viṣayam jñānam etena kāmakāreṇa viṣaya vyāmoha jananena nitya vairiṇā āvṛtam

original: duṣpūreṇa prāptyanarhaviṣayeṇa,
analyzed: duṣpūreṇa prāpti anarha viṣayeṇa

original: analena ca paryāptirahitena // BhGR_3.39 //
analyzed: analena ca paryāpti rahitena

original: kair upakaraṇair ayaṃ kāma ātmānam adhiṣṭhitīty atrāha
analyzed: kaiḥ upakaraṇaiḥ ayam kāmaḥ ātmānam adhiṣṭhiti iti atra āha

original: indriyāṇi mano buddhir asyādhiṣṭhānam ucyate /
analyzed: indriyāṇi manaḥ buddhiḥ asya adhiṣṭhānam ucyate

original: etair vimohayaty eṣa jñānam āvṛtya dehinam // BhG_3.40 //
analyzed: etaiḥ vimohayati eṣa jñānam āvṛtya dehinam

original: adhitiṣṭhaty ebhir ayaṃ kāma ātmānam itīndriyāṇi mano buddhir asyādhiṣṭhānam;
analyzed: adhitiṣṭhati ebhiḥ ayam kāmaḥ ātmānam iti indriyāṇi manaḥ buddhiḥ asya adhiṣṭhānam

original: etair indriyamanobuddhibhiḥ kāmo 'dhiṣṭhānabhūtair viṣayapravaṇair dehinaṃ prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭaṃ jñānam āvṛtya vimohayati vividhaṃ mohayati,
analyzed: etaiḥ indriya manaḥ buddhibhiḥ kāmaḥ adhiṣṭhāna bhūtaiḥ viṣaya pravaṇaiḥ dehinam prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭam jñānam āvṛtya vimohayati vividham mohayati

original: ātmajñānavimukhaṃ viṣayānubhavaparaṃ karotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_3.40 //
analyzed: ātma jñāna vimukham viṣaya anubhava param karoti iti arthaḥ

original: tasmāt tvam indriyāṇy ādau niyamya bharatarṣabha /
analyzed: tasmāt tvam indriyāṇi ādau niyamya bharata ṛṣabha

original: pāpmānaṃ prajahi hy enaṃ jñānavijñānanāśanam // BhG_3.41 //
analyzed: pāpmānam prajahi hi enam jñāna vijñāna nāśanam

original: yasmāt sarvendriyavyāpāroparatirūpe jñānayoge pravṛttasyāyaṃ kāmarūpaḥ śatruḥ viṣayābhimukhyakaraṇena ātmani vaimukhyaṃ karoti,
analyzed: yasmāt sarva indriya vyāpāra uparati rūpe jñāna yoge pravṛttasya ayam kāma rūpaḥ śatruḥ viṣaya ābhimukhya karaṇena ātmani vaimukhyam karoti

original: tasmāt prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭatayendriyavyāpārapravaṇastvam ādau mokṣopāyārambhasamaya eva,
analyzed: tasmāt prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭa tayā indriya vyāpāra pravaṇaḥ tvam ādau mokṣa upāya ārambha samaye eva

original: indriyavyāpārarūpe karmayoge indriyāṇi niyamya,
analyzed: indriya vyāpāra rūpe karma yoge indriyāṇi niyamya

original: enaṃ jñānavijñānanāśanam ātmasvarūpaviṣayasya jñānasya tadvivekaviṣayasya ca nāśanaṃ pāpmānaṃ kāmarūpaṃ vairiṇaṃ prajahi nāśaya // BhGR_3.41
analyzed: enam jñāna vijñāna nāśanam ātma svarūpa viṣayasya jñānasya tad viveka viṣayasya ca nāśanam pāpmānam kāma rūpam vairiṇam prajahi nāśaya

original: jñānavirodhiṣu pradhānam āha
analyzed: jñāna virodhiṣu pradhānam āha

original: indriyāṇi parāṇy āhur indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: indriyāṇi parāṇi āhuḥ indriyebhyaḥ param manaḥ

original: manasas tu parā buddhir yo buddheḥ paratas tu saḥ // BhG_3.42 //
analyzed: manasaḥ tu parā buddhiḥ yaḥ buddheḥ paratas tu saḥ

original: jñānavirodhe pradhānānīndriyāṇy āhuḥ,
analyzed: jñāna virodhe pradhānāni indriyāṇi āhuḥ

original: yata indriyeṣu viṣayavyāpṛteṣu ātmani jñānaṃ na pravartate /
analyzed: yatas indriyeṣu viṣaya vyāpṛteṣu ātmani jñānam na pravartate

original: indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ indriyeṣu uparateṣv api manasi viṣayapravaṇe ātmajñānaṃ na saṃbhavati /
analyzed: indriyebhyaḥ param manaḥ indriyeṣu uparateṣu api manasi viṣaya pravaṇe ātma jñānam na saṃbhavati

original: manasas tu parā buddhiḥ manasi vṛttyantaravimukhe 'pi viparītādhyavasāyapravṛttau satyāṃ jñānaṃ na pravartate /
analyzed: manasaḥ tu parā buddhiḥ manasi vṛtti antara vimukhe api viparīta adhyavasāya pravṛttau satyām jñānam na pravartate

original: sarveṣu buddhiparyanteṣu uparateṣv apīcchāparyāyaḥ kāmo rajassamudbhavo vartate cet,
analyzed: sarveṣu buddhi paryanteṣu uparateṣu api icchā paryāyaḥ kāmaḥ rajaḥ samudbhavaḥ vartate ced

original: sa evaitānīndriyādīny api svaviṣaye vartayitvā ātmajñānaṃ niruṇaddhi /
analyzed: saḥ eva etāni indriya ādīni api sva viṣaye vartayitvā ātma jñānam niruṇaddhi

original: tad idam ucyate,
analyzed: tat idam ucyate

original: yo buddheḥ paras tu saḥ iti /
analyzed: yaḥ buddheḥ paraḥ tu saḥ iti

original: buddher api yaḥ paras sa kāma ityarthaḥ // BhGR_3.42 //
analyzed: buddheḥ api yaḥ paraḥ sa kāmaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ buddheḥ paraṃ buddhvā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā /
analyzed: evam buddheḥ param buddhvā saṃstabhya ātmānam ātmanā

original: jahi śatruṃ mahābāho kāmarūpaṃ durāsadam // BhG_3.43 //
analyzed: jahi śatrum mahā bāho kāma rūpam durāsadam

original: evaṃ buddher api paraṃ kāmaṃ jñānayogavirodhinaṃ vairiṇaṃ buddhvā ātmānaṃ manaḥ ātmanā buddhyā karmayoge 'vasthāpya enaṃ kāmarūpaṃ durāsadaṃ  #
analyzed: evam buddheḥ api param kāmam jñāna yoga virodhinam vairiṇam buddhvā ātmānam manaḥ ātmanā buddhyā karmayoge avasthāpya enam kāmarūpam durāsadam

original: śatruṃ jahi nāśayeti // BhGR_3.43 //
analyzed: śatrum jahi nāśaya iti

original: tṛtīye 'dhyāye prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasya mumukṣoḥ sahasā jñānayoge 'nadhikārāt karmayoga eva kāryaḥ,
analyzed: tṛtīye adhyāye prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭasya mumukṣoḥ sahasā jñāna yoge anadhikārāt karmayogaḥ eva kāryaḥ

original: jñānayogādhikāriṇo 'py akartṛtvānusandhānapūrvakakarmayoga eva śreyān iti sahetukam uktam;
analyzed: jñāna yoga adhikāriṇaḥ api akartṛ tva anusandhāna pūrvaka karmayogaḥ eva śreyān iti sa hetukam uktam

original: śiṣṭatayā vyapadeśyasya tu viśeṣataḥ karmayoga eva kārya iti coktam /
analyzed: śiṣṭa tayā vyapadeśyasya tu viśeṣataḥ karma yogaḥ eva kāryaḥ iti ca uktam

original: caturthenedānīm asyaiva karmayogasya nikhilajagaduddharaṇāya manvantarādāv evopadiṣṭatayā kartavyatāṃ draḍhayitvā antargatajñānatayāsyaiva
analyzed: caturthena idānīm asya eva karmayogasya nikhila jagat uddharaṇāya manvantara ādau eva upadiṣṭa tayā kartavya tām draḍhayitvā antargata jñāna tayā asya eva

original: karmayogasvarūpam,
tadbhedāḥ,
analyzed: tad bhedāḥ

original: karmayoge jñānāṃśasyaiva prādhānyaṃ cocyate /
analyzed: karmayoge jñāna aṃśasya eva prādhānyam ca ucyate

original: prasaṅgāc ca bhagavadavatārayāthātmyam ucyate /
analyzed: prasaṅgāt ca bhagavat avatāra yāthātmyam ucyate

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: imaṃ vivasvate yogaṃ proktavān aham avyayam /
analyzed: imam vivasvate yogam proktavān aham avyayam

original: vivasvān manave prāha manur īkṣavākave 'bravīt // BhG_4.1 //
analyzed: vivasvān manave prāha manuḥ īkṣavākave abravīt

original: evaṃ paramparāprāptam imaṃ rājarṣayo 'viduḥ /
analyzed: evam paramparā prāptam imam rājarṣayaḥ aviduḥ

original: sa kāleneha mahatā yogo naṣṭaḥ parantapa // BhG_4.2 //
analyzed: sa kālena iha mahatā yogaḥ naṣṭaḥ parantapa

original: sa evāyaṃ mayā te 'dya yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva ayam mayā te adya yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ

original: bhakto 'sti me sakhā ceti rahasyaṃ hy etad uttamam // BhG_4.3 //
analyzed: bhaktaḥ asti me sakhā ca iti rahasyam hi etat uttamam

original: yo 'yaṃ tavodito yogaḥ sa kevalaṃ yuddhaprotsāhanāyedānīm udita iti na mantavyam /
analyzed: yaḥ ayam tava uditaḥ yogaḥ sa kevalam yuddha protsāhanāya idānīm uditaḥ iti na mantavyam

original: manvantarādāv eva nikhilajagaduddharaṇāya paramapuruṣārthalakṣaṇamokṣasādhanatayā imaṃ yogam aham eva vivasvate proktavān,
analyzed: manvantara ādau eva nikhila jagat uddharaṇāya parama puruṣa artha lakṣaṇa mokṣa sādhanatayā imam yogam aham eva vivasvate proktavān

original: vivasvāṃś ca manave,
analyzed: vivasvān ca manave

original: manur ikṣvakave /
analyzed: manuḥ ikṣvakave

original: ity evaṃ saṃpradāyaparamparayā prāptam imaṃ yogaṃ pūrve rājarṣayo 'viduḥ /
analyzed: iti evam saṃpradāya paramparayā prāptam imam yogam pūrve rājarṣayaḥ aviduḥ

original: sa mahatā kālena tattacchrotṛbuddhimāndyād vinaṣṭaprāyo 'bhūt /
analyzed: sa mahatā kālena tad tad śrotṛ buddhi māndyāt vinaṣṭa prāyaḥ abhūt

original: sa evāyam askhalitasvarūpaḥ purātano yogaḥ sakhyenātimātrabhaktyā ca mām eva prapannāya te mayā proktaḥ saparikaras savistaram ukta ityarthaḥ
analyzed: saḥ eva ayam askhalita svarūpaḥ purātanaḥ yogaḥ sakhyena atimātra bhaktyā ca mām eva prapannāya te mayā proktaḥ sa parikaraḥ sa vistaram uktaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: madanyena kenāpi jñātuṃ vaktuṃ cāśakyam,
analyzed: mat anyena kena api jñātum vaktum ca aśakyam

original: yata idaṃ vedāntoditam uttamaṃ rahasyaṃ jñānam //
analyzed: yatas idam vedānta uditam uttamam rahasyam jñānam

original: asmin prasaṅge bhagavadavatārayāthātmyaṃ yathāvaj jñātum arjuna uvāca
analyzed: asmin prasaṅge bhagavat avatāra yāthātmyam yathāvat jñātum arjunaḥ uvāca

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: avaraṃ bhavato janma paraṃ janma vivasvataḥ /
analyzed: avaram bhavataḥ janma param janma vivasvataḥ

original: katham etad vijānīyāṃ tvam ādau proktavān iti // BhG_4.4 //
analyzed: katham etat vijānīyām tvam ādau proktavān iti

original: kālasaṅkhyayā avaram asmajjanmasamakālaṃ hi bhavato janma /
analyzed: kāla saṅkhyayā avaram asmad janma sama kālam hi bhavataḥ janma

original: vivasvataś ca janma kālasaṅkhyayā param aṣṭāviṃśaticaturyugasaṅkhyāsaṅkhyātam /
analyzed: vivasvataḥ ca janma kāla saṅkhyayā param aṣṭāviṃśati caturyuga saṅkhyā saṅkhyātam

original: tvam evādau proktavān iti katham etad asaṃbhāvanīyaṃ yathārthaṃ jānīyām ?
analyzed: tvam eva ādau proktavān iti katham etat asaṃbhāvanīyam yathārtham jānīyām

original: nanu janmāntareṇāpi vaktuṃ śakyam,
analyzed: nanu janma antareṇa api vaktum śakyam

original: janmāntarakṛtasya mahatāṃ smṛtiś ca yujyata iti nātra kaścid virodhaḥ /
analyzed: janma antara kṛtasya mahatām smṛtiḥ ca yujyate iti na atra kaścid virodhaḥ

original: na cāsau vaktāram enaṃ vasudevatanayaṃ sarveśvaraṃ na jānāti,
analyzed: na ca asau vaktāram enam vasudeva tanayam sarveśvaram na jānāti

original: yata evaṃ vakṣyati,
analyzed: yatas evam vakṣyati

original: “paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān /
analyzed: param brahma param dhāma pavitram paramam bhavān

original: puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ divyam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum //
analyzed: puruṣam śāśvatam divyam ādidevam ajam vibhum

original: āhus tvām ṛṣayas sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā /
analyzed: āhuḥ tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve deva ṛṣiḥ nāradaḥ tathā

original: asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me” iti /
analyzed: asitaḥ devalaḥ vyāsaḥ svayam ca eva bravīṣi me iti

original: yudhiṣṭhirarājasūyādiṣu bhīṣmādibhyaś cāsakṛcchrutam,
analyzed: yudhiṣṭhira rājasūya ādiṣu bhīṣma ādibhyaḥ ca asakṛt śrutam

original: “kṛṣṇa eva hi lokānām utpattir api cāpyayaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ eva hi lokānām utpattiḥ api ca apyayaḥ

original: kṛṣṇasya hi kṛte bhūtam idaṃ viśvaṃ carācaram” ityevamādiṣu /
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya hi kṛte bhūtam idam viśvam carācaram iti evamādiṣu

original: kṛṣṇasya hi kṛte iti,
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya hi kṛte iti

original: kṛṣṇasya śeṣabhūtam idaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagad ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya śeṣa bhūtam idam kṛtsnam jagat iti arthaḥ

original: atrocyate jānāty evāyaṃ bhagavantaṃ vasudevasūnaṃ pārthaḥ /
analyzed: atrā ucyate jānāti eva ayam bhagavantam vasudeva sūnam pārthaḥ

original: jānato 'py ajānata iva pṛcchato 'yam āśayaḥ nikhilaheyapratyanīkakalyāṇaikatānasya
analyzed: jānataḥ api a jānataḥ iva pṛcchataḥ ayam āśayaḥ nikhila heya pratyanīka kalyāṇa ekatānasya

original: sarveśvarasya sarvajñasya satyasaṅkalpasyāvāptasamastakāmasya karmaparavaśadevamanuṣyādisajātīyaṃ
analyzed: sarveśvarasya sarvajñasya satya saṅkalpasya avāpta samasta kāmasya karma para vaśa deva manuṣya ādi sajātīyam

analyzed: janma kim indrajāla ādi vat mithyā uta satyam

analyzed: satya tve ca katham janma prakāraḥ

analyzed: kim ātmakaḥ ayam dehaḥ

analyzed: kaḥ ca janma hetuḥ

original: kadā ca janma?
analyzed: kadā ca janma

original: kim arthaṃ ca janmeti /
analyzed: kim artham ca janma iti

analyzed: parihāra prakāreṇa praśna arthaḥ vijñāyate

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna /
analyzed: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava ca arjuna

analyzed: tāni aham veda sarvāṇi na tvam vettha parantapa

original: anena janmanas satyatvam uktam,
analyzed: anena janmanaḥ satya tvam uktam

original: bahūni me vyatītāni janmānīti vacanāt,
analyzed: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni iti vacanāt

original: tava ceti dṛṣṭāntatayopādānāc ca // BhGR_4.5 //
analyzed: tava ca iti dṛṣṭānta tayā upādānāt ca

analyzed: avatāra prakāram

original: dehayāthātmyam,
analyzed: deha yāthātmyam

original: janmahetuṃ cāha
analyzed: janma hetum ca āha

original: ajo 'pi san avyayātmā bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi san /
analyzed: ajaḥ api san avyaya ātmā bhūtānām īśvaraḥ api san

original: prakṛtiṃ svām adhiṣṭhāya saṃbhavāmy ātmamāyayā // BhG_4.6 //
analyzed: prakṛtim svām adhiṣṭhāya saṃbhavāmi ātma māyayā

analyzed: aja tva avyaya tva sarva īśvara tva ādi sarvam pārameśvaram prakāram a jahat eva svām prakṛtim adhiṣṭhāya ātma māyayā saṃbhavāmi

original: prakṛtiḥ svabhāvaḥ svam eva svabhāvam adhiṣṭhāya svenaiva rūpeṇa svecchayā saṃbhavāmītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ svabhāvaḥ svam eva svabhāvam adhiṣṭhāya svena eva rūpeṇa sva icchayā saṃbhavāmi iti arthaḥ

original: svasvarūpaṃ hi,
analyzed: sva svarūpam hi

original: “ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt“,
analyzed: āditya varṇam tamasaḥ parastāt

original: “kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāke“,
analyzed: kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāke

original: “ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇyamayaḥ puruṣaḥ“,
analyzed: yaḥ eṣaḥ antarāditye hiraṇya mayaḥ puruṣaḥ

original: “tasminn ayaṃ puruṣo manomayaḥ;
analyzed: tasmin ayam puruṣaḥ manaḥ mayaḥ

original: amṛto hiraṇmayaḥ“,
analyzed: amṛtaḥ hiraṇmayaḥ

original: “sarve nimeṣā jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣād adhi” ,
analyzed: sarve nimeṣāḥ jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣāt adhi

analyzed: bhā rūpaḥ satya saṅkalpaḥ ākāśa ātmā sarva kāmā sarva kāmaḥ sarva gandhaḥ sarva rasaḥ

analyzed: māhārajanam vāsaḥ ityādi śruti siddham

original: ātmamāyayā ātmīyayā māyayā /
analyzed: ātma māyayā ātmīyayā māyayā

original: tathā cābhiyuktaprayogaḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca abhiyukta prayogaḥ

original: “māyayā satataṃ vetti prāṇināṃ ca śubhāśubham” iti /
analyzed: māyayā satatam vetti prāṇinām ca śubha aśubham iti

original: ātmīyena jñānena ātmasaṅkalpenetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: ātmīyena jñānena ātma saṅkalpena iti arthaḥ

original: ato 'pahatapāpmatvādisamastakalyāṇaguṇātmakatvaṃ sarvam aiśaṃ svabhāvam ajahat svam eva rūpaṃ devamanuṣyādisajātīyasaṃsthānaṃ kurvan ātmasaṅkalpena  #
analyzed: atas apahata pāpma tva ādi samasta kalyāṇa guṇa ātmaka tvam sarvam aiśam svabhāvam ajahat svam eva rūpam deva manuṣya ādi sajātīya saṃsthānam kurvan ātma saṅkalpena

original: devādirūpaḥ saṃbhavāmi /
analyzed: deva ādi rūpaḥ saṃbhavāmi

original: tad idam āha,
analyzed: tat idam āha

original: “ajāyamāno bahudhā vijāyate” iti śrutiḥ /
analyzed: a jāyamānaḥ bahudhā vijāyate iti śrutiḥ

original: itarapuruṣasādhāraṇaṃ janma akurvan devādirūpeṇa svasaṅkalpenoktaprakriyayā jāyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: itara puruṣa sādhāraṇam janma akurvan deva ādi rūpeṇa sva saṅkalpena ukta prakriyayā jāyate iti arthaḥ

original: “bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna /
analyzed: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava ca arjuna

original: tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇi“,
analyzed: tāni aham veda sarvāṇi

original: “tadātmānaṃ sṛjāmy aham” “janma karma ca me divyam evaṃ yo vetti tattvataḥ” iti pūrvāparāvirodhāc ca //
analyzed: tadā ātmānam sṛjāmi aham janma karma ca me divyam evam yaḥ vetti tattvataḥ iti pūrva apara avirodhāt ca

original: janmakālam āha
analyzed: janma kālam āha

original: yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata /
analyzed: yadā yadā hi dharmasya glāniḥ bhavati bhārata

original: abhyutthānam adharmasya tadātmānaṃ sṛjāmy aham // BhG_4.7 //
analyzed: abhyutthānam adharmasya tadā ātmānam sṛjāmi aham

original: na kālaniyamo 'smatsaṃbhavasya /
analyzed: na kāla niyamaḥ asmad saṃbhavasya

original: yadā yadā hi dharmasya vedoditasya cāturvarṇyacāturāśramyavyavasthayāvasthitasya kartavyayasya glānir bhavati,
analyzed: yadā yadā hi dharmasya veda uditasya cāturvarṇya cāturāśramya vyavasthayā avasthitasya karta vyayasya glāniḥ bhavati

original: yadā yadā ca tadviparyayasyādharmasyābhyutthānam tadāham eva svasaṅkalpenoktaprakāreṇātmānaṃ sṛjāmi // BhGR_4.7 //
analyzed: yadā yadā ca tad viparyayasya adharmasya abhyutthānam tadā aham eva sva saṅkalpena ukta prakāreṇa ātmānam sṛjāmi

original: janmanaḥ prayojanam āha
analyzed: janmanaḥ prayojanam āha

original: paritrāṇāya sādhūnāṃ vināśāya ca duṣkṛtām /
analyzed: paritrāṇāya sādhūnām vināśāya ca duṣkṛtām

original: dharmasaṃsthāpanārthāya saṃbhavāmi yuge yuge // BhG_4.8 //
analyzed: dharma saṃsthāpana arthāya saṃbhavāmi yuge yuge

original: sādhavaḥ uktalakṣaṇadharmaśīlāḥ vaiṣṇavāgresarā matsamāśrayaṇe pravṛttā mannāmakarmasvarūpāṇāṃ
analyzed: sādhavaḥ ukta lakṣaṇa dharma śīlāḥ vaiṣṇava agresarāḥ mad samāśrayaṇe pravṛttāḥ mad nāma karma svarūpāṇām

original: vāṅmanasāgocaratayā maddarśanena vinā svātmadhāraṇapoṣaṇādikm alabhamānāḥ kṣaṇamātrakālaṃ
analyzed: vāc manasā agocara tayā mad darśanena vinā sva ātma dhāraṇa poṣaṇa ādikm a labhamānāḥ kṣaṇa mātra kālam

original: kalpasahasraṃ manvānāḥ pratiśithilasarvagātrā bhaveyur iti matsvarūpaceṣṭitāvalokanālāpādidānena
analyzed: kalpa sahasram manvānāḥ pratiśithila sarva gātrāḥ bhaveyuḥ iti mad sva rūpa ceṣṭita avalokana ālāpa ādi dānena

original: teṣāṃ paritrāṇāya tadviparītānāṃ vināśāya ca kṣīṇasya vaidikasya dharmasya madārādhanarūpasyārādhyasvarūpapradarśanena
analyzed: teṣām paritrāṇāya tad viparītānām vināśāya ca kṣīṇasya vaidikasya dharmasya mad ārādhana rūpasya ārādhya svarūpa pradarśanena

original: sthāpanāya ca devamanuṣyādirūpeṇa yuge yuge saṃbhavāmi /
analyzed: sthāpanāya ca deva manuṣya ādi rūpeṇa yuge yuge saṃbhavāmi

original: kṛtatretādiyugaviśeṣaniyamo 'pi nāstītyarthaḥ // BhGR_4.8 //
analyzed: kṛta tretā ādi yuga viśeṣa niyamaḥ api na asti iti arthaḥ

original: janma karmaṃ ca me divyam evaṃ yo vetti tattvataḥ /
analyzed: janma karmam ca me divyam evam yaḥ vetti tattvataḥ

original: tyaktvā dehaṃ punarjanma naiti mām eti so 'rjuna // BhG_4.9 //
analyzed: tyaktvā deham punarjanma na eti mām eti saḥ arjuna

original: evaṃ karmamūlaheyatriguṇaprakṛtisaṃsargarūpajanmarahitasya sarvesvaratvasārvajñyasatyasaṅkalpatvādisamastakalyāṇaguṇopetasya
analyzed: evam karma mūla heya triguṇa prakṛti saṃsarga rūpa janma rahitasya sarvesvara tva sārvajñya satya saṅkalpa tva ādi samasta kalyāṇa guṇa upetasya

original: sādhuparitrāṇamatsamāśrayaṇaikaprayojanaṃ divyam aprākṛtaṃ madasādhāraṇaṃ mama janma
analyzed: sādhu paritrāṇa mad samāśrayaṇa eka prayojanam divyam aprākṛtam mad asādhāraṇam mama janma

original: ceṣṭitaṃ ca tattvato yo vetti,
analyzed: ceṣṭitam ca tattvataḥ yaḥ vetti

original: sa vartamānaṃ dehaṃ parityajya punarjanma naiti,
analyzed: sa vartamānam deham parityajya punarjanma na eti

original: mām eva prāpnoti /
analyzed: mām eva prāpnoti

original: madīyadivyajanmaceṣṭitayāthātmyavijñānena vidhvastasamastamatsamāśryaṇavirodhipāpaḥ
analyzed: madīya divya janma ceṣṭita yāthātmya vijñānena vidhvasta samasta mad samāśryaṇa virodhi pāpaḥ

original: asminn eva janmani yathoditaprakāreṇa mām āśritya madekapriyo madekacitto mām eva
analyzed: asmin eva janmani yathā udita prakāreṇa mām āśritya mad eka priyaḥ mad ekacittaḥ mām eva

original: prāpnoti // BhGR_4.9 //
analyzed: prāpnoti

original: tad āha
analyzed: tat āha

original: vītarāgabhayakrodhā manmayā mām upāśritāḥ /
analyzed: vīta rāga bhaya krodhāḥ mad mayāḥ mām upāśritāḥ

original: bahavo jñānatapasā pūtā madbhāvan āgatāḥ // BhG_4.10 //
analyzed: bahavaḥ jñāna tapasā pūtāḥ mad bhāvan āgatāḥ

original: madīyajanmakarmatattvajñānākhyena tapasā pūtā bahava evaṃ saṃvṛttāḥ /
analyzed: madīya janma karma tattva jñāna ākhyena tapasā pūtāḥ bahavaḥ evam saṃvṛttāḥ

original: tathā ca śrutiḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ

original: “tasya dhīrāḥ parijānanti yonim” iti /
analyzed: tasya dhīrāḥ parijānanti yonim iti

original: dhīrāḥ dhīmatām agresarā evaṃ tasya janmaprakāraṃ jānantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_4.10 //
analyzed: dhīrāḥ dhīmatām agresarāḥ evam tasya janma prakāram jānanti iti arthaḥ

original: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham /
analyzed: ye yathā mām prapadyante tān tathā eva bhajāmi aham

original: mama vartmānuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśaḥ // BhG_4.11 //
analyzed: mama vartma anuvartante manuṣyāḥ pārtha sarvaśas

original: na kevalaṃ devamanuṣyādirūpeṇāvatīrya matsamāśrayaṇāpekṣāṇāṃ paritrāṇaṃ karomi,
analyzed: na kevalam deva manuṣya ādi rūpeṇa avatīrya mad samāśrayaṇa apekṣāṇām paritrāṇam karomi

original: api tu ye matsamāśrayaṇāpekṣā yathā yena prakāreṇa svāpekṣānurūpaṃ māṃ saṃkalpya prapadyante samāśrayante;
analyzed: api tu ye mad samāśrayaṇa apekṣāḥ yathā yena prakāreṇa sva apekṣā anurūpam mām saṃkalpya prapadyante samāśrayante

original: tān prati tathaiva tanmanīṣitaprakāreṇa bhajāmi māṃ darśayāmi /
analyzed: tān prati tathā eva tad manīṣita prakāreṇa bhajāmi mām darśayāmi

original: kim atra bahunā,
analyzed: kim atra bahunā

original: sarve manuṣyāḥ madanuvartanaikamanorathā mama vartma matsvabhāvaṃ sarvaṃ yogināṃ
analyzed: sarve manuṣyāḥ mad anuvartana eka manorathāḥ mama vartma mad svabhāvam sarvam yoginām

original: vāṅmanasāgocaram api svakīyāiś cakṣurādikaraṇaiḥ sarvaśaḥ svāpekṣitaiḥ sarvaprakārair
analyzed: vāc manasā agocaram api svakīyāiḥ cakṣuḥ ādi karaṇaiḥ sarvaśas sva apekṣitaiḥ sarva prakāraiḥ

original: anubhūyānuvartnte // BhGR_4.11 //
analyzed: anubhūya anuvartnte

original: idānīṃ prāsaṅgikaṃ parisamāpya prakṛtasya karmayogasya jñānākāratāprakāraṃ vaktuṃ tathāvidhakarmayogādhikāriṇo durlabhatvam āha
analyzed: idānīm prāsaṅgikam parisamāpya prakṛtasya karmayogasya jñāna ākāra tā prakāram vaktum tathāvidha karmayoga adhikāriṇaḥ durlabha tvam āha

original: kāṅkṣantaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ yajanta iha devatāḥ /
analyzed: kāṅkṣantaḥ karmaṇām siddhim yajantaḥ iha devatāḥ

original: kṣipraṃ hi mānuṣe loke siddhir bhavati karmajā // BhG_4.12 //
analyzed: kṣipram hi mānuṣe loke siddhiḥ bhavati karma jā

original: sarva eva puruṣāḥ karmaṇāṃ phalaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ indrādidevatāmātraṃ yajante ārādhayanti,
analyzed: sarve eva puruṣāḥ karmaṇām phalam kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ indra ādi devatā mātram yajante ārādhayanti

original: na tu kaścid anabhisaṃhitaphalaḥ indrādidevatātmabhūtaṃ sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktāraṃ māṃ yajate /
analyzed: na tu kaścid an abhisaṃhita phalaḥ indra ādi devatā ātma bhūtam sarva yajñānām bhoktāram mām yajate

original: kuta etat? yataḥ kṣiprasminn eva mānuṣe loke karmajā putrapaśvannādysiddhir bhavati /
analyzed: kutas etat yatas kṣiprasmin eva mānuṣe loke karma jā putra paśu annādya siddhiḥ bhavati

original: manuṣyalokaśabdaḥ svargādīnām api pradarśanārthaḥ /
analyzed: manuṣya loka śabdaḥ svarga ādīnām api pradarśana arthaḥ

original: sarvaṃ eva laukikāḥ puruṣā akṣīṇānādikālapravṛttānantapāpasaṃcayatayā avivekinaḥ
analyzed: sarve eva laukikāḥ puruṣāḥ akṣīṇa anādi kāla pravṛtta ananta pāpa saṃcaya tayā avivekinaḥ

original: kṣipraphalākāṅkṣiṇaḥ putrapaśvannādyasvargādyarthatayā sarvāṇi karmāṇīndrādidevatārādhanamātrāṇi kurvate;
analyzed: kṣipra phala ākāṅkṣiṇaḥ putra paśu annādya svarga ādi artha tayā sarvāṇi karmāṇi indra ādi devatā ārādhana mātrāṇi kurvate

original: na tu kaścit saṃsārodvignahṛdayo mumukṣuḥ uktalakṣaṇaṃ karmayogaṃ madārādhanabhūtam ārabhata ityarthaḥ // BhGR_4.12 //
analyzed: na tu kaścid saṃsāra udvigna hṛdayaḥ mumukṣuḥ ukta lakṣaṇam karmayogam mad ārādhana bhūtam ārabhate iti arthaḥ

original: yathoktakarmayogārambhavirodhipāpakṣayahetum āha
analyzed: yathā ukta karma yoga ārambha virodhi pāpa kṣaya hetum āha

original: cāturvarṇyaṃ mayā sṛṣṭaṃ guṇakarmavibhāgaśaḥ /
analyzed: cāturvarṇyam mayā sṛṣṭam guṇa karma vibhāgaśaḥ

original: tasya kartāram api māṃ viddhy akartāram avyayam // BhG_4.13 //
analyzed: tasya kartāram api mām viddhi akartāram avyayam

original: cāturvarṇyapramukhaṃ brahmādistambaparyantaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagat sattvādiguṇavibhāgena tadanuguṇaśamādikarmavibhāgena ca vibhaktaṃ mayā sṛṣṭam /
analyzed: cāturvarṇya pramukham brahma ādi stamba paryantam kṛtsnam jagat sattva ādi guṇa vibhāgena tad anuguṇa śama ādi karma vibhāgena ca vibhaktam mayā sṛṣṭam

original: sṛṣṭigrahaṇaṃ pradarśanārtham /
analyzed: sṛṣṭi grahaṇam pradarśana artham

original: mayaiva rakṣyante,
analyzed: mayā eva rakṣyante

original: mayaiva copasaṃhriyate /
analyzed: mayā eva ca upasaṃhriyate

original: tasya vicitrasṛṣtyādeḥ kartāram apy akartāraṃ māṃ viddhi //
analyzed: tasya vicitra sṛṣti ādeḥ kartāram api akartāram mām viddhi

original: katham ity atrāha
analyzed: katham iti atra āha

original: na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti na me karmaphale spṛhā /
analyzed: na mām karmāṇi limpanti na me karma phale spṛhā

original: iti māṃ yo 'bhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate // BhG_4.14 //
analyzed: iti mām yaḥ abhijānāti karmabhiḥ na sa badhyate

original: yata imāni vicitrasṛṣṭyādīni karmāṇi māṃ na limpanti na māṃ saṃbadhnanti /
analyzed: yatas imāni vicitra sṛṣṭi ādīni karmāṇi mām na limpanti na mām saṃbadhnanti

original: na matprayuktāni tāni devamanuṣyādivaicitryāṇi /
analyzed: na mad prayuktāni tāni deva manuṣya ādi vaicitryāṇi

original: sṛjyānāṃ puṇyapāparūpakarmaviśeṣaprayuktānītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sṛjyānām puṇya pāpa rūpa karma viśeṣa prayuktāni iti arthaḥ

original: ataḥ prāptāprāptavivekena vicitrasṛṣṭyāder nāhaṃ kartā;
analyzed: atas prāpta aprāpta vivekena vicitra sṛṣṭi ādeḥ na aham kartā

original: yataś ca sṛṣṭāḥ kṣetrajñāḥ sṛṣṭilabdhakaraṇakalebarāḥ sṛṣṭilabdhaṃ bhogyajātaṃ phalasaṅgādihetusvakarmānuguṇaṃ bhuṅjate;
analyzed: yatas ca sṛṣṭāḥ kṣetrajñāḥ sṛṣṭi labdha karaṇa kalebarāḥ sṛṣṭi labdham bhogya jātam phala saṅga ādi hetu sva karma anuguṇam bhuṅjate

original: sṛṣṭyādkarmaphale ca teṣām eva spṛheti ne me spṛhā /
analyzed: sṛṣṭyāt karma phale ca teṣām eva spṛhā iti me spṛhā

original: tathāha sūtrakāraḥ vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvād iti /
analyzed: tathā āha sūtrakāraḥ vaiṣamya nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣa tvāt iti

original: tathā ca bhagavān parāśaraḥ “nimittamātram evāsau sṛjyānāṃ sargakarmaṇi /
analyzed: tathā ca bhagavān parāśaraḥ nimitta mātram eva asau sṛjyānām sarga karmaṇi

original: pradhānakāraṇībhūtā yato vai sṛjyaśaktayaḥ //
analyzed: pradhāna kāraṇībhūtāḥ yatas vai sṛjya śaktayaḥ

original: nimittamātraṃ muktvedaṃ nānyat kiṃcid apekṣate /
analyzed: nimitta mātram muktvā idam na anyat kiṃcid apekṣate

original: nīyate tapatāṃ śreṣṭha svaśaktyā vastu vastutām //
analyzed: nīyate tapatām śreṣṭha sva śaktyā vastu vastu tām

original: BhGR_4.” iti /
analyzed: iti

original: sṛjyānāṃ devādīnāṃ kṣetrajñānāṃ sṛṣṭeḥ kāraṇamātram evāyaṃ paramapuruṣaḥ;
analyzed: sṛjyānām deva ādīnām kṣetrajñānām sṛṣṭeḥ kāraṇa mātram eva ayam paramapuruṣaḥ

original: devādivaicitrye tu pradhānakāraṇaṃ sṛjyabhūtakṣetrajñānāṃ prācīnakarmaśaktaya eva /
analyzed: deva ādi vaicitrye tu pradhāna kāraṇam sṛjya bhūta kṣetrajñānām prācīna karma śaktayaḥ eva

original: ato nimittamātraṃ muktvā sṛṣṭeḥ kartāraṃ paramapuruṣaṃ muktvā idaṃ kṣetrajñavastu devādivicitrabhāve nānyad apekṣate;
analyzed: atas nimitta mātram muktvā sṛṣṭeḥ kartāram paramapuruṣam muktvā idam kṣetrajña vastu deva ādi vicitra bhāve na anyat apekṣate

original: svagataprācīnakarmaśaktyā eva hi devādivastubhāvaṃ nīyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: svagata prācīna karma śaktyā eva hi deva ādi vastu bhāvam nīyate iti arthaḥ

original: evam uktena prakāreṇa sṛṣtyādeḥ kartāram apy akartāraṃ sṛṣṭyādikarmaphalasaṅgarahitaṃ ca yo mām abhijānāti,
analyzed: evam uktena prakāreṇa sṛṣti ādeḥ kartāram api akartāram sṛṣṭi ādi karma phala saṅga rahitam ca yaḥ mām abhijānāti

original: sa karmayogārambhavirodhibhiḥ phalasaṅgādihetubhiḥ prācīnakarmabhir na saṃbadhyate /
analyzed: sa karma yoga ārambha virodhibhiḥ phala saṅga ādi hetubhiḥ prācīna karmabhiḥ na saṃbadhyate

original: mucyata ityarthaḥ // BhGR_4.14 //
analyzed: mucyate iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair api mumukṣubhiḥ /
analyzed: evam jñātvā kṛtam karma pūrvaiḥ api mumukṣubhiḥ

original: kuru karmaiva tasmāt tvaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam // BhG_4.15 //
analyzed: kuru karma eva tasmāt tvam pūrvaiḥ pūrvataram kṛtam

original: evaṃ māṃ jñātvā vimuktapāpaiḥ pūrvair api mumukṣubhir uktalakṣaṇaṃ karma kṛtam /
analyzed: evam mām jñātvā vimukta pāpaiḥ pūrvaiḥ api mumukṣubhiḥ ukta lakṣaṇam karma kṛtam

original: tasmāt tvam uktaprakāramadviṣayajñānavidhūtapāpaḥ pūrvair vivasvanmanvādibhiḥ kṛtaṃ pūrvataraṃ purātanaṃ tadānīm eva mayoktaṃ vakṣyamāṇākāraṃ  #
analyzed: tasmāt tvam ukta prakāra mad viṣaya jñāna vidhūta pāpaḥ pūrvaiḥ vivasvat manu ādibhiḥ kṛtam pūrvataram purātanam tadānīm eva mayā uktam vakṣyamāṇa ākāram

original: karvaiva kuru // BhGR_4.15 //
analyzed: karva eva kuru

original: vakṣyamāṇasya karmaṇo durjñānatām āha
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇasya karmaṇaḥ durjñāna tām āha

original: kiṃ karma kim akarmeti kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ /
analyzed: kim karma kim akarma iti kavayaḥ api atra mohitāḥ

original: tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhāt // BhG_4.16 //
analyzed: tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yat jñātvā mokṣyase aśubhāt

original: mumukṣuṇānuṣṭheyaṃ karma kiṃrūpam,
analyzed: mumukṣuṇā anuṣṭheyam karma kiṃrūpam

original: akarma ca kim /
analyzed: akarma ca kim

original: akarmeti kartur ātmano yāthātmyajñānam ucyate;
analyzed: akarma iti kartuḥ ātmanaḥ yāthātmya jñānam ucyate

original: anuṣṭheyaṃ karma tadantargataṃ jñānaṃ ca kiṃrūpam ity ubhayatra kavayaḥ vidvāṃso 'pi mohitāḥ yathāvan na jānanti /
analyzed: anuṣṭheyam karma tad antargatam jñānam ca kiṃrūpam iti ubhayatra kavayaḥ vidvāṃsaḥ api mohitāḥ yathāvat na jānanti

original: evam antargatajñānaṃ yat karma,
analyzed: evam antargata jñānam yat karma

original: tat te pravakṣyāmi,
analyzed: tat te pravakṣyāmi

original: yaj jñātvānuṣṭhāya aśubhāt saṃsārabandhān mokṣyase /
analyzed: yat jñātvā anuṣṭhāya aśubhāt saṃsāra bandhāt mokṣyase

original: kartavyakarmajñānaṃ hy anuṣṭhānaphalam // BhGR_4.16 //
analyzed: kartavya karma jñānam hi anuṣṭhāna phalam

original: kuto 'sya durjñānatety āha
analyzed: kutas asya durjñāna tā iti āha

original: karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ hi api boddhavyam boddhavyam ca vikarmaṇaḥ

original: akarmaṇaś ca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ // BhG_4.17 //
analyzed: akarmaṇaḥ ca boddhavyam gahanā karmaṇaḥ gatiḥ

original: yasmān mokṣasādhanabhūte karmasvarūpe boddhavyam asti;
analyzed: yasmāt mokṣa sādhana bhūte karma svarūpe boddhavyam asti

original: vikarmaṇi ca /
analyzed: vikarmaṇi ca

original: nityanaimittikakāmyarūpeṇa,
analyzed: nitya naimittika kāmya rūpeṇa

original: tatsādhanadravyārjanādyākāreṇa ca vividhatāpannaṃ karma vikarma /
analyzed: tad sādhana dravya arjana ādi ākāreṇa ca vividha tā āpannam karma vikarma

original: akarmaṇi jñāne ca boddhavyam asti /
analyzed: akarmaṇi jñāne ca boddhavyam asti

original: gahanā durvijñānā mumukṣoḥ karmaṇo gatiḥ // BhGR_4.17 //
analyzed: gahanā durvijñānā mumukṣoḥ karmaṇaḥ gatiḥ

original: vikarmaṇi boddhavyaṃ nityanaimittikakāmyadravyārjanādau karmaṇi phalabhedakṛtaṃ vaividhyaṃ parityajya mokṣaikaphalatayaikaśāstrārthatvānusandhānam
analyzed: vikarmaṇi boddhavyam nitya naimittika kāmya dravya arjana ādau karmaṇi phala bheda kṛtam vaividhyam parityajya mokṣa eka phala tayā eka śāstra artha tva anusandhānam

original: tad etat “vyavasāyātmikā buddhir ekā” ity atraivoktam iti neha prapañcyate /
analyzed: tat etat vyavasāya ātmikā buddhiḥ ekā iti atra eva uktam iti na iha prapañcyate

original: karmākarmaṇor boddhavyam āha
analyzed: karma akarmaṇoḥ boddhavyam āha

original: karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ /
analyzed: karmaṇi a karma yaḥ paśyet a karmaṇi ca karma yaḥ

original: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsnakarmakṛt // BhG_4.18 //
analyzed: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsna karma kṛt

original: akarmaśabdenātra karmetarāt prastutam ātmajñānam ucyate /
analyzed: akarma śabdena atra karma itarāt prastutam ātma jñānam ucyate

original: karmaṇi kriyamāṇa evātmajñānaṃ yaḥ paśyet,
analyzed: karmaṇi kriyamāṇe eva ātma jñānam yaḥ paśyet

original: akarmaṇi cātmajñāne vartamāna eva yaḥ karma paśyet /
analyzed: akarmaṇi ca ātma jñāne vartamāne eva yaḥ karma paśyet

original: kim uktaṃ bhavati?
analyzed: kim uktam bhavati

original: kriyamāṇam eva karma ātmayāthātmyānusandhānena jñānākāraṃ yaḥ paśyet,
analyzed: kriyamāṇam eva karma ātma yāthātmya anusandhānena jñāna ākāram yaḥ paśyet

original: tac ca jñānaṃ karmayogāntaragatatayā karmākāraṃ yaḥ paśyed ity uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tat ca jñānam karmayoga antara gata tayā karma ākāram yaḥ paśyet iti uktam bhavati

original: kriyamāṇe hi karmaṇi kartṛbhūtātmayāthātmyānusandhāne sati tadubhayaṃ saṃpannaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: kriyamāṇe hi karmaṇi kartṛ bhūta ātma yāthātmya anusandhāne sati tat ubhayam saṃpannam bhavati

original: evam ātmayāthātmyānusandhānāntargarbhaṃ karma yaḥ paśyet,
analyzed: evam ātma yāthātmya anusandhāna antar garbham karma yaḥ paśyet

original: sa buddhimān kṛtsnaśāstrārthavit,
analyzed: sa buddhimān kṛtsna śāstra artha vid

original: manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ mokṣāyārhaḥ,
analyzed: manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ mokṣāya arhaḥ

original: sa eva kṛtsnakarmakṛt kṛtsnaśāstrārthakṛt // BhGR_4.18 //
analyzed: saḥ eva kṛtsna karma kṛt kṛtsna śāstra artha kṛt

original: pratyakṣeṇa kriyamāṇasya karmaṇo jñanākāratā katham upapadyata ity atrāha
analyzed: pratyakṣeṇa kriyamāṇasya karmaṇaḥ jñanā kāra tā katham upapadyate iti atra āha

original: yasya sarve samārambhāḥ kāmasaṃkalpavarjitāḥ /
analyzed: yasya sarve samārambhāḥ kāma saṃkalpa varjitāḥ

original: jñānāgnidagdhakarmāṇaṃ tam āhuḥ paṇḍitaṃ budhāḥ // BhG_4.19 //
analyzed: jñāna agni dagdha karmāṇam tam āhuḥ paṇḍitam budhāḥ

original: yasya mumukṣoḥ sarve dravyārjanādilaukikakarmapūrvakanityanaimittikakāmyarūpakarmasamārambhāḥ kāmārjitāḥ phalasaṅgarahitāḥ /
analyzed: yasya mumukṣoḥ sarve dravya arjana ādi laukika karma pūrvaka nitya naimittika kāmya rūpa karma samārambhāḥ kāma arjitāḥ phala saṅga rahitāḥ

original: saṅkalpavarjitāś ca /
analyzed: saṅkalpa varjitāḥ ca

original: prakṛtyā tadguṇaiś cātmānam ekīkṛtyānusandhānaṃ saṅkalpaḥ;
analyzed: prakṛtyā tad guṇaiḥ ca ātmānam ekīkṛtya anusandhānam saṅkalpaḥ

original: prakṛtiviyuktātmasvarūpānusandhānayuktatayā tadrahitāḥ /
tam evaṃ karma kurvāṇaṃ paṇḍitaṃ karmāntargatātmayāthātmyajñānāgninā dagdhaprācīnakarmāṇam āhus tattvajñāḥ /
analyzed: tam evam karma kurvāṇam paṇḍitam karma antargata ātma yāthātmya jñāna agninā dagdha prācīna karmāṇam āhuḥ tattva jñāḥ

original: ataḥ karmaṇo jñānākāratvam upapadyate // BhGR_4.19 //
analyzed: atas karmaṇaḥ jñāna ākāra tvam upapadyate

original: etad eva vivṛṇoti
analyzed: etat eva vivṛṇoti

original: tyaktvā karmaphalāsaṅgaṃ nityatṛpto nirāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: tyaktvā karma phala āsaṅgam nitya tṛptaḥ nirāśrayaḥ

original: karmaṇy abhipravṛtto 'pi naiva kiṃcit karoti saḥ // BhG_4.20 //
analyzed: karmaṇi abhipravṛttaḥ api nā eva kiṃcid karoti saḥ

original: karmaphalasaṅgaṃ tyaktvā nityatṛptaḥ nitye svātmny eva tṛptaḥ,
analyzed: karma phala saṅgam tyaktvā nitya tṛptaḥ nitye svātmni eva tṛptaḥ

original: nirāśrayaḥ asthiraprakṛtau āśrayabuddhirahito yaḥ karmāṇi karoti,
analyzed: nirāśrayaḥ asthira prakṛtau āśraya buddhi rahitaḥ yaḥ karmāṇi karoti

original: sa karmaṇy ābhimukhyena pravṛtto 'pi naiva kiṃcit karma karoti karmāpadeśena jñānābhyāsam eva karotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_4.20 //
analyzed: sa karmaṇi ābhimukhyena pravṛttaḥ api na eva kiṃcid karma karoti karma apadeśena jñāna abhyāsam eva karoti iti arthaḥ

original: punar api karmaṇo jñānākārataiva viśodhyate
analyzed: punar api karmaṇaḥ jñāna ākāra tā eva viśodhyate

original: nirāśīr yatacittātmā tyaktasarvaparigrahaḥ /
analyzed: nirāśīḥ yata citta ātmā tyakta sarva parigrahaḥ

original: śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam // BhG_4.21 //
analyzed: śārīram kevalam karma kurvan na āpnoti kilbiṣam

original: nirāśīḥ nirgataphalābhisandhiḥ yatacittātmā yatacittamanāḥ tyaktasarvaparigrahaḥ ātmaikaprayojanatayā prakṛtiprākṛtavastuni mamatārahitaḥ,
analyzed: nirāśīḥ nirgata phala abhisandhiḥ yata citta ātmā yata citta manāḥ tyakta sarva parigrahaḥ ātma eka prayojana tayā prakṛti prākṛta vastuni mamatā rahitaḥ

original: yāvajjīvaṃ kevalaṃ śārīram eva karma kurvan kilbiṣaṃ saṃsāraṃ nāpnoti jñānaniṣṭhāvyavadhānarahitakevalakarmayogenaivaṃrūpeṇātmānaṃ paśyatītyarthaḥ
analyzed: yāvajjīvam kevalam śārīram eva karma kurvan kilbiṣam saṃsāram na āpnoti jñāna niṣṭhā vyavadhāna rahita kevala karmayogena evaṃrūpeṇa ātmānam paśyati iti arthaḥ

original: yadṛcchālābhasaṃtuṣṭo dvandvātīto vimatsaraḥ /
analyzed: yadṛcchā lābha saṃtuṣṭaḥ dvandva atītaḥ vimatsaraḥ

original: samaḥ siddhāv asiddhau ca kṛtvāpi na nibadhyate // BhG_4.22 //
analyzed: samaḥ siddhau asiddhau ca kṛtvā api na nibadhyate

original: yadṛcchopanataśarīradhāraṇahetuvastusantuṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: yadṛcchā upanata śarīra dhāraṇa hetu vastu santuṣṭaḥ

original: dvandvātītaḥ yāvatsādhanasamāptyavarjanīyaśītoṣṇādisahaḥ,
vimatsaraḥ aniṣṭopanipātahetubhūtasvakarmanirūpaṇena pareṣu vigatamatsaraḥ,
analyzed: vimatsaraḥ aniṣṭa upanipāta hetu bhūta sva karma nirūpaṇena pareṣu vigata matsaraḥ

original: samas siddhāv asiddau ca yuddhādikarmasu jayādisiddhyasiddhyoḥ samacittaḥ,
analyzed: samaḥ siddhau asiddau ca yuddha ādi karmasu jaya ādi siddhi asiddhyoḥ sama cittaḥ

original: karmaiva kṛtvāpi jñānaniṣṭhāṃ vināpi na nibadhyate na saṃsāraṃ pratipadyate // BhGR_4.22 //
analyzed: karma eva kṛtvā api jñāna niṣṭhām vinā api na nibadhyate na saṃsāram pratipadyate

original: gatasaṅgasya muktasya jñānāvasthitacetasaḥ /
analyzed: gata saṅgasya muktasya jñāna avasthita cetasaḥ

original: yajñāyācarataḥ karma samagraṃ pravilīyate // BhG_4.23 //
analyzed: yajñāya ācarataḥ karma samagram pravilīyate

original: ātmaviṣayajñānāvasthitamanastvena nirgatataditarasaṅgasya tata eva nikhilaparigrahavinirmuktasya
analyzed: ātma viṣaya jñāna avasthita manaḥ tvena nirgata tad itara saṅgasya tatas eva nikhila parigraha vinirmuktasya

original: uktalakṣaṇayajñādikarmanirvṛttaye vartamānasya puruṣasya bandhahetubhūtaṃ prācīnaṃ
analyzed: ukta lakṣaṇa yajña ādi karma nirvṛttaye vartamānasya puruṣasya bandha hetu bhūtam prācīnam

original: karma samagraṃ pravilīyate niśśeṣaṃ kṣīyate // BhGR_4.23 //
analyzed: karma samagram pravilīyate niśśeṣam kṣīyate

original: prakṛtiviyuktātmasvarūpānusandhānayuktatayā karmaṇo jñānākāratvam uktam;
idānīṃ sarvasya saparikarasya karmaṇaḥ parabrahmabhūtaparamapuruṣātmakatvānusandhānayuktatayā jñānākāratvam āha
analyzed: idānīm sarvasya sa parikarasya karmaṇaḥ para brahma bhūta paramapuruṣa ātmaka tva anusandhāna yuktatayā jñāna ākāra tvam āha

original: brahmārpaṇaṃ brahma havir brahmāgnau brahmaṇā hutam /
analyzed: brahma arpaṇam brahma haviḥ brahma agnau brahmaṇā hutam

original: brahmaiva tena gantavyaṃ brahmakarmasamādhinā // BhG_4.24 //
analyzed: brahma eva tena gantavyam brahma karma samādhinā

original: brahmārpaṇam iti havir viśeṣyate /
analyzed: brahma arpaṇam iti haviḥ viśeṣyate

original: arpyate 'nenety arpaṇaṃ srugādi /
analyzed: arpyate anena iti arpaṇam sruc ādi

original: tadbrahmakāryatvād brahma /
analyzed: tat brahma kārya tvāt brahma

original: brahma yasya haviṣo 'rpaṇaṃ tad brahmārpaṇam,
analyzed: brahma yasya haviṣaḥ arpaṇam tat brahmārpaṇam

original: brahma haviḥ brahmārpaṇaṃ haviḥ /
analyzed: brahma haviḥ brahma arpaṇam haviḥ

original: svayaṃ ca brahmabhūtam,
analyzed: svayam ca brahma bhūtam

original: brahmāgnau brahmabhūte agnau brahmaṇā kartrā hutam iti sarvaṃ karma brahmātmakatayā brahmamayam iti yaḥ samādhatte,
analyzed: brahma agnau brahma bhūte agnau brahmaṇā kartrā hutam iti sarvam karma brahma ātmaka tayā brahma mayam iti yaḥ samādhatte

original: sa brahmakarmasamādhiḥ,
analyzed: sa brahma karma samādhiḥ

original: tena brahmakarmasamādhinā brahmaiva gantavyam brahmātmakatayā brahmabhūtam ātmasvarūpaṃ gantavyam /
analyzed: tena brahma karma samādhinā brahma eva gantavyam brahma ātmaka tayā brahma bhūtam ātma svarūpam gantavyam

original: mumukṣuṇā kriyamāṇaṃ karma parabrahmātmakam evety anusandhānayuktatayā jñānākāraṃ sākṣādātmāvalokanasādhanam;
analyzed: mumukṣuṇā kriyamāṇam karma para brahma ātmakam eva iti anusandhāna yukta tayā jñāna ākāram sākṣāt ātma avalokana sādhanam

original: na jñānaniṣṭhāvyadhānenetyarthaḥ // BhGR_4.24 //
analyzed: na jñāna niṣṭhā vyadhānena iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ karmaṇo jñānākāratāṃ pratipādya karmayogabhedān āha
analyzed: evam karmaṇaḥ jñāna ākāra tām pratipādya karma yoga bhedān āha

original: daivam evāpare yajñaṃ yoginaḥ paryupāsate /
analyzed: daivam eva apare yajñam yoginaḥ paryupāsate

original: brahmāgnāv apare yajñaṃ yajñenaivopajuhvati // BhG_4.25 //
analyzed: brahma agnau apare yajñam yajñena eva upajuhvati

original: daivaṃ devārcanarūpaṃ yajñam apare karmayoginaḥ paryupāsate sevante /
analyzed: daivam deva arcana rūpam yajñam apare karma yoginaḥ paryupāsate sevante

original: tatraiva niṣṭhāṃ kurvantītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tatra eva niṣṭhām kurvanti iti arthaḥ

original: apare brahmāgnau yajñaṃ yajñenaivopajuhvati;
analyzed: apare brahma agnau yajñam yajñena eva upajuhvati

original: atra yajñaśabdo havis srugādiyajñasādhane vartate;
analyzed: atra yajña śabdaḥ haviḥ sruc ādi yajña sādhane vartate

original: “brahmārpaṇaṃ brahma haviḥ” iti nyāyena yāgahomayor niṣṭhāṃ kurvanti // BhGR_4.25 //
analyzed: brahma arpaṇam brahma haviḥ iti nyāyena yāga homayoḥ niṣṭhām kurvanti

original: śrotrādīnīndriyāṇy anye saṃyamāgniṣu juhvati /
analyzed: śrotra ādīni indriyāṇi anye saṃyama agniṣu juhvati

original: śabdādīn viṣayān anye indriyāgniṣu juhvati // BhG_4.26 //
analyzed: śabda ādīn viṣayān anye indriya agniṣu juhvati

original: anye śrotrādīnām indriyāṇāṃ saṃyamane prayatante /
analyzed: anye śrotra ādīnām indriyāṇām saṃyamane prayatante

original: anye yoginaḥ indriyāṇāṃ śabdādipravaṇatānivāraṇe prayatante // BhGR_4.26 //
analyzed: anye yoginaḥ indriyāṇām śabda ādi pravaṇa tā nivāraṇe prayatante

original: sarvāṇīndriyakarmāṇi prāṇakarmāṇi cāpare /
analyzed: sarvāṇi indriya karmāṇi prāṇa karmāṇi ca apare

original: ātmasaṃyamayogāgnau juhvati jñānadīpite // BhG_4.27 //
analyzed: ātma saṃyama yoga agnau juhvati jñāna dīpite

original: anye jñānadīpite manassaṃyanayogāgnau sarvāṇīndriyakarmāṇi prāṇakarmāṇi ca juhvati /
analyzed: anye jñāna dīpite manaḥ saṃyana yoga agnau sarvāṇi indriya karmāṇi prāṇa karmāṇi ca juhvati

original: manasa indriyaprāṇakarmaprvaṇatānivāraṇe prayatanta ityarthaḥ // BhGR_4.27 //
analyzed: manasaḥ indriya prāṇa karma prvaṇatā nivāraṇe prayatantaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: dravyayajñās tapoyajñā yogayajñās tathāpare /
analyzed: dravya yajñāḥ tapaḥ yajñāḥ yoga yajñāḥ tathā apare

original: svādhyāyajñānayajñāś ca yatayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // BhG_4.28 //
analyzed: svādhyāya jñāna yajñāḥ ca yatayaḥ saṃśita vratāḥ

original: kecit karmayogino dravyayajñāḥ nyāyato dravyāṇy upādāya devatārcane prayatante,
analyzed: kecid karma yoginaḥ dravya yajñāḥ nyāyataḥ dravyāṇi upādāya devatā arcane prayatante

original: kecic ca dāneṣu,
analyzed: kecid ca dāneṣu

original: kecic ca yāgeṣu,
analyzed: kecid ca yāgeṣu

original: kecic ca homeṣu /
analyzed: kecid ca homeṣu

original: ete sarve dravyayajñāḥ /
analyzed: ete sarve dravyayajñāḥ

original: kecit tapoyajñāḥ kṛcchracāndrāyaṇopavāsādiṣu niṣṭhāṃ kurvanti /
analyzed: kecid tapaḥ yajñāḥ kṛcchra cāndrāyaṇa upavāsa ādiṣu niṣṭhām kurvanti

original: yogayajñāś cāpare puṇyatīrthapuṇyasthānaprāptiṣu niṣṭhāṃ kurvanti /
analyzed: yoga yajñāḥ ca apare puṇya tīrtha puṇya sthāna prāptiṣu niṣṭhām kurvanti

original: iha yogaśabdaḥ karmaniṣṭhābhedaprakaraṇāt tadviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: iha yoga śabdaḥ karma niṣṭhā bheda prakaraṇāt tad viṣayaḥ

original: kecit svādhyāyābhyāsaparāḥ /
analyzed: kecid svādhyāya abhyāsa parāḥ

original: kecit tadarthajñānābhyāsaparāḥ /
analyzed: kecid tad artha jñāna abhyāsa parāḥ

original: yatayaḥ yatanaśīlāḥ,
analyzed: yatayaḥ yatana śīlāḥ

original: saṃśitavratāḥ dṛḍhasaṅkalpāḥ // BhGR_4.28 //
analyzed: saṃśita vratāḥ dṛḍha saṅkalpāḥ

original: apāne juhvati prāṇaṃ prāṇe 'pānaṃ tathāpare /
analyzed: apāne juhvati prāṇam prāṇe apānam tathā apare

original: prāṇāpānagatī ruddhvā prāṇāyāmaparāyaṇāḥ // BhG_4.29 //
analyzed: prāṇa apāna gatīḥ ruddhvā prāṇāyāma parāyaṇāḥ

original: apare niyatāhārāḥ prāṇān prāṇeṣu juhvati /
analyzed: apare niyata āhārāḥ prāṇān prāṇeṣu juhvati

original: apare karmayoginaḥ prāṇāyāmeṣu niṣṭhāṃ kurvanti /
analyzed: apare karma yoginaḥ prāṇāyāmeṣu niṣṭhām kurvanti

original: te ca trividhāḥ pūrakarecakakumbhakabhedena;
analyzed: te ca trividhāḥ pūraka recaka kumbhaka bhedena

original: apāne juhvati prāṇam iti pūrakaḥ,
analyzed: apāne juhvati prāṇam iti pūrakaḥ

original: prāṇe 'pānam iti recakaḥ,
analyzed: prāṇe apānam iti recakaḥ

original: prāṇāpānagatī ruddhvā ..... prāṇān prāṇeṣu juhvati iti kumbhakaḥ /
analyzed: prāṇa apāna gatī ruddhvā prāṇān prāṇeṣu juhvati iti kumbhakaḥ

original: prāṇāyāmapareṣu triṣv apy anuṣajyate niyatāhārā iti //
analyzed: prāṇāyāma pareṣu triṣu api anuṣajyate niyata āhārāḥ iti

original: sarve 'py ete yajñavido yajñakṣapitakalmaṣāḥ // BhG_4.30 //
analyzed: sarve api ete yajña vidaḥ yajña kṣapita kalmaṣāḥ

original: yajñaśiṣṭāmṛtabhujo yānti brahma sanātanam /
analyzed: yajña śiṣṭa amṛta bhujaḥ yānti brahma sanātanam

original: daivayajñaprabhṛtiprāṇāyāmaparyanteṣu karmayogabhedeṣu svasamīhiteṣu pravṛttā ete
analyzed: daiva yajña prabhṛti prāṇāyāma paryanteṣu karma yoga bhedeṣu sva samīhiteṣu pravṛttāḥ ete

original: sarve “saha yajñaiḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā” ityabhihitamahāyajñapūrvakanityanaimittikakarmarūpayajñavidaḥ
analyzed: sarve saha yajñaiḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā iti abhihita mahāyajña pūrvaka nitya naimittika karma rūpa yajña vidaḥ

original: tanniṣṭhāḥ tata eva kṣapitakalmaṣāḥ yajñaśiṣṭāmṛtena śarīradhāraṇaṃ kurvanta eva
analyzed: tad niṣṭhāḥ tatas eva kṣapita kalmaṣāḥ yajña śiṣṭa amṛtena śarīra dhāraṇam kurvantaḥ eva

original: karmayoga vyāpṛtāḥ sanātanaṃ brahma yānti //
analyzed: karmayoga vyāpṛtāḥ sanātanam brahma yānti

original: nāyaṃ loko 'sty ayajñasya kuto 'nyaḥ kurusattama // BhG_4.31 //
analyzed: na ayam lokaḥ asti ayajñasya kutas anyaḥ kurusattama

original: ayajñasya mahāyajñādipūrvakanityamaimittikakarmarahitasya nāyaṃ lokaḥ na prākṛtalokaḥ,
analyzed: ayajñasya mahāyajña ādi pūrvaka nitya maimittika karma rahitasya na ayam lokaḥ na prākṛta lokaḥ

original: prākṛtalokasaṃbandhidharmārthakāmākhyaḥ puruṣārtho na sidhyati /
analyzed: prākṛta loka saṃbandhi dharma artha kāma ākhyaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ na sidhyati

original: kuta ito 'nyo mokṣākhyaḥ puruṣārthaḥ?
analyzed: kutas itas anyaḥ mokṣa ākhyaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ

original: paramapuruṣārthatayā mokṣasya prastutatvāt taditarapuruṣārthaḥ ayaṃ lokaḥ iti nirdiśyate /
analyzed: paramapuruṣa artha tayā mokṣasya prastuta tvāt tad itara puruṣa arthaḥ ayam lokaḥ iti nirdiśyate

original: sa hi prākṛtaḥ // BhGR_4.31 //
analyzed: sa hi prākṛtaḥ

original: evaṃ bahuvidhā yajñā vitatā brahmaṇo mukhe /
analyzed: evam bahuvidhāḥ yajñāḥ vitatāḥ brahmaṇaḥ mukhe

original: karmajān viddhi tān sarvān evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase // BhG_4.32 //
analyzed: karma jān viddhi tān sarvān evam jñātvā vimokṣyase

original: evaṃ hi bahuprakārāḥ karmayogāḥ brahmaṇo mukhe vitatāḥ ātmayāthātmyāvāptisādhanatayā sthitāḥ;
analyzed: evam hi bahu prakārāḥ karma yogāḥ brahmaṇaḥ mukhe vitatāḥ ātma yāthātmya avāpti sādhana tayā sthitāḥ

original: tān uktalakṣaṇān uktabhedān karmayogān sarvān karmajān viddhi aharaharanuṣṭhīyamānanityanaimittikakarmajān viddhi /
analyzed: tān ukta lakṣaṇān ukta bhedān karmayogān sarvān karma jān viddhi ahar ahar anuṣṭhīyamāna nitya naimittika karma jān viddhi

original: evaṃ jñātvā yathoktaprakāreṇānuṣṭhāya mokṣyase // BhGR_4.32 //
analyzed: evam jñātvā yathā ukta prakāreṇa anuṣṭhāya mokṣyase

original: antargatajñānatayā karmaṇo jñānākāratvam uktam;
analyzed: antargata jñāna tayā karmaṇaḥ jñāna ākāra tvam uktam

original: tatrāntargatajñāne karmaṇi jñānāṃśasyaiva prādhānyam āha
analyzed: tatra antargata jñāne karmaṇi jñāna aṃśasya eva prādhānyam āha

original: śreyān dravyamayād yajñāj jñānayajñaḥ parantapa /
analyzed: śreyān dravya mayāt yajñāt jñāna yajñaḥ parantapa

original: sarvaṃ karmākhilaṃ pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate // BhG_4.33 //
analyzed: sarvam karma akhilam pārtha jñāne parisamāpyate

original: ubhayākāre karmaṇi dravyamayād aṃśāj jñānamayāṃśaḥ śreyān;
analyzed: ubhaya ākāre karmaṇi dravya mayāt aṃśāt jñāna maya aṃśaḥ śreyān

original: sarvasya karmaṇaḥ taditarasya cākhilasyopādeyasya jñāne parisamāpteḥ tad eva sarvais sādhanaiḥ prāpyabhūtaṃ jñānaṃ karmāntargatatvenābhyasyate
analyzed: sarvasya karmaṇaḥ tad itarasya ca akhilasya upādeyasya jñāne parisamāpteḥ tat eva sarvaiḥ sādhanaiḥ prāpya bhūtam jñānam karma antargata tvena abhyasyate

original: tad eva abhyasyamānaṃ krameṇa prāpyadaśāṃ pratipadyate // BhGR_4.33 //
analyzed: tat eva abhyasyamānam krameṇa prāpya daśām pratipadyate

original: tad viddhi praṇipātena paripraśnena sevayā /
analyzed: tat viddhi praṇipātena paripraśnena sevayā

original: upadekṣyanti te jñānaṃ jñāninas tattvadarśinaḥ // BhG_4.34 //
analyzed: upadekṣyanti te jñānam jñāninaḥ tattva darśinaḥ

original: tad atmaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ “avināśi tu tad viddhi” ityārabhya “eṣā te 'bhihitā” ityantena mayopadiṣṭam,
analyzed: tat ātma viṣayam jñānam avināśi tu tat viddhi iti ārabhya eṣā te abhihitā ityantena mayā upadiṣṭam

original: “tadyuktakarmaṇi vartamānatvaṃ vipākānuguṇaṃ kāle kāle praṇipātaparipraśnasevādibhir viśadākāraṃ jñānibhyo viddhi /
analyzed: tad yukta karmaṇi vartamāna tvam vipāka anuguṇam kāle kāle praṇipāta paripraśna sevā ādibhiḥ viśada ākāram jñānibhyaḥ viddhi
