original: sākṣātkṛtātmasvarūpās tu jñāninaḥ praṇipātādibhyas sevitāḥ jñānabubhutsayā paritaḥ pṛcchatas tavāśayam ālakṣya jñānam upadekṣyanti // BhGR_4.34
analyzed: sākṣātkṛta ātma svarūpāḥ tu jñāninaḥ praṇipāta ādibhyaḥ sevitāḥ jñāna bubhutsayā paritas pṛcchataḥ tava āśayam ālakṣya jñānam upadekṣyanti  /

original: ātmayāthātmyaviṣayasya jñānasya sākṣātkārarūpasya lakṣaṇam āha
analyzed: ātma yāthātmya viṣayasya jñānasya sākṣātkāra rūpasya lakṣaṇam āha

original: yaj jñātvā na punar moham evaṃ yāsyasi pāṇḍava /
analyzed: yat jñātvā na punar moham evam yāsyasi pāṇḍava

original: yena bhūtāny aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasy ātmany atho mayi // BhG_4.35 //
analyzed: yena bhūtāni aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasi ātmani atha u mayi

original: yaj jñānaṃ jñātvā punar evaṃ devādyātmābhimānarūpaṃ tatkṛtaṃ mamatādyāspadaṃ ca mohaṃ na yāsyasi,
analyzed: yat jñānam jñātvā punar evam deva ādi ātma abhimāna rūpam tat kṛtam mamatā ādi āspadam ca moham na yāsyasi

original: yena ca devamanuṣyādyākāreṇānusanhitāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni svātmany eva drakṣyasi,
analyzed: yena ca deva manuṣya ādi ākāreṇa anusanhitāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni sva ātmani eva drakṣyasi

original: yatas tavānyeṣāṃ ca bhūtānāṃ prakṛtiviyuktānāṃ jñānaikākāratayā sāmyam /
analyzed: yatas tava anyeṣām ca bhūtānām prakṛti viyuktānām jñāna eka ākāra tayā sāmyam

original: prakṛtisaṃsargadoṣavinirmuktam ātmarūpaṃ sarvaṃ samam iti ca vakṣyate,
analyzed: prakṛti saṃsarga doṣa vinirmuktam ātma rūpam sarvam samam iti ca vakṣyate

original: “nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ” iti /
analyzed: nirdoṣam hi samam brahma tasmāt brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ iti

original: atho mayi sarvabhūtāny aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasi,
analyzed: atha u mayi sarva bhūtāni aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasi

original: matsvarūpasāmyāt pariśuddhasya sarvasyātmavastunaḥ /
analyzed: mad sva rūpa sāmyāt pariśuddhasya sarvasya ātma vastunaḥ

original: “idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ” iti hi vakṣyate /
analyzed: idam jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ iti hi vakṣyate

original: tathā, “tadā vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyam upaiti” ityevamādiṣu nāmarūpavinirmuktasyātmavastunaḥ parasvarūpasāmyam avagamyate
analyzed: tathā tadā vidvān puṇya pāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramam sāmyam upaiti iti evamādiṣu nāma rūpa vinirmuktasya ātma vastunaḥ para svarūpa sāmyam avagamyate

original: ataḥ prakṛtivinirmuktaṃ sarvam ātmavastu parasparaṃ samaṃ sarveśvareṇa ca samam // BhGR_4.35 //
analyzed: atas prakṛti vinirmuktam sarvam ātma vastu parasparam samam sarveśvareṇa ca samam

original: api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ /
analyzed: api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpa kṛttamaḥ

original: sarvaṃ jñānaplavenaiva vṛjinaṃ saṃtariṣyasi // BhG_4.36 //
analyzed: sarvam jñāna plavena eva vṛjinam saṃtariṣyasi

original: yady api sarvebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ pāpakṛttamo 'si,
analyzed: yadi api sarvebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ pāpa kṛttamaḥ asi

original: sarvaṃ pūrvārjitaṃ vṛjinarūpaṃ samudram ātmaviṣayajñānarūpaplavenaiva saṃtariṣyasi // BhGR_4.36 //
analyzed: sarvam pūrva arjitam vṛjina rūpam samudram ātma viṣaya jñāna rūpa plavena eva saṃtariṣyasi

original: yathaidhāṃsi samiddho 'gnir bhasmasāt kurute 'rjuna /
analyzed: yathā edhāṃsi samiddhaḥ agniḥ bhasmasāt kurute arjuna

original: jñānāgniḥ sarvakarmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tathā // BhG_4.37 //
analyzed: jñāna agniḥ sarva karmāṇi bhasmasāt kurute tathā

original: samyakpravṛddho 'gnir indhanasañcayam iva,
analyzed: samyak pravṛddhaḥ agniḥ indhana sañcayam iva

original: ātmayāthātmyajñānarūpo 'gnir jīvātmagatam anādikālapravṛttānantakarmasañcayaṃ bhasmīkaroti // BhGR_4.37 //
analyzed: ātma yāthātmya jñāna rūpaḥ agniḥ jīvātma gatam anādi kāla pravṛtta ananta karma sañcayam bhasmīkaroti

original: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate /
analyzed: na hi jñānena sadṛśam pavitram iha vidyate

original: tat svayaṃ yogasaṃsiddhaḥ kālenātmani vindati // BhG_4.38 //
analyzed: tat svayam yoga saṃsiddhaḥ kālena ātmani vindati

original: yasmād ātmajñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitraṃ śuddhikaram iha jagati vastvantaraṃ na vidyate,
analyzed: yasmāt ātma jñānena sadṛśam pavitram śuddhi karam iha jagati vastu antaram na vidyate

original: tasmād ātmajñānaṃ sarvapāpaṃ nāśayatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ātma jñānam sarva pāpam nāśayati iti arthaḥ

original: tat tathāvidhaṃ jñānaṃ yathopadeśam aharaharanuṣṭhīyamānajñānākārakarmayogasaṃsiddhaḥ kālena svātmani svayam eva labhate // BhGR_4.38 //
analyzed: tat tathāvidham jñānam yathopadeśam aharahar anuṣṭhīyamāna jñāna ākāra karma yoga saṃsiddhaḥ kālena sva ātmani svayam eva labhate

original: tad eva vispaṣṭam āha
analyzed: tat eva vispaṣṭam āha

original: śraddhāvān labhate jñānaṃ tatparaḥ saṃyatendriyaḥ /
analyzed: śraddhāvān labhate jñānam tad paraḥ saṃyata indriyaḥ

original: jñānaṃ labdhvā parām śāntim acireṇādhigacchati // BhG_4.39 //
analyzed: jñānam labdhvā parām śāntim acireṇa adhigacchati

original: evam upadeśāj jñānaṃ labdhvā copadiṣṭajñānavṛddhau śraddhāvān tatparaḥ tatraiva niyatamanāḥ taditaraviṣayāt saṃyatendriyo 'cireṇa kālenoktalakṣaṇavipākadaśāpannaṃ  #
analyzed: evam upadeśāt jñānam labdhvā ca upadiṣṭa jñāna vṛddhau śraddhāvān tatparaḥ tatra eva niyata manāḥ tad itara viṣayāt saṃyata indriyaḥ acireṇa kālena ukta lakṣaṇa vipāka daśā āpannam

original: jñānaṃ labhate,
analyzed: jñānam labhate

original: tathāvidhaṃ jñānaṃ labdhvā parām śāntim acireṇādhigacchati paraṃ nirvāṇam āpnoti // BhGR_4.39 //
analyzed: tathāvidham jñānam labdhvā parām śāntim acireṇa adhigacchati param nirvāṇam āpnoti

original: ajñaś cāśraddadhānaś ca saṃśayātmā vinaśyati /
analyzed: ajñaḥ ca aśraddadhānaḥ ca saṃśaya ātmā vinaśyati

original: nāyaṃ loko 'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ // BhG_4.40 //
analyzed: na ayam lokaḥ asti na paraḥ na sukham saṃśaya ātmanaḥ

original: ajñaḥ evam upadeśalabdhajñānarahitaḥ,
analyzed: ajñaḥ evam upadeśa labdha jñāna rahitaḥ

original: upadiṣṭajñānavṛddhyupāye cāśraddhadhānaḥ atvaramāṇaḥ,
analyzed: upadiṣṭa jñāna vṛddhi upāye ca a śraddhadhānaḥ a tvaramāṇaḥ

original: upadiṣṭe ca jñāne saṃśayātmā saṃśayamanāḥ vinaśyati vinaṣṭo bhavati /
analyzed: upadiṣṭe ca jñāne saṃśaya ātmā saṃśaya manāḥ vinaśyati vinaṣṭaḥ bhavati

original: asminn upadiṣṭe ātmayāthātmyaviṣaye jñāne saṃśayātmano 'yam api prākṛto loko nāsti, na ca paraḥ /
analyzed: asmin upadiṣṭe ātma yāthātmya viṣaye jñāne saṃśaya ātmanaḥ ayam api prākṛtaḥ lokaḥ nā asti na ca paraḥ

original: dharmārthakāmarūpapuruṣārthāś ca na sidhyanti,
analyzed: dharma artha kāma rūpa puruṣa arthāḥ ca na sidhyanti

original: kuto mokṣa ityarthaḥ;
analyzed: kutas mokṣaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: śāstrīyakarmasiddhirūpatvāt sarveṣāṃ puruṣārthānām,
analyzed: śāstrīya karma siddhi rūpa tvāt sarveṣām puruṣa arthānām

original: śāstrīyakarmajanyasiddheś ca dehātiriktātmaniścayapūrvakatvāt /
analyzed: śāstrīya karma janya siddheḥ ca deha atirikta ātma niścaya pūrvaka tvāt

original: ataḥ sukhalavabhāgitvam ātmani saṃśayātmano na saṃbhavati // BhGR_4.40 //
analyzed: atas sukha lava bhāgi tvam ātmani saṃśaya ātmanaḥ na saṃbhavati

original: yogasaṃnyastakarmāṇaṃ jñānasaṃcchinnasaṃśayam /
analyzed: yoga saṃnyasta karmāṇam jñāna saṃcchinna saṃśayam

original: ātmavantaṃ na karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanañjaya // BhG_4.41 //
analyzed: ātmavantam na karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanañjaya

original: yathopadiṣṭayogena saṃnyastakarmāṇam jñānākāratāpannakarmāṇaṃ yathopadiṣṭena cātmajñānena ātmani saṃcchinnasaṃśayam,
analyzed: yathā upadiṣṭa yogena saṃnyasta karmāṇam jñāna ākāra tā āpanna karmāṇam yathā upadiṣṭena ca ātma jñānena ātmani saṃcchinna saṃśayam

original: ātmavantaṃ manasvinam upadiṣṭārthe dṛḍhāvasthitamanasaṃ bandhahetubhūtaprācīnānantakarmāṇi na nibadhnanti // BhGR_4.41 //
analyzed: ātmavantam manasvinam upadiṣṭa arthe dṛḍha avasthita manasam bandha hetu bhūta prācīna ananta karmāṇi na nibadhnanti

original: tasmād ajñānasaṃbhūtaṃ hṛtsthaṃ jñānāsinātmanaḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt ajñāna saṃbhūtam hṛd stham jñāna asinā ātmanaḥ

original: chittvainaṃ saṃśayaṃ yogam ātiṣṭhottiṣṭha bhārata // BhG_4.42 //
analyzed: chittvā enam saṃśayam yogam ātiṣṭha uttiṣṭha bhārata

original: tasmād anādyajñānasaṃbhūtaṃ hṛtstham ātmaviṣayaṃ saṃśayaṃ mayopadiṣṭenātmajñānāsinā chittvā mayopadiṣṭaṃ karmayogam ātiṣṭha;
analyzed: tasmāt anādya jñāna saṃbhūtam hṛd stham ātma viṣayam saṃśayam mayā upadiṣṭena ātma jñāna asinā chittvā mayā upadiṣṭam karmayogam ātiṣṭha

original: tadartham uttiṣṭha bhārateti // BhGR_4.42 //
analyzed: tad artham uttiṣṭha bhārata iti

original: caturthe 'dhyāye karmayogasya jñānākāratāpūrvakasvarūpabhedo jñānāṃśasya ca prādhānyam uktam;
analyzed: caturthe adhyāye karmayogasya jñāna ākāra tā pūrvaka svarūpa bhedaḥ jñāna aṃśasya ca prādhānyam uktam

original: jñānayogādhikāriṇo 'pi karmayogasyāntargatātmajñānatvād apramādatvāt sukaratvān nirapekṣatvāc ca jyāyastvaṃ tṛtīya evoktam /
analyzed: jñāna yoga adhikāriṇaḥ api karmayogasya antargata ātma jñāna tvāt apramāda tvāt sukara tvāt nirapekṣa tvāt ca jyāyaḥ tvam tṛtīye eva uktam

original: idānīṃ karmayogasyātmaprāptisādhanatve jñānaniṣṭhāyāś śaighryaṃ karmayogāntargatākarṭrtvānusandhānaprakāraṃ ca pratipādya tanmūlaṃ jñānaṃ ca  #
analyzed: idānīm karmayogasya ātma prāpti sādhana tve jñāna niṣṭhāyāḥ śaighryam karmayoga antargata ākarṭṛ tva anusandhāna prakāram ca pratipādya tad mūlam jñānam ca

original: viśodhyate //
analyzed: viśodhyate

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: saṃnyāsaṃ karmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇa punar yogaṃ ca śaṃsasi /
analyzed: saṃnyāsam karmaṇām kṛṣṇa punar yogam ca śaṃsasi

original: yac chreya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam // BhG_5.1 //
analyzed: yat śreyaḥ etayoḥ ekam tat me brūhi su niścitam

original: karmaṇāṃ saṃnyāsaṃ jñānayogam punaḥ karmayogaṃ ca śaṃsasi /
analyzed: karmaṇām saṃnyāsam jñāna yogam punar karma yogam ca śaṃsasi

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati dvitīye 'dhyāye mumukṣoḥ prathamaṃ karmayoga eva kāryaḥ,
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati dvitīye adhyāye mumukṣoḥ prathamam karma yogaḥ eva kāryaḥ

original: karmayogena mṛditāntaḥkaraṇakaṣāyasya jñānayogenātmadarśanaṃ kāryam iti pratipādya punas tṛtīyacaturthayoḥ jñānayogādhikāradaśāpannasyāpi karmaniṣṭhaiva
analyzed: karmayogena mṛdita antaḥkaraṇa kaṣāyasya jñāna yogena ātma darśanam kāryam iti pratipādya punar tṛtīya caturthayoḥ jñāna yoga adhikāra daśā āpannasya api karma niṣṭhā eva

original: saiva jñānaniṣṭhānirapekṣā ātmaprāptau sādhanam iti karmaniṣṭhāṃ praśaṃśasi iti /
analyzed: sā eva jñāna niṣṭhā nirapekṣā ātma prāptau sādhanam iti karma niṣṭhām praśaṃśasi iti

original: tatraitayor jñānayogakarmayogayor ātmaprāptisādhanabhāve yad ekaṃ saukāryac chaighryāc ca śreyaḥ śreṣṭham iti suniścitam,
analyzed: tatra etayoḥ jñāna yoga karmayogayoḥ ātma prāpti sādhana bhāve yat ekam śaighryāt ca śreyaḥ śreṣṭham iti su niścitam

original: tan me brūhi // BhGR_5.1 //
analyzed: tat me brūhi

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: saṃnyāsaḥ karmayogaś ca niśśreyasakarāv ubhau /
analyzed: saṃnyāsaḥ karma yogaḥ ca niśśreyasa karau ubhau

original: tayos tu karmasaṃnyāsāt karmayogo viśiṣyate // BhG_5.2 //
analyzed: tayoḥ tu karma saṃnyāsāt karma yogaḥ viśiṣyate

original: saṃnyāsaḥ jñānayogaḥ,
analyzed: saṃnyāsaḥ jñāna yogaḥ

original: karmayogaś ca jñānayogaśaktasyāpy ubhau nirapekṣau niśśreyasakarau /
analyzed: karmayogaḥ ca jñānayoga śaktasya api ubhau nirapekṣau niśśreyasa karau

original: tayos tu karmasaṃnyāsāj jñānayogāt karmayoga eva viśiṣyate // BhGR_5.2 //
analyzed: tayoḥ tu karma saṃnyāsāt jñāna yogāt karmayogaḥ eva viśiṣyate

original: kuta ity atrāha
analyzed: kutas iti atra āha

original: jñeyaḥ sa nityasaṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati /
analyzed: jñeyaḥ sa nitya saṃnyāsī yaḥ na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati

original: nirdvandvo hi mahābāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate // BhG_5.3 //
analyzed: nirdvandvaḥ hi mahā bāho sukham bandhāt pramucyate

original: yaḥ karmayogī tadantargatātmānubhavatṛptas tadvyatiriktaṃ kim api na kāṅkṣati,
analyzed: yaḥ karma yogī tad antargata ātma anubhava tṛptaḥ tad vyatiriktam kim api na kāṅkṣati

original: tata eva kim api na dveṣṭi,
analyzed: tatas eva kim api na dveṣṭi

original: tata eva dvandvasahaś ca;
analyzed: tatas eva dvandva sahaḥ ca

original: sa nityasaṃnyāsī nityajñānaniṣṭha iti jñeyaḥ /
analyzed: sa nitya saṃnyāsī nitya jñāna niṣṭhaḥ iti jñeyaḥ

original: sa hi sukarakarmayoganiṣṭhatayā sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate // BhGR_5.3 //
analyzed: sa hi sukara karma yoga niṣṭha tayā sukham bandhāt pramucyate

original: jñānayogakarmayogayor ātmaprāptisādhanabhāve 'nyonyanairapekṣyam āha
analyzed: jñāna yoga karmayogayoḥ ātma prāpti sādhana bhāve anyonya nairapekṣyam āha

original: sāṃkhyayogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ /
analyzed: sāṃkhya yogau pṛthak bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ

original: ekam apy āsthitas samyag ubhayor vindante phalam // BhG_5.4 //
analyzed: ekam api āsthitaḥ samyak ubhayoḥ vindante phalam

original: jñānayogakarmayogau phalabhedāt pṛthag bhūtau ye pravadanti,
analyzed: jñāna yoga karma yogau phala bhedāt pṛthak bhūtau ye pravadanti

original: te bālāḥ aniṣpannajñānāḥ na paṇḍitāḥ akṛtsnavidaḥ /
analyzed: te bālāḥ aniṣpanna jñānāḥ na paṇḍitāḥ akṛtsna vidaḥ

original: karmayogo jñānayogam eva sādhayati;
analyzed: karmayogaḥ jñānayogam eva sādhayati

original: jñānayogas tv eka ātmāvalokanaṃ sādhayatīti tayoḥ phalabhedena pṛthaktvaṃ vadanto na paṇḍitā ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: jñāna yogaḥ tu ekaḥ ātma avalokanam sādhayati iti tayoḥ phala bhedena pṛthaktvam vadantaḥ na paṇḍitāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: ubhayor ātmāvalokanaikaphalayor ekaphalatvena ekam apy āsthitas tad eva phalaṃ labhate // BhGR_5.4 //
analyzed: ubhayoḥ ātma avalokana eka phalayoḥ eka phala tvena ekam api āsthitaḥ tat eva phalam labhate

original: etad eva vivṛṇoti
analyzed: etat eva vivṛṇoti

original: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate /
analyzed: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānam tat yogaiḥ api gamyate

original: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // BhG_5.5 //
analyzed: ekam sāṃkhyam ca yogam ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: sāṃkhyaiḥ jñānaniṣṭhaiḥ /
analyzed: sāṃkhyaiḥ jñāna niṣṭhaiḥ

original: yad atmāvalokanarūpaṃ phalaṃ prāpyate,
analyzed: yat ātma avalokana rūpam phalam prāpyate

original: tad eva karmayoganiṣṭhair api prāpyate /
analyzed: tat eva karma yoga niṣṭhaiḥ api prāpyate

original: evam ekaphalatvena ekaṃ vaikalpikaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati,
analyzed: evam eka phala tvena ekam vaikalpikam sāṃkhyam yogam ca yaḥ paśyati

original: sa paśyati sa eva paṇḍita ityarthaḥ // BhGR_5.5 //
analyzed: sa paśyati saḥ eva paṇḍitaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: iyān viśeṣa ity āhā
analyzed: iyān viśeṣaḥ iti āha ā

original: saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ /
analyzed: saṃnyāsaḥ tu mahā bāho duḥkham āptum a yogataḥ

original: yogayukto munir brahma na cireṇādhigacchati // BhG_5.6 //
analyzed: yoga yuktaḥ muniḥ brahma na cireṇa adhigacchati

original: saṃnyāsaḥ jñānayogas tu ayogataḥ karmayogād rte prāptum aśakyaḥ;
analyzed: saṃnyāsaḥ jñāna yogaḥ tu ayogataḥ karmayogāt prāptum aśakyaḥ

original: yogayuktaḥ karmayogayuktaḥ svayam eva muniḥ ātmamananaśīlaḥ sukhena karmayogaṃ sādhayitvā na cireṇa alpenaiva kālena brahmādhigacchati ātmānaṃ  #
analyzed: yoga yuktaḥ karmayoga yuktaḥ svayam eva muniḥ ātma manana śīlaḥ sukhena karmayogam sādhayitvā na cireṇa alpena eva kālena brahma adhigacchati ātmānam

original: prāpnoti /
analyzed: prāpnoti

original: jñānayogayuktas tu mahatā duḥkhena jñānayogaṃ sādhayati;
analyzed: jñāna yoga yuktaḥ tu mahatā duḥkhena jñāna yogam sādhayati

original: duḥkhasādhyatvād ātmānaṃ cireṇa prāpnotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_5.6 //
analyzed: duḥkha sādhya tvāt ātmānam cireṇa prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: yogayukto viśuddhātmā vijitātmā jitendriyaḥ /
analyzed: yoga yuktaḥ viśuddha ātmā vijita ātmā jita indriyaḥ

original: sarvabhūtātmabhūtātmā kurvann api na lipyate // BhG_5.7 //
analyzed: sarva bhūta ātma bhūta ātmā kurvan api na lipyate

original: karmayogayuktas tu śāstrīye paramapuruṣārādhanarūpe viśuddhe karmaṇi vartamānaḥ tena viśuddhamanāḥ vijitātmā svābhyaste te karmaṇi vyāpṛtamanastvena  #
analyzed: karma yoga yuktaḥ tu śāstrīye paramapuruṣa ārādhana rūpe viśuddhe karmaṇi vartamānaḥ tena viśuddha manāḥ vijita ātmā sva abhyaste te karmaṇi vyāpṛta manaḥ tvena

original: sukhena vijitamanāḥ ,
analyzed: sukhena vijita manāḥ

original: tata eva jitendiyaḥ kartur ātmano yāthātmyānusandhānaniṣṭhatayā sarvabhūtātmabhūtātmā sarveṣāṃ devādibhūtānām ātmabhūta ātmā yasyāsau sarvabhūtātmabhūtātmā
analyzed: tatas eva jita indiyaḥ kartuḥ ātmanaḥ yāthātmya anusandhāna niṣṭha tayā sarva bhūta ātma bhūta ātmā sarveṣām deva ādi bhūtānām ātma bhūtaḥ ātmā yasya asau sarva bhūta ātma bhūta ātmā

original: ātmayāthātmyam anusandhānasya hi devādīnāṃ svasya caikākāra ātmā;
analyzed: ātma yāthātmyam anusandhānasya hi deva ādīnām svasya ca eka ākāraḥ ātmā

original: devādibhedānāṃ prakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣarūpatayātmākāratvāsaṃbhavāt /
analyzed: deva ādi bhedānām prakṛti pariṇāma viśeṣa rūpa tayā ātma ākāra tva asaṃbhavāt

original: prakṛtiviyuktaḥ sarvatra devādideheṣu jñānaikākāratayā samānākāra iti “nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma” iti anantaram eva vakṣyate /
analyzed: prakṛti viyuktaḥ sarvatra deva ādi deheṣu jñāna eka ākāra tayā samāna ākāraḥ iti nirdoṣam hi samam brahma iti anantaram eva vakṣyate

original: sa evaṃbhūtaḥ karma kurvann api anātmany ātmābhimānena na lipyate na saṃbadhyate /
analyzed: saḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ karma kurvan api anātmani ātma abhimānena na lipyate na saṃbadhyate

original: ato 'cireṇātmānaṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_5.7 //
analyzed: atas acireṇa ātmānam prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: yataḥ saukaryāc chaighryāc ca karmayoga eva śreyān,
analyzed: yatas saukaryāt śaighryāt ca karma yogaḥ eva śreyān

original: atas tadapekṣitaṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: atas tad apekṣitam śṛṇu

original: naiṣa kiñcit karomīti yukto manyeta tattvavit /
analyzed: na eṣa kiñcid karomi iti yuktaḥ manyeta tattva vid

original: paśyan śṛṇvan spṛśan jighran aśnan gacchan svapan śvasan // BhG_5.8 //
analyzed: paśyan śṛṇvan spṛśan jighran aśnan gacchan svapan śvasan

original: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇan unmiṣan nimiṣann api /
analyzed: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇan unmiṣan nimiṣan api

original: indriyāṇīndriyārtheṣu vartanta iti dhārayan // BhG_5.9 //
analyzed: indriyāṇi indriya artheṣu vartante iti dhārayan

original: evam ātmatattvavic śrotrādīni jñānendriyāṇi,
analyzed: evam ātma tattva vid śrotra ādīni jñāna indriyāṇi

original: vāgādīni ca karmendriyāṇi,
analyzed: vāc ādīni ca karmendriyāṇi

original: praṇāś ca svaviṣayeṣu vartanta iti dhārayan anusandhānaḥ nāhaṃ kiṃcit karomīti manyeta jñānaikasvabhāvasya mama karmamūlendriyaprāṇasaṃbandhakṛtam  #
analyzed: praṇāḥ ca sva viṣayeṣu vartante iti dhārayan anusandhānaḥ na aham kiṃcid karomi iti manyeta jñāna eka svabhāvasya mama karma mūla indriya prāṇa saṃbandha kṛtam

original: īdṛśaṃ kartṛtvam;
analyzed: īdṛśam kartṛ tvam

original: na svarūpaprayuktam iti manyetetyarthaḥ // BhGR_5.8 //9//
analyzed: na sva rūpa prayuktam iti manyeta iti arthaḥ

original: brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ /
analyzed: brahmaṇi ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgam tyaktvā karoti yaḥ

original: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatram ivāmbhasā // BhG_5.10 //
analyzed: lipyate na sa pāpena padma patram iva ambhasā

original: brahmaśabdena prakṛtir ihocyate /
analyzed: brahma śabdena prakṛtiḥ iha ucyate

original: “mama yonir mahad brahma” iti hi vakṣyate /
analyzed: mama yoniḥ mahat brahma iti hi vakṣyate

original: indriyāṇāṃ prakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣarūpatvena indriyākāreṇāvasthitāyāṃ prakṛtau “paśyañ chṛṇvan” ityādyuktaprakāreṇa karmāṇy ādhāya,
analyzed: indriyāṇām prakṛti pariṇāma viśeṣa rūpa tvena indriya ākāreṇa avasthitāyām prakṛtau paśyam śṛṇvan ityādi ukta prakāreṇa karmāṇi ādhāya

original: phalasaṅgaṃ tyaktvā,
analyzed: phala saṅgam tyaktvā

original: naiva kiṃcit karomīti yaḥ karmāṇi karoti,
analyzed: na eva kiṃcid karomi iti yaḥ karmāṇi karoti

original: sa prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭatayā vartamāno 'pi prakṛtyātmābhimānarūpeṇa bandhahetunā pāpena na lipyate /
analyzed: sa prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭa tayā vartamānaḥ api prakṛti ātma abhimāna rūpeṇa bandha hetunā pāpena na lipyate

original: padmapatram ivāmbhasā yathā padmapatram ambhasā saṃsṛṣṭam api na lipyate,
analyzed: padma patram iva ambhasā yathā padma patram ambhasā saṃsṛṣṭam api na lipyate

original: tathā na lipyata ityarthaḥ // BhGR_5.10 //
analyzed: tathā na lipyate iti arthaḥ

original: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api /
analyzed: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalaiḥ indriyaiḥ api

original: yoginaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgaṃ tyaktvātmaśuddhaye // BhG_5.11 //
analyzed: yoginaḥ karma kurvanti saṅgam tyaktvā ātma śuddhaye

original: kāyamanobuddhīndriyasādhyaṃ karma svargādiphalasaṅgaṃ tyaktvā yogina ātmaviśuddhaye kuranti;
analyzed: kāya manaḥ buddhi indriya sādhyam karma svarga ādi phala saṅgam tyaktvā yoginaḥ ātma viśuddhaye kuranti

original: ātmagataprācīnakarmabandhavināśāya kurvantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_5.11 //
analyzed: ātma gata prācīna karma bandha vināśāya kurvanti iti arthaḥ

original: yuktaḥ karmaphalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm /
analyzed: yuktaḥ karma phalam tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm

original: ayuktaḥ kāmakāreṇa phale sakto nibadhyate // BhG_5.12 //
analyzed: a yuktaḥ kāmakāreṇa phale saktaḥ nibadhyate

original: yuktaḥ ātmavyatiriktaphaleṣv acapalaḥ ātmaikapravaṇaḥ,
analyzed: yuktaḥ ātma vyatirikta phaleṣu acapalaḥ ātma eka pravaṇaḥ

original: karmaphalaṃ tyaktvā kevalam ātmaśuddhaye karmānuṣṭhāya naiṣṭhikīṃ śāntim āpnoti sthirām ātmānubhavarūpāṃ nirvṛtim āpnoti /
analyzed: karma phalam tyaktvā kevalam ātma śuddhaye karma anuṣṭhāya naiṣṭhikīm śāntim āpnoti sthirām ātma anubhava rūpām nirvṛtim āpnoti

original: ayuktaḥ ātmavyatiriktaphaleṣu capalaḥ ātmāvalokanavimukhaḥ kāmakāreṇa phale saktaḥ karmāṇi kurvan nityaṃ karmabhir badhyate nityasaṃsārī bhavati
analyzed: ayuktaḥ ātma vyatirikta phaleṣu capalaḥ ātma avalokana vimukhaḥ kāmakāreṇa phale saktaḥ karmāṇi kurvan nityam karmabhiḥ badhyate nitya saṃsārī bhavati

original: ataḥ phalasaṅgarahitaḥ indriyākāreṇa pariṇatāyāṃ prakṛtau karmāṇi saṃnyasya ātmano bandhamocanāyaiva karmāṇi kurvītetyuktaṃ bhavati // BhGR_5.12
analyzed: atas phala saṅga rahitaḥ indriya ākāreṇa pariṇatāyām prakṛtau karmāṇi saṃnyasya ātmanaḥ bandha mocanāya eva karmāṇi kurvīta iti uktam bhavati  /

original: atha dehākāreṇa pariṇatāyāṃ prakṛtau kartṛtvasaṃnyāsa ucyate
analyzed: atha deha ākāreṇa pariṇatāyām prakṛtau kartṛ tva saṃnyāsaḥ ucyate

original: sarvakarmāṇi manasā saṃnyasyāste sukhaṃ vaśī /
analyzed: sarva karmāṇi manasā saṃnyasya āste sukham vaśī

original: navadvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan // BhGR_5.13 //
analyzed: nava dvāre pure dehī nā eva kurvan na kārayan

original: ātmanaḥ prācīnakarmamūladehasaṃbandhaprayuktam idaṃ karmaṇāṃ kartṛtvam;
analyzed: ātmanaḥ prācīna karma mūla deha saṃbandha prayuktam idam karmaṇām kartṛ tvam

original: na svarūpaprayuktam iti vivekaviṣayeṇa manasā sarvāṇi karmāṇi navadvāre pure saṃnyasya
analyzed: na sva rūpa prayuktam iti viveka viṣayeṇa manasā sarvāṇi karmāṇi nava dvāre pure saṃnyasya

original: dehī svayaṃ vaśī dehādhiṣṭhānaprayatnam akurvan dehaṃ ca naiva kārayan sukham āste // BhGR_5.13 //
analyzed: dehī svayam vaśī deha adhiṣṭhāna prayatnam akurvan deham ca na eva kārayan sukham āste

original: sākṣād ātmanaḥ svābhāvikaṃ rūpam āha
analyzed: sākṣāt ātmanaḥ svābhāvikam rūpam āha

original: na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ /
analyzed: na kartṛ tvam na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ

original: na karmaphalasaṃyogaṃ svabhāvas tu pravartate // BhG_5.14 //
analyzed: na karma phala saṃyogam svabhāvaḥ tu pravartate

original: asya devatiryaṅmanuṣyasthāvarātmanā prakṛtisaṃsargeṇa vartamānasya lokasya devādyasādhāraṇaṃ kartṛtvaṃ tattadasādhāraṇāni karmāṇi tattatkarmajanyadevādiphalasaṃyogaṃ
analyzed: asya deva tiryak manuṣya sthāvara ātmanā prakṛti saṃsargeṇa vartamānasya lokasya deva ādi asādhāraṇam kartṛ tvam tad tad asādhāraṇāni karmāṇi tad tad karma janya deva ādi phala saṃyogam

original: ayaṃ prabhuḥ akarmavaśyaḥ svābhāvikasvarūpeṇāvasthita ātmā na sṛjati notpādayati /
analyzed: ayam prabhuḥ akarma vaśyaḥ svābhāvika svarūpeṇa avasthitaḥ ātmā na sṛjati na utpādayati

original: kas tarhi? svabhāvas tu pravartate /
analyzed: kaḥ tarhi svabhāvaḥ tu pravartate

original: svabhāvaḥ prakṛtivāsanā /
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ prakṛti vāsanā

original: anādikālapravṛttapūrvapūrvakarmajanitadevādyākāraprakṛtisaṃsargakṛtatattadātmābhimānajanitavāsanākṛtam īdṛśaṃ kartṛtvādikaṃ sarvam;
analyzed: anādi kāla pravṛtta pūrva pūrva karma janita deva ādi ākāra prakṛti saṃsarga kṛta tad tad ātma abhimāna janita vāsanā kṛtam īdṛśam kartṛ tva ādikam sarvam

original: na svarūpaprayuktam ityarthaḥ // BhGR_5.14 //
analyzed: na sva rūpa prayuktam iti arthaḥ

original: nādatte kasyacit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ /
analyzed: na ādatte kasyacid pāpam na ca eva sukṛtam vibhuḥ

original: ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānaṃ tena muhyanti jantavaḥ // BhG_5.15 //
analyzed: ajñānena āvṛtam jñānam tena muhyanti jantavaḥ

original: kasyacit svasaṃbandhitayābhimatasya putrādeḥ pāpaṃ duḥkhaṃ nādatte nāpanudati /
analyzed: kasyacid sva saṃbandhi tayā abhimatasya putra ādeḥ pāpam duḥkham na ādatte na apanudati

original: kasyacit pratikūlatayābhimatasya sukṛtaṃ sukhaṃ ca nādatte nāpanudati /
analyzed: kasyacid pratikūla tayā abhimatasya sukṛtam sukham ca na ādatte na apanudati

original: yato 'yaṃ vibhuḥ;
analyzed: yatas ayam vibhuḥ

original: na kvācitkaḥ,
analyzed: na kvācitkaḥ

original: na devādidehādyasādhāraṇadeśaḥ,
analyzed: na deva ādi deha ādi asādhāraṇa deśaḥ

original: ata eva na kasyacit saṃbandhī,
analyzed: atas eva na kasyacid saṃbandhī

original: na kasyacit pratikūlaś ca /
analyzed: na kasyacid pratikūlaḥ ca

original: sarvam idaṃ vāsanākṛtam /
analyzed: sarvam idam vāsanā kṛtam

original: evaṃsvabhāvasya katham iyaṃ viparītavāsanā utpadyate?
analyzed: evaṃsvabhāvasya katham iyam viparīta vāsanā utpadyate

original: ajñānenāvṛtaṃ jñānam jñānavirodhinā pūrvapūrvakarmaṇā svaphalānubhavayogyatvāya asya jñānam āvṛtaṃ saṃkucitam /
analyzed: ajñānena āvṛtam jñānam jñāna virodhinā pūrva pūrva karmaṇā sva phala anubhava yogya tvāya asya jñānam āvṛtam saṃkucitam

original: tena jñānāvaraṇarūpeṇa karmaṇā devādidehasaṃyogas tattadātmābhimānarūpamohaś ca jāyate /
analyzed: tena jñāna āvaraṇa rūpeṇa karmaṇā deva ādi deha saṃyogaḥ tad tad ātma abhimāna rūpa mohaḥ ca jāyate

original: tataś ca tathāvidhātmābhimānavāsanā,
analyzed: tatas ca tathāvidha ātma abhimāna vāsanā

original: taducitakarmavāsanā ca;
analyzed: tad ucita karma vāsanā ca

original: vāsanāto viparītātmābhimānaḥ,
analyzed: vāsanātaḥ viparīta ātma abhimānaḥ

original: karmārambhaś copapadyate // BhGR_5.15 //
analyzed: karma ārambhaḥ ca upapadyate

original: “sarvaṃ jñānaplavenaiva vṛjinaṃ saṃtariṣyati /
analyzed: sarvam jñāna plavena eva vṛjinam saṃtariṣyati

original: “, “jñānāgniḥ sarvakarmāṇi bhasmasātkurute tathā“,
analyzed: jñāna agniḥ sarva karmāṇi bhasmasātkurute tathā

original: “na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram” iti pūrvoktaṃ svakāle saṃgamayati
analyzed: na hi jñānena sadṛśam pavitram iti pūrva uktam sva kāle saṃgamayati

original: jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: jñānena tu tat ajñānam yeṣām nāśitam ātmanaḥ

original: teṣām ādityavaj jñānaṃ prakāśayati tat param // BhG_5.16 //
analyzed: teṣām āditya vat jñānam prakāśayati tat param

original: evaṃ vartamāneṣu sarveṣv ātmasu yeṣām ātmanām uktalakṣaṇena ātmayāthātmyopadeśajanitena
analyzed: evam vartamāneṣu sarveṣu ātmasu yeṣām ātmanām ukta lakṣaṇena ātma yāthātmya upadeśa janitena

original: ātmaviṣayeṇa aharaharabhyāsādheyātiśayena niratiśayapavitreṇa jñānena tat jñānāvaraṇam
analyzed: ātma viṣayeṇa aharahar abhyāsa ādheya atiśayena niratiśaya pavitreṇa jñānena tat jñāna āvaraṇam

original: anādikālapravṛttānantakarmasaṃcayarūpam ajñānaṃ nāśitam,
analyzed: anādi kāla pravṛtta ananta karma saṃcaya rūpam ajñānam nāśitam

original: teṣāṃ tat svābhāvikaṃ paraṃ jñānam aparimitam asaṃkucitam ādityavat sarvaṃ yathāvasthitaṃ prakāśayati /
analyzed: teṣām tat svābhāvikam param jñānam aparimitam asaṃkucitam āditya vat sarvam yathā avasthitam prakāśayati

original: teṣām iti vinaṣṭājñānānāṃ bahutvābhimānād ātmasvarūpabahutvam,
analyzed: teṣām iti vinaṣṭa ajñānānām bahu tva abhimānāt ātma svarūpa bahu tvam

original: “na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsam” ityupakramāvagatam atra spaṣṭataram uktam /
analyzed: na tu eva aham jātu na āsam iti upakrama avagatam atra spaṣṭataram uktam

original: na cedaṃ bahutvam upādhikṛtam;
analyzed: na ca idam bahu tvam upādhi kṛtam

original: vinaṣṭājñānānām upādhigandhābhāvāt /
analyzed: vinaṣṭa ajñānānām upādhi gandha abhāvāt

original: “teṣām ādityavaj jñānam” iti vyatirekanirdeśāj jñānasya svarūpānubandhidharmatvam uktam /
analyzed: teṣām āditya vat jñānam iti vyatireka nirdeśāt jñānasya svarūpa anubandhi dharma tvam uktam

original: ādityadṛṣṭāntena ca jñātṛjñānayoḥ prabhāprabhāvator ivāvasthānaṃ ca /
analyzed: āditya dṛṣṭāntena ca jñātṛ jñānayoḥ prabhā prabhāvatoḥ iva avasthānam ca

original: tata eva saṃsāradaśāyāṃ jñānasya karmaṇā saṃkoco mokṣadaśāyāṃ vikāsaś copapannaḥ // BhGR_5.16 //
analyzed: tatas eva saṃsāra daśāyām jñānasya karmaṇā saṃkocaḥ mokṣa daśāyām vikāsaḥ ca upapannaḥ

original: tadbuddhayas tadātmanas tanniṣṭhās tatparāyaṇāḥ /
analyzed: tad buddhayaḥ tad ātmanaḥ tad niṣṭhāḥ tad parāyaṇāḥ

original: gacchanty apunarāvṛttiṃ jñānanirdhūtakalmaṣāḥ // BhG_5.17 //
analyzed: gacchanti apunarāvṛttim jñāna nirdhūta kalmaṣāḥ

original: tadbuddhayaḥ tathāvidhātmadarśanādhyavasāyāḥ,
analyzed: tad buddhayaḥ tathāvidha ātma darśana adhyavasāyāḥ

original: tadātmānaḥ tadviṣayamanasaḥ,
analyzed: tad ātmānaḥ tad viṣaya manasaḥ

original: tanniṣṭhāḥ tadabhyāsaniratāḥ,
analyzed: tad niṣṭhāḥ tad abhyāsa niratāḥ

original: tatparāyaṇāḥ tad eva paramaprayojanam iti manvānāḥ,
analyzed: tad parāyaṇāḥ tat eva parama prayojanam iti manvānāḥ

original: evam abhyasyamānena jñānena nirdhūtaprācīnakalmaṣāḥ tathāvidham ātmanam apunarāvṛttiṃ gacchanti /
analyzed: evam abhyasyamānena jñānena nirdhūta prācīna kalmaṣāḥ tathāvidham ātmanam apunarāvṛttim gacchanti

original: yad avasthād ātmanaḥ punarāvṛttir na vidyate,
analyzed: yat avasthāt ātmanaḥ punarāvṛttiḥ na vidyate

original: sa ātmā apunarāvṛttiḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ātmā apunarāvṛttiḥ

original: svena rūpeṇāvasthitam ātmānaṃ gacchantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_5.17 //
analyzed: svena rūpeṇa avasthitam ātmānam gacchanti iti arthaḥ

original: vidyāvinayasaṃpanne brāhmaṇe gavi hastini /
analyzed: vidyā vinaya saṃpanne brāhmaṇe gavi hastini

original: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ // BhG_5.18 //
analyzed: śuni ca eva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ sama darśinaḥ

original: vidyāvinayasaṃpanne,
analyzed: vidyā vinaya saṃpanne

original: kevalabrāhmaṇe,
analyzed: kevala brāhmaṇe

original: gohastiśvaśvapacādiṣu atyantaviṣamākāratayā pratīyamāneṣu ātmasu paṇḍitāḥ ātmayāthātmyavidaḥ,
analyzed: go hasti śva śva paca ādiṣu atyanta viṣama ākāra tayā pratīyamāneṣu ātmasu paṇḍitāḥ ātma yāthātmya vidaḥ

original: jñānaikākāratayā sarvatra samadarśinaḥ viṣamākāras tu prakṛteḥ,
analyzed: jñāna eka ākāra tayā sarvatra sama darśinaḥ viṣama ākāraḥ tu prakṛteḥ

original: nātmanaḥ; ātmā tu sarvatra jñānaikākāratayā sama iti paśyantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_5.18 //
analyzed: na ātmanaḥ ātmā tu sarvatra jñāna eka ākāra tayā samaḥ iti paśyanti iti arthaḥ

original: ihaiva tair jitas svargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: iha eva taiḥ jitaḥ svargaḥ yeṣām sāmye sthitam manaḥ

original: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ // BhG_5.19 //
analyzed: nirdoṣam hi samam brahma tasmāt brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ

original: ihaiva sādhanānuṣṭhānadaśāyām eva taiḥ sargo jitaḥ saṃsāro jitaḥ;
analyzed: iha eva sādhana anuṣṭhāna daśāyām eva taiḥ sargaḥ jitaḥ saṃsāraḥ jitaḥ

original: yeṣām uktarītyā sarveṣv ātmasu sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ /
analyzed: yeṣām ukta rītyā sarveṣu ātmasu sāmye sthitam manaḥ

original: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma /
analyzed: nirdoṣam hi samam brahma

original: prakṛtisaṃsargadoṣaviyuktatayā samam ātmavastu hi bramha /
analyzed: prakṛti saṃsarga doṣa viyukta tayā samam ātma vastu hi bramha

original: ātmasāmye sthitāś ced brahmaṇi sthitā eva te;
analyzed: ātma sāmye sthitāḥ ced brahmaṇi sthitāḥ eva te

original: brahmaṇi sthitir eva hi sṃsārajayaḥ /
analyzed: brahmaṇi sthitiḥ eva hi sṃsāra jayaḥ

original: ātmasu jñānaikākāratayā sāmyam evānusandhānā muktā evetyarthaḥ // BhGR_5.19 //
analyzed: ātmasu jñāna eka ākāra tayā sāmyam eva anusandhānāḥ muktāḥ eva iti arthaḥ

original: yena prakāreṇāvathitasya karmayoginaḥ samadarśanarūpo jñanavipāko bhavati,
analyzed: yena prakāreṇa avathitasya karma yoginaḥ sama darśana rūpaḥ jñana vipākaḥ bhavati

original: taṃ prakāram upadiśati
analyzed: tam prakāram upadiśati

original: na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam /
analyzed: na prahṛṣyet priyam prāpya na udvijet prāpya ca apriyam

original: sthirabuddhir asaṃmūḍho brahmavid brahmaṇi sthitaḥ // BhG_5.20 //
analyzed: sthira buddhiḥ asaṃmūḍhaḥ brahma vid brahmaṇi sthitaḥ

original: yādṛśadehasthasya yadavasthasya prācīnakarmavāsanayā yat priyaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: yādṛśa deha sthasya yad avasthasya prācīna karma vāsanayā yat priyam bhavati

original: yac cāpriyam,
analyzed: yat ca apriyam

original: tadubhayaṃ prāpya harṣodvegau na kuryāt /
analyzed: tat ubhayam prāpya harṣa udvegau na kuryāt

original: katham? sthirabuddhiḥ sthire ātmani buddhir yasya saḥ sthirabuddhiḥ,
analyzed: katham sthira buddhiḥ sthire ātmani buddhiḥ yasya saḥ sthira buddhiḥ

original: asaṃmūḍho asthieṇa śarīreṇa sthiram ātmānam ekīkṛtya mohaḥ saṃmohaḥ;
analyzed: asaṃmūḍhaḥ asthieṇa śarīreṇa sthiram ātmānam ekīkṛtya mohaḥ saṃmohaḥ

original: tadrahitaḥ /
analyzed: tad rahitaḥ

original: tac ca katham?
analyzed: tat ca katham

original: brahmavid brahmaṇi sthitaḥ /
analyzed: brahma vid brahmaṇi sthitaḥ

original: upadeśena brahmavit san tasmin brahmaṇy abhyāsayuktaḥ /
analyzed: upadeśena brahma vid san tasmin brahmaṇi abhyāsa yuktaḥ

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati tattvavidām upadeśena ātmayāthātmyavid bhūtvā tatraiva yatamāno
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati tattva vidām upadeśena ātma yāthātmya vid bhūtvā tatra eva yatamānaḥ

original: dehātmābhimānaṃ parityajya sthirarūpātmāvalokanapriyānubhave vyavasthitaḥ asthire
analyzed: deha ātma abhimānam parityajya sthira rūpa ātma avalokana priya anubhave vyavasthitaḥ asthire

original: prākṛte priyāpriye prāpya harṣodevegau na kuryād iti // BhGR_5.20 //
analyzed: prākṛte priya apriye prāpya harṣa udevegau na kuryāt iti

original: bāhyasparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yaḥ sukham /
analyzed: bāhya sparśeṣu asakta ātmā vindati ātmani yaḥ sukham

original: sa brahmayogayuktātmā sukham akṣayam aśnute // BhG_5.21 //
analyzed: sa brahma yoga yukta ātmā sukham akṣayam aśnute

original: evamuktena prakāreṇa bāhyasparśeṣu ātmavyatiriktaviṣayānubhaveṣu,
analyzed: evam uktena prakāreṇa bāhya sparśeṣu ātma vyatirikta viṣaya anubhaveṣu

original: asaktātmā asaktamanāḥ antarātmany eva yaḥ sukhaṃ vindati labhate,
analyzed: asakta ātmā asakta manāḥ antarātmani eva yaḥ sukham vindati labhate

original: sa prakṛtyabhyāsaṃ vihāya brahmayogayuktātmā brahmābhyāsayuktamanāḥ brahmānubhavarūpam akṣayaṃ sukhaṃ prāpnoti // BhGR_5.21 //
analyzed: sa prakṛti abhyāsam vihāya brahma yoga yukta ātmā brahma abhyāsa yukta manāḥ brahma anubhava rūpam akṣayam sukham prāpnoti

original: prākṛtasya bhogasya sutyajatām āha
analyzed: prākṛtasya bhogasya su tyaja tām āha

original: ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkhayonaya eva te /
analyzed: ye hi saṃsparśa jāḥ bhogāḥ duḥkha yonayaḥ eva te

original: ādyantavantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ // BhG_5.22 //
analyzed: ādi antavantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ

original: viṣayendriyasparśajāḥ ye bhogāḥ duḥkhayonayas te duḥkhodarkāḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya indriya sparśa jāḥ ye bhogāḥ duḥkha yonayaḥ te duḥkha udarkāḥ

original: ādyantavantaḥ alpakālavartino hi upalabhyante /
analyzed: ādi antavantaḥ alpa kāla vartinaḥ hi upalabhyante

original: na teṣu tadyāthātmyavid ramate // BhGR_5.22 //
analyzed: na teṣu tad yāthātmya vid ramate

original: śaknotīhaiva yaḥ soḍhuṃ prāk śarīravimokṣaṇāt /
analyzed: śaknoti iha eva yaḥ soḍhum prāk śarīravimokṣaṇāt

original: kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ // BhG_5.23 //
analyzed: kāma krodha udbhavam vegam sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ

original: śarīravimokṣaṇāt prāk ih+eva sādhanānuṣṭhānadaśāyam eva ātmānubhavaprītyā kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ soḍhuṃ niroddhuṃ yaḥ śaknoti,
analyzed: śarīra vimokṣaṇāt prāk iha iva sādhana anuṣṭhāna daśā ayam eva ātma anubhava prītyā kāma krodha udbhavam vegam soḍhum niroddhum yaḥ śaknoti

original: sa yuktaḥ ātmānubhavāyārhaḥ /
analyzed: sa yuktaḥ ātma anubhavāya arhaḥ

original: sa eva śarīravimokṣottarakālam ātmānubhavaikasukhas saṃpatsyate // BhGR_5.23 //
analyzed: saḥ eva śarīra vimokṣa uttara kālam ātma anubhava eka sukhaḥ saṃpatsyate

original: yo 'ntassukho 'ntarārāmas tathāntarjyotir eva yaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ antar sukhaḥ antara ārāmaḥ tathā antar jyotiḥ eva yaḥ

original: sa yogī brahma nirvāṇaṃ brahmabhūto 'dhigacchati // BhG_5.24 //
analyzed: sa yogī brahma nirvāṇam brahma bhūtaḥ adhigacchati

original: yo bāhyaviṣayānubhavaṃ sarvaṃ vihāya antassukhaḥ ātmānubhavaikasukhaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ bāhya viṣaya anubhavam sarvam vihāya antar sukhaḥ ātma anubhava eka sukhaḥ

original: antarārāmaḥ ātmaikodyānaḥ svaguṇair ātmaiva sukhavardhako yasya sa tathoktaḥ,
analyzed: antarārāmaḥ ātma eka udyānaḥ sva guṇaiḥ ātmā eva sukha vardhakaḥ yasya sa tathā uktaḥ

original: tathāntarjyotiḥ ātmaikajñāno yo vartate,
analyzed: tathā antar jyotiḥ ātmā eka jñānaḥ yaḥ vartate

original: sa brahmabhūto yogī brahmanirvāṇam ātmānubhavasukhaṃ prāpnoti // BhGR_5.24 //
analyzed: sa brahma bhūtaḥ yogī brahma nirvāṇam ātma anubhava sukham prāpnoti

original: labhante brahmanirvāṇam ṛṣayaḥ kṣīṇakalmaṣāḥ /
analyzed: labhante brahma nirvāṇam ṛṣayaḥ kṣīṇa kalmaṣāḥ

original: chinnadvaidhā yatātmānas sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ // BhG_5.25 //
analyzed: chinna dvaidhāḥ yata ātmānaḥ sarva bhūta hite ratāḥ

original: cchinnadvaidhāḥ śītoṣṇādidvandvair vimuktāḥ,
analyzed: chinna dvaidhāḥ śīta uṣṇa ādi dvandvaiḥ vimuktāḥ

original: yatātmānaḥ ātmany eva niyamitamanasaḥ,
analyzed: yata ātmānaḥ ātmani eva niyamita manasaḥ

original: sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ ātmavat sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ hiteṣv eva niratāḥ,
analyzed: sarva bhūta hite ratāḥ ātma vat sarveṣām bhūtānām hiteṣu eva niratāḥ

original: ṛṣayaḥ draṣṭāraḥ ātmāvalokanaparāḥ,
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ draṣṭāraḥ ātma avalokana parāḥ

original: ya evambhūtās te kṣīṇāśeṣātmaprāptivirodhikalmaṣāḥ brahmanirvāṇaṃ labhante // BhGR_5.25 //
analyzed: ye evambhūtāḥ te kṣīṇa aśeṣa ātma prāpti virodhi kalmaṣāḥ brahma nirvāṇam labhante

original: uktalakṣaṇānāṃ brahma atyantasulabham ity āha
analyzed: ukta lakṣaṇānām brahma atyanta sulabham iti āha

original: kāmakrodhaviyuktānāṃ yatīnāṃ yatacetasām /
analyzed: kāma krodha viyuktānām yatīnām yata cetasām

original: abhito brahmanirvāṇaṃ vartate vijitātmanām // BhG_5.26 //
analyzed: abhitas brahma nirvāṇam vartate vijita ātmanām

original: kāmakrodhviyuktānāṃ yatīnāṃ yatanaśīlānāṃ yatacetasāṃ niyamitamanasāṃ vijitātmanāṃ vijitamanasāṃ,
analyzed: kāma krodha viyuktānām yatīnām yatana śīlānām yata cetasām niyamita manasām vijita ātmanām vijita manasām

original: brahmanirvāṇam abhito vartate /
analyzed: brahma nirvāṇam abhitas vartate

original: evaṃbhūtānāṃ hastasthaṃ brahmanirvāṇam ityarthaḥ // BhGR_5.26 //
analyzed: evaṃbhūtānām hasta stham brahma nirvāṇam iti arthaḥ

original: uktaṃ karmayogaṃ svalakṣyabhūtayogaśiraskam upasaṃharati
analyzed: uktam karmayogam sva lakṣya bhūta yoga śiraskam upasaṃharati

original: sparśān kṛtvā bahir bāhyāṃś cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ /
analyzed: sparśān kṛtvā bahis bāhyān cakṣuḥ ca eva antare bhruvoḥ

original: prāṇāpānau samau kṛtvā nāsābhyantaracāriṇau // BhG_5.27 //
analyzed: prāṇa apānau samau kṛtvā nāsā abhyantara cāriṇau

original: yatendriyamanobuddhir munir mokṣaparāyaṇaḥ /
analyzed: yata indriya manaḥ buddhiḥ muniḥ mokṣa parāyaṇaḥ

original: vigatecchābhayakrodho yaḥ sadā mukta eva saḥ // BhG_5.28 //
analyzed: vigata icchā bhaya krodhaḥ yaḥ sadā muktaḥ eva saḥ

original: bāhyān viṣayasparśān bahiḥ kṛtvā bāhyendriyavyāpāraṃ sarvam upasaṃhṛtya,
analyzed: bāhyān viṣaya sparśān bahis kṛtvā bāhya indriya vyāpāram sarvam upasaṃhṛtya

original: yogayogyāsane ṛjukāya upaviśya cakṣuṣī bhruvor antare nāsāgre vinyasya nāsābhyantaracāriṇau
analyzed: yoga yogya āsane ṛju kāyaḥ upaviśya cakṣuṣī bhruvoḥ antare nāsā agre vinyasya nāsā abhyantara cāriṇau

original: prāṇāpānau samau kṛtvā ucchvāsaniśvāsau samagatī kṛtvā ātmāvalokanād anyatra pravṛttyanarhendriyamanobuddhiḥ,
analyzed: prāṇa apānau samau kṛtvā ucchvāsa niśvāsau sama gatī kṛtvā ātma avalokanāt anyatra pravṛtti anarha indriya manaḥ buddhiḥ

original: tata eva vigatecchābhayakrodhaḥ,
analyzed: tatas eva vigata icchā bhaya krodhaḥ

original: mokṣaparāyaṇaḥ mokṣaikaprayojanaḥ,
muniḥ ātmāvalokanaśīlaḥ yaḥ,
analyzed: muniḥ ātma avalokana śīlaḥ yaḥ

original: saḥ sadā mukta eva sādhyadaśāyām iva sādhanadaśāyām api mukta evetyarthaḥ // BhGR_5.27 //28//
analyzed: saḥ sadā muktaḥ eva sādhya daśāyām iva sādhana daśāyām api muktaḥ eva iti arthaḥ

original: uktasya nityanaimittikakarmetikartavyatākasya karmayogasya yogaśiraskasya suśakatām āha
analyzed: uktasya nitya naimittika karma iti kartavya tākasya karmayogasya yoga śiraskasya su śaka tām āha

original: bhoktāraṃ yajñatapasāṃ sarvalokamaheśvaram /
analyzed: bhoktāram yajña tapasām sarva loka mahā īśvaram

original: suhṛdaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jñātvā mām śāntim ṛcchati // BhG_5.29 //
analyzed: suhṛdam sarva bhūtānām jñātvā mām śāntim ṛcchati

original: yajñatapasāṃ bhoktāraṃ sarvalokamaheśvaraṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ suhṛdaṃ māṃ jñātvā śāntim ṛcchati,
analyzed: yajña tapasām bhoktāram sarva loka mahā īśvaram sarva bhūtānām suhṛdam mām jñātvā śāntim ṛcchati

original: karmayogakaraṇa eva sukham ṛcchati /
analyzed: karma yoga karaṇe eva sukham ṛcchati

original: sarvalokamaheśvaraṃ sarveṣāṃ lokeśvarāṇām apīśvaram;
analyzed: sarva loka mahā īśvaram sarveṣām loka īśvarāṇām api īśvaram

original: “tam īśvarāṇāṃ paramaṃ maheśvaram” iti hi śrūyate /
analyzed: tam īśvarāṇām paramam maheśvaram iti hi śrūyate

original: māṃ sarvalokamaheśvaraṃ sarvasuhṛdaṃ jñātvā madārādhanarūpaḥ karmayoga iti sukhena tatra pravartata ityarthaḥ;
analyzed: mām sarva loka maheśvaram sarva suhṛdam jñātvā mad ārādhana rūpaḥ karmayogaḥ iti sukhena tatra pravartate iti arthaḥ

original: suhṛda ārādhanāya hi sarve pravartante // BhGR_5.29 //
analyzed: suhṛdaḥ ārādhanāya hi sarve pravartante

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ /
analyzed: anāśritaḥ karma phalam kāryam karma karoti yaḥ

original: sa saṃnyasī ca yogī ca na niragnir na cākriyaḥ // BhG_6.1 //
analyzed: sa saṃnyasī ca yogī ca na niragniḥ na ca akriyaḥ

original: uktaḥ karmayogaḥ saparikaraḥ,
analyzed: uktaḥ karmayogaḥ sa parikaraḥ

original: idānīṃ jñānayogakarmayogasādhyātmāvalokanarūpayogābhyāsavidhir ucyate /
analyzed: idānīm jñāna yoga karma yoga sādhya ātma avalokana rūpa yoga abhyāsa vidhiḥ ucyate

original: tatra karmayogasya nirapekṣayogasādhanatvaṃ draḍhayituṃ jñānākāraḥ karmayogo yogaśirasko 'nūdyate /
analyzed: tatra karmayogasya nirapekṣa yoga sādhana tvam draḍhayitum jñāna ākāraḥ karmayogaḥ yoga śiraskaḥ anūdyate

original: karmaphalaṃ svargādikam anāśritaḥ,
analyzed: karma phalam svarga ādikam anāśritaḥ

original: kāryaṃ karmānuṣṭhānam eva kāryam,
analyzed: kāryam karma anuṣṭhānam eva kāryam

original: sarvātmanāsmatsuhṛdbhūtaparamapuruṣārādhanarūpatayā karmaiva mama prayojanam,
analyzed: sarva ātmanā asmad suhṛd bhūta paramapuruṣa ārādhana rūpa tayā karma eva mama prayojanam

original: na tatsādhyaṃ kiṃcid iti yaḥ karma karoti;
analyzed: na tad sādhyam kiṃcid iti yaḥ karma karoti

original: sa saṃnyāsī ca jñānayoganiṣṭhaś ca;
analyzed: sa saṃnyāsī ca jñāna yoga niṣṭhaḥ ca

original: yogī ca karmayoganiṣṭhaś ca;
analyzed: yogī ca karma yoga niṣṭhaḥ ca

original: ātmāvalokanarūpayogasādhanabhūtobhayaniṣṭha ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: ātma avalokana rūpa yoga sādhana bhūta ubhaya niṣṭhaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: na niragnir na cākriyaḥ na coditayajñādikarmasv apravṛttaḥ,
analyzed: na niragniḥ na ca akriyaḥ na ca udita yajña ādi karmasu apravṛttaḥ

original: na ca kevalajñānaniṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: na ca kevala jñāna niṣṭhaḥ

original: tasya hi jñananiṣṭhaiva,
analyzed: tasya hi jñana niṣṭhā eva

original: karmayoganiṣṭhasya tūbhayam astītyabhiprāyaḥ // BhGR_6.1 //
analyzed: karma yoga niṣṭhasya tu ubhayam asti iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: uktalakṣaṇakarmayoge jñānam apy astīty āha
analyzed: ukta lakṣaṇa karma yoge jñānam api asti iti āha

original: yaṃ saṃnyāsa iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava /
analyzed: yam saṃnyāsaḥ iti prāhuḥ yogam tam viddhi pāṇḍava

original: na hy asaṃnyastasaṅkalpo yogī bhavati kaścana // BhG_6.2 //
analyzed: na hi asaṃnyasta saṅkalpaḥ yogī bhavati kaścana

original: yaṃ saṃnyāsa iti jñānayoga iti,
analyzed: yam saṃnyāsaḥ iti jñāna yogaḥ iti

original: ātmayāthātmyajñānam iti prāhuḥ,
analyzed: ātma yāthātmya jñānam iti prāhuḥ

original: taṃ karmayogam eva viddhi /
analyzed: tam karma yogam eva viddhi

original: tad upapādayati na hy asaṃnyastasaṃkalpo yogī bhavati kaścana /
analyzed: tat upapādayati na hi asaṃnyasta saṃkalpaḥ yogī bhavati kaścana

original: ātmayāthātmyānusandhānena anātmani prakṛtau ātmasaṅkalpaḥ saṃnyastaḥ parityakto yena sa saṃnyastasaṅkalpaḥ;
analyzed: ātma yāthātmya anusandhānena anātmani prakṛtau ātma saṅkalpaḥ saṃnyastaḥ parityaktaḥ yena sa saṃnyasta saṅkalpaḥ

original: anevaṃbhūtaḥ asaṃnyastasaṅkalpaḥ /
analyzed: anevaṃbhūtaḥ asaṃnyasta saṅkalpaḥ

original: na hy ukteṣu karmayogiṣv anevaṃbhūtaḥ kaścana karmayogī bhavati;
analyzed: na hi ukteṣu karma yogiṣu anevaṃbhūtaḥ kaścana karma yogī bhavati

original: “yasya sarve samārambhāḥ kāmasaṅkalpavarjitāḥ” iti hy uktam // BhGR_6.2 //
analyzed: yasya sarve samārambhāḥ kāma saṅkalpa varjitāḥ iti hi uktam

original: karmayoga evāpramādena yogaṃ sādhayatīty āha
analyzed: karma yogaḥ eva apramādena yogam sādhayati iti āha

original: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate /
analyzed: ārurukṣoḥ muneḥ yogam karma kāraṇam ucyate

original: yogārūḍhasya tasyaiva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate // BhG_6.3 //
analyzed: yoga ārūḍhasya tasya eva śamaḥ kāraṇam ucyate

original: yogam ātmāvalokanaṃ prāptum icchor mumukṣoḥ karmayoga eva kāraṇam ucyate /
analyzed: yogam ātma avalokanam prāptum icchoḥ mumukṣoḥ karmayogaḥ eva kāraṇam ucyate

original: tasyaiva yogārūḍhasya pratiṣṭhitayogasyaiva,
analyzed: tasya eva yoga ārūḍhasya pratiṣṭhita yogasya eva

original: śamaḥ karmanivṛttiḥ kāraṇam ucyate /
analyzed: śamaḥ karma nivṛttiḥ kāraṇam ucyate

original: yāvad ātmāvalokanarūpamokṣāvāpti karma kāryam ityarthaḥ // BhGR_6.3 //
analyzed: yāvat ātma avalokana rūpa mokṣa avāpti karma kāryam iti arthaḥ

original: kadā pratiṣṭhitayogo bhavatīty atrāha
analyzed: kadā pratiṣṭhita yogaḥ bhavati iti atra āha

original: yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasv anuṣajjate /
analyzed: yadā hi na indriya artheṣu na karmasu anuṣajjate

original: sarvasaṅkalpasaṃnyāsī yogārūḍhas tadocyate // BhG_6.4 //
analyzed: sarva saṅkalpa saṃnyāsī yoga ārūḍhaḥ tadā ucyate

original: yadāyaṃ yogī tv ātmaikānubhavasvabhāvatayā indriyārtheṣu ātmavyatiriktaprākṛtaviṣayeṣu,
analyzed: yadā ayam yogī tu ātma eka anubhava svabhāva tayā indriyārtheṣu ātma vyatirikta prākṛta viṣayeṣu

original: tatsaṃbandhiṣu ca karmasu nānuṣajjate na saṅgam arhati,
analyzed: tad saṃbandhiṣu ca karmasu na anuṣajjate na saṅgam arhati

original: tadā hi sarvasaṅkalpasamnyāsī yogārūḍha ity ucyate /
analyzed: tadā hi sarva saṅkalpa samnyāsī yoga ārūḍhaḥ iti ucyate

original: tasmād ārurukṣor viṣayānubhavārhatayā tadananuṣaṅgābhyāsarūpaḥ karmayoga eva yoganiṣpattikāraṇam /
analyzed: tasmāt ārurukṣoḥ viṣaya anubhava arha tayā tad ananuṣaṅga abhyāsa rūpaḥ karmayogaḥ eva yoga niṣpatti kāraṇam

original: ato viṣayānanuṣaṅgābhyāsarūpaṃ karmayogam eva ārurukṣuḥ kuryāt // BhGR_6.4 //
analyzed: atas viṣaya ananuṣaṅga abhyāsa rūpam karma yogam eva ārurukṣuḥ kuryāt

original: tad evāha
analyzed: tat eva āha

original: uddhared ātmanātmānaṃ nātmānam avasādayet /
analyzed: uddharet ātmanā ātmānam na ātmānam avasādayet

original: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ // BhG_6.5 //
analyzed: ātmā eva hi ātmanaḥ bandhuḥ ātmā eva ripuḥ ātmanaḥ

original: ātmanā manasā;
analyzed: ātmanā manasā

original: viṣayānanuṣaktena ātmānam uddharet /
analyzed: viṣaya ananuṣaktena ātmānam uddharet

original: tadviparītena manasā ātmānaṃ nāvasādayet /
analyzed: tad viparītena manasā ātmānam na avasādayet

original: ātmaiva mana eva hy ātmano bandhuḥ;
analyzed: ātmā eva manaḥ eva hi ātmanaḥ bandhuḥ

original: tad evātmano ripuḥ // BhGR_6.5 //
analyzed: tat eva ātmanaḥ ripuḥ

original: bandhur ātmātmanas tasya yenātmaivātmanā jitaḥ /
analyzed: bandhuḥ ātmā ātmanaḥ tasya yena ātmā eva ātmanā jitaḥ

original: anātmanas tu śatrutve vartetātmaiva śatruvat // BhG_6.6 //
analyzed: anātmanaḥ tu śatru tve varteta ātmā eva śatru vat

original: yena puruṣeṇa svenaiva svamano viṣayebhyo jitam,
analyzed: yena puruṣeṇa svena eva sva manaḥ viṣayebhyaḥ jitam

original: tanmanas tasya bandhuḥ /
analyzed: tat manaḥ tasya bandhuḥ

original: anātmanaḥ ajitamanasaḥ svakīyam eva manaḥ svasya śatruvac śatrutve varteta svaniśśreyasaviparīte vartetetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: anātmanaḥ ajita manasaḥ svakīyam eva manaḥ svasya śatru vat śatru tve varteta sva niśśreyasa viparīte varteta iti arthaḥ

original: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā parāśareṇāpi,
analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā parāśareṇa api

original: “mana eva manuṣyāṇāṃ kāraṇaṃ bandhamokṣayoḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ eva manuṣyāṇām kāraṇam bandha mokṣayoḥ

original: bandhāya viṣayāsaṅgi muktyaiva nirviṣayaṃ manaḥ // BhGR_6.” iti //6//
analyzed: bandhāya viṣaya āsaṅgi muktyā eva nirviṣayam manaḥ iti

original: yogārambhayogyā avasthocyate
analyzed: yoga ārambha yogyā avasthā ucyate

original: jitātmanaḥ praśāntasya paramātmā samāhitaḥ /
analyzed: jita ātmanaḥ praśāntasya paramātmā samāhitaḥ

original: śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkheṣu tathā mānāvamānayoḥ // BhG_6.7 //
analyzed: śīta uṣṇa sukha duḥkheṣu tathā māna avamānayoḥ

original: śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkheṣu mānāvamānayoś ca jitātmanaḥ jitamanasaḥ vikārarahitamanasaḥ praśāntasya manasi paramātmā samāhitaḥ samyagāhitaḥ /
analyzed: śīta uṣṇa sukha duḥkheṣu māna avamānayoḥ ca jita ātmanaḥ jita manasaḥ vikāra rahita manasaḥ praśāntasya manasi paramātmā samāhitaḥ samyak āhitaḥ

original: svarūpeṇāvasthitaḥ pratyagātmātra paramātmety ucyate;
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa avasthitaḥ pratyagātmā atra paramātmā iti ucyate

original: tasyaiva prakṛtatvāt /
analyzed: tasya eva prakṛta tvāt

original: tasyāpi pūrvapūrvāvasthāpekṣayā paramātmatvāt /
analyzed: tasya api pūrva pūrva avasthā apekṣayā paramātma tvāt

original: ātmā paraṃ samāhita iti vānvayaḥ // BhGR_6.7 //
analyzed: ātmā param samāhitaḥ iti vā anvayaḥ

original: jñānavijñānatṛptātmā kūṭastho vijitendriyaḥ /
analyzed: jñāna vijñāna tṛpta ātmā kūṭasthaḥ vijita indriyaḥ

original: yukta ity ucyate yogī samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ // BhG_6.8 //
analyzed: yuktaḥ iti ucyate yogī sama loṣṭa aśma kāñcanaḥ

original: jñānavijñānatṛptātmā ātmasvarūpaviṣayeṇa jñānena,
analyzed: jñāna vijñāna tṛpta ātmā ātma svarūpa viṣayeṇa jñānena

original: tasya ca prakṛtivisajātīyākāraviṣayeṇa jñānena ca tṛptamanāḥ kūṭasthaḥ devādyavasthāsv anuvartamānasarvasādhāraṇajñānaikākārātmani sthitaḥ,
analyzed: tasya ca prakṛti visajātīya ākāra viṣayeṇa jñānena ca tṛpta manāḥ kūṭasthaḥ deva ādi avasthāsu anuvartamāna sarva sādhāraṇa jñāna eka ākāra ātmani sthitaḥ

original: tata eva vijitendriyaḥ,
analyzed: tatas eva vijita indriyaḥ

original: samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ prakṛtiviviktasvarūpaniṣṭhatayā prākṛtavastuviśeṣeṣu bhogyatvābhāvāl loṣṭāśmakāñcaneṣu samaprayojanaḥ yaḥ karmayogī,
analyzed: sama loṣṭa aśma kāñcanaḥ prakṛti vivikta sva rūpa niṣṭha tayā prākṛta vastu viśeṣeṣu bhogya tva abhāvāt loṣṭa aśma kāñcaneṣu sama prayojanaḥ yaḥ karma yogī

original: sa yukta ity ucyate ātmāvalokanarūpayogābhyāsārha ity ucyate // BhGR_6.8 //
analyzed: sa yuktaḥ iti ucyate ātma avalokana rūpa yoga abhyāsa arhaḥ iti ucyate

original: tathā ca
analyzed: tathā ca

original: suhṛnmitrāryudāsīnamadhyasthadveṣyabandhuṣu /
analyzed: suhṛd mitra ari udāsīna madhyastha dveṣya bandhuṣu

original: sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu samabuddhir viśiṣyate // BhG_6.9 //
analyzed: sādhuṣu api ca pāpeṣu sama buddhiḥ viśiṣyate

original: vayoviśeṣānaṅgīkāreṇa svahitaiṣiṇaḥ suhṛdaḥ;
analyzed: vayaḥ viśeṣa an aṅgīkāreṇa sva hita eṣiṇaḥ suhṛdaḥ

original: savayaso hitaiṣiṇo mitrāṇi,
analyzed: savayasaḥ hita eṣiṇaḥ mitrāṇi

original: arayo nimittato 'narthecchavaḥ;
analyzed: arayaḥ nimittataḥ anartha icchavaḥ

original: ubhayahetvabhāvād ubhayarahitā udāsīnāḥ;
analyzed: ubhaya hetu abhāvāt ubhaya rahitāḥ udāsīnāḥ

original: janmata evobhayarahitā madhyasthāḥ;
analyzed: janmataḥ eva ubhaya rahitāḥ madhyasthāḥ

original: janmata evānicchecchavo dveṣyāḥ;
analyzed: janmataḥ eva an icchā icchavaḥ dveṣyāḥ

original: janmata eva hitaiṣiṇo bandhavaḥ,
analyzed: janmataḥ eva hita eṣiṇaḥ bandhavaḥ

original: sādhavo dharmaśīlāḥ;
analyzed: sādhavaḥ dharma śīlāḥ

original: pāpāḥ pāpaśīlāḥ;
analyzed: pāpāḥ pāpa śīlāḥ

original: ātmaikaprayojanatayā suhṛnmitrādibhiḥ prayojanābhāvād virodhābhāvāc ca teṣu
analyzed: ātma eka prayojana tayā suhṛd mitra ādibhiḥ prayojana abhāvāt virodha abhāvāt ca teṣu

original: samabuddhir yogābhyāsārhatve viśiṣyate // BhGR_6.9 //
analyzed: sama buddhiḥ yoga abhyāsa arha tve viśiṣyate

original: yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ /
analyzed: yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānam rahasi sthitaḥ

original: ekākī yatacittātmā nirāśīr aparigrahaḥ // BhG_6.10 //
analyzed: ekākī yata citta ātmā nirāśīḥ aparigrahaḥ

original: yogī uktaprakārakarmayoganiṣṭhaḥ,
satatam aharaharyogakāle ātmānaṃ yuñjīta ātmānaṃ yuktaṃ kurvīta /
analyzed: satatam ahar ahar yoga kāle ātmānam yuñjīta ātmānam yuktam kurvīta

original: svadarśananiṣṭhaṃ kurvītetyarthaḥ;
analyzed: sva darśana niṣṭham kurvīta iti arthaḥ

original: rahasi janavarjite niśśabde deśe sthitaḥ,
analyzed: rahasi jana varjite niśśabde deśe sthitaḥ

original: ekākī tatrāpi na sadvitīyaḥ,
analyzed: ekākī tatra api na sa dvitīyaḥ

original: yatacittātmā yatacittamanaskaḥ,
analyzed: yata citta ātmā yata citta manaskaḥ

original: nirāśīḥ ātmavyatirikte kṛtsne vastuni nirapekṣaḥ aparigrahaḥ tadvyatirikte kasmiṃścid api mamatārahitaḥ // BhGR_6.10 //
analyzed: nirāśīḥ ātma vyatirikte kṛtsne vastuni nirapekṣaḥ aparigrahaḥ tad vyatirikte kasmiṃścid api mamatā rahitaḥ

original: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ

original: nātyucchritaṃ nātinīcaṃ celājinakuśottaram // BhG_6.11 //
analyzed: na ati ucchritam na ati nīcam cela ajina kuśa uttaram

original: tatraikāgraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā yatacittendriyakriyaḥ /
analyzed: tatra ekāgram manaḥ kṛtvā yata citta indriya kriyaḥ

original: upaviśyāsane yuñjyād yogam ātmaviśuddhaye // BhG_6.12 //
analyzed: upaviśya āsane yuñjyāt yogam ātma viśuddhaye

original: śucau deśe aśucibhiḥ puruṣair anadhiṣṭhite aparigṛhīte ca aśucibhir vastubhir aspṛṣṭe ca pavitrabhūte deśe,
analyzed: śucau deśe aśucibhiḥ puruṣaiḥ an adhiṣṭhite a parigṛhīte ca aśucibhiḥ vastubhiḥ a spṛṣṭe ca pavitra bhūte deśe

original: dārvādinirmitaṃ nātyucchritaṃ nātinīcaṃ celājinakuśottaraṃ āsanaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya tasmin
analyzed: dārva ādi nirmitam na ati ucchritam na ati nīcam cela ajina kuśa uttaram āsanam pratiṣṭhāpya tasmin

original: manaḥprasādakare sāpāśraye upaviśya yogaikāgraṃ manaḥ kṛtvā yatacittendriyakriyaḥ
analyzed: manaḥ prasāda kare sa apāśraye upaviśya yoga ekāgram manaḥ kṛtvā yata citta indriya kriyaḥ

original: sarvātmanopasaṃhṛtacittendriyakriyaḥ ātmaviśuddhaye bandhanivṛttaye yogaṃ yuñjyād
analyzed: sarvātmanā upasaṃhṛta citta indriya kriyaḥ ātma viśuddhaye bandha nivṛttaye yogam yuñjyāt

original: atmāvalokanaṃ kurvīta // BhGR_6.11 //12 //
analyzed: ātma avalokanam kurvīta

original: samaṃ kāyaśirogrīvaṃ dhārayan acalaṃ sthiram /
analyzed: samam kāya śiraḥ grīvam dhārayan acalam sthiram

original: saṃprekṣya nāsikāgraṃ svaṃ deśaś cānavalokayan // BhG_6.13 //
analyzed: saṃprekṣya nāsikā agram svam deśaḥ ca anavalokayan

original: praśāntātmā vigatabhīḥ brahmacārivrate sthitaḥ /
analyzed: praśānta ātmā vigata bhīḥ brahmacāri vrate sthitaḥ

original: manaḥ saṃyamya maccitto yukta āsīta matparaḥ // BhG_6.14 //
analyzed: manaḥ saṃyamya mad cittaḥ yuktaḥ āsīta mad paraḥ

original: kāyaśirogrīvaṃ samam acalaṃ sāpāśrayatayā sthiraṃ dhārayan,
analyzed: kāya śiraḥ grīvam samam acalam sa apāśraya tayā sthiram dhārayan

original: diśaś cānavaloakayan,
analyzed: diśaḥ ca an avaloakayan

original: svanāsikāgraṃ saṃprekṣya,
analyzed: sva nāsikā agram saṃprekṣya

original: praśāntātmā atyantanirvṛtamanāḥ,
analyzed: praśānta ātmā atyanta nirvṛta manāḥ

original: vigatabhīr brahmacaryayukto manaḥ saṃyamya maccitto yuktaḥ avahito matpara āsīta mām eva cintyan āsīta // BhGR_6.13 //14//
analyzed: vigata bhīḥ brahmacarya yuktaḥ manaḥ saṃyamya mad cittaḥ yuktaḥ avahitaḥ mad paraḥ āsīta mām eva cintyan āsīta

original: yuñjann evaṃ sadātmānaṃ yogī niyatamānasaḥ /
analyzed: yuñjan evam sadā ātmānam yogī niyata mānasaḥ

original: śāntiṃ nirvāṇaparamāṃ matsaṃsthām adhigacchati // BhG_6.15 //
analyzed: śāntim nirvāṇa paramām mad saṃsthām adhigacchati

original: evaṃ mayi parasmin brahmaṇi puruṣottame manasaś śubhāśraye sadā ātmānaṃ manaḥ yuñjan niyatamānasaḥ matsparśavitrīkṛtamānasatayā niścalamānasaḥ,
analyzed: evam mayi parasmin brahmaṇi puruṣottame manasaḥ śubha āśraye sadā ātmānam manaḥ yuñjan niyata mānasaḥ mad sparśa vitrīkṛta mānasa tayā niścala mānasaḥ

original: mām eva cintayan matsaṃsthāṃ nirvāṇaparamāṃ śāntim adhigacchati nirvāṇakāṣṭhārūpāṃ matsaṃsthāṃ mayi saṃsthitāṃ śāntim adhigacchati // BhGR_6.15
analyzed: mām eva cintayan mad saṃsthām nirvāṇa paramām śāntim adhigacchati nirvāṇa kāṣṭhā rūpām mad saṃsthām mayi saṃsthitām śāntim adhigacchati  /

original: evam ātmayogam ārabhamāṇasya manonairmalyahetubhūtāṃ manaso bhagavati śubhāśraye sthitim abhidhāya anyad api yogopakaraṇam āha
analyzed: evam ātma yogam ārabhamāṇasya manaḥ nairmalya hetu bhūtām manasaḥ bhagavati śubha āśraye sthitim abhidhāya anyat api yoga upakaraṇam āha

original: nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti na caikāntam anaśnataḥ /
analyzed: na atyaśnataḥ tu yogaḥ asti na ca ekāntam an aśnataḥ

original: na cātisvapnaśīlasya jāgrato naiva cārjuna // BhG_6.16 //
analyzed: na ca ati svapna śīlasya jāgrataḥ na eva ca arjuna

original: yuktāhāravihārasya yuktaceṣṭasya karmasu /
analyzed: yukta āhāra vihārasya yukta ceṣṭasya karmasu

original: yuktasvapnāvabodhasya yogo bhavati duḥkhahā // BhG_6.17 //
analyzed: yukta svapna avabodhasya yogaḥ bhavati duḥkha hā

original: atyaśanānaśane yogavirodhinī;
analyzed: atyaśana anaśane yoga virodhinī

original: ativihārāvihārau ca tathātimātrasvapnajāgarye;
analyzed: ati vihāra avihārau ca tathā atimātra svapna jāgarye

original: tathā cātyāyāsānāyāsau /
analyzed: tathā ca atyāyāsa anāyāsau

original: mitāhāravihārasya mitāyāsasya mitasvapnāvabodhasya sakaladuḥkhahā bandhanāśanaḥ yogaḥ saṃpanno bhavati // BhGR_6.16 //17//
analyzed: mita āhāra vihārasya mita āyāsasya mita svapna avabodhasya sakala duḥkha hā bandha nāśanaḥ yogaḥ saṃpannaḥ bhavati

original: yadā viniyataṃ cittam ātmany evāvatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: yadā viniyatam cittam ātmani eva avatiṣṭhate

original: nisspṛhaḥ sarvakāmebhyo yukta ity ucyate tadā // BhG_6.18 //
analyzed: nisspṛhaḥ sarva kāmebhyaḥ yuktaḥ iti ucyate tadā

original: yadā prayojanaviṣayaṃ cittam ātmany eva viniyatam viśeṣeṇa niyataṃ niratiśayaprayojanatayā tatraiva niyataṃ niścalam avatiṣṭhate,
analyzed: yadā prayojana viṣayam cittam ātmani eva viniyatam viśeṣeṇa niyatam niratiśaya prayojana tayā tatra eva niyatam niścalam avatiṣṭhate

original: tadā sarvakāmebhyo nisspṛhas san yukta ity ucyate yogārha ity ucyate // BhGR_6.18 //
analyzed: tadā sarva kāmebhyaḥ nisspṛhaḥ san yuktaḥ iti ucyate yoga arhaḥ iti ucyate

original: yathā dīpo nivātastho neṅgate sopamā smṛtā /
analyzed: yathā dīpaḥ nivāta sthaḥ na iṅgate sā upamā smṛtā

original: yogino yatacittasya yuñjato yogam ātmanaḥ // BhG_6.19 //
analyzed: yoginaḥ yata cittasya yuñjataḥ yogam ātmanaḥ

original: nivātastho dīpo yathā neṅgate na calati;
analyzed: nivāta sthaḥ dīpaḥ yathā na iṅgate na calati

original: acalas saprabhas tiṣṭhati;
analyzed: acalaḥ sa prabhaḥ tiṣṭhati

original: yatacittasya nivṛttasakaletaramanovṛtteḥ yoginaḥ ātmani yogaṃ yuñjataḥ ātmasvarūpasya sopamā;
analyzed: yata cittasya nivṛtta sakala itara manaḥ vṛtteḥ yoginaḥ ātmani yogam yuñjataḥ ātma svarūpasya sā upamā

original: nivātasthatayā niścalasaprabhadīpavan nivṛttasakalamanovṛttitayā niścalo jñānaprabha ātmā tiṣṭhaītyarthaḥ // BhGR_6.19 //
analyzed: nivāta stha tayā niścala saprabha dīpa vat nivṛtta sakala manaḥ vṛtti tayā niścalaḥ jñāna prabhaḥ ātmā tiṣṭhai iti arthaḥ

original: yatroparamate cittaṃ niruddhaṃ yogasevayā /
analyzed: yatra uparamate cittam niruddham yoga sevayā

original: yatra caivātmanātmānaṃ paśyan ātmani tuṣyati /20//
analyzed: yatra ca eva ātmanā ātmānam paśyan ātmani tuṣyati

original: sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad buddhigrāhyam atīndriyam /
analyzed: sukham ātyantikam yat tat buddhi grāhyam atīndriyam

original: vetti yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvataḥ // BhG_6.21 //
analyzed: vetti yatra na ca eva ayam sthitaḥ calati tattvataḥ

original: yaṃ labdhvā cāparaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ tataḥ /
analyzed: yam labdhvā ca aparam lābham manyate na adhikam tatas

original: yasmin sthito na duḥkhena guruṇāpi vicālyate // BhG_6.22 //
analyzed: yasmin sthitaḥ na duḥkhena guruṇā api vicālyate

original: taṃ vidyād duḥkhasaṃyogaviyogaṃ yogasaṃjñitam /
analyzed: tam vidyāt duḥkha saṃyoga viyogam yoga saṃjñitam

original: sa niścayena yoktavyo yogo 'nirviṇṇacetasā // BhG_6.23 //
analyzed: sa niścayena yoktavyaḥ yogaḥ anirviṇṇa cetasā

original: yogasevayā hetunā sarvatra niruddhaṃ cittaṃ yatra yoge uparamate atiśayitasukham idam iti ramate,
analyzed: yoga sevayā hetunā sarvatra niruddham cittam yatra yoge uparamate atiśayita sukham idam iti ramate

original: yatra ca yoge ātmanā manasā ātmānaṃ paśyan anyanirapekṣam ātmany eva tuṣyati,
analyzed: yatra ca yoge ātmanā manasā ātmānam paśyan anya nirapekṣam ātmani eva tuṣyati

original: yat tad atīndriyam ātmabuddhyekagrāhyam ātyantikaṃ sukhaṃ yatra ca yoge vetti anubhavati,
analyzed: yat tat atīndriyam ātma buddhi eka grāhyam ātyantikam sukham yatra ca yoge vetti anubhavati

original: yatra ca yoge sthitaḥ sukhātirekeṇa tattvataḥ tadbhāvān na calati,
analyzed: yatra ca yoge sthitaḥ sukha atirekeṇa tattvataḥ tad bhāvāt na calati

original: yaṃ yogaṃ labdhvā yogād viratas tam eva kāṅkṣamāṇo nāparaṃ lābhaṃ tato 'dhikaṃ manyate,
analyzed: yam yogam labdhvā yogāt virataḥ tam eva kāṅkṣamāṇaḥ na aparam lābham tatas adhikam manyate

original: yasmiṃś ca yoge sthito virato 'pi guṇavat putraviyogādinā guruṇāpi duḥkhena na vicālyate,
analyzed: yasmin ca yoge sthitaḥ virataḥ api guṇa vat putra viyoga ādinā guruṇā api duḥkhena na vicālyate

original: taṃ duḥkhasaṃyogaviyogaṃ duḥkhasaṃyogapratyanīkākāraṃ yogaśabdābhidheyaṃ vidyāt /
analyzed: tam duḥkha saṃyoga viyogam duḥkha saṃyoga pratyanīka ākāram yoga śabda abhidheyam vidyāt

original: sa evaṃrūpo yoga iti ārambhadaśāyāṃ niścayena anirviṇṇacetasā hṛṣṭacetasā yogo yoktavyaḥ // BhGR_6.2023 //
analyzed: saḥ evaṃrūpaḥ yogaḥ iti ārambha daśāyām niścayena anirviṇṇa cetasā hṛṣṭa cetasā yogaḥ yoktavyaḥ

original: saṅkalpaprabhavān kāmāṃs tyaktvā sarvān aśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: saṅkalpa prabhavān kāmān tyaktvā sarvān aśeṣatas

original: manasaivendriyagrāmaṃ viniyamya samantataḥ // BhG_6.24 //
analyzed: manasā evā indriya grāmam viniyamya samantataḥ

original: śanaiś śanair uparamed buddhyā dhṛtigṛhītayā /
analyzed: śanais śanais uparamet buddhyā dhṛti gṛhītayā

original: ātmasaṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃcid api cintayet // BhG_6.25 //
analyzed: ātma saṃstham manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃcid api cintayet

original: sparśajāḥ saṅkalpajāś ceti dvividhāḥ kāmāḥ,
analyzed: sparśa jāḥ saṅkalpa jāḥ ca iti dvividhāḥ kāmāḥ

original: sparśajāḥ śītoṣṇādayaḥ,
analyzed: sparśa jāḥ śīta uṣṇa ādayaḥ

original: saṅkalpajāḥ putrakṣetrādayaḥ /
analyzed: saṅkalpa jāḥ putra kṣetra ādayaḥ

original: tatra saṅkalpaprabhavāḥ svarūpeṇaiva tyaktuṃ śakyāḥ /
analyzed: tatra saṅkalpa prabhavāḥ sva rūpeṇa eva tyaktum śakyāḥ

original: tān sarvān manasaiva tadanvayānusandhānena tyaktvā sparśajeṣv avarjanīyeṣu tannimittaharṣodvegau
analyzed: tān sarvān manasā eva tad anvaya anusandhānena tyaktvā sparśa jeṣu avarjanīyeṣu tad nimitta harṣa udvegau

original: tyaktvā samantataḥ sarvasmād viṣayāt sarvam indriyagrāmaṃ viniyamya śanaiś śanair
analyzed: tyaktvā samantataḥ sarvasmāt viṣayāt sarvam indriya grāmam viniyamya śanais śanais

original: dhṛtigṛhītayā vivekaviṣayayā buddhyā sarvasmād ātmavyatiriktād uparamya ātmasaṃsthaṃ
analyzed: dhṛti gṛhītayā viveka viṣayayā buddhyā sarvasmāt ātma vyatiriktāt uparamyaḥ ātma saṃstham

original: manaḥ kṛtvā na kiñcid api cintayet // BhGR_6.24 //25 //
analyzed: manaḥ kṛtvā na kiñcid api cintayet

original: yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram /
analyzed: yatas yatas niścarati manaḥ cañcalam asthiram

original: tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet // BhG_6.26 //
analyzed: tatas tatas niyamya etat ātmani eva vaśam nayet

original: calasvabhāvatayātmany asthiraṃ manaḥ yato yato viṣayaprāvaṇyahetoḥ bahiḥ niścarati,
analyzed: cala svabhāva tayā ātmani asthiram manaḥ yatas yatas viṣaya prāvaṇya hetoḥ bahis niścarati

original: tatas tato yatnena mano niyamya ātmany eva atiśayitasukhabhāvanayā vaśaṃ nayet // BhGR_6.26 //
analyzed: tatas tatas yatnena manaḥ niyamya ātmani eva atiśayita sukha bhāvanayā vaśam nayet

original: praśāntamanasaṃ hy enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamam /
analyzed: praśānta manasam hi enam yoginam sukham uttamam

original: upaiti śāntarajasaṃ brahmabhūtam akalmaṣam // BhG_6.27 //
analyzed: upaiti śānta rajasam brahma bhūtam akalmaṣam

original: praśāntamanasam ātmani niścalamanasam,
analyzed: praśānta manasam ātmani niścala manasam

original: ātmanyastamanasaṃ tad eva hetor dagdhāśeṣakalmaṣam,
analyzed: ātma nyasta manasam tat eva hetoḥ dagdha aśeṣa kalmaṣam

original: tata eva śāntarajasaṃ vinaṣṭarajoguṇam,
analyzed: tatas eva śānta rajasam vinaṣṭa rajaḥ guṇam

original: tata eva brahmabhūtaṃ svasvarūpeṇāvasthitam enaṃ yoginam ātmasvarūpānubhavarūpam uttamaṃ sukham upaiti /
analyzed: tatas eva brahma bhūtam sva svarūpeṇa avasthitam enam yoginam ātma svarūpa anubhava rūpam uttamam sukham upaiti

original: hīti hetau; uttamasukharūpatvād ātmasvarūpasyetyarthaḥ // BhGR_6.27 //
analyzed: hi iti hetau uttama sukha rūpa tvāt ātma svarūpasya iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ yuñjan sadātmānaṃ yogī vigatakalmaṣaḥ /
analyzed: evam yuñjan sadā ātmānam yogī vigata kalmaṣaḥ

original: sukhena brahmasaṃsparśam atyantaṃ sukham aśnute // BhG_6.28 //
analyzed: sukhena brahma saṃsparśam atyantam sukham aśnute

original: evam uktaprakāreṇātmānaṃ yuñjan tenaiva vigataprācīnasamastakalmaṣo brahmasaṃsparśaṃ brahmānubhavarūpaṃ sukham atyantam aparimitaṃ sukhena  #
analyzed: evam ukta prakāreṇa ātmānam yuñjan tena eva vigata prācīna samasta kalmaṣaḥ brahma saṃsparśam brahma anubhava rūpam sukham atyantam aparimitam sukhena

original: anāyāsena sadāśunute // BhGR_6.28 //
analyzed: anāyāsena sadā āśunute

original: atha yogavipākadaśā catuṣprakārocyate
analyzed: atha yoga vipāka daśā catuṣprakārā ucyate

original: sarvabhūtastham ātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni cātmani /
analyzed: sarva bhūta stham ātmānam sarva bhūtāni ca ātmani

original: īkṣate yogayuktātmā sarvatra samadarśanaḥ // BhG_6.29 //
analyzed: īkṣate yoga yukta ātmā sarvatra sama darśanaḥ

original: svātmanaḥ pareṣām ca bhūtānāṃ prakṛtiviyuktasvarūpāṇāṃ jñānaikākāratayā sāmyād vaiṣamyasya
analyzed: sva ātmanaḥ pareṣām ca bhūtānām prakṛti viyukta svarūpāṇām jñāna eka ākāra tayā sāmyāt vaiṣamyasya

original: ca prakṛtigatatvād yogayuktātmā prakṛtiviyukteṣv ātmasu sarvatra jñānaikākāratayā
analyzed: ca prakṛti gata tvāt yoga yukta ātmā prakṛti viyukteṣu ātmasu sarvatra jñāna eka ākāra tayā

original: samadarśanaḥ sarvabhūtasthaṃ svātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni ca svātmanīkṣate sarvabhūtasamānākāraṃ
analyzed: sama darśanaḥ sarva bhūta stham sva ātmānam sarva bhūtāni ca sva ātmani īkṣate sarva bhūta samāna ākāram

original: svātmānaṃ svātmasamānākārāṇi ca sarvabhūtāni paśyatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sva ātmānam sva ātma samāna ākārāṇi ca sarva bhūtāni paśyati iti arthaḥ

original: ekasmin ātmani dṛṣṭe sarvasyātmavastunas tatsāmyāt sarvam ātmavastu dṛṣṭaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: ekasmin ātmani dṛṣṭe sarvasya ātma vastunaḥ tad sāmyāt sarvam ātma vastu dṛṣṭam bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: “sarvatra samadarśanaḥ” iti vacanāt /
analyzed: sarvatra samadarśanaḥ iti vacanāt

original: “yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena” ityanubhāṣaṇāc ca /
analyzed: yaḥ ayam yogaḥ tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena iti anubhāṣaṇāt ca

original: “nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma” iti vacanāc ca // BhGR_6.29 //
analyzed: nirdoṣam hi samam brahma iti vacanāt ca

original: yo māṃ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṃ ca mayi paśyati /
analyzed: yaḥ mām paśyati sarvatra sarvam ca mayi paśyati

original: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati // BhG_6.30 //
analyzed: tasya aham na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati

original: tato 'pi vipākadaśāpanno mama sādharmyam upāgataḥ,
analyzed: tatas api vipāka daśā āpannaḥ mama sādharmyam upāgataḥ

original: “nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyam upaiti” ity ucyamānaṃ sarvasyātmavastuno vidhūtapuṇyapāpasya svarūpeṇāvasthitasya matsāmyaṃ paśyan yaḥ sarvatrātmavastuni  #
analyzed: nirañjanaḥ paramam sāmyam upaiti iti ucyamānam sarvasya ātma vastunaḥ vidhūta puṇya pāpasya sva rūpeṇa avasthitasya mad sāmyam paśyan yaḥ sarvatra ātma vastuni

original: māṃ paśyati,
analyzed: mām paśyati

original: sarvam ātmavastu ca mayi paśyati anyonyasāmyād anyataradarśanena anyatarad apīdṛśam iti paśyati,
analyzed: sarvam ātma vastu ca mayi paśyati anyonya sāmyāt anyatara darśanena anyatarat api īdṛśam iti paśyati

original: tasya svātmasvarūpaṃ paśyato 'haṃ tatsāmyān na praṇaśyāmi nādarśanam upayāmi;
analyzed: tasya sva ātma svarūpam paśyataḥ aham tad sāmyāt na praṇaśyāmi na adarśanam upayāmi

original: mamāpi māṃ paśyataḥ,
analyzed: mama api mām paśyataḥ

original: matsāmyāt svātmānaṃ matsamam avalokayan sa nādarśanam upayāti // BhGR_6.30 //
analyzed: mad sāmyāt sva ātmānam mad samam avalokayan sa nā adarśanam upayāti

original: tato 'pi vipākadaśām āha
analyzed: tatas api vipāka daśām āha

original: sarvabhūtasthitaṃ yo mām bhajaty ekatvam āsthitaḥ /
analyzed: sarva bhūta sthitam yaḥ mām bhajati eka tvam āsthitaḥ

original: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi sa yogī mayi vartate // BhG_6.31 //
analyzed: sarvathā vartamānaḥ api sa yogī mayi vartate

original: yogadaśāyāṃ sarvabhūtasthitaṃ mām asaṃkucitajñānaikākāratayā ekatvam āsthitaḥ prākṛtabhedaparityāgena sudṛḍhaṃ yo bhajate,
analyzed: yoga daśāyām sarva bhūta sthitam mām asaṃkucita jñāna eka ākāra tayā ekatvam āsthitaḥ prākṛta bheda parityāgena su dṛḍham yaḥ bhajate

original: sa yogī vyutthānakāle 'pi yathā tathā vartamānaḥ svātmānaṃ sarvabhūtāni ca paśyan mayi vartate mām eva paśyati /
analyzed: sa yogī vyutthāna kāle api yathā tathā vartamānaḥ sva ātmānam sarva bhūtāni ca paśyan mayi vartate mām eva paśyati

original: svātmani sarvabhūteṣu ca sarvadā matsāmyam eva paśyatītyarthaḥ // BhGR_6.31 //
analyzed: sva ātmani sarva bhūteṣu ca sarvadā mad sāmyam eva paśyati iti arthaḥ

original: tato 'pi kāṣṭhām āha
analyzed: tatas api kāṣṭhām āha

original: ātmāupamyena sarvatra samaṃ paśyati yo 'rjuna /
analyzed: ātma aupamyena sarvatra samam paśyati yaḥ arjuna

original: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ // BhG_6.32 //
analyzed: sukham vā yadi vā duḥkham sa yogī paramaḥ mataḥ

original: svātmanaś cānyeṣāṃ cātmanām asaṃkucitajñānaikākāratayopamyena svātmani cānyeṣu ca
analyzed: sva ātmanaḥ ca anyeṣām ca ātmanām asaṃkucita jñāna eka ākāra tayā upamyena sva ātmani ca anyeṣu ca

original: sarvatra vartamānaṃ putrajanmādirūpaṃ sukhaṃ tanmaraṇādirūpaṃ ca duḥkham asaṃbandhasāmyāt
analyzed: sarvatra vartamānam putra janma ādi rūpam sukham tad maraṇa ādi rūpam ca duḥkham asaṃbandha sāmyāt

original: samaṃ yaḥ paśyati paraputrajanmamaraṇādisamaṃ svaputrajanmamaraṇādikaṃ yaḥ paśyatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: samam yaḥ paśyati para putra janma maraṇa ādi samam sva putra janma maraṇa ādikam yaḥ paśyati iti arthaḥ

original: sa yogī paramo mataḥ yogakāṣṭhām gato mataḥ // BhGR_6.32 //
analyzed: sa yogī paramaḥ mataḥ yogakāṣṭhām gataḥ mataḥ

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena ṃadhusūdana /
analyzed: yaḥ ayam yogaḥ tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena nadhusūdana

original: etasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi cañcalatvāt sthitiṃ sthirām // BhG_6.33 //
analyzed: etasya aham na paśyāmi cañcala tvāt sthitim sthirām

original: cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavad dṛḍham /
analyzed: cañcalam hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavat dṛḍham

original: tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye vāyor iva suduṣkaram // BhG_6.34 //
analyzed: tasya aham nigraham manye vāyoḥ iva su duṣkaram

original: yo 'yaṃ devamanuṣyādibhedena jīveśvarabhedena cātyatabhinnatayaitāvantaṃ kālam anubhūteṣu
analyzed: yaḥ ayam deva manuṣya ādi bhedena jīva īśvara bhedena ca atyata bhinna tayā etāvantam kālam anubhūteṣu

original: sarveṣv ātmasu jñānaikākāratayā parasparasāmyena akarmavaśyatayā ceśvarasāmyena sarvatra
analyzed: sarveṣu ātmasu jñāna eka ākāra tayā paraspara sāmyena akarma vaśya tayā ca īśvara sāmyena sarvatra

original: samadarśanarūpo yogas tvayā proktaḥ,
analyzed: sama darśana rūpaḥ yogaḥ tvayā proktaḥ

original: etasya yogasya sthirāṃ sthitiṃ na paśyāmi,
analyzed: etasya yogasya sthirām sthitim na paśyāmi

original: manasaś cañcalatvāt /
analyzed: manasaḥ cañcala tvāt

original: tathā anavaratābhyastaviṣayeṣv api svata eva cañcalaṃ puruṣeṇaikatrāvasthāpayitum aśakyaṃ manaḥ puruṣaṃ balāt pramathya dṛḍham anyatra carati;
analyzed: tathā anavarata abhyasta viṣayeṣu api svatas eva cañcalam puruṣeṇa ekatra avasthāpayitum aśakyam manaḥ puruṣam balāt pramathya dṛḍham anyatra carati

original: tasya svābhyastaviṣayeṣv api cañcalasvabhāvasya manasas tadviparītākārātmani sthāpayituṃ nigrahaṃ pratikūlagater mahāvātasya vyajanādinaiva  #
analyzed: tasya sva abhyasta viṣayeṣu api cañcala svabhāvasya manasaḥ tad viparīta ākāra ātmani sthāpayitum nigraham pratikūla gateḥ mahā vātasya vyajana ādinā eva

original: suduṣkaram ahaṃ manye /
analyzed: su duṣkaram aham manye

original: manonigrahopāyo vaktavya ityabhiprāyaḥ // BhGR_6.33 //34//
analyzed: manaḥ nigraha upāyaḥ vaktavyaḥ iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: asaṃśayaṃ mahābāho mano durnigrahaṃ calam /
analyzed: asaṃśayam mahā bāho manaḥ durnigraham calam

original: abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate // BhG_6.35 //
analyzed: abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate

original: asaṃyatātmanā yogo duṣprāpa iti me matiḥ /
analyzed: asaṃyata ātmanā yogaḥ duṣprāpaḥ iti me matiḥ

original: vaśyātmanā tu yatatā śakyo 'vāptum upāyataḥ // BhG_6.36 //
analyzed: vaśya ātmanā tu yatatā śakyaḥ avāptum upāyataḥ

original: calasvabhāvatayā mano durnigraham evety atra na saṃśayaḥ;
analyzed: cala svabhāva tayā manaḥ durnigraham evā iti atra na saṃśayaḥ

original: tathā +apy ātmano guṇākaratvābhyāsajanitābhimukhyena ātmavyatirikteṣu doṣākaratvajanitavaitṛṣṇyena ca kathaṃcid gṛhyate;
analyzed: tathā api ātmanaḥ guṇa ākara tva abhyāsa janita ābhimukhyena ātma vyatirikteṣu doṣa ākara tva janita vaitṛṣṇyena ca kathaṃcid gṛhyate

original: asaṃyatātmanā ajitamanasā mahatāpi balena yogo duṣprāpa ea /
analyzed: a saṃyata ātmanā a jita manasā mahatā api balena yogaḥ duṣprāpaḥ

original: upāyatas tu vaśyātmanā pūrvoktena madārādhanarūpeṇāntargatajñānena karmaṇā jitamanasā yatamānenāyam eva samadarśanarūpo yogo 'vāptuṃ śakyaḥ
analyzed: upāyatas tu vaśya ātmanā pūrva uktena mad ārādhana rūpeṇa antargata jñānena karmaṇā jita manasā yatamānena ayam eva samadarśana rūpaḥ yogaḥ avāptum śakyaḥ

original: atha “nehābhikramanāśo 'sti” iti ādāv eva śrutaṃ yogamāhātmyaṃ yathāvacchrotum arjunaḥ pṛcchati /
analyzed: atha na iha abhikrama nāśaḥ asti iti ādau eva śrutam yoga māhātmyam yathāvat śrotum arjunaḥ pṛcchati

original: antargatātmajñānatayā yogaśiraskatayā ca hi karmayogasya māhātmyaṃ tatroditam;
analyzed: antargata ātma jñāna tayā yoga śiraska tayā ca hi karmayogasya māhātmyam tatra uditam

original: tac ca yogamāhātmyam eva /
analyzed: tat ca yoga māhātmyam eva

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: ayatiḥ śraddhayopeto yogāc calitamānasaḥ /
analyzed: ayatiḥ śraddhayā upetaḥ yogāt calita mānasaḥ

original: aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati // BhG_6.37 //
analyzed: a prāpya yoga saṃsiddhim kām gatim kṛṣṇa gacchati

original: kaccin nobhayavibhraṣṭaś chinnābhram iva naśyati /
analyzed: kaccit nā ubhaya vibhraṣṭaḥ chinna abhram iva naśyati

original: apratiṣṭho mahābāho vimūḍho brahmaṇaḥ pathi // BhG_6.38 //
analyzed: apratiṣṭhaḥ mahā bāho vimūḍhaḥ brahmaṇaḥ pathi

original: etaṃ me saṃśayaṃ kṛṣṇa cchetum arhasy aśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: etam me saṃśayam kṛṣṇa chetum arhasi aśeṣatas

original: tvadanyaḥ saṃśayasyāsya cchettā na hy upapadyate // BhG_6.39 //
analyzed: tvat anyaḥ saṃśayasya asya chettā na hi upapadyate

original: śraddhayā yoge pravṛtto dṛḍhatarābhyāsarūpayatanavaikalyena yogasaṃsiddhim aprāpya yogāc calitamānasaḥ kāṃ gatiṃ gacchati;
analyzed: śraddhayā yoge pravṛttaḥ dṛḍhatara abhyāsa rūpa yatana vaikalyena yoga saṃsiddhim a prāpya yogāt calita mānasaḥ kām gatim gacchati

original: ubhayavibhraṣṭo 'yaṃ cchinnābhram iva kaccin na naśyati?
analyzed: ubhaya vibhraṣṭaḥ ayam chinna abhram iva kaccit na naśyati

original: yathā meghaśakalaḥ pūrvasmād bṛhato meghāc chinnaḥ paraṃ bṛhantaṃ megham aprāpya madhye vinaṣṭo bhavati,
analyzed: yathā megha śakalaḥ pūrvasmāt bṛhataḥ meghāt chinnaḥ param bṛhantam megham a prāpya madhye vinaṣṭaḥ bhavati

original: tathaiva kaccin na naśyati /
analyzed: tathā eva kaccit na naśyati

original: katham ubhayavibhraṣṭatā?
analyzed: katham ubhaya vibhraṣṭa tā

original: apratiṣṭhaḥ,
analyzed: apratiṣṭhaḥ

original: vimūḍho brahmaṇaḥ pathīti /
analyzed: vimūḍhaḥ brahmaṇaḥ pathi iti

original: yathāvasthitaṃ svargādisādhanabhūtaṃ karma phalābhisandhirahitasyāsya puruṣasya svaphalasādhanatvena pratiṣṭhā na bhavatīty apratiṣṭhaḥ /
analyzed: yathā avasthitam svarga ādi sādhana bhūtam karma phala abhisandhi rahitasya asya puruṣasya sva phala sādhana tvena pratiṣṭhā na bhavati iti apratiṣṭhaḥ

original: prakrānte brahmaṇaḥ pathi vimūḍhaḥ tasmāt pathaḥ pracyutaḥ /
analyzed: prakrānte brahmaṇaḥ pathi vimūḍhaḥ tasmāt pathaḥ pracyutaḥ

original: ataḥ ubhayavibhraṣṭatayā kim ayaṃ naśyaty eva,
analyzed: atas ubhaya vibhraṣṭa tayā kim ayam naśyati eva

original: uta na naśyati?
analyzed: uta na naśyati

original: tam enaṃ saṃśayam aśeṣataś chettum arhasi /
analyzed: tam enam saṃśayam aśeṣatas chettum arhasi

original: svataḥ pratyakṣeṇa yugapat sarvaṃ sadā paśyatas tvatto 'nyaḥ saṃśayasyāsya
analyzed: svatas pratyakṣeṇa yugapad sarvam sadā paśyataḥ tvattaḥ anyaḥ saṃśayasya asya

original: chettā na hy upapadyate //
analyzed: chettā na hi upapadyate

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya vidyate /
analyzed: pārtha na evā iha na amutra vināśaḥ tasya vidyate

original: na hi kalyāṇakṛt kaścid durgatiṃ tāta gacchati // BhG_6.40 //
analyzed: na hi kalyāṇa kṛt kaścid durgatim tāta gacchati

original: śraddhayā yoge prakrāntasya tasmāt pracyutasyeha cāmutra ca vināśo na vidyate prākṛtasvargādibhogānubhave
analyzed: śraddhayā yoge prakrāntasya tasmāt pracyutasya iha ca amutra ca vināśaḥ na vidyate prākṛta svarga ādi bhoga anubhave

original: brahmānubhave cābhilaṣitān avāptirūpaḥ pratyavāyākhyāniṣṭāvāptirūpaś ca vināśo na vidyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: brahma anubhave ca abhilaṣitān avāpti rūpaḥ pratyavāya ākhya aniṣṭa avāpti rūpaḥ ca vināśaḥ na vidyate iti arthaḥ

original: na hi niratiśayakalyāṇarūpayogakṛt kaścit kālatraye 'pi durgatiṃ gacchati // BhGR_6.40 //
analyzed: na hi niratiśaya kalyāṇa rūpa yoga kṛt kaścid kāla traye api durgatim gacchati

original: katham ayaṃ bhaviṣyatīty atrāha
analyzed: katham ayam bhaviṣyati iti atra āha

original: prāpya puṇyakṛtāṃ lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ /
