analyzed: prāpya puṇya kṛtām lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ

original: śucīnāṃ śrīmatāṃ gehe yogabhraṣṭo 'bhijāyate // BhG_6.41 //
analyzed: śucīnām śrīmatām gehe yoga bhraṣṭaḥ abhijāyate

original: yajjātīyabhogābhikāṅkṣayā yogāt pracyuto 'yam,
analyzed: yad jātīya bhoga abhikāṅkṣayā yogāt pracyutaḥ ayam

original: atipuṇyakṛtāṃ prāpyān lokān prāpya tajjātīyān atikalyāṇān bhogān yogamāhātmyād eva
analyzed: ati puṇya kṛtām prāpyān lokān prāpya tad jātīyān ati kalyāṇān bhogān yoga māhātmyāt eva

original: bhuñjāno yāvat tadbhogatṛṣṇāvasānaṃ śaśvatīḥ samās tatroṣitvā tasmin bhoge vitṛṣṇaḥ
analyzed: bhuñjānaḥ yāvat tad bhoga tṛṣṇā avasānam śaśvatīḥ samāḥ tatra uṣitvā tasmin bhoge vitṛṣṇaḥ

original: śucīnāṃ śrīmatām yogopakramayogyānāṃ kule yogopakrame bhraṣṭo yogamāhātmyāj jāyate // BhGR_6.41 //
analyzed: śucīnām śrīmatām yoga upakrama yogyānām kule yoga upakrame bhraṣṭaḥ yoga māhātmyāt jāyate

original: atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām /
analyzed: atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām

original: etad dhi durlabhataraṃ loke janma yadīdṛśam // BhG_6.42 //
analyzed: etat hi durlabhataram loke janma yat īdṛśam

original: paripakvayogaś calitaś cet,
analyzed: paripakva yogaḥ calitaḥ ced

original: yogināṃ dhīmatāṃ yogaṃ kurvatāṃ svayam eva yogopadeśakṣamāṇāṃ mahatāṃ kule bhavati;
analyzed: yoginām dhīmatām yogam kurvatām svayam eva yoga upadeśa kṣamāṇām mahatām kule bhavati

original: tad etad ubhayavidhaṃ yogayogyānāṃ yogināṃ ca kule janma loke prākṛtānāṃ durlabhataram /
analyzed: tat etat ubhayavidham yoga yogyānām yoginām ca kule janma loke prākṛtānām durlabhataram

original: etat tu yogamāhātmyakṛtam // BhGR_6.42 //
analyzed: etat tu yoga māhātmya kṛtam

original: tatra taṃ buddhisaṃyogaṃ labhate paurvadaihikam /
analyzed: tatra tam buddhi saṃyogam labhate paurvadaihikam

original: yatate ca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau kurunandana // BhG_6.43 //
analyzed: yatate ca tatas bhūyas saṃsiddhau kuru nandana

original: pūrvābhyāsena tenaiva hriyate hy avaśo 'pi saḥ /
analyzed: pūrva abhyāsena tena eva hriyate hi avaśaḥ api saḥ

original: tatra janmani paurvadaihikaṃ tam eva yogaviṣayaṃ buddhisaṃyogaṃ labhate /
analyzed: tatra janmani paurvadaihikam tam eva yoga viṣayam buddhi saṃyogam labhate

original: tataḥ suptaprabuddhavad bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau yatate yathā nāntarāyahato bhavati,
analyzed: tatas supta prabuddha vat bhūyas saṃsiddhau yatate yathā na antarāya hataḥ bhavati

original: tathā yatate /
analyzed: tathā yatate

original: tena pūrvābhyāsena pūrveṇa yogaviṣyeṇābhyāsena saḥ yogabhraṣṭo hy avaśo 'pi yoga eva hriyate /
analyzed: tena pūrva abhyāsena pūrveṇa yoga viṣyeṇa abhyāsena saḥ yoga bhraṣṭaḥ hi avaśaḥ api yoge eva hriyate

original: prasiddhaṃ hy etad yogamāhātmyam ityarthaḥ // BhGR_6.43 //
analyzed: prasiddham hi etat yoga māhātmyam iti arthaḥ

original: jijñāsur api yogasya śabdabrahmātivartate // BhG_6.44 //
analyzed: jijñāsuḥ api yogasya śabdabrahma ativartate

original: apravṛttayogo yoge jijñāsur api tataś calitamānasaḥ punar api tām eva jijñāsāṃ prāpya karmayogādikaṃ yogam anuṣṭhāya śabdabrahmātivartate /
analyzed: apravṛtta yogaḥ yoge jijñāsuḥ api tatas calita mānasaḥ punar api tām eva jijñāsām prāpya karmayoga ādikam yogam anuṣṭhāya śabdabrahma ativartate

original: śabdabrahma devamanuṣyapṛthivyantarikṣasvargādiśabdābhilāpayogyaṃ brahma prakṛtiḥ /
analyzed: śabdabrahma deva manuṣya pṛthivī antarikṣa svarga ādi śabda abhilāpa yogyam brahma prakṛtiḥ

original: prakṛtibandhād vimukto devamanuṣyādiśabdābhilāpānarhaṃ jñānānandaikatānam ātmānaṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_6.44 //
analyzed: prakṛti bandhāt vimuktaḥ deva manuṣya ādi śabda abhilāpa anarham jñāna ānanda ekatānam ātmānam prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: prayatnād yatamānas tu yogī saṃśuddhakilbiṣaḥ /
analyzed: prayatnāt yatamānaḥ tu yogī saṃśuddha kilbiṣaḥ

original: anekajanmasaṃsiddhas tato yāti parāṃ gatim // BhG_6.45 //
analyzed: aneka janma saṃsiddhaḥ tatas yāti parām gatim

original: yata evaṃ yogamāhātmyam,
analyzed: yatas evam yoga māhātmyam

original: tataḥ anekajanmārjitapuṇyasañcayaiḥ saṃśuddhakilbiṣas saṃsiddhiḥ saṃjātaḥ prayatnād yatamānas tu yogī calito 'pi punaḥ parāṃ gatiṃ yāty eva
analyzed: tatas aneka janma arjita puṇya sañcayaiḥ saṃśuddha kilbiṣaḥ saṃsiddhiḥ saṃjātaḥ prayatnāt yatamānaḥ tu yogī calitaḥ api punar parām gatim yāti eva

original: atiśayitapuruṣārthaniṣṭhatayā yoginaḥ sarvasmād ādhikyam āha
analyzed: atiśayita puruṣa artha niṣṭha tayā yoginaḥ sarvasmāt ādhikyam āha

original: tapasvibhyo 'dhiko yogī jñānibhyo 'pi mato 'dhikaḥ /
analyzed: tapasvibhyaḥ adhikaḥ yogī jñānibhyaḥ api mataḥ adhikaḥ

original: karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna // BhG_6.46 //
analyzed: karmibhyaḥ ca adhikaḥ yogī tasmāt yogī bhava arjuna

original: kevalatapobhir yaḥ puruṣārthaḥ sādhyate,
analyzed: kevala tapobhiḥ yaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ sādhyate

original: ātmajñānavyatiriktair jñānaiś ca yaḥ,
analyzed: ātma jñāna vyatiriktaiḥ jñānaiḥ ca yaḥ

original: yaś ca kevalair aśvamedhādibhiḥ karmabhiḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ ca kevalaiḥ aśvamedha ādibhiḥ karmabhiḥ

original: tebhyas sarvebhyo 'dhikapuruṣārthasādhanatvād yogasya,
analyzed: tebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ adhika puruṣa artha sādhana tvāt yogasya

original: tapasvibhyo jñānibhyaḥ karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna // BhGR_6.46 //
analyzed: tapasvibhyaḥ jñānibhyaḥ karmibhyaḥ ca adhikaḥ yogī tasmāt yogī bhava arjuna

original: tad evaṃ paravidyāṅgabhūtaṃ prajāpativākyoditaṃ pratyagātmadarśanam uktam;
analyzed: tat evam para vidyā aṅga bhūtam prajāpati vākya uditam pratyagātma darśanam uktam

original: atha paravidyāṃ prastauti
analyzed: atha paravidyām prastauti

original: yoginām api sarveṣāṃ madgatenāntarātmanā /
analyzed: yoginām api sarveṣām mad gatena antarātmanā

original: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ // BhG_6.47 //
analyzed: śraddhāvān bhajate yaḥ mām sa me yuktatamaḥ mataḥ

original: yoginām iti pañcamyarthe ṣaṣṭhī /
analyzed: yoginām iti pañcamī arthe ṣaṣṭhī

original: “sarvabhūtastham ātmānam” ityādinā caturvidhā yoginaḥ pratipāditāḥ /
analyzed: sarva bhūta stham ātmānam ityādinā caturvidhāḥ yoginaḥ pratipāditāḥ

original: teṣv anantargatatvād vakṣyamāṇasya yoginaḥ na nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī saṃbhavati /
analyzed: teṣu an antargata tvāt vakṣyamāṇasya yoginaḥ na nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī saṃbhavati

original: api sarveṣām iti sarvaśabdanirdiṣṭās tapasviprabhṛtayaḥ /
analyzed: api sarveṣām iti sarva śabda nirdiṣṭāḥ tapasvi prabhṛtayaḥ

original: tatrāpy uktena nyāyena pañcamyartho grahītavyaḥ /
analyzed: tatra api uktena nyāyena pañcamī arthaḥ grahītavyaḥ

original: yogibhyaḥ, api sarvebhyo vakṣyamāṇo yogī yuktatamaḥ /
analyzed: yogibhyaḥ api sarvebhyaḥ vakṣyamāṇaḥ yogī yuktatamaḥ

original: tadapekṣayā avaratve tapasviprabhṛtīnāṃ yogināṃ ca na kaścidviśeṣa ityarthaḥ;
analyzed: tad apekṣayā avara tve tapasvi prabhṛtīnām yoginām ca na kaścid viśeṣaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: mervapekṣayā sarṣapāṇām iva /
analyzed: meru apekṣayā sarṣapāṇām iva

original: yady api sarṣapeṣu anyonyanyūnādhikabhāvo vidyate tathāpi mervapekṣayā avaratvanirdeśaḥ samānaḥ /

original: aspṛṣṭāśeṣadoṣānavadhikātiśayajñānabalāiśvaryavīryaśaktitejaḥprabhṛtyasaṅkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇanidhim,
analyzed: a spṛṣṭa aśeṣa doṣa anavadhika atiśaya jñāna bala aiśvarya vīrya śakti tejaḥ prabhṛti asaṅkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa nidhim

original: svābhimatānurūpaikarūpācintyadivyādbhutanityaniravadyaniratiśayāujjvalyasaundaryasaugandhyasaukumāryalāvaṇyayauvanādyanantaguṇanidhidivyarūpam,
analyzed: sva abhimata anurūpa eka rūpa acintya divya adbhuta nitya niravadya niratiśaya aujjvalya saundarya saugandhya saukumārya lāvaṇya yauvana ādi ananta guṇa nidhi divya rūpam

āśritavātsalyaikajaladhim,

analyzed: upāste iti arthaḥ sa me yuktatamaḥ mataḥ sa sarvebhyaḥ śreṣṭatamaḥ iti sarvam sarvadā yathā avasthitam svatas eva sākṣātkurvan aham manye

analyzed: tat upāsanam vaktum tad aṅga bhūtam ātma jñāna pūrvaka karma anuṣṭhāna sādhyam prāptuḥ pratyagātmanaḥ

analyzed: yāthātmya dārśanam uktam

analyzed: kṣīyante ca asya karmāṇi tasmin dṛṣṭe parāvare ityādibhiḥ aikārthyāt smṛti santāna rūpam darśana samāna ākāram dhyāna upāsana śabda vācyam iti avagamyate

original: punaś ca, “nāyam ātmā pravacanena labhyo na medhayā na bahunā śrutena /

analyzed: yam eva eṣa vṛṇute tena labhyaḥ tasya eṣaḥ ātmā vivṛṇute tanūm svām iti viśeṣaṇāt pareṇa ātmanā

original: varaṇīyatāhetubhūtaṃ smaryamāṇātyarthapriyatvena svayam apy atyarthapriyarūpaṃ smṛtisantānam
analyzed: varaṇīya tā hetu bhūtam smaryamāṇa atyartha priya tvena svayam api atyartha priya rūpam smṛti santānam

original: tad eva hi bhaktir ity ucyate,

original: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidho 'rjuna /

original: tatra saptame tāvad upāsyabhūtaparamapuruṣayāthātmyaṃ prakṛtyā tattirodhānaṃ tannivṛttaye bhagavatprapattiḥ,

jñāninaś śraiṣṭhyaṃ cocyate //
analyzed: jñāninaḥ śraiṣṭhyam ca ucyate

analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

analyzed: asaṃśayam samagram mām yathā jñāsyasi tat śṛṇu

original: mayy ābhimukhyena asaktamanāḥ matpriyatvātirekeṇa matsvarūpeṇa guṇaiś ca ceṣṭitena
analyzed: mayi ābhimukhyena asakta manāḥ mad priya tva atirekeṇa mad svarūpeṇa guṇaiḥ ca ceṣṭitena

analyzed: mad vibhūtyā viśleṣe sati tad kṣaṇāt eva viśīryamāṇa sva rūpa tayā mayi su gāḍham baddha manāḥ

analyzed: tathā mad aśrayaḥ svayam ca mayā vinā viśīryamāṇa tayā mad āśrayaḥ mad ekādhāraḥ

analyzed: mad yogam yuñjan yoktum pravṛttaḥ yoga viṣaya bhūtam mām asaṃśayam nissaṃśayam

analyzed: samagram sakalam yathā jñāsyasi jñānena uktena jñāsyasi

analyzed: tat jñānam avahita manāḥ tvam śṛṇu

original: yaj jñātvā neha bhūyo 'nyaj jñātavyam avaśiṣyate // BhG_7.2 //
analyzed: yat jñātvā na iha bhūyas anyat jñātavyam avaśiṣyate

analyzed: aham te mad viṣayam idam jñānam vijñānena saha aśeṣatas

original: vijñānan viviktākāraviṣayaṃ jñānam /

original: yathāhaṃ madvyatiriktāt samastacidacidvastujātān nikhilaheyapratyanīkatayā nānāvidhānavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇānantamahāvibhūtitayā  #
analyzed: yathā aham mad vyatiriktāt samasta cit acit vastu jātāt nikhila heya pratyanīka tayā nānāvidha anavadhika atiśaya asaṃkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa ananta mahā vibhūti tayā

original: ca viviktaḥ,
analyzed: ca viviktaḥ

original: tena viviktaviṣayajñānena saha matsvarūpaviṣayajñānaṃ vakṣyāmi /

original: kiṃ bahunā; yad jñānaṃ jñātvā
analyzed: kim bahunā yat jñānam jñātvā

analyzed: vakṣyamāṇasya jñānasya duṣprāpa tām āha

analyzed: manuṣyāṇām sahasreṣu kaścid yatati siddhaye

analyzed: yatatām api siddhānām kaścid mām vetti tattvataḥ

original: manuṣyāḥ śāstrādhikārayogyāḥ /
analyzed: manuṣyāḥ śāstra adhikāra yogyāḥ

original: teṣāṃ sahasreṣu kaścid eva siddhiparyantaṃ yatate /
analyzed: teṣām sahasreṣu kaścid eva siddhi paryantam yatate

original: siddhiparyantaṃ yatamānānāṃ sahasreṣu kaścid eva māṃ viditvā mattas siddhaye yatate /
analyzed: siddhi paryantam yatamānānām sahasreṣu kaścid eva mām viditvā mattaḥ siddhaye yatate

original: madvidāṃ sahasreṣu kaścid eva tattvataḥ yathāvasthitaṃ māṃ vetti /
analyzed: mad vidām sahasreṣu kaścid eva tattvataḥ yathā avasthitam mām vetti

original: na kaścid ityabhiprāyaḥ;
analyzed: na kaścid iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: “sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ“,
analyzed: sa mahātmā su durlabhaḥ

original: “māṃ tu veda na kaścana” iti hi vakṣyate // BhGR_7.3 //
analyzed: mām tu veda na kaścana iti hi vakṣyate

original: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca /
analyzed: bhūmiḥ āpaḥ analaḥ vāyuḥ kham manaḥ buddhiḥ eva ca

original: ahaṅkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā // BhG_7.4 //
analyzed: ahaṅkāraḥ iti iyam me bhinnā prakṛtiḥ aṣṭadhā

original: asya vicitrānantabhogyabhogopakaraṇabhogasthānarūpeṇāvasthitasya jagataḥ prakṛtir
analyzed: asya vicitra ananta bhogya bhoga upakaraṇa bhoga sthāna rūpeṇa avasthitasya jagataḥ prakṛtiḥ

original: iyaṃ gandhādiguṇakapṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśādirūpeṇa manaḥprabhṛtīndriyarūpeṇa mahadahaṃkārarūpeṇa
analyzed: iyam gandha ādi guṇaka pṛthivī ap tejaḥ vāyu ākāśa ādi rūpeṇa manaḥ prabhṛti indriya rūpeṇa mahat ahaṃkāra rūpeṇa

original: cāṣṭadhā bhinnā madīyeti viddhi // BhGR_7.4 //
analyzed: ca aṣṭadhā bhinnā madīyā iti viddhi

original: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām /
analyzed: aparā iyam itas tu anyām prakṛtim viddhi me parām

original: jīvabhūtāṃ mahābāho yayedaṃ dhāryate jagat // BhG_7.5 //
analyzed: jīva bhūtām mahā bāho yayā idam dhāryate jagat

original: iyaṃ mamāparā prakṛtiḥ;
analyzed: iyam mama aparā prakṛtiḥ

original: itas tv anyām ito 'cetanāyāś cetanabhogyabhūtāyāḥ prakṛter visajātīyākārāṃ jīvabhūtāṃ parāṃ tasyāḥ bhoktṛtvena pradhānabhūtāṃ cetanarūpāṃ madīyāṃ  #
analyzed: itas tu anyām itas acetanāyāḥ cetana bhogya bhūtāyāḥ prakṛteḥ visajātīya ākārām jīva bhūtām parām tasyāḥ bhoktṛ tvena pradhāna bhūtām cetana rūpām madīyām

original: prakṛtiṃ viddhi;
analyzed: prakṛtim viddhi

original: yayedam acetanaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagad dhāryate // BhGR_7.5 //
analyzed: yayā idam acetanam kṛtsnam jagat dhāryate

original: etadyonīni bhūtāni sarvāṇīty upadhāraya /
analyzed: etad yonīni bhūtāni sarvāṇi iti upadhāraya

original: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā // BhG_7.6 //
analyzed: aham kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ tathā

original: etadcetanācetanasamaṣṭirūpamadīyaprakṛtidvayayonīni brahmādistambaparyantāni uccāvacabhāvenāvasthitāni cidacinmiśrāṇi madīyāni sarvāṇi bhūtānīty  #
analyzed: etat cetana acetana samaṣṭi rūpa madīya prakṛti dvaya yonīni brahma ādi stamba paryantāni uccāvaca bhāvena avasthitāni cit acit miśrāṇi madīyāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni iti

original: upadhāraya /
analyzed: upadhāraya

original: madīyaprakṛtidvayayonīni hi tāni madīyāny eva /
analyzed: madīya prakṛti dvaya yonīni hi tāni madīyāni eva

original: tathā prakṛtidvayayonitvena kṛtsnasya jagataḥ,
analyzed: tathā prakṛti dvaya yoni tvena kṛtsnasya jagataḥ

original: tayor dvayor api madyonitvena madīyatvena ca,
analyzed: tayoḥ dvayoḥ api mad yoni tvena madīya tvena ca

original: kṛtsnasya jagataḥ aham eva prabhavo 'ham eva ca pralayo 'ham eva ca śeṣīty upadhāraya /
analyzed: kṛtsnasya jagataḥ aham eva prabhavaḥ aham eva ca pralayaḥ aham eva ca śeṣī iti upadhāraya

original: tayoḥ cidacitsamaṣṭibhūtayoḥ prakṛtipuruṣayor api paramapuruṣayonitvaṃ śrutismṛtisiddham /
analyzed: tayoḥ cit acit samaṣṭi bhūtayoḥ prakṛti puruṣayoḥ api parama puruṣa yoni tvam śruti smṛti siddham

original: “mahān avyakte līyate /
analyzed: mahān avyakte līyate

original: avyaktam akṣare līyate /
analyzed: avyaktam akṣare līyate

original: akṣaraṃ tamasi līyate /
analyzed: akṣaram tamasi līyate

original: tamaḥ pare deva ekībhavati“,
analyzed: tamaḥ pare devaḥ ekībhavati

original: “viṣṇos svarūpāt paratodite dve rūpe prdhānaṃ puruṣaś ca vipra“,
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ sva rūpāt paratas udite dve rūpe prdhānam puruṣaḥ ca vipra

original: “prakṛtir yā mayākhyātā vyaktāvyaktasvarūpiṇī /
analyzed: prakṛtiḥ yā mayā ākhyātā vyakta avyakta svarūpiṇī

original: puruṣaś cāpy ubhāv etau līyate paramātmani /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ ca api ubhau etau līyate paramātmani

original: paramātmā ca sarveṣām ādhāraḥ parameśvaraḥ /
analyzed: paramātmā ca sarveṣām ādhāraḥ parameśvaraḥ

original: viṣṇunāmā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate //
analyzed: viṣṇu nāmā sa vedeṣu vedānteṣu ca gīyate

original: BhGR_1.” ityādikā hi śrutismṛtayaḥ //76//
analyzed: ityādikāḥ hi śruti smṛtayaḥ

original: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiñcid asti dhanañjaya /
analyzed: mattaḥ parataram na anyat kiñcid asti dhanañjaya

original: yathā sarvakāraṇasyāpi prakṛtidvayasya kāraṇatvena,
analyzed: yathā sarva kāraṇasya api prakṛti dvayasya kāraṇa tvena

original: sarvācetanavastuśeṣiṇaś cetanasyāpi śeṣitvena kāraṇatayā śeṣitayā cāhaṃ parataraḥ tathā jñānaśaktibalādiguṇayogena cāham eva parataraḥ /
analyzed: sarva acetana vastu śeṣiṇaḥ cetanasya api śeṣi tvena kāraṇa tayā śeṣi tayā ca aham parataraḥ tathā jñāna śakti bala ādi guṇa yogena ca aham eva parataraḥ

original: matto 'nyan madvyatiriktaṃ jñānabalādiguṇāntarayogi kiṃcid api parataraṃ nāsti //
analyzed: mattaḥ anyat mad vyatiriktam jñāna bala ādi guṇa antara yogi kiṃcid api parataram nā asti

original: mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva // BhG_7.7 //
analyzed: mayi sarvam idam protam sūtre maṇi gaṇāḥ iva

original: sarvam idaṃ cidacidvastujātaṃ kāryāvasthaṃ kāraṇāvasthaṃ ca maccharīrabhūtaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇavad atmatayāvasthite mayi protam āśritam /
analyzed: sarvam idam cit acit vastu jātam kārya avastham kāraṇa avastham ca mad śarīra bhūtam sūtre maṇi gaṇa vat atma tayā avasthite mayi protam āśritam

original: “yasya pṛthivī śarīram“,
analyzed: yasya pṛthivī śarīram

original: “yasyātmā śarīram“,
analyzed: yasya ātmā śarīram

original: “eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmāpahatapāpmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇaḥ” iti,
analyzed: eṣa sarva bhūta antarātmā apahata pāpmā divyaḥ devaḥ ekaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ iti

original: ātmaśarīrabhāvenāvasthānaṃ ca jagadbrahmaṇor antaryāmibrāhmaṇādiṣu siddham // BhGR_7.7 //
analyzed: ātma śarīra bhāvena avasthānam ca jagat brahmaṇoḥ antaryāmi brāhmaṇa ādiṣu siddham

original: ataḥ sarvasya paramapuruṣaśarīratvenātmabhūtaparamapuruṣaprakārarvāt sarvaprakāraḥ paramapuruṣa evāvasthita iti sarvaiś śabdais tasyaivābhidhānam  #
analyzed: atas sarvasya paramapuruṣa śarīra tvena ātma bhūta paramapuruṣa prakāra rvāt sarva prakāraḥ paramapuruṣaḥ eva avasthitaḥ iti sarvaiḥ śabdaiḥ tasya eva abhidhānam

original: iti tat tat sāmānādhikaraṇyena āha
analyzed: iti tat tat sāmānādhikaraṇyena āha

original: raso 'ham apsu kaunteya prabhāsmi śaśisūryayoḥ /
analyzed: rasaḥ aham apsu kaunteya prabhā asmi śaśi sūryayoḥ

original: praṇavas sarvavedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu // BhG_7.8 //
analyzed: praṇavaḥ sarva vedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣam nṛṣu

original: puṇyo gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaś cāsmi vibhāvasau /
analyzed: puṇyaḥ gandhaḥ pṛthivyām ca tejaḥ ca asmi vibhāvasau

original: jīvanaṃ sarvabhūteṣu tapaś cāsmi tapasviṣu // BhG_7.9 //
analyzed: jīvanam sarva bhūteṣu tapaḥ ca asmi tapasviṣu

original: bījaṃ māṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viddhi pārtha sanātanam /
analyzed: bījam mām sarva bhūtānām viddhi pārtha sanātanam

original: buddhir buddhimatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham // BhG_7.10 //
analyzed: buddhiḥ buddhimatām asmi tejaḥ tejasvinām aham

original: balaṃ balavantāñ cāhaṃ kāmarāgavivarjitam /
analyzed: balam balavantām ca aham kāma rāga vivarjitam

original: dharmāviruddho bhūteṣu kāmo 'smi bharatarṣabha // BhG_7.11 //
analyzed: dharma aviruddhaḥ bhūteṣu kāmaḥ asmi bharata ṛṣabha

original: ete sarve vilakṣaṇā bhāvā matta evotpannāḥ,
analyzed: ete sarve vilakṣaṇāḥ bhāvāḥ mattaḥ eva utpannāḥ

original: maccheṣabhūtāḥ maccharīratayā mayy evāvasthitāḥ;
analyzed: mad śeṣa bhūtāḥ mad śarīra tayā mayi eva avasthitāḥ

original: atas tattatprakāro 'ham evāvathitaḥ // BhGR_7.8, 9,10,11 //
analyzed: atas tad tad prakāraḥ aham eva avathitaḥ

original: ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye /
analyzed: ye ca eva sāttvikāḥ bhāvāḥ rājasāḥ tāmasāḥ ca ye

original: matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi // BhG_7.12 //
analyzed: mattaḥ evā iti tān viddhi na tu aham teṣu te mayi

original: kiṃ viśiṣya abhidhīyate?
analyzed: kim viśiṣya abhidhīyate

original: sāttvikā rājasās tāmasāś ca jagati dehatvenendriyatvena bhogyatvena tattaddhtetutvena cāvasthitā ye bhavāḥ,
analyzed: sāttvikāḥ rājasāḥ tāmasāḥ ca jagati deha tvena indriya tvena bhogya tvena ca avasthitāḥ ye bhavāḥ

original: tān sarvān matta evotpannān viddhi;
analyzed: tān sarvān mattaḥ eva utpannān viddhi

original: te maccharīratayā mayy evāvasthitā iti ca /
analyzed: te mad śarīra tayā mayi eva avasthitāḥ iti ca

original: na tv ahaṃ teṣu nāhaṃ kadācid api tadāyattasthitiḥ;
analyzed: na tu aham teṣu na aham kadācid api tad āyatta sthitiḥ

original: anyatrātmāyattasthititve 'pi śarīrasya,
analyzed: anyatra ātma āyatta sthiti tve api śarīrasya

original: śarīreṇātmanaḥ sthitāv apy upakāro vidyate;
analyzed: śarīreṇa ātmanaḥ sthitau api upakāraḥ vidyate

original: mama tu tair na kaścit tathāvidha upakāraḥ,
analyzed: mama tu taiḥ na kaścid tathāvidhaḥ upakāraḥ

original: kevalalīlaiva prayojanam ityarthaḥ // BhGR_7.12 //
analyzed: kevala līlā eva prayojanam iti arthaḥ

original: tribhir guṇamayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat /
analyzed: tribhiḥ guṇa mayaiḥ bhāvaiḥ ebhiḥ sarvam idam jagat

original: mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam // BhG_7.13 //
analyzed: mohitam na abhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam

original: tad evaṃ cetanācetanātmakaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagan madīyaṃ kāle kāle matta evotpadyate,
analyzed: tat evam cetana acetana ātmakam kṛtsnam jagat madīyam kāle kāle mattaḥ eva utpadyate

original: mayi ca pralīyate,
analyzed: mayi ca pralīyate

original: mayy evāvasthitam,
analyzed: mayi eva avasthitam

original: maccharīrabhūtam,
analyzed: mad śarīra bhūtam

original: madātmakaṃ cety aham eva kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ kāryāvathāyāṃ ca sarvaśarīratayā sarvaprakāro 'vasthitaḥ /
analyzed: mad ātmakam ca iti aham eva kāraṇa avasthāyām kārya avathāyām ca sarva śarīra tayā sarva prakāraḥ avasthitaḥ

original: ataḥ kāraṇatvena śeṣitvena ca jñānādyasaṅkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaiś cāham eva sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ parataraḥ,
analyzed: atas kāraṇa tvena śeṣi tvena ca jñāna ādi asaṅkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇaiḥ ca aham eva sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ parataraḥ

original: matto 'nyat kenāpi kalyāṇaguṇagaṇena parataraṃ na vidyate /
analyzed: mattaḥ anyat kena api kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇena parataram na vidyate

original: evaṃbhūtaṃ māṃ tribhyaḥ sāttvikarājasatāmasaguṇamayebhyo bhāvebhyaḥ paraṃ madasādhāraṇaiḥ kalyāṇaguṇagaṇais tattadbhogyatāprakāraiś ca param
analyzed: evaṃbhūtam mām tribhyaḥ sāttvika rājasa tāmasa guṇa mayebhyaḥ bhāvebhyaḥ param mad asādhāraṇaiḥ kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇaiḥ tad tad bhogya tā prakāraiḥ ca param

original: avyayaṃ sadaikarūpam api tair eva tribhir guṇamayair nihīnataraiḥ kṣaṇadhvaṃsibhiḥ
analyzed: avyayam sadā eka rūpam api taiḥ eva tribhiḥ guṇa mayaiḥ nihīnataraiḥ kṣaṇa dhvaṃsibhiḥ

original: pūrvakarmānuguṇadehendriyabhogyatvenāvasthitaiḥ padārthair mohitaṃ devatiryaṅmanuṣyasthāvarātmanāvasthitaṃ
analyzed: pūrva karma anuguṇa deha indriya bhogya tvena avasthitaiḥ padārthaiḥ mohitam deva tiryak manuṣya sthāvara ātmanā avasthitam

original: sarvam idaṃ jagan nābhijānāti // BhGR_7.13 //
analyzed: sarvam idam jagat na abhijānāti

original: kathaṃ svata evānavadhikātiśayānande nitye sadaikarūpe laukikavastubhogyatatprakāraiś
analyzed: katham svatas eva anavadhika atiśaya ānande nitye sadā ekarūpe laukika vastu bhogya tad prakāraiḥ

original: cotkṛṣṭatame tvayi sthite 'py atyantanihīneṣu guṇamayeṣv asthireṣu bhāveṣu sarvasya
analyzed: ca utkṛṣṭatame tvayi sthite api atyanta nihīneṣu guṇa mayeṣu asthireṣu bhāveṣu sarvasya

original: bhoktṛvargasya bhogyatvabuddhir upajāyata ity atrāha
analyzed: bhoktṛ vargasya bhogya tva buddhiḥ upajāyate iti atra āha

original: daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā /
analyzed: daivī hi eṣā guṇa mayī mama māyā duratyayā

original: mamaiṣā guṇamayī sattvarajastamomayī māyā yasmād daivī devena krīḍhāpravṛttena mayaiva nirmitā,
analyzed: mama eṣā guṇa mayī sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ mayī māyā yasmāt daivī devena krīḍha apravṛttena mayā eva nirmitā

original: tasmāt sarvair duratyayā duratikramā /
analyzed: tasmāt sarvaiḥ duratyayā duratikramā

original: asyāḥ māyāśabdavācyatvam āsurarākṣasāstrādīnām iva vicitrakāryakaratvena,
analyzed: asyāḥ māyā śabda vācya tvam āsura rākṣasa astra ādīnām iva vicitra kārya kara tvena

original: yathā ca “tato bhagavatā tasya rakṣārthaṃ cakram uttamam /
analyzed: yathā ca tatas bhagavatā tasya rakṣā artham cakram uttamam

original: ājagāma samājñaptaṃ jvālāmāli sudarśanam /
analyzed: ājagāma samājñaptam jvālā māli sudarśanam

original: tena māyāsahasraṃ tacchambarasyāśugāminā /
analyzed: tena māyā sahasram tat śambarasya āśu gāminā

original: bālasya rakṣatā deham aikāikaśyena sūditam” ity ādau /
analyzed: bālasya rakṣatā deham aikāikaśyena sūditam iti ādau

original: ato māyāśabdo na mithyārthavācī /
analyzed: atas māyā śabdaḥ na mithyā artha vācī

original: aindrajālikādiṣv api kenacin mantrāuṣadhādinā mithyārthaviṣayāyāḥ pāramārthikyā eva buddher utpādakatvena māyāvīti prayogaḥ /
analyzed: aindrajālika ādiṣu api kenacid mantra auṣadha ādinā mithyā artha viṣayāyāḥ pāramārthikyāḥ eva buddheḥ utpādaka tvena māyāvī iti prayogaḥ

original: tathā mantrāuṣadhādir eva tatra māyā;
analyzed: tathā mantra auṣadha ādiḥ eva tatra māyā

analyzed: sarva prayogeṣu anugatasya ekasya eva śabda artha tvāt

analyzed: tatra mithyā artheṣu māyā śabda prayogaḥ māyā kārya buddhi viṣaya tvena aupacārikaḥ

original: mañcāḥ krośantītivat /
analyzed: mañcāḥ krośanti itivat

original: eṣā guṇamayī pāramārthikī bhagavanmāyaiva,
analyzed: eṣā guṇa mayī pāramārthikī bhagavat māyā eva

original: “māyām tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu maheśvaram” ityādiṣv abhidhīyate /
analyzed: māyām tu prakṛtim vidyāt māyinam tu maheśvaram ityādiṣu abhidhīyate

original: asyāḥ kāryaṃ bhagavatsvarūpatirodhānam,
analyzed: asyāḥ kāryam bhagavat svarūpa tirodhānam

original: svasvarūpabhogyatvabuddhiś ca /
analyzed: sva svarūpa bhogya tva buddhiḥ ca

original: ato bhagavanmāyayā mohitaṃ sarvaṃ jagad bhagavantam anavadhikātiśayānandasvarūpaṃ nābhijānāti //
analyzed: atas bhagavat māyayā mohitam sarvam jagat bhagavantam anavadhika atiśaya ānanda svarūpam na abhijānāti

original: māyāvimocanopāyam āha
analyzed: māyā vimocana upāyam āha

original: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te // BhG_7.14cd //
analyzed: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etām taranti te

original: mām eva satyasaṅkalpaṃ paramakāruṇikam anālocitaviśeṣāśeṣalokaśaraṇyam ye śaraṇaṃ prapadyante,
analyzed: mām eva satya saṅkalpam parama kāruṇikam an ālocita viśeṣa aśeṣa loka śaraṇyam ye śaraṇam prapadyante

original: te etāṃ madīyāṃ guṇamayīṃ māyāṃ taranti māyām utsṛjya mām evopāsata ityarthaḥ // BhGR_7.14 //
analyzed: te etām madīyām guṇa mayīm māyām taranti māyām utsṛjya mām eva upāsate iti arthaḥ

original: kim iti bhagavadupāsanāpādinīṃ bhagavatprapattiṃ sarve na kurvata ity atrāha
analyzed: kim iti bhagavat upāsana āpādinīm bhagavat prapattim sarve na kurvate iti atra āha

original: na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamāḥ /
analyzed: na mām duṣkṛtinaḥ mūḍhāḥ prapadyante nara adhamāḥ

original: māyayāpahṛtajñānā āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥ // BhG_7.15 //
analyzed: māyayā apahṛta jñānāḥ āsuram bhāvam āśritāḥ

original: duṣkṛtinaḥ pāpakarmāṇaḥ māṃ na prapadyate /
analyzed: duṣkṛtinaḥ pāpa karmāṇaḥ mām na prapadyate

original: duṣkṛtatāratamyena te caturvidhā bhavanti mūḍhāḥ,
analyzed: duṣkṛta tāratamyena te caturvidhāḥ bhavanti mūḍhāḥ

original: narādhamāḥ,
analyzed: nara adhamāḥ

original: māyayāpahṛtajñānāḥ,
analyzed: māyayā apahṛta jñānāḥ

original: āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥ iti /
analyzed: āsuram bhāvam āśritāḥ iti

original: mūḍhāḥ viparītajñānāḥ;
analyzed: mūḍhāḥ viparīta jñānāḥ

original: pūrvoktaprakāreṇa bhagavaccheṣataikarasam ātmānaṃ bhogyajātaṃ ca svaśeṣatayā manyamānāḥ /
analyzed: pūrva ukta prakāreṇa bhagavat śeṣa tā eka rasam ātmānam bhogya jātam ca sva śeṣa tayā manyamānāḥ

original: narādhamāḥ sāmānyena jñāte 'pi matsvarūpe madaunmukhyānarhāḥ /
analyzed: nara adhamāḥ sāmānyena jñāte api mad sva rūpe mad aunmukhya anarhāḥ

original: māyayāpahṛtajñānāḥ madviṣayaṃ madaiśvaryaviṣayaṃ ca jñānaṃ yeṣāṃ tadasaṃbhāvanāpādinībhiḥ kūṭayuktibhir apahṛtam,
analyzed: māyayā apahṛta jñānāḥ mad viṣayam mad aiśvarya viṣayam ca jñānam yeṣām tad asaṃbhāvanā pādinībhiḥ kūṭa yuktibhiḥ apahṛtam

original: te tathā uktāḥ /
analyzed: te tathā uktāḥ

original: āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥ madviṣayaṃ madaiśvaryaviṣayaṃ ca jñānaṃ sudṛḍham upapannaṃ yeṣāṃ dvaiṣāyaiva bhavati;
analyzed: āsuram bhāvam āśritāḥ mad viṣayam mad aiśvarya viṣayam ca jñānam su dṛḍham upapannam yeṣām dvaiṣāya eva bhavati

original: te āsuraṃ bhāvam āśritāḥ /
analyzed: te āsuram bhāvam āśritāḥ

original: uttarottarāḥ pāpiṣṭhatamāḥ // BhGR_7.15 //
analyzed: uttara uttarāḥ pāpiṣṭhatamāḥ

original: caturvidhā bhajante mām janāḥ sukṛtino 'rjuna /
analyzed: caturvidhāḥ bhajante mām janāḥ sukṛtinaḥ arjuna

original: ārto jijñāsur arthārthī jñānī ca bharatarṣabha // BhG_7.16 //
analyzed: ārtaḥ jijñāsuḥ artha arthī jñānī ca bharata ṛṣabha

original: sukṛtinaḥ puṇyakarmāṇo māṃ śaraṇam upagamya mām eva bhajante /
analyzed: sukṛtinaḥ puṇya karmāṇaḥ mām śaraṇam upagamya mām eva bhajante

original: te ca sukṛtatāratamyena caturvidhāḥ,
analyzed: te ca sukṛta tāratamyena caturvidhāḥ

original: sukṛtagarīyastvena pratipattivaiśeṣyād uttarottarā adhikatamā bhavanti /
analyzed: sukṛta garīyaḥ tvena pratipatti vaiśeṣyāt uttarottarāḥ adhikatamāḥ bhavanti

original: ārtaḥ pratiṣṭhāhīnaḥ bhraṣṭāiśvaryaḥ punar tatprāptikāmaḥ /
analyzed: ārtaḥ pratiṣṭhā hīnaḥ bhraṣṭa aiśvaryaḥ punar tad prāpti kāmaḥ

original: arthārthī aprāptāiśvaryatayā aiśvaryakāmaḥ /
analyzed: artha arthī aprāpta aiśvarya tayā aiśvarya kāmaḥ

original: tayor mukhabhedamātram /
analyzed: tayoḥ mukha bheda mātram

original: aiśvaryaviṣayatayāikyād eka evādhikāraḥ /
analyzed: aiśvarya viṣaya tayā āikyāt ekaḥ eva adhikāraḥ

original: jijñāsuḥ prakṛtiviyuktātmasvarūpāvāptīcchuḥ /
analyzed: jijñāsuḥ prakṛti viyukta ātma svarūpa avāpti icchuḥ

original: jñānam evāsya svarūpam iti jijñāsur ity uktam /
analyzed: jñānam eva asya svarūpam iti jijñāsuḥ iti uktam

original: jñānī ca, “itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām” ityādinābhihitabhagavaccheṣataikarasātmasvarūpavit;
analyzed: jñānī ca itas tu anyām prakṛtim viddhi me parām ityādinā abhihita bhagavat śeṣa tā eka rasa ātma svarūpa vid

original: prakṛtiviyuktakevalātmani aparyavasyan bhagavantaṃ prepsuḥ bhagavantam eva paramaprāpyaṃ manvānaḥ // BhGR_7.16 //
analyzed: prakṛti viyukta kevala ātmani aparyavasyan bhagavantam prepsuḥ bhagavantam eva parama prāpyam manvānaḥ

original: teṣāṃ jñānī nityayuktaḥ ekabhaktir viśiṣyate /
analyzed: teṣām jñānī nitya yuktaḥ eka bhaktiḥ viśiṣyate

original: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ // BhG_7.17 //
analyzed: priyaḥ hi jñāninaḥ atyartham aham sa ca mama priyaḥ

original: teṣāṃ jñānī viśiṣyate /
analyzed: teṣām jñānī viśiṣyate

original: kutaḥ? nityayukta ekabhaktir iti ca / jñānino hi
analyzed: kutas nitya yuktaḥ eka bhaktiḥ iti ca jñāninaḥ hi

original: madekaprāpyasya mayā yogo nityaḥ;
analyzed: mad eka prāpyasya mayā yogaḥ nityaḥ

original: itarayos tu yāvatsvābhilaṣitaprāpti mayā yogaḥ /
analyzed: itarayoḥ tu yāvat sva abhilaṣita prāpti mayā yogaḥ

original: tathā jñānino mayy ekasminn eva bhaktiḥ;
analyzed: tathā jñāninaḥ mayi ekasmin eva bhaktiḥ

original: itarayos tu svābhilaṣite tatsādhanatvena mayi ca /
analyzed: itarayoḥ tu sva abhilaṣite tad sādhanatvena mayi ca

original: ataḥ sa eva viśiṣyate /
analyzed: atas saḥ eva viśiṣyate

original: kiñ ca, priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham aham /
analyzed: kim ca priyaḥ hi jñāninaḥ atyartham aham

original: arthaśabdo 'bhidheyavacanaḥ;
analyzed: artha śabdaḥ abhidheya vacanaḥ

original: jñānino 'haṃ yathā priyaḥ,
analyzed: jñāninaḥ aham yathā priyaḥ

original: tathā mayā sarvajñena sarvaśaktināpy abhidhātuṃ na śakyata ityarthaḥ;
analyzed: tathā mayā sarvajñena sarva śaktinā api abhidhātum na śakyate iti arthaḥ

original: priyatvasyeyattārahitatvāt /
analyzed: priya tvasya iyattā rahita tvāt

original: yathā jñāninām agresarasya prahlādasya,
analyzed: yathā jñāninām agresarasya prahlādasya

original: “sa tv āsaktamatiḥ kṛṣṇe daśyamāno mahoragaiḥ /
analyzed: sa tu āsakta matiḥ kṛṣṇe daśyamānaḥ mahā uragaiḥ

original: na vivedātmano gātraṃ tatsmṛtyāhlādasaṃsthitaḥ” iti /
analyzed: na viveda ātmanaḥ gātram tad smṛtyā āhlāda saṃsthitaḥ iti

original: tathaiva so 'pi mama priyaḥ // BhGR_7.17 //
analyzed: tathā eva saḥ api mama priyaḥ

original: udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam /
analyzed: udārāḥ sarve eva ete jñānī tu ātmā eva me matam

original: āsthitas sa hi yuktātmā mām evānuttamāṃ gatim // BhG_7.18 //
analyzed: āsthitaḥ sa hi yukta ātmā mām eva anuttamām gatim

original: sarva evaite mām evopāsata iti udārāḥ vadānyāḥ /
analyzed: sarve eva ete mām eva upāsate iti udārāḥ vadānyāḥ

original: ye matto yat kiṃcid api gṛhṇanti,
analyzed: ye mattaḥ yat kiṃcid api gṛhṇanti

original: te hi mama sarvasvadāyinaḥ /
analyzed: te hi mama sarvasva dāyinaḥ

original: jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam tadāyattadhāraṇo 'ham iti manye /
analyzed: jñānī tu ātmā eva me matam tad āyatta dhāraṇaḥ aham iti manye

original: kasmād evam?
analyzed: kasmāt evam

original: yasmād ayaṃ mayā vinātmadhāraṇāsaṃbhāvanayā mām evānuttamaṃ prāpyam āsthitaḥ,
analyzed: yasmāt ayam mayā vinā ātma dhāraṇā saṃbhāvanayā mām eva anuttamam prāpyam āsthitaḥ

original: atas tena vinā mamāpy ātmadhāraṇaṃ na saṃbhavati /
analyzed: atas tena vinā mama api ātma dhāraṇam na saṃbhavati

original: tato mamātmā hi saḥ // BhGR_7.18 //
analyzed: tatas mama ātmā hi saḥ

original: bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate /
analyzed: bahūnām janmanām ante jñānavān mām prapadyate

original: vāsudevas sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ // BhG_7.19 //
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā su durlabhaḥ

original: nālpasaṃkhyāsaṅkhyātānāṃ puṇyajanmanāṃ phalam idam,
analyzed: na alpa saṃkhyā saṅkhyātānām puṇya janmanām phalam idam

original: yan maccheṣataikarasātmayāthātmyajñānapūrvakaṃ matprapadanam;
analyzed: yat mad śeṣa tā eka rasa ātma yāthātmya jñāna pūrvakam mad prapadanam

original: api tu bahūnāṃ janmanāṃ puṇyajanmanām ante avasāne,
analyzed: api tu bahūnām janmanām puṇya janmanām ante avasāne

original: vāsudevaśeṣataikaraso 'haṃ tadāyattasvarūpasthitipravṛttiś ca;
analyzed: vāsudeva śeṣa tā eka rasaḥ aham tad āyatta svarūpa sthiti pravṛttiḥ ca

original: sa cāsaṅkhyeyaiḥ kalyāṇaguṇagaṇaiḥ parataraḥ iti jñānavān bhūtvā,
analyzed: sa ca asaṅkhyeyaiḥ kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇaiḥ parataraḥ iti jñānavān bhūtvā

original: vāsudeva eva mama paramaprāpyaṃ prāpakaṃ ca,
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ eva mama parama prāpyam prāpakam ca

original: anyad api yan manorathavartiṃ sa eva mama tat sarvam iti māṃ prapadyate mām upāste;
analyzed: anyat api yat manorathavartim saḥ eva mama tat sarvam iti mām prapadyate mām upāste

original: sa mahātmā mahāmanāḥ sudurlabhaḥ durlabhataro loke /
analyzed: sa mahātmā mahāmanāḥ su durlabhaḥ durlabhataraḥ loke

original: vāsudevas sarvam ity asyāyam evārthaḥ,
analyzed: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti asya ayam eva arthaḥ

original: “priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham aham“,
analyzed: priyaḥ hi jñāninaḥ atyartham aham

original: “āsthitas sa hi yuktātmā mām evānuttamāṃ gatim” iti prakramāt /
analyzed: āsthitaḥ sa hi yukta ātmā mām eva anuttamām gatim iti prakramāt

original: jñānavāṃś cāyam uktalakṣaṇa eva,
analyzed: jñānavān ca ayam ukta lakṣaṇaḥ eva

original: asyaiva pūrvoktajñānitvāt,
analyzed: asya eva pūrva ukta jñāni tvāt

original: bhūmir āpaḥ” ity ārabhya,
analyzed: bhūmiḥ āpaḥ iti ārabhya

original: “ahaṅkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā /
analyzed: ahaṅkāraḥ iti iyam me bhinnā prakṛtiḥ aṣṭadhā

original: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām /
analyzed: aparā iyam itas tu anyām prakṛtim viddhi me parām

original: jīvabhūtām” iti hi cetanācetanaprakṛtidvayasya paramapuruṣaśeṣataikarasatoktā;
analyzed: jīva bhūtām iti hi cetana acetana prakṛti dvayasya paramapuruṣa śeṣa tā ekarasa tā uktā

original: “ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā /
analyzed: aham kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ tathā

original: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiñcid asti dhanañjaya” ity ārabhya,
analyzed: mattaḥ parataram na anyat kiñcid asti dhanañjayaḥ iti ārabhya

original: “ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye /
analyzed: ye ca eva sāttvikāḥ bhāvāḥ rājasāḥ tāmasāḥ ca ye

original: matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi //
analyzed: mattaḥ evā iti tān viddhi na tu aham teṣu te mayi

original: BhGR_1.” iti prakṛtidvayasya kāryakāraṇobhayāvasthasya paramapuruṣāyattasvarūpasthitipravṛttitvaṃ paramapuruṣasya ca sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ sarvasmāt  #
analyzed: iti prakṛti dvayasya kārya kāraṇa ubhaya avasthasya paramapuruṣa āyatta svarūpa sthiti pravṛtti tvam paramapuruṣasya ca sarvaiḥ prakāraiḥ sarvasmāt

original: parataratvam uktam;
analyzed: paratara tvam uktam

original: ataḥ sa evātra jñānīty ucyate //719//
analyzed: atas saḥ eva atra jñānī iti ucyate

original: tasya jñānino durlabhatvam evopapādayati
analyzed: tasya jñāninaḥ durlabha tvam eva upapādayati

original: kāmais tais tair hṛtajñānāḥ prapadyante 'nyadevatāḥ /
analyzed: kāmaiḥ taiḥ taiḥ hṛta jñānāḥ prapadyante anya devatāḥ

original: taṃ taṃ niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā // BhG_7.20 //
analyzed: tam tam niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā

original: sarva eva hi laukikāḥ puruṣāḥ svayā prakṛtyā pāpavāsanayā guṇamayabhāvaviṣayayā niyatāḥ
analyzed: sarve eva hi laukikāḥ puruṣāḥ svayā prakṛtyā pāpa vāsanayā guṇa maya bhāva viṣayayā niyatāḥ

original: nityānvitāḥ tais taiḥ svavāsanānurūpair guṇamayair eva kāmaiḥ icchāviṣayabhūtaiḥ
analyzed: nitya anvitāḥ taiḥ taiḥ sva vāsanā anurūpaiḥ guṇa mayaiḥ eva kāmaiḥ icchā viṣaya bhūtaiḥ

original: hṛtamatsvarūpaviṣayajñānāḥ tattatkāmasiddhyartham anyadevatāḥ madvyatiriktāḥ kevalendrādidevatāḥ
analyzed: hṛta mad sva rūpa viṣaya jñānāḥ tad tad kāma siddhi artham anya devatāḥ mad vyatiriktāḥ kevala indra ādi devatāḥ

original: taṃ taṃ niyamaṃ āsthāya tattaddevatāviśeṣamātraprīṇanāsādhāraṇaṃ niyamam āsthyāya
analyzed: tam tam niyamam āsthāya tad tad devatā viśeṣa mātra prīṇanā sādhāraṇam niyamam āsthyāya

original: prapadyante tā evāśrityārcayante // BhGR_7.20 //
analyzed: prapadyante tāḥ eva āśritya arcayante

original: yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati /
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ yām yām tanum bhaktaḥ śraddhayā arcitum icchati

original: tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham // BhG_7.21 //
analyzed: tasya tasya acalām śraddhām tām eva vidadhāmi aham

original: tā api devatā madīyās tanavaḥ,
analyzed: tāḥ api devatāḥ madīyāḥ tanavaḥ

original: “ya āditye tiṣṭhan ... yam ādityo na veda yasyādityaś śarīram” ityādiśrutibhiḥ pratipāditāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ āditye tiṣṭhan yam ādityaḥ na veda yasya ādityaḥ śarīram ityādi śrutibhiḥ pratipāditāḥ

original: madīyās tanava ity ajānann api yo yo yāṃ yāṃ madīyām ādityādikāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati;
analyzed: madīyāḥ tanavaḥ iti a jānan api yaḥ yaḥ yām yām madīyām āditya ādikām tanum bhaktaḥ śraddhayā arcitum icchati

original: tasya tasyājānato 'pi mattanuviṣayaiṣā śraddhety anusandhāya tām evācalāṃ nirvighnāṃ vidadhāmy aham // BhGR_7.21 //
analyzed: tasya tasya a jānataḥ api mad tanu viṣayā eṣā śraddhā iti anusandhāya tām evā acalām nirvighnām vidadhāmi aham

original: sa tayā śraddhayā yuktas tasyārādhanam īhate /
analyzed: sa tayā śraddhayā yuktaḥ tasya ārādhanam īhate

original: labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān hi tān // BhG_7.22 //
analyzed: labhate ca tatas kāmān mayā eva vihitān hi tān

original: sa tayā nirvighnayā śraddhayā yuktas tasya indrāder ārādhanaṃ pratīhate /
analyzed: sa tayā nirvighnayā śraddhayā yuktaḥ tasya indra ādeḥ ārādhanam pratīhate

original: tataḥ mattanubhūtendrādidevatārādhanāt tān eva hi svābhilaṣitān kāmān mayaiva vihitān labhate /
analyzed: tatas mad tanubhūta indra ādi devatā ārādhanāt tān eva hi sva abhilaṣitān kāmān mayā eva vihitān labhate

original: yady apy ārādhanakāle,
analyzed: yadi api ārādhana kāle

original: “ārādhyendrādayo madīyās tanavaḥ,
analyzed: ārādhya indra ādayaḥ madīyāḥ tanavaḥ

original: tata eva tadarcanaṃ ca madārādhanam” iti na jānāti tathāpi tasya vastuno madārādhanatvād ārādhakābhilaṣitam aham eva vidadhāmi // BhGR_7.22
analyzed: tatas eva tad arcanam ca mad ārādhanam iti na jānāti tathā api tasya vastunaḥ mad ārādhana tvāt ārādhaka abhilaṣitam aham eva vidadhāmi

original: antavat tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhavaty alpamedhasām /
analyzed: antavat tu phalam teṣām tat bhavati alpa medhasām

original: devān devayajño yānti madbhaktā yānti mām api // BhG_7.23 //
analyzed: devān deva yajñaḥ yānti mad bhaktāḥ yānti mām api

original: teṣām alpamedhasām alpabuddhīnām indrādimātrayājināṃ tadārādhanaphalam alpam,
analyzed: teṣām alpa medhasām alpabuddhīnām indra ādi mātra yājinām tad ārādhana phalam alpam

original: antavac ca bhavati /
analyzed: antavat ca bhavati

original: kutaḥ? devān devayajo yānti yata indrādīn devān tadyājino yānti /
analyzed: kutas devān deva yajaḥ yānti yatas indra ādīn devān tad yājinaḥ yānti

original: indrādayo 'pi hi paricchinnabhogāḥ parimitakālavartinaś ca /
analyzed: indra ādayaḥ api hi paricchinna bhogāḥ parimita kāla vartinaḥ ca

original: tatas tatsāyujyaṃ prāptāḥ tais saha pracyavante /
analyzed: tatas tad sāyujyam prāptāḥ taiḥ saha pracyavante

original: madbhaktā api teṣām eva karmaṇāṃ madārādhanarūpatāṃ jñātvā paricchinnaphalasaṅgaṃ tyaktvā matprīṇanaikaprayojanāḥ māṃ prāpnuvanti;
analyzed: mad bhaktāḥ api teṣām eva karmaṇām mad ārādhana rūpa tām jñātvā paricchinna phala saṅgam tyaktvā mad prīṇana eka prayojanāḥ mām prāpnuvanti

original: na ca punar nivartante /
analyzed: na ca punar nivartante

original: “mām upetya tu kaunteya punar janma na vidyate” iti hi vakṣyate // BhGR_7.23 //
analyzed: mām upetya tu kaunteya punar janma na vidyate iti hi vakṣyate

original: itare tu sarvasamāśrayaṇīyatvāya mama manuṣyādiṣv avatāram apy akiñcitkaraṃ kurvantīty āha
analyzed: itare tu sarva samāśrayaṇīya tvāya mama manuṣya ādiṣu avatāram api akiñcitkaram kurvanti iti āha

original: avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ /
analyzed: avyaktam vyaktim āpannam manyante mām abuddhayaḥ

original: paraṃ bhāvam ajānanto mama avyayam anuttamam // BhG_7.24 //
analyzed: param bhāvam a jānantaḥ mama avyayam anuttamam

original: sarvaiḥ karmabhir ārādhyo 'haṃ sarveśvaro vāṅmanasāparicchedyasvarūpasvabhāvaḥ paramakāruṇyād
analyzed: sarvaiḥ karmabhiḥ ārādhyaḥ aham sarveśvaraḥ vāc manasā aparicchedya svarūpa svabhāvaḥ parama kāruṇyāt

original: aśrityavātsalyāc ca sarvasamāśrayaṇīyatvāyājahatsvabhāva eva vasudevasūnur avarīrṇa
analyzed: a śritya vātsalyāt ca sarva samāśrayaṇīya tvāya a jahat svabhāvaḥ eva vasudeva sūnuḥ avarīrṇa

original: iti mamaivaṃ paraṃ bhāvam avyayam anuttamam ajānantaḥ prākṛtarājasūnusamānam itaḥ
analyzed: iti mama evam param bhāvam avyayam anuttamam a jānantaḥ prākṛta rāja sūnu samānam itas

original: pūrvam anabhivyaktam idānīṃ karmavaśāj janmaviśeṣaṃ prāpya vyaktim āpannam prāptaṃ
analyzed: pūrvam anabhivyaktam idānīm karma vaśāt janma viśeṣam prāpya vyaktim āpannam prāptam

original: mām buddhayo manyante /
analyzed: mām buddhayaḥ manyante

original: ato māṃ nāśrayante;
analyzed: atas mām na āśrayante

original: na karmabhir ārādhayanti ca // BhGR_7.24 //
analyzed: na karmabhiḥ ārādhayanti ca

original: kuta evaṃ na prakāśyata ity atrāha
analyzed: kutas evam na prakāśyate iti atra āha

original: nāhaṃ prakāśaḥ sarvasya yogamāyāsamāvṛtaḥ /
analyzed: na aham prakāśaḥ sarvasya yoga māyā samāvṛtaḥ

original: mūḍho 'yaṃ nābhijānāti loko mām ajam avyayam // BhG_7.25 //
analyzed: mūḍhaḥ ayam na abhijānāti lokaḥ mām ajam avyayam

original: kṣetrajñāsādhāraṇamanuṣyatvādisaṃsthānayogākhyamāyayā samāvṛto 'haṃ na sarvasya prakāśaḥ /
analyzed: kṣetrajña asādhāraṇa manuṣya tva ādi saṃsthāna yoga ākhya māyayā samāvṛtaḥ aham na sarvasya prakāśaḥ

original: mayi manuṣyatvādisaṃsthānadarśanamātreṇa mūḍho 'yaṃ loko mām ativāyvindrakarmāṇam
analyzed: mayi manuṣya tva ādi saṃsthāna darśana mātreṇa mūḍhaḥ ayam lokaḥ mām ati vāyu indra karmāṇam

original: atisūryāgnitejasam upalabhyamānam api ajam avyayaṃ nikhilajagadekakāraṇaṃ sarveśvaraṃ
analyzed: ati sūrya agni tejasam upalabhyamānam api ajam avyayam nikhila jagat eka kāraṇam sarveśvaram

original: māṃ sarvasamāśrayaṇīyatvāya manuṣyatvasaṃsthānam āsthitaṃ nābhijānāti // BhGR_7.25 //
analyzed: mām sarva samāśrayaṇīya tvāya manuṣya tva saṃsthānam āsthitam na abhijānāti

original: vedāhaṃ samatītāni vartamānāni cārjuna /
analyzed: veda aham samatītāni vartamānāni ca arjuna

original: bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni māṃ tu veda na kaścana // BhG_7.26 //
analyzed: bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni mām tu veda na kaścana

original: atītāni vartamānāni anāgatāni ca sarvāṇi bhūtāny ahaṃ veda jānāmi /
analyzed: atītāni vartamānāni anāgatāni ca sarvāṇi bhūtāni aham veda jānāmi

original: māṃ tu veda na kaścana mayānusaṃdhīyamāneṣu kālatrayavartiṣu bhūteṣu mām evaṃvidhaṃ
analyzed: mām tu veda na kaścana mayā anusaṃdhīyamāneṣu kāla traya vartiṣu bhūteṣu mām evaṃvidham

original: vāsudevaṃ sarvasamāśrayṇīyatvāyāvatīrṇaṃ viditvā mām eva samāśrayan na kaścid upalabhyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: vāsudevam sarva samāśrayṇīya tvāya avatīrṇam viditvā mām eva samāśrayan na kaścid upalabhyate iti arthaḥ

original: ato jñānī sudurlabha eva // BhGR_7.26 //
analyzed: atas jñānī su durlabhaḥ eva

original: tathā hi
analyzed: tathā hi

original: icchādveṣasamutthena dvandvamohena bhārata /
analyzed: icchā dveṣa samutthena dvandva mohena bhārata

original: sarvabhūtāni saṃmohaṃ sarge yānti parantapa // BhG_7.27 //
analyzed: sarva bhūtāni saṃmoham sarge yānti parantapa

original: icchādveṣābhyāṃ samutthitena śītoṣṇādidvandvākhyena mohena sarvabhūtāni sarge janmakāla eva saṃmohaṃ yānti /
analyzed: icchā dveṣābhyām samutthitena śīta uṣṇa ādi dvandva ākhyena mohena sarva bhūtāni sarge janma kāle eva saṃmoham yānti

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati guṇamayeṣu sukhaduḥkhādidvandveṣu pūrvapūrvajanmani yadviṣayau icchādveṣau abhyastau,
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati guṇa mayeṣu sukha duḥkha ādi dvandveṣu pūrva pūrva janmani yat viṣayau icchā dveṣau abhyastau

original: tadvāsanayā punar api janmakāla eva tad eva dvandvākhyam icchādveṣaviṣayatvena samutthitaṃ bhūtānāṃ mohanaṃ bhavati;
analyzed: tad vāsanayā punar api janma kāle eva tat eva dvandva ākhyam icchā dveṣa viṣaya tvena samutthitam bhūtānām mohanam bhavati

original: tena mohena sarvabhūtāni saṃmohaṃ yānti;
analyzed: tena mohena sarva bhūtāni saṃmoham yānti

original: tadviṣayecchādveṣasvabhāvāni bhavanti,
analyzed: tad viṣaya icchā dveṣa svabhāvāni bhavanti

original: na matsamśleṣaviyogasukhaduḥkhasvabhāvāni,
analyzed: na mad samśleṣa viyoga sukha duḥkha svabhāvāni

original: jñānī tu matsaṃśleṣaviyogaikasukhaduḥkhasvabhāvaḥ;
analyzed: jñānī tu mad saṃśleṣa viyoga eka sukha duḥkha svabhāvaḥ

original: na tatsvabhāvaṃ kim api bhūtaṃ jāyate iti // BhGR_7.27 //
analyzed: na tad svabhāvam kim api bhūtam jāyate iti

original: yeṣāṃ tv antagataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām /
analyzed: yeṣām tu anta gatam pāpam janānām puṇya karmaṇām

original: te dvandvamohanirmuktāḥ bhajante māṃ dṛḍhavratāḥ // BhG_7.28 //
analyzed: te dvandva moha nirmuktāḥ bhajante mām dṛḍha vratāḥ

original: yeṣāṃ tv anekajanmārjitenotkṛṣṭapuṇyasaṃcayena guṇamayadvandveccchādveṣahetubhūtaṃ madaunmukhyavirodhi ca anādikālapravṛttaṃ pāpam antagatam
analyzed: yeṣām tu aneka janma arjitena utkṛṣṭa puṇya saṃcayena guṇa maya dvandva icchā dveṣa hetu bhūtam mad aunmukhya virodhi ca anādi kāla pravṛttam pāpam anta gatam

original: te pūrvoktena sukṛtatāratamyena māṃ śaraṇam anuprapadya guṇamayān mohād vinirmuktāḥ jarāmaraṇamokṣāya,
analyzed: te pūrva uktena sukṛta tāratamyena mām śaraṇam anuprapadya guṇa mayāt mohāt vinirmuktāḥ jarā maraṇa mokṣāya

original: mahate cāiśvaryāya,
analyzed: mahate ca aiśvaryāya

original: matprāptaye ca dṛḍhavratāḥ dṛḍhasaṅkalpāḥ mām eva bhajante // BhGR_7.28 //
analyzed: mad prāptaye ca dṛḍha vratāḥ dṛḍha saṅkalpāḥ mām eva bhajante

original: atra trayāṇāṃ bhagavantaṃ bhajamānānāṃ jñātavyaviśeṣān upādeyāṃś ca prastauti
analyzed: atra trayāṇām bhagavantam bhajamānānām jñātavya viśeṣān upādeyān ca prastauti

original: jarāmaraṇamokṣāya mām āśritya yatanti ye /
analyzed: jarā maraṇa mokṣāya mām āśritya yatanti ye

original: te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam // BhG_7.29 //
analyzed: te brahma tat viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmam karma ca akhilam

original: jarāmaraṇamokṣāya prakṛtiviyuktātmasvarūpadarśanāya mām āśritya ye yatante,
analyzed: jarā maraṇa mokṣāya prakṛti viyukta ātma sva rūpa darśanāya mām āśritya ye yatante

original: te tadbrahma viduḥ,
analyzed: te tat brahma viduḥ

original: adhyātmaṃ tu kṛtsnaṃ viduḥ,
analyzed: adhyātmam tu kṛtsnam viduḥ

original: karma cākhilaṃ viduḥ // BhGR_1.29 //
analyzed: karma ca akhilam viduḥ

original: sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ /
analyzed: sa adhibhūta adhidaivam mām sa adhiyajñam ca ye viduḥ

original: prayāṇakāle 'pi ca māṃ te vidur yuktacetasaḥ // BhG_7.30 //
analyzed: prayāṇa kāle api ca mām te viduḥ yukta cetasaḥ

original: atra ya iti punar nirdeśāt pūrvanirdiṣṭavyo 'nye adhikāriṇo jñāyante;
analyzed: atra yaḥ iti punar nirdeśāt pūrva nirdiṣṭavyaḥ anye adhikāriṇaḥ jñāyante

original: sādhibhūtaṃ sādhidaivaṃ mām aiśvaryārthino ye viduḥ ity etad anuvādasarūpam apy aprāptārthatvād vidhāyakam eva;
analyzed: sa adhibhūtam sa adhidaivam mām aiśvarya arthinaḥ ye viduḥ iti etat anuvāda sarūpam api aprāpta artha tvāt vidhāyakam eva

original: tathā sādhiyajñam ity api trayāṇām adhikāriṇām aviśeṣeṇa vidhīyate;
analyzed: tathā sa adhiyajñam iti api trayāṇām adhikāriṇām aviśeṣeṇa vidhīyate

original: arthasvabhāvyāt /
analyzed: artha svabhāvyāt

original: trayāṇāṃ hi nityanaimittikarūpamahāyajñādyanuṣṭhānam avarjanīyam /
analyzed: trayāṇām hi nitya naimittika rūpa mahāyajña ādi anuṣṭhānam avarjanīyam

original: te ca prayāṇakāle 'pi svaprāpyānuguṇaṃ māṃ viduḥ /
analyzed: te ca prayāṇa kāle api sva prāpya anuguṇam mām viduḥ

original: te ceti cakārāt pūrve jarāmaraṇamokṣāya yatamānāś ca prayāṇakāle vidur iti samuccīyante;
analyzed: te ca iti cakārāt pūrve jarā maraṇa mokṣāya yatamānāḥ ca prayāṇa kāle viduḥ iti samuccīyante

original: anena jñānino 'py arthasvābhāvyāt sādhiyajñaṃ māṃ viduḥ,
analyzed: anena jñāninaḥ api artha svābhāvyāt sa adhiyajñam mām viduḥ

original: prayāṇakāle 'pi svaprāpyānuguṇaṃ māṃ vidur ity uktaṃ bhavati // BhGR_7.30 //
analyzed: prayāṇa kāle api sva prāpya anuguṇam mām viduḥ iti uktam bhavati

original: saptame parasya brahmaṇo vāsudevasyopāsyatvam nikhilacetanācetanavastuśeṣitvam,
analyzed: saptame parasya brahmaṇaḥ vāsudevasya upāsya tvam nikhila cetana acetana vastu śeṣi tvam

original: kāraṇatvam,
ādhāratvam,
analyzed: ādhāra tvam

original: sarvaśarīratayā sarvaprakāratvena sarvaśabdavācyatvam,
analyzed: sarva śarīra tayā sarva prakāra tvena sarva śabda vācya tvam

original: sarvaniyantṛtvam,
analyzed: sarva niyantṛ tvam

original: sarvaiś ca kalyāṇaguṇagaṇais tasyaiva parataratvam,
analyzed: sarvaiḥ ca kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇaiḥ tasya eva paratara tvam

original: sattvarajastamomayair dehendriyatvena bhogyatvena cāvasthitair bhāvair anādikālapravṛttaduṣkṛtapravāhahetukais tasya tirodhānam,
analyzed: sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ mayaiḥ deha indriya tvena bhogya tvena ca avasthitaiḥ bhāvaiḥ anādi kāla pravṛtta duṣkṛta pravāha hetukaiḥ tasya tirodhānam

original: atyutkṛṣṭasukṛtahetukabhagavatprapattyā sukṛtatāratamyena ca pratipattivaiśeṣyād aiśvaryākṣarayāthātmyabhagavatprāptyapekṣayopāsakabhedam,
analyzed: ati utkṛṣṭa sukṛta hetuka bhagavat prapattyā sukṛta tāratamyena ca pratipatti vaiśeṣyāt aiśvarya akṣara yāthātmya bhagavat prāpti apekṣayā upāsaka bhedam

original: bhagavantaṃ prepsor nityayuktatayaikabhaktitayā cātyarthaparamapuruṣapriyatvena ca śraiṣṭhyam durlabhatvaṃ ca pratipādya eṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ jñātavyopādeyabhedāṃś  #
analyzed: bhagavantam prepsoḥ nitya yukta tayā ekabhakti tayā ca atyartha parama puruṣa priya tvena ca śraiṣṭhyam durlabha tvam ca pratipādya eṣām trayāṇām jñātavya upādeya bhedān

original: ca prāstauṣīt /
analyzed: ca prāstauṣīt

original: idānīm aṣṭame prastutān jñātavyopādeyabhedān vivinakti //
analyzed: idānīm aṣṭame prastutān jñātavya upādeya bhedān vivinakti

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: kiṃ tad brahma kim adhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama /
analyzed: kim tat brahma kim adhyātmam kim karma puruṣottama

original: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate // BhG_8.1 //
analyzed: adhibhūtam ca kim proktam adhidaivam kim ucyate

original: adhiyajñaḥ kathaṃ ko 'tra dehe 'smin madhusūdanam /
analyzed: adhiyajñaḥ katham kaḥ atra dehe asmin madhusūdanam

original: prayāṇakāle ca kathaṃ jñeyo 'si niyatātmabhiḥ // BhG_8.2 //
analyzed: prayāṇa kāle ca katham jñeyaḥ asi niyata ātmabhiḥ

original: jarāmaraṇamokṣāya bhagavantam āśritya yatamānānāṃ jñātavyatayoktaṃ tad brahma adhyātmaṃ ca kim iti vaktavyam /
analyzed: jarā maraṇa mokṣāya bhagavantam āśritya yatamānānām jñātavya tayā uktam tat brahma adhyātmam ca kim iti vaktavyam

original: aiśvaryārthīnāṃ jñātavyam adhibhūtam adhidaivaṃ ca kim?
analyzed: aiśvarya arthīnām jñātavyam adhibhūtam adhidaivam ca kim

original: trayāṇāṃ jñātavyo 'dhiyajñaśabdanirdiṣṭaś ca kaḥ?
analyzed: trayāṇām jñātavyaḥ adhiyajña śabda nirdiṣṭaḥ ca kaḥ

original: tasya cādhiyajñabhāvaḥ katham?
analyzed: tasya ca adhiyajña bhāvaḥ katham

original: prayāṇakāle ca ebhis tribhir niyatātmabhiḥ kathaṃ jñeyo 'si? // BhGR_8.1,2 //
analyzed: prayāṇa kāle ca ebhiḥ tribhiḥ niyata ātmabhiḥ katham jñeyaḥ asi

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: akṣaraṃ brahma paramaṃ svabhāvo 'dhyātmam ucyate /
analyzed: akṣaram brahma paramam svabhāvaḥ adhyātmam ucyate

original: bhūtabhāvodbhavakaro visargaḥ karmasaṃjñitaḥ // BhG_8.3 //
analyzed: bhūta bhāva udbhava karaḥ visargaḥ karma saṃjñitaḥ

original: tadbrahmeti nirdiṣṭaṃ paramam akṣaraṃ na kṣaratīty akṣaram,
analyzed: tat brahma iti nirdiṣṭam paramam akṣaram na kṣarati iti akṣaram

original: kṣetrajñasamaṣṭirūpam /
analyzed: kṣetrajña samaṣṭi rūpam

original: tathā ca śrutiḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ

original: “avyaktam akṣare līyate akṣaraṃ tamasi līyate” ityādikā /
analyzed: avyaktam akṣare līyate akṣaram tamasi līyate iti ādikā

original: paramam akṣaraṃ prakṛtivinirmuktam ātmasvarūpam /
analyzed: paramam akṣaram prakṛti vinirmuktam ātma svarūpam

original: svabhāvo 'dhyātmam ucyate /
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ adhyātmam ucyate

original: svabhāvaḥ prakṛtiḥ /
analyzed: svabhāvaḥ prakṛtiḥ

original: anātmabhūtam,
analyzed: anātma bhūtam

original: ātmani saṃbadhyamānaṃ bhūtasūkṣmatadvāsanādikaṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ jñātavyatayoditam /
analyzed: ātmani saṃbadhyamānam bhūta sūkṣma tad vāsanā ādikam pañcāgnividyāyām jñātavya tayā uditam

original: tadubhayaṃ prāpyatayā tyājyatayā ca mumukṣubhir jñātavyam /
analyzed: tat ubhayam prāpya tayā tyājya tayā ca mumukṣubhiḥ jñātavyam

original: bhūtabhāvodbhavakaro visargaḥ karmasaṃjñitaḥ /
analyzed: bhūta bhāva udbhava karaḥ visargaḥ karma saṃjñitaḥ

original: bhūtabhāvaḥ manuṣyādibhāvaḥ;
analyzed: bhūta bhāvaḥ manuṣya ādi bhāvaḥ

original: tadudbhavakaro yo visargaḥ,
analyzed: tad udbhava karaḥ yaḥ visargaḥ

original: “pañcamyām āhutāv āpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti” iti śrutisiddho yoṣitsaṃbandhajaḥ,
analyzed: pañcamyām āhutau āpaḥ puruṣa vacasaḥ bhavanti iti śruti siddhaḥ yoṣit saṃbandha jaḥ

original: sa karmasaṃjñitaḥ /
analyzed: sa karma saṃjñitaḥ

original: tac cākhilaṃ sānubandham udvejanīyatayā,
analyzed: tat ca akhilam sānubandham udvejanīya tayā

original: pariharaṇīyatayā ca mumukṣubhir jñātavyam /
analyzed: pariharaṇīya tayā ca mumukṣubhiḥ jñātavyam

original: pariharaṇīyatayā cānantaram eva vakṣyate,
analyzed: pariharaṇīya tayā ca anantaram eva vakṣyate

original: “yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti” iti // BhGR_8.3 //
analyzed: yat icchantaḥ brahmacaryam caranti iti

original: adhibhūtaṃ kṣaro bhāvaḥ puruṣaś cādhidaivatam /
analyzed: adhibhūtam kṣaraḥ bhāvaḥ puruṣaḥ ca adhidaivatam

original: adhiyajño 'ham evātra dehe dehabhṛtāṃ vara // BhG_8.4 //
analyzed: adhiyajñaḥ aham eva atra dehe dehabhṛtām vara

original: aiśvaryārthināṃ jñātavyatayā nirdiṣṭam adhibhūtaṃ kṣaro bhāvaḥ viyadādibhūteṣu vartamānaḥ tatpariṇāmaviśeṣaḥ kṣaraṇasvabhāvo vilakṣaṇaḥ śabdasparśādis  #
analyzed: aiśvarya arthinām jñātavya tayā nirdiṣṭam adhibhūtam kṣaraḥ bhāvaḥ viyat ādi bhūteṣu vartamānaḥ tad pariṇāma viśeṣaḥ kṣaraṇa svabhāvaḥ vilakṣaṇaḥ śabda sparśa ādiḥ

original: sāsrayaḥ /
analyzed: sa asrayaḥ

original: vilakṣaṇāḥ sāśrayāś śabdasparśarūparasagandhāḥ aiśvaryārthibhiḥ prāpyās tair anusandheyāḥ /
analyzed: vilakṣaṇāḥ sa āśrayāḥ śabda sparśa rūpa rasa gandhāḥ aiśvarya arthibhiḥ prāpyāḥ taiḥ anusandheyāḥ

original: puruṣaś cādhidaivatam adhidaivataśabdanirdiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ adhidaivatam devatopari vartamānaḥ,
analyzed: puruṣaḥ ca adhidaivatam adhidaivata śabda nirdiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ adhidaivatam devatā upari vartamānaḥ

original: indraprajāpatiprabhṛtikṛtsnadaivatopari vartamānaḥ,
analyzed: indra prajāpati prabhṛti kṛtsna daivata upari vartamānaḥ

original: indraprajāpatiprabhṛtīnāṃ bhogyajātad vilakṣaṇaśabdāder bhoktā puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: indra prajāpati prabhṛtīnām bhogya jāta d vilakṣaṇa śabda ādeḥ bhoktā puruṣaḥ

original: sā ca bhoktṛtvāvasthā aiśvaryārthibhiḥ prāpyatayānusandheyā /
analyzed: sā ca bhoktṛ tva avasthā aiśvarya arthibhiḥ prāpya tayā anusandheyā

original: adhiyajño 'ham eva /
analyzed: adhiyajñaḥ aham eva

original: adhiyajñaḥ yajñair ārādhyatayā vartamānaḥ /
analyzed: adhiyajñaḥ yajñaiḥ ārādhya tayā vartamānaḥ

original: atra indrādau mama dehabhūte ātmatayāvasthito 'ham eva yajñair ārādhya iti mahāyajñādinityanaimittikānuṣṭhānavelāyāṃ trayāṇām adhikāriṇām anusandheyam  #
analyzed: atra indra ādau mama deha bhūte ātma tayā avasthitaḥ aham eva yajñaiḥ ārādhyaḥ iti mahāyajña ādi nitya naimittika anuṣṭhāna velāyām trayāṇām adhikāriṇām anusandheyam  /

original: etat // BhGR_8.4 //
analyzed: etat

original: antakāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalebaram /
analyzed: antakāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalebaram

original: yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ // BhG_8.5 //
analyzed: yaḥ prayāti sa mad bhāvam yāti na asti atra saṃśayaḥ

original: idam api trayāṇāṃ sādhāraṇam /
analyzed: idam api trayāṇām sādhāraṇam

original: antakāle ca mām eva smaran kalevaraṃ tyaktvā yaḥ prayāti,
analyzed: antakāle ca mām eva smaran kalevaram tyaktvā yaḥ prayāti

original: sa madbhāvaṃ yāti mama yo bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ taṃ yāti;
analyzed: sa mad bhāvam yāti mama yaḥ bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ tam yāti

original: tadānīṃ yathā mām anusandhatte,
analyzed: tadānīm yathā mām anusandhatte

original: tathāvidhākāro bhavatītyarthaḥ;
analyzed: tathāvidha ākāraḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: yathā ādibharatādayas tadānīṃ smaryamāṇamṛgasajātīyākārāt saṃbhūtāḥ // BhGR_8.5 //
analyzed: yathā ādi bharata ādayaḥ tadānīm smaryamāṇa mṛga sajātīya ākārāt saṃbhūtāḥ

original: smartus svaviṣayasajātīyākāratāpādanam antyapratyayasya svabhāva iti suspaṣṭam āha
analyzed: smartuḥ sva viṣaya sajātīya ākāra tā āpādanam antya pratyayasya svabhāvaḥ iti su spaṣṭam āha

original: yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaran bhāvaṃ tyajaty ante kalebaram /
analyzed: yam yam vā api smaran bhāvam tyajati ante kalebaram

original: taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ // BhG_8.6 //
analyzed: tam tam eva eti kaunteya sadā tad bhāva bhāvitaḥ

original: ante antakāle yaṃ yaṃ vāpi bhāvaṃ smaran kalebaraṃ tyajati,
analyzed: ante antakāle yam yam vā api bhāvam smaran kalebaram tyajati

original: taṃ taṃ bhāvam eva maraṇānantaram eti /
analyzed: tam tam bhāvam eva maraṇa anantaram eti

original: antimapratyayaś ca pūrvabhāvitaviṣaya eva jāyate // BhGR_8.6 //
analyzed: antima pratyayaḥ ca pūrva bhāvita viṣayaḥ eva jāyate

original: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca /
analyzed: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca

original: mayy arpitamanobuddhiḥ mām evaiṣyasy asaṃśayaḥ // BhG_8.7 //
analyzed: mayi arpita manaḥ buddhiḥ mām eva eṣyasi asaṃśayaḥ

original: yasmāt pūrvakālābhyastaviṣaya evāntyapratyayo jāyate,
analyzed: yasmāt pūrva kāla abhyasta viṣayaḥ eva antya pratyayaḥ jāyate

original: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣv āprayāṇād ahar ahar mām anusmara /
analyzed: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu āprayāṇāt ahar ahar mām anusmara

original: aharahar anusmṛtikaraṃ yuddhādikaṃ varṇāśramānubandhi śrutismṛticoditaṃ nityanaimittikaṃ ca karma kuru /
analyzed: ahar ahar anusmṛti karam yuddha ādikam varṇa āśrama anubandhi śruti smṛti coditam nitya naimittikam ca karma kuru

original: evam upāyena mayy arpitamanobuddhiḥ antakale ca mām eva smaran yathābhilaṣitaprakāraṃ māṃ prāpsyasi;
analyzed: evam upāyena mayi arpita manaḥ buddhiḥ anta kale ca mām eva smaran yathā abhilaṣita prakāram mām prāpsyasi

original: nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhGR_8.7 //
analyzed: na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: evaṃ sāmānyena svaprāpyāvāptir antyapratyayādhīnety uktvā tadarthaṃ trayāṇām upāsanaprakārabhedaṃ vaktum upakramate;
analyzed: evam sāmānyena sva prāpya avāptiḥ antya pratyaya adhīnā iti uktvā tad artham trayāṇām upāsana prakāra bhedam vaktum upakramate

original: tatrāiśvaryārthinām upāsanaprakāraṃ yathopāsanam antyapratyayaprakāraṃ cāha
analyzed: tatra aiśvarya arthinām upāsana prakāram yathopāsanam antya pratyaya prakāram ca āha

original: abhyāsayogayuktena cetasā nānyagāminā /
analyzed: abhyāsa yoga yuktena cetasā na anya gāminā

original: paramaṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ yāti pārthānucintayan // BhG_8.8 //
analyzed: paramam puruṣam divyam yāti pārtha anucintayan

original: aharahar abhyāsayogābhyāṃ yuktatayā nānyagāminā cetasā antakāle paramaṃ puruṣaṃ divyaṃ
analyzed: ahar ahar abhyāsa yogābhyām yukta tayā na anya gāminā cetasā antakāle paramam puruṣam divyam

original: māṃ vakṣyamāṇaprakāraṃ cintayan mām eva yāti ādibharatamṛgatvaprāptivad aiśvaryaviśiṣṭatayā
analyzed: mām vakṣyamāṇa prakāram cintayan mām eva yāti ādi bharata mṛga tva prāpti vat aiśvarya viśiṣṭa tayā

original: matsamānākāro bhavati /
analyzed: mad samāna ākāraḥ bhavati

original: abhyāsaḥ nityanaimittikāviruddheṣu sarveṣu kāleṣu manasopāsyasaṃśīlanam /
analyzed: abhyāsaḥ nitya naimittika aviruddheṣu sarveṣu kāleṣu manasā upāsya saṃśīlanam

original: yogas tu aharahar yogakāle 'nuṣṭhīyamānaṃ yathoktalakṣaṇam upāsanam // BhGR_8.8 //
analyzed: yogaḥ tu ahar ahar yoga kāle anuṣṭhīyamānam yathā ukta lakṣaṇam upāsanam

original: kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāram aṇor aṇīyāṃsam anusmared yaḥ /
analyzed: kavim purāṇam anuśāsitāram aṇoḥ aṇīyāṃsam anusmaret yaḥ

original: sarvasya dhātāram acintyarūpam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt // BhG_8.9 //
analyzed: sarvasya dhātāram acintya rūpam āditya varṇam tamasaḥ parastāt

original: prayāṇakāle manasācalena bhaktyā yukto yogabalena caiva /
analyzed: prayāṇa kāle manasā acalena bhaktyā yuktaḥ yoga balena ca eva

original: bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya samyak sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam // BhG_8.10 //
analyzed: bhruvoḥ madhye prāṇam āveśya samyak sa tam param puruṣam upaiti divyam

original: kaviṃ sarvajñan purāṇam purātanam anuśāsitāram viśvasya praśāsitāram aṇor aṇīyāṃsam jīvād api sūkṣmataram,
analyzed: kavim sarvajñan purāṇam purātanam anuśāsitāram viśvasya praśāsitāram aṇoḥ aṇīyāṃsam jīvāt api sūkṣmataram

original: sarvasya dhātāram sarvasya sraṣṭāram,
analyzed: sarvasya dhātāram sarvasya sraṣṭāram

original: acintyarūpam sakaletaravisajātīyasvarūpam,
ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastād aprākṛtasvāsādhāraṇadivyarūpam,
analyzed: āditya varṇam tamasaḥ parastāt a prākṛta sva a sādhāraṇa divya rūpam

original: tam evaṃbhūtam aharahar abhyasyamānabhaktiyuktayogabalena ārūḍhasaṃskāratayā acalena
analyzed: tam evaṃbhūtam ahar ahar abhyasyamāna bhakti yukta yoga balena ārūḍha saṃskāra tayā acalena

original: manasā prayāṇakāle bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya saṃsthāpya tatra bhūmadhye divyaṃ
analyzed: manasā prayāṇa kāle bhruvoḥ madhye prāṇam āveśya saṃsthāpya tatra bhū madhye divyam

original: puruṣaṃ yo 'nusmaret;
analyzed: puruṣam yaḥ anusmaret

original: sa tam evopaiti tadbhāvaṃ yāti,
analyzed: sa tam eva upaiti tad bhāvam yāti

original: tatsamānāiśvaryo bhavatītyarthaḥ // BhGR_8.9,10 //
analyzed: tad samāna aiśvaryaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: atha kaivalyārthināṃ smaraṇ aprakāram āha
analyzed: atha kaivalya arthinām āha

original: yad akṣaraṃ vedavido vadanti viśanti yad yatayo vītarāgāḥ /
analyzed: yat akṣaram veda vidaḥ vadanti viśanti yat yatayaḥ vīta rāgāḥ

original: yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa pravakṣye // BhG_8.11 //
analyzed: yat icchantaḥ brahmacaryam caranti tat te padam saṃgraheṇa pravakṣye

original: yad akṣaram asthūlatvādiguṇakaṃ vedavido vadanti,
analyzed: yat akṣaram a sthūla tva ādi guṇakam veda vidaḥ vadanti

original: vītarāgāś ca yatayo yad akṣaraṃ viśanti,
analyzed: vīta rāgāḥ ca yatayaḥ yat akṣaram viśanti

original: yad akṣaraṃ prāptum icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
analyzed: yat akṣaram prāptum icchantaḥ brahmacaryam caranti

original: tat padaṃ saṃgraheṇa te pravakṣye /
analyzed: tat padam saṃgraheṇa te pravakṣye

original: padyate gamyate cetaseti padam;
analyzed: padyate gamyate cetasā iti padam

original: tan nikhilavedāntavedyaṃ matsvarūpam akṣaraṃ yathā upāsyam,
analyzed: tat nikhila vedānta vedyam mad svarūpam akṣaram yathā upāsyam

original: tathā saṃkṣepeṇa pravakṣyāmītyarthaḥ // BhGR_8.11 //
analyzed: tathā saṃkṣepeṇa pravakṣyāmi iti arthaḥ

original: sarvadvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca /
analyzed: sarva dvārāṇi saṃyamya manaḥ hṛdi nirudhya ca

original: mūrdhny ādhāyātmanaḥ prāṇam āsthito yogadhāraṇām // BhG_8.12 //
analyzed: mūrdhni ādhāya ātmanaḥ prāṇam āsthitaḥ yoga dhāraṇām

original: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran /
analyzed: om iti ekākṣaram brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran

original: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim // BhG_8.13 //
analyzed: yaḥ prayāti tyajan deham sa yāti paramām gatim

original: sarvāṇi śrotrādīnīndriyāṇi jñānadvārabhūtāni saṃyamya svavyāpārebhyo vinivartya,
analyzed: sarvāṇi śrotra ādīni indriyāṇi jñāna dvāra bhūtāni saṃyamya sva vyāpārebhyaḥ vinivartya

original: hṛdayakamalaniviṣṭe mayy akṣare mano nirudhya,
analyzed: hṛdaya kamala niviṣṭe mayi akṣare manaḥ nirudhya

original: yogākhyāṃ dhāraṇām āsthitaḥ mayy eva niścalāṃ sthitim āsthitaḥ,
analyzed: yoga ākhyām dhāraṇām āsthitaḥ mayi eva niścalām sthitim āsthitaḥ

original: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma madvācakaṃ vyāharan,
analyzed: om iti ekākṣaram brahma mad vācakam vyāharan

original: vācyaṃ mām anusmaran,
analyzed: vācyam mām anusmaran

original: ātmanaḥ prāṇaṃ mūrdhny ādhāya dehaṃ tyajan yaḥ prayāti sa yāti paramāṃ gatiṃ prakṛtiviyuktaṃ matsamānākāram apunarāvṛttim ātmānaṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ
analyzed: ātmanaḥ prāṇam mūrdhni ādhāya deham tyajan yaḥ prayāti sa yāti paramām gatim prakṛti viyuktam mad samāna ākāram apunarāvṛttim ātmānam prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: “yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati //
analyzed: yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati

original: avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim //
analyzed: avyaktaḥ akṣaraḥ iti uktaḥ tam āhuḥ paramām gatim

original: BhGR_1.” ity anantaram eva vakṣyate //812, 13//
analyzed: iti anantaram eva vakṣyate

original: evam aiśvaryārthinaḥ kaivalyārthinaś ca svaprāpyānuguṇaṃ bhagavadupāsanaprakāra uktaḥ;
analyzed: evam aiśvarya arthinaḥ kaivalya arthinaḥ ca sva prāpya anuguṇam bhagavat upāsana prakāraḥ uktaḥ

original: atha jñānino bhagavadupāsanaprakāraṃ prāptiprakāraṃ cāha
analyzed: atha jñāninaḥ bhagavat upāsana prakāram prāpti prakāram ca āha

original: ananyacetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ /
analyzed: an anya cetāḥ satatam yaḥ mām smarati nityaśas

original: tasyāhaṃ sulabhaḥ pārtha nityayuktasya yoginaḥ // BhG_8.14 //
analyzed: tasya aham sulabhaḥ pārtha nitya yuktasya yoginaḥ

original: nityaśaḥ mām udyogaprabhṛti satataṃ sarvakālam ananyacetāḥ yaḥ smarati atyarthamatpriyatvena matsmṛtyā vinā ātmadhāraṇam alabhamāno niratiśayapriyāṃ  #
analyzed: nityaśas mām udyoga prabhṛti satatam sarvakālam an anya cetāḥ yaḥ smarati atyartha mad priya tvena mad smṛtyā vinā ātma dhāraṇam a labhamānaḥ niratiśaya priyām

original: smṛtiṃ yaḥ karoti;
analyzed: smṛtim yaḥ karoti

original: tasya nityayuktasya nityayogaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇasya yoginaḥ ahaṃ sulabhaḥ aham eva prāpyaḥ;
analyzed: tasya nitya yuktasya nitya yogam kāṅkṣamāṇasya yoginaḥ aham sulabhaḥ aham eva prāpyaḥ

original: na madbhāva aiśvaryādikaḥ suprāpaś ca /
analyzed: na mad bhāvaḥ aiśvarya ādikaḥ su prāpaḥ ca

original: tadviyogam asahamāno 'ham eva taṃ vṛṇe /
analyzed: tad viyogam asahamānaḥ aham eva tam vṛṇe

original: “yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyaḥ” iti hi śrūyate /
analyzed: yam eva eṣa vṛṇute tena labhyaḥ iti hi śrūyate

original: matprāptyanuguṇopāsanavipākaṃ tadvirodhinirasanam atyarthamatpriyatvādikaṃ cāham eva dadāmītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: mad prāpti anuguṇa upāsana vipākam tad virodhi nirasanam atyartha mad priya tva ādikam ca aham eva dadāmi iti arthaḥ

original: vakṣyate ca “teṣāṃ satatayuktānāṃ bhajatāṃ prītipūrvakam /
analyzed: vakṣyate ca teṣām satata yuktānām bhajatām prīti pūrvakam

original: dadāmi buddhiyogaṃ taṃ yena mām upāyānti te //
analyzed: dadāmi buddhi yogam tam yena mām upāyānti te

original: teṣām evānukampārtham aham ajñānajaṃ tamaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām eva anukampā artham aham ajñāna jam tamaḥ

original: nāśayāmy ātmabhāvastho jñānadīpena bhāsvatā // BhGR_1.” iti //814//
analyzed: nāśayāmi ātma bhāva sthaḥ jñāna dīpena bhāsvatā iti

original: ataḥ param adhyāyaśeṣeṇa jñāninaḥ kaivalyārthinaś cāpunarāvṛttim aiśvaryārthinaḥ punarāvṛttiṃ cāha
analyzed: atas param adhyāya śeṣeṇa jñāninaḥ kaivalya arthinaḥ ca apunarāvṛttim aiśvarya arthinaḥ punarāvṛttim ca āha

original: mām upetya punarjanma duḥkhālayam aśāśvatam /
analyzed: mām upetya punarjanma duḥkha ālayam aśāśvatam

original: nāpnuvanti mahātmānaḥ saṃsiddhiṃ paramāṃ gatāḥ // BhG_8.15 //
analyzed: na āpnuvanti mahātmānaḥ saṃsiddhim paramām gatāḥ

original: māṃ prāpya punarnikhiladuḥkhālayam aśāśvatam asthiraṃ janma na prāpnuvanti /
analyzed: mām prāpya punar nikhila duḥkha ālayam aśāśvatam asthiram janma na prāpnuvanti

original: yata ete mahātmānaḥ mahāmanasaḥ,
analyzed: yatas ete mahātmānaḥ mahā manasaḥ

original: yathāvasthitamatsvarūpajñānānā atyarthamatpriyatvena mayā vinā ātmadhāraṇam alabhamānā mayy āsktamanaso madāśrayā mām upāsya paramasaṃsiddhirūpaṃ  #
analyzed: yathā avasthita mad sva rūpa jñānānāḥ atyartha mad priya tvena mayā vinā ātma dhāraṇam a labhamānāḥ mayi āskta manasaḥ mad āśrayāḥ mām upāsya parama saṃsiddhi rūpam

original: māṃ prāptāḥ // BhGR_8.15 //
analyzed: mām prāptāḥ

original: aiśvaryagatiṃ prāptānāṃ bhagavantaṃ prāptānāṃ ca punarāvṛttau apunarāvṛttau ca hetum anantaram āha
analyzed: aiśvarya gatim prāptānām bhagavantam prāptānām ca punarāvṛttau apunarāvṛttau ca hetum anantaram āha

original: ā brahmabhuvanāl lokāḥ punarāvartino 'rjuna /
analyzed: ā brahma bhuvanāt lokāḥ punarāvartinaḥ arjuna

original: mām upetya tu kaunteya punarjanma na vidyate // BhG_8.16 //
analyzed: mām upetya tu kaunteya punarjanma na vidyate

original: brahmalokaparyantāḥ brahmāṇḍodaravartinas sarve lokā bhogāiśvaryālayāḥ punarāvartinaḥ vināśinaḥ /
analyzed: brahma loka paryantāḥ brahmāṇḍa udara vartinaḥ sarve lokāḥ bhoga aiśvarya ālayāḥ punarāvartinaḥ vināśinaḥ

original: ata aiśvaryagatiṃ prāptānāṃ prāpyasthānavināśād vināśitvam avarjanīyam /
analyzed: atas aiśvarya gatim prāptānām prāpya sthāna vināśāt vināśi tvam avarjanīyam

original: māṃ sarvajñaṃ satyasaṅkalpaṃ nikhilajagadutpattisthitilayalīlaṃ paramakāruṇikaṃ sadaikarūpaṃ prāptānāṃ vināśaprasaṅgābhāvāt teṣāṃ punarjanma  #
analyzed: mām sarvajñam satya saṅkalpam nikhila jagat utpatti sthiti laya līlam parama kāruṇikam sadā ekarūpam prāptānām vināśa prasaṅga abhāvāt teṣām punarjanma

original: na vidyate // BhGR_8.16 //
analyzed: na vidyate

original: brahmalokaparyantānāṃ lokānāṃ tadantarvartināṃ ca paramapuruṣasaṅkalpakṛtām utpattivināśakālavyavasthām āha
analyzed: brahma loka paryantānām lokānām tad antarvartinām ca paramapuruṣa saṅkalpa kṛtām utpatti vināśa kāla vyavasthām āha

original: sahasrayugaparyantam ahar yad brahmaṇo viduḥ /
analyzed: sahasra yuga paryantam ahar yat brahmaṇaḥ viduḥ

original: rātriṃ yugasahasrāntāṃ te 'horātravido janāḥ // BhG_8.17 //
analyzed: rātrim yuga sahasra antām te ahorātra vidaḥ janāḥ

original: avyaktād vyaktayaḥ sarvāḥ prabhavanty aharāgame /
analyzed: avyaktāt vyaktayaḥ sarvāḥ prabhavanti ahar āgame

original: rātryāgame pralīyante tatraivāvyaktasaṃjñake // BhG_8.18 //
analyzed: rātri āgame pralīyante tatra eva avyakta saṃjñake

original: bhūtagrāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate /
analyzed: bhūta grāmaḥ saḥ eva ayam bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate

original: rātryāgame 'vaśaḥ pārtha prabhavaty aharāgame // BhG_8.19 //
analyzed: rātri āgame avaśaḥ pārtha prabhavati ahar āgame

original: ye manuṣyādicaturmukhāntānāṃ matsaṅkalpakṛtāhorātravyavasthāvido janāḥ,
analyzed: ye manuṣya ādi caturmukha antānām mad saṅkalpa kṛta ahorātra vyavasthā vidaḥ janāḥ

original: te brahmaṇaś caturmukhasya yad ahaḥ tac caturyugasahasrāvasānaṃ viduḥ,
analyzed: te brahmaṇaḥ caturmukhasya yat ahar tat caturyuga sahasra avasānam viduḥ

original: rātriṃ ca tathārūpām /
analyzed: rātrim ca tathārūpām

original: tatra brahmaṇo 'harāgamasamaye trailokyāntarvartinyo dehendriyabhogyabhogasthānarūpā vyaktaś caturmukhadehāvasthād avyaktāt prabhavanti /
analyzed: tatra brahmaṇaḥ ahar āgama samaye trailokya antar vartinyaḥ deha indriya bhogya bhoga sthāna rūpāḥ vyaktaḥ caturmukha deha avasthāt avyaktāt prabhavanti

original: tatraiva avyaktāvasthāviśeṣe caturmukhadehe rātryāgamasamaye pralīyante /
analyzed: tatra eva avyakta avasthā viśeṣe caturmukha dehe rātri āgama samaye pralīyante

original: sa evāyaṃ karmavaśyo bhūtagrāmo 'harāgame bhūtvā bhutvā rātryāgame pralīyate /
analyzed: saḥ eva ayam karma vaśyaḥ bhūta grāmaḥ ahar āgame bhūtvā bhutvā rātri āgame pralīyate

original: punar apy aharāgame prabhavati /
analyzed: punar api ahar āgame prabhavati

original: tathā varṣatāvasānarūpayugasahasrānte brahmalokaparyantā lokāḥ brahmā ca,
analyzed: tathā varṣatā avasāna rūpa yuga sahasra ante brahma loka paryantāḥ lokāḥ brahmā ca

original: “pṛthivyapsu pralīyate āpastejasi līyante” ityādikrameṇa avyaktākṣaratamaḥparyantaṃ mayy eva pralīyante /
analyzed: pṛthivī apsu pralīyate āpaḥ tejasi līyante ityādi krameṇa avyakta akṣara tamaḥ paryantam mayi eva pralīyante

original: evaṃ madvyatiriktasya kṛtsnasya kālavyavasthayā matta utpatteḥ mayi pralayāc cotpattivināśayogitvam avarjanīyam ity aiśvaryagatiṃ prāptānāṃ  #
analyzed: evam mad vyatiriktasya kṛtsnasya kāla vyavasthayā mattaḥ utpatteḥ mayi pralayāt ca utpatti vināśa yogi tvam avarjanīyam iti aiśvarya gatim prāptānām

original: punarāvṛttir aparihāryā /
analyzed: punarāvṛttiḥ a parihāryā

original: mām upetānāṃ tu na punarāvṛttiprasaṅgaḥ // BhGR_8.19 //
analyzed: mām upetānām tu na punarāvṛtti prasaṅgaḥ

original: atha kaivalyaṃ praptānām api punarāvṛttir na vidyata ity aha
analyzed: atha kaivalyam praptānām api punarāvṛttiḥ na vidyate iti aha

original: paras tasmāt tu bhāvo 'nyo 'vyakto 'vyaktāt sanātanaḥ /
analyzed: paraḥ tasmāt tu bhāvaḥ anyaḥ avyaktaḥ avyaktāt sanātanaḥ

original: yasya sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati // BhG_8.20 //
analyzed: yasya sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati

original: avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim /
analyzed: avyaktaḥ akṣaraḥ iti uktaḥ tam āhuḥ paramām gatim

original: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama // BhG_8.21 //
analyzed: yam prāpya na nivartante tat dhāma paramam mama

original: tasmād avyaktād acetanaprakṛtirūpāt puruṣārthatayā paraḥ utkṛṣṭo bhāvo 'nyo jñānaikākāratayā tasmād visajātīyaḥ,
analyzed: tasmāt avyaktāt acetana prakṛti rūpāt puruṣa artha tayā paraḥ utkṛṣṭaḥ bhāvaḥ anyaḥ jñāna eka ākāra tayā tasmāt visajātīyaḥ

original: avyaktaḥ kenacit pramāṇena na vyajyata ity avyaktaḥ,
analyzed: avyaktaḥ kenacid pramāṇena na vyajyate iti avyaktaḥ

original: svasaṃvedyasvāsādhāraṇākāra ityarthaḥ;
sanātanaḥ utpattivināśānarhatayā nityaḥ yaḥ sarveṣu viyadādibhūteṣu sakāraṇeṣu sakāryeṣu vinaśyatsu tatra tatra sthito 'pi na vinaśyati;
analyzed: sanātanaḥ utpatti vināśa anarha tayā nityaḥ yaḥ sarveṣu viyat ādi bhūteṣu sa kāraṇeṣu sa kāryeṣu vinaśyatsu tatra tatra sthitaḥ api na vinaśyati

original: saḥ avyakto 'kṣara ityuktaḥ,
analyzed: saḥ avyaktaḥ akṣaraḥ iti uktaḥ

original: “ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate“,
analyzed: ye tu akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktam paryupāsate

original: “kūṭastho 'kṣara ucyate” ityādiṣu taṃ vedavidaḥ paramāṃ gatim āhuḥ /
analyzed: kūṭasthaḥ akṣaraḥ ucyate ityādiṣu tam veda vidaḥ paramām gatim āhuḥ

original: ayam eva, “yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim” ity atra paramagatiśabdanirdiṣṭo 'kṣaraḥ prakṛtisaṃsargaviyuktasvasvarūpeṇāvasthita  #
analyzed: ayam eva yaḥ prayāti tyajan deham sa yāti paramām gatim iti atra parama gati śabda nirdiṣṭaḥ akṣaraḥ prakṛti saṃsarga viyukta sva svarūpeṇa avasthita

original: ātmetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: ātmā iti arthaḥ

original: yam evaṃbhūtaṃ svarūpeṇāvasthitaṃ prāpya na nivartante;
analyzed: yam evaṃbhūtam sva rūpeṇa avasthitam prāpya na nivartante

original: tan mama paramaṃ dhāma paraṃ niyamanasthānam /
analyzed: tat mama paramam dhāma param niyamana sthānam

original: acetanaprakṛtir ekaṃ niyamanasthānam;
analyzed: acetana prakṛtiḥ ekam niyamana sthānam

original: tatsaṃsṛṣṭarūpā jīvaprakṛtir dvitīyaṃ niyamanasthānam /
analyzed: tad saṃsṛṣṭa rūpā jīva prakṛtiḥ dvitīyam niyamana sthānam

original: acitsaṃsargaviyuktaṃ svarūeṇāvathitaṃ muktasvarūpaṃ paramaṃ niyamanasthānam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: acit saṃsarga viyuktam mukta svarūpam paramam niyamana sthānam iti arthaḥ

original: tac cāpunarāvṛttirūpam /
analyzed: tat ca apunarāvṛtti rūpam

original: atha vā prakāśavācī dhāmaśabdaḥ;
analyzed: atha vā prakāśa vācī dhāma śabdaḥ

original: prakāśaḥ ceha jñānam abhipretam;
analyzed: prakāśaḥ ca iha jñānam abhipretam

original: prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭāt parichinnajñānarūpād ātmano 'paricchinnajñānarūpatayā muktasvarūpaṃ paraṃ dhāma // BhGR_1.20 //21//
analyzed: prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭāt parichinna jñāna rūpāt ātmanaḥ aparicchinna jñāna rūpa tayā mukta svarūpam param dhāma

original: jñāninaḥ prāpyaṃ tu tasmād atyantavibhaktam ity āha
analyzed: jñāninaḥ prāpyam tu tasmāt atyanta vibhaktam iti āha

original: puruṣas sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā /
analyzed: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyaḥ tu ananyayā

original: yasyāntassthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam // BhG_8.22 //
analyzed: yasya antar sthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idam tatam

original: “mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiñcid asti dhanaṃjaya /
analyzed: mattaḥ parataram na anyat kiñcid asti dhanaṃjaya

original: mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva //
analyzed: mayi sarvam idam protam sūtre maṇi gaṇāḥ iva

original: BhGR_1.“, “mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam” ityādinā nirdiṣṭasya yasya antassthāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni,
analyzed: mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam ityādinā nirdiṣṭasya yasya antassthāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni

original: yena ca pareṇa puruṣeṇa sarvam idaṃ tatam,
analyzed: yena ca pareṇa puruṣeṇa sarvam idam tatam

original: sa paraḥ puruṣaḥ “ananyacetās satatam” ity ananyayā bhaktyā labhyaḥ //822//
analyzed: sa paraḥ puruṣaḥ an anya cetāḥ satatam iti ananyayā bhaktyā labhyaḥ

original: athātmayāthātmyaviduḥ paramapuruṣaniṣṭasya ca sādharaṇīm arcirādikāṃ gatim āha dvayor apy arcirādikā gatiḥ śrutau śrutā /
analyzed: atha ātma yāthātmya viduḥ parama puruṣa niṣṭasya ca sādharaṇīm arciḥ ādikām gatim āha dvayoḥ api arciḥ ādikā gatiḥ śrutau śrutā

original: sā cāpunarāvṛttilakṣaṇā /
analyzed: sā ca apunarāvṛtti lakṣaṇā

original: yathā pañcāgnividyāyām,
analyzed: yathā pañcāgni vidyāyām

original: “tad ya itthaṃ vidur ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhā tapa ity upāsate,
analyzed: tat ye ittham viduḥ ye ca ime araṇye śraddhā tapaḥ iti upāsate

original: te 'rciṣam abhisaṃbhavanty arciṣo 'haḥ” ityādau /
analyzed: te arciṣam abhisaṃbhavanti arciṣaḥ ahar ityādau

original: arcirādikayā gatasya parabrahmaprāptir apunarāvṛttiś cāmnātā,
analyzed: arciḥ ādikayā gatasya para brahma prāptiḥ apunarāvṛttiḥ ca āmnātā

original: “sa enān brahma gamayati etena pratipadyamānā imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante” iti /
analyzed: saḥ enān brahma gamayati etena pratipadyamānāḥ imam mānavam āvartam na āvartante iti

original: na ca prajāpativākyādau śrutaparavidyāṅgabhūtātmaprāptiviṣayeyam,
analyzed: na ca prajāpati vākya ādau śruta para vidyā aṅga bhūta ātma prāpti viṣayā iyam

original: “tad ya itthaṃ viduḥ” iti gatiśrtuiḥ,
analyzed: tat ye ittham viduḥ iti gati śrtuiḥ

original: “ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhā tapa ity upāsate” iti paravidyāyāḥ pṛthakchrutivaiyārthyāt /
analyzed: ye ca ime araṇye śraddhā tapaḥ iti upāsate iti para vidyāyāḥ pṛthak śruti vaiyārthyāt

original: pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ca,
analyzed: pañcāgni vidyāyām ca

original: “iti tu pañcamyām āhutāv āpaḥ puruṣavacaso bhavanti” iti,
analyzed: iti tu pañcamyām āhutau āpaḥ puruṣa vacasaḥ bhavanti iti

original: “ramaṇīyacaraṇāḥ ... kapūyacaraṇāḥ” iti puṇyapāpahetuko manuṣyādibhāvo 'pām eva bhūtāntarasaṃsṛṣṭānām,
analyzed: ramaṇīya caraṇāḥ kapūya caraṇāḥ iti puṇya pāpa hetukaḥ manuṣya ādi bhāvaḥ apām eva bhūta antara saṃsṛṣṭānām

original: ātmanas tu tatpariṣvaṅgamātram iti cidacitor vivekam abhidhāya,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ tu tad pariṣvaṅga mātram iti cit acitoḥ vivekam abhidhāya

original: “tad ya itthaṃ viduḥ , , ,
analyzed: tat ye ittham viduḥ
