original: te 'rciṣam asaṃbhavanti ... imaṃ mānavam āvartaṃ nāvartante” iti vivikte cidacidvastunī tyājyatayā prāpyatayā ca ya itthaṃ viduḥ te 'rcirādinā
analyzed: te arciṣam asaṃbhavanti imam mānavam āvartam na āvartante iti vivikte cit acit vastunī tyājya tayā prāpya tayā ca ye ittham viduḥ te arciḥ ādinā

original: na ca punar āvartanta ity uktam iti gamyate /
analyzed: na ca punar āvartante iti uktam iti gamyate

original: ātmayāthātmyavidaḥ paramapuruṣaniṣṭhasya ca “sa enān brahma gamayati” iti brahmaprāptivacanād acidviyuktam ātmavastu brahmātmakatayā brahmaśeṣataikarasam  #
analyzed: ātma yāthātmya vidaḥ parama puruṣa niṣṭhasya ca saḥ enān brahma gamayati iti brahma prāpti vacanāt acit viyuktam ātma vastu brahma ātmaka tayā brahma śeṣa tā ekarasam

original: ity anusandheyam;
analyzed: iti anusandheyam

original: tatkratunyāyāc ca /
analyzed: tad kratu nyāyāt ca

original: paraśeṣataikarasatvaṃ ca “ya ātmani tiṣṭhan ... yasyātmā śarīram” ityādiśrutisiddham /
analyzed: para śeṣa tā eka rasa tvam ca yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan yasya ātmā śarīram ityādi śruti siddham

original: yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ /
analyzed: yatra kāle tu anāvṛttim āvṛttim ca eva yoginaḥ

original: prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha // BhG_8.23 //
analyzed: prayātāḥ yānti tam kālam vakṣyāmi bharata ṛṣabha

original: agnir jyotir ahaś śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam /
analyzed: agniḥ jyotiḥ ahar śuklaḥ ṣaṣ māsāḥ uttarāyaṇam

original: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ // BhG_8.24 //
analyzed: tatra prayātāḥ gacchanti brahma brahma vidaḥ janāḥ

original: atra kālaśabdo mārgasyāhaḥprabhṛtisaṃvatarāntakālābhimānidevatābhūyastayā mārgopalakṣaṇārthaḥ /
analyzed: atra kāla śabdaḥ mārgasya ahar prabhṛti saṃvatara anta kāla abhimāni devatā bhūyas tayā mārga upalakṣaṇa arthaḥ

original: yasmin mārge prayātā yogino 'nāvṛttiṃ puṇyakarmāṇaś cāvṛttiṃ yānti taṃ mārgaṃ vakṣyāmītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yasmin mārge prayātāḥ yoginaḥ anāvṛttim puṇya karmāṇaḥ ca avṛttim yānti tam mārgam vakṣyāmi iti arthaḥ

original: “agnir jyotir ahaś śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam” iti saṃvatsarādīnāṃ pradarśanam // BhGR_8.23,24 //
analyzed: agniḥ jyotiḥ ahar śuklaḥ ṣaṭ māsāḥ uttarāyaṇam iti saṃvatsara ādīnām pradarśanam

original: dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyaṇam /
analyzed: dhūmaḥ rātriḥ tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṣ māsāḥ dakṣiṇāyaṇam

original: tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate // BhG_8.25 //
analyzed: tatra cāndramasam jyotiḥ yogī prāpya nivartate

original: etac ca dhūmādimārgasthapitṛlokādeḥ pradarśanam /
analyzed: etat ca dhūma ādi mārga stha pitṛ loka ādeḥ pradarśanam

original: atra yogiśabdaḥ puṇyakarmasaṃbandhiviṣayaḥ // BhGR_8.25 //
analyzed: atra yogi śabdaḥ puṇya karma saṃbandhi viṣayaḥ

original: śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate /
analyzed: śukla kṛṣṇe gatī hi ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate

original: ekayā yāty anāvṛttim anyayāvartate punaḥ // BhG_8.26 //
analyzed: ekayā yāti anāvṛttim anyayā āvartate punar

original: śuklā gatiḥ arcirādikā,
analyzed: śuklā gatiḥ arciḥ ādikā

original: kṛṣṇā ca dhūmādikā /
analyzed: kṛṣṇā ca dhūma ādikā

original: śuklayānāvṛttiṃ yāti;
analyzed: śuklayā anāvṛttim yāti

original: kṛṣṇayā tu punar āvartate /
analyzed: kṛṣṇayā tu punar āvartate

original: ete śuklakṛṣṇe gatī jñānināṃ vividhānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇāṃ ca śrutau śāśvate mate /
analyzed: ete śukla kṛṣṇe gatī jñāninām vividhānām puṇya karmaṇām ca śrutau śāśvate mate

original: “tad ya itthaṃ vidur ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhā tapa ity upāsate te 'rciṣam abhisaṃbhavanti“,
analyzed: tat ye ittham viduḥ ye ca ime araṇye śraddhā tapaḥ iti upāsate te arciṣam abhisaṃbhavanti

original: “atha ya ime grāma iṣṭāpūrte dattam ity upāsate te dhūmam abhisaṃbhavanti” iti // BhGR_8.26 //
analyzed: atha ye ime grāme iṣṭāpūrte dattam iti upāsate te dhūmam abhisaṃbhavanti iti

original: naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaścana /
analyzed: na ete sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaścana

original: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu yogayukto bhavārjuna // BhG_8.27 //
analyzed: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu yoga yuktaḥ bhava arjuna

original: etau mārgau jānan yogī prayāṇakāle kaścana na muhyati;
analyzed: etau mārgau jānan yogī prayāṇa kāle kaścana na muhyati

original: api tu svenaiva devayānena pathā yāti /
analyzed: api tu svena eva deva yānena pathā yāti

original: tasmād aharahar cirādigaticintanākhyayogayukto bhava // BhGR_8.27 //
analyzed: tasmāt ahar ahar cira ādi gati cintana ākhya yoga yuktaḥ bhava

original: athādhyāyadvayoditaśāstrārthavedanaphalam āha
analyzed: atha adhyāya dvaya udita śāstra artha vedana phalam āha

original: vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapassu caiva dāne ca yat puṇyaphalaṃ pradiṣṭam /
analyzed: vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapassu ca eva dāne ca yat puṇya phalam pradiṣṭam

original: atyeti tat sarvam idaṃ viditvā yogī paraṃ sthānam upaiti cādyam // BhG_8.28 //
analyzed: atyeti tat sarvam idam viditvā yogī param sthānam upaiti ca ādyam

original: ṛgyajussāmātharvarūpavedābhyāsayajñatapodānaprabhṛtiṣu sarveṣu puṇyeṣu yat phalaṃ nirdiṣṭam,
analyzed: ṛk yajuḥ sāma atharva rūpa veda abhyāsa yajña tapaḥ dāna prabhṛtiṣu sarveṣu puṇyeṣu yat phalam nirdiṣṭam

original: idam adhyāyadvayoditaṃ bhagavanmāhātmyaṃ viditvā tat sarvam atyeti etadvedanasukhātirekeṇa tat sarvaṃ tṛṇavan manyate /
analyzed: idam adhyāya dvaya uditam bhagavat māhātmyam viditvā tat sarvam atyeti etad vedana sukha atirekeṇa tat sarvam tṛṇa vat manyate

original: yogī jñānī ca bhūtvā jñāninaḥ prāpyaṃ param ādyaṃ sthānam upaiti // BhGR_8.28 //
analyzed: yogī jñānī ca bhūtvā jñāninaḥ prāpyam param ādyam sthānam upaiti

original: upāsakabhedanibandhanā viśeṣāḥ pratipāditāḥ /
analyzed: upāsaka bheda nibandhanāḥ viśeṣāḥ pratipāditāḥ

original: idānīm upāsyasya paramapuruṣasya māhātmyam,
analyzed: idānīm upāsyasya paramapuruṣasya māhātmyam

original: jñānināṃ viśeṣaṃ ca viśodhya bhaktirūpasyopāsanasya svarūpam ucyate /
analyzed: jñāninām viśeṣam ca viśodhya bhakti rūpasya upāsanasya svarūpam ucyate

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: idaṃ tu guhyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave /
analyzed: idam tu guhyatamam pravakṣyāmi anasūyave

original: jñānaṃ vijñānasahitaṃ yaj jñātvā mokṣase 'śubhāt // BhG_9.1 //
analyzed: jñānam vijñāna sahitam yat jñātvā mokṣase aśubhāt

original: idaṃ tu guhyatamaṃ bhaktirūpam upāsanākhyaṃ jñānaṃ vijñānasahitam upāsanagataviśeṣajñānasahitam,
analyzed: idam tu guhyatamam bhakti rūpam upāsana ākhyam jñānam vijñāna sahitam upāsana gata viśeṣa jñāna sahitam

original: anasūyave te pravakṣyāmi madviṣayaṃ sakaletaravisajātīyam aparimitaprakāraṃ māhātmyaṃ śrutvā,
analyzed: anasūyave te pravakṣyāmi mad viṣayam sakala itara visajātīyam aparimita prakāram māhātmyam śrutvā

original: evam eva saṃbhavatīti manvānāya te pravakṣyāmītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: evam eva saṃbhavati iti manvānāya te pravakṣyāmi iti arthaḥ

original: yaj jñānam anuṣṭhānaparyantaṃ jñātvā matprāptivirodhinaḥ sarvasmād aśubhān mokṣyase // BhGR_9.1 //
analyzed: yat jñānam anuṣṭhāna paryantam jñātvā mad prāpti virodhinaḥ sarvasmāt aśubhāt mokṣyase

original: rājavidyā rājaguhyaṃ pavitram idam uttamam /
analyzed: rāja vidyā rāja guhyam pavitram idam uttamam

original: pratyakṣāvagamaṃ dharmyaṃ susukhaṃ kartum avyayam // BhG_9.2 //
analyzed: pratyakṣa avagamam dharmyam su sukham kartum avyayam

original: rājavidyā vidyānāṃ rājā,
analyzed: rāja vidyāḥ vidyānām rājā

original: rājaguhyaṃ guhyānāṃ rājā /
analyzed: rāja guhyam guhyānām rājā

original: rājñāṃ vidyeti vā rājavidyā /
analyzed: rājñām vidyā iti vā rāja vidyā

original: rājāno hi vistīrṇāgādhyamanasaḥ /
analyzed: rājānaḥ hi vistīrṇa āgādhya manasaḥ

original: mahāmanasām iyaṃ vidyetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: mahāmanasām iyam vidyā iti arthaḥ

original: mahāmanasa eva hi gopanīyagopanakuśalā iti teṣām eva guhyam /
analyzed: mahāmanasaḥ eva hi gopanīya gopana kuśalāḥ iti teṣām eva guhyam

original: idam uttamaṃ pavitraṃ matprāptivirodhyaśeṣakalmaṣāpaham /
analyzed: idam uttamam pavitram mad prāpti virodhi aśeṣa kalmaṣa apaham

original: pratyakṣāvagamam /
analyzed: pratyakṣa avagamam

original: avagamyata ity avagamaḥ viṣayaḥ;
analyzed: avagamyate iti avagamaḥ viṣayaḥ

original: pratyakṣabhūto 'vagamaḥ viṣayo yasya jñānasya tat pratyakṣāvagamam /
analyzed: pratyakṣa bhūtaḥ avagamaḥ viṣayaḥ yasya jñānasya tat pratyakṣāvagamam

original: bhaktirūpeṇopāsanenopāsyamāno 'haṃ tādānīm evopāsituḥ pratyakṣatām upagato bhavāmītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: bhakti rūpeṇa upāsanena upāsyamānaḥ aham tādānīm eva upāsituḥ pratyakṣa tām upagataḥ bhavāmi iti arthaḥ

original: athāpi dharmyaṃ dharmād anapetam /
analyzed: atha api dharmyam dharmāt an apetam

original: dharmatvaṃ hi niśśreyasasādhanatvam /
analyzed: dharma tvam hi niśśreyasa sādhana tvam

original: svarūpeṇaivātyarthapriyatvena tadānīm eva maddarśanāpādanatayā ca svayaṃ niśśreyasarūpam api niratiśayaniśśreyasarūpātyantikamatprāptisādhanam  #
analyzed: sva rūpeṇa evā atyartha priya tvena tadānīm eva mad darśana āpādanatayā ca svayam niśśreyasa rūpam api niratiśaya niśśreyasa rūpa ātyantika mad prāpti sādhanam

original: ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: iti arthaḥ

original: ata eva susukhaṃ kartuṃ susukhopādānam /
analyzed: atas eva su sukham kartum su sukha upādānam

original: atyarthapriyatvenopādeyam /
analyzed: atyartha priya tvena upādeyam

original: avyayam akṣayam;
analyzed: avyayam akṣayam

original: matprāptiṃ sādhayitvā+api svayaṃ na kṣīyate /
analyzed: mad prāptim sādhayitvā api svayam na kṣīyate

original: evaṃrūpam upāsanaṃ kurvato matpradāne kṛte 'pi kiṃcit kṛtaṃ mayā+asyeti me pratibhātītyarthaḥ // BhGR_9.2 //
analyzed: evaṃrūpam upāsanam kurvataḥ mad pradāne kṛte api kiṃcid kṛtam mayā asya iti me pratibhāti iti arthaḥ

original: aśraddadhānāḥ puruṣā dharmasyāsya parantapa /
analyzed: aśraddadhānāḥ puruṣāḥ dharmasya asya parantapa

original: aprāpya māṃ nivartante mṛtyusaṃsāravartmani // BhG_9.3 //
analyzed: a prāpya mām nivartante mṛtyu saṃsāra vartmani

original: asyopāsanākhyasya dharmasya niratiśayapriyamadviṣayatayā svayaṃ niratiśayapriyarūpasya
analyzed: asya upāsana ākhyasya dharmasya niratiśaya priya mad viṣaya tayā svayam niratiśaya priya rūpasya

original: paramaniśśreyasarūpamatprāptisādhanasyāvyayasyopādānayogyadaśāyāṃ prāpya aśraddadhānāḥ
analyzed: parama niśśreyasa rūpa mad prāpti sādhanasya avyayasya upādāna yogya daśāyām prāpya aśraddadhānāḥ

original: viśvāsapūrvakatvarārahitāḥ puruṣāḥ mām aprāpya mṛtyurūpe saṃsāravartmani nitarāṃ vartante /
analyzed: viśvāsa pūrvaka tvarā rahitāḥ puruṣāḥ mām a prāpya mṛtyu rūpe saṃsāra vartmani nitarām vartante

original: aho mahad idam āścaryam ityarthaḥ // BhGR_9.3 //
analyzed: aho mahat idam āścaryam iti arthaḥ

original: śṛṇu tāvat prāpyabhūtasya mamācintyamahimānam
analyzed: śṛṇu tāvat prāpya bhūtasya mama acintya mahimānam

original: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā /
analyzed: mayā tatam idam sarvam jagat avyakta mūrtinā

original: matsthāni sarvabhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣv avasthitaḥ // BhG_9.4 //
analyzed: mad sthāni sarva bhūtāni na ca aham teṣu avasthitaḥ

original: na ca matsthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram /
analyzed: na ca mad sthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram

original: bhūtabhṛn na ca bhūtastho mamātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ // BhG_9.5 //
analyzed: bhūta bhṛt na ca bhūta sthaḥ mama ātmā bhūta bhāvanaḥ

original: idaṃ cetanācetanātmakaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā aprakāśitasvarūpeṇa mayā antaryāmiṇā,
analyzed: idam cetana acetana ātmakam kṛtsnam jagat avyakta mūrtinā aprakāśita svarūpeṇa mayā antaryāmiṇā

original: tatam asya jagato dhāraṇārthaṃ niyamanārthaṃ ca śeṣitvena vyāptam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tatam asya jagataḥ dhāraṇa artham niyamana artham ca śeṣi tvena vyāptam iti arthaḥ

original: yathāntaryāmibrāhmaṇe,
analyzed: yathā antaryāmi brāhmaṇe

original: “yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan ... yaṃ pṛthivī na veda“,
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivyām tiṣṭhan yam pṛthivī na veda

original: “ya ātmani tiṣṭhan ... yam ātmā na veda” iti cetanācetanavastujātair adṛṣṭeṇāntaryāmiṇā tatra tatra vyāptir uktā /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan yam ātmā na veda iti cetana acetana vastu jātaiḥ adṛṣṭeṇa antaryāmiṇā tatra tatra vyāptiḥ uktā

original: tato matsthāni sarvabhūtāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni mayy antaryāmiṇi sthitāni /
analyzed: tatas mad sthāni sarva bhūtāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni mayi antaryāmiṇi sthitāni

original: tatraiva brāhmaṇe,
analyzed: tatra eva brāhmaṇe

original: “yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ ... yaḥ pṛthivīm antaro yamayati,
analyzed: yasya pṛthivī śarīram yaḥ pṛthivīm antaras yamayati

original: yasyātmā śarīraṃ ... ya ātmānam antaro yamayati” iti śarīratvena niyāmyatvapratipādanāt tadāyatte sthitiniyamane pratipādite;
analyzed: yasya ātmā śarīram yaḥ ātmānam antaraḥ yamayati iti śarīra tvena niyāmya tva pratipādanāt tad āyatte sthiti niyamane pratipādite

original: śeṣitvaṃ ca /
analyzed: śeṣi tvam ca

original: na cāhaṃ teṣv avasthitaḥ ahaṃ tu na tadāyattasthitiḥ;
analyzed: na ca aham teṣu avasthitaḥ aham tu na tad āyatta sthitiḥ

original: matsthitau tair na kaścid upakāra ityathaḥ /
analyzed: mad sthitau taiḥ na kaścid upakāraḥ

original: na ca matsthāni bhūtāni na ghaṭādīnāṃ jalāder iva mama dhārakatvam /
analyzed: na ca mad sthāni bhūtāni na ghaṭa ādīnām jala ādeḥ iva mama dhāraka tvam

original: katham? matsaṅkalpena /
analyzed: katham mad saṅkalpena

original: paśya mamāiśvaraṃ yogam anyatra kutracid asaṃbhāvanīyaṃ madasādhāraṇam āścaryaṃ yogaṃ paśya /
analyzed: paśya mama aiśvaram yogam anyatra kutracid asaṃbhāvanīyam mad asādhāraṇam āścaryam yogam paśya

original: ko 'sau yoga? bhūtabhṛn na ca bhūtastho mamātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ /
analyzed: kaḥ asau yoga bhūta bhṛt na ca bhūta sthaḥ mama ātmā bhūta bhāvanaḥ

original: sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ bhartāham;
analyzed: sarveṣām bhūtānām bhartā aham

original: na ca taiḥ kaścid api mamopakāraḥ /
analyzed: na ca taiḥ kaścid api mama upakāraḥ

original: mamātmaiva bhūtabhāvanaḥ mama manomayas saṅkalpa eva bhūtānāṃ bhāvayitā dhārayitā niyantā ca // BhGR_9.4,5 //
analyzed: mama ātmā eva bhūta bhāvanaḥ mama manaḥ mayaḥ saṅkalpaḥ eva bhūtānām bhāvayitā dhārayitā niyantā ca

original: sarvasyāsya svasaṅkalpāyattasthitipravṛttitve nidarśanam āha
analyzed: sarvasya asya sva saṅkalpa āyatta sthiti pravṛtti tve nidarśanam āha

original: yathā+ākāśasthito nityaṃ vāyuḥ sarvatrago mahān /
analyzed: yathā ākāśa sthitaḥ nityam vāyuḥ sarvatragaḥ mahān

original: tathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni matsthānīty upadhāraya // BhG_9.6 //
analyzed: tathā sarvāṇi bhūtāni mad sthāni iti upadhāraya

original: yathā ākaśe anālambane mahān vayuḥ sthitaḥ sarvatra gacchati;
analyzed: yathā ākaśe anālambane mahān vayuḥ sthitaḥ sarvatra gacchati

original: sa tu vāyur nirālambano madāyattasthitir ity avaśyābhyupagamanīyaḥ evam eva sarvāṇi bhūtāni tair adṛṣṭe mayi sthitāni mayaiva dhṛtānīty upadhāraya
analyzed: sa tu vāyuḥ nirālambanaḥ mad āyatta sthitiḥ iti avaśya abhyupagamanīyaḥ evam eva sarvāṇi bhūtāni taiḥ adṛṣṭe mayi sthitāni mayā eva dhṛtāni iti upadhāraya

original: yathā+āhur vedavidaḥ,
analyzed: yathā āhuḥ veda vidaḥ

original: “meghodayaḥ sāgarasannivṛttir indor vibhāgaḥ sphuritāni vāyoḥ /
analyzed: megha udayaḥ sāgara sannivṛttiḥ indoḥ vibhāgaḥ sphuritāni vāyoḥ

original: vidyudvibhaṅgo gatir uṣṇaraśmer viṣṇor vicitrāḥ prabhavanti māyāḥ” iti viṣṇor ananyasādhāraṇāni mahāścaryāṇītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: vidyut vibhaṅgaḥ gatiḥ uṣṇaraśmeḥ viṣṇoḥ vicitrāḥ prabhavanti māyāḥ iti viṣṇoḥ an anya sādhāraṇāni mahā āścaryāṇi iti arthaḥ

original: śrutir api, “etasya vā akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ“,
analyzed: śrutiḥ api etasya vai akṣarasya praśāsane gārgi sūryācandramasau vidhṛtau tiṣṭhataḥ

original: “bhīṣā+asmād vātaḥ pavate,
analyzed: bhīṣā asmāt vātaḥ pavate

original: bhīṣodeti sūryaḥ,
analyzed: bhīṣā udeti sūryaḥ

original: bhīṣā+asmād agniś cendraś ca” ityādikā // BhGR_9.6 //
analyzed: agniḥ ca indraḥ ca iti ādikā

original: sakaletaranirapekṣasya bhagavatas saṅkalpāt sarveṣāṃ sthitiḥ pravṛttiś coktā tathā tat saṅkalpād eva sarveṣām utpattipralayāv apīty āha
analyzed: sakala itara nirapekṣasya bhagavataḥ saṅkalpāt sarveṣām sthitiḥ pravṛttiḥ ca uktā tathā tat saṅkalpāt eva sarveṣām utpatti pralayau api iti āha

original: sarvabhūtāni kaunteya prakṛtiṃ yānti māmikām /
analyzed: sarva bhūtāni kaunteya prakṛtim yānti māmikām

original: kalpakṣaye punas tāni kalpādau visṛjāmy aham // BhG_9.7 //
analyzed: kalpa kṣaye punar tāni kalpa ādau visṛjāmi aham

original: sthāvarajaṅgamātmakāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni,
analyzed: sthāvara jaṅgama ātmakāni sarvāṇi bhūtāni

original: māmikām maccharīrabhūtām,
analyzed: māmikām mad śarīra bhūtām

original: prakṛtiṃ tamaśśabdavācyāṃ nāmarūpavibhāgānarhām,
analyzed: prakṛtim tamaḥ śabda vācyām nāma rūpa vibhāga anarhām

original: kalpakṣaye caturmukhāvasānasamaye matsaṅkalpād yānti;
analyzed: kalpa kṣaye caturmukha avasāna samaye mad saṅkalpāt yānti

original: tāny eva bhūtāni kalpādau punar visṛjyāmy aham;
analyzed: tāni eva bhūtāni kalpa ādau punar visṛjyāmi aham

original: yathā+āha manuḥ “āsīd idaṃ tamobhūtaṃ ... so 'bhidhyāya śarīrāt svāt” iti /
analyzed: yathā āha manuḥ āsīt idam tamaḥ bhūtam saḥ abhidhyāya śarīrāt svāt iti

original: śrutir api “yasyāvyaktaṃ śarīram“,
analyzed: śrutiḥ api yasya avyaktam śarīram

original: “avyaktam akṣare līyate,
analyzed: avyaktam akṣare līyate

original: akṣaraṃ tamasi līyate” ityādikā,
analyzed: akṣaram tamasi līyate iti ādikā

original: “tam āsīt tamasā gūḍham agre praketam” iti ca // BhGR_9.7 //
analyzed: tam āsīt tamasā gūḍham agre praketam iti ca

original: prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtim svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punar punar

original: bhūtagrāmam imaṃ kṛtsnam avaśaṃ prakṛter vaśāt // BhG_9.8 //
analyzed: bhūta grāmam imam kṛtsnam avaśam prakṛteḥ vaśāt

original: svakīyāṃ vicitrapariṇāminīṃ prakṛtim avaṣṭabhya aṣṭadhā pariṇāmyy imaṃ caturvidhaṃ
analyzed: svakīyām vicitra pariṇāminīm prakṛtim avaṣṭabhya aṣṭadhā pariṇāmyī imam caturvidham

original: devatiryaṅmanuṣyasthāvarātmakaṃ bhūtagrāmaṃ madīyāyā mohinyā guṇamayyāḥ prakṛter
analyzed: deva tiryak manuṣya sthāvara ātmakam bhūta grāmam madīyāyāḥ mohinyāḥ guṇa mayyāḥ prakṛteḥ

original: vaśād avaśaṃ punaḥ punaḥ kāle kāle visṛjāmi // BhGR_9.8 //
analyzed: vaśāt avaśam punar punar kāle kāle visṛjāmi

original: evaṃ tarhi viṣamasṛṣṭyādīni karmāṇi naighṛṇyādyāpādanena bhavantaṃ badhnantīty atrāha
analyzed: evam tarhi viṣama sṛṣṭi ādīni karmāṇi naighṛṇya ādi āpādanena bhavantam badhnanti iti atra āha

original: na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanañjaya /
analyzed: na ca mām tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanañjaya

original: udāsīnavad āsīnam asaktaṃ teṣu karmasu // BhG_9.9 //
analyzed: udāsīna vat āsīnam asaktam teṣu karmasu

original: na ca tāni viṣamasṛṣṭyādīni karmāṇi māṃ nibadhnanti mayi nairghṛṇyādikaṃ nāpādayanti,
analyzed: na ca tāni viṣama sṛṣṭi ādīni karmāṇi mām nibadhnanti mayi nairghṛṇya ādikam nā āpādayanti

original: yataḥ kṣetrajñānāṃ pūrvakṛtāny eva karmāṇi devādiviṣamabhāvahetavaḥ;
analyzed: yatas kṣetrajñānām pūrva kṛtāni eva karmāṇi deva ādi viṣama bhāva hetavaḥ

original: ahaṃ tu tatra vaiṣamye asaktaḥ tatrodāsīnavad āsīnaḥ;
analyzed: aham tu tatra vaiṣamye asaktaḥ tatra udāsīna vat āsīnaḥ

original: yathā +āha sūtrakāraḥ “vaiṣamyanairghṛṇye na sāpekṣatvāt“,
analyzed: yathā āha sūtrakāraḥ vaiṣamya nairghṛṇye na sāpekṣa tvāt

original: na karmāvibhāgād iti cen nānāditvāt” iti // BhGR_9.9 //
analyzed: na karma avibhāgāt iti ced na anādi tvāt iti

original: mayā+adhyakṣeṇa prakṛtiḥ sūyate sacarācaram /
analyzed: mayā a adhyakṣeṇa prakṛtiḥ sūyate sacarācaram

original: hetunā+anena kaunteya jagad dhi parivartate // BhG_9.10 //
analyzed: hetunā aanena kaunteya jagat hi parivartate

original: tasmāt kṣetrajñakarmānuguṇaṃ madīyā prakṛtiḥ satyasaṅkalpena mayā+adhyakṣeṇekṣitā sacarācaraṃ jagat sūyate /
analyzed: tasmāt kṣetrajña karma anuguṇam madīyā prakṛtiḥ satya saṅkalpena mayā adhyakṣeṇa īkṣitā sacarācaram jagat sūyate

original: anena kṣetrajñakarmānuguṇamadīkṣaṇena hetunā jagat parivartata iti matsvāmyaṃ satyasaṅkalpatvaṃ nairghṛṇyādidoṣarahitatvam ity evam ādikaṃ  #
analyzed: anena kṣetrajña karma anuguṇam a dīkṣaṇena hetunā jagat parivartate iti mad svāmyam satya saṅkalpa tvam nairghṛṇya ādi doṣa rahita tvam iti evam ādikam

original: mama vasudevasūnor aiśvaraṃ yogaṃ paśya /
analyzed: mama vasudeva sūnoḥ aiśvaram yogam paśya

original: yathā+āha śrutiḥ,
analyzed: yathā āha śrutiḥ

original: “asmān māyī sṛjate viśvam etat tasmiṃś cānyo māyayā sanniruddhaḥ /
analyzed: asmāt māyī sṛjate viśvam etat tasmin ca anyaḥ māyayā san niruddhaḥ

original: māyāṃ tu prakṛtiṃ vidyān māyinaṃ tu mheśvaram // BhGR_1.” iti //910//
analyzed: māyām tu prakṛtim vidyāt māyinam tu mheśvaram iti

original: avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam /
analyzed: avajānanti mām mūḍhāḥ mānuṣīm tanum āśritam

original: paraṃ bhāvam ajānanto mama bhūtamaheśvaram // BhG_9.11 //
analyzed: param bhāvam a jānantaḥ mama bhūta maheśvaram

original: evaṃ māṃ bhūtamaheśvaraṃ sarvajñaṃ satyasaṅkalpaṃ nikhilajagadekakāraṇaṃ paramakāruṇikatayā
analyzed: evam mām bhūta maheśvaram sarvajñam satya saṅkalpam nikhila jagat eka kāraṇam parama kāruṇika tayā

original: sarvasamāśrayaṇīyatvāya mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritaṃ svakṛtaiḥ pāpakarmabhir mūḍhā avajānanti
analyzed: sarva samāśrayaṇīya tvāya mānuṣīm tanum āśritam sva kṛtaiḥ pāpa karmabhiḥ mūḍhāḥ avajānanti

original: prākṛtamanuṣyasamaṃ manyante /
analyzed: prākṛta manuṣya samam manyante

original: bhūtamaheśvarasya mamāpārakāruṇyodāryasauśīlyavātsalyanibandhanaṃ manuṣyatvasamāśrayaṇalakṣaṇam
analyzed: bhūta maheśvarasya mama apāra kāruṇya udārya sauśīlya vātsalya nibandhanam manuṣya tva samāśrayaṇa lakṣaṇam

original: imaṃ paraṃ bhāvam ajānanto manuṣyatvasamāśrayaṇamātreṇa mām itarasajātīyaṃ matvā
analyzed: imam param bhāvam a jānantaḥ manuṣya tva samāśrayaṇa mātreṇa mām itara sajātīyam matvā

original: tiraskurvantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_9.11 //
analyzed: tiraskurvanti iti arthaḥ

original: moghāśā moghakarmāṇo moghajñānā vicetasaḥ /
analyzed: mogha āśāḥ mogha karmāṇaḥ mogha jñānāḥ vicetasaḥ

original: rākṣasīm āsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ śritāḥ // BhG_9.12 //
analyzed: rākṣasīm āsurīm ca eva prakṛtim mohinīm śritāḥ

original: mama manuṣyatve paramakāruṇyādiparatvatirodhānakarīṃ rākṣasīm āsurīṃ ca mohinīṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ,
analyzed: mama manuṣya tve parama kāruṇya ādi para tva tirodhāna karīm rākṣasīm āsurīm ca mohinīm prakṛtim āśritāḥ

original: moghāśāḥ moghvāñ chitāḥ niṣphalavāñ chitāḥ,
analyzed: mogha āśāḥ moghvām chitāḥ niṣphalavām chitāḥ

original: moghkarmāṇaḥ moghārambhāḥ,
analyzed: mogha karmāṇaḥ mogha ārambhāḥ

original: moghajñānāḥ sarveṣu madīyeṣu carācareṣv artheṣu viparītajñānatayā niṣphalajñānāḥ,
analyzed: mogha jñānāḥ sarveṣu madīyeṣu carācareṣu artheṣu viparīta jñāna tayā niṣphala jñānāḥ

original: vicetasaḥ tathā sarvatra vigatayāthātmyajñānāḥ māṃ sarveśvaram itarasamaṃ matvā mayi ca yat kartum icchanti,
analyzed: vicetasaḥ tathā sarvatra vigata yāthātmya jñānāḥ mām sarveśvaram itara samam matvā mayi ca yat kartum icchanti

original: yad uddiśyārambhān kurvate,
analyzed: yat uddiśya ārambhān kurvate

original: tat sarvaṃ moghaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ // BhGR_9.12 //
analyzed: tat sarvam mogham bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: mahātmānas tu mām pārtha daivīṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ /
analyzed: mahātmānaḥ tu mām pārtha daivīm prakṛtim āśritāḥ

original: bhajanty ananyamanaso jñātvā bhūtādim avyayam // BhG_9.13 //
analyzed: bhajanti an anya manasaḥ jñātvā bhūtādim avyayam

original: ye tu svakṛtaiḥ puṇyasañcayaiḥ māṃ śaraṇam upagamya vidhvastasamastapāpabandhā daivīṃ prakṛtim āśritā mahātmānaḥ, te,
analyzed: ye tu sva kṛtaiḥ puṇya sañcayaiḥ mām śaraṇam upagamya vidhvasta samasta pāpa bandhāḥ daivīm prakṛtim āśritāḥ mahātmānaḥ te

original: bhūtādim avyayam vāṅmanasāgocaranāmakarmasvarūpaṃ paramakāruṇikatayā sādhuparitrāṇāya manuṣyatvenāvatīrṇaṃ māṃ jñātvā+ananyamanaso māṃ bhajante;
analyzed: bhūtādim avyayam vāc manasā agocara nāma karma svarūpam parama kāruṇika tayā sādhu paritrāṇāya manuṣya tvena avatīrṇam mām jñātvā ananya manasaḥ mām bhajante

original: matpriyatvātirekeṇa madbhajanena vinā manasaś cātmanaś ca bāhyakaraṇānāṃ ca dhāraṇam alabhamānā madbhajanaikaprayojanā bhajante // BhGR_9.13
analyzed: mad priya tva atirekeṇa mad bhajanena vinā manasaḥ ca ātmanaḥ ca bāhya karaṇānām ca dhāraṇam a labhamānāḥ mad bhajana eka prayojanāḥ bhajante  /

original: satataṃ kīrtayanto māṃ yatantaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ /
analyzed: satatam kīrtayantaḥ mām yatantaḥ ca dṛḍha vratāḥ

original: namasyantaś ca māṃ bhaktyā nityayuktā upāsate // BhG_9.14 //
analyzed: namasyantaḥ ca mām bhaktyā nitya yuktāḥ upāsate

original: atyarthamatpriyatvena matkīrtanayatananamaskārair vinā kṣaṇāṇumātre 'py ātmadhāraṇam alabhamānāḥ,
analyzed: atyartha mad priya tvena mad kīrtana yatana namaskāraiḥ vinā kṣaṇa aṇu mātre api ātma dhāraṇam a labhamānāḥ

original: madguṇaviśeṣavācīni mannāmāni smṛtvā pulakāñcitasarvāṅgāḥ harṣagadgadakaṇṭhāḥ,
analyzed: mad guṇa viśeṣa vācīni mad nāmāni smṛtvā pulaka āñcita sarva aṅgāḥ harṣa gadgada kaṇṭhāḥ

original: nārāyaṇakṛṣṇavāsedevety evam ādīni satataṃ kīrtayantaḥ,
analyzed: nārāyaṇa kṛṣṇa vāsedeva iti evam ādīni satatam kīrtayantaḥ

original: tathaiva yatantaḥ matkarmasv arcanādikeṣu,
analyzed: tathā eva yatantaḥ mad karmasu arcana ādikeṣu

original: tadupakāreṣu bhavananandanavanakaraṇādikeṣu ca dṛḍhasaṅkalpā yatamānāḥ,
analyzed: tad upakāreṣu bhavana nandana vana karaṇa ādikeṣu ca dṛḍha saṅkalpāḥ yatamānāḥ

original: bhaktibhārāvanamitamanobuddhyabhimānapadadvayakaradvayaśirobhir aṣṭāṅgair acintitapāṃsukardamaśarkarādike dharātale daṇḍavat praṇipatantaḥ,
analyzed: bhakti bhāra avanamita manaḥ buddhi abhimāna pada dvaya kara dvaya śirobhiḥ aṣṭāṅgaiḥ a cintita pāṃsu kardama śarkarā ādike dharā tale daṇḍa vat praṇipatantaḥ

original: satataṃ māṃ nityayuktāḥ nityayogaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇā ātmāntaṃ maddāsyavyavasāyinaḥ upāsate // BhGR_9.14 //

original: evaṃ mahātmanāṃ jñānināṃ bhagavadanubhavaikabhogānāṃ vṛttam uktvā teṣām eva viśeṣaṃ darśayitum ajñānāṃ kāmakāmānāṃ vṛttam āha

analyzed: mahātmanaḥ tu niratiśaya priya rūpa mad cintanam kṛtvā mām anavadhika atiśaya ānandam punar āvartante iti teṣām viśeṣam darśayati

analyzed: mad cintanena vinā ātma dhāraṇā lābhāt mad cintana eka prayojanāḥ mām cintayantaḥ ye mahātmānaḥ janāḥ paryupāsate sarva kalyānṇa guṇa anvitam sarva vibhūti yuktam

original: vrataśabdaḥ saṅklpavācī;
analyzed: vrata śabdaḥ saṅklpa vācī

original: devavratāḥ darśapūrṇamāsādibhiḥ karmabhiḥ indrādīn yajāmahe iti indrādiyajanasaṅkalpā ye,
analyzed: deva vratāḥ darśa pūrṇamāsa ādibhiḥ karmabhiḥ indra ādīn yajāmahe iti indra ādi yajana saṅkalpāḥ ye

original: te indrādīn devān yānti /
analyzed: te indra ādīn devān yānti

original: ye ca pitṛyajñādibhiḥ pitQn yajāmahe iti pitṛyajanasaṅkalpāḥ,
analyzed: ye ca pitṛ yajña ādibhiḥ yajāmahe iti pitṛ yajana saṅkalpāḥ

original: te pitQn yānti /
analyzed: te pitqn yānti

original: ye ca “yakṣarakaṣaḥpiśācādīni bhūtāni yajāmahe” iti bhūtayajanasaṅkalpāḥ,
analyzed: ye ca yakṣa raka ṣaḥ piśāca ādīni bhūtāni yajāmahe iti bhūta yajana saṅkalpāḥ

original: te bhūtāni yānti /
analyzed: te bhūtāni yānti

original: ye te tair eva yajñaiḥ “devapitṛbhūtaśarīrakaṃ paramātmānaṃ bhagavantaṃ vāsudevaṃ yajāmahe” iti māṃ yajante,
analyzed: ye te taiḥ eva yajñaiḥ deva pitṛ bhūta śarīrakam paramātmānam bhagavantam vāsudevam yajāmahe iti mām yajante

original: te madyājino mām eva yānti /
analyzed: te mad yājinaḥ mām eva yānti

original: devādivratāḥ devādīn prāpya tais saha parimitaṃ bhogaṃ bhuktvā teṣāṃ vinaśakāle tais saha vinaṣṭā bhavanti /
analyzed: deva ādi vratāḥ deva ādīn prāpya taiḥ saha parimitam bhogam bhuktvā teṣām vinaśa kāle taiḥ saha vinaṣṭāḥ bhavanti

original: madyājinas tu mām anādinidhanaṃ sarvajñaṃ satyasaṅkalpam anavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇamahodadhim
analyzed: mad yājinaḥ tu mām an ādi nidhanam sarvajñam satya saṅkalpam anavadhika atiśaya asaṃkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa mahā udadhim

original: anavadhikātiśayānandaṃ prāpya na punar nivartanta ityarthaḥ // BhGR_9.25 //
analyzed: anavadhika atiśaya ānandam prāpya na punar nivartante iti arthaḥ

original: madyājinām ayam api viśeṣo 'stīty āha
analyzed: mad yājinām ayam api viśeṣaḥ asti iti āha

original: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati /
analyzed: patram puṣpam phalam toyam yaḥ me bhaktyā prayacchati

original: tad ahaṃ bhaktyupahṛtam aśnāmi prayatātmanaḥ // BhG_9.26 //
analyzed: tat aham bhakti upahṛtam aśnāmi prayata ātmanaḥ

original: sarvasulabhaṃ patraṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā phalaṃ vā toyaṃ vā yo bhaktyā me prayacchati atyarthamatpriyatvena
analyzed: sarva sulabham patram vā puṣpam vā phalam vā toyam vā yaḥ bhaktyā me prayacchati atyartha mad priya tvena

original: tatpradānena vinā+ātmadhāraṇam alabhamānatayā tadekaprayojano yo me patrādikaṃ dadāti;
analyzed: tad pradānena vinā ātma dhāraṇam alabhamāna tayā tad eka prayojanaḥ yaḥ me patra ādikam dadāti

original: tasya prayatātmanaḥ tatpradānaikaprayojanatvarūpaśuddhiyuktamanasaḥ,
analyzed: tasya prayata ātmanaḥ tad pradāna eka prayojana tva rūpa śuddhi yukta manasaḥ

original: tat tathāvidhabhaktyupahṛtam,
analyzed: tat tathāvidha bhakti upahṛtam

original: aham sarveśvaro nikhilajagadudayavibhavalayalīlā+avāptasamastakāmaḥ satyasaṅkalpo 'navadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaḥ svābhāvikānavadhikātiśayānandasvānubhave  #
analyzed: aham sarveśvaraḥ nikhila jagat udaya vibhava laya līlā avāpta samasta kāmaḥ satya saṅkalpaḥ anavadhika atiśaya asaṃkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇaḥ svābhāvika anavadhika atiśaya ānanda sva anubhave

original: vartamāno 'pi,
analyzed: vartamānaḥ api

original: manorathapathadūravarti priyaṃ prāpyaivāśnāmi /
analyzed: manoratha patha dūra varti priyam prāpya eva aśnāmi

original: yathoktaṃ mokṣadharme,
analyzed: yathā uktam mokṣadharme

original: “yāḥ kriyāḥ saṃprayuktās syur ekāntagatabuddhibhiḥ /
analyzed: yāḥ kriyāḥ saṃprayuktāḥ syuḥ ekānta gata buddhibhiḥ

original: tāḥ sarvāḥ śirasā devaḥ pratigṛhṇāti vai svayam” iti // BhGR_9.26 //
analyzed: tāḥ sarvāḥ śirasā devaḥ pratigṛhṇāti vai svayam iti

original: yasmāj jñānināṃ mahātmanāṃ vāṅmanasāgocaro 'yaṃ viśeṣaḥ,
analyzed: yasmāt jñāninām mahātmanām vāc manasā agocaraḥ ayam viśeṣaḥ

original: tasmāt tvaṃ ca jñānī bhūtvā uktalakṣaṇabhaktibhārāvanamitātmā ātmīyaḥ kīrtanayatanārcanapraṇāmādikaṃ
analyzed: tasmāt tvam ca jñānī bhūtvā ukta lakṣaṇa bhakti bhāra avanamita ātmā ātmīyaḥ kīrtana yatana arcana praṇāma ādikam

original: satataṃ kurvāṇo laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ ca nityanaimittikaṃ karma cetthaṃ kurv ity āhā
analyzed: satatam kurvāṇaḥ laukikam vaidikam ca nitya naimittikam karma ca ittham kuru iti āha ā

original: yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj jahoṣi dadāsi yat /
analyzed: yat karoṣi yat aśnāsi yat jahoṣi dadāsi yat

original: yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva madarpaṇam // BhG_9.27 //
analyzed: yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva mad arpaṇam

original: yad dehayātrāśeṣabhūtaṃ laukikaṃ karma karoṣi,
analyzed: yat dehayātrā śeṣa bhūtam laukikam karma karoṣi

original: yac ca dehadhāraṇāyāśnāsi,
analyzed: yat ca dehadhāraṇāya aśnāsi

original: yac ca vaidikaṃ homadānatapaḥprabhṛti nityanaimittikaṃ karma karoṣi,
analyzed: yat ca vaidikam homa dāna tapaḥ prabhṛti nitya naimittikam karma karoṣi

original: tat sarvaṃ madarpaṇaṃ kuruṣva /
analyzed: tat sarvam mad arpaṇam kuruṣva

original: arpyata ity arpaṇam sarvasya laukikasya vaidikasya ca karmaṇaḥ kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvam ārādhyatvaṃ ca yathā mayi samarpitaṃ bhavati tathā kuru
analyzed: arpyate iti arpaṇam sarvasya laukikasya vaidikasya ca karmaṇaḥ kartṛ tvam bhoktṛ tvam ārādhya tvam ca yathā mayi samarpitam bhavati tathā kuru

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati yāgadānādiṣu ārādhyatayā pratīyamānānāṃ devādīnāṃ karmakartur
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yāga dāna ādiṣu ārādhya tayā pratīyamānānām deva ādīnām karma kartuḥ

original: bhoktuḥ tava ca madīyatayā matsaṅkalpāyattasvarūpasthitipravṛttitayā ca mayy eva
analyzed: bhoktuḥ tava ca madīya tayā mad saṅkalpa āyatta svarūpa sthiti pravṛtti tayā ca mayi eva

original: paramaśeṣiṇi paramakartari tvāṃ ca kartāraṃ bhoktāram ārādhakam,
analyzed: parama śeṣiṇi parama kartari tvām ca kartāram bhoktāram ārādhakam

original: ārādhyaṃ ca devatājātam,
analyzed: ārādhyam ca devatā jātam

original: ārādhanaṃ ca kriyājātaṃ sarvaṃ samarpaya;
analyzed: ārādhanam ca kriyā jātam sarvam samarpaya

original: tava manniyāmyatāpūrvakamaccheṣataikarasatām ārādhyādes caitatsvabhāvagarbhatām atyarthaprītiyukto 'nusaṃdhatsva iti // BhGR_9.27 //
analyzed: tava mad niyāmya tā pūrvaka maccheṣa tā eka rasa tām ārādhya ādeḥ ca etad svabhāva garbha tām atyartha prīti yuktaḥ anusaṃdhatsva iti

original: śubhāśubhaphalair evaṃ mokṣyase karmabandhanaiḥ /
analyzed: śubha aśubha phalaiḥ evam mokṣyase karma bandhanaiḥ

original: saṃnyāsayogayuktātmā vimukto mām upaiṣyasi // BhG_9.28 //
analyzed: saṃnyāsa yoga yukta ātmā vimuktaḥ mām upaiṣyasi

original: evaṃ saṃnyāsākhyayogayuktamanāḥ ātmānaṃ maccheṣatāmanniyāmyataikarasaṃ karma ca sarvaṃ
analyzed: evam saṃnyāsa ākhya yoga yukta manāḥ ātmānam karma ca sarvam

original: madārādhanam anusaṃdadhāno laukikaṃ vaidikaṃ ca karma kurvan śubhāśubhaphalair anantaiḥ
analyzed: mad ārādhanam anusaṃdadhānaḥ laukikam vaidikam ca karma kurvan śubha aśubha phalaiḥ anantaiḥ

original: prācīnakarmākhyair bandhanair matprāptivirodhibhis sarvair mokṣyase;
analyzed: prācīnakarma ākhyaiḥ bandhanaiḥ mad prāpti virodhibhiḥ sarvaiḥ mokṣyase

original: tair vimukto mām evopaiṣyasi // BhGR_9.28 //
analyzed: taiḥ vimuktaḥ mām eva upaiṣyasi

original: mamemaṃ paramam atilokaṃ svabhāvaṃ śṛṇu
analyzed: mama imam paramam ati lokam svabhāvam śṛṇu

original: samo 'haṃ sarvabhūteṣu na me dveṣyo 'sti na priyaḥ /
analyzed: samaḥ aham sarva bhūteṣu na me dveṣyaḥ asti na priyaḥ

original: ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham // BhG_9.29 //
analyzed: ye bhajanti tu mām bhaktyā mayi te teṣu ca api aham

original: devatiryaṅmanuṣyasthāvarātmanā+avasthiteṣu jātitaś cākārataḥ svabhāvato jñānataś cātyantotkṛṣṭāpakṛṣṭarūpeṇa vartamāneṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu samāśrayaṇīyatve  #
analyzed: deva tiryak manuṣya sthāvara ātmanā avasthiteṣu jātitaḥ ca ākārataḥ svabhāvataḥ jñānataḥ ca atyanta utkṛṣṭa apakṛṣṭa rūpeṇa vartamāneṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu samāśrayaṇīya tve

original: samo 'ham;
analyzed: samaḥ aham

original: ayaṃ jātyākārasvabhāvajñānādibhir nirkṛṣṭa iti samāśrayaṇe na me dveṣyo 'sti udvejanīyatayā na tyājyo 'sti /
analyzed: ayam jāti ākāra svabhāva jñāna ādibhiḥ nirkṛṣṭaḥ iti samāśrayaṇe na me dveṣyaḥ asti udvejanīya tayā na tyājyaḥ asti

original: tathā samāśritatvātirekeṇa jātyādibhir atyantotkṛṣṭo 'yam iti tadvyuktatayā samāśrayaṇe na kaścit priyo 'sti na saṃgrāhyo 'sti /
analyzed: tathā samāśrita tva atirekeṇa jāti ādibhiḥ atyanta utkṛṣṭaḥ ayam iti tad vyukta tayā samāśrayaṇe na kaścid priyaḥ asti na saṃgrāhyaḥ asti

original: api tu atyarthamatpriyatvena madbhajanena vinā+ātmadhāraṇālābhān madbhajanaikaprayojanā ye māṃ bhajante,
analyzed: api tu atyartha mad priya tvena mad bhajanena vinā ātma dhāraṇā lābhāt mad bhajana eka prayojanāḥ ye mām bhajante

original: te jātyādibhir utkṛṣṭā apakṛṣṭā vā matsamānaguṇavad yathāsukhaṃ mayy eva vartante /
analyzed: te jāti ādibhiḥ utkṛṣṭāḥ apakṛṣṭāḥ vā mad samāna guṇavat yathāsukham mayi eva vartante

original: aham api teṣu madutkṛṣṭeṣv iva varte // BhGR_9.29 //
analyzed: aham api teṣu mad utkṛṣṭeṣu iva varte

original: tatrāpi
analyzed: tatra api

original: api cet sudurācāro bhajate mām ananyabhāk /
analyzed: api ced su durācāraḥ bhajate mām an anya bhāj

original: sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyagvyavasito hi saḥ // BhG_9.30 //
analyzed: sādhuḥ eva sa mantavyaḥ samyak vyavasitaḥ hi saḥ

original: tatra tatra jātiviśeṣe jātānāṃ yaḥ samācāra upādeyaḥ pariharaṇīyaś ca,
analyzed: tatra tatra jāti viśeṣe jātānām yaḥ samācāraḥ upādeyaḥ pariharaṇīyaḥ ca

original: tasmād ativṛtto 'py uktaprakāreṇa mām ananyabhāk bhajanaikaprayojano bhajate cet,
analyzed: tasmāt ativṛttaḥ api ukta prakāreṇa mām ananya bhāj bhajana eka prayojanaḥ bhajate ced

original: sādhur eva saḥ vaiṣṇavāgresara eva saḥ /
analyzed: sādhuḥ eva saḥ vaiṣṇava agresaraḥ eva saḥ

original: mantavyaḥ bahumantavyaḥ pūrvoktais sama ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: mantavyaḥ bahu mantavyaḥ pūrvoktaiḥ samaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: kuta etat? samyagvyavasito hi saḥ yato 'sya vyavasāyaḥ susamīcīnaḥ bhagavān nikhilajagadekakāraṇabhūtaḥ
analyzed: kutas etat samyak vyavasitaḥ hi saḥ yatas asya vyavasāyaḥ su samīcīnaḥ bhagavān nikhila jagat eka kāraṇa bhūtaḥ

original: paraṃ brahma nārāyaṇaś carācarapatir asmatsvāmī mama gurur mama suhṛn mama paramaṃ
analyzed: param brahma nārāyaṇaḥ carācara patiḥ asmad svāmī mama guruḥ mama suhṛd mama paramam

original: bhogyam iti sarvair duṣprāpo 'yaṃ vyavasāyas tena kṛtaḥ;
analyzed: bhogyam iti sarvaiḥ duṣprāpaḥ ayam vyavasāyaḥ tena kṛtaḥ

original: tatkāryaṃ cānanyaprayojanaṃ nirantaraṃ bhajanaṃ tasyāsti ataḥ sādhur eva;
analyzed: tat kāryam ca ananya prayojanam nirantaram bhajanam tasya asti atas sādhuḥ eva

original: bahumantavyaḥ /
analyzed: bahu mantavyaḥ

original: asmin vyavasāye,
analyzed: asmin vyavasāye

original: tatkārye coktaprakārabhajane saṃpanne sati tasyācāravyatikramaḥ svalpavaikalyam iti na tāvatā+anādaraṇīyaḥ,
analyzed: tad kārye ca ukta prakāra bhajane saṃpanne sati tasya ācāra vyatikramaḥ su alpa vaikalyam iti na tāvatā anādaraṇīyaḥ

original: api tu bahumantavya evetyarthaḥ // BhGR_9.30 //
analyzed: api tu bahu mantavyaḥ eva iti arthaḥ

original: nanu “nāvirato duścaritān nāśānto nāsamāhitaḥ /
analyzed: nanu na a virataḥ duścaritāt na a śāntaḥ na a samāhitaḥ

original: nāśantamānaso vā+api prajñānenainam āpnuyāt //
analyzed: na a śanta mānasaḥ vā api prajñānena enam āpnuyāt

original: BhGR_1.” ityādiśruteḥ ācāravyatikrama uttarottarabhajanotpattipravāhaṃ niruṇaddhīty atra āha
analyzed: ityādi śruteḥ ācāra vyatikramaḥ uttara uttara bhajana utpatti pravāham niruṇaddhi iti atra āha

original: kṣipraṃ bhavati dharmātmā śaśvacchāntiṃ nigacchati /
analyzed: kṣipram bhavati dharma ātmā śaśvat śāntim nigacchati

original: kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati // BhG_9.31 //
analyzed: kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati

original: matpriyatvakāritānanyaprayojanamadbhajanena vidhūtapāpatayaiva samūlonmūlitarajastamoguṇaḥ kṣipraṃ dharmātmā bhavati kṣipram eva virodhirahitasaparikaramadbhajanaikamanā  #
analyzed: mad priya tva kārita ananya prayojana mad bhajanena vidhūta pāpa tayā eva sa mūla unmūlita rajaḥ tamaḥ guṇaḥ kṣipram dharma ātmā bhavati kṣipram eva virodhi rahita sa parikara mad bhajana ekamanāḥ

original: bhavati /
analyzed: bhavati

original: evaṃrūpabhajanam eva hi “dharmasyāsya parantapa” iti upakrame dharmaśabdoditam /
analyzed: evaṃrūpa bhajanam eva hi dharmasya asya parantapaḥ iti upakrame dharma śabda uditam

original: śaśvacchāntiṃ nigacchati śaśvatīm apunarāvartinīṃ matprāptivirodhyācāranivṛttiṃ gacchati /
analyzed: śaśvat śāntim nigacchati śaśvatīm apunarāvartinīm mad prāpti virodhi ācāra nivṛttim gacchati

original: kaunteya tvam evāsminn arthe pratijñāṃ kuru madbhaktāv upakrānto virodhyācāramiśro 'pi na naśyati;
analyzed: kaunteya tvam eva asmin arthe pratijñām kuru mad bhaktau upakrāntaḥ virodhi ācāra miśraḥ api na naśyati

original: api tu madbhaktimāhātmyena sarvaṃ virodhijātaṃ nāśayitvā śāśvatīṃ virodhinivṛttim adhigamya kṣipraṃ paripūrṇabhaktir bhavatīti // BhGR_9.31
analyzed: api tu mad bhakti māhātmyena sarvam virodhi jātam nāśayitvā śāśvatīm virodhi nivṛttim adhigamya kṣipram paripūrṇa bhaktiḥ bhavati iti

original: māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ /
analyzed: mām hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye api syuḥ pāpa yonayaḥ

original: striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim // BhG_9.32 //
analyzed: striyaḥ vaiśyāḥ tathā śūdrāḥ te api yānti parām gatim

original: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā /
analyzed: kim punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyāḥ bhaktāḥ rājarṣayaḥ tathā

original: anityam asukhaṃ lokam imaṃ prāpya bhajasva mām // BhG_9.33 //
analyzed: anityam asukham lokam imam prāpya bhajasva mām

original: striyo vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś ca pāpayonayo 'pi māṃ vyapāśritya parāṃ gatiṃ yānti;
analyzed: striyaḥ vaiśyāḥ śūdrāḥ ca pāpa yonayaḥ api mām vyapāśritya parām gatim yānti

original: kiṃ punaḥ puṇyayonayo brāhmaṇā rājarṣayaś ca madbhaktim āsthitāḥ /
analyzed: kim punar puṇya yonayaḥ brāhmaṇāḥ rājarṣayaḥ ca mad bhaktim āsthitāḥ

original: atas tvaṃ rājarṣir asthiraṃ tāpatrayābhihatatayā asukhaṃ cemaṃ lokaṃ prāpya vartamāno māṃ bhajasva // BhGR_9.32,33 //
analyzed: atas tvam rājarṣiḥ asthiram tāpa traya abhihata tayā asukham ca imam lokam prāpya vartamānaḥ mām bhajasva

original: bhaktisvarūpam āha
analyzed: bhakti svarūpam āha

original: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru /
analyzed: mad manāḥ bhava mad bhaktaḥ mad yājī mām namaskuru

original: mām evaiṣyasi yuktvaivam ātmānaṃ matparāyaṇaḥ // BhG_9.34 //
analyzed: mām eva eṣyasi yuktvā evam ātmānam mad parāyaṇaḥ

original: manmanā bhava mayi sarveśvareśvare,
analyzed: mad manāḥ bhava mayi sarva īśvara īśvare

original: nikhilaheyapratyanīkakalyāṇaikatāne,
sarvajñe,
analyzed: sarvajñe

original: satyasaṅkalpe nikhilajagadekakāraṇe,
analyzed: satya saṅkalpe nikhila jagat eka kāraṇe

original: parasmin brahmaṇi,
analyzed: parasmin brahmaṇi

original: puruṣottame,
analyzed: puruṣottame

original: puṇḍarīkadalāmalāyatākṣe,
analyzed: puṇḍarīka dala amala āyata akṣe

original: svacchanīlajīmūtasaṅkāśe,
analyzed: svaccha nīla jīmūta saṅkāśe

original: yugapaduditadinakarasahasrasadṛśatejasi,
analyzed: yugapad udita dinakara sahasra sadṛśa tejasi

original: lāvaṇyāmṛtamahodadhau,
udārapīvaracaturbāhau,
analyzed: udāra pīvara catur bāhau

original: atyujjvalapītāmbare,
analyzed: ati ujjvala pīta ambare

original: amalakirīṭamakarakuṇḍalahārakeyūrakaṭakabhūṣite,
analyzed: amala kirīṭa makara kuṇḍala hāra keyūra kaṭaka bhūṣite

original: apārakāruṇyasauśīlyasaundaryamādhuryagāmbhīryāudāryavātsalyajaladhau,
analyzed: apāra kāruṇya sauśīlya saundarya mādhurya gāmbhīrya audārya vātsalya jaladhau

original: anālocitaviśeṣāśeṣalokaśaraṇye sarvasvāmini tailadhārāvad avicchedena niviṣṭamanā bhava /
analyzed: an ālocita viśeṣa aśeṣa loka śaraṇye sarva svāmini taila dhārā vat avicchedena niviṣṭa manāḥ bhava

original: tad eva viśinaṣṭi madbhaktaḥ atyarthamatpriyatvena yukto manmanā bhavetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tat eva viśinaṣṭi mad bhaktaḥ atyartha mad priya tvena yuktaḥ mad manāḥ bhava iti arthaḥ

original: punar pi viśinaṣṭi madyājī anavadhikātiśayapriyamadanubhavakāritamadyajanaparo bhava /
analyzed: punar viśinaṣṭi mad yājī anavadhika atiśaya priya mad anubhava kārita madya jana paraḥ bhava

original: yajanaṃ nāmaparipūrṇaśeṣavṛttiḥ /
analyzed: yajanam nāma paripūrṇa śeṣa vṛttiḥ

original: aupacārikasāṃsparśikābhyavahārikādisakalabhogapradānarūpo hi yāgaḥ /
analyzed: aupacārika sāṃsparśika ābhyavahārika ādi sakala bhoga pradāna rūpaḥ hi yāgaḥ

original: yathā madanubhavajanitanirvadhikātiśayaprītikāritamadyajanaparo bhavasi,
analyzed: yathā mad anubhava janita nirvadhika atiśaya prīti kārita madya jana paraḥ bhavasi

original: tathā manmanā bhavety uktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: tathā mad manāḥ bhava iti uktam bhavati

original: punar api tad eva viśinaṣṭi māṃ namaskuru /
analyzed: punar api tat eva viśinaṣṭi mām namaskuru

original: anavadhikātiśayapriyamadanubhavakāritātyarthapriyāśeṣaśeṣavṛttau aparyavasyan mayy antarātmani atimātraprahvībhāvavyavasāyaṃ kuru /
analyzed: anavadhika atiśaya priya mad anubhava kārita atyartha priya aśeṣa śeṣa vṛttau a paryavasyan mayi antarātmani atimātra prahvī bhāva vyavasāyam kuru

original: matparāyaṇaḥ aham eva param ayanaṃ yasyāsau matparāyaṇaḥ;
analyzed: mad parāyaṇaḥ aham eva param ayanam yasya asau mad parāyaṇaḥ

original: mayā vinā+ātmadhāraṇāsaṃbhāvanayā madāśraya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: mayā vinā ātma dhāraṇā saṃbhāvanayā mad āśrayaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: evam ātmānaṃ yuktvā matparāyaṇas evam anavadhikātiśayaprītyā madanubhavasamarthaṃ manaḥ prāpya mām evaiṣyasi /
analyzed: evam ātmānam yuktvā mad parāyaṇaḥ evam anavadhika atiśaya prītyā mad anubhava samartham manaḥ prāpya mām eva eṣyasi

original: ātmaśabdo hy atra manoviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: ātma śabdaḥ hi atra manaḥ viṣayaḥ

original: evaṃrūpeṇa manasā māṃ dhyātvā mām anubhūya mām iṣṭvā māṃ namaskṛtya matparāyaṇo mām eva prāpsyasītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: evaṃrūpeṇa manasā mām dhyātvā mām anubhūya mām iṣṭvā mām namaskṛtya mad parāyaṇaḥ mām eva prāpsyasi iti arthaḥ

original: tad evaṃ laukikāni śarīradhāraṇārthāni,
analyzed: tat evam laukikāni śarīra dhāraṇa arthāni

original: vaidikāni ca nityanaimittikāni karmāṇi matprītaye maccheṣataikaraso mayaiva kārita
analyzed: vaidikāni ca nitya naimittikāni karmāṇi mad prītaye mad śeṣa tā eka rasaḥ mayā eva kārita

original: iti kurvan satataṃ matkīrtanayatananamaskārādikān prītyā kurvāṇo manniyāmyaṃ nikhilajagan
analyzed: iti kurvan satatam mad kīrtana yatana namaskāra ādikān prītyā kurvāṇaḥ mad niyāmyam nikhila jagan

original: maccheṣataikarasam iti cānusandhānaḥ atyarthapriyamadguṇagaṇaṃ
analyzed: mad śeṣa tā eka rasam iti ca anusandhānaḥ atyartha priya mad guṇa gaṇam

original: cānusandhāyāharahar uktalakṣaṇam idam upāsanam upādadāno mām eva prāpsyasi // BhGR_9.34 //
analyzed: ca anusandhāya aharahar ukta lakṣaṇam idam upāsanam upādadānaḥ mām eva prāpsyasi

original: bhaktiyogaḥ saparikara uktaḥ /
analyzed: bhakti yogaḥ sa parikaraḥ uktaḥ

original: idānīṃ bhaktyutpattaye tadvivṛddhaye ca bhgavato niraṅkuśāiśvaryādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇānantyam,
analyzed: idānīm bhakti utpattaye tad vivṛddhaye ca bhgavataḥ niraṅkuśa aiśvarya ādi kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa ānantyam

original: kṛtsnasya jagatas taccharīratayā tadātmakatvena tatpravartyatvaṃ ca prapañcyate
analyzed: kṛtsnasya jagataḥ tad śarīra tayā tad ātmaka tvena tad pravartya tvam ca prapañcyate

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: bhūyas eva mahā bāho śṛṇu me paramam vacaḥ

original: yat te 'haṃ prīyamāṇāya vakṣyāmi hitakāmyayā // BhG_1.101 //
analyzed: yat te aham prīyamāṇāya vakṣyāmi hita kāmyayā

original: mama māhātmyaṃ śrutvā prīyamāṇāya te madbhaktyutpattivivṛddhirūpahitakāmanayā bhūyo manmāhātmyaprapañcaviṣayam eva paramaṃ vaco yad vakṣyāmi;
analyzed: mama māhātmyam śrutvā prīyamāṇāya te mad bhakti utpatti vivṛddhi rūpa hita kāmanayā bhūyas mad māhātmya prapañca viṣayam eva paramam vacaḥ yat vakṣyāmi

original: tad avahitamanāś śṛṇu // BhGR_1.101 //
analyzed: tat avahita manāḥ śṛṇu

original: na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ /
analyzed: na me viduḥ sura gaṇāḥ prabhavam na mahā ṛṣayaḥ

original: aham ādir hi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // BhG_1.102 //
analyzed: aham ādiḥ hi devānām mahā ṛṣīṇām ca sarvaśas

original: suragaṇā maharṣayaś cātīndriyārthadarśino 'dhikatarajñānā api me prabhavaṃ prabhāvaṃ na viduḥ mama nāmakarmasvarūpasvabhāvādikaṃ na jānanti;
analyzed: sura gaṇāḥ mahā ṛṣayaḥ ca atīndriya artha darśinaḥ adhikatara jñānāḥ api me prabhavam prabhāvam na viduḥ mama nāma karma svarūpa svabhāva ādikam na jānanti

original: yatas teṣāṃ devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśo 'ham ādiḥ teṣāṃ svarūpasya jñānaśaktyādeś cāham ādiḥ;
analyzed: yatas teṣām devānām mahā ṛṣīṇām ca sarvaśas aham ādiḥ teṣām sva rūpasya jñānaśakti ādeḥ ca aham ādiḥ

original: teṣāṃ devatvamaharṣitvādihetubhūtapuṇyānuguṇaṃ mayā dattaṃ jñānaṃ parimitam;
analyzed: teṣām deva tva mahā ṛṣi tva ādi hetu bhūta puṇya anuguṇam mayā dattam jñānam parimitam

original: atas te parimitajñānā matsvarūpādikaṃ yathāvan na jānanti // BhGR_1.102 //
analyzed: atas te parimita jñānāḥ mad sva rūpa ādikam yathāvat na jānanti

original: tad etad devādyacintyasvayāthātmyaviṣayajñānaṃ bhaktyutpattivirodhipāpavimocanopāyam āha
analyzed: tat etat deva ādi acintya sva yāthātmya viṣaya jñānam bhakti utpatti virodhi pāpa vimocana upāyam āha

original: yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram /
analyzed: yaḥ mām ajam anādim ca vetti loka mahā īśvaram

original: asaṃmūḍhas sa martyeṣu sarvapāpaiḥ pramucyate // BhG_1.103 //
analyzed: asaṃmūḍhaḥ sa martyeṣu sarva pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: na jāyata ity ajaḥ,
analyzed: na jāyate iti ajaḥ

original: anena vikāridravyād acetanāt tatsaṃsṛṣṭāt saṃsāricetanāc ca visajātīyatvam uktam /
analyzed: anena vikāri dravyāt acetanāt tad saṃsṛṣṭāt saṃsāri cetanāt ca visajātīya tvam uktam

original: saṃsāricetanasya hi karmakṛtācitsaṃsargo janma /
analyzed: saṃsāri cetanasya hi karma kṛta acit saṃsargaḥ janma

original: anādim ity anena padena ādimato 'jān muktātmano visajātīyatvam uktam /
analyzed: anādim iti anena padena ādimataḥ ajāt mukta ātmanaḥ visajātīya tvam uktam

original: muktātmano hy ajatvam ādimat;
analyzed: mukta ātmanaḥ hi aja tvam ādimat

original: tasya heyasaṃbandhasya pūrvavṛttatvāt tadarhatāsti /
analyzed: tasya heya saṃbandhasya pūrva vṛtta tvāt tad arhatā asti

original: ato 'nādim ity anena tadanarhatayā tatpratyanīkatocyate;
analyzed: atas anādim iti anena tad anarha tayā tad pratyanīka tā ucyate

original: “niravadyam” ityādiśrutyā ca /
analyzed: niravadyam ityādi śrutyā ca

original: evaṃ heyasaṃbandhapratyanīkasvarūpatayā tadanarhaṃ māṃ lokamaheśvaram lokeśvarāṇām apīśvaraṃ martyeṣv asaṃmūḍho yo vetti;
analyzed: evam heya saṃbandha pratyanīka svarūpa tayā tad anarham mām loka maheśvaram loka īśvarāṇām api īśvaram martyeṣu asaṃmūḍhaḥ yaḥ vetti

original: itarasajātīyatayaikīkṛtya mohaḥ saṃmohaḥ,
analyzed: itara sajātīya tayā ekīkṛtya mohaḥ saṃmohaḥ

original: tadrahito 'saṃmūḍhaḥ sa madbhaktyutpattivirodhibhis sarvaiḥ pāpaiḥ pramucyate /
analyzed: tad rahitaḥ asaṃmūḍhaḥ sa mad bhakti utpatti virodhibhiḥ sarvaiḥ pāpaiḥ pramucyate

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati loke manuṣyāṇāṃ rājā itaramanuṣyasajātīyaḥ kenacit karmaṇā tadādhipatyaṃ prāptaḥ;
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati loke manuṣyāṇām rājā itara manuṣya sajātīyaḥ kenacid karmaṇā tad ādhipatyam prāptaḥ

original: tathā devānām adhipatir api;
analyzed: tathā devānām adhipatiḥ api

original: tathāṇḍādhipatir apītarasaṃsārisajātīyaḥ;
analyzed: tathā aṇḍa adhipatiḥ api itara saṃsāri sajātīyaḥ

original: tasyāpi bhāvanātrayāntargatatvāt /
analyzed: tasya api bhāvanā traya antargata tvāt

original: “yo brahmāṇaṃ vidadhāti” iti śruteś ca /
analyzed: yaḥ brahmāṇam vidadhāti iti śruteḥ ca

original: tathānye 'pi ye kecanāṇimādyaiśvaryaṃ prāptāḥ /
analyzed: tathā anye api ye kecana aṇima ādi aiśvaryam prāptāḥ

original: ayaṃ tu lokamaheśvaraḥ kāryakāraṇāvasthād acetanād baddhān muktāc ca cetanād iśitavyāt
analyzed: ayam tu loka maheśvaraḥ kārya kāraṇa avasthāt acetanāt baddhāt muktāt ca cetanāt iśitavyāt

original: sarvasmān nikhilaheyapratyanīkānavadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇaikatānatayā niyamanaikasvabhāvatayā
analyzed: sarvasmāt nikhila heya pratyanīka anavadhika atiśaya asaṃkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa eka tāna tayā niyamana eka svabhāva tayā

original: ca visajātīya itītrasajātīyatāmoharahito yo māṃ vetti,
analyzed: ca visajātīyaḥ yaḥ mām vetti

original: sa sarvaiḥ pāpaiḥ pramucyate iti // BhGR_1.103 //
analyzed: sa sarvaiḥ pāpaiḥ pramucyate iti

original: evaṃ svasvabhāvānusandhānena bhaktyutpattivirodhipāpanirasanam,
analyzed: evam sva svabhāva anusandhānena bhakti utpatti virodhi pāpa nirasanam

original: virodhinirasanā devārthato bhaktyutpattiṃ ca pratipādya svāiśvaryasvakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaprapañcānusandhānena bhaktivivṛddhiprakāram āha
analyzed: virodhi nirasanāḥ deva arthataḥ bhakti utpattim ca pratipādya sva aiśvarya sva kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa prapañca anusandhānena bhakti vivṛddhi prakāram āha

original: buddhir jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ /
analyzed: buddhiḥ jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyam damaḥ śamaḥ

original: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo 'bhāvo bhayaṃ cābhayam eva ca // BhG_1.104 //
analyzed: sukham duḥkham bhavaḥ abhāvaḥ bhayam ca abhayam eva ca

original: ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭhis tapo dānaṃ yaśo 'yaśaḥ /
analyzed: ahiṃsā sama tā tuṣṭhiḥ tapaḥ dānam yaśaḥ ayaśaḥ

original: bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ // BhG_1.105 //
analyzed: bhavanti bhāvāḥ bhūtānām mattaḥ eva pṛthagvidhāḥ

original: buddhiḥ manaso nirūpaṇasāmarthyam,
analyzed: buddhiḥ manasaḥ nirūpaṇa sāmarthyam

original: jñānam cidacidvastuviśeṣaviṣayo niścayaḥ,
asaṃmohaḥ pūrvagṛhītād rajatāder visajātīye śuktikādivastuni sajātīyatābuddhinivṛttiḥ;
analyzed: asaṃmohaḥ pūrva gṛhītāt rajata ādeḥ visajātīye śuktikā ādi vastuni sajātīya tā buddhi nivṛttiḥ

original: kṣamā manovikārahetau saty apy avikṛtamanastvam;
analyzed: kṣamā manaḥ vikāra hetau satī api avikṛta manaḥ tvam

original: satyam yathādṛṣṭaviṣayaṃ bhūtahitarūpaṃ vacanam /
analyzed: satyam yathādṛṣṭa viṣayam bhūta hita rūpam vacanam

original: tadanuguṇā manovṛttir ihābhipretā,
analyzed: tad anuguṇā manaḥ vṛttiḥ iha abhipretā

original: manovṛttiprakaraṇāt /
analyzed: manaḥ vṛtti prakaraṇāt

original: damaḥ bāhyakaraṇānām anarthaviṣayebhyo niyamanam;
analyzed: damaḥ bāhya karaṇānām anartha viṣayebhyaḥ niyamanam

original: śamaḥ antaḥkaraṇasya tathā niyamanam;
analyzed: śamaḥ antaḥkaraṇasya tathā niyamanam

original: sukham ātmānukūlānubhavaḥ;
analyzed: sukham ātma anukūla anubhavaḥ

original: duḥkham pratikūlānubhavaḥ;
analyzed: duḥkham pratikūla anubhavaḥ

original: bhavaḥ bhavanam;
analyzed: bhavaḥ bhavanam

original: anukūlānubhavahetukaṃ manaso bhavanam;
analyzed: anukūla anubhava hetukam manasaḥ bhavanam

original: abhāvaḥ pratikūlānubhavahetuko manaso 'vasādaḥ;
analyzed: abhāvaḥ pratikūla anubhava hetukaḥ manasaḥ avasādaḥ

original: bhayam āgāmino duḥkhasya hetudarśanajaṃ duḥkham;
analyzed: bhayam āgāminaḥ duḥkhasya hetu darśana jam duḥkham

original: tannivṛttiḥ abhayam;
analyzed: tad nivṛttiḥ abhayam

original: ahiṃsā paraduḥkhāhetutvam;
samatā ātmani sukṛtsu vipakṣeṣu cārthānarthayos samamatitvam;
analyzed: sama tā ātmani sukṛtsu vipakṣeṣu ca artha anarthayoḥ sama mati tvam

original: tuṣṭiḥ sarveṣv ātmasu dṛṣṭeṣu toṣasvabhāvatvam;
analyzed: tuṣṭiḥ sarveṣu ātmasu dṛṣṭeṣu toṣa svabhāva tvam

original: tapaḥ śāstrīyo bhogasaṅkocarūpaḥ kāyakleśaḥ;
analyzed: tapaḥ śāstrīyaḥ bhoga saṅkoca rūpaḥ kāya kleśaḥ

original: dānam svakīyabhogyānaṃ parasmai pratipādanam;
analyzed: dānam svakīya bhogyānam parasmai pratipādanam

original: yaśaḥ guṇavattāprathā;
analyzed: yaśaḥ guṇavat tā prathā

original: ayaśaḥ nairguṇyaprathā /
etac cobhayaṃ tadanuguṇamanovṛttidvayaṃ mantavyam,
analyzed: etat ca ubhayam tad anuguṇa manaḥ vṛtti dvayam mantavyam

original: tatprakaraṇāt /
analyzed: tad prakaraṇāt

original: tapodāne ca tathā /
analyzed: tapaḥ dāne ca tathā

original: evam ādyāḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ bhāvāḥ pravṛttinivṛttihetavo manovṛttayo matta eva matsaṅkalpāyattā bhavanti // BhGR_1.104,5 //
analyzed: evam ādyāḥ sarveṣām bhūtānām bhāvāḥ pravṛtti nivṛtti hetavaḥ manaḥ vṛttayaḥ mattaḥ eva mad saṅkalpa āyattāḥ bhavanti

original: sarvasya bhūtajātasya sṛṣṭisthityoḥ pravartayitāraś ca matsaṃkalpāyattapravṛttaya ity āha
analyzed: sarvasya bhūtajātasya sṛṣṭi sthityoḥ pravartayitāraḥ ca mad saṃkalpa āyatta pravṛttayaḥ iti āha

original: maharṣayas sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā /
analyzed: mahā ṛṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāraḥ manavaḥ tathā

original: madbhāvā mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ // BhG_1.106 //
analyzed: mad bhāvāḥ mānasāḥ jātāḥ yeṣām loke imāḥ prajāḥ

original: pūrve sapta maharṣayaḥ atītamanvantare ye bhṛgvādayas sapta maharṣayo nityasṛṣṭipravartanāya brahmaṇo manassaṃbhavāḥ,
analyzed: pūrve sapta mahā ṛṣayaḥ atīta manvantare ye bhṛgu ādayaḥ sapta mahā ṛṣayaḥ nitya sṛṣṭi pravartanāya brahmaṇaḥ manaḥ saṃbhavāḥ

original: nityasthitipravartanāya ye ca sārvaṇikā nāma catvāro manavaḥ sthitāḥ,
analyzed: nitya sthiti pravartanāya ye ca sārvaṇikāḥ nāma catvāraḥ manavaḥ sthitāḥ

original: yeṣāṃ santānamaye loke jātā imāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ pratikṣaṇam āpralayād apatyānām utpādakāḥ
analyzed: yeṣām santāna maye loke jātāḥ imāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ pratikṣaṇam ā pralayāt apatyānām utpādakāḥ

original: pālakāś ca bhavanti te bhṛgvādayo manavaś ca madbhāvāḥ mama yo bhāvaḥ sa eva yeṣāṃ
analyzed: pālakāḥ ca bhavanti te bhṛgu ādayaḥ manavaḥ ca mad bhāvāḥ mama yaḥ bhāvaḥ saḥ eva yeṣām

original: bhāvaḥ te madbhāvāḥ,
analyzed: bhāvaḥ te mad bhāvāḥ

original: manmate sthitāḥ,
analyzed: mad mate sthitāḥ

original: matsaṅkalpā1nuvartina ityarthaḥ // BhGR_1.106 //
analyzed: iti arthaḥ

original: etāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca mama yo vetti tattvataḥ /
analyzed: etām vibhūtim yogam ca mama yaḥ vetti tattvataḥ

original: so 'vikampena yogena yujyate nātra saṃśayaḥ // BhG_1.107 //
analyzed: saḥ avikampena yogena yujyate na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: vibhūtiḥ aiśvaryam /
analyzed: vibhūtiḥ aiśvaryam

original: etāṃ sarvasya madāyattotpattisthitipravṛttitārūpāṃ vibhūtim,
analyzed: etām sarvasya mad āyatta utpatti sthiti pravṛtti tā rūpām vibhūtim

original: mama heyapratyanīkakalyāṇaguṇagaṇarūpaṃ yogaṃ ca yas tattvato vetti,
analyzed: mama heya pratyanīka kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa rūpam yogam ca yaḥ tattvataḥ vetti

original: so 'vikampena aprakampyena bhaktiyogena yujyate /
analyzed: saḥ avikampena aprakampyena bhakti yogena yujyate

original: nātra saṃśayaḥ /
analyzed: na atra saṃśayaḥ

original: madvibhūtiviṣayaṃ kalyāṇaguṇaviṣayaṃ ca jñānaṃ bhaktiyogavardhanam iti svayam eva drakṣyasītyabhiprāyaḥ // BhGR_1.107 //
analyzed: mad vibhūti viṣayam kalyāṇa guṇa viṣayam ca jñānam bhakti yoga vardhanam iti svayam eva drakṣyasi iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: vibhūtijñānavipākarūpāṃ bhaktivṛddhiṃ darśayati
analyzed: vibhūti jñāna vipāka rūpām bhakti vṛddhim darśayati

original: ahaṃ, sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate /

original: iti matvā bhajante māṃ budhā bhāvasamanvitāḥ // BhG_1.108 //
analyzed: iti matvā bhajante mām budhāḥ bhāva samanvitāḥ

original: ahaṃ, sarvasya vicitracidacitprapañcasya prabhavaḥ utpattikāraṇam,
analyzed: aham sarvasya vicitra cit acit prapañcasya prabhavaḥ utpatti kāraṇam

original: sarvaṃ matta eva pravartate itīdaṃ mama svābhāvikaṃ niraṃkuśāiśvaryaṃ,
analyzed: sarvam mattaḥ eva pravartate iti idam mama svābhāvikam niraṃkuśa aiśvaryam

original: sauśīlyasaundaryavātsalyādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇayogaṃ ca matvā budhā jñāninaḥ bhāvasamanvitāḥ māṃ sarvakalyāṇaguṇānvitaṃ bhajante /
analyzed: sauśīlya saundarya vātsalya ādi kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa yogam ca matvā budhāḥ jñāninaḥ bhāva samanvitāḥ mām sarva kalyāṇa guṇa anvitam bhajante

original: bhāvaḥ manovṛttiviśeṣaḥ /
mayi spṛhayālavo māṃ bhajanta ityarthaḥ // BhGR_1.108 //
analyzed: mayi spṛhayālavaḥ mām bhajante iti arthaḥ

original: katham?
analyzed: katham

original: maccittā madgataprāṇā bodhayantaḥ parasparam /
analyzed: mad cittāḥ mad gata prāṇāḥ bodhayantaḥ parasparam

original: kathayantaś ca māṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca // BhG_1.109 //
analyzed: kathayantaḥ ca mām nityam tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca

original: maccittāḥ mayi niviṣṭamanasaḥ,
analyzed: mad cittāḥ mayi niviṣṭa manasaḥ

original: madgataprāṇāḥ madgatajīvitāḥ,
analyzed: mad gata prāṇāḥ mad gata jīvitāḥ

original: mayā vinātmadhāraṇam alabhamānā ityarthaḥ;
analyzed: mayā vinā ātma dhāraṇam alabhamānāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: svaiḥ svair anubhūtān madīyān guṇān parasparaṃ bodhayantaḥ,
analyzed: svaiḥ svaiḥ anubhūtān madīyān guṇān parasparam bodhayantaḥ

original: madīyāni divyāni ramaṇīyāni karmāṇi ca kathayantaḥ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca vaktāras tadvacanenānanyaprayojanena tuṣyanti;
analyzed: madīyāni divyāni ramaṇīyāni karmāṇi ca kathayantaḥ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca vaktāraḥ tad vacanena ananya prayojanena tuṣyanti

original: śrotāraś ca tacchravaṇenānavadhikātiśayapriyeṇa ramante // BhGR_1.109 //
analyzed: śrotāraḥ ca tad śravaṇena anavadhika atiśaya priyeṇa ramante

original: teṣāṃ satatayuktānāṃ bhajatāṃ prītipūrvakam /
analyzed: teṣām satata yuktānām bhajatām prīti pūrvakam

original: dadāmi buddhiyogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te // BhG_1.1010 //
analyzed: dadāmi buddhi yogam tam yena mām upayānti te

original: teṣāṃ satatayuktānām mayi satatayogam āśaṃsamānānāṃ māṃ bhajamānānām ahaṃ tam eva buddhiyogaṃ vipākadaśāpannaṃ prītipūrvakaṃ dadāmi;
analyzed: teṣām satata yuktānām mayi satata yogam āśaṃsamānānām mām bhajamānānām aham tam eva buddhi yogam vipāka daśā āpannam prīti pūrvakam dadāmi

original: yena te mām upayānti // BhGR_1.1010 //
analyzed: yena te mām upayānti

original: kiñ ca,
analyzed: kim ca

original: teṣām evānukampārtham aham ajñānajaṃ tamaḥ /
analyzed: teṣām eva anukampā artham aham ajñāna jam tamaḥ

original: naśyāmy ātmabhāvastho jñānadīpena bhāsvatā // BhG_1.1011 //
analyzed: naśyāmi ātma bhāva sthaḥ jñāna dīpena bhāsvatā

original: teṣām evānugrahārtham aham,
analyzed: teṣām eva anugraha artham aham

original: ātmabhāvasthaḥ teṣāṃ manovṛttau viṣayatayāvasthitaḥ madīyān kalyāṇaguṇagaṇāṃś cāviṣkurvan
analyzed: ātma bhāva sthaḥ teṣām manaḥ vṛttau viṣaya tayā avasthitaḥ madīyān kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇān ca āviṣkurvan

original: madviṣayajñānākhyena bhāsvatā dīpena jñānavirodhiprācīnakarmarūpājñānajaṃ madvyatiriktapūrvābhyastaviṣayaprāvaṇyarūpaṃ
analyzed: mad viṣaya jñāna ākhyena bhāsvatā dīpena jñāna virodhi prācīna karma rūpa ajñāna jam mad vyatirikta pūrva abhyasta viṣaya prāvaṇya rūpam

original: tamo nāśayāmi // BhGR_1.1011 //
analyzed: tamaḥ nāśayāmi

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: evaṃ sakaletaravisajātīyaṃ bhagavadasādhāraṇaṃ śṛṇvatāṃ niratiśayānandajanakaṃ kalyāṇaguṇagaṇayogaṃ tadaiśvaryavitatiṃ ca śrutvā tadvistāraṃ  #
analyzed: evam sakala itara visajātīyam bhagavat asādhāraṇam śṛṇvatām niratiśaya ānanda janakam kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa yogam tad aiśvarya vitatim ca śrutvā tad vistāram

original: śrotukāmo 'rjuna uvāca
analyzed: śrotu kāmaḥ arjunaḥ uvāca

original: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān /
analyzed: param brahma param dhāma pavitram paramam bhavān

original: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma paramaṃ pavitraṃ iti yaṃ śrutayo vadanti,
analyzed: param brahma param dhāma paramam pavitram iti yam śrutayaḥ vadanti

original: sa hi bhavān /
analyzed: sa hi bhavān

original: “yato vā imāni bhūtāni jāyante,
analyzed: yatas vai imāni bhūtāni jāyante

original: yena jātāni jīvanti,
analyzed: yena jātāni jīvanti

original: yat prayanty abhisaṃviśanti,
analyzed: yat prayanti abhisaṃviśanti

original: tad vijijñāsasva tad brahmeti“,
analyzed: tat vijijñāsasva tat brahma iti

original: “brahmavid āpnoti param“,
analyzed: brahma vid āpnoti param

original: “sa yo ha vai tat paramaṃ brahma veda brahmaiva bhavati” iti /
analyzed: sa yaḥ ha vai tat paramam brahma veda brahmā eva bhavati iti

original: tathā paraṃ dhāma;
analyzed: tathā param dhāma

original: dhāmaśabdo jyotirvacanaḥ;
analyzed: dhāma śabdaḥ jyotiḥ vacanaḥ

original: paraṃ jyotiḥ “atha yad ataḥ paro divo jyotir dīpyate“,
analyzed: param jyotiḥ atha yat atas paras divaḥ jyotiḥ dīpyate

original: “paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate“,
analyzed: param jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate

original: “taṃ devā jyotiṣāṃ jyotiḥ” iti /
analyzed: tam devāḥ jyotiṣām jyotiḥ iti

original: tathā ca paramaṃ pavitram paramaṃ pāvanam;
analyzed: tathā ca paramam pavitram paramam pāvanam

original: smartur aśeṣakalmaṣāśleṣakaram,
analyzed: smartuḥ aśeṣa kalmaṣa āśleṣa karam

original: vināśakaraṃ ca /
analyzed: vināśa karam ca

original: “yathā puṣkarapalāśa āpo na śliṣyante evam evaṃvidi pāpaṃ karma na śliṣyate“,
analyzed: yathā puṣkarapalāśe āpaḥ na śliṣyante evam evaṃvidi pāpam karma na śliṣyate

original: “tad yatheṣīkātūlam agnau protaṃ pradūyetaivaṃ hāsya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante“,
analyzed: tat yathā iṣīkā tūlam agnau protam pradūyeta evam ha asya sarve pāpmānaḥ pradūyante

original: “nārāyaṇa paraṃ brahma tattvaṃ nagarāyaṇaḥ paraḥ /
analyzed: nārāyaṇa param brahma tattvam nagarāyaṇaḥ paraḥ

original: nārāyaṇa paro jyotir ātmā nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ” iti hi śrutayo vadanti // BhG_1.1012ab //
analyzed: nārāyaṇa paraḥ jyotiḥ ātmā nārāyaṇaḥ paraḥ iti hi śrutayaḥ vadanti

original: puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ divyam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum // BhGR_1.1012 //
analyzed: puruṣam śāśvatam divyam ādidevam ajam vibhum

original: āhus tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā /
analyzed: āhuḥ tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve deva ṛṣiḥ nāradaḥ tathā

original: asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me // BhG_1.1013 //
analyzed: asitaḥ devalaḥ vyāsaḥ svayam ca eva bravīṣi me

original: ṛṣayaś ca sarve parāvaratattvayāthātmyavidas tvām eva śāśvataṃ divyaṃ puruṣam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum āhuḥ;
analyzed: ṛṣayaḥ ca sarve parāvara tattva yāthātmya vidaḥ tvām eva śāśvatam divyam puruṣam ādidevam ajam vibhum āhuḥ

original: tathaiva devarṣir nāradaḥ asitaḥ devalaḥ vyāsaś ca /
analyzed: tathā eva deva ṛṣiḥ nāradaḥ asitaḥ devalaḥ vyāsaḥ ca

original: “ye ca devavido vipro ye cādhyātmavido janāḥ /
analyzed: ye ca deva vidaḥ vipraḥ ye ca adhyātma vidaḥ janāḥ

analyzed: te vadanti mahātmānam kṛṣṇam dharmam sanātanam

analyzed: pavitāṇām hi govindaḥ pavitram param ucyate

original: puṇyānām api puṇyo 'sau maṅgalānāṃ ca maṅgalam /
analyzed: puṇyānām api puṇyaḥ asau maṅgalānām ca maṅgalam

original: trailokyaṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo devadevaḥ sanātanaḥ /
analyzed: trailokyam puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ devadevaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: āste harir acintyātmā tatraiva madhusūdanaḥ //
analyzed: āste hariḥ acintya ātmā tatra eva madhusūdanaḥ

original: BhGR_1.“, “eṣa nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān kṣīrārṇavaniketanaḥ /
analyzed: eṣa nārāyaṇaḥ śrīmān kṣīrārṇava niketanaḥ

original: nāgaparyaṅkam utsṛjya hy āgato madhurāṃ purīm //
analyzed: nāga paryaṅkam utsṛjya hi āgataḥ madhurām purīm

original: BhGR_1.“, “puṇyā dvāravatī tatra yatrāste madhusūdahaḥ /
analyzed: puṇyā dvāravatī tatra yatra āste madhusūda haḥ

original: sākṣād devaḥ purāṇo 'sau sa hi dharmas sanātanaḥ” /
analyzed: sākṣāt devaḥ purāṇaḥ asau sa hi dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: tathā, “yatra nārāyaṇo devaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ /
analyzed: tathā yatra nārāyaṇaḥ devaḥ paramātmā sanātanaḥ

original: tatra kṛtsnaṃ jagat pārtha tīrthāny āyatanāni ca //
analyzed: tatra kṛtsnam jagat pārtha tīrthāni āyatanāni ca

original: tat puṇyaṃ tat paraṃ brahma tat tīrthaṃ tat tapovanam /
analyzed: tat puṇyam tat param brahma tat tīrtham tat tapaḥ vanam

analyzed: tatra devarṣayaḥ siddhāḥ sarve ca eva tapodhanāḥ

analyzed: ādidevaḥ mahā yogī yatra āste madhusūdanaḥ

original: puṇyānām api tat puṇyaṃ mā bhūt te saṃśayo 'tra vai //
analyzed: puṇyānām api tat puṇyam mā bhūt te saṃśayaḥ atra vai

original: BhGR_1.“, “kṛṣṇa eva hi lokānām utpattir api cāpyayaḥ /
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ eva hi lokānām utpattiḥ api ca apyayaḥ

original: kṛṣṇasya hi kṛte bhūtam idaṃ viśvaṃ carācaram //
analyzed: kṛṣṇasya hi kṛte bhūtam idam viśvam carācaram

original: BhGR_1.” iti /
analyzed: iti

original: tathā svayam eva bravīṣi ca,
analyzed: tathā svayam eva bravīṣi ca

analyzed: bhūmiḥ apaḥ analaḥ vāyuḥ kham manaḥ budhiḥ eva ca

original: ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā //
analyzed: ahaṃkāraḥ iti iyam me bhinnā prakṛtiḥ aṣṭadhā

original: BhGR_1.” ityādinā, “ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattas sarvaṃ pravartate” ityantena //1012,13//
analyzed: ityādinā aham sarvasya prabhavaḥ mattaḥ sarvam pravartate ityantena

original: sarvam etad ṛtaṃ manye yan māṃ vadasi keśava /
analyzed: sarvam etat ṛtam manye yat mām vadasi keśava

original: na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavāḥ // BhG_1.1014 //
analyzed: na hi te bhagavan vyaktim viduḥ devāḥ na dānavāḥ

original: ataḥ sarvam etad yathāvasthitavastukathanaṃ manye,
analyzed: atas sarvam etat yathā avasthita vastu kathanam manye

analyzed: na praśaṃsā ādi abhiprāyam

original: yan māṃ prati ananyasādhāraṇam anavadhikātiśayaṃ svābhāvikaṃ tavāiśvaryaṃ kalyāṇaguṇānantyaṃ ca vadasi /
analyzed: yat mām prati ananya sādhāraṇam anavadhika atiśayam svābhāvikam tava aiśvaryam kalyāṇa guṇa ānantyam ca vadasi

original: ato bhagavan niratiśayajñānaśaktibalāiśvaryavīryatejasāṃ nidhe,
analyzed: atas bhagavat niratiśaya jñāna śakti bala aiśvarya vīrya tejasām nidhe

original: te vyaktiṃ vyañjanaprakāraṃ na hi parimitajñānā devā dānavāś ca viduḥ // BhGR_1.1014 //
analyzed: te vyaktim vyañjana prakāram na hi parimita jñānāḥ devāḥ dānavāḥ ca viduḥ

original: svayam evātmanātmānaṃ vettha tvaṃ puruṣottama /
analyzed: svayam eva ātmanā ātmānam vettha tvam puruṣottama

original: bhūtabhāvana bhūteśa devadeva jagatpate // BhG_1.1015 //
analyzed: bhūtabhāvana bhūteśa devadeva jagatpate

original: he puruṣottama,
analyzed: he puruṣottama

original: ātmanā,
analyzed: ātmanā

original: ātmānam tvāṃ svayam eva svena jñānenaiva vettha /
analyzed: ātmānam tvām svayam eva svena jñānena eva vettha

original: bhūtabhāvana;
analyzed: bhūtabhāvana

original: sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām utpādayitaḥ,
analyzed: sarveṣām bhūtānām utpādayitaḥ

original: bhūteśa sarveṣāṃ niyantaḥ,
analyzed: bhūteśa sarveṣām niyantar

original: devadeva daivatānām api paramadaivata,
analyzed: devadeva daivatānām api parama daivata

original: yathā manuṣyamṛgapakṣisarīsṛpādīn saundaryasauśīlyādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇair daivatāni atītya vartante,
analyzed: yathā manuṣya mṛga pakṣi sarīsṛpa ādīn saundarya sauśīlya ādi kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇaiḥ daivatāni atītya vartante

original: tathā tāni sarvāṇi daivatāny api tais tair guṇais atītya vartamāna,
analyzed: tathā tāni sarvāṇi daivatāni api taiḥ taiḥ guṇaiḥ atītya vartamāna

original: jagatpate jagatsvāmin // BhGR_1.1015 //
analyzed: jagatpate jagatsvāmin

original: vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ /
analyzed: vaktum arhasi aśeṣeṇa divyāḥ hi ātma vibhūtayaḥ

original: yābhir vibhūtibhir lokān imāṃs tvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasi // BhG_1.1016 //
analyzed: yābhiḥ vibhūtibhiḥ lokān imān tvam vyāpya tiṣṭhasi

original: divyāḥ tvadasādhāraṇyo vibhūtayo yāḥ,
analyzed: divyāḥ tvad asādhāraṇyaḥ vibhūtayaḥ yāḥ

original: tās tvam evāśeṣeṇa vaktum arhasi /
analyzed: tāḥ tvam eva aśeṣeṇa vaktum arhasi

original: tvam eva vyañjayetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tvam eva vyañjaya iti arthaḥ

original: yābhir anantābhir vibhūtibhiḥ yair niyamanaviśeṣair yuktaḥ imān lokān tvaṃ niyantṛtvena vyāpya tiṣṭhasi // BhGR_1.1016 //
analyzed: yābhiḥ anantābhiḥ vibhūtibhiḥ yaiḥ niyamana viśeṣaiḥ yuktaḥ imān lokān tvam niyantṛ tvena vyāpya tiṣṭhasi

original: kathaṃ vidyām ahaṃ yogī tvāṃ sadā paricintayan /
analyzed: katham vidyām aham yogī tvām sadā paricintayan

original: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyo 'si bhagavan mayā // BhG_1.1017 //
analyzed: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyaḥ asi bhagavat mayā

original: ahaṃ yogī bhaktiyoganiṣṭhas san bhaktyā tvāṃ sadā paricintayan cintayituṃ pravṛttaḥ cintanīyaṃ tvāṃ paripūrṇāiśvaryādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇaṃ kathaṃ
analyzed: aham yogī bhakti yoga niṣṭhaḥ san bhaktyā tvām sadā paricintayan cintayitum pravṛttaḥ cintanīyam tvām paripūrṇa aiśvarya ādi kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇam katham

original: pūrvoktabuddhijñānādibhāvavyatirikteṣu keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu mayā niyantṛtvena cintyo 'si? // BhGR_1.1017 //
analyzed: pūrvokta buddhi jñāna ādi bhāva vyatirikteṣu keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu mayā niyantṛ tvena cintyaḥ asi

original: vistareṇātmano yogaṃ vibhūtiṃ ca janārdana /
analyzed: vistareṇa ātmanaḥ yogam vibhūtim ca janārdana

original: bhūyaḥ kathaya tṛptir hi śṛṇvato nāsti me 'mṛtam // BhG_1.1018 //
analyzed: bhūyas kathaya tṛptiḥ hi śṛṇvataḥ nā asti me amṛtam

original: “ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattas sarvaṃ pravartate” iti saṃkṣepeṇoktaṃ tava sraṣṭṛtvādiyogaṃ vibhūtiṃ niyamanaṃ ca bhūyo vistareṇa kathaya /
analyzed: aham sarvasya prabhavaḥ mattaḥ sarvam pravartate iti saṃkṣepeṇa uktam tava sraṣṭṛ tva ādi yogam vibhūtim niyamanam ca bhūyas vistareṇa kathaya

original: tvayocyamānaṃ tvanmāhātmyāmṛtaṃ śṛṇvato me tṛptir nāsti;
analyzed: tvayā ucyamānam tvad māhātmya amṛtam śṛṇvataḥ me tṛptiḥ nā asti

original: hi mamātṛptis tvayaiva viditetyabhiprāyaḥ // BhGR_1.1018 //
analyzed: hi mama atṛptiḥ tvayā eva viditā iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi vibhūtīr ātmanaś śubhāḥ /
analyzed: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi vibhūtīḥ ātmanaḥ śubhāḥ

original: prādhānyataḥ kuruśreṣṭha nāsty anto vistarasya me // BhG_1.1019 //
analyzed: prādhānyataḥ kuruśreṣṭha na asti antaḥ vistarasya me

original: he kuruśreṣṭha/
analyzed: he kuruśreṣṭha

original: madīyāḥ kalyāṇīr vibhūtīḥ prādhānyatas te kathayiṣyāmi /
analyzed: madīyāḥ kalyāṇīḥ vibhūtīḥ prādhānyataḥ te kathayiṣyāmi

original: prādhanyaśabdena utkarṣo vivakṣitaḥ;
analyzed: prādhanya śabdena utkarṣaḥ vivakṣitaḥ

original: “purodhasāṃ ca mukhyaṃ mām” iti hi vakṣyate /
analyzed: purodhasām ca mukhyam mām iti hi vakṣyate

analyzed: jagati utkṛṣṭāḥ kāścana vibhūtīḥ vakṣyāmi

original: vistareṇa vaktuṃ śrotuṃ ca na śakyate,
analyzed: vistareṇa vaktum śrotum ca na śakyate

analyzed: vibhūti tvam nāma niyāmya tvam

analyzed: etām vibhūtim yogam ca mama yaḥ vetti tattvataḥ iti pratipādanāt

original: tathā tatra yogaśabdanirdiṣṭaṃ sraṣṭṛtvādikaṃ vibhutiśabdanirdiṣṭaṃ tatpravartyatvam iti hy uktaṃ punaś ca,
analyzed: tathā tatra yoga śabda nirdiṣṭam sraṣṭṛ tva ādikam vibhuti śabda nirdiṣṭam tad pravartya tvam iti hi uktam punar ca

original: “ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattas sarvaṃ pravartate /
analyzed: aham sarvasya prabhavaḥ mattaḥ sarvam pravartate

original: iti matvā bhajante māṃ budhā bhāvasamanvitāḥ” iti // BhGR_1.1019 //
analyzed: iti matvā bhajante mām budhāḥ bhāva samanvitāḥ iti

original: tatra sarvabhūtānāṃ pravartanarūpaṃ niyamanam ātmatayāvasthāyetīmam artham,
analyzed: tatra sarva bhūtānām pravartana rūpam niyamanam ātma tayā avasthāya iti imam artham

original: yogaśabdanirdiṣṭaṃ sarvasya sraṣṭṛtvaṃ pālayitṛtvaṃ saṃhartṛtvaṃ ceti suspaṣṭam āha
analyzed: yoga śabda nirdiṣṭam sarvasya sraṣṭṛ tvam pālayitṛ tvam saṃhartṛ tvam ca iti su spaṣṭam āha

original: aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarvabhūtāśayasthitaḥ /
analyzed: aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarva bhūta āśaya sthitaḥ

original: aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ ca bhūtānām anta eva ca // BhG_1.1020 //
analyzed: aham ādiḥ ca madhyam ca bhūtānām antaḥ eva ca

original: sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ mama śarīrabhūtānām āśaye hṛdaye aham ātmatayāvasthitaḥ /
analyzed: sarveṣām bhūtānām mama śarīra bhūtānām āśaye hṛdaye aham ātma tayā avasthitaḥ

original: ātmā hi nāma śarīrasya sarvātmanā ādhāraḥ,
analyzed: ātmā hi nāma śarīrasya sarvātmanā ādhāraḥ

original: niyantā, śeṣī ca /
analyzed: niyantā śeṣī ca

original: tathā vakṣyate,
analyzed: tathā vakṣyate

original: “sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi sanniviṣṭo mattas smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca“,
analyzed: sarvasya ca aham hṛdi sanniviṣṭaḥ mattaḥ smṛtiḥ jñānam apohanam ca

original: “īśvaras sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśe 'rjuna tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ sarva bhūtānām hṛd deśe arjuna tiṣṭhati

original: bhrāmayan sarvabhūtāni yantrārūḍhāni māyayā //
analyzed: bhrāmayan sarva bhūtāni yantra ārūḍhāni māyayā

original: BhGR_1.” iti /
analyzed: iti

original: śrūyate ca, “yaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhan sarvebhyo bhūtebhyo 'ntaro yaṃ sarvāṇi bhūtāni na viduḥ,
analyzed: śrūyate ca yaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhan sarvebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ antaraḥ yam sarvāṇi bhūtāni na viduḥ

original: yasya sarvāṇi bhūtāni śarīraṃ yas sarvāṇi bhūtāny antaro yamayati,
analyzed: yasya sarvāṇi bhūtāni śarīram yaḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni antaraḥ yamayati

original: eṣa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ” iti,
analyzed: eṣa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ iti

original: “ya ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmano 'ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati,
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmanaḥ antaraḥ yam ātmā na veda yasya ātmā śarīram yaḥ ātmānam antaraḥ yamayati

original: sa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ” iti ca /
analyzed: sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ iti ca

original: evaṃ sarvabhūtānām ātmatayāvasthito 'haṃ teṣām ādir madhyaṃ cāntaś ca teṣām utpattisthitipralayahetur ityarthaḥ // BhGR_1.1020 //
analyzed: evam sarva bhūtānām ātma tayā avasthitaḥ aham teṣām ādiḥ madhyam ca antaḥ ca teṣām utpatti sthiti pralaya hetuḥ iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ bhagavataḥ svavibhūtibhūteṣu sarveṣv ātmatayāvasthānaṃ tattacchabdasāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśahetuṃ pratipādya vibhūtiviśeṣān sāmānādhikaraṇyena  #
analyzed: evam bhagavataḥ sva vibhūti bhūteṣu sarveṣu ātma tayā avasthānam tad tad śabda sāmānādhikaraṇya nirdeśa hetum pratipādya vibhūti viśeṣān sāmānādhikaraṇyena

original: vyapadiśati /
analyzed: vyapadiśati

original: bhagavaty ātmatayāvasthite hi sarve śabdās tasminn eva paryavasyanti;
analyzed: bhagavati ātma tayā avasthite hi sarve śabdāḥ tasmin eva paryavasyanti

original: yathā devo manuṣyaḥ pakṣī vṛkṣaḥ ityādayaḥ śabdāḥ śarīrāṇi pratipādayantas tattadātmani paryavasyanti /
analyzed: yathā devaḥ manuṣyaḥ pakṣī vṛkṣaḥ ityādayaḥ śabdāḥ śarīrāṇi pratipādayantaḥ tad tad ātmani paryavasyanti

original: bhagavatas tattadātmatayāvasthānam eva tattacchabdasāmānādhikaraṇyanibandhanam iti vibhūtyupasaṃhāre vakṣyati;
“na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram” iti sarveṣāṃ svenāvinābhāvavacanāt /
analyzed: na tat asti vinā yat syāt mayā bhūtam carācaram iti sarveṣām svena avinābhāva vacanāt

original: avinābhāvaś ca niyāmyatayeti;
analyzed: avinābhāvaḥ ca niyāmya tayā iti

original: “mattas sarvaṃ pravartate” ity upakramoditam /
analyzed: mattaḥ sarvam pravartate iti upakrama uditam

original: ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇur jyotiṣāṃ ravir aṃśumān /
analyzed: ādityānām aham viṣṇuḥ jyotiṣām raviḥ aṃśumān

original: marīcir marutām asmi nakṣatrāṇām ahaṃ śaśī // BhG_1.1021 //
analyzed: marīciḥ marutām asmi nakṣatrāṇām aham śaśī

original: dvādaśasaṃkhyāsaṃkhyātānām ādityānāṃ dvādaśo ya utkṛṣṭo viṣṇur nāmādityaḥ, so 'ham /
analyzed: dvādaśa saṃkhyā saṃkhyātānām ādityānām dvādaśaḥ yaḥ utkṛṣṭaḥ viṣṇuḥ nāma ādityaḥ saḥ aham

original: jyotiṣāṃ jagati prakāśakānāṃ yaḥ aṃśumān raviḥ ādityagaṇaḥ, so 'ham /
analyzed: jyotiṣām jagati prakāśakānām yaḥ aṃśumān raviḥ āditya gaṇaḥ saḥ aham

original: marutām utkṛṣṭo marīcir yaḥ, so 'ham asmi /
analyzed: marutām utkṛṣṭaḥ marīciḥ yaḥ saḥ aham asmi

original: nakṣatrāṇām ahaṃ śaśī /
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇām aham śaśī

analyzed: na iyam nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī

original: “bhūtānām asmi cetanā” itivat /
analyzed: bhūtānām asmi cetanā itivat

original: nakṣatrāṇāṃ patir yaś candraḥ,
analyzed: nakṣatrāṇām patiḥ yaḥ candraḥ

original: so 'ham asmi // BhGR_1.1021 //
analyzed: saḥ aham asmi

analyzed: indriyāṇām manaḥ ca asmi bhūtānām asmi cetanā

original: so 'ham asmi // BhGR_1.1022 //
analyzed: saḥ aham asmi

analyzed: śikhariṇām śikhara śobhinām parvatānām madhye meruḥ aham

analyzed: pitūnām aryamā ca asmi yamaḥ saṃyamatām aham

original: vṛkṣāṇāṃ pūjyo 'śvattho 'ham /

analyzed: kāmadhuk divyā surabhiḥ

original: jananahetuḥ kandarpaś cāham asmi /
analyzed: janana hetuḥ kandarpaḥ ca aham asmi

original: sarpāḥ ekāśirasaḥ;
analyzed: sarpāḥ ekāśirasaḥ

original: nāgāḥ bahuśirasaḥ /
analyzed: nāgāḥ bahuśirasaḥ

original: yādāṃsi jalavāsinaḥ,
analyzed: yādāṃsi jala vāsinaḥ

original: teṣāṃ varuṇo 'ham /
analyzed: teṣām varuṇaḥ aham

analyzed: daṇḍayatām vaivasvataḥ aham

original: prahlādaś cāsmi daityānāṃ kālaḥ kalayatām aham /
analyzed: prahlādaḥ ca asmi daityānām kālaḥ kalayatām aham

original: mṛgāṇāṃ ca mṛgendro 'haṃ vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām // BhG_1.1030 //
analyzed: mṛgāṇām ca mṛgendraḥ aham vainateyaḥ ca pakṣiṇām

analyzed: anartha prepsu tayā gaṇayatām madhye kālaḥ mṛtyuḥ aham

original: pavanaḥ pavatām asmi rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām aham /
analyzed: pavanaḥ pavatām asmi rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām aham

original: jhaṣāṇāṃ makaraś cāsmi srotasām asmi jāhnavī // BhG_1.1031 //
analyzed: jhaṣāṇām makaraḥ ca asmi srotasām asmi jāhnavī

original: pavatām gamanasvabhāvānāṃ pavano 'ham /
analyzed: pavatām gamana svabhāvānām pavanaḥ aham
