original: śastrabhṛttvam atra vibhūtiḥ,
analyzed: śastrabhṛt tvam atra vibhūtiḥ

original: arthāntarābhāvāt /
analyzed: artha antara abhāvāt

original: ādityādayaś ca kṣetrajñā ātmatvenāvasthitasya bhagavataḥ śarīratayā dharmabhūtā iti śastrabhṛttvasthānīyāḥ // BhGR_1.1031 //
analyzed: āditya ādayaḥ ca kṣetrajñāḥ ātma tvena avasthitasya bhagavataḥ śarīra tayā dharma bhūtāḥ iti śastrabhṛt tva sthānīyāḥ

original: sargāṇām ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ caivāham arjuna /
analyzed: sargāṇām ādiḥ antaḥ ca madhyam ca eva aham arjuna

original: adhyātmavidyā vidyānāṃ vādaḥ pravadatām aham // BhG_1.1032 //
analyzed: adhyātma vidyā vidyānām vādaḥ pravadatām aham

original: sṛjyanta iti sargāḥ,
analyzed: sṛjyante iti sargāḥ

original: teṣām ādiḥ kāraṇam;
analyzed: teṣām ādiḥ kāraṇam

original: sarvadā sṛjyamānānāṃ sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ tatra tatra sraṣṭāro 'ham evetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sarvadā sṛjyamānānām sarveṣām prāṇinām tatra tatra sraṣṭāraḥ aham eva iti arthaḥ

original: tathā antaḥ sarvadā saṃhriyamāṇānāṃ tatra tatra saṃhartāro 'py aham eva /
analyzed: tathā antar sarvadā saṃhriyamāṇānām tatra tatra saṃhartāraḥ api aham eva

original: tathā ca madhyaṃ pālanam;
analyzed: tathā ca madhyam pālanam

original: sarvadā pālyamānānāṃ pālayitāraś cāham evetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sarvadā pālyamānānām pālayitāraḥ ca aham eva iti arthaḥ

original: jalpavitaṇḍādi kurvatāṃ tattvanirṇayāya pravṛtto vādo yaḥ, so 'ham // BhGR_1.1032 //
analyzed: jalpa vitaṇḍā ādi kurvatām tattva nirṇayāya pravṛttaḥ vādaḥ yaḥ saḥ aham

original: akṣarāṇām akāro 'smi dvandvas sāmāsikasya ca /
analyzed: akṣarāṇām akāraḥ asmi dvandvaḥ sāmāsikasya ca

original: aham eva akṣayaḥ kālaḥ dhātāhaṃ viśvatomukhaḥ // BhG_1.1033 //
analyzed: aham eva akṣayaḥ kālaḥ dhātā aham viśvatomukhaḥ

original: akṣarāṇāṃ madhye “akāro vai sarvā vāk” iti śrutisiddhiḥ sarvavarṇānāṃ prakṛtir akāro 'ham sāmāsikaḥ samāsasamūhaḥ;
analyzed: akṣarāṇām madhye akāraḥ vai sarvā vāc iti śruti siddhiḥ sarva varṇānām prakṛtiḥ akāraḥ aham sāmāsikaḥ samāsa samūhaḥ

original: tasya madhye dvandvasamāso 'ham /
analyzed: tasya madhye dvandva samāsaḥ aham

original: sa hy ubhayapadārthapradhānatvenotkṛṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: sa hi ubhaya padārtha pradhāna tvena utkṛṣṭaḥ

original: kalāmuhūrtādimayo 'kṣayaḥ kālo 'ham eva /
analyzed: kalā muhūrta ādi mayaḥ akṣayaḥ kālaḥ aham eva

original: sarvasya sraṣṭā hiraṇyagarbhaś caturmukho 'ham // BhGR_1.1033 //
analyzed: sarvasya sraṣṭā hiraṇya garbhaḥ catur mukhaḥ aham

original: mṛtyus sarvaharaś cāham udbhavaś ca bhaviṣyatām /
analyzed: mṛtyuḥ sarva haraḥ ca aham udbhavaḥ ca bhaviṣyatām

original: kīrtiś śrīr vāk ca nārīṇāṃ smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā // BhG_1.1034 //
analyzed: kīrtiḥ śrīḥ vāc ca nārīṇām smṛtiḥ medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā

original: sarvaprāṇaharo mṛtyuś cāham /
analyzed: sarva prāṇa haraḥ mṛtyuḥ ca aham

original: utpatsyamānānām udbhavākhyaṃ karma cāham /
analyzed: utpatsyamānānām udbhava ākhyam karma ca aham

original: śrīr aham; kīrtiś cāham;
analyzed: śrīḥ aham kīrtiḥ ca aham

original: vāk cāham;
analyzed: vāc ca aham

original: smṛtiś cāham;
analyzed: smṛtiḥ ca aham

original: medhā cāham;
analyzed: medhā ca aham

original: dhṛtiś cāham;
analyzed: dhṛtiḥ ca aham

original: kṣamā cāham // BhGR_1.1034 //
analyzed: kṣamā ca aham

original: bṛhatsāma tathā sāmnāṃ gāyatrī chandasām aham /
analyzed: bṛhatsāma tathā sāmnām gāyatrī chandasām aham

original: māsānāṃ mārgaśīrṣo 'ham ṛtūnāṃ kusumākaraḥ // BhG_1.1035 //
analyzed: māsānām mārgaśīrṣaḥ aham ṛtūnām kusumākaraḥ

original: sāmnāṃ bṛhatsāma aham /
analyzed: sāmnām bṛhatsāma aham

original: chandasāṃ gāyatry aham /
analyzed: chandasām gāyatrī aham

original: kusumākaraḥ vasantaḥ // BhGR_1.1035 //
analyzed: kusumākaraḥ vasantaḥ

original: dyūtaṃ chalayatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham /
analyzed: dyūtam chalayatām asmi tejaḥ tejasvinām aham

original: jayo 'smi vyavasāyo 'smi sattvaṃ sattvavatām aham // BhG_1.1036 //
analyzed: jayaḥ asmi vyavasāyaḥ asmi sattvam sattvavatām aham

original: chalaṃ kurvatāṃ chalāspadeṣv akṣādilakṣaṇaṃ dyutam aham /
analyzed: chalam kurvatām chala āspadeṣu akṣa ādi lakṣaṇam dyutam aham

original: jetQṇāṃ jayo 'smi /
analyzed: jayaḥ asmi

original: vyavasāyināṃ vyavasāyo 'smi /
analyzed: vyavasāyinām vyavasāyaḥ asmi

original: sattvavatāṃ sattvam aham /
analyzed: sattvavatām sattvam aham

original: sattvam mahāmanastvam // BhGR_1.1036 //
analyzed: sattvam mahāmanaḥ tvam

original: vṛṣṇīnāṃ vāsudevo 'smi pāṇḍavānāṃ dhanañjayaḥ /
analyzed: vṛṣṇīnām vāsudevaḥ asmi pāṇḍavānām dhanañjayaḥ

original: munīnām apy ahaṃ vyāsaḥ kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ // BhG_1.1037 //
analyzed: munīnām api aham vyāsaḥ kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ

original: vasudevasūnutvam atra vibhūtiḥ,
analyzed: vasudeva sūnu tvam atra vibhūtiḥ

original: arthāntarābhāvād eva /
analyzed: artha antara abhāvāt eva

original: pāṇḍavānāṃ dhanañjayo 'rjuno 'ham /
analyzed: pāṇḍavānām dhanañjayaḥ arjunaḥ aham

original: munayaḥ mananenātmayāthātmyadarśinaḥ;
analyzed: munayaḥ mananena ātma yāthātmya darśinaḥ

original: teṣāṃ vyāso 'ham /
analyzed: teṣām vyāsaḥ aham

original: kavayaḥ vipaścitaḥ // BhGR_1.1037 //
analyzed: kavayaḥ vipaścitaḥ

original: daṇḍo damayatām asmi nītir asmi jigīṣatām /
analyzed: daṇḍaḥ damayatām asmi nītiḥ asmi jigīṣatām

original: maunaṃ caivāsmi guhyānāṃ jñānaṃ jñānavatām aham // BhG_1.1038 //
analyzed: maunam ca eva asmi guhyānām jñānam jñānavatām aham

original: niyamātikramaṇe daṇḍaṃ kurvatāṃ daṇḍo 'ham /
analyzed: niyama atikramaṇe daṇḍam kurvatām daṇḍaḥ aham

original: vijigīṣūṇāṃ jayopāyabhūtā nītir asmi /
analyzed: vijigīṣūṇām jaya upāya bhūtā nītiḥ asmi

original: guhyānāṃ saṃbandhiṣu gopāneṣu maunam asmi /
analyzed: guhyānām saṃbandhiṣu gopāneṣu maunam asmi

original: jñānavatāṃ jñānaṃ cāham // BhGR_1.1038 //
analyzed: jñānavatām jñānam ca aham

original: yac cāpi sarvabhūtānāṃ bījaṃ tad aham arjuna /
analyzed: yat ca api sarva bhūtānām bījam tat aham arjuna

original: na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram // BhG_1.1039 //
analyzed: na tat asti vinā yat syāt mayā bhūtam carācaram

original: sarvabhūtānāṃ sarvāvasthāvasthitānām tattadavasthābījabhūtaṃ pratīyamānam apratīyamānaṃ ca yat,
analyzed: sarva bhūtānām sarva avasthā avasthitānām tat tat avasthā bīja bhūtam pratīyamānam a pratīyamānam ca yat

original: tad aham eva /
analyzed: tat aham eva

original: bhūtajātaṃ mayā ātmatayāvasthitena vinā yat syāt, na tad asti /
analyzed: bhūta jātam mayā ātma tayā avasthitena vinā yat syāt na tat asti

original: “aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarvabhūtāśayasthitaḥ” iti prakramāt,
analyzed: aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarva bhūta āśaya sthitaḥ iti prakramāt

original: “na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram” ity atrāpy ātmatayāvasthānam eva vivakṣitam /
analyzed: na tat asti vinā yat syāt mayā bhūtam carācaram iti atra api ātma tayā avasthānam eva vivakṣitam

original: sarvaṃ vastujātaṃ sarvāvasthaṃ mayā ātmabhūtena yuktaṃ syād ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: sarvam vastu jātam sarva avastham mayā ātma bhūtena yuktam syāt iti arthaḥ

original: anena sarvasyāsya sāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśasyātmatayāvasthitir eva hetur iti prakaṭitam // BhGR_1.1039 //
analyzed: anena sarvasya asya sāmānādhikaraṇya nirdeśasya ātma tayā avasthitiḥ eva hetuḥ iti prakaṭitam

original: nānto 'sti mama divyānāṃ vibhūtīnāṃ parantapa /
analyzed: na antaḥ asti mama divyānām vibhūtīnām parantapa

original: eṣa tūddeśataḥ prokto vibhūter vistaro mayā // BhG_1.1040 //
analyzed: eṣa tu uddeśataḥ proktaḥ vibhūteḥ vistaraḥ mayā

original: mama divyānāṃ kalyāṇīnāṃ vibhūtīnām anto nāsti;
analyzed: mama divyānām kalyāṇīnām vibhūtīnām antaḥ na asti

original: eṣa tu vibhūter vistaro mayā kaiścid upādhibhiḥ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ // BhGR_1.40 //
analyzed: eṣa tu vibhūteḥ vistaraḥ mayā kaiścid upādhibhiḥ saṃkṣepataḥ proktaḥ

original: yad yad vibhūtimat sattvaṃ śrīmad urjitam eva vā /
analyzed: yat yat vibhūtimat sattvam śrīmat urjitam eva vā

original: tat tad evāvagaccha tvaṃ mama tejo'ṃśasaṃbhavam // BhG_1.1041 //
analyzed: tat tat eva avagaccha tvam mama tejaḥ aṃśa saṃbhavam

original: yad yad vibhūtimad iśitavyasaṃpannaṃ bhūtajātaṃ śrīmat kāntimat,
analyzed: yat yat vibhūtimat iśitavya saṃpannam bhūta jātam śrīmat kāntimat

original: dhanadhānyasamṛddhaṃ vā,
analyzed: dhana dhānya samṛddham vā

original: ūrjitaṃ kalyāṇārambheṣu udyuktam;
analyzed: ūrjitam kalyāṇa ārambheṣu udyuktam

original: tat tan mama tejo'ṃśasaṃbhavam ity avagaccha /
analyzed: tat tat mama tejaḥ aṃśa saṃbhavam iti avagaccha

original: tejaḥ parābhibhavanasāmarthyam,
analyzed: tejaḥ para abhibhavana sāmarthyam

original: mamācintyaśakter niyamanaśaktyekadeśasaṃbhavatītyarthaḥ // BhGR_1.1041 //
analyzed: mama acintya śakteḥ niyamana śakti eka deśa saṃbhavati iti arthaḥ

original: atha vā bahunaitena kiṃ jñānena tavārjuna /
analyzed: atha vā bahunā etena kim jñānena tava arjuna

original: viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat // BhG_1.1042 //
analyzed: viṣṭabhya aham idam kṛtsnam eka aṃśena sthitaḥ jagat

original: bahunā etena ucyamānena jñānena kiṃ prayojanam /
analyzed: bahunā etena ucyamānena jñānena kim prayojanam

original: idaṃ cidacidātmakaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagat kāryāvasthaṃ kāraṇāvasthaṃ sthūlaṃ sūkṣmaṃ ca svarūpasadbhāve,
analyzed: idam cit acit ātmakam kṛtsnam jagat kārya avastham kāraṇa avastham sthūlam sūkṣmam ca svarūpa sadbhāve

original: sthitau,
analyzed: sthitau

original: pravṛttibhede ca yathā matsaṅkalpaṃ nātivarteta,
analyzed: pravṛtti bhede ca yathā mad saṅkalpam na ativarteta

original: tathā mama mahimno 'yutāyutāṃśena viṣṭabhyāham avasthitaḥ /
analyzed: tathā mama mahimnaḥ ayuta ayuta aṃśena viṣṭabhya aham avasthitaḥ

original: yathoktaṃ bhagavatā parāśareṇa,
analyzed: yathā uktam bhagavatā parāśareṇa

original: “yasyāyutāyutāṃśāṃśe viśvaśaktir iyaṃ sthitā” iti // BhGR_1.1042 //
analyzed: yasya ayuta ayuta aṃśa aṃśe viśva śaktiḥ iyam sthitā iti

original: evaṃ bhaktiyoganiṣpattaye tadvivṛddhaye ca sakaletaravilakṣaṇena svābhāvikena bhagavadasādhāraṇena
analyzed: evam bhaktiyoga niṣpattaye tad vivṛddhaye ca sakala itara vilakṣaṇena svābhāvikena bhagavat asādhāraṇena

original: kalyāṇaguṇagaṇena saha bhagavataḥ sarvātmatvaṃ tata eva tadvyatiriktasya kṛtsnasya
analyzed: kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇena saha bhagavataḥ sarva ātma tvam tatas eva tad vyatiriktasya kṛtsnasya

original: cidacidātmakasya vastujātasya taccharīratayā tadāyattasvarūpasthitipravṛttitvaṃ coktam /
analyzed: cit acit ātmakasya vastu jātasya tad śarīra tayā tad āyatta svarūpa sthiti pravṛtti tvam ca uktam

original: tam etaṃ bhagavadasādhāraṇaṃ svabhāvaṃ kṛtsnasya tadāyattasvarūpasthitipravṛttitāṃ
analyzed: tam etam bhagavat asādhāraṇam svabhāvam kṛtsnasya tad āyatta svarūpa sthiti pravṛtti tām

original: ca bhagavatsakāśād upaśrutya evam eveti nityaś ca tathābhūtaṃ bhagavantaṃ sākṣātkartukāmo 'rjuna uvāca /
analyzed: ca bhagavat sakāśāt upaśrutya evam eva iti nityaḥ ca tathābhūtam bhagavantam sākṣātkartu kāmaḥ arjunaḥ uvāca

original: tathaiva bhagavatprasādād anantaraṃ drakṣyati /
analyzed: tathā eva bhagavat prasādāt anantaram drakṣyati

original: “sarvāścaryamayaṃ devam anantaṃ viśvatomukham ... tatraikasthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ pratibhaktam anekadhāḥ” iti hi vakṣyate /
analyzed: sarva āścarya mayam devam anantam viśvatomukham  tatra ekastham jagat kṛtsnam pratibhaktam anekadhā iti hi vakṣyate

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: madanugrahāya paramaṃ guhyam adhyātmasaṃjñitam /
analyzed: mad anugrahāya paramam guhyam adhyātma saṃjñitam

original: yat tvayoktaṃ vacas tena moho 'yaṃ vigato mama // BhG_11.1 //
analyzed: yat tvayā uktam vacaḥ tena mohaḥ ayam vigataḥ mama

original: dehātmābhimānarūpamohena mohitasya mamānugrahaikaprayojanāya paramaṃ guhyam paramaṃ rahasyam adhyātmasaṃjñitam ātmani vaktavyaṃ vacaḥ,
analyzed: deha ātma abhimāna rūpa mohena mohitasya mama anugraha eka prayojanāya paramam guhyam paramam rahasyam adhyātma saṃjñitam ātmani vaktavyam vacaḥ

original: “na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsam” ityādi,
analyzed: na tu eva aham jātu na āsam ityādi

original: “tasmād yogī bhavārjuna” ity etadantaṃ yat tvayoktam,
analyzed: tasmāt yogī bhava arjunaḥ iti etad antam yat tvayā uktam

original: tenāyam mamātmaviṣayo mohaḥ sarvo vigataḥ dūrato nirastaḥ // BhGR_11.1 //
analyzed: tena ayam mama ātma viṣayaḥ mohaḥ sarvaḥ vigataḥ dūratas nirastaḥ

original: tathā ca
analyzed: tathā ca

original: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānāṃ śrutau vistaraśo mayā /
analyzed: bhava apyayau hi bhūtānām śrutau vistaraśaḥ mayā

original: tvattaḥ kamalapatrākṣa māhātmyam api cāvyayam // BhG_11.2 //
analyzed: tvattaḥ kamala patra akṣa māhātmyam api ca avyayam

original: saptamaprabhṛti daśamaparyante tvadvyatiriktānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ tvattaḥ paramātmano bhavāpyayau utpattipralayau vistaraśo mayā śrutau hi
analyzed: saptama prabhṛti daśama paryante tvad vyatiriktānām sarveṣām bhūtānām tvattaḥ paramātmanaḥ bhava apyayau utpatti pralayau vistaraśaḥ mayā śrutau hi

original: kamalapatrākṣa,
analyzed: kamala patra akṣa

original: tava avyayaṃ nityaṃ sarvacetanācetanavastuśeṣitvaṃ jñānabalādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇais tavaiva
analyzed: tava avyayam nityam sarva cetana acetana vastu śeṣi tvam jñāna bala ādi kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇaiḥ tava eva

original: parataratvaṃ sarvādhāratvaṃ cintitanimiṣitādisarvapravṛttiṣu tavaiva pravartayitṛtvam
analyzed: paratara tvam sarva ādhāra tvam cintita nimiṣita ādi sarva pravṛttiṣu tava eva pravartayitṛ tvam

original: ityādi aparimitaṃ māhātmyaṃ ca śrutam /
analyzed: ityādi aparimitam māhātmyam ca śrutam

original: hiśabdo vakṣyamāṇadidṛkṣādyotanārthaḥ // BhGR_11.2 //
analyzed: hi śabdaḥ vakṣyamāṇa didṛkṣā dyotana arthaḥ

original: evam etad yathāttha tvam ātmānaṃ parameśvara /
analyzed: evam etat yathā āttha tvam ātmānam parameśvara

original: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama // BhG_11.3 //
analyzed: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaram puruṣottama

original: he parameśvara,
analyzed: he parameśvara

original: evam etad ity avadhṛtam,
analyzed: evam etat iti avadhṛtam

original: yathātha tvam ātmānaṃ bravīṣi /
analyzed: yathā atha tvam ātmānam bravīṣi

original: puruṣottama āśritavātsalyajaladhe tavāiśvaraṃ tvadasādhāraṇaṃ sarvasya praśāsitṛtve,
analyzed: puruṣottamaḥ āśrita vātsalya jaladhe tava aiśvaram tvat asādhāraṇam sarvasya praśāsitṛ tve

original: pālayitṛtve,
analyzed: pālayitṛ tve

original: sraṣṭṛtve,
analyzed: sraṣṭṛ tve

original: saṃhartṛtve bhartṛtve,
analyzed: saṃhartṛ tve bhartṛ tve

original: kalyāṇaguṇākaratve,
parataratve,
analyzed: paratara tve

original: sakaletaravisajātīyatve 'vasthitaṃ rūpaṃ draṣṭuṃ sākṣātkartum icchāmi // BhGR_11.3 //
analyzed: sakala itara visajātīya tve avasthitam rūpam draṣṭum sākṣātkartum icchāmi

original: manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti prabho /
analyzed: manyase yadi tat śakyam mayā draṣṭum iti prabho

original: yogeśvara tato me tvaṃ darśayātmānam avyayam // BhG_11.4 //
analyzed: yogeśvara tatas me tvam darśaya ātmānam avyayam

original: tat sarvasya sraṣṭṛ,
analyzed: tat sarvasya sraṣṭṛ

original: sarvasya praśāsitṛ,
analyzed: sarvasya praśāsitṛ

original: sarvasyādhārabhūtaṃ tvadrūpaṃ mayā draṣṭuṃ śakyam iti yadi manyase,
analyzed: sarvasya ādhāra bhūtam tvad rūpam mayā draṣṭum śakyam iti yadi manyase

original: tato yogeśvara yogo jñānādikalyāṇaguṇayogaḥ,
analyzed: tatas yogeśvara yogaḥ jñāna ādi kalyāṇa guṇa yogaḥ

original: “paśya me yogam aiśvaram” iti hi vakṣyate tvadvyatiriktasya kasyāpy asaṃbhāvitānāṃ jñānabalāiśvaryavīryaśaktitejasāṃ nidhe/
analyzed: paśya me yogam aiśvaram iti hi vakṣyate tvad vyatiriktasya kasya api a saṃbhāvitānām jñāna bala aiśvarya vīrya śakti tejasām nidhe

original: ātmānaṃ tvām avyayaṃ me darśaya /
analyzed: ātmānam tvām avyayam me darśaya

original: avyayam iti kriyāviśeṣaṇam /
analyzed: avyayam iti kriyā viśeṣaṇam

original: tvāṃ sakalaṃ me darśayetyarthaḥ // BhGR_11.4 //
analyzed: tvām sakalam me darśaya iti arthaḥ

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: evaṃ kautūhalānvitena harṣagadgadakaṇṭhena pārthena prārthito bhagavān uvāca
analyzed: evam kautūhala anvitena harṣa gadgada kaṇṭhena pārthena prārthitaḥ bhagavān uvāca

original: paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ /
analyzed: paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśas atha sahasraśas

original: nānāvidhāni divyāni nānāvarṇākṛtīni ca // BhG_11.5 //
analyzed: nānāvidhāni divyāni nānā varṇa ākṛtīni ca

original: paśya me sarvāśrayāṇi rūpāṇi;
analyzed: paśya me sarva āśrayāṇi rūpāṇi

original: atha śataśaḥ sahasraśaś ca nānāvidhāni nānāprakārāṇi,
analyzed: atha śataśas sahasraśas ca nānāvidhāni nānā prakārāṇi

original: divyāni aprākṛtāni,
analyzed: divyāni aprākṛtāni

original: nānāvarṇākṛtīni śuklakṛṣṇādinānāvarṇāni,
analyzed: nānā varṇa ākṛtīni śukla kṛṣṇa ādi nānā varṇāni

original: nānākārāṇi ca paśya // BhGR_11.5 //
analyzed: nānā ākārāṇi ca paśya

original: paśyādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutas tathā /
analyzed: paśya ādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutaḥ tathā

original: bahūny adṛṣṭapūrvāṇi paśyāścaryāṇi bhārata // BhG_11.6 //
analyzed: bahūni a dṛṣṭa pūrvāṇi paśya āścaryāṇi bhārata

original: mamaikasmin rūpe paśya ādityān dvādaśa,
analyzed: mama ekasmin rūpe paśye ādityān dvādaśa

original: vasūn aṣṭau,
analyzed: vasūn aṣṭau

original: rudrān ekādaśa,
analyzed: rudrān ekādaśa

original: aśvinau dvau,
analyzed: aśvinau dvau

original: marutaś caikonapañcāśatam /
analyzed: marutaḥ ca ekonapañcāśatam

original: pradarśanārtham idam,
analyzed: pradarśana artham idam

original: iha jagati pratyakṣadṛṣṭāni śāstradṛṣṭāni ca yāni vastūni,
analyzed: iha jagati pratyakṣa dṛṣṭāni śāstra dṛṣṭāni ca yāni vastūni

original: tāni sarvāṇi,
analyzed: tāni sarvāṇi

original: anyāny api sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu ca śāstreṣv adṛṣṭapūrvāṇi bahūny āścaryāṇi paśya // BhGR_11.6 //
analyzed: anyāni api sarveṣu lokeṣu sarveṣu ca śāstreṣu a dṛṣṭa pūrvāṇi bahūni āścaryāṇi paśya

original: ihaikasthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ paśyādya sacarācaram /
analyzed: iha ekastham jagat kṛtsnam paśya adya sacarācaram

original: mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi // BhG_11.7 //
analyzed: mama dehe guḍākeśa yat ca anyat draṣṭum icchasi

original: iha mamaikasmin dehe,
analyzed: iha mama ekasmin dehe

original: tatrāpi ekastham ekadeśasthaṃ sacarācaraṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagat paśya;
analyzed: tatra api ekastham eka deśa stham sa carācaram kṛtsnam jagat paśya

original: yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi,
analyzed: yat ca anyat draṣṭum icchasi

original: tad apy ekadehaikadeśa eva paśya // BhGR_11.7 //
analyzed: tat api eka deha eka deśe eva paśya

original: na tu māṃ śakṣyase draṣṭum anenaiva svacakṣuṣā /
analyzed: na tu mām śakṣyase draṣṭum anena eva sva cakṣuṣā

original: divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram // BhG_11.8 //
analyzed: divyam dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram

original: ahaṃ mama dehaikadeśe sarvaṃ jagad darśayiṣyāmi;
analyzed: aham mama deha eka deśe sarvam jagat darśayiṣyāmi

original: tvaṃ tv anena niyataparimitavastugrāhiṇā prākṛtena svacakṣuṣā,
analyzed: tvam tu anena niyata parimita vastu grāhiṇā prākṛtena sva cakṣuṣā

original: māṃ tathābhūtaṃ sakaletaravisajātīyam aparimeyaṃ draṣṭuṃ na śakṣyase /
analyzed: mām tathābhūtam sakala itara visajātīyam aparimeyam draṣṭum na śakṣyase

original: tava divyam aprākṛtaṃ maddarśanasādhanaṃ cakṣur dadāmi /
analyzed: tava divyam aprākṛtam mad darśana sādhanam cakṣuḥ dadāmi

original: paśya me yogam aiśvaram madasādhāraṇaṃ yogaṃ paśya;
analyzed: paśya me yogam aiśvaram mada sādhāraṇam yogam paśya

original: mamānantajñānādiyogam anantavibhūtiyogaṃ ca paśyetyarthaḥ // BhGR_11.8 //
analyzed: mama ananta jñāna ādi yogam ananta vibhūti yogam ca paśya iti arthaḥ

original: evam uktvā tato rājan mahāyogeśvaro hariḥ /
analyzed: evam uktvā tatas rājan mahā yoga īśvaraḥ hariḥ

original: darśayām āsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram // BhG_11.9 //
analyzed: darśayām āsa pārthāya paramam rūpam aiśvaram

original: evam uktvā sārathye 'vasthitaḥ pārthamātulajo mahāyogeśvaro hariḥ mahāścaryayogānām
analyzed: evam uktvā sārathye avasthitaḥ pārtha mātula jaḥ mahā yoga īśvaraḥ hariḥ mahā āścarya yogānām

original: īśvaraḥ parabrahmabhūto nārāyaṇaḥ paramam aiśvaraṃ svāsādhāraṇaṃ rūpaṃ pārthāya pitṛṣvasuḥ
analyzed: īśvaraḥ para brahma bhūtaḥ nārāyaṇaḥ paramam aiśvaram sva a sādhāraṇam rūpam pārthāya pitṛṣvasuḥ

original: pṛthāyāḥ putrāya darśayām āsa /
analyzed: pṛthāyāḥ putrāya darśayām āsa

original: tad vividhavicitranikhilajagadāśrayaṃ viśvasya praśāsitṛ ca rūpam;
analyzed: tat vividha vicitra nikhila jagat āśrayam viśvasya praśāsitṛ ca rūpam

original: tac cedṛśam
analyzed: tat ca īdṛśam

original: anekavaktranayanam anekādbhutadarśanam /
analyzed: aneka vaktra nayanam aneka adbhuta darśanam

original: anekadivyābharaṇaṃ divyānekodyatāyudham // BhG_11.10 //
analyzed: aneka divya ābharaṇam divya aneka udyata āyudham

original: divyamālyāmbaradharaṃ divyagandhānulepanam /
analyzed: divya mālya ambara dharam divya gandha anulepanam

original: sarvāścaryamayaṃ devam anantaṃ viśvatomukham // BhG_11.11 //
analyzed: sarva āścarya mayam devam anantam viśvatomukham

original: devaṃ dyotamānam,
analyzed: devam dyotamānam

original: anantam kālatrayavarti;
analyzed: anantam kāla traya varti

original: nikhilajagadāśrayatayā deśakālaparicchedānarham,
analyzed: nikhila jagat āśraya tayā deśa kāla pariccheda anarham

original: viśvatomukham viśvadigvartimukham,
analyzed: viśvatomukham viśva diś varti mukham

original: svocitadivyāmbaragandhamālyābharaṇāyudhānvitam // BhGR_11.10,11 //
analyzed: sva ucita divya ambara gandha mālya ābharaṇa āyudha anvitam

original: tām eva devaśabdanirdiṣṭāṃ dyotamānatāṃ viśinaṣṭi
analyzed: tām eva deva śabda nirdiṣṭām dyotamāna tām viśinaṣṭi

original: divi sūryasahasrasya bhaved yugapad utthitā /
analyzed: divi sūrya sahasrasya bhavet yugapad utthitā

original: yadi bhāḥ, sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ // BhG_11.12 //
analyzed: yadi bhās sadṛśī sā syāt bhāsaḥ tasya mahātmanaḥ

original: tejaso 'parimitatvadarśanārtham idam;
analyzed: tejasaḥ aparimita tva darśana artham idam

original: akṣayatejassvarūpam ityarthaḥ // BhGR_11.12 //
analyzed: akṣaya tejaḥ svarūpam iti arthaḥ

original: tatraikasthaṃ jagat kṛtsnaṃ pravibhaktam anekadhā /
analyzed: tatra ekastham jagat kṛtsnam pravibhaktam anekadhā

original: apaśyad devadevasya śarīre pāṇḍavas tadā // BhG_11.13 //
analyzed: apaśyat devadevasya śarīre pāṇḍavaḥ tadā

original: tatra anantāyām avistāre,
analyzed: tatra anantāyām avistāre

original: anantabāhūdaravaktranetre,
aparimitatejaske,
analyzed: aparimita tejaske

original: aparimitadivyāyudhopete,
analyzed: aparimita divya āyudha upete

original: svocitāparimitadivyabhūṣaṇe,
analyzed: sva ucita aparimita divya bhūṣaṇe

original: divyamālyāmbaradhare,
analyzed: divya mālya ambara dhare

original: divyagandhānulepane,
analyzed: divya gandha anulepane

original: anantāścaryamaye,
analyzed: ananta āścarya maye

original: devadevasya divye śarīre anekadhā pravibhaktaṃ brahmādivividhavicitradevatiryaṅmanuṣyasthāvarādibhoktṛvargapṛthivyantarikṣasvargapātālātalavitalasutalādibhogasthānabhogyabhogopakaraṇabhedabhinnaṃ
analyzed: devadevasya divye śarīre anekadhā pravibhaktam brahma ādi vividha vicitra deva tiryak manuṣya sthāvara ādi bhoktṛ varga pṛthivī antarikṣa svarga pātāla atala vitala sutala ādi bhoga sthāna bhogya bhoga upakaraṇa bheda bhinnam

original: prakṛtipuruṣātmakaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagat,
analyzed: prakṛti puruṣa ātmakam kṛtsnam jagat

original: “ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattas sarvaṃ pravartate“,
analyzed: aham sarvasya prabhavaḥ mattaḥ sarvam pravartate

original: “hanta te kathayiṣyāmi vibhūtīr ātmanaś śubhāḥ“,
analyzed: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi vibhūtīḥ ātmanaḥ śubhāḥ

original: “aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarvabhūtāśayasthitaḥ“,
analyzed: aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarva bhūta āśaya sthitaḥ

original: ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇuḥ” ityādinā,
analyzed: ādityānām aham viṣṇuḥ ityādinā

original: “na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram“,
analyzed: na tat asti vinā yat syāt mayā bhūtam carācaram

original: “viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat” ityantenoditam,
analyzed: viṣṭabhya aham idam kṛtsnam eka aṃśena sthitaḥ jagat ityantena uditam

original: ekastham ekadeśastham;
analyzed: ekastham eka deśa stham

original: pāṇḍavo bhagavatprasādalabdhataddarśanānuguṇadivyacakṣur apaśyat // BhGR_11.13 //
analyzed: pāṇḍavaḥ bhagavat prasāda labdha tad darśana anuguṇa divya cakṣuḥ apaśyat

original: tatas sa vismayāviṣṭo hṛṣṭaromā dhanañjayaḥ /
analyzed: tatas sa vismaya āviṣṭaḥ hṛṣṭa romā dhanañjayaḥ

original: praṇamya śirasā devaṃ kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata // BhG_11.14 //
analyzed: praṇamya śirasā devam kṛtāñjaliḥ abhāṣata

original: tato dhanañjayo mahāścaryasya kṛtsnasya jagataḥ svadehaikadeśenāśrayabhūtaṃ kṛtsnasya
analyzed: tatas dhanañjayaḥ mahā āścaryasya kṛtsnasya jagataḥ sva deha ekadeśena āśraya bhūtam kṛtsnasya

original: pravartayitāraṃ ca āścaryatamānantajñānādikalyāṇaguṇagaṇaṃ devaṃ dṛṣṭvā vismayāviṣṭo
analyzed: pravartayitāram ca āścaryatama ananta jñāna ādi kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇam devam dṛṣṭvā vismaya āviṣṭaḥ

original: hṛṣṭaromā śirasā daṇḍavat praṇamya kṛtāñjalir abhāṣata // BhGR_11.14 //
analyzed: hṛṣṭa romā śirasā daṇḍa vat praṇamya kṛtāñjaliḥ abhāṣata

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: paśyāmi devāṃs tava deva dehe sarvāṃs tathā bhūtaviśeṣasaṅgān /
analyzed: paśyāmi devān tava deva dehe sarvān tathā bhūta viśeṣa saṅgān

original: brahmāṇam īśaṃ kamalāsanastham ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān uragāṃś ca dīptān // BhG_11.15 //
analyzed: brahmāṇam īśam kamalāsana stham ṛṣīn ca sarvān uragān ca dīptān

original: deva; tava dehe sarvān devān paśyāmi;
analyzed: deva tava dehe sarvān devān paśyāmi

original: tathā sarvān prāṇiviśeṣāṇāṃ saṃghān,
analyzed: tathā sarvān prāṇi viśeṣāṇām saṃghān

original: tathā brahmāṇaṃ caturmukham aṇḍādhipatim,
analyzed: tathā brahmāṇam caturmukham aṇḍa adhipatim

original: tatheśaṃ kamalāsanasthaṃ kamalāsane brahmaṇi sthitam īśaṃ tanmate 'vasthitaṃ tathā devarṣipramukhān sarvān ṛṣīn,
analyzed: tathā īśam kamalāsana stham kamalāsane brahmaṇi sthitam īśam tad mate avasthitam tathā devarṣi pramukhān sarvān ṛṣīn

original: uragāṃś ca vāsukitakṣakādīn dīptān // BhGR_11.15 //
analyzed: uragān ca vāsuki takṣaka ādīn dīptān

original: anekabāhūdaravaktranetraṃ paśyāmi tvāṃ sarvato 'nantarūpam /
analyzed: aneka bāhu udara vaktra netram paśyāmi tvām sarvatas ananta rūpam

original: nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ paśyāmi viśveśvara viśvarūpa // BhG_11.16 //
analyzed: na antam na madhyam na punar tava ādim paśyāmi viśveśvara viśvarūpa

original: anekabāhūdaravaktranetram anantarūpaṃ tvāṃ sarvataḥ paśyāmi;
analyzed: aneka bāhu udara vaktra netram ananta rūpam tvām sarvatas paśyāmi

original: viśveśvara viśvasya niyantaḥ,
analyzed: viśveśvara viśvasya niyantar

original: viśvarūpa viśvaśarīra/
analyzed: viśvarūpa viśva śarīra

original: yatas tvam anantaḥ,
analyzed: yatas tvam anantaḥ

original: atas tava nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ ca paśyāmi // BhGR_11.16 //
analyzed: atas tava na antam na madhyam na punar tava ādim ca paśyāmi

original: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca tejorāśiṃ sarvato dīptim antam /
analyzed: kirīṭinam gadinam cakriṇam ca tejaḥ rāśim sarvatas dīptim antam

original: paśyāmi tvā durnirīkṣaṃ samantād dīptānalārkadyutim aprameyam // BhG_11.17 //
analyzed: paśyāmi tvā durnirīkṣam samantāt dīpta anala arka dyutim aprameyam

original: tejorāśiṃ sarvato dīptimantaṃ samantād durnirīkṣaṃ dīptānalārkadyutim aprameyaṃ tvāṃ kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca paśyāmi // BhGR_11.17 //
analyzed: tejaḥ rāśim sarvatas dīptimantam samantāt durnirīkṣam dīpta anala arka dyutim aprameyam tvām kirīṭinam gadinam cakriṇam ca paśyāmi

original: tvam akṣaraṃ paramaṃ veditavyaṃ tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam /
analyzed: tvam akṣaram paramam veditavyam tvam asya viśvasya param nidhānam

original: tvam avyayaḥ śāśvatadharmagoptā sanātanas tvaṃ puruṣo mato me // BhG_11.18 //
analyzed: tvam avyayaḥ śāśvata dharma goptā sanātanaḥ tvam puruṣaḥ mataḥ me

original: upaniṣatsu,
analyzed: upaniṣatsu

original: “dve vidye veditavye” ityādiṣu veditavyatayā nirdiṣṭaṃ paramam akṣaraṃ tvam eva;
analyzed: dve vidye veditavye ityādiṣu veditavya tayā nirdiṣṭam paramam akṣaram tvam eva

original: asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam viśvasyāsya paramādhārabhūtas tvam eva;
analyzed: asya viśvasya param nidhānam viśvasya asya parama ādhāra bhūtaḥ tvam eva

original: tvam avyayaḥ vyayarahitaḥ;
analyzed: tvam avyayaḥ vyaya rahitaḥ

original: yat svarūpo yadguṇo yadvibhavaś ca tvam,
analyzed: yat sva rūpaḥ yad guṇaḥ yad vibhavaḥ ca tvam

original: tenaiva rūpeṇa sarvadāvatiṣṭhase /
analyzed: tena eva rūpeṇa sarvadā avatiṣṭhase

original: śāśvatadharmagoptā śāśvatasya nityasya vaidikasya dharmasya evam ādibhir avatārais tvam eva goptā /
analyzed: śāśvata dharma goptā śāśvatasya nityasya vaidikasya dharmasya evam ādibhiḥ avatāraiḥ tvam eva goptā

original: sanātanas tvaṃ puruṣo mato me “vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntaṃ“,
analyzed: sanātanaḥ tvam puruṣaḥ mataḥ me veda aham etam puruṣam mahāntam

original: “parāt paraṃ puruṣam” ityādiṣūditaḥ sanātanapuruṣas tvam eveti me mataḥ jñātaḥ /
analyzed: parāt param puruṣam ityādiṣu uditaḥ sanātana puruṣaḥ tvam eva iti me mataḥ jñātaḥ

original: yad ukulatilakas tvam evaṃbhūta idānīṃ sākṣātkṛto mayetyarthaḥ // BhGR_11.18 //
analyzed: yat ukula tilakaḥ tvam evaṃbhūtaḥ idānīm sākṣātkṛtaḥ mayā iti arthaḥ

original: anādimadhyāntam anantavīryam anantabāhuṃ śaśisūryanetram /
analyzed: an ādi madhya antam ananta vīryam ananta bāhum śaśi sūrya netram

original: paśyāmi tvā dīptahutāśavaktraṃ svatejasā viśvam idaṃ tapantam // BhG_11.19 //
analyzed: paśyāmi tvā dīpta hutāśa vaktram sva tejasā viśvam idam tapantam

original: anādimadhyāntam ādimadhyāntarahitam /
analyzed: an ādi madhya antam ādi madhya anta rahitam

original: anantavīryam anavadhikātiśayavīryam;
vīryaśabdaḥ pradarśanārthaḥ;
analyzed: vīrya śabdaḥ pradarśana arthaḥ

original: anavadhikātiśayajñānabalāiśvaryavīryaśaktitejasāṃ nidhim ityarthaḥ /
anantabāhum asaṃkhyeyabāhum /
analyzed: ananta bāhum asaṃkhyeya bāhum

original: so 'pi pradarśanārthaḥ;
analyzed: saḥ api pradarśana arthaḥ

original: anantabāhūdarapādavaktrādikam /
analyzed: ananta bāhu udara pāda vaktra ādikam

original: śaśisūryanetram śaśivat sūryavac ca prasādapratāpayuktasarvanetram /
analyzed: śaśi sūrya netram śaśi vat sūrya vat ca prasāda pratāpa yukta sarva netram

original: devādīn anukūlān namaskārādi kurvāṇān prati prasādaḥ,
analyzed: deva ādīn anukūlān namaskāra ādi kurvāṇān prati prasādaḥ

original: tadviparītān asurarākṣasādīn prati pratāpaḥ;
analyzed: tad viparītān asura rākṣasa ādīn prati pratāpaḥ

original: “rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśo dravanti sarve namasyanti ca siddhasaṃghāḥ” iti hi vakṣyate /
analyzed: rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśaḥ dravanti sarve namasyanti ca siddha saṃghāḥ iti hi vakṣyate

original: dīptahutāśavaktram pradīptakālānalavat saṃhārānuguṇavaktram /
analyzed: dīpta hutāśa vaktram pradīpta kāla anala vat saṃhāra anuguṇa vaktram

original: svatejasā viśvam idaṃ tapantam /
analyzed: sva tejasā viśvam idam tapantam

original: tejaḥ parābhibhavanasāmarthyam;
analyzed: tejaḥ para abhibhavana sāmarthyam

original: svakīyena tejasā viśvam idaṃ tapantaṃ tvāṃ paśyāmi evambhūtaṃ sarvasya sraṣṭāraṃ
analyzed: svakīyena tejasā viśvam idam tapantam tvām paśyāmi evambhūtam sarvasya sraṣṭāram

original: sarvasyādhārabhūtaṃ sarvasya praśāsitāraṃ sarvasya saṃhartāraṃ jñānādyaparimitaguṇasāgaram
analyzed: sarvasya ādhāra bhūtam sarvasya praśāsitāram sarvasya saṃhartāram jñāna ādi aparimita guṇa sāgaram

original: ādimadhyāntarahitam evaṃbhūtadivyadehaṃ tvāṃ yathopadeśaṃ sākṣātkaromītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: ādi madhya anta rahitam evaṃbhūta divya deham tvām yathopadeśam sākṣātkaromi iti arthaḥ

original: ekasmin divyadehe anekodarādikaṃ katham? /
analyzed: ekasmin divya dehe aneka udara ādikam katham

original: ittham upapadyate /
analyzed: ittham upapadyate

original: ekasmāt kaṭipradeśād anantaparimāṇād ūrdhvam udgatā yathoditodarādayaḥ,
analyzed: ekasmāt kaṭi pradeśāt ananta parimāṇāt ūrdhvam udgatāḥ yathā udita udara ādayaḥ

original: adhaś ca yathoditadivyapādāḥ;
analyzed: adhas ca yathā udita divya pādāḥ

original: tatraikasmin mukhe netradvayam iti ca na virodhaḥ // BhGR_11.19 //
analyzed: tatra ekasmin mukhe netra dvayam iti ca na virodhaḥ

original: evaṃbhūtaṃ tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā devādayo 'haṃ ca pravyathitā bhavāma ity āha
analyzed: evaṃbhūtam tvām dṛṣṭvā deva ādayaḥ aham ca pravyathitāḥ bhavāmaḥ iti āha

original: dyāvāpṛthivyor idam antaraṃ hi vyāptaṃ tvayaikena diśaś ca sarvāḥ /
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ idam antaram hi vyāptam tvayā ekena diśaḥ ca sarvāḥ

original: dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ rūpam ugraṃ tad evaṃ lokatrayaṃ pravyathitaṃ mahātman // BhG_11.20 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā adbhutam rūpam ugram tat evam lokatrayam pravyathitam mahātman

original: dyuśabdaḥ pṛthivīśabdaś cobhau uparitanānām adhastanānāṃ ca lokānāṃ pradarśanārthau /
analyzed: dyu śabdaḥ pṛthivī śabdaḥ ca ubhau uparitanānām adhastanānām ca lokānām pradarśana arthau

original: dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ antaram avakāśaḥ /
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ antaram avakāśaḥ

original: yasminn avakāse sarve lokās tiṣṭhanti,
analyzed: yasmin avakāse sarve lokāḥ tiṣṭhanti

original: sarvo 'yam avakāśo diśaś ca sarvās tvayaikena vyāptāḥ /
analyzed: sarvaḥ ayam avakāśaḥ diśaḥ ca sarvāḥ tvayā ekena vyāptāḥ

original: dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ rūpam ugraṃ tavedam anantāyām avistāram atyadbhutam atyugraṃ ca rūpaṃ
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā adbhutam rūpam ugram tava idam anantāyām avistāram ati adbhutam ati ugram ca rūpam

original: dṛṣṭvā lokatrayaṃ pravyathitam yuddhadidṛkṣayā āgateṣu brahmādidevāsurapitṛgaṇasiddhagandharvayakṣarākṣaseṣu
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā lokatrayam pravyathitam yuddha didṛkṣayā āgateṣu brahma ādi deva asura pitṛ gaṇa siddha gandharva yakṣa rākṣaseṣu

original: pratikūlānukūlamadhyastharūpaṃ lokatrayaṃ sarvaṃ pravyathitam atyantabhītam /
analyzed: pratikūla anukūla madhyastha rūpam lokatrayam sarvam pravyathitam atyanta bhītam

original: mahātman aparicchedyamanovṛtte /
analyzed: mahātman aparicchedya manaḥ vṛtte

original: eteṣām apy arjunasyaiva viśvāśrayarūpasākṣātkārasādhanaṃ divyaṃ cakṣur bhagavatā dattam /
analyzed: eteṣām api arjunasya eva viśva āśraya rūpa sākṣātkāra sādhanam divyam cakṣuḥ bhagavatā dattam

original: kim artham iti cet,
analyzed: kim artham iti ced

original: arjunāya svāiśvaryaṃ sarvaṃ pradarśayitum /
analyzed: arjunāya sva aiśvaryam sarvam pradarśayitum

original: ata idam ucyate,
analyzed: atas idam ucyate

original: “dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ rūpam ugraṃ tavedaṃ lokatrayaṃ pravyarthitaṃ mahātman” iti // BhGR_11.20 //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā adbhutam rūpam ugram tava idam lokatrayam pravyarthitam mahātman iti

original: amī hi tvā surasaṅghā viśanti kecid bhītāḥ prāñjalayo gṛṇanti /
analyzed: amī hi tvā sura saṅghāḥ viśanti kecid bhītāḥ prāñjalayaḥ gṛṇanti

original: svastīty uktvā maharṣisiddhasaṅghāḥ stuvanti tvāṃ stutibhiḥ puṣkalābhiḥ // BhG_11.21 //
analyzed: svasti iti uktvā mahā ṛṣi siddha saṅghāḥ stuvanti tvām stutibhiḥ puṣkalābhiḥ

original: amī surasaṃghāḥ utkṛṣṭās tvāṃ viśvāśrayam avalokya hṛṣṭamanasaḥ tvan samīpaṃ viśanti /
analyzed: amī sura saṃghāḥ utkṛṣṭāḥ tvām viśva āśrayam avalokya hṛṣṭa manasaḥ samīpam viśanti

original: teṣv eva kecid atyugram atyadbhutaṃ ca tavākāram ālokya bhītāḥ prāñjalayaḥ svajñānānuguṇaṃ stutirūpāṇi vākyāni gṛṇanti uccārayanti /
analyzed: teṣu eva kecid ati ugram ati adbhutam ca tava ākāram ālokya bhītāḥ prāñjalayaḥ sva jñāna anuguṇam stuti rūpāṇi vākyāni gṛṇanti uccārayanti

original: apare maharṣisaṃghāḥ siddhasaṃghāś ca parāvaratattvayāthātmyavidaḥ svastīty uktvā puṣkalābhir bhavadanurūpābhiḥ stutibhiḥ stuvanti // BhGR_11.21
analyzed: apare mahā ṛṣi saṃghāḥ siddha saṃghāḥ ca parāvara tattva yāthātmya vidaḥ svasti iti uktvā puṣkalābhiḥ bhavat anurūpābhiḥ stutibhiḥ stuvanti  /

original: rudrādityā vasavo ye ca sādhyā viśve 'śvinau marutaś coṣmapāś ca /
analyzed: rudra ādityāḥ vasavaḥ ye ca sādhyāḥ viśve aśvinau marutaḥ ca ūṣmapāḥ ca

original: gandharvayakṣāsurasiddhasaṅghā vīkṣyante tvāṃ vismitāś caiva sarve // BhG_11.22 //
analyzed: gandharva yakṣa asura siddha saṅghāḥ vīkṣyante tvām vismitāḥ ca eva sarve

original: ūṣmapāḥ pitaraḥ,
analyzed: ūṣma pāḥ pitaraḥ

original: “ūṣmabhāgā hi pitaraḥ” iti śruteḥ /
analyzed: ūṣma bhāgāḥ hi pitaraḥ iti śruteḥ

original: ete sarve vismayam āpannās tvāṃ vīkṣante // BhGR_11.22 //
analyzed: ete sarve vismayam āpannāḥ tvām vīkṣante

original: rūpaṃ mahat te bahuvaktranetraṃ mahābāho bahubāhūrupādam /
analyzed: rūpam mahat te bahu vaktra netram mahā bāho bahu bāhu ūru pādam

original: bahūdaraṃ bahudaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ pravyathitās tathāham // BhG_11.23 //
analyzed: bahu udaram bahu daṃṣṭrā karālam dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ pravyathitāḥ tathā aham

original: bahvībhir daṃṣṭrābhir atibhīṣaṇākāraṃ lokāḥ pūrvoktāḥ pratikūlānukūlamadhyasthās trividhāḥ sarva eva ahaṃ ca tad evam īdṛśaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā atīva  #
analyzed: bahvībhiḥ daṃṣṭrābhiḥ ati bhīṣaṇa ākāram lokāḥ pūrva uktāḥ pratikūla anukūla madhyasthāḥ trividhāḥ sarve eva aham ca tat evam īdṛśam rūpam dṛṣṭvā atīva

original: vyathitā bhavāmaḥ // BhGR_11.23 //
analyzed: vyathitāḥ bhavāmaḥ

original: nabhasspṛśaṃ dīptam anekavarṇaṃ vyāttānanaṃ dīptaviśālanetram /
analyzed: nabhaḥ spṛśam dīptam aneka varṇam vyātta ānanam dīpta viśāla netram

original: dṛsṭvā hi tvā pravyathitāntarātmā dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo // BhG_11.24 //
analyzed: dṛsṭvā hi tvā pravyathita antarātmā dhṛtim na vindāmi śamam ca viṣṇo

original: namaśśabdaḥ “tad akṣare parame vyoman“,
analyzed: namaḥ śabdaḥ tat akṣare parame vyoman

original: “ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt“,
analyzed: āditya varṇam tamasaḥ parastāt

original: “kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāke“,
analyzed: kṣayantam asya rajasaḥ parāke

original: “yo asyādhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman” ityādiśrutisiddhitriguṇaprakṛtyatītaparamavyomavācī;
analyzed: yaḥ asya adhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman ityādi śruti siddhi triguṇa prakṛti atīta parama vyoma vācī

original: savikārasya prakṛtitattvasya,
analyzed: sa vikārasya prakṛti tattvasya

original: puruṣasya ca sarvāvasthasya,
analyzed: puruṣasya ca sarva avasthasya

original: kṛtsnasyāśrayatayā nabhas spṛśam iti vacanāt;
analyzed: kṛtsnasya āśraya tayā nabhaḥ spṛśam iti vacanāt

original: “dyāvāpṛthivyor idam antaraṃ hi vyāptam” iti pūrvoktatvāc ca /
analyzed: dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ idam antaram hi vyāptam iti pūrva ukta tvāt ca

original: dīptam anekavarṇaṃ vyāttānanaṃ dīptaviśālanetraṃ tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā pravyathitāntarātmā atyantabhītamanāḥ dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi dehasya dhāraṇaṃ na labhe,
analyzed: dīptam aneka varṇam vyātta ānanam dīpta viśāla netram tvām dṛṣṭvā pravyathita antarātmā atyanta bhīta manāḥ dhṛtim na vindāmi dehasya dhāraṇam na labhe

original: manasaś cendriyāṇāṃ ca śamaṃ na labhe /
analyzed: manasaḥ ca indriyāṇām ca śamam na labhe

original: viṣṇo vyāpin/ /
analyzed: viṣṇo vyāpin

original: sarvavyāpinam atimātram atyadbhutam atighoraṃ ca tvāṃ dṛṣṭvā praśithikasarvāvayavo vyākulendriyaś ca bhavāmītyarthaḥ // BhGR_11.24 //
analyzed: sarva vyāpinam atimātram ati adbhutam ati ghoram ca tvām dṛṣṭvā praśithika sarva avayavaḥ vyākula indriyaḥ ca bhavāmi iti arthaḥ

original: daṃṣṭrākarālāni ca te mukhāni dṛṣṭvaiva kālānalasannibhāni /
analyzed: daṃṣṭrā karālāni ca te mukhāni dṛṣṭvā eva kāla anala sannibhāni

original: diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa // BhG_11.25 //
analyzed: diśaḥ na jāne na labhe ca śarma prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa

original: yugāntakālānalavat sarvasaṃhāre pravṛttāni atighorāṇi tava mukhāni dṛṣṭvā diśo na jāne;
analyzed: yugānta kāla anala vat sarva saṃhāre pravṛttāni ati ghorāṇi tava mukhāni dṛṣṭvā diśaḥ na jāne

original: sukhaṃ ca na labhe /
analyzed: sukham ca na labhe

original: jagatāṃ nivāsa deveśa brahmādīnām īśvarāṇām api paramamaheśvara/
analyzed: jagatām nivāsa deveśa brahma ādīnām īśvarāṇām api parama maheśvara

original: māṃ prati prasanno bhava /
analyzed: mām prati prasannaḥ bhava

original: yathāhaṃ prakṛtiṃ gato bhavāmi,
analyzed: yathā aham prakṛtim gataḥ bhavāmi

original: tathā kurv ityarthaḥ // BhGR_11.25 //
analyzed: tathā kuru iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ sarvasya jagataḥ svāyattasthitipravṛttitvaṃ darśayan pārthasārathī rājaveṣacchadmanāvasthitānāṃ
analyzed: evam sarvasya jagataḥ sva āyatta sthiti pravṛtti tvam darśayan pārthasārathiḥ rāja veṣa chadmanā avasthitānām

original: dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ yaudhiṣṭhireṣv anupraviṣṭānāṃ ca asurāṃśānāṃ saṃhāreṇa bhūbhārāvataraṇaṃ
analyzed: dhārtarāṣṭrāṇām yaudhiṣṭhireṣu anupraviṣṭānām ca asura aṃśānām saṃhāreṇa bhū bhāra avataraṇam

original: svamanīṣitaṃ svenaiva kariṣyamāṇaṃ pārthāya darśayām āsa /
analyzed: sva manīṣitam svena eva kariṣyamāṇam pārthāya darśayām āsa

original: sa ca pārtho bhagavataḥ sraṣṭrtvādikaṃ sarvāiśvaryaṃ sākṣātkṛtya tasminn eva bhagavati
analyzed: sa ca pārthaḥ bhagavataḥ sraṣṭṛ tva ādikam sarva aiśvaryam sākṣātkṛtya tasmin eva bhagavati

original: sarvātmani dhārtarāṣṭrādīnām upasaṃhāram anāgatam api tatprasādalabdhena divyena
analyzed: sarvātmani dhārtarāṣṭra ādīnām upasaṃhāram anāgatam api tad prasāda labdhena divyena

original: cakṣuṣā paśyann idaṃ covāca
analyzed: cakṣuṣā paśyan idam ca uvāca

original: amī ca tvā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ sarvaiḥ sahaivāvanipālasaṅghaiḥ /
analyzed: amī ca tvā dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ sarvaiḥ saha eva avanipāla saṅghaiḥ

original: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ sūtaputras tathāsau sahāsmadīyair api yodhamukhyaiḥ // BhG_11.26 //
analyzed: bhīṣmaḥ droṇaḥ sūtaputraḥ tathā asau saha asmadīyaiḥ api yodha mukhyaiḥ

original: vaktrāṇi te tvaramāṇā viśanti daṃṣṭrākarālāni bhayānakāni /
analyzed: vaktrāṇi te tvaramāṇāḥ viśanti daṃṣṭrā karālāni bhayānakāni

original: kecid vilagnā daśanāntareṣu saṃdṛśyante cūrṇitair uttamāṅgaiḥ // BhG_11.27 //
analyzed: kecid vilagnāḥ daśana antareṣu saṃdṛśyante cūrṇitaiḥ uttamāṅgaiḥ

original: amī dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ duryodhanādayas sarve bhīṣmo droṇaḥ sūtaputraḥ karṇaś ca tatpakṣīyair avanipālasamūhaiḥ sarvaiḥ,
analyzed: amī dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ duryodhana ādayaḥ sarve bhīṣmaḥ droṇaḥ sūtaputraḥ karṇaḥ ca tad pakṣīyaiḥ avanipāla samūhaiḥ sarvaiḥ

original: asmadīyair api kaiścid yodhamukhyais saha tvaramāṇā daṃṣṭrākarālāni bhayānakāni tava vaktrāṇi vināśāya viśanti;
analyzed: asmadīyaiḥ api kaiścid yodha mukhyaiḥ saha tvaramāṇāḥ daṃṣṭrā karālāni bhayānakāni tava vaktrāṇi vināśāya viśanti

original: tatra kecic cūrṇitair uttamāṅgair daśānāntareṣu vilagnās saṃdṛśyante // BhGR_11.26,27 //
analyzed: tatra kecid cūrṇitaiḥ uttamāṅgaiḥ daśā nānā antareṣu vilagnāḥ saṃdṛśyante

original: yathā nadīnāṃ bahavo 'mbuvegāḥ samudram evābhimukhā dravanti /
analyzed: yathā nadīnām bahavaḥ ambu vegāḥ samudram eva abhimukhāḥ dravanti

original: tathā tavāmī naralokavīrā viśanti vaktrāṇy abhivijvalanti // BhG_11.28 //
analyzed: tathā tava amī nara loka vīrāḥ viśanti vaktrāṇi abhivijvalanti

original: yathā pradīptajvalanaṃ pataṅgā viśanti nāśāya samṛddhavegāḥ /
analyzed: yathā pradīpta jvalanam pataṅgāḥ viśanti nāśāya samṛddha vegāḥ

original: tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokās tavāpi vaktrāṇi samṛddhavegāḥ // BhG_11.29 //
analyzed: tathā eva nāśāya viśanti lokāḥ tava api vaktrāṇi samṛddha vegāḥ

original: ete rājalokāḥ,
analyzed: ete rāja lokāḥ

original: bahavo nadīnām ambupravāhāḥ samudram iva,
analyzed: bahavaḥ nadīnām ambu pravāhāḥ samudram iva

original: pradīptajvalanam iva ca śalabhāḥ,
analyzed: pradīpta jvalanam iva ca śalabhāḥ

original: tava vaktrāṇy abhivijvalanti svayam eva tvaramāṇā ātmanāśāya viśanti // BhGR_11.28,29 //
analyzed: tava vaktrāṇi abhivijvalanti svayam eva tvaramāṇāḥ ātma nāśāya viśanti

original: lelihyase grasamānaḥ samantāl lokān samagrān vadanair jvaladbhiḥ /
analyzed: lelihyase grasamānaḥ samantāt lokān samagrān vadanaiḥ jvaladbhiḥ

original: tejobhir āpūrya jagat samagraṃ bhāsas tavogrāḥ pratapanti viṣṇo // BhG_11.30 //
analyzed: tejobhiḥ āpūrya jagat samagram bhāsaḥ tava ugrāḥ pratapanti viṣṇo

original: rājalokān samagrān jvaladbhir vadanair grasamānaḥ kopavegena tadrudhirāvasiktamoṣṭhapuṭādikaṃ lelihyase punaḥ punar lehanaṃ karoṣi /
analyzed: rāja lokān samagrān jvaladbhiḥ vadanaiḥ grasamānaḥ kopa vegena tad rudhira avasikta moṣṭha puṭa ādikam lelihyase punar punar lehanam karoṣi

original: tavātighorā bhāsaḥ raśmayaḥ tejobhiḥ svakīyaiḥ prakāśaiḥ jagat samagram āpūrya pratapanti // BhGR_11.30 //
analyzed: tava ati ghorāḥ bhāsaḥ raśmayaḥ tejobhiḥ svakīyaiḥ prakāśaiḥ jagat samagram āpūrya pratapanti

original: ākhyāhi me ko bhavān ugrarūpo namo 'stu te devavara prasīda /
analyzed: ākhyāhi me kaḥ bhavān ugra rūpaḥ namaḥ astu te deva vara prasīda

original: vijñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṃ na hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim // BhG_11.31 //
analyzed: vijñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyam na hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim

original: “darśayātmānam avyayam” iti tavāiśvaryaṃ niraṅkuśaṃ sākṣātkartuṃ prārthitena bhavatā niraṅkuśam aiśvaryaṃ darśayatā atighorarūpam idam āviṣkṛtam
analyzed: darśaya ātmānam avyayam iti tava aiśvaryam niraṅkuśam sākṣātkartum prārthitena bhavatā niraṅkuśam aiśvaryam darśayatā ati ghora rūpam idam āviṣkṛtam

original: atighorarūpaḥ ko bhavān,
analyzed: ati ghora rūpaḥ kaḥ bhavān

original: kiṃ kartuṃ pravṛtta iti bhavantaṃ jñātum icchāmi /
analyzed: kim kartum pravṛttaḥ iti bhavantam jñātum icchāmi

original: tavābhipretāṃ pravṛttiṃ na jānāmi /
analyzed: tava abhipretām pravṛttim na jānāmi

original: etad ākhyāhi me /
analyzed: etat ākhyāhi me

original: namo 'stu te devavara/
analyzed: namaḥ astu te deva vara

original: prasīda namas te 'stu sarveśvara;
analyzed: prasīda namaḥ te astu sarveśvara

original: evaṃ kartum,
analyzed: evam kartum

original: anenābhiprāyeṇedaṃ saṃhartṛrūpam āviṣkṛtam ity uktvā prasannarūpaś ca bhava // BhGR_11.31 //
analyzed: anena abhiprāyeṇa idam saṃhartṛ rūpam āviṣkṛtam iti uktvā prasanna rūpaḥ ca bhava

original: āśritavātsalyātirekeṇa viśvāiśvaryaṃ darśayato bhavato ghorarūpāviṣkāre ko 'bhiprāya iti pṛṣṭo bhagavān pārthasārathiḥ svābhiprāyam āha,
analyzed: āśrita vātsalya atirekeṇa viśva aiśvaryam darśayataḥ bhavataḥ ghora rūpa āviṣkāre kaḥ abhiprāyaḥ iti pṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān pārthasārathiḥ sva abhiprāyam āha

original: pārthodyogena vināpi dhārtarāṣṭrapramukham aśeṣaṃ rājalokaṃ nihantum aham eva pravṛtta iti jñāpanāya mama ghorarūpāviṣkāraḥ,
analyzed: pārtha udyogena vinā api dhārtarāṣṭra pramukham aśeṣam rāja lokam nihantum aham eva pravṛttaḥ iti jñāpanāya mama ghora rūpa āviṣkāraḥ

original: tajjñāpanaṃ ca pārtham udyojayitum iti /
analyzed: tad jñāpanam ca pārtham udyojayitum iti

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: kālo 'smi lokakṣayakṛt pravṛddho lokān samāhartum iha pravṛttaḥ /
analyzed: kālaḥ asmi loka kṣaya kṛt pravṛddhaḥ lokān samāhartum iha pravṛttaḥ

original: ṛte 'pi tvā na bhaviṣyanti sarve ye 'vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu yodhāḥ // BhG_11.32 //
analyzed: ṛte api tvā na bhaviṣyanti sarve ye avasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu yodhāḥ

original: kalayati gaṇayatīti kālaḥ;
analyzed: kalayati gaṇayati iti kālaḥ

original: sarveṣāṃ dhārtarāṣṭrapramukhānāṃ rājalokānām āyuravasānaṃ gaṇayann ahaṃ tatkṣayakṛd ghorarūpeṇa pravṛddho rājalokān samāhartum ābhimukhyena  #
analyzed: sarveṣām dhārtarāṣṭra pramukhānām rāja lokānām āyuḥ avasānam gaṇayan aham tad kṣaya kṛt ghora rūpeṇa pravṛddhaḥ rāja lokān samāhartum ābhimukhyena

original: saṃhartum iha pravṛtto 'smi /
analyzed: saṃhartum iha pravṛttaḥ asmi

original: ato matsaṃkalpād eva tvām ṛte 'pi tvadudyogād rte 'pi ete dhārtarāṣṭrapramukhās tava pratyanīkeṣu ye 'vasthitā yodhāḥ,
analyzed: atas mad saṃkalpāt eva tvām ṛte api tvad udyogāt api ete dhārtarāṣṭra pramukhāḥ tava pratyanīkeṣu ye avasthitāḥ yodhāḥ

original: te sarve na bhaviṣyanti vinaṅkṣyanti // BhGR_11.32 //
analyzed: te sarve na bhaviṣyanti vinaṅkṣyanti

original: tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha yaśo labhasva jitvā śatrūn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ samṛddham /
analyzed: tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha yaśaḥ labhasva jitvā śatrūn bhuṅkṣva rājyam samṛddham

original: mayaivaite nihatāḥ pūrvam eva nimittamātraṃ bhava savyasācin // BhG_11.33 //
analyzed: mayā eva ete nihatāḥ pūrvam eva nimitta mātram bhava savyasācin

original: tasmāt tvaṃ tān prati yuddhāyottiṣṭha /

analyzed: tān śatrūn jitvā yaśaḥ labhasva

analyzed: mayā eva ete kṛta aparādhāḥ pūrvam eva nihatāḥ hanane viniyuktāḥ

analyzed: tvam tu teṣām hanane nimitta mātram bhava

analyzed: mayā hanyamānānām śatṛ ādi sthānīyaḥ bhava

original: ṣaca samavāye;
analyzed: ṣaca samavāye

analyzed: savyena śara sacana śīlaḥ savyasācī

analyzed: savyena api kareṇa śara samavāya karaḥ

original: karadvayena yoddhuṃ samartha ityarthaḥ // BhGR_11.33 //
analyzed: kara dvayena yoddhum samarthaḥ iti arthaḥ

analyzed: droṇam ca bhīṣmam ca jayadratham ca karṇam tathā anyān api yodha mukhyān

original: mayā hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ yudhyasva jetāsi raṇe sapatnān // BhG_11.34 //
analyzed: mayā hatān tvam jahi mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ yudhyasva jetāsi raṇe sapatnān

analyzed: droṇa bhīṣma karṇa ādīn kṛta aparādha tayā mayā eva hanane viniyuktān tvam jahi tvam hanyāḥ

original: etān gurūn bandhūṃś ca anyān api bhogasaktān kathaṃ haniṣyāmīti mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ tān uddiśya dharmādharmabhayena bandhusnehena kāruṇyena ca mā  #
analyzed: etān gurūn bandhūn ca anyān api bhoga saktān katham haniṣyāmi iti mā vyathiṣṭhāḥ tān uddiśya dharma adharma bhayena bandhu snehena kāruṇyena ca mā

original: vyathāṃ kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: vyathām kṛthāḥ

original: yatas te kṛtāparādhā mayaiva hanane viniyuktāḥ,
analyzed: yatas te kṛta aparādhāḥ mayā eva hanane viniyuktāḥ

analyzed: atas nirviśaṅkaḥ yudhyasva

original: raṇe sapatnān jetāsi jeṣyasi /
analyzed: raṇe sapatnān jetāsi jeṣyasi

original: naiteṣāṃ vadhe nṛśaṃsatāgandhaḥ;
analyzed: na eteṣām vadhe nṛśaṃsa tā gandhaḥ

analyzed: api tu jayaḥ eva labhyate iti arthaḥ

original: sañjaya uvāca
analyzed: sañjayaḥ uvāca

original: etac chrutvā vacanaṃ keśavasya kṛtāñjalir vepamānaḥ kirīṭī /
analyzed: etat śrutvā vacanam keśavasya kṛtāñjaliḥ vepamānaḥ kirīṭī

original: namaskṛtvā bhūya evāha kṛṣṇaṃ sagadgadaṃ bhītabhītaḥ praṇamya // BhG_11.35 //
analyzed: namaskṛtvā bhūyas eva āha kṛṣṇam sa gadgadam bhīta bhītaḥ praṇamya

original: etad aśritavātsalyajaladheḥ keśavasya vacanaṃ śrutvā arjunas tasmai namaskṛtya bhītabhīto bhūyas taṃ praṇamya kṛtāñjalir vepamānaḥ kirīṭī sagadgadam  #
analyzed: etat aśrita vātsalya jaladheḥ keśavasya vacanam śrutvā arjunaḥ tasmai namaskṛtya bhīta bhītaḥ bhūyas tam praṇamya kṛtāñjaliḥ vepamānaḥ kirīṭī sa gadgadam

original: āha // BhGR_11.35 //
analyzed: āha

original: sthāne hṛṣīkeśa tava prakīrtyā jagat prahṛṣyaty anurajyate ca /
analyzed: sthāne hṛṣīkeśa tava prakīrtyā jagat prahṛṣyati anurajyate ca

original: rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśo dravanti sarve namasyanti ca siddhasaṅghāḥ // BhG_11.36 //
analyzed: rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśaḥ dravanti sarve namasyanti ca siddha saṅghāḥ

analyzed: sthāne yuktam

original: yad etad yuddhadidṛkṣayāgatam aśeṣadevagandharvasiddhayakṣavidyādharakinnarakiṃpuruṣādikaṃ jagat,
analyzed: yat etat yuddha didṛkṣayā āgatam aśeṣa deva gandharva siddha yakṣa vidyādhara kinnara kiṃpuruṣa ādikam jagat

original: tvatprasādāt tvāṃ sarveśvaram avalokya tava prakīrtyā sarvaṃ prahṛṣyati,
analyzed: tvad prasādāt tvām sarveśvaram avalokya tava prakīrtyā sarvam prahṛṣyati

original: anurajyate ca,
analyzed: anurajyate ca

original: yac ca tvām avalokya rakṣāṃsi bhītāni sarvā diśaḥ pradravanti,
analyzed: yat ca tvām avalokya rakṣāṃsi bhītāni sarvāḥ diśaḥ pradravanti

original: sarve siddhasaṃghāḥ siddhādyanukūlasaṃghāḥ namasyanti ca tad etat sarvaṃ yuktam iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ // BhGR_11.36 //
analyzed: sarve siddha saṃghāḥ siddha ādi anukūla saṃghāḥ namasyanti ca tat etat sarvam yuktam iti pūrveṇa saṃbandhaḥ

original: yuktatām evopapādayati
analyzed: yukta tām eva upapādayati

original: kasmāc ca te na nameran mahātman garīyase brahmaṇo 'py ādikartre /

original: mahātman, te tubhyaṃ garīyase brahmaṇaḥ hiraṇyagarbhasyāpi ādibhūtāya kartre hiraṇyagarbhādayaḥ kasmād dhetor na namaskuryuḥ // BhGR_11.37ab
analyzed: mahātman te tubhyam garīyase brahmaṇaḥ hiraṇyagarbhasya api ādi bhūtāya kartre hiraṇyagarbha ādayaḥ kasmāt hetoḥ na namaskuryuḥ  /

original: ananta deveśa jagannivāsa tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat tat paraṃ yat // BhG_11.37 //
analyzed: ananta deveśa jagannivāsa tvam akṣaram sat asat tat param yat

original: ananta deveśa jagannivāsa tvam evākṣaram /
analyzed: ananta deveśa jagannivāsa tvam eva akṣaram

original: na kṣaratīty akṣaraṃ jīvātmatattvam /
analyzed: na kṣarati iti akṣaram jīvātma tattvam

analyzed: na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit iti ādi śruti siddhaḥ jīvātmā hi na kṣarati

original: sad asac ca tvam eva sadasacchabdanirdiṣṭaṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvenāvasthitaṃ prakṛtitattvaṃ,
analyzed: sat asat ca tvam eva sat asat śabda nirdiṣṭam kārya kāraṇa bhāvena avasthitam prakṛti tattvam

original: nāmarūpavibhāgavattayā kāryāvasthaṃ sacchabdanirdiṣṭaṃ tadanarhatayā kāraṇāvastham asacchabdanirdiṣṭaṃ ca tvam eva /
analyzed: nāma rūpa vibhāgavat tayā kārya avastham sat śabda nirdiṣṭam tad anarha tayā kāraṇa avastham asat śabda nirdiṣṭam ca tvam eva

original: tat param yat tasmāt prakṛteḥ prakṛtisaṃbandhinaś ca jīvātmanaḥ param anyan muktātmatattvaṃ yat,
analyzed: tat param yat tasmāt prakṛteḥ prakṛti saṃbandhinaḥ ca jīvātmanaḥ param anyat mukta ātma tattvam yat

original: tad api tvam eva // BhGR_11.37 //
analyzed: tat api tvam eva

original: tvam ādidevaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇas tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam /

original: atas tvam ādidevaḥ,
analyzed: atas tvam ādidevaḥ

analyzed: puruṣaḥ purāṇaḥ

original: tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam /
analyzed: tvam asya viśvasya param nidhānam

original: nidhīyate tvayi viśvam iti tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam;
analyzed: nidhīyate tvayi viśvam iti tvam asya viśvasya param nidhānam

analyzed: viśvasya śarīra bhūtasya ātma tayā parama ādhāra bhūtaḥ tvam eva iti arthaḥ

analyzed: vettāsi vedyam ca param ca dhāma tvayā tatam viśvam ananta rūpa

analyzed: evam sarva ātma tayā avasthitaḥ tvam eva param ca dhāma sthānam

original: prāpyasthānam ityarthaḥ /

analyzed: atas tvam eva vāyu ādi śabda vācyaḥ iti āha

analyzed: sarveṣām prapitāmahaḥ tvam eva

analyzed: sarvasām prajānām pitaraḥ prajāpatayaḥ

analyzed: prajāpatīnām pitā hiraṇya garbhaḥ prajānām pitāmahaḥ

analyzed: hiraṇyagarbhasya api pitā tvam prajānām prapitāmahaḥ

original: pitāmahādīnām ātmatayā tattacchabdavācyas tvam evetyarthaḥ // BhGR_11.39ab //
atyadbhutākāraṃ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā harṣotphullanayano 'tyantasādhvasāvanataḥ sarvato namaskaroti //

original: “tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat“,
analyzed: tvam akṣaram sat asat

analyzed: vāyuḥ yamaḥ agniḥ ityādi sarva sāmānādhikaraṇya nirdeśasya ātma tayā vyāptiḥ eva hetuḥ iti su vyaktam uktam

analyzed: tvayā tatam viśvam ananta rūpa

analyzed: sarvam samāpnoṣi tatas asi sarvaḥ iti ca

analyzed: sakhā iti matvā prasabham yat uktam he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakhā iti

analyzed: a jānatā mahimānam tava imam mayā pramādāt praṇayena vā api

analyzed: ekaḥ atha vā api acyuta tad samakṣam tat kṣāmaye tvām aham aprameyam

analyzed: tava ananta vīrya tva amitavikrama tva sarva antarātma tva sraṣṭṛ tva ādikaḥ yaḥ mahimā

analyzed: tam imam a jānatā mayā pramādāt mohāt

analyzed: he kṛṣṇa

analyzed: he yādava

analyzed: he sakhā iti tvayi prasabham vinaya apetam yat uktam

analyzed: vihāra śayyā āsana bhojaneṣu ca sahakṛteṣu ekānte vaḥ samakṣam vā yat asatkṛtaḥ asi

analyzed: tat sarvam tvām aprameyam aham kṣāmaye

original: apratimaprabhāva/
analyzed: apratima prabhāva

analyzed: tvam asya sarvasya carācarasya lokasya pitā asi

original: asya lokasya guruś cāsi;
analyzed: asya lokasya guruḥ ca asi

original: na tvatsamo 'sty abhyadhikaḥ kuto 'nyaḥ lokatraye 'pi tvadanyaḥ kāruṇyādinā kenāpi guṇena na tvatsamo 'sti /
analyzed: na tvad samaḥ asti abhyadhikaḥ kutas anyaḥ lokatraye api tvad anyaḥ kāruṇya ādinā kena api guṇena na tvad samaḥ asti
