analyzed: kutas abhyadhikaḥ

original: tasmāt praṇamya praṇidhāya kāryaṃ prasādaye tvām aham īśam īḍyam /
analyzed: tasmāt praṇamya praṇidhāya kāryam prasādaye tvām aham īśam īḍyam

original: piteva putrasya sakheva sakhyuḥ priyaḥ priyāyārhasi deva soḍhum // BhG_11.44 //
analyzed: pitā iva putrasya sakhā iva sakhyuḥ priyaḥ priyāya arhasi deva soḍhum

original: yasmāt tvaṃ sarvasya pitā pūjyatamo guruś ca kāruṇyādiguṇaiś ca sarvādhiko 'si,
analyzed: yasmāt tvam sarvasya pitā pūjyatamaḥ guruḥ ca kāruṇya ādi guṇaiḥ ca sarva adhikaḥ asi

original: tasmāt tvām īśam īḍyaṃ praṇamya praṇidhāya ca kāyaṃ,
analyzed: tasmāt tvām īśam īḍyam praṇamya praṇidhāya ca kāyam

original: prasādaye; yathā kṛtāparādhasyāpi putrasya,
analyzed: prasādaye yathā kṛta aparādhasya api putrasya

original: yathā ca sakhyuḥ,
analyzed: yathā ca sakhyuḥ

original: praṇāmapūrvaṃ prārthitaḥ pitā vā sakhā vā prasīdati;
analyzed: praṇāma pūrvam prārthitaḥ pitā vā sakhā vā prasīdati

original: tathā tvaṃ paramakāruṇikaḥ priyāya me sarvaṃ soḍhum arhasi // BhGR_11.44 //
analyzed: tathā tvam parama kāruṇikaḥ priyāya me sarvam soḍhum arhasi

original: adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hṛṣito 'smi dṛṣṭvā bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ mano me /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa pūrvam hṛṣitaḥ asmi dṛṣṭvā bhayena ca pravyathitam manaḥ me

original: tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa // BhG_11.45 //
analyzed: tat eva me darśaya deva rūpam prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa

original: adṛṣṭapūrvam atyadbhutam atyugraṃ ca tava rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣito 'smi prīto 'smi /
analyzed: adṛṣṭa pūrvam ati adbhutam ati ugram ca tava rūpam dṛṣṭvā hṛṣitaḥ asmi prītaḥ asmi

original: bhayena pravyathitaṃ ca me manaḥ /
analyzed: bhayena pravyathitam ca me manaḥ

original: atas tad eva tava suprasannaṃ rūpaṃ me darśaya /
analyzed: atas tat eva tava su prasannam rūpam me darśaya

original: prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa mayi prasādaṃ kuru,
analyzed: prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa mayi prasādam kuru

original: devānāṃ brahmādīnām apīśa,
analyzed: devānām brahma ādīnām api īśa

original: nikhilajagadāśrayabhūta // BhGR_11.45 //
analyzed: nikhila jagat āśraya bhūta

original: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakrahastam icchāmi tvāṃ draṣṭum ahaṃ tathaiva /
analyzed: kirīṭinam gadinam cakra hastam icchāmi tvām draṣṭum aham tathā eva

original: tenaiva rūpeṇa caturbhujena sahasrabāho bhava viśvamūrte // BhG_11.46 //
analyzed: tena eva rūpeṇa catur bhujena sahasrabāho bhava viśvamūrte

original: tathaiva pūrvavat,
analyzed: tathā eva pūrvavat

original: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakrahastaṃ tvāṃ draṣṭum icchāmi /
analyzed: kirīṭinam gadinam cakra hastam tvām draṣṭum icchāmi

original: atas tenaiva pūrvasiddhena caturbhujena rūpeṇa yukto bhava /
analyzed: atas tena eva pūrva siddhena catur bhujena rūpeṇa yuktaḥ bhava

original: sahasrabāho viśvamūrte idānīṃ sahasrabāhutvena viśvaśarīratvena dṛśyamānarūpas tvaṃ tenaiva rūpeṇa yukto bhavetyarthaḥ // BhGR_11.46 //
analyzed: sahasrabāho viśvamūrte idānīm sahasrabāhu tvena viśva śarīra tvena dṛśyamāna rūpaḥ tvam tena eva rūpeṇa yuktaḥ bhava iti arthaḥ

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: mayā prasannena tavārjunedaṃ rūpaṃ paraṃ darśitam ātmayogāt /
analyzed: mayā prasannena tava arjuna idam rūpam param darśitam ātma yogāt

original: tejomayaṃ viśvam anantam ādyaṃ yan me tvadanyena na dṛṣṭapūrvam // BhG_11.47 //
analyzed: tejaḥ mayam viśvam anantam ādyam yat me tvad anyena na dṛṣṭa pūrvam

original: yan me tejomayaṃ tejasāṃ rāśiḥ;
analyzed: yat me tejaḥ mayam tejasām rāśiḥ

original: viśvaṃ viśvātmabhūtam,
analyzed: viśvam viśva ātma bhūtam

original: anantam antarahitam;
analyzed: anantam anta rahitam

original: pradarśanārtham idam;
analyzed: pradarśana artham idam

original: ādimadhyāntarahitam;
analyzed: ādi madhya anta rahitam

original: ādyam madvyatiriktasya kṛtsnasyādibhūtam,
analyzed: ādyam mad vyatiriktasya kṛtsnasya ādi bhūtam

original: tvadanyena kenāpi na dṛṣṭapūrvaṃ rūpam tad idaṃ prasannena mayā madbhaktāya te darśitam;
analyzed: tvad anyena kena api na dṛṣṭa pūrvam rūpam tat idam prasannena mayā mad bhaktāya te darśitam

original: ātmayogād atmanas satyasaṃkalpatvayogāt // BhGR_11.47 //
analyzed: ātma yogāt ātmanaḥ satya saṃkalpa tva yogāt

original: ananyabhaktivyatiriktaiḥ sarvair apy upāyair yathāvad avasthito 'haṃ draṣṭuṃ na śakya ity āha
analyzed: ananya bhakti vyatiriktaiḥ sarvaiḥ api upāyaiḥ yathāvat avasthitaḥ aham draṣṭum na śakyaḥ iti āha

original: na vedayajñādhyayanair na dānair na ca kriyābhir na tapobhir ugraiḥ /
analyzed: na veda yajña adhyayanaiḥ na dānaiḥ na ca kriyābhiḥ na tapobhiḥ ugraiḥ

original: evaṃrūpaś śakya ahaṃ nṛloke draṣṭuṃ tvadanyena kurupravīra // BhG_11.48 //
analyzed: evaṃrūpaḥ śakyaḥ aham nṛ loke draṣṭum tvad anyena kuru pravīra

original: evaṃrūpo yathāvad avathito 'haṃ mayi bhaktimatas tvatto 'nyena ekāntabhaktirahitena kenāpi puruṣeṇa vedayajñādibhiḥ kevalair draṣṭuṃ na śakyaḥ
analyzed: evaṃrūpaḥ yathāvat avathitaḥ aham mayi bhaktimataḥ tvattaḥ anyena ekānta bhakti rahitena kena api puruṣeṇa veda yajña ādibhiḥ kevalaiḥ draṣṭum na śakyaḥ

original: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍhabhāvo dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ ghoram īdṛṅ mamedam /
analyzed: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍha bhāvaḥ dṛṣṭvā rūpam ghoram īdṛś mama idam

original: vyapetabhīḥ prītamanāḥ punas tvaṃ tad eva me rūpam idaṃ prapaśya // BhG_11.49 //
analyzed: vyapeta bhīḥ prīta manāḥ punar tvam tat eva me rūpam idam prapaśya

original: īdṛśaghorarūpadarśanena te yā vyathā,
analyzed: īdṛśa ghora rūpa darśanena te yā vyathā

original: yaś ca vimūḍhabhāvo vartate,
analyzed: yaḥ ca vimūḍha bhāvaḥ vartate

original: tadubhayaṃ mā bhūt;
analyzed: tat ubhayam mā bhūt

original: tvayā abhyastapūrvam eva saumyaṃ rūpaṃ darśayāmi,
analyzed: tvayā abhyasta pūrvam eva saumyam rūpam darśayāmi

original: tad evedaṃ mama rūpaṃ prapaśya // BhGR_11.49 //
analyzed: tat eva idam mama rūpam prapaśya

original: sañjaya uvāca
analyzed: sañjayaḥ uvāca

original: ity arjunaṃ vāsudevas tathoktvā svakaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa bhūyaḥ /
analyzed: iti arjunam vāsudevaḥ tathā uktvā svakam rūpam darśayām āsa bhūyas

original: āśvāsayām āsa ca bhītam enaṃ bhūtvā punas saumyavapur mahātmā // BhG_11.50 //
analyzed: āśvāsayām āsa ca bhītam enam bhūtvā punar saumya vapuḥ mahātmā

original: evaṃ pāṇḍutanayaṃ bhagavān vasudevasūnur uktvā bhūyaḥ svakīyam eva caturbhujaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa;
analyzed: evam pāṇḍu tanayam bhagavān vasudeva sūnuḥ uktvā bhūyas svakīyam eva catur bhujam rūpam darśayām āsa

original: aparicitarupadarśanena bhītam enaṃ punar api paricitasaumyavapur bhūtvā āśvāsayām āsa ca,
analyzed: a paricita rupa darśanena bhītam enam punar api paricita saumya vapuḥ bhūtvā āśvāsayām āsa ca

original: mahātmā satyasaṅkalpaḥ /
analyzed: mahātmā satya saṅkalpaḥ

original: asya sarveśvarasya paramapuruṣasya parasya brahmaṇo jagadupakṛtimartyasya vasudevasūnoś caturbhujam eva svakīyaṃ rūpam;
analyzed: asya sarveśvarasya paramapuruṣasya parasya brahmaṇaḥ jagat upakṛti martyasya vasudeva sūnoḥ catur bhujam eva svakīyam rūpam

original: kaṃsād bhītavasudevaprārthanena ākaṃsavadhād bhujadvayam upasaṃhṛtaṃ paścād āviṣkṛtaṃ ca /
analyzed: kaṃsāt bhīta vasudeva prārthanena ā kaṃsa vadhāt bhuja dvayam upasaṃhṛtam paścāt āviṣkṛtam ca

original: “jāto 'si deva deveśa śaṅkhacakragadādhara /
analyzed: jātaḥ asi deva deveśa śaṅkha cakra gadā dhara

original: divyaṃ rūpam idaṃ deva prasādenopsaṃhara //
analyzed: divyam rūpam idam deva prasādena upsaṃhara

original: ..... upasaṃhara viśvātman rūpam etac caturbhujam” iti hi prārthitam /
analyzed: upasaṃhara viśvātman rūpam etat catur bhujam iti hi prārthitam

original: śiśupālasyāpi dviṣato 'navaratabhāvanāviṣayaś caturbhujam eva vasudevasūno rūpam,
analyzed: śiśupālasya api dviṣataḥ anavarata bhāvanā viṣayaḥ catur bhujam eva vasudeva sūnoḥ rūpam

original: “udārapīvaracaturbāhuṃ śaṅkhacakragadādharam” iti /
analyzed: udāra pīvara catur bāhum śaṅkha cakra gadā dharam iti

original: ataḥ pārthenātra tenaiva rūpeṇa caturbhujanety ucyate // BhGR_11.50 //
analyzed: atas pārthena atra tena eva rūpeṇa catur bhujana iti ucyate

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana /
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā idam mānuṣam rūpam tava saumyam janārdana

original: idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sacetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ // BhG_11.51 //
analyzed: idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sa cetāḥ prakṛtim gataḥ

original: anavadhikātiśayasaundaryasaukumāryalāvaṇyādiyuktaṃ tavaivāsādhāraṇaṃ manuṣyatvasaṃsthānasaṃsthitam atisaumyam idaṃ tava rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā idānīṃ  #
analyzed: anavadhika atiśaya saundarya saukumārya lāvaṇya ādi yuktam tava eva asādhāraṇam manuṣya tva saṃsthāna saṃsthitam ati saumyam idam tava rūpam dṛṣṭvā idānīm

original: sacetās saṃvṛtto 'smi;
analyzed: sacetāḥ saṃvṛttaḥ asmi

original: prakṛtiṃ gataś ca // BhGR_11.51 //
analyzed: prakṛtim gataḥ ca

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: sudurdarśam idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi yan mama /
analyzed: su durdarśam idam rūpam dṛṣṭavān asi yat mama

original: devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // BhG_11.52 //
analyzed: devāḥ api asya rūpasya nityam darśana kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: mama idaṃ sarvasya praśāsane 'vasthitaṃ sarvāsrayaṃ sarvakāraṇabhūtaṃ rūpaṃ yad dṛṣṭavān asi,
analyzed: mama idam sarvasya praśāsane avasthitam sarva asrayam sarva kāraṇa bhūtam rūpam yat dṛṣṭavān asi

original: tat sudurdarśaṃ na kenāpi draṣṭuṃ śakyam /
analyzed: tat su durdarśam na kena api draṣṭum śakyam

original: asya rūpasya devā api nityaṃ darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ,
analyzed: asya rūpasya devāḥ api nityam darśana kāṅkṣiṇaḥ

original: na tu dṛṣṭavantaḥ // BhGR_11.52 //
analyzed: na tu dṛṣṭavantaḥ

original: kuta ity atra āha
analyzed: kutas iti atra āha

original: nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā /
analyzed: na aham vedaiḥ na tapasā na dānena na ca ijyayā

original: śakya evaṃvidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi mām yathā // BhG_11.53 //
analyzed: śakyaḥ evaṃvidhaḥ draṣṭum dṛṣṭavān asi mām yathā

original: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidho 'rjuna /
analyzed: bhaktyā tu an anyayā śakya aham evaṃvidhaḥ arjuna

original: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca parantapa // BhG_11.54 //
analyzed: jñātum draṣṭum ca tattvena praveṣṭum ca parantapa

original: vedair adhyāpanapravacanādhyayanaśravaṇajapaviṣayaiḥ,
analyzed: vedaiḥ adhyāpana pravacana adhyayana śravaṇa japa viṣayaiḥ

original: yāgadānahomatapobhiś ca madbhaktivirahitaiḥ kevalaiḥ yathāvad avasthito 'haṃ draṣṭum aśakyaḥ /
analyzed: yāga dāna homa tapobhiḥ ca mad bhakti virahitaiḥ kevalaiḥ yathāvat avasthitaḥ aham draṣṭum aśakyaḥ

original: ananyayā tu bhaktyā tattvataś śāstrair jñātuṃ tattvatas sākṣātkartuṃ,
analyzed: ananyayā tu bhaktyā tattvataḥ śāstraiḥ jñātum tattvataḥ sākṣātkartum

original: tattvataḥ praveṣṭuṃ ca śakyaḥ /
analyzed: tattvataḥ praveṣṭum ca śakyaḥ

original: tathā ca śrutiḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ

original: “nāyam ātmā pravacanena labhyo na medhayā na bahunā śrutena /
analyzed: na ayam ātmā pravacanena labhyaḥ na medhayā na bahunā śrutena

original: yam evaiṣa vṛṇute tena labhyas tasyaiṣa ātmā vivṛṇute tanūṃ svām” iti // BhGR_11.53,54 //
analyzed: yam eva eṣa vṛṇute tena labhyaḥ tasya eṣaḥ ātmā vivṛṇute tanūm svām iti

original: matkarmakṛn matparamo madbhaktas saṅgavarjitaḥ /
analyzed: mad karma kṛt mad paramaḥ mad bhaktaḥ saṅga varjitaḥ

original: nirvairas sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava // BhG_11.55 //
analyzed: nirvairaḥ sarva bhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava

original: vedādhyayanādīni sarvāṇi karmāṇi madārādhanarūpāṇīti yaḥ karoti,
analyzed: veda adhyayana ādīni sarvāṇi karmāṇi mad ārādhana rūpāṇi iti yaḥ karoti

original: sa matkarmakṛt /
analyzed: sa mad karma kṛt

original: matparamaḥ sarveṣām ārambhāṇām aham eva paramoddeśyo yasya,
analyzed: mad paramaḥ sarveṣām ārambhāṇām aham eva parama uddeśyaḥ yasya

original: sa matparamaḥ /
analyzed: sa mad paramaḥ

original: madbhaktaḥ atyarthamatpriyatvena matkīrtanastutidhyānārcanapraṇāmādibhir vinā ātmadhāraṇam alabhamāno madekaprayojanatayā yaḥ satataṃ tāni
analyzed: mad bhaktaḥ atyartha mad priya tvena mad kīrtana stuti dhyāna arcana praṇāma ādibhiḥ vinā ātma dhāraṇam alabhamānaḥ mad eka prayojana tayā yaḥ satatam tāni

original: sa madbhaktaḥ /
analyzed: sa mad bhaktaḥ

original: saṅgavarjitaḥ madekapriyatvenetarasaṅgam asahamānaḥ /
analyzed: saṅga varjitaḥ mad eka priya tvena itara saṅgam asahamānaḥ

original: nirvairas sarvabhūteṣu matsaṃśleṣaviyogaikasukhaduḥkhasvabhāvatvāt svaduḥkhasya svāparādhananimittatvānusaṃdhānāc
analyzed: nirvairaḥ sarva bhūteṣu mad saṃśleṣa viyoga eka sukha duḥkha svabhāva tvāt sva duḥkhasya sva aparādhana nimitta tva anusaṃdhānāt

original: ca sarvabhūtānāṃ paramapuruṣaparatantratvānusaṃdhānāc ca sarvabhūteṣu vairanimittābhāvāt teṣu nirvairaḥ /
analyzed: ca sarva bhūtānām paramapuruṣa paratantra tva anusaṃdhānāt ca sarva bhūteṣu vaira nimitta abhāvāt teṣu nirvairaḥ

original: ya evaṃ bhūtaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ evam bhūtaḥ

original: sa mām iti māṃ yathāvad avasthitaṃ prāpnoti;
analyzed: sa mām iti mām yathāvat avasthitam prāpnoti

original: nirastāvidyādyaśeṣadoṣagandho madekānubhavo bhavatītyarthaḥ // BhGR_11.55 //
analyzed: nirasta avidyā ādi aśeṣa doṣa gandhaḥ mad eka anubhavaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: bhaktiyoganiṣṭhānāṃ prāpyabhūtasya parasya brahmaṇo bhagavato nārāyaṇasya niraṅkuśāiśvaryaṃ
analyzed: bhakti yoga niṣṭhānām prāpya bhūtasya parasya brahmaṇaḥ bhagavataḥ nārāyaṇasya niraṅkuśa aiśvaryam

original: sākṣātkartukāmāyārjunāya anavadhikātiśayakāruṇyāudāryasauśīlyādiguṇasāgareṇa satyasaṃkalpena
analyzed: sākṣātkartu kāmāya arjunāya anavadhika atiśaya kāruṇya audārya sauśīlya ādi guṇa sāgareṇa satya saṃkalpena

original: bhagavatā svāiśvaryaṃ yathāvad avasthitaṃ darśitam;
analyzed: bhagavatā sva aiśvaryam yathāvat avasthitam darśitam

original: uktaṃ ca tattvato bhagavajjñānadarśanaprāptīnām aikāntikātyantikabhagavadbhaktyekalabhyatvam /
analyzed: uktam ca tattvataḥ bhagavat jñāna darśana prāptīnām aikāntika ātyantika bhagavat bhakti eka labhya tvam

original: ananataram ātmaprāptisādhanabhūtād atmopāsanād bhaktirūpasya bhagavadupāsanasya svasādhyaniṣpādane śaighryāt susukhopādānatvāc ca śraiṣṭhyam,
analyzed: ananataram ātma prāpti sādhana bhūtāt atma upāsanāt bhakti rūpasya bhagavat upāsanasya sva sādhya niṣpādane śaighryāt su sukha upādāna tvāt ca śraiṣṭhyam

original: bhagavadupāsanopāyaś ca,
analyzed: bhagavat upāsana upāyaḥ ca

original: tadaśaktasyākṣaraniṣṭhatā,
analyzed: tad aśaktasya akṣara niṣṭha tā

original: tadapekṣitāś cocyante /
analyzed: tad apekṣitāḥ ca ucyante

original: bhagavadupāsanasya prāpyabhūtopāsyaśraiṣṭhyāc śraiṣṭhyaṃ tu,
analyzed: bhagavat upāsanasya prāpya bhūta upāsya śraiṣṭhyāt śraiṣṭhyam tu

original: “yoginām api sarveṣāṃ madgatenāntarātmanā /
analyzed: yoginām api sarveṣām mad gatena antarātmanā

original: śraddhāvān bhajate yo mām sa me yuktatamo mataḥ //
analyzed: śraddhāvān bhajate yaḥ mām sa me yuktatamaḥ mataḥ

original: BhGR_12.” ity atroktam /
analyzed: iti atra uktam

original: evaṃ satatayuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate /
analyzed: evam satata yuktāḥ ye bhaktāḥ tvām paryupāsate

original: ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yogavittamāḥ // BhG_12.1 //
analyzed: ye ca api akṣaram avyaktam teṣām ke yoga vittamāḥ

original: evam “matkarmakṛt” ityādinoktena prakāreṇa,
analyzed: evam mad karma kṛt ityādinā uktena prakāreṇa

original: satatayuktāḥ bhagavantaṃ tvām eva paraṃ prāpyaṃ manvānāḥ ye bhaktāḥ,
analyzed: satata yuktāḥ bhagavantam tvām eva param prāpyam manvānāḥ ye bhaktāḥ

original: tvām sakalavibhūtiyuktam anavadhikātiśayasaundaryasauśīlyasārvajñyasatyasaṃkalpatvādyanantaguṇasāgaraṃ paripūrṇam upāsate,
analyzed: tvām sakala vibhūti yuktam anavadhika atiśaya saundarya sauśīlya sārvajñya satya saṃkalpa tva ādi ananta guṇa sāgaram paripūrṇam upāsate

original: ye cāpy akṣaraṃ pratyagātmasvarūpam tad eva ca avyaktaṃ cakṣurādikaraṇānabhivyaktasvarūpam upāsate;
analyzed: ye ca api akṣaram pratyagātma svarūpam tat eva ca avyaktam cakṣuḥ ādi karaṇa an abhivyakta svarūpam upāsate

original: teṣām ubhayeṣāṃ ke yogavittamāḥ ke svasādhyaṃ prati śīghragāmina ityarthaḥ,
analyzed: teṣām ubhayeṣām ke yoga vittamāḥ ke sva sādhyam prati śīghra gāminaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: “bhavāmi na cirāt pārtha” iti uttaratra yogavittamatvaṃ śaighryaviṣayam iti hi vyañjayiṣyate // BhGR_12.1 //
analyzed: bhavāmi na cirāt pārthaḥ iti uttaratra yoga vittama tvam śaighrya viṣayam iti hi vyañjayiṣyate

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nityayuktā upāsate /
analyzed: mayi āveśya manaḥ ye mām nitya yuktāḥ upāsate

original: śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamāḥ matāḥ // BhG_12.2 //
analyzed: śraddhayā parayā upetāḥ te me yuktatamāḥ matāḥ

original: atyarthamatpriyatvena mano mayy āveśya śraddhayā parayopetāḥ nityayuktāḥ nityayogaṃ
analyzed: atyartha mad priya tvena manaḥ mayi āveśya śraddhayā parayā upetāḥ nitya yuktāḥ nitya yogam

original: kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ ye mām upāsate prāpyaviṣayaṃ mano mayy āveśya ye mām upāsata ityarthaḥ
analyzed: kāṅkṣamāṇāḥ ye mām upāsate prāpya viṣayam manaḥ mayi āveśya ye mām upāsate iti arthaḥ

original: te yuktatamāḥ māṃ sukhenācirāt prāpnuvantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_12.2 //
analyzed: te yuktatamāḥ mām sukhena acirāt prāpnuvanti iti arthaḥ

original: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate /
analyzed: ye tu akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktam paryupāsate

original: sarvatragam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam // BhG_12.3 //
analyzed: sarvatragam acintyam ca kūṭastham acalam dhruvam

original: sanniyamyendriyagrāmaṃ sarvatra samabuddhayaḥ /
analyzed: san niyamya indriya grāmam sarvatra sama buddhayaḥ

original: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ // BhG_12.4 //
analyzed: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarva bhūta hite ratāḥ

original: kleśo 'dhikataras teṣām avyaktāsaktacetasām /
analyzed: kleśaḥ adhikataraḥ teṣām avyakta āsakta cetasām

original: avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate // BhG_12.5 //
analyzed: avyaktā hi gatiḥ duḥkham dehavadbhiḥ avāpyate

original: ye tu akṣaram pratyagātmasvarūpam,
analyzed: ye tu akṣaram pratyagātma svarūpam

original: anirdeśyam dehād anyatayā devādiśabdānirdeśyam tata eva cakṣurādikaraṇānabhivyaktam,
analyzed: anirdeśyam dehāt anya tayā deva ādi śabda anirdeśyam tatas eva cakṣuḥ ādi karaṇa anabhivyaktam

original: sarvatragam acintyaṃ ca sarvatra devādideheṣu vartamānam api tadvisajātīyatayā tena tena rūpeṇa cintayitum anarham,
analyzed: sarvatragam acintyam ca sarvatra deva ādi deheṣu vartamānam api tad visajātīya tayā tena tena rūpeṇa cintayitum anarham

original: tata eva kūṭastham sarvasādhāraṇam tat tad devādyasādhāraṇākārāsaṃbaddham ityarthaḥ apariṇāmitvena svāsādhāraṇākārān na calati na cyavata ity
analyzed: tatas eva kūṭastham sarva sādhāraṇam tat tat deva ādi asādhāraṇa ākāra asaṃbaddham iti arthaḥ apariṇāmi tvena sva asādhāraṇa ākārāt na calati na cyavate iti

original: tata eva dhruvam, nityam /
analyzed: tatas eva dhruvam nityam

original: sanniyāmyendriyagrāmam cakṣurādikam indriyagrāmaṃ sarvaṃ svavyāpārebhyas samyaṅniyamya,
analyzed: san niyāmya indriya grāmam cakṣuḥ ādikam indriya grāmam sarvam sva vyāpārebhyaḥ samyak niyamya

original: sarvatra samabuddhayaḥ sarvatra devādiviṣamākāreṣu deheṣv avasthiteṣv ātmasu jñānaikākāratayā samabuddhayaḥ,
analyzed: sarvatra sama buddhayaḥ sarvatra deva ādi viṣama ākāreṣu deheṣu avasthiteṣu ātmasu jñāna eka ākāra tayā sama buddhayaḥ

original: tata eva sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ sarvabhūtāhitarahitatvān nivṛttāḥ /
analyzed: tatas eva sarva bhūta hite ratāḥ sarva bhūta ahita rahita tvāt nivṛttāḥ

original: sarvabhūtāhitarahitatvaṃ hy ātmano devādiviṣamākārābhimānanimittam /
analyzed: sarva bhūta ahita rahita tvam hi ātmanaḥ deva ādi viṣama ākāra abhimāna nimittam

original: ya evam akṣaram upāsate,
analyzed: ye evam akṣaram upāsate

original: te 'pi māṃ prāpnuvanty eva matsamānākāram asaṃsāriṇam ātmānaṃ prāpnuvanty evetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: te api mām prāpnuvanti eva mad samāna ākāram asaṃsāriṇam ātmānam prāpnuvanti eva iti arthaḥ

original: “mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ” iti hi vakṣyate /
analyzed: mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ iti hi vakṣyate

original: śrūyate ca, “nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyam upaiti” iti /
analyzed: śrūyate ca nirañjanaḥ paramam sāmyam upaiti iti

original: tathā akṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭāt kūṭasthād anyatvaṃ parasya brahmaṇo vakṣyate,
analyzed: tathā akṣara śabda nirdiṣṭāt kūṭasthāt anya tvam parasya brahmaṇaḥ vakṣyate

original: “kūṭastho 'kṣara ucyate /
analyzed: kūṭasthaḥ akṣaraḥ ucyate

original: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ” iti /
analyzed: uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ tu anyaḥ iti

original: “atha parā yayā tad akṣaram adhikgamyate” ity akṣaravidyāyāṃ tu akṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭaṃ param eva brahma,
analyzed: atha parā yayā tat akṣaram adhik gamyate iti akṣaravidyāyām tu akṣara śabda nirdiṣṭam param eva brahma

original: bhūtayonitvādeḥ /
analyzed: bhūta yoni tva ādeḥ

original: teṣām avyaktāsaktacetasāṃ kleśas tv adhikataraḥ /
analyzed: teṣām avyakta āsakta cetasām kleśaḥ tu adhikataraḥ

original: avyaktā hi gatiḥ avyaktaviṣayā manovṛttiḥ dehavadbhiḥ dehātmābhimānayuktaiḥ duḥkhenāvāpyate /
analyzed: avyaktā hi gatiḥ avyakta viṣayā manaḥ vṛttiḥ dehavadbhiḥ deha ātma abhimāna yuktaiḥ duḥkhena avāpyate

original: dehavanto hi deham eva ātmānaṃ manyante // BhGR_12.3,4,5 //
analyzed: dehavantaḥ hi deham eva ātmānam manyante

original: bhagavantam upāsīnānāṃ yuktatamatvaṃ suvyaktam āha
analyzed: bhagavantam upāsīnānām yuktatama tvam su vyaktam āha

original: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparāḥ /
analyzed: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya mad parāḥ

original: ananyenaiva yogena māṃ dhyāyanta upāsate // BhG_12.6 //
analyzed: an anyena eva yogena mām dhyāyantaḥ upāsate

original: teṣām ahaṃ samuddhartā mṛtyusaṃsārasāgarāt /
analyzed: teṣām aham samuddhartā mṛtyu saṃsāra sāgarāt

original: bhavāmi na cirāt pārtha mayy āveśitacetasām // BhG_12.7 //
analyzed: bhavāmi na cirāt pārtha mayi āveśita cetasām

original: ye tu laukikāni dehayātrāśeṣabhūtāni,
analyzed: ye tu laukikāni dehayātrā śeṣa bhūtāni

original: dehadhāraṇārthāni ca aśanādīni karmāṇi,
analyzed: deha dhāraṇa arthāni ca aśana ādīni karmāṇi

original: vaidikāni ca yagadānahomatapaḥprabhṛtīni sarvāṇi sakāraṇāni soddeśyāni adhyātmacetasā mayi saṃnyasya,
analyzed: vaidikāni ca yaga dāna homa tapaḥ prabhṛtīni sarvāṇi sa kāraṇāni sa uddeśyāni adhyātma cetasā mayi saṃnyasya

original: matparāḥ madekaprāpyāḥ,
analyzed: mad parāḥ mad eka prāpyāḥ

original: ananyenaiva yogena ananyaprayojanena yogena māṃ dhyāyanta upāsate dhyānārcanapraṇāmastutikīrtanādīni svayam evātyarthapriyāṇi prāpyasamāni  #
analyzed: ananyena eva yogena ananya prayojanena yogena mām dhyāyantaḥ upāsate dhyāna arcana praṇāma stuti kīrtana ādīni svayam eva atyartha priyāṇi prāpya samāni

original: kurvanto mām upāsata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kurvantaḥ mām upāsate iti arthaḥ

original: teṣāṃ matprāptivirodhitayā mṛtyubhūtāt saṃsārākhyāt sāgarād aham acireṇaiva kālena samuddhartā bhavāmi // BhGR_12.6,7 //
analyzed: teṣām mad prāpti virodhi tayā mṛtyu bhūtāt saṃsāra ākhyāt sāgarāt aham acireṇa eva kālena samuddhartā bhavāmi

original: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya /
analyzed: mayi eva manaḥ ādhatsva mayi buddhim niveśaya

original: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ // BhG_12.8 //
analyzed: nivasiṣyasi mayi eva atas ūrdhvam na saṃśayaḥ

original: ato 'tiśayitapuruṣārthatvāt sulabhatvād aciralabhyatvāc ca mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi manassamādhānaṃ kuru /
analyzed: atas atiśayita puruṣa artha tvāt sulabha tvāt acira labhya tvāt ca mayi eva manaḥ ādhatsva mayi manaḥ samādhānam kuru

original: mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya aham eva paramaprāpya ity adhyavasāyaṃ kuru /
analyzed: mayi buddhim niveśaya aham eva parama prāpyaḥ iti adhyavasāyam kuru

original: ata ūrdhvaṃ mayy eva nivasiṣyasi /
analyzed: atas ūrdhvam mayi eva nivasiṣyasi

original: aham eva paramaprāpya ity adhyavasāyapūrvakamanoniveśanānantaram eva mayi nivasiṣyasītyarthaḥ // BhGR_12.8 //
analyzed: aham eva parama prāpyaḥ iti adhyavasāya pūrvaka manaḥ niveśana anantaram eva mayi nivasiṣyasi iti arthaḥ

original: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram /
analyzed: atha cittam samādhātum na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram

original: abhyāsayogena tato mām icchāptuṃ dhanañjaya // BhG_12.9 //
analyzed: abhyāsa yogena tatas mām iccha āptum dhanañjaya

original: atha sahasaiva mayi sthiraṃ cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi,
analyzed: atha sahasā eva mayi sthiram cittam samādhātum na śaknoṣi

original: tato 'bhyāsayogena mām āptum iccha
analyzed: tatas abhyāsa yogena mām āptum iccha

original: svābhāvikānavadhikātiśayasaundaryasauśīlyasauhārdavātsalyakāruṇyamādhuryagāmbhīryāudāryaśairyavīryaparākramasārvajñyasatyakāmatvasatyasaṃkalpatvasarveśvaratvasakalakāraṇatvādyasaṃkhyeyaguṇasāgare
analyzed: svābhāvika anavadhika atiśaya saundarya sauśīlya sauhārda vātsalya kāruṇya mādhurya gāmbhīrya audārya śairya vīrya parākrama sārvajñya satya kāma tva satya saṃkalpa tva sarva īśvara tva sakala kāraṇa tva ādi asaṃkhyeya guṇa sāgare

original: nikhilaheyapratyanīke mayi niratiśayapremagarbhasmṛtyabhyāsayogena sthiraṃ cittasamādhānaṃ
analyzed: nikhila heya pratyanīke mayi niratiśaya prema garbha smṛti abhyāsa yogena sthiram citta samādhānam

original: labdhvā māṃ prāptum iccha // BhGR_12.9 //
analyzed: labdhvā mām prāptum iccha

original: abhyāse 'py asamartho 'si matkarmaparamo bhava /
analyzed: abhyāse api asamarthaḥ asi mad karma paramaḥ bhava

original: madartham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi // BhG_12.10 //
analyzed: mad artham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi

original: athaivaṃvidhasmṛtyabhyāse 'py asamartho 'si,
analyzed: atha evaṃvidha smṛti abhyāse api asamarthaḥ asi

original: matkarmaparamo bhava /
analyzed: mad karma paramaḥ bhava

original: madīyāni karmāṇy ālayanirmāṇodyonakaraṇapradīpāropaṇamārjanābhyukṣaṇopalepanapuṣpāharaṇapūjāpravartananāmasaṃkīrtanapradakṣiṇastutinamaskārādīni;
analyzed: madīyāni karmāṇi ālaya nirmāṇa udyona karaṇa pradīpa āropaṇa mārjana abhyukṣaṇa upalepana puṣpa āharaṇa pūjā pravartana nāma saṃkīrtana pradakṣiṇa stuti namaskāra ādīni

original: tāni atyarthapriyatvenācara /
analyzed: tāni atyartha priya tvena ācara

original: atyarthapriyatvena madarthaṃ karmāṇi kurvann api acirād abhyāsayogapūrvikāṃ mayi sthirāṃ cittasthitiṃ labdhvā matprāptirūpāṃ siddhim avāpsyasi
analyzed: atyartha priya tvena mad artham karmāṇi kurvan api acirāt abhyāsa yoga pūrvikām mayi sthirām citta sthitim labdhvā mad prāpti rūpām siddhim avāpsyasi

original: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ madyogam āśritaḥ /
analyzed: athā etat api aśaktaḥ asi kartum mad yogam āśritaḥ

original: sarvakarmaphalatyāgaṃ tataḥ kuru yatātmavān // BhG_12.11 //
analyzed: sarva karma phala tyāgam tatas kuru yata ātmavān

original: atha madyogam āśrityaitad api kartuṃ na śaknoṣi madguṇānusandhānakṛtamadekapriyatvākāraṃ bhaktiyogam āśritya bhaktiyogāṅkurarūpam etan matkarmāpi  #
analyzed: atha mad yogam āśritya etat api kartum na śaknoṣi mad guṇa anusandhāna kṛta mad eka priya tva ākāram bhakti yogam āśritya bhakti yoga aṅkura rūpam etat mad karma api

original: kartuṃ na śaknoṣi,
analyzed: kartum na śaknoṣi

original: tato 'kṣarayogam ātmasvabhāvānusandhānarūpaṃ parabhaktijananaṃ pūrvaṣaṭkoditam āśritya tadupāyatayā sarvakarmaphalatyāgaṃ kuru /
analyzed: tatas akṣara yogam ātma svabhāva anusandhāna rūpam para bhakti jananam pūrva ṣaṭka uditam āśritya tad upāya tayā sarva karma phala tyāgam kuru

original: matpriyatvena madekaprāpyatābuddhir hi prakṣīṇāśeṣapāpasyaiva jāyate /
analyzed: mad priya tvena mad eka prāpya tā buddhiḥ hi prakṣīṇa aśeṣa pāpasya eva jāyate

original: yatātmavān yatamanaskaḥ /
analyzed: yata ātmavān yata manaskaḥ

original: tato 'nabhisaṃhitaphalena madārādhanarūpeṇānuṣṭhitena karmaṇā siddhenātmadhyānena
analyzed: tatas an abhisaṃhita phalena mad ārādhana rūpeṇa anuṣṭhitena karmaṇā siddhena ātma dhyānena

original: nivṛttāvidyādisarvatirodhāne maccheṣataikasvarūpe pratyagātmani sākṣātkṛte sati mayi
analyzed: nivṛtta avidyā ādi sarva tirodhāne mad śeṣa tā eka svarūpe pratyagātmani sākṣātkṛte sati mayi

original: parā bhaktiḥ svayam evotpadyate /
analyzed: parā bhaktiḥ svayam eva utpadyate

original: tathā ca vakṣyate,
analyzed: tathā ca vakṣyate

original: “svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ” ity ārabhya,
analyzed: sva karmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhim vindati mānavaḥ iti ārabhya

original: “vimucya nirmamaś śānto brahmabhūyāya kalapate /
analyzed: vimucya nirmamaḥ śāntaḥ brahma bhūyāya kalapate

original: brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati /
analyzed: brahma bhūtaḥ prasanna ātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati

original: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu madbhaktiṃ labhate parām” iti // BhGR_12.11 //
analyzed: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu mad bhaktim labhate parām iti

original: śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate /
analyzed: śreyaḥ hi jñānam abhyāsāt jñānāt dhyānam viśiṣyate

original: dhyānāt karmaphalatyāgaḥ tyāgāc chāntir anantaram // BhG_12.12 //
atyarthaprītivirahitāt karkaśarūpāt smṛtyabhyāsād akṣarayāthātmyānusandhānapūrvakaṃ tadāparokṣyajñānam eva ātmahitatvena viśiṣyate /
analyzed: atyartha prīti virahitāt karkaśa rūpāt smṛti abhyāsāt akṣara yāthātmya anusandhāna pūrvakam tadā āparokṣya jñānam eva ātma hita tvena viśiṣyate

original: ātmāparokṣyajñānād apy aniṣpannarūpāt tadupāyabhūtātmadhyānam evātmahitatve viśiṣyate /
analyzed: ātma aparokṣya jñānāt api aniṣpanna rūpāt tad upāya bhūta ātma dhyānam eva ātma hita tve viśiṣyate

original: taddhyānād apy aniṣpannarūpāt tadupāyabhūtaṃ phalatyāgenānuṣṭhitaṃ karmaiva viśiṣyate /
analyzed: tad dhyānāt api aniṣpanna rūpāt tad upāya bhūtam phala tyāgena anuṣṭhitam karma eva viśiṣyate

original: anabhisaṃhitaphalād anuṣṭhitāt karmaṇo 'nantaram eva nirastapāpatayā manasaś śāntir bhaviṣyati;
analyzed: an abhisaṃhita phalāt anuṣṭhitāt karmaṇaḥ anantaram eva nirasta pāpa tayā manasaḥ śāntiḥ bhaviṣyati

original: śānte manasi ātmadhyānaṃ saṃpatsyate;
analyzed: śānte manasi ātma dhyānam saṃpatsyate

original: dhyānāc ca tadāparokṣyam;
analyzed: dhyānāt ca tad āparokṣyam

original: tadāparokṣyāt parā bhaktiḥ iti bhaktiyogābhyāsāśaktasyātmaniṣṭhaiva śreyasī /
analyzed: tad āparokṣyāt parā bhaktiḥ iti bhakti yoga abhyāsa aśaktasya ātma niṣṭhā eva śreyasī

original: ātmaniṣṭhasyāpi aśāntamanaso niṣṭhāprāptaye antargatātmajñānānabhisaṃhitaphalakarmaniṣṭhaiva śreyasītyarthaḥ // BhGR_12.12 //
analyzed: ātma niṣṭhasya api aśānta manasaḥ niṣṭhā prāptaye antargata ātma jñāna anabhisaṃhita phala karma niṣṭhā eva śreyasī iti arthaḥ

original: anabhisaṃhitaphalakarmaniṣṭhasyopādeyān guṇān āha
analyzed: an abhisaṃhita phala karma niṣṭhasya upādeyān guṇān āha

original: adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca /
analyzed: a dveṣṭā sarva bhūtānām maitraḥ karuṇaḥ eva ca

original: nirmamo nirahaṅkāraḥ samaduḥkhasukhaḥ kṣamī // BhG_12.13 //
analyzed: nirmamaḥ nirahaṅkāraḥ sama duḥkha sukhaḥ kṣamī

original: santuṣṭas satataṃ yogī yatātmā dṛḍhaniścayaḥ /
analyzed: santuṣṭaḥ satatam yogī yata ātmā dṛḍha niścayaḥ

original: mayy arpitamanobuddhir yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ // BhG_12.14 //
analyzed: mayi arpita manaḥ buddhiḥ yaḥ mad bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ

original: adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānām vidviṣatām apakurvatām api sarveṣāṃ bhūtānām adveṣṭā madaparādhānuguṇam īśvarapreritāny etāni bhūtāni dviṣanty apakurvanti  #
analyzed: a dveṣṭā sarva bhūtānām vidviṣatām apakurvatām api sarveṣām bhūtānām a dveṣṭā mad aparādha anuguṇam īśvara preritāni etāni bhūtāni dviṣanti apakurvanti  /

original: cety anusandadhānaḥ;
analyzed: ca iti anusandadhānaḥ

original: teṣu dviṣatsu apkurvatsu ca sarvabhūteṣu maitrīṃ matiṃ kurvan maitraḥ,
analyzed: teṣu dviṣatsu ap kurvatsu ca sarva bhūteṣu maitrīm matim kurvan maitraḥ

original: teṣv eva duḥkhiteṣu karuṇāṃ kurvan karuṇaḥ,
analyzed: teṣu eva duḥkhiteṣu karuṇām kurvan karuṇaḥ

original: nirmamaḥ dehendriyeṣu tatsaṃbandhiṣu ca nirmamaḥ,
analyzed: nirmamaḥ deha indriyeṣu tad saṃbandhiṣu ca nirmamaḥ

original: nirahaṅkāraḥ dehātmābhimānarahitaḥ,
analyzed: nirahaṅkāraḥ deha ātma abhimāna rahitaḥ

original: tata eva samaduḥkhasukhaḥ sukhaduḥkhāgamayoḥ sāṅkalpikayoḥ harṣodvegarahitaḥ,
analyzed: tatas eva sama duḥkha sukhaḥ sukha duḥkha āgamayoḥ sāṅkalpikayoḥ harṣa udvega rahitaḥ

original: kṣamī sparśaprabhavayor avarjanīyayor api tayor vikārarahitaḥ,
analyzed: kṣamī sparśa prabhavayoḥ avarjanīyayoḥ api tayoḥ vikāra rahitaḥ

original: saṃtuṣṭaḥ yadṛcchopanatena yena kenāpi dehadhāraṇadravyeṇa saṃtuṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: saṃtuṣṭaḥ yadṛcchā upanatena yena kena api deha dhāraṇa dravyeṇa saṃtuṣṭaḥ

original: satataṃ yogī satataṃ prakṛtiviyuktātmānusandhānaparaḥ,
analyzed: satatam yogī satatam prakṛti viyukta ātma anusandhāna paraḥ

original: yatātmā niyamitamanovṛttiḥ,
analyzed: yata ātmā niyamita manaḥ vṛttiḥ

original: dṛḍhaniścayaḥ adhyātmaśāstroditeṣv artheṣu dṛḍhaniścayaḥ,
analyzed: dṛḍha niścayaḥ adhyātma śāstra uditeṣu artheṣu dṛḍha niścayaḥ

original: mayy arpitamanobuddhiḥ bhagavān vāsedeva evānabhisaṃhitaphalenānuṣṭhitena karmaṇā ārādhyate,
analyzed: mayi arpita manaḥ buddhiḥ bhagavān vāsedevaḥ eva anabhisaṃhita phalena anuṣṭhitena karmaṇā ārādhyate

original: ārādhitaś ca mama ātmāparokṣyaṃ sādhayiṣyatīti mayy arpitamanobuddhiḥ,
analyzed: ārādhitaḥ ca mama ātmā āparokṣyam sādhayiṣyati iti mayi arpita manaḥ buddhiḥ

original: ya evaṃbhūto madbhaktaḥ evaṃ karmayogena māṃ bhajamāno yaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ mad bhaktaḥ evam karmayogena mām bhajamānaḥ yaḥ

original: sa me priyaḥ // BhGR_12.13 //14//
analyzed: sa me priyaḥ

original: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt na udvijate lokaḥ lokāt na udvijate ca yaḥ

original: harṣāmarṣabhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ // BhG_12.15 //
analyzed: harṣa amarṣa bhaya udvegaiḥ muktaḥ yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ

original: yasmāt karmaniṣṭhāt puruṣān nimittabhūtāl loko nodvijate yo lokodvegakaraṃ karma kiñcid api na karotītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt karma niṣṭhāt puruṣāt nimitta bhūtāt lokaḥ na udvijate yaḥ loka udvega karam karma kiñcid api na karoti iti arthaḥ

original: lokāc ca nimittabhūtād yo nodvijate yam uddiśya sarvaloko nodvegakaraṃ karma karoti;
analyzed: lokāt ca nimitta bhūtāt yaḥ na udvijate yam uddiśya sarva lokaḥ na udvega karam karma karoti

original: sarvāvirodhitvaniścayāt /
analyzed: sarva avirodhi tva niścayāt

original: ata eva kañcana prati harṣeṇa,
analyzed: atas eva kañcana prati harṣeṇa

original: kañcana prati amarṣeṇa,
analyzed: kañcana prati amarṣeṇa

original: kañcana prati bhayena,
analyzed: kañcana prati bhayena

original: kañcana prati udvegena muktah;
analyzed: kañcana prati udvegena muktah

original: evaṃbhūto yaḥ,
analyzed: evaṃbhūtaḥ yaḥ

original: so 'pi mama priyaḥ // BhGR_12.15 //
analyzed: saḥ api mama priyaḥ

original: anapekṣaḥ śucir dakṣa udāsīno gatavyathaḥ /
analyzed: anapekṣaḥ śuciḥ dakṣaḥ udāsīnaḥ gata vyathaḥ

original: sarvārambhaparityāgī yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ // BhG_12.16 //
analyzed: sarva ārambha parityāgī yaḥ mad bhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ

original: anapekṣaḥ ātmavyatirikte kṛtsne vastuny anapekṣaḥ,
analyzed: anapekṣaḥ ātma vyatirikte kṛtsne vastuni anapekṣaḥ

original: śuciḥ śāstravihitadravyavardhitakāyaḥ,
analyzed: śuciḥ śāstra vihita dravya vardhita kāyaḥ

original: dakṣaḥ śāstrīyakriyopādānasamarthaḥ,
anyatrodāsīnaḥ,
analyzed: anyatra udāsīnaḥ

original: ganavyathaḥ śāstrīyakriyānirvṛttau avarjanīyaśītoṣṇapuruṣasparśādiduḥkheṣu vyathārahitaḥ,
analyzed: śāstrīya kriyā nirvṛttau avarjanīya śīta uṣṇa puruṣa sparśa ādi duḥkheṣu vyathā rahitaḥ

original: sarvārambhaparityāgī śāstrīyavyatiriktasarvakarmārambhaparityāgī,
analyzed: sarva ārambha parityāgī śāstrīya vyatirikta sarva karma ārambha parityāgī

original: ya evaṃbhūto madbhaktaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ mad bhaktaḥ

original: sa me priyaḥ // BhGR_12.16 //
analyzed: sa me priyaḥ

original: yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati /
analyzed: yaḥ na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati

original: śubhāśubhaparityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ // BhG_12.17 //
analyzed: śubha aśubha parityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ

original: yo na hṛṣyati yan manuṣyāṇāṃ harṣanimittaṃ priyajātam,
analyzed: yaḥ na hṛṣyati yat manuṣyāṇām harṣa nimittam priya jātam

original: tat prāpya yaḥ karmayogī na hṛṣyati;
analyzed: tat prāpya yaḥ karma yogī na hṛṣyati

original: yac cāpriyam,
analyzed: yat ca apriyam

original: tat prāpya na dveṣṭi;
analyzed: tat prāpya na dveṣṭi

original: yac ca manuṣyāṇāṃ śokanimittaṃ bhāryāputravittakṣayādikam,
analyzed: yat ca manuṣyāṇām śoka nimittam bhāryā putra vitta kṣaya ādikam

original: tat prāpya na śocati;
analyzed: tat prāpya na śocati

original: tathāvidham aprāptaṃ ca na kāṅkṣati;
analyzed: tathāvidham a prāptam ca na kāṅkṣati

original: śubhāśubhaparityāgī pāpavat puṇyasyāpi bandhahetutvāviśeṣād ubhayaparityāgī /
analyzed: śubha aśubha parityāgī pāpa vat puṇyasya api bandha hetu tva aviśeṣāt ubhaya parityāgī

original: ya evaṃbhūto bhaktimān,
analyzed: yaḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ bhaktimān

original: sa me priyaḥ // BhGR_12.17 //
analyzed: sa me priyaḥ

original: śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkheṣu samaḥ saṅgavivarjitaḥ // BhG_12.18 //
analyzed: śīta uṣṇa sukha duḥkheṣu samaḥ saṅga vivarjitaḥ

original: tulyanindāstutir maunī saṃtuṣṭo yena kenacit /
analyzed: tulya nindā stutiḥ maunī saṃtuṣṭaḥ yena kenacid

original: aniketaḥ sthiramatir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ // BhG_12.19 //
analyzed: aniketaḥ sthira matiḥ bhaktimān me priyaḥ naraḥ

original: “adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānām” ityādinā śatrumitrādiṣu dveṣādirahitatvam uktam;
analyzed: a dveṣṭā sarva bhūtānām ityādinā śatru mitra ādiṣu dveṣa ādi rahita tvam uktam

original: atra teṣu sannihiteṣv api samacittatvaṃ tato 'py atirikto viśeṣa ucyate /
analyzed: atra teṣu sannihiteṣu api sama citta tvam tatas api atiriktaḥ viśeṣaḥ ucyate

original: ātmani sthiramatitvena niketanādiṣv asakta ity aniketaḥ;
analyzed: ātmani sthira mati tvena niketana ādiṣu asaktaḥ iti aniketaḥ

original: tata eva mānāvamānādiṣv api samaḥ;
analyzed: tatas eva māna avamāna ādiṣu api samaḥ

original: ya evaṃbhūto bhaktimān,
analyzed: yaḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ bhaktimān

original: sa me priyaḥ // BhGR_12.18 //19//
analyzed: sa me priyaḥ

original: asmād ātmaniṣṭhād bhaktiyoganiṣṭhasya śraiṣṭhyaṃ pratipādayan yathopakramam upasaṃharati
analyzed: asmāt ātma niṣṭhāt bhakti yoga niṣṭhasya śraiṣṭhyam pratipādayan yathopakramam upasaṃharati

original: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate /

original: śraddadhānā matparamā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ // BhG_12.20 //
analyzed: śraddadhānāḥ mad paramāḥ bhaktāḥ te atīva me priyāḥ

original: dharmyaṃ cāmṛtaṃ ceti dharmyāmṛtam,
analyzed: dharmyam ca amṛtam ca iti dharmya amṛtam

analyzed: ye tu prāpya samam prāpakam bhakti yogam

analyzed: yathā uktam mayi āveśya manaḥ ye mām ityādinā uktena prakāreṇa upāsate

original: te bhaktāḥ atitarāṃ mama priyāḥ // BhGR_12.20 //
analyzed: te bhaktāḥ atitarām mama priyāḥ

original: pūrvasmin ṣaṭke paramaprāpyasya parasya brahmaṇo bhagavato vāsudevasya prāptyupāyabhūtabhaktirūpabhagavadupāsanāṅgabhūtaṃ
analyzed: pūrvasmin ṣaṭke parama prāpyasya parasya brahmaṇaḥ bhagavataḥ vāsudevasya prāpti upāya bhūta bhakti rūpa bhagavat upāsana aṅga bhūtam

original: prāptuḥ pratyagātmano yāthātmyadarśanaṃ jñānayogakarmayogalakṣaṇaniṣṭhādvayasādhyam uktam /

original: madhyame ca paramaprāpyabhūtabhagavadtattvayāthātmyatanmāhātmyajñānapūrvakāikāntikātyantikabhaktiyoganiṣṭhā pratipāditā /
analyzed: madhyame ca parama prāpya bhūta bhagavat tattva yāthātmya tad māhātmya jñāna pūrvaka āikāntika ātyantika bhakti yoga niṣṭhā pratipāditā

original: atiśayitāiśvaryāpekṣāṇām ātmakaivalyamātrāpekṣāṇāṃ ca bhaktiyogas tattadapekṣitasādhanam iti coktam /
analyzed: atiśayita aiśvarya apekṣāṇām ātma kaivalya mātra apekṣāṇām ca bhakti yogaḥ tad tad apekṣita sādhanam iti ca uktam

original: idānīm uparitane ṣaṭke prakṛtipuruṣatatsaṃsargarūpaprapañceśvaratadyāthātmyakarmajñānabhaktisvarūpatadupādānaprakārāś ca ṣaṭkadvayoditā viśodhyante
analyzed: idānīm uparitane ṣaṭke prakṛti puruṣa tad saṃsarga rūpa prapañca īśvara tad yāthātmya karma jñāna bhakti svarūpa tad upādāna prakārāḥ ca ṣaṭka dvaya uditāḥ viśodhyante

original: tatra tāvat trayodaśe dehātmanoḥ svarūpam,
analyzed: tatra tāvat trayodaśe deha ātmanoḥ svarūpam

original: dehayāthātmyaśodhanam,
dehaviyuktātmaprāptyupāyaḥ,
viviktātmasvarūpasaṃśodhanam,
tathāvidhasyātmanaś cācitsaṃbandhahetuḥ,
analyzed: tathāvidhasya ātmanaḥ ca acit saṃbandha hetuḥ

original: tato vivekānusandhānaprakāraś cocyate/
analyzed: tatas viveka anusandhāna prakāraḥ ca ucyate

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate /
analyzed: idam śarīram kaunteya kṣetram iti abhidhīyate

original: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ // BhG_13.1 //
analyzed: etat yaḥ vetti tam prāhuḥ kṣetrajñaḥ iti tad vidaḥ

original: idaṃ śarīram devo 'ham,
analyzed: idam śarīram devaḥ aham

original: manuṣyo 'ham,
analyzed: manuṣyaḥ aham

original: sthūlo 'ham,
analyzed: sthūlaḥ aham

original: kṛśo 'ham iti ātmano bhoktrā saha sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyamānaṃ bhoktur ātmano 'rthāntarabhūtasya bhogakṣetram iti śarīrayāthātmyavidbhir  #
analyzed: kṛśaḥ aham iti ātmanaḥ bhoktrā saha sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratīyamānam bhoktuḥ ātmanaḥ artha antara bhūtasya bhogakṣetram iti śarīra yāthātmya vidbhiḥ

original: abhidhīyate /
analyzed: abhidhīyate

original: etad avayavaśaḥ saṃghātarūpeṇa ca,
analyzed: etat avayavaśas saṃghāta rūpeṇa ca

original: idam ahaṃ vedmīti yo vetti,
analyzed: idam aham vedmi iti yaḥ vetti

original: taṃ vedyabhūtād asmād veditṛtvenārthāntarabhūtam,
analyzed: tam vedya bhūtāt asmāt veditṛ tvena artha antara bhūtam

original: kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ ātmayāthātmyavidaḥ prāhuḥ /
analyzed: kṣetrajñaḥ iti tad vidaḥ ātma yāthātmya vidaḥ prāhuḥ

original: yady api dehavyatiriktaghaṭādyarthānusandhānavelāyāṃ “devo 'ham,
analyzed: yadi api deha vyatirikta ghaṭa ādi artha anusandhāna velāyām devaḥ aham

original: manuṣyo 'haṃ ghaṭādikaṃ jānāmi” iti dehasāmānādhikaraṇyena jñātāram ātmānam anusandhatte,
analyzed: manuṣyaḥ aham ghaṭa ādikam jānāmi iti deha sāmānādhikaraṇyena jñātāram ātmānam anusandhatte

original: tathāpi dehānubhavavelāyāṃ deham api ghaṭādikam iva “idam ahaṃ vedmi” iti vedyatayā veditānubhavatīti veditur ātmano vedyatayā śarīram api  #
analyzed: tathā api deha anubhava velāyām deham api ghaṭa ādikam iva idam aham vedmi iti vedya tayā veditā anubhavati iti vedituḥ ātmanaḥ vedya tayā śarīram api

original: ghaṭādivad arthāntarabhūtam /
analyzed: ghaṭa ādi vat artha antara bhūtam

original: tathā ghaṭāder iva vedyabhūtāc charīrād api veditā kṣetrajño 'rthāntarabhūtaḥ /
analyzed: tathā ghaṭa ādeḥ iva vedya bhūtāt śarīrāt api veditā kṣetrajñaḥ artha antara bhūtaḥ

original: sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratītis tu vastutaś śarīrasya gotvādivad atmaviśeṣaṇataikasvabhāvatayā tadapṛthaksiddher upapannā /
analyzed: sāmānādhikaraṇyena pratītiḥ tu vastutas śarīrasya go tva ādi vat atma viśeṣaṇa tā eka svabhāva tayā tad apṛthak siddheḥ upapannā

original: tatra veditur asādhāraṇākārasya cakṣurādikaraṇāviṣayatvād yogasaṃskṛtamanoviṣayatvāc ca prakṛtisannidhānād eva mūḍhāḥ prakṛtyākāram eva veditāraṃ
analyzed: tatra vedituḥ asādhāraṇa ākārasya cakṣuḥ ādi karaṇa aviṣaya tvāt yoga saṃskṛta manaḥ viṣaya tvāt ca prakṛti sannidhānāt eva mūḍhāḥ prakṛti ākāram eva veditāram

original: tathā ca vakṣyati,
analyzed: tathā ca vakṣyati

original: “utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam /
analyzed: utkrāmantam sthitam vā api bhuñjānam vā guṇa anvitam

original: vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti paśyanti jñānacakṣuṣaḥ” iti // BhGR_13.1 //
analyzed: vimūḍhāḥ na anupaśyanti paśyanti jñāna cakṣuṣaḥ iti

original: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata /
analyzed: kṣetrajñam ca api mām viddhi sarva kṣetreṣu bhārata

original: kṣetrakṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama // BhG_13.2 //
analyzed: kṣetra kṣetrajñayoḥ jñānam yat tat jñānam matam mama

original: devamanuṣyādisarvakṣetreṣu veditṛtvākāraṃ kṣetrajñaṃ ca māṃ viddhi madātmakaṃ viddhi;
analyzed: deva manuṣya ādi sarva kṣetreṣu veditṛ tva ākāram kṣetrajñam ca mām viddhi mad ātmakam viddhi

original: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpīti apiśabdāt kṣetram api māṃ viddhīty uktam iti gamyate /
analyzed: kṣetrajñam ca api iti apiśabdāt kṣetram api mām viddhi iti uktam iti gamyate

original: yathā kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaviśeṣaṇataikasvabhāvatayā tadapṛthaksiddheḥ tatsāmānādhikaraṇyenaiva nirdeśyam,
analyzed: yathā kṣetram kṣetrajña viśeṣaṇa tā eka svabhāva tayā tad apṛthak siddheḥ tat sāmānādhikaraṇyena eva nirdeśyam

original: tathā kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñaṃ ca madviśeṣaṇataikasvabhāvatayā madapṛthaksiddheḥ matsāmānādhikaraṇyenaiva nirdeśyau viddhi /
analyzed: tathā kṣetram kṣetrajñam ca mad viśeṣaṇa tā eka svabhāva tayā mad apṛthak siddheḥ mad sāmānādhikaraṇyena eva nirdeśyau viddhi

original: pṛthivyādisaṃghātarūpasya kṣetrasya kṣetrajñasya ca bhagavaccharīrataikasvarūpatayā bhagavadātmakatvaṃ śrutayo vadanti,
analyzed: pṛthivī ādi saṃghāta rūpasya kṣetrasya kṣetrajñasya ca bhagavat śarīra tā eka svarūpa tayā bhagavat ātmaka tvam śrutayaḥ vadanti

original: “yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīm antaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ” ity
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivyām tiṣṭhan pṛthivyāḥ antaraḥ yam pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīram yaḥ pṛthivīm antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ iti

original: “ya ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmano 'ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ” ity ādyāḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmanaḥ antaraḥ yam ātmā na veda yasya ātmā śarīram yaḥ ātmānam antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ iti ādyāḥ

original: idam evāntaryāmitayā sarvakṣetrajñānām ātmatvenāvasthānaṃ bhagavataḥ tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena vyapadeśahetuḥ /
analyzed: idam eva antaryāmi tayā sarva kṣetrajñānām ātma tvena avasthānam bhagavataḥ tad sāmānādhikaraṇyena vyapadeśa hetuḥ

original: “aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarvabhūtāśayasthitaḥ“,
analyzed: aham ātmā guḍākeśa sarva bhūta āśaya sthitaḥ

original: “na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram” ,
analyzed: na tat asti vinā yat syāt mayā bhūtam carācaram

original: “viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat” iti purastād upariṣṭāc cābhidhāya,
analyzed: viṣṭabhya aham idam kṛtsnam eka aṃśena sthitaḥ jagat iti purastāt upariṣṭāt ca abhidhāya

original: madhye sāmānādhikaraṇyena vyapadiśati,
analyzed: madhye sāmānādhikaraṇyena vyapadiśati

original: “ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇuḥ” ityādinā /
analyzed: ādityānām aham viṣṇuḥ ityādinā

original: yad idaṃ kṣetrakṣetrajñayoḥ vivekaviṣayaṃ tayor madātmakatvaviṣayaṃ ca jñānam uktam,
analyzed: yat idam kṣetra kṣetrajñayoḥ viveka viṣayam tayoḥ mad ātmaka tva viṣayam ca jñānam uktam

original: tad evopādeyaṃ jñānam iti mama matam /
analyzed: tat eva upādeyam jñānam iti mama matam

original: kecid āhuḥ “kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi” iti sāmānādhikaraṇyenaikatvam avagamyate /
analyzed: kecid āhuḥ kṣetrajñam ca api mām viddhi iti sāmānādhikaraṇyena ekatvam avagamyate

original: tataś ceśvarasyaiva sato 'jñānāt kṣetrajñatvam iva bhavatīty abhyupagantavyam /
analyzed: tatas ca īśvarasya eva sataḥ ajñānāt kṣetrajña tvam iva bhavati iti abhyupagantavyam

original: tannivṛttyarthaś cāyam ekatvopadeśaḥ /
analyzed: tad nivṛtti arthaḥ ca ayam eka tva upadeśaḥ

original: anena ca āptatamabhagavadupadeśena,
analyzed: anena ca āptatama bhagavat upadeśena

original: te praṣṭavyāḥ ayam upadeṣṭā bhagavān vāsudevaḥ parameśvaraḥ kim ātmayāthātmyasākṣātkāreṇa nivṛttājñānaḥ uta neti /
analyzed: te praṣṭavyāḥ ayam upadeṣṭā bhagavān vāsudevaḥ parameśvaraḥ kim ātma yāthātmya sākṣātkāreṇa nivṛtta ajñānaḥ uta na iti

analyzed: pradhānam ātmanaḥ bhogya tvena harati iti haraḥ sa kāraṇam karaṇa adhipa adhipaḥ na ca asya janitā na ca adhipaḥ

“patiṃ viśvasyātmeśvaraṃ śāśvataṃ śivam acyutam“,

analyzed: tatas mad saṅkalpa kṛtāt cit acit saṃsargāt

original: evaṃ bhoktṛbhogyarūpeṇāvasthitayoḥ sarvāvasthāvasthitayoś cidacitoḥ paramapuruṣaśarīratayā tanniyāmyatvena tadapṛthaksthitiṃ paramapuruṣasya  #

original: cātmatvam āhuḥ kāścana śrutayaḥ,
analyzed: ca ātma tvam āhuḥ kāścana śrutayaḥ

original: “yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan pṛthivyā antaro yaṃ pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaḥ pṛthivīm antaro yamayati” ity ārabhya,
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivyām tiṣṭhan pṛthivyāḥ antaraḥ yam pṛthivī na veda yasya pṛthivī śarīram yaḥ pṛthivīm antaraḥ yamayati iti ārabhya

original: “ya ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmano 'ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmyamṛtāḥ” iti; tathā,
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmanaḥ antaraḥ yam ātmā na veda yasya ātmā śarīram yaḥ ātmānam antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtāḥ iti tathā

original: “yaḥ pṛthivīm antare sañcaran yasya pṛthivī śarīraṃ yaṃ pṛthivī na veda” ity ārabhya,
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivīm antare sañcaran yasya pṛthivī śarīram yam pṛthivī na veda iti ārabhya

original: yo 'kṣaram antare sañcaran yasyākṣaraṃ śarīraṃ yam akṣaraṃ na veda“,
analyzed: yaḥ akṣaram antare sañcaran yasya akṣaram śarīram yam akṣaram na veda

original: “yo mṛtyum antare sañcaran yasya mṛtyuś śarīraṃ yaṃ mṛtyur na veda eṣa sarvabhūtāntarātmāpahatapāpmā divyo deva eko nārāyaṇa“,
analyzed: yaḥ mṛtyum antare sañcaran yasya mṛtyuḥ śarīram yam mṛtyuḥ na veda eṣa sarva bhūta antarātmā apahata pāpmā divyaḥ devaḥ ekaḥ nārāyaṇa

original: atra mṛtyuśabdena tamaśśabdavācyaṃ sūkṣmāvastham acidvastv abhidhīyate,

original: asyām evopaniṣadi,
analyzed: asyām eva upaniṣadi

original: “avyaktam akṣare līyate akṣaraṃ tamasi līyate” iti vacanāt “antaḥpraviṣṭaś śāstā janānāṃ sarvātmā” iti ca /

original: evaṃ sarvāvasthāvasthitacidacidvastuśarīratayā tatprakāraḥ paramapuruṣa eva kāryāvasthakāraṇāvasthajagadrūpeṇāvasthita
analyzed: evam sarva avasthā avasthita cit acit vastu śarīra tayā tad prakāraḥ paramapuruṣaḥ eva kārya avastha kāraṇa avastha jagat rūpeṇa avasthita

original: itīmam arthaṃ jñāpayituṃ kāścana śrutayaḥ kāryāvathaṃ kāraṇāvathaṃ ca jagat sa evety āhuḥ,

analyzed: sat eva somya idam agre āsīt ekam eva advitīyam

original: “tad aikṣata bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti /

original: tathā, “so 'kāmayata,

original: bahu syāṃ prajāyeyeti /

original: sa tapo 'tapyata,
analyzed: sa tapaḥ atapyata

analyzed: sa tapaḥ taptvā

analyzed: idam sarvam asṛjata iti ārabhya

original: kāraṇāt kāryasyānanyatvena kāraṇavijñānena kāryasya jñātatayaikavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ ca samīhitam upapannataram /
analyzed: kāraṇāt kāryasya ananya tvena kāraṇa vijñānena kāryasya jñāta tayā eka vijñānena sarva vijñānam ca samīhitam upapannataram

original: “hantāham imās tisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi” iti,
analyzed: hanta aham imāḥ tisraḥ devatāḥ anena jīvena ātmanā anupraviśya nāma rūpe vyākaravāṇi iti

original: sarve vācakāḥ śabdāḥ acijjīvaviśiṣṭaparamātmana eva vācakā iti kāraṇāvasthaparamātmavācinā
analyzed: sarve vācakāḥ śabdāḥ acit jīva viśiṣṭa paramātmanaḥ eva vācakāḥ iti kāraṇa avastha paramātma vācinā

original: śabdena kāryavācinaḥ śabdasya sāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ mukhyavṛttam /
analyzed: śabdena kārya vācinaḥ śabdasya sāmānādhikaraṇyam mukhya vṛttam

analyzed: atas sthūla sūkṣma cit acit prakāram brahma eva kāryam kāraṇam ca iti brahma upādānam jagat

original: sūkṣmacidacidvastuśarīraṃ brahmaiva kāraṇam iti jagato brahmopādānatve 'pi saṃghātasyopādānatvena cidacitor brahmaṇaś ca svabhāvāsaṅkaro 'py  #
analyzed: sūkṣma cit acit vastu śarīram brahma eva kāraṇam iti jagataḥ brahma upādāna tve api saṃghātasya upādāna tvena cit acitoḥ brahmaṇaḥ ca svabhāva asaṅkaraḥ api

original: upapannataraḥ /
analyzed: upapannataraḥ

original: yathā śuklakṛṣṇaraktatantusaṃghātopādānatve 'pi citrapaṭasya tattattantupradeśa eva
analyzed: yathā śukla kṛṣṇa rakta tantu saṃghāta upādāna tve api citra paṭasya tad tad tantu pradeśe eva

original: śauklyādisaṃbandha iti kāryāvasthāyām api na sarvatra varṇasaṅkaraḥ tathā cidacidīśvarasaṃghātopādānatve
analyzed: śauklya ādi saṃbandhaḥ iti kārya avasthāyām api na sarvatra varṇa saṅkaraḥ tathā cit acit īśvara saṃghāta upādāna tve

original: 'pi jagataḥ kāryāvasthāyām api bhoktṛtvabhogyatvaniyantṛtvādyasaṅkaraḥ /
analyzed: api jagataḥ kārya avasthāyām api bhoktṛ tva bhogya tva niyantṛ tva ādi asaṅkaraḥ

original: tantūnāṃ pṛthaksthitiyogyānām eva puruṣecchayā kadācit saṃhatānāṃ kāraṇatvaṃ kāryatvaṃ ca;
analyzed: tantūnām pṛthak sthiti yogyānām eva puruṣa icchayā kadācid saṃhatānām kāraṇa tvam kārya tvam ca

original: iha tu cidacitos sarvāvasthayoḥ paramapuruṣaśarīratvena tatprakāratayaiva padārthatvāt tatprakāraḥ paramapuruṣa eva karāṇa kāryaṃ ca;
analyzed: iha tu cit acitoḥ sarva avasthayoḥ paramapuruṣa śarīra tvena tad prakāra tayā eva padārtha tvāt tad prakāraḥ paramapuruṣaḥ eva kāryam ca

original: sa eva sarvadā sarvaśabdavācya iti viśeṣaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva sarvadā sarva śabda vācyaḥ iti viśeṣaḥ

original: svabhāvabhedas tadasaṅkaraś ca tatra cātra ca tulyaḥ /
analyzed: svabhāva bhedaḥ tad asaṅkaraḥ ca tatra ca atra ca tulyaḥ

original: evaṃ ca sati parasya brahmaṇaḥ kāryānupraveśe 'pi svarūpānyathābhāvābhāvād avikṛtatvam upapannataram /

original: sthūlāvasthasya nāmarūpavibhāgavibhaktasya cidacidvastunaḥ ātmatayāvasthānāt kāryatvam apy upapannam /
analyzed: sthūla avasthasya nāma rūpa vibhāga vibhaktasya cit acit vastunaḥ ātma tayā avasthānāt kārya tvam api upapannam

original: avasthāntarāpattir eva hi kāryatā /
analyzed: avasthā antara āpattiḥ eva hi kārya tā

original: nirguṇavādāś ca parasya brahmaṇo heyaguṇasaṃbandhābhāvād upapadyante /
analyzed: nirguṇa vādāḥ ca parasya brahmaṇaḥ heya guṇa saṃbandha abhāvāt upapadyante

original: “apahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyur
analyzed: apahata pāpmā vijaraḥ vimṛtyuḥ

original: viśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ” iti heyaguṇān pratiṣidhya,
analyzed: viśokaḥ vijighatsaḥ apipāsaḥ iti heya guṇān pratiṣidhya

original: “satyakāmas satyasaṅkalpaḥ” iti kalyāṇaguṇagaṇān vidadhatīyaṃ śrutir eva anyatra sāmānyenāvagataṃ guṇaniṣedhaṃ heyaguṇaviṣayaṃ vyavasthāpayati
analyzed: satya kāmaḥ satya saṅkalpaḥ iti kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇān vidadhati iyam śrutiḥ eva anyatra sāmānyena avagatam guṇa niṣedham heya guṇa viṣayam vyavasthāpayati

original: jñānasvarūpa brahma iti vādaś ca sarvajñasya sarvaśakter nikhilaheyapratyanīkakaylāṇaguṇākarasya
analyzed: brahma iti vādaḥ ca sarvajñasya sarva śakteḥ nikhila heya pratyanīka kaylāṇa guṇa ākarasya

analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ svarūpam jñāna eka nirūpaṇīyam sva prakāśa tayā jñāna svarūpam ca iti abhyupagamāt upapannataraḥ

original: “yas sarvajñaḥ sarvavit“,
analyzed: yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarva vid

analyzed: tat nāma rūpābhyām eva vyākriyate iti brahmā eva sva saṅkalpāt vicitra sthira trasa rūpa tayā

analyzed: nānā prakāram avasthitam iti tad pratyanīka abrahma ātmaka vastu nānātvam atattvam iti pratiṣidhyate

analyzed: mṛtyuḥ sa mṛtyum āpnoti yaḥ iha nānā iva paśyati na iha nānā asti kiñcana

original: “yatra hi dvaitam iva bhavati tad itara itaraṃ paśyati /
analyzed: yatra hi dvaitam iva bhavati tat itaraḥ itaram paśyati

original: na punaḥ, “bahu syāṃ prajāyeya” ityādiśrutisiddhaṃ svasaṅkalpakṛtaṃ brahmaṇo nānānāmarūpabhāktvena nānāprakāratvam api niṣidhyate /
analyzed: na punar bahu syām prajāyeya ityādi śruti siddham sva saṅkalpa kṛtam brahmaṇaḥ nānā nāma rūpa bhāktvena nānā prakāra tvam api niṣidhyate

original: “yatra tv asya sarvam ātmaivābhūt” iti niṣedhavākyārambhe ca tat sthāpitam,
analyzed: yatra tu asya sarvam ātmā eva abhūt iti niṣedha vākya ārambhe ca tat sthāpitam

original: evaṃ cidacidīśvarāṇāṃ svarūpabhedaṃ svabhāvabhedaṃ ca vadantīnāṃ kāryakāraṇabhāvaṃ kāryakāraṇayor ananyatvaṃ vadantīnāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ śrutīnām
analyzed: evam cit acit īśvarāṇām svarūpa bhedam svabhāva bhedam ca vadantīnām kārya kāraṇa bhāvam kārya kāraṇayoḥ ananya tvam vadantīnām ca sarvāsām śrutīnām

analyzed: cit acitoḥ paramātmanaḥ ca sarvadā śarīra ātma bhāvam śarīra bhūtayoḥ kāraṇa daśāyām nāma rūpa vibhāga anarha sūkṣma daśā āpattim

analyzed: kārya daśāyām ca tad arha sthūla daśā āpattim vadantībhiḥ śrutibhiḥ eva jñāyate iti brahma ajñāna vādasya aupādhika brahma bheda vādasya

original: anyasyāpi apanyāyamūlasya sakalaśrutiviruddhasya na kathaṃcid apy avakāśo dṛśyata
analyzed: anyasya api apanyāya mūlasya sakala śruti viruddhasya na kathaṃcid api avakāśaḥ dṛśyata

analyzed: tat idam kṣetra kṣetrajña yāthātmyam ṛṣibhiḥ parāśara ādibhiḥ bahudhā bahu prakāram gītam aham tvam ca tathā anye ca bhūtaiḥ uhyāma pārthiva

analyzed: avidyā sañcitam karma tat ca aśeṣeṣu jantuṣu

original: tato 'ham iti kutraitāṃ saṃjñāṃ rājan karomy aham”; tathā ca,

original: BhGR_13.” iti /

analyzed: chandobhiḥ vividhaiḥ pṛthak pṛthagvidhaiḥ chandobhiḥ ca ṛk yajuḥ sāma atharvabhiḥ deha ātmanoḥ svarūpam pṛthak gītam tasmāt vai etasmāt ātmanaḥ ākāśaḥ

analyzed: sa vai eṣa puruṣaḥ anna rasa mayaḥ iti śarīra svarūpam abhidhāya tasmāt antaram prāṇa mayam tasmāt ca antaram manaḥ mayam abhidhāya

original: brahmasūtrapadaiś caiva brahmapratipādanasūtrākhyaiḥ padaiḥ śārīrakasūtraiḥ,
analyzed: brahmasūtra padaiḥ ca eva brahma pratipādana sūtra ākhyaiḥ padaiḥ śārīraka sūtraiḥ

analyzed: evam bahudhā gītam kṣetra kṣetrajña yāthātmyam mayā saṃkṣepeṇa su spaṣṭam ucyamānam śṛṇu iti arthaḥ

analyzed: mahābhūtāni ahaṃkāraḥ buddhiḥ avyaktam eva ca iti kṣetra ārambhaka dravyāṇi

original: ahaṃkāro bhūtādiḥ,

analyzed: buddhiḥ mahān

original: avyaktaṃ prakṛtiḥ;

original: indriyāṇi daśaikaṃ ca pañca cendriyagocarā iti kṣetrāśritāni tattvāni;
analyzed: indriyāṇi daśa ekam ca pañca ca indriya gocarāḥ iti kṣetra āśritāni tattvāni

original: vākpāṇipādapāyūpasthāni pañca karmendriyāṇīti tāni daśa,

original: ekam iti manaḥ;

original: yady apīcchādveṣasukhaduḥkhāny ātmadharmabhūtāni,

analyzed: teṣām puruṣa dharma tvam

analyzed: ādhṛtiḥ ādhāraḥ sukha duḥkhe bhuñjānasya bhoga apavargau sādhayataḥ ca cetanasya ādhāra tayā utpannaḥ bhūta saṃghātaḥ

original: prakṛtyādipṛthivyantadravyārabdham indriyāśrayabhūtam icchādveṣasukhaduḥkhavikāri bhūtasaṃghātarūpaṃ cetanasukhaduḥkhopabhogādhāratvaprayojanaṃ  #

original: kṣetram ity uktaṃ bhavati;
analyzed: kṣetram iti uktam bhavati

analyzed: atha kṣetra kāryeṣu ātma jñāna sādhanatayā upādeyāḥ guṇāḥ procyante

analyzed: amāni tvam utkṛṣṭa janeṣu avadhīraṇā rahita tvam

analyzed: ārjavam parān prati vāc manaḥ kāya prabhṛtīnām eka rūpa tā

analyzed: ācārya upāsanam ātma jñāna pradāyini ācārye praṇipāta paripraśna sevā ādi nirata tvam

original: śaucaṃ ātmajñānatatsādhanayogyatā manovākkāyagatā śāstrasiddhā;
analyzed: śaucam ātma jñāna tad sādhana yogya tā manaḥ vāc kāya gatā śāstra siddhā

original: stairyam adhyātmaśāstrodite 'rthe niścalatvam;
analyzed: stairyam adhyātma śāstra udite arthe niścala tvam

original: ātmavinigrahaḥ ātmasvarūpavyatiriktaviṣayebhyo manaso nivartanam // BhGR_13.7 //
analyzed: ātma vinigrahaḥ ātma svarūpa vyatirikta viṣayebhyaḥ manasaḥ nivartanam

original: indriyārtheṣu vairāgyam anahaṅkāra eva ca /
analyzed: indriya artheṣu vairāgyam anahaṅkāraḥ eva ca

original: janmamṛtyujarāvyādhiduḥkhadoṣānudarśanam // BhG_13.8 //
analyzed: janma mṛtyu jarā vyādhi duḥkha doṣa anudarśanam

original: indriyārtheṣu vairāgyam ātmavyatirikteṣu viṣayeṣu sadoṣatānusaṃdhānenodvejanam;
analyzed: indriyārtheṣu vairāgyam ātma vyatirikteṣu viṣayeṣu sa doṣa tā anusaṃdhānena udvejanam

original: anahaṃkāraḥ anātmani dehe ātmābhimānarahitatvam;
analyzed: anahaṃkāraḥ anātmani dehe ātma abhimāna rahita tvam

original: pradarśanārtham idam;
analyzed: pradarśana artham idam

original: anātmīyeṣv ātmīyābhimānarahitatvaṃ ca vivakṣitam /
analyzed: anātmīyeṣu ātmīya abhimāna rahita tvam ca vivakṣitam

original: janmamṛtyujarāvyādhiduḥkhadoṣānudarśanam saśarīratve janmamṛtyujarāvyādhiduḥkharūpasya doṣasyāvarjanīyatvānusaṃdhānam // BhGR_13.8 //
analyzed: janma mṛtyu jarā vyādhi duḥkha doṣa anudarśanam sa śarīra tve janma mṛtyu jarā vyādhi duḥkha rūpasya doṣasya avarjanīya tva anusaṃdhānam

original: asaktir anabhiṣvaṅgaḥ putradāragṛhādiṣu /
analyzed: asaktiḥ anabhiṣvaṅgaḥ putra dāra gṛha ādiṣu

original: nityaṃ ca samacittatvam iṣṭāniṣṭopapattiṣu // BhG_13.9 //
analyzed: nityam ca sama citta tvam iṣṭa aniṣṭa upapattiṣu

original: asaktiḥ ātmavyatiriktaparigraheṣu saṅgarahitatvam;
analyzed: asaktiḥ ātma vyatirikta parigraheṣu saṅga rahita tvam

original: anabhiṣvaṅgaḥ putradāragṛhādiṣu teṣu śāstrīyakarmopakaraṇatvātirekeṇa śleṣarahitatvam;
analyzed: anabhiṣvaṅgaḥ putra dāra gṛha ādiṣu teṣu śāstrīya karma upakaraṇa tva atirekeṇa śleṣa rahita tvam

original: saṃkalpaprabhaveṣv iṣṭāniṣṭopanipāteṣu harṣodvegarahitatvam // BhGR_13.9 //
analyzed: saṃkalpa prabhaveṣu iṣṭa aniṣṭa upanipāteṣu harṣa udvega rahita tvam

original: mayi cānanyayogena bhaktir avyabhicāriṇī /
analyzed: mayi ca an anya yogena bhaktiḥ avyabhicāriṇī

original: viviktadeśasevitvam aratir janasaṃsadi // BhG_13.10 //
analyzed: vivikta deśa sevi tvam aratiḥ jana saṃsadi

original: mayi sarveśvare ca aikāntyayogena sthirā bhaktiḥ,
analyzed: mayi sarveśvare ca aikāntya yogena sthirā bhaktiḥ

original: janavarjitadeśavāsitvam,
analyzed: jana varjita deśa vāsi tvam

original: janasaṃsadi cāprītiḥ // BhGR_13.10 //
analyzed: jana saṃsadi ca aprītiḥ

original: adhyātmajñānanityatvaṃ tattvajñānārthacintanam /
etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato 'nyathā // BhG_13.11 //
analyzed: etat jñānam iti proktam ajñānam yat atas anyathā

original: ātmani jñānam adhyātmajñānam tanniṣṭhatvam,
tattvajñānārthacintanam tattvajñānaprayojanaṃ yac cintanaṃ tan niratatvam ityarthaḥ /
jñāyate 'nenātmeti jñānam,
analyzed: jñāyate anena ātmā iti jñānam

original: ātmajñānasādhanam ityarthaḥ;
kṣetrasaṃbandhinaḥ puruṣasyāmānitvādikam uktaṃ guṇabṛnham evātmajñānopayogi,
analyzed: kṣetra saṃbandhinaḥ puruṣasya amāni tva ādikam uktam guṇa bṛnham eva ātma jñāna upayogi

original: etadvyatiriktaṃ sarvaṃ kṣetrakāryam ātmajñānavirodhīti ajñānam // BhGR_13.11 //
analyzed: etad vyatiriktam sarvam kṣetra kāryam ātma jñāna virodhi iti ajñānam

original: atha etad yo vettīti veditṛtvalakṣaṇenoktasya kṣetrajñasya svarūpaṃ viśodhyate
analyzed: atha etat yaḥ vetti iti veditṛ tva lakṣaṇena uktasya kṣetrajñasya svarūpam viśodhyate

original: jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute /
analyzed: jñeyam yat tat pravakṣyāmi yat jñātvā amṛtam aśnute

original: anādi matparaṃ brahma na sat tan nāsad ucyate // BhG_13.12 //
analyzed: anādi mad param brahma na sat tat na asat ucyate

original: amānitvādibhiḥ sādhanaiḥ jñeyaṃ prāpyaṃ yat pratyagātmasvarūpaṃ tat pravakṣyāmi,
analyzed: amāni tva ādibhiḥ sādhanaiḥ jñeyam prāpyam yat pratyagātma svarūpam tat pravakṣyāmi

original: yaj jñātvā janmajarāmaraṇādiprākṛtadharmarahitam amṛtam ātmānaṃ prāpnoti;
analyzed: yat jñātvā janma jarā maraṇa ādi prākṛta dharma rahitam amṛtam ātmānam prāpnoti

original: ādir yasya na vidyate,
analyzed: ādiḥ yasya na vidyate

original: tad anādi; asya hi pratyagātmana utpattir na vidyate;
analyzed: tat anādi asya hi pratyagātmanaḥ utpattiḥ na vidyate

original: tata evānto na vidyate /
analyzed: tatas eva antaḥ na vidyate

original: śrutiś ca, “na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit” iti,
analyzed: śrutiḥ ca na jāyate mriyate vā vipaścit iti

original: matparam ahaṃ paro yasya tan matparam /
analyzed: mad param aham paraḥ yasya tat mad param

original: “itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām,
analyzed: itas tu anyām prakṛtim viddhi me parām

original: jīvabhūtām” iti hy uktam /
analyzed: jīva bhūtām iti hi uktam

original: bhagavaccharīratayā bhagavaccheṣataikarasaṃ hy ātmasvarūpam;
analyzed: bhagavat śarīra tayā bhagavat śeṣa tā ekarasam hi ātma svarūpam

original: tathā ca śrutiḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ

original: “ya ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmano 'ntaro yam atmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati” iti,
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmanaḥ antaraḥ yam atmā na veda yasya ātmā śarīram yaḥ ātmānam antaraḥ yamayati iti

original: tathā,
analyzed: tathā

original: “sa kāraṇaṃ karaṇādhipādhipo na cāsya kaściñ janitā na cādhipaḥ“,
analyzed: sa kāraṇam karaṇa adhipa adhipaḥ na ca asya janitā na ca adhipaḥ

original: “pradhānakṣetrajñapatir guṇeśaḥ” ityādikā /
brahma bṛhattvaguṇayogi,
analyzed: brahma bṛhat tva guṇa yogi

original: śarīrāder arthāntarabhūtam,
analyzed: śarīra ādeḥ artha antara bhūtam

original: svataḥ śarīrādibhiḥ paricchedarahitaṃ kṣetrajñatattvam ityarthaḥ;
analyzed: svatas śarīra ādibhiḥ pariccheda rahitam kṣetrajña tattvam iti arthaḥ

original: “sa cānantyāya kalpate” iti hi śrūyate;
analyzed: sa ca ānantyāya kalpate iti hi śrūyate

original: śarīraparicchinnatvam aṇutvaṃ cāsya karmakṛtam /
analyzed: śarīra paricchinna tvam aṇu tvam ca asya karma kṛtam

original: karmabandhān muktasyānantyam /
analyzed: karma bandhāt muktasya ānantyam

original: ātmany api brahmaśabdaḥ prayujyate,
analyzed: ātmani api brahma śabdaḥ prayujyate

original: “sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahmabhūyāya kalpate /
analyzed: sa guṇān samatītya etān brahma bhūyāya kalpate

original: brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham amṛtasyāvyayasya ca“,
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ hi pratiṣṭhā aham amṛtasya avyayasya ca

original: “brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati /
analyzed: brahma bhūtaḥ prasanna ātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati

original: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu madbhaktiṃ labhate parām //
analyzed: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu mad bhaktim labhate parām

original: BhGR_13.” iti /
analyzed: iti

original: na sat tan nāsad ucyate kāryakāraṇarūpāvasthādvayarahitatayā sadasacchabdābhyām ātmasavarūpaṃ nocyate /
analyzed: na sat tat na asat ucyate kārya kāraṇa rūpa avasthā dvaya rahita tayā sat asat śabdābhyām ātma sava rūpam na ucyate

original: kāryāvasthāyāṃ hi devādināmarūpabhāktvena sad ity ucyate,
analyzed: kārya avasthāyām hi deva ādi nāma rūpa bhāktvena sat iti ucyate

original: tadanarhatā kāraṇāvasthāyām asad ity ucyate /
analyzed: tad anarha tā kāraṇa avasthāyām asat iti ucyate

original: tathā ca śrutiḥ,
analyzed: tathā ca śrutiḥ

original: “asad vā idam agra āsīt /
analyzed: asat vai idam agre āsīt

original: tato vai sad ajāyata“,
analyzed: tatas vai sat ajāyata

original: “tad dhedaṃ tarhy avyākṛtam āsīt tannāmarūpābhyāṃ vyākriyata” ityādikā /
analyzed: tat ha idam tarhi a vyākṛtam āsīt tat nāma rūpābhyām vyākriyate iti ādikā

original: kāryakāraṇāvasthādvayānvayas tv ātmanaḥ karmarūpāvidyāveṣṭanakṛtaḥ,
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa avasthā dvaya anvayaḥ tu ātmanaḥ karma rūpa avidyā veṣṭana kṛtaḥ

original: na svarūpakṛta iti sadasacchabdābhyām ātmasvarūpaṃ nocyate /
analyzed: na svarūpa kṛtaḥ iti sat asat śabdābhyām ātma svarūpam na ucyate

original: yady api “asad vā idam agra āsīt” iti kāraṇāvasthaṃ paraṃ brahmocyate,
analyzed: yadi api asat vai idam agre āsīt iti kāraṇa avastham param brahma ucyate

original: tathāpi nāmarūpavibhāgānarhasūkṣmacidacidvastuśarīraṃ
analyzed: tathā api nāma rūpa vibhāga anarha sūkṣma cit acit vastu śarīram

original: paraṃ brahma kāraṇāvastham iti kāraṇāvasthāyāṃ kṣetrakṣetrajñasvarūpam api asacchabdavācyam,
analyzed: param brahma kāraṇa avastham iti kāraṇa avasthāyām kṣetra kṣetrajña svarūpam api asat śabda vācyam

original: kṣetrajñasya sāvasthā karmakṛteti pariśuddhasvarūpaṃ na sadasacchabdanirdeśyam // BhGR_13.12 //
analyzed: kṣetrajñasya sā avasthā karma kṛtā iti pariśuddha svarūpam na sat asat śabda nirdeśyam

original: sarvataḥpāṇipādaṃ tat sarvato'kṣiśiromukham /
analyzed: sarvatas pāṇi pādam tat sarvatas akṣi śiraḥ mukham

original: sarvataśśrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati // BhG_13.13 //
analyzed: sarvatas śrutimat loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati

original: sarvataḥ pāṇipādaṃ tat pariśuddhātmasvarūpaṃ sarvataḥ pāṇipādakāryaśaktam,
analyzed: sarvatas pāṇi pādam tat pariśuddha ātma svarūpam sarvatas pāṇi pāda kārya śaktam

original: tathā sarvato 'kṣiśiromukhaṃ sarvataś śrutimat sarvataś cakṣurādikāryakṛt,
analyzed: tathā sarvatas akṣi śiraḥ mukham sarvatas śrutimat sarvatas cakṣuḥ ādi kārya kṛt

original: “apāṇipādo javano grahītā paśyaty acakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoty akarṇaḥ” iti parasya brahmaṇo 'pāṇipādasyāpi sarvataḥ pāṇipādādikāryakṛttvaṃ śrūyate /
analyzed: a pāṇi pādaḥ javanaḥ grahītā paśyati a cakṣuḥ sa śṛṇoti a karṇaḥ iti parasya brahmaṇaḥ a pāṇi pādasya api sarvatas pāṇi pāda ādi kārya kṛt tvam śrūyate

original: pratyagātmano 'pi pariśuddhasya tatsāmyāpattyā sarvataḥ pāṇipādādikāryakṛttvaṃ śrutisiddham eva /
analyzed: pratyagātmanaḥ api pariśuddhasya tad sāmya āpattyā sarvatas pāṇi pāda ādi kārya kṛt tvam śruti siddham eva

original: “tadā vidvān puṇyapāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramaṃ sāmyam upaiti” iti hi śrūyate /
analyzed: tadā vidvān puṇya pāpe vidhūya nirañjanaḥ paramam sāmyam upaiti iti hi śrūyate

original: “idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ” iti ca vakṣyate /
analyzed: idam jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ iti ca vakṣyate

original: loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati loke yad vastujātaṃ tat sarvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhati,
analyzed: loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati loke yat vastu jātam tat sarvam vyāpya tiṣṭhati

original: pariśuddhasvarūpaṃ deśādiparicchedarahitatayā sarvagatam ityarthaḥ // BhGR_13.13 //
analyzed: pariśuddha svarūpam deśa ādi pariccheda rahita tayā sarva gatam iti arthaḥ

original: sarvendriyaguṇābhāsaṃ sarvendriyavivarjitam /
analyzed: sarva indriya guṇa ābhāsam sarva indriya vivarjitam

original: asaktaṃ sarvabhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca // BhG_13.14 //
analyzed: asaktam sarva bhṛt ca eva nirguṇam guṇa bhoktṛ ca

original: sarvendriyaguṇābhāsam sarvendriyaguṇair ābhāso yasya tat sarvendriyābhāsam /
analyzed: sarva indriya guṇa ābhāsam sarva indriya guṇaiḥ ābhāsaḥ yasya tat sarva indriya ābhāsam

original: indriyaguṇā indriyavṛttayaḥ /
analyzed: indriya guṇāḥ indriya vṛttayaḥ

original: indriyavṛttibhir api viṣayān jñatuṃ samartham ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: indriya vṛttibhiḥ api viṣayān jñatum samartham iti arthaḥ

original: svabhāvatas sarvendriyavivarjitam vinaivendriyavṛttibhiḥ svata eva sarvaṃ jānātītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: svabhāvataḥ sarva indriya vivarjitam vinā eva indriya vṛttibhiḥ svatas eva sarvam jānāti iti arthaḥ

original: asaktam svabhāvato devādidehasaṅgarahitam,
analyzed: asaktam svabhāvataḥ deva ādi deha saṅga rahitam

original: sarvabhṛc caiva devādisarvadehabharaṇasamarthaṃ ca;
analyzed: sarva bhṛt ca eva deva ādi sarva deha bharaṇa samartham ca

original: “sa ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati” ityādiśruteḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ekadhā bhavati tridhā bhavati ityādi śruteḥ

original: nirguṇam tathā svabhāvatas sattvādiguṇarahitam /
analyzed: nirguṇam tathā svabhāvataḥ sattva ādi guṇa rahitam

original: guṇabhoktṛ ca sattvādīnāṃ guṇānāṃ bhogasamarthaṃ ca // BhGR_13.14 //
analyzed: guṇa bhoktṛ ca sattva ādīnām guṇānām bhoga samartham ca

original: bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca /
analyzed: bahis antar ca bhūtānām acaram caram eva ca

original: sūkṣmatvāt tad avijñeyaṃ dūrasthaṃ cāntike ca tat // BhG_13.15 //
analyzed: sūkṣma tvāt tat avijñeyam dūra stham ca antike ca tat

original: pṛthivyādīni bhūtāni parityajyāśarīro bahir vartate;
analyzed: pṛthivī ādīni bhūtāni parityajya aśarīraḥ bahis vartate

original: teṣām antaś ca vartate,
analyzed: teṣām antaḥ ca vartate

original: “jakṣat krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ strībhir vā yānair vā” ityādiśrutisiddhasvacchandavṛttiṣu /
analyzed: jakṣat krīḍan ramamāṇaḥ strībhiḥ vā yānaiḥ vā ityādi śruti siddha svacchanda vṛttiṣu

original: acaraṃ caram eva ca svabhāvato 'caram;
analyzed: acaram caram eva ca svabhāvataḥ acaram

original: caram ca dehitve /
analyzed: caram ca dehi tve

original: sūkṣmatvāt tadavijñeyam evaṃ sarvaśaktiyuktaṃ sarvajñāṃ tad atmatattvam asmin kṣetre vartamānam apy atisūkṣmatvād dehāt pṛthaktvena saṃsāribhir
analyzed: sūkṣma tvāt tat avijñeyam evam sarva śakti yuktam sarvajñām tat atma tattvam asmin kṣetre vartamānam api ati sūkṣma tvāt dehāt pṛthaktvena saṃsāribhiḥ

original: dūrasthaṃ cāntike ca tad amānitvādyuktaguṇarahitānāṃ viparītaguṇāṇāṃ puṃsāṃ svadehe vartamānam apy atidūrastham,
analyzed: dūra stham ca antike ca tat amāni tva ādi ukta guṇa rahitānām viparīta guṇāṇām puṃsām sva dehe vartamānam api ati dūra stham

original: tathā amānitvādiguṇopetānāṃ tad evāntike vartate // BhGR_13.15 //
analyzed: tathā amāni tva ādi guṇa upetānām tat eva antike vartate

original: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam /
analyzed: avibhaktam ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam

original: bhūtabhartṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca // BhG_13.16 //
analyzed: bhūta bhartṛ ca tat jñeyam grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca

original: devamanuṣyādibhūteṣu sarvatra sthitam ātmavastu veditṛtvaikākāratayā avibhaktam /
analyzed: deva manuṣya ādi bhūteṣu sarvatra sthitam ātma vastu veditṛ tva eka ākāra tayā avibhaktam

original: aviduṣāṃ devādyākāreṇa “ayaṃ devo manuṣyaḥ” iti vibhaktam iva ca sthitam /
analyzed: aviduṣām deva ādi ākāreṇa ayam devaḥ manuṣyaḥ iti vibhaktam iva ca sthitam

original: devo 'ham, manuṣyo 'ham iti dehasāmānādhikaraṇyenānusandhīyamānam api veditṛtvena dehād arthāntarabhūtaṃ jñātuṃ śakyam iti ādāv uktam eva,
analyzed: devaḥ aham manuṣyaḥ aham iti deha sāmānādhikaraṇyena anusandhīyamānam api veditṛ tvena dehāt artha antara bhūtam jñātum śakyam iti ādau uktam eva

original: “etad yo vetti” iti,
analyzed: etat yaḥ vetti iti

original: idānīṃ prakārāntaraiś ca jñātuṃ śakyam ity āja bhūtabhartṛ ceti /
analyzed: idānīm prakāra antaraiḥ ca jñātum śakyam iti āja bhūta bhartṛ ca iti

original: bhūtānāṃ pṛthivyādīnāṃ deharūpeṇa saṃhatānāṃ yad bhartṛ,
analyzed: bhūtānām pṛthivī ādīnām deha rūpeṇa saṃhatānām yat bhartṛ

original: tad bhartavyebhyo bhūtebhyo 'rthāntaraṃ jñeyam;
analyzed: tat bhartavyebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ artha antaram jñeyam

original: arthāntaram iti jñātuṃ śakyam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: artha antaram iti jñātum śakyam iti arthaḥ

original: tathā grasiṣṇu annādīnāṃ bhautikānāṃ grasiṣṇu,
analyzed: tathā grasiṣṇu anna ādīnām bhautikānām grasiṣṇu

original: grasyamānebhyo bhūtebhyo grasitṛtvenārthāntrabhūtam iti jñātuṃ śakyam /
analyzed: grasyamānebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ grasitṛ tvena arthāntra bhūtam iti jñātum śakyam

original: prabhaviṣṇu ca prabhavahetuś ca,
analyzed: prabhaviṣṇu ca prabhava hetuḥ ca

original: grastānām annādīnām ākārāntareṇa pariṇatānāṃ prabhahetuḥ,
analyzed: grastānām anna ādīnām ākāra antareṇa pariṇatānām prabhā hetuḥ

original: tebhyo 'rthāntaram iti jñātuṃ śakyam ityarthaḥ;
analyzed: tebhyaḥ artha antaram iti jñātum śakyam iti arthaḥ

original: mṛtaśarīre grasanaprabhavādīnām adarśanān na bhūtasaṃghātarūpaṃ kṣetraṃ grasanaprabhavabharaṇahetur iti niścīyate // BhGR_13.16 //
analyzed: mṛta śarīre grasana prabhava ādīnām adarśanāt na bhūta saṃghāta rūpam kṣetram grasana prabhava bharaṇa hetuḥ iti niścīyate

original: jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate /
analyzed: jyotiṣām api tat jyotiḥ tamasaḥ param ucyate

original: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam // BhG_13.17 //
analyzed: jñānam jñeyam jñāna gamyam hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam

original: jyotiśām dīpādityamaṇiprabhṛtīnām api tad eva jyotiḥ prakāśakam,
analyzed: jyotiśām dīpa āditya maṇi prabhṛtīnām api tat eva jyotiḥ prakāśakam

original: dīpādityādīnām apy ātmaprabhārūpaṃ /
analyzed: dīpa āditya ādīnām api ātma prabhā rūpam

original: jñānam eva prakāśakam /
analyzed: jñānam eva prakāśakam

original: dīpādayas tu viṣayendriyasannikarṣavirodhisaṃtamasanirasanamātraṃ kurvate /
analyzed: dīpa ādayaḥ tu viṣaya indriya sannikarṣa virodhi saṃtamasa nirasana mātram kurvate

original: tāvan mātreṇa teṣāṃ prakāśakatvam /
analyzed: tāvat mātreṇa teṣām prakāśaka tvam

original: tamasaḥ param ucyate /
analyzed: tamasaḥ param ucyate

original: tamaśśabdaḥ sūkṣmāvasthaprakṛtivacanaḥ /
analyzed: tamaḥ śabdaḥ sūkṣma avasthā prakṛti vacanaḥ

original: prakṛteḥ param ucyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛteḥ param ucyate iti arthaḥ

original: ato jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānaikākāram iti jñeyam /
analyzed: atas jñānam jñeyam jñāna eka ākāram iti jñeyam

original: tac ca jñānagamyam amānitvādibhir jñānasādhanair uktaiḥ prāpyam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tat ca jñāna gamyam amāni tva ādibhiḥ jñāna sādhanaiḥ uktaiḥ prāpyam iti arthaḥ

original: hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam sarvasya manuṣyādeḥ hṛdi viśeṣaṇāvasthitam sannihitam // BhGR_13.17 //
analyzed: hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam sarvasya manuṣya ādeḥ hṛdi viśeṣaṇa avasthitam sannihitam

original: iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ /
analyzed: iti kṣetram tathā jñānam jñeyam ca uktam samāsatas

original: madbhakta etad vijñāya madbhāvāyopapadyate // BhG_13.18 //
analyzed: mad bhaktaḥ etat vijñāya mad bhāvāya upapadyate

original: evaṃ “mahābhūtāny ahaṅkāraḥ” ityādinā “saṃghātaś cetanādhṛtir” ityantena kṣetratattvaṃ samāsenoktam /
analyzed: evam mahābhūtāni ahaṅkāraḥ ityādinā saṃghātaḥ cetanā dhṛtiḥ iti antena kṣetra tattvam samāsena uktam

original: “amānitvam” ityādinā “tattvajñānārthacintanam” ityantena jñātavyasyātmatattvasya jñānasādhanam uktam /
analyzed: amāni tvam ityādinā tattva jñāna artha cintanam iti antena jñātavyasya ātma tattvasya jñāna sādhanam uktam

original: “anādi matparam” ityādinā “hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam” ityantena jñeyasya kṣetrajñasya yāthātmyaṃ ca saṃkṣepeṇoktam /
analyzed: anādi mad param ityādinā hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam iti antena jñeyasya kṣetrajñasya yāthātmyam ca saṃkṣepeṇa uktam

original: madbhaktaḥ etat kṣetrayāthātmyaṃ,
analyzed: mad bhaktaḥ etat kṣetra yāthātmyam

original: kṣetrād viviktātmasvarūpaprāptyupāyayāthātmyaṃ kṣetrajñayāthātmyaṃ ca vijñāya,
analyzed: kṣetrāt vivikta ātma svarūpa prāpti upāya yāthātmyam kṣetrajña yāthātmyam ca vijñāya

original: madbhāvāyopapadyate /
analyzed: mad bhāvāya upapadyate

original: mama yo bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ,
analyzed: mama yaḥ bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ

original: asaṃsāritvam asaṃsāritvaprāptaye upapanno bhavatītyarthaḥ // BhGR_13.18 //
analyzed: asaṃsāri tvam asaṃsāri tva prāptaye upapannaḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: athātyantaviviktasvabhāvayoḥ prakṛtyātmanoḥ saṃsargasyānāditvaṃ saṃsṛṣṭayor dvayoḥ kāryabhedaḥ saṃsargahetuś cocyate
analyzed: atha atyanta vivikta svabhāvayoḥ prakṛti ātmanoḥ saṃsargasya anādi tvam saṃsṛṣṭayoḥ dvayoḥ kārya bhedaḥ saṃsarga hetuḥ ca ucyate

original: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api /
analyzed: prakṛtim puruṣam ca eva viddhi anādī ubhau api

original: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛtisaṃbhavān // BhG_13.19 //
analyzed: vikārān ca guṇān ca eva viddhi prakṛti saṃbhavān

original: prakṛtipuruṣau ubhau anyonyasaṃsṛṣṭau anādī iti viddhi;
analyzed: prakṛti puruṣau ubhau anyonya saṃsṛṣṭau anādī iti viddhi

original: bandhahetubhūtān vikārān icchādveṣādīn,
analyzed: bandha hetu bhūtān vikārān icchā dveṣa ādīn

original: amānitvādikāṃś ca guṇām mokṣahetubhūtān prakṛtisaṃbhavān viddhi /
analyzed: amāni tva ādikān ca guṇān mokṣa hetu bhūtān prakṛti saṃbhavān viddhi

original: puruṣeṇa saṃsṛṣṭeyam anādikālapravṛttā kṣetrākārapariṇātā prakṛtiḥ svavikārair icchādveṣādibhiḥ puruṣasya bandhuhetur bhavati;
analyzed: puruṣeṇa saṃsṛṣṭā iyam anādi kāla pravṛttā kṣetra ākāra pariṇātā prakṛtiḥ sva vikāraiḥ icchā dveṣa ādibhiḥ puruṣasya bandhu hetuḥ bhavati

original: saivāmānitvādibhiḥ svavikāraiḥ puruṣasyāpavargahetur bhavatītyarthaḥ // BhGR_13.19 //
analyzed: sā eva amānitva ādibhiḥ sva vikāraiḥ puruṣasya apavarga hetuḥ bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: kāryakāraṇakartṛtve hetuḥ prakṛtir ucyate /
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa kartṛ tve hetuḥ prakṛtiḥ ucyate

original: puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetur ucyate // BhG_13.20 //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ sukha duḥkhānām bhoktṛ tve hetuḥ ucyate

original: kāryaṃ śarīram;
analyzed: kāryam śarīram

original: kāraṇāni jñānakarmātmakāni samanaskānīndriyāṇi /
analyzed: kāraṇāni jñāna karma ātmakāni sa manaskāni indriyāṇi

original: teṣāṃ kriyākāritve puruṣādhiṣṭhitā prakṛtir eva hetuḥ;
analyzed: teṣām kriyā kāri tve puruṣa dhiṣṭhitā prakṛtiḥ eva hetuḥ

original: puruṣādhiṣṭhitakṣetrākārapariṇataprakṛtyāśrayāḥ bhogasādhanabhūtāḥ kriyā ityarthaḥ /
puruṣasyādhiṣṭhātṛtvam eva;
analyzed: puruṣasya adhiṣṭhātṛ tvam eva

original: tadapekṣayā,
analyzed: tad apekṣayā

original: “kartā śāstrārthavattvāt” ityādikam uktam;
analyzed: kartā śāstra arthavat tvāt ityādikam uktam

original: śarīrādhiṣṭhānaprayatnahetutvam eva hi puruṣasya kartṛtvam /
analyzed: śarīra adhiṣṭhāna prayatna hetu tvam eva hi puruṣasya kartṛ tvam

original: prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ sukhaduḥkhānāṃ bhoktṛtve hetuḥ,
analyzed: prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ sukha duḥkhānām bhoktṛ tve hetuḥ

original: sukhaduḥkhānubhavāśraya ityarthaḥ // BhGR_13.20 //
analyzed: sukha duḥkha anubhava āśrayaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: evam anyonyasaṃsṛṣṭayoḥ prakṛtipuruṣayoḥ kāryabheda uktaḥ;
analyzed: evam anyonya saṃsṛṣṭayoḥ prakṛti puruṣayoḥ kārya bhedaḥ uktaḥ

original: puruṣasya svatas svānubhavaikasukhasyāpi vaiṣayikasukhaduḥkhopabhogahetum āha
analyzed: puruṣasya svatas sva anubhava eka sukhasya api vaiṣayika sukha duḥkha upabhoga hetum āha

original: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān /
