analyzed: puruṣaḥ prakṛti sthaḥ hi bhuṅkte prakṛti jān guṇān

original: guṇaśabdaḥ svakāryeṣv aupacārikaḥ /
analyzed: guṇa śabdaḥ sva kāryeṣu aupacārikaḥ

original: svatas svānubhavaikasukhaḥ puruṣaḥ prakṛtisthaḥ prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: svatas sva anubhava eka sukhaḥ puruṣaḥ prakṛti sthaḥ prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭaḥ

original: prakṛtijān guṇān prakṛtisaṃsargopādhikān sattvādiguṇakāryabhūtān sukhaduḥkhādīn,
analyzed: prakṛti jān guṇān prakṛti saṃsarga upādhikān sattva ādi guṇa kārya bhūtān sukha duḥkha ādīn

original: bhuṅkte anubhavati /
analyzed: bhuṅkte anubhavati

original: prakṛtisaṃsargahetum āha
analyzed: prakṛti saṃsarga hetum āha

original: kāraṇaṃ guṇasaṅgo 'sya sadasadyonijanmasu // BhG_13.21 //
analyzed: kāraṇam guṇa saṅgaḥ asya sat asat yoni janmasu

original: pūrvapūrvaprakṛtipariṇāmarūpadevamanuṣyādiyoniviśeṣeṣu sthito 'yaṃ puruṣas tattadyoniprayuktasattvādiguṇamayeṣu
analyzed: pūrva pūrva prakṛti pariṇāma rūpa deva manuṣya ādi yoni viśeṣeṣu sthitaḥ ayam puruṣaḥ tad tad yoni prayukta sattva ādi guṇa mayeṣu

original: sukhaduḥkhādiṣu saktaḥ tatsādhanabhūteṣu puṇyapāpakarmasu pravartate;
analyzed: sukha duḥkha ādiṣu saktaḥ tad sādhana bhūteṣu puṇya pāpa karmasu pravartate

original: tatas tatpuṇyapāpaphalānubhavāya sadasadyoniṣu sādhvasādhuṣu yoniṣu jāyate;
analyzed: tatas tad puṇya pāpa phala anubhavāya sat asat yoniṣu sādhu asādhuṣu yoniṣu jāyate

original: tataś ca karmārabhate;
analyzed: tatas ca karma ārabhate

original: tato jāyate;
analyzed: tatas jāyate

original: yāvad amānitvādikān ātmaprāptisādhanabhūtān guṇān sevate,
analyzed: yāvat amāni tva ādikān ātma prāpti sādhana bhūtān guṇān sevate

original: tāvad eva saṃsarati /
analyzed: tāvat eva saṃsarati

original: tad idam uktaṃ kāraṇaṃ guṇasaṅgo 'sya sadasadyonijanmasu iti // BhGR_13.21 //
analyzed: tat idam uktam kāraṇam guṇa saṅgaḥ asya sat asat yoni janmasu iti

original: upadraṣṭānumantā ca bhartā bhoktā maheśvaraḥ /
analyzed: upadraṣṭā anumantā ca bhartā bhoktā maheśvaraḥ

original: paramātmeti cāpy ukto dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ // BhG_13.22 //
analyzed: paramātmā iti ca api uktaḥ dehe asmin puruṣaḥ paraḥ

original: asmin dehe 'vasthito 'yaṃ puruṣo dehapravṛttyanuguṇasaṅkalpādirūpeṇa dehasyopadraṣṭā anumantā ca bhavati /
analyzed: asmin dehe avasthitaḥ ayam puruṣaḥ deha pravṛtti anuguṇa saṅkalpa ādi rūpeṇa dehasya upadraṣṭā anumantā ca bhavati

original: tathā dehasya bhartā ca bhavati;
analyzed: tathā dehasya bhartā ca bhavati

original: tathā dehapravṛttijanitasukhaduḥkhayor bhoktā ca bhavati /
analyzed: tathā deha pravṛtti janita sukha duḥkhayoḥ bhoktā ca bhavati

original: evaṃ dehaniyamanena,
analyzed: evam deha niyamanena

original: dehabharaṇena,
analyzed: deha bharaṇena

original: dehaśeṣitvena ca dehendriyamanāṃsi prati maheśvaro bhavati /
analyzed: deha śeṣi tvena ca deha indriya manāṃsi prati maheśvaraḥ bhavati

original: tathā ca vakṣyate,
analyzed: tathā ca vakṣyate

original: “śarīraṃ yad avāpnoti yac cāpy utkrāmatīśvaraḥ /
analyzed: śarīram yat avāpnoti yat ca api utkrāmati īśvaraḥ

original: gṛhītvaitāni saṃyāti vāyur gandhān ivāśayāt //
analyzed: gṛhītvā etāni saṃyāti vāyuḥ gandhān iva āśayāt

original: BhGR_13.” iti /
analyzed: iti

original: asmin dehe dehendriyamanāṃsi prati paramātmeti cāpy uktaḥ /
analyzed: asmin dehe deha indriya manāṃsi prati paramātmā iti ca api uktaḥ

original: dehe manasi ca ātmaśabdo 'nantaram eva prayujyate,
analyzed: dehe manasi ca ātma śabdaḥ anantaram eva prayujyate

original: “dhyānenātmani paśyanti kecid ātmānam ātmanā” iti;
analyzed: dhyānena ātmani paśyanti kecid ātmānam ātmanā iti

original: apiśabdān maheśvara ity apy ukta iti gamyate;
analyzed: api śabdāt maheśvaraḥ iti api uktaḥ iti gamyate

original: puruṣaḥ paraḥ “anādi matparam” ityādinokto 'paricchinnajñānaśaktir ayaṃ puruṣo 'nādiprakṛtisaṃbandhakṛtaguṇasaṅgād
analyzed: puruṣaḥ paraḥ anādi mat param ityādinā uktaḥ aparicchinna jñānaśaktiḥ ayam puruṣaḥ anādi prakṛti saṃbandha kṛta guṇa saṅgāt

original: etad dehamātramaheśvaro dehamātraparamātmā ca bhavati // BhGR_13.22 //
analyzed: etat deha mātra maheśvaraḥ deha mātra paramātmā ca bhavati

original: ya enaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇais saha /
analyzed: yaḥ enam vetti puruṣam prakṛtim ca guṇaiḥ saha

original: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi na sa bhūyo 'bhijāyate // BhG_13.23 //
analyzed: sarvathā vartamānaḥ api na sa bhūyas abhijāyate

original: enam uktasvabhāvaṃ puruṣam,
analyzed: enam ukta svabhāvam puruṣam

original: uktasvabhāvāṃ ca prakṛtiṃ vakṣyamāṇasvabhāvayuktaiḥ sattvādibhir guṇaiḥ saha,
analyzed: ukta svabhāvām ca prakṛtim vakṣyamāṇa svabhāva yuktaiḥ sattva ādibhiḥ guṇaiḥ saha

original: yo vetti yathāvad vivekena jānāti,
analyzed: yaḥ vetti yathāvat vivekena jānāti

original: sa sarvathā devamanuṣyādideheṣv atimātrakliṣṭaprakāreṇa vartamāno 'pi,
analyzed: sa sarvathā deva manuṣya ādi deheṣu atimātra kliṣṭa prakāreṇa vartamānaḥ api

original: na bhūyo 'bhijāyate na bhūyaḥ prakṛtyā saṃsargam arhati,
analyzed: na bhūyas abhijāyate na bhūyas prakṛtyā saṃsargam arhati

original: aparicchinnajñānalakaṣaṇam apahatapāpmānam ātmānaṃ taddehāvasānasamaye prāpnotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_13.23 //
analyzed: aparicchinna jñāna lakaṣaṇam apahata pāpmānam ātmānam tad deha avasāna samaye prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: dhyānenātmani paśyanti kecid ātmānam ātmanā /
analyzed: dhyānena ātmani paśyanti kecid ātmānam ātmanā

original: anye sāṅkhyena yogena karmayogena cāpare // BhG_13.24 //
analyzed: anye sāṅkhyena yogena karma yogena ca apare

original: kecin niṣpannayogāḥ ātmani śarīre 'vasthitam ātmānam ātmanā manasā dhyānena yogena paśyanti /
analyzed: kecid niṣpanna yogāḥ ātmani śarīre avasthitam ātmānam ātmanā manasā dhyānena yogena paśyanti

original: anye ca aniṣpannayogāḥ,
analyzed: anye ca aniṣpanna yogāḥ

original: sāṃkhyena yogena jñānayogena yogayogyaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā ātmānaṃ paśyanti /
analyzed: sāṃkhyena yogena jñāna yogena yoga yogyam manaḥ kṛtvā ātmānam paśyanti

original: apare jñānayogānadhikāriṇaḥ,
analyzed: apare jñāna yoga anadhikāriṇaḥ

original: tadadhikāriṇaś ca sukaropāyasaktāḥ,
analyzed: tad adhikāriṇaḥ ca sukara upāya saktāḥ

original: vyapadeśyāś ca karmayogenāntargatajñānena manaso yogayogyatām āpādya ātmānaṃ paśyanti // BhGR_13.24 //
analyzed: vyapadeśyāḥ ca karmayogena antargata jñānena manasaḥ yoga yogya tām āpādya ātmānam paśyanti

original: anye tv evam ajānantaḥ śrutvānyebhyaś ca upāsate /
analyzed: anye tu evam a jānantaḥ śrutvā anyebhyaḥ ca upāsate

original: te 'pi cātitaranty eva mṛtyuṃ śrutiparāyaṇāḥ // BhG_13.25 //
analyzed: te api ca atitaranti eva mṛtyum śruti parāyaṇāḥ

original: anye tu karmayogādiṣu ātmāvalokanasādhaneṣv anadhikṛtāḥ anyebhyaḥ tattvadarśibhyo jñānibhyaḥ śrutvā karmayogādibhir ātmānam upāsate;
analyzed: anye tu karma yoga ādiṣu ātma avalokana sādhaneṣu anadhikṛtāḥ anyebhyaḥ tattva darśibhyaḥ jñānibhyaḥ śrutvā karma yoga ādibhiḥ ātmānam upāsate

original: te 'py ātmadarśanena mṛtyum atitaranti /
analyzed: te api ātma darśanena mṛtyum atitaranti

original: ye śrutiparāyaṇāḥ śravaṇamātraniṣṭhāḥ,
analyzed: ye śruti parāyaṇāḥ śravaṇa mātra niṣṭhāḥ

original: ete ca śravaṇaniṣṭhāḥ pūtapāpāḥ krameṇa karmayogādikam ārabhyātitaranty eva mṛtyum /
analyzed: ete ca śravaṇa niṣṭhāḥ pūta pāpāḥ krameṇa karma yoga ādikam ārabhya atitaranti eva mṛtyum

original: apiśabdāc ca pūrvabhedo 'vagamyate // BhGR_13.25 //
analyzed: apiśabdāt ca pūrva bhedaḥ avagamyate

original: atha prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasyātmano vivekānusandhānaprakāraṃ vaktuṃ sarvaṃ sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ ca sattvaṃ cidacitsaṃsargajam ity āha
analyzed: atha prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭasya ātmanaḥ viveka anusandhāna prakāram vaktum sarvam sthāvaram jaṅgamam ca sattvam cit acit saṃsarga jam iti āha

original: yāvat saṃjāyate kiñcit sattvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam /
analyzed: yāvat saṃjāyate kiñcid sattvam sthāvara jaṅgamam

original: kṣetrakṣetrajñasaṃyogāt tad viddhi bharatarṣabha // BhG_13.26 //
analyzed: kṣetra kṣetrajña saṃyogāt tat viddhi bharata ṛṣabha

original: yāvat sthāvarajaṅgamātmanā sattvaṃ jāyate,
analyzed: yāvat sthāvara jaṅgama ātmanā sattvam jāyate

original: tāvat kṣetrakṣetrajñayor itaretarasaṃyogād eva jāyate saṃyuktam eva jāyate,
analyzed: tāvat kṣetra kṣetrajñayoḥ itaretara saṃyogāt eva jāyate saṃyuktam eva jāyate

original: na tv itaretaraviyuktam ityarthaḥ // BhGR_13.26 //
analyzed: na tu itaretara viyuktam iti arthaḥ

original: samaṃ sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhantaṃ parameśvaram /
analyzed: samam sarveṣu bhūteṣu tiṣṭhantam parameśvaram

original: vinaśyatsv avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati // BhG_13.27 //
analyzed: vinaśyatsu a vinaśyantam yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati

original: evam itaretarayukteṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu devādiviṣamākārād viyuktaṃ tatra tatra tattaddehendriyamanāṃsi
analyzed: evam itaretara yukteṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu deva ādi viṣama ākārāt viyuktam tatra tatra tad tad deha indriya manāṃsi

original: prati parameśvaratvena sthitam ātmānaṃ jñātṛtvena samānākāraṃ teṣu dehādiṣu vinaśyatsu
analyzed: prati parameśvara tvena sthitam ātmānam jñātṛ tvena samāna ākāram teṣu deha ādiṣu vinaśyatsu

original: vināśānarhasvabhāvenāvinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati,
analyzed: vināśa anarha svabhāvena avinaśyantam yaḥ paśyati

original: sa paśyati sa ātmānaṃ yathāvad avasthitaṃ paśyati /
analyzed: sa paśyati saḥ ātmānam yathāvat avasthitam paśyati

original: yas tu devādiviṣamākāreṇātmānam api viṣamākāraṃ janmavināśādiyuktaṃ ca paśyati,
analyzed: yaḥ tu deva ādi viṣama ākāreṇa ātmānam api viṣama ākāram janma vināśa ādi yuktam ca paśyati

original: sa nityam eva saṃsaratītyabhiprāyaḥ // BhGR_13.27 //
analyzed: sa nityam eva saṃsarati iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram /
analyzed: samam paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram

original: na hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim // BhG_13.28 //
analyzed: na hinasti ātmanā ātmānam tatas yāti parām gatim

original: sarvatra devādiśarīreṣu tattaccheṣitvenādhāratayā viyantṛtayā ca sthitam īśvaram ātmānaṃ devādiviṣamākāraviyuktaṃ jñānaikākāratayā samaṃ paśyan  #
analyzed: sarvatra deva ādi śarīreṣu tat tat śeṣi tvena ādhāra tayā viyantṛ tayā ca sthitam īśvaram ātmānam deva ādi viṣama ākāra viyuktam jñāna eka ākāra tayā samam paśyan

original: ātmanā manasā,
analyzed: ātmanā manasā

original: svam ātmānaṃ na hinasti rakṣati,
analyzed: svam ātmānam na hinasti rakṣati

original: saṃsārān mocayati /
analyzed: saṃsārāt mocayati

original: tataḥ tasmāj jñātṛtayā sarvatra samānākāradarśanāt parāṃ gatiṃ yāti;
analyzed: tatas tasmāt jñātṛ tayā sarvatra samāna ākāra darśanāt parām gatim yāti

original: gamyata iti gatiḥ;
analyzed: gamyate iti gatiḥ

original: paraṃ gantavyaṃ yathāvad avasthitam ātmānaṃ prāpnoti;
analyzed: param gantavyam yathāvat avasthitam ātmānam prāpnoti

original: devādyākārayuktatayā sarvatra viṣamam ātmānaṃ paśyan ātmānaṃ hinasti bhavajaladhimadhye prakṣipati // BhGR_13.28 //
analyzed: deva ādi ākāra yukta tayā sarvatra viṣamam ātmānam paśyan ātmānam hinasti bhava jaladhi madhye prakṣipati

original: prakṛtyaiva ca karmāṇi kriyamāṇāni sarvaśaḥ /
analyzed: prakṛtyā eva ca karmāṇi kriyamāṇāni sarvaśas

original: yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati // BhG_13.29 //
analyzed: yaḥ paśyati tathā ātmānam akartāram sa paśyati

original: sarvāṇi karmāṇi,
analyzed: sarvāṇi karmāṇi

original: “kāryakāraṇakartṛtve hetuḥ prakṛtir ucyate” iti pūrvoktarītyā prakṛtyā kriyamāṇānīti yaḥ paśyati,
analyzed: kārya kāraṇa kartṛ tve hetuḥ prakṛtiḥ ucyate iti pūrva ukta rītyā prakṛtyā kriyamāṇāni iti yaḥ paśyati

original: tathā ātmānaṃ jñānākāraṃ akartāraṃ ca yaḥ paśyati,
analyzed: tathā ātmānam jñāna ākāram akartāram ca yaḥ paśyati

original: tasya prakṛtisaṃyogas tadadhiṣṭhānaṃ tajjanyasukhaduḥkhānubhavaś ca karmarūpājñānakṛtānīti ca yaḥ paśyati,
analyzed: tasya prakṛti saṃyogaḥ tad adhiṣṭhānam tad janya sukha duḥkha anubhavaḥ ca karma rūpa ajñāna kṛtāni iti ca yaḥ paśyati

original: sa ātmānaṃ yathāvad avasthitaṃ paśyati // BhGR_13.29 //
analyzed: saḥ ātmānam yathāvat avasthitam paśyati

original: yadā bhūtapṛthagbhāvam ekastham anupaśyati /
analyzed: yadā bhūta pṛthagbhāvam ekastham anupaśyati

original: tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā // BhG_13.30 //
analyzed: tatas eva ca vistāram brahma saṃpadyate tadā

original: prakṛtipuruṣatattvadvayātmakeṣu devādiṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu satsu teṣāṃ devatvamanuṣyatvahrasvatvadīrghatvādipṛthagbhāvam ekastham ekatattvastham  #
analyzed: prakṛti puruṣa tattva dvaya ātmakeṣu deva ādiṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu satsu teṣām deva tva manuṣya tva hrasva tva dīrgha tva ādi pṛthagbhāvam ekastham eka tattva stham

original: prakṛtisthaṃ yadā paśyati,
analyzed: prakṛti stham yadā paśyati

original: nātmastham,
analyzed: na ātma stham

original: tata eva prakṛtita evottarottaraputrapautrādibhedavistāraṃ ca yadā paśyati,
analyzed: tatas eva prakṛtitaḥ eva uttara uttara putra pautra ādi bheda vistāram ca yadā paśyati

original: tadaiva brahmasaṃpadyate anavacchinnaṃ jñānaikākāram ātmānaṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_13.30 //
analyzed: tadā eva brahma saṃpadyate anavacchinnam jñāna eka ākāram ātmānam prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: anāditvān nirguṇatvāt paramātmāyam avyayaḥ /
analyzed: anādi tvāt nirguṇa tvāt paramātmā ayam avyayaḥ

original: śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate // BhG_13.31 //
analyzed: śarīra sthaḥ api kaunteya na karoti na lipyate

original: ayaṃ paramātmā dehān niṣkṛṣya svasvabhāvena nirūpitaḥ,
analyzed: ayam paramātmā dehāt niṣkṛṣya sva svabhāvena nirūpitaḥ

original: śarīrastho 'pi anāditvād anārabhyatvād avyayaḥ vyayarahitaḥ,
analyzed: śarīra sthaḥ api anādi tvāt anārabhya tvāt avyayaḥ vyaya rahitaḥ

original: nirguṇatvāt sattvādiguṇarahitatvān na karoti,
analyzed: nirguṇa tvāt sattva ādi guṇa rahita tvāt na karoti

original: na lipyate dehasvabhāvair na lipyate // BhGR_13.31 //
analyzed: na lipyate deha svabhāvaiḥ na lipyate

original: yady api nirguṇatvān na karoti,
analyzed: yadi api nirguṇa tvāt na karoti

original: nityasaṃyukto dehasvabhāvaiḥ kathaṃ na lipyata ity atrāha
analyzed: nitya saṃyuktaḥ deha svabhāvaiḥ katham na lipyate iti atra āha

original: yathā sarvagataṃ saukṣmyād ākāśaṃ nopalipyate /
analyzed: yathā sarva gatam saukṣmyāt ākāśam na upalipyate

original: sarvatrāvasthito dehe tathātmā nopalipyate // BhG_13.32 //
analyzed: sarvatra avasthitaḥ dehe tathā ātmā na upalipyate

original: yathā ākāśaṃ sarvagatam api sarvair vastubhis saṃyuktam api saukṣmyāt sarvavastusvabhāvair na lipyate,
analyzed: yathā ākāśam sarva gatam api sarvaiḥ vastubhiḥ saṃyuktam api saukṣmyāt sarva vastu svabhāvaiḥ na lipyate

original: tathā ātmā atisaukṣmyāt sarvatra devamanuṣyādau dehe 'vasthito 'pi tattaddehasvabhāvair na lipyate // BhGR_13.32 //
analyzed: tathā ātmā atisaukṣmyāt sarvatra deva manuṣya ādau dehe avasthitaḥ api tad tad deha svabhāvaiḥ na lipyate

original: yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ /
analyzed: yathā prakāśayati ekaḥ kṛtsnam lokam imam raviḥ

original: kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārata // BhG_13.33 //
analyzed: kṣetram kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnam prakāśayati bhārata

original: yathaika ādityaḥ svayā prabhayā kṛtsnam imaṃ lokaṃ prakāśayati,
analyzed: yathā ekaḥ ādityaḥ svayā prabhayā kṛtsnam imam lokam prakāśayati

original: tathā kṣetram api kṣetrī,
analyzed: tathā kṣetram api kṣetrī

original: “mamedaṃ kṣetram īdṛśam” iti kṛtsnam bahirantaś cāpādatalamastakaṃ svakīyena jñānena prakāśayati /
analyzed: mama idam kṣetram īdṛśam iti kṛtsnam bahis antar ca ā pādatalamastakam svakīyena jñānena prakāśayati

original: ataḥ prakāśyāl lokāt prakāśakādityavad veditṛtvena vedyabhūtād asmāt kṣetrād atyantavilakṣaṇo 'yam uktalakṣaṇa ātmetyarthaḥ // BhGR_13.33 //
analyzed: atas prakāśyāt lokāt prakāśaka āditya vat veditṛ tvena vedya bhūtāt asmāt kṣetrāt atyanta vilakṣaṇaḥ ayam ukta lakṣaṇaḥ ātmā iti arthaḥ

original: kṣetrakṣetrajñayor evam antaraṃ jñānacakṣuṣā /
analyzed: kṣetra kṣetrajñayoḥ evam antaram jñānacakṣuṣā

original: bhūtaprakṛtimokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param // BhG_13.34 //
analyzed: bhūta prakṛti mokṣam ca ye viduḥ yānti te param

original: evam uktena prakāreṇa kṣetrakṣetrajñayor antaraṃ viśeṣaṃ vivekaviṣayajñānākhyena cakṣuṣā ye viduḥ,
analyzed: evam uktena prakāreṇa kṣetra kṣetrajñayoḥ antaram viśeṣam viveka viṣaya jñāna ākhyena cakṣuṣā ye viduḥ

original: bhūtaprakṛtimokṣaṃ ca,
analyzed: bhūta prakṛti mokṣam ca

original: te paraṃ yānti nirmuktabandham ātmānaṃ prāpnuvanti /
analyzed: te param yānti nirmukta bandham ātmānam prāpnuvanti

original: mokṣyate 'neneti mokṣaḥ,
analyzed: mokṣyate anena iti mokṣaḥ

original: amānitvādikaṃ mokṣasādhanam ityarthaḥ;
analyzed: amāni tva ādikam mokṣa sādhanam iti arthaḥ

original: kṣetrakṣetrajñayor vivekaviṣayeṇoktena jñānena tayor vivekaṃ viditvā bhūtākārapariṇataprakṛtimokṣopāyam amānitvādikaṃ cāgamya ya ācaranti,
analyzed: kṣetra kṣetrajñayoḥ viveka viṣayeṇa uktena jñānena tayoḥ vivekam viditvā bhūta ākāra pariṇata prakṛti mokṣa upāyam amāni tva ādikam ca āgamya ye ācaranti

original: te nirmuktabandhāḥ svena rūpeṇāvasthitam anavacchinnajñānalakṣaṇam ātmānaṃ prāpnuvantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_13.34 //
analyzed: te nirmukta bandhāḥ svena rūpeṇa avasthitam anavacchinna jñāna lakṣaṇam ātmānam prāpnuvanti iti arthaḥ

original: trayodaśe prakṛtipuruṣayor anyānyasaṃsṛṣṭayoḥ svarūpayāthātmayaṃ vijñāya amānitvādibhiḥ bhagavadbhaktyanugṛhītair bandhān mucyata ity uktam
analyzed: trayodaśe prakṛti puruṣayoḥ anya anya saṃsṛṣṭayoḥ sva rūpa yāthātmayam vijñāya amāni tva ādibhiḥ bhagavat bhakti anugṛhītaiḥ bandhāt mucyate iti uktam

original: tatra bandhahetuḥ pūrvapūrvasattvādiguṇamayasukhādisaṅga iti cābhihitam,
analyzed: tatra bandha hetuḥ pūrva pūrva sattva ādi guṇa maya sukha ādi saṅgaḥ iti ca abhihitam

original: “kāraṇaṃ guṇasaṅgo 'sya sadasadyonijanmasu” iti /
analyzed: kāraṇam guṇa saṅgaḥ asya sat asat yoni janmasu iti

original: athedānīṃ guṇānāṃ bandhahetutāprakāraḥ,
analyzed: atha idānīm guṇānām bandha hetutā prakāraḥ

original: guṇanivartanaprakāraś cocyate /
analyzed: guṇa nivartana prakāraḥ ca ucyate

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: paraṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi jñānānāṃ jñānam uttamam /
analyzed: param bhūyas pravakṣyāmi jñānānām jñānam uttamam

original: yaj jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ // BhG_14.1 //
analyzed: yat jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parām siddhim itas gatāḥ

original: param pūrvoktād anyat prakṛtipuruṣāntargatam eva sattvādiguṇaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi /
analyzed: param pūrva uktāt anyat prakṛti puruṣa antargatam eva sattva ādi guṇa viṣayam jñānam bhūyas pravakṣyāmi

original: tac ca jñānaṃ sarveṣāṃ prakṛtipuruṣaviṣayajñānānām uttamam /
analyzed: tat ca jñānam sarveṣām prakṛti puruṣa viṣaya jñānānām uttamam

original: yaj jñānaṃ jñātvā sarve munayas tan mananaśīlāḥ itaḥ saṃsārabandhāt parāṃ siddhiṃ gatāḥ parāṃ pariśuddhātmasvarūpaprāptirūpāṃ siddhim avāptāḥ
analyzed: yat jñānam jñātvā sarve munayaḥ tat manana śīlāḥ itas saṃsāra bandhāt parām siddhim gatāḥ parām pariśuddha ātma svarūpa prāpti rūpām siddhim avāptāḥ

original: punar api taj jñānaṃ phalena viśinaṣṭi
analyzed: punar api tat jñānam phalena viśinaṣṭi

original: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ /
analyzed: idam jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ

original: sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca // BhG_14.2 //
analyzed: sarge api nā upajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca

original: idam vakṣyamāṇaṃ jñānam upaśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ matsāmyaṃ prāptāḥ,
analyzed: idam vakṣyamāṇam jñānam upaśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ mad sāmyam prāptāḥ

original: sarge 'pi nopajāyante na sṛjikarmatāṃ bhajante;
analyzed: sarge api nā upajāyante na sṛji karma tām bhajante

original: pralaye na vyathanti ca na ca saṃhṛtikarmatām // BhGR_14.2 //
analyzed: pralaye na vyathanti ca na ca saṃhṛti karma tām

original: atha prākṛtānāṃ guṇānāṃ bandhahetutāprakāraṃ vaktuṃ sarvasya bhūtajātasya prakṛtipuruṣasaṃsargajatvaṃ “yāvat saṃjāyate kiñcit” ity anenoktaṃ  #
analyzed: atha prākṛtānām guṇānām bandha hetutā prakāram vaktum sarvasya bhūta jātasya prakṛti puruṣa saṃsarga ja tvam yāvat saṃjāyate kiñcid iti anena uktam

original: bhagavatā svenaiva kṛtam ity āha
analyzed: bhagavatā svena eva kṛtam iti āha

original: mama yonir mahadbrahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham /
analyzed: mama yoniḥ mahat brahma tasmin garbham dadhāmi aham

original: saṃbhavas sarvabhūtānāṃ tato bhavati bhārata // BhG_14.3 //
analyzed: saṃbhavaḥ sarva bhūtānām tatas bhavati bhārata

original: kṛtsnasya jagato yonibhūtaṃ mama mahadbrahma yat,
analyzed: kṛtsnasya jagataḥ yoni bhūtam mama mahat brahma yat

original: tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham;
analyzed: tasmin garbham dadhāmi aham

original: “bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca /
analyzed: bhūmiḥ āpaḥ analaḥ vāyuḥ kham manaḥ buddhiḥ eva ca

original: ahaṅkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā //
analyzed: ahaṅkāraḥ iti iyam me bhinnā prakṛtiḥ aṣṭadhā

original: apareyam” iti nirdiṣṭā acetanaprakṛtiḥ mahadahaṅkārādivikārāṇāṃ kāraṇatayā mahadbrahmety ucyate /
analyzed: aparā iyam iti nirdiṣṭā acetana prakṛtiḥ mahat ahaṅkāra ādi vikārāṇām kāraṇatayā mahat brahma iti ucyate

original: śrutāv api kvacit prakṛtir api brahmeti nirdiśyate,
analyzed: śrutau api kvacid prakṛtiḥ api brahma iti nirdiśyate

original: “yas sarvajñas sarvavid yasya jñānamayaṃ tapaḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ sarva jñaḥ sarva vid yasya jñāna mayam tapaḥ

original: tasmād etad brahma nāma rūpam annaṃ ca jāyate” iti;
analyzed: tasmāt etat brahma nāma rūpam annam ca jāyate iti

original: “itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām /
analyzed: itas tu anyām prakṛtim viddhi me parām

original: jīvabhūtām” iti cetanapuñjarūpā yā parā prakṛtir nirdiṣṭā,
analyzed: jīva bhūtām iti cetana puñja rūpā yā parā prakṛtiḥ nirdiṣṭā

original: seha sakalaprāṇibījatayā garbhaśabdenocyate /
analyzed: sā iha sakala prāṇi bīja tayā garbha śabdena ucyate

original: tasmin acetane yonibhūte mahati brahmaṇi cetanapuñjarūpaṃ garbhaṃ dadhāmi;
analyzed: tasmin acetane yoni bhūte mahati brahmaṇi cetana puñja rūpam garbham dadhāmi

original: acetanaprakṛtyā bhogakṣetrabhūtayā bhoktṛvargapuñjabhūtāṃ cetanaprakṛtiṃ saṃyojayāmītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: acetana prakṛtyā bhogakṣetra bhūtayā bhoktṛ varga puñja bhūtām cetana prakṛtim saṃyojayāmi iti arthaḥ

original: tataḥ tasmāt prakṛtidvayasaṃyogān matsaṃkalpakṛtāt sarvabhūtānāṃ brahmādistambaparyantānāṃ saṃbhavo bhavati // BhGR_14.3 //
analyzed: tatas tasmāt prakṛti dvaya saṃyogāt mad saṃkalpa kṛtāt sarva bhūtānām brahma ādi stamba paryantānām saṃbhavaḥ bhavati

original: kāryāvastho 'pi cidacitprakṛtisaṃsargo mayaiva kṛta ity āha
analyzed: kārya avasthaḥ api cit acit prakṛti saṃsargaḥ mayā eva kṛtaḥ iti āha

original: sarvayoniṣu kaunteya mūrtayaḥ saṃbhavanti yāḥ /
analyzed: sarva yoniṣu kaunteya mūrtayaḥ saṃbhavanti yāḥ

original: tāsāṃ brahma mahad yonir ahaṃ bījapradaḥ pitā // BhG_14.4 //
analyzed: tāsām brahma mahat yoniḥ aham bīja pradaḥ pitā

original: sarvāsu devagandharvayakṣarākṣasamanuṣyapaśumṛgapakṣisarīsṛpādiṣu yoniṣu tattanmūrtayo yāḥ saṃbhavanti jāyante,
analyzed: sarvāsu deva gandharva yakṣa rākṣasa manuṣya paśu mṛga pakṣi sarīsṛpa ādiṣu yoniṣu tad tad mūrtayaḥ yāḥ saṃbhavanti jāyante

original: tāsāṃ brahma mahad yoniḥ kāraṇam;
analyzed: tāsām brahma mahat yoniḥ kāraṇam

original: mayā saṃyojitacetanavargā mahadādiviśeṣāntāvasthā prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: mayā saṃyojita cetana vargā mahat ādi viśeṣa anta avasthā prakṛtiḥ kāraṇam iti arthaḥ

original: ahaṃ bījapradaḥ pitā tatra tatra ca tattatkarmānuguṇyena cetanavargasya saṃyojakaś cāham ityarthaḥ // BhGR_14.4 //
analyzed: aham bīja pradaḥ pitā tatra tatra ca tad tad karma ānuguṇyena cetana vargasya saṃyojakaḥ ca aham iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ sargādau prācīnakarmavaśād acitsaṃsargeṇa devādiyoniṣu jātānāṃ punaḥ punar devādibhāvena janmahetum āha
analyzed: evam sarga ādau prācīna karma vaśāt acit saṃsargeṇa deva ādi yoniṣu jātānām punar punar deva ādi bhāvena janma hetum āha

original: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ /
analyzed: sattvam rajaḥ tamaḥ iti guṇāḥ prakṛti saṃbhavāḥ

original: nibadhnanti mahābāho dehe dehinam avyayam // BhG_14.5 //
analyzed: nibadhnanti mahā bāho dehe dehinam avyayam

original: sattvarajastamāṃsi trayo guṇāḥ prakṛteḥ svarūpānubandhinaḥ svabhāvaviśeṣāḥ prakāśādikāryaikanirūpaṇīyāḥ
analyzed: sattva rajaḥ tamāṃsi trayaḥ guṇāḥ prakṛteḥ svarūpa anubandhinaḥ svabhāva viśeṣāḥ prakāśa ādi kārya eka nirūpaṇīyāḥ

original: prakṛtyavasthāyām anudbhūtāḥ tadvikāreṣu mahadādiṣu udbhūtāḥ mahadādiviśeṣāntair
analyzed: prakṛti avasthāyām anudbhūtāḥ tad vikāreṣu mahat ādiṣu udbhūtāḥ mahat ādi viśeṣa antaiḥ

original: ārabdhadevamanuṣyādidehasaṃbandhinam enaṃ dehinam,
analyzed: ārabdha deva manuṣya ādi deha saṃbandhinam enam dehinam

original: avyayam svato guṇasaṃbandhānarhaṃ dehe vartamānaṃ nibadhnanti,
analyzed: avyayam svatas guṇa saṃbandha anarham dehe vartamānam nibadhnanti

original: dehe vartamānatvopādhinā nibadhnantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_14.5 //
analyzed: dehe vartamāna tva upādhinā nibadhnanti iti arthaḥ

original: sattvarajastamasām ākāraṃ bandhanaprakāraṃ cāha
analyzed: sattva rajaḥ tamasām ākāram bandhana prakāram ca āha

original: tatra sattvaṃ nirmalatvāt prakāśakam anāmayam /
analyzed: tatra sattvam nirmala tvāt prakāśakam anāmayam

original: sukhasaṅgena badhnāti jñānasaṅgena cānagha // BhG_14.6 //
analyzed: sukha saṅgena badhnāti jñāna saṅgena ca anagha

original: tatra sattvarajastamas tu sattvasya svarūpam īdṛśam nirmalatvāt prakāśakam;
analyzed: tatra sattva rajaḥ tamaḥ tu sattvasya svarūpam īdṛśam nirmala tvāt prakāśakam

original: prakāśasukhāvaraṇasvabhāvarahitatā nirmalatvam;
prakāśasukhajananaikāntasvabhāvatayā prakāśasukhahetubhūtam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: prakāśa sukha janana ekānta svabhāva tayā prakāśa sukha hetu bhūtam iti arthaḥ

original: prakāśaḥ vastuyāthātmyāvabodhaḥ /
anāmayam āmayākhyaṃ kāryaṃ na vidyata ity anāmayam;
analyzed: anāmayam āmaya ākhyam kāryam na vidyate iti anāmayam

original: arogatāhetur ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: aroga tā hetuḥ iti arthaḥ

original: eṣa sattvākhyo guṇo dehinam enaṃ sukhasaṅgena jñānasaṅgena ca badhnāti puruṣasya sukhasaṅgaṃ jñānasaṅgaṃ ca janayatītyarthaḥ/
analyzed: eṣa sattva ākhyaḥ guṇaḥ dehinam enam sukha saṅgena jñāna saṅgena ca badhnāti puruṣasya sukha saṅgam jñāna saṅgam ca janayati iti arthaḥ

original: jñānasukhayos saṅge hi jāte tatsādhaneṣu laukikavaidikeṣu pravartate;
analyzed: jñāna sukhayoḥ saṅge hi jāte tad sādhaneṣu laukika vaidikeṣu pravartate

original: tataś ca tatphalānubhavasādhanabhūtāsu yoniṣu jāyata iti sattvaṃ sukhajñānasaṅgadvāreṇa puruṣaṃ badhnāti /
analyzed: tatas ca tad phala anubhava sādhana bhūtāsu yoniṣu jāyate iti sattvam sukha jñāna saṅga dvāreṇa puruṣam badhnāti

original: jñānasukhajananaṃ punar api tayos saṅgajananaṃ ca sattvam ity uktaṃ bhavati // BhGR_14.6 //
analyzed: jñāna sukha jananam punar api tayoḥ saṅga jananam ca sattvam iti uktam bhavati

original: rajo rāgātmakaṃ viddhi tṛṣṇāsaṅgasamudbhavam /
analyzed: rajaḥ rāga ātmakam viddhi tṛṣṇā saṅga samudbhavam

original: tan nibadhnāti kaunteya karmasaṅgena dehinam // BhG_14.7 //
analyzed: tat nibadhnāti kaunteya karma saṅgena dehinam

original: rajo rāgātmakam rāgahetubhūtam /
analyzed: rajaḥ rāga ātmakam rāga hetu bhūtam

original: rāgaḥ yoṣitpuruṣayor anyānyaspṛhā /
analyzed: rāgaḥ yoṣit puruṣayoḥ anya anya spṛhā

original: tṛṇāsaṅgasamudbhavam tṛṣṇāsaṅgayor udbhavasthānam tṛṣṇāsaṅgahetubhūtam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tṛṇa asaṅga samudbhavam tṛṣṇā saṅgayoḥ udbhava sthānam tṛṣṇā saṅga hetu bhūtam iti arthaḥ

original: tṛṣṇā śabdādisarvaviṣayaspṛhā;
analyzed: tṛṣṇā śabda ādi sarva viṣaya spṛhā

original: saṅgaḥ putramitrādiṣu saṃbandhiṣu saṃśleṣaspṛhā /
analyzed: saṅgaḥ putra mitra ādiṣu saṃbandhiṣu saṃśleṣa spṛhā

original: tad rajaḥ dehinaṃ karmasu kriyāsu spṛhājananadvāreṇa nibadhnāti;
analyzed: tat rajaḥ dehinam karmasu kriyāsu spṛhā janana dvāreṇa nibadhnāti

original: kriyāsu hi spṛhayā yāḥ kriyā ārabhate dehī,
analyzed: kriyāsu hi spṛhayā yāḥ kriyāḥ ārabhate dehī

original: tāś ca puṇyapāparūpā iti tatphalānubhavasādhanabhūtāsu yoniṣu janmahetavo bhavanti /
analyzed: tāḥ ca puṇya pāpa rūpāḥ iti tad phala anubhava sādhana bhūtāsu yoniṣu janma hetavaḥ bhavanti

original: ataḥ karmasaṅgadvāreṇa rajo dehinaṃ nibadhnāti /
analyzed: atas karma saṅga dvāreṇa rajaḥ dehinam nibadhnāti

original: tad evaṃ rajo rāgatṛṣṇāsaṅgahetuḥ karmasaṅgahetuś cety uktaṃ bhavati // BhGR_14.7 //
analyzed: tat evam rajaḥ rāga tṛṣṇā saṅga hetuḥ karma saṅga hetuḥ ca iti uktam bhavati

original: tamas tv ajñānajaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarvadehinām /
analyzed: tamaḥ tu ajñāna jam viddhi mohanam sarva dehinām

original: pramādālasyanidrābhis tan nibadhnāti bhārata // BhG_14.8 //
analyzed: pramāda ālasya nidrābhiḥ tat nibadhnāti bhārata

original: jñānād anyad iha ajñānam abhipretam /
analyzed: jñānāt anyat iha ajñānam abhipretam

original: jñānaṃ vastuyathātmyāvabodhaḥ;
analyzed: jñānam vastu yathātmya avabodhaḥ

original: tasmād anyat tadviparyayajñānam /
analyzed: tasmāt anyat tad viparyaya jñānam

original: tamas tu vastuyāthātmyaviaparītaviṣayajñānajam /
analyzed: tamaḥ tu vastu yāthātmya viaparīta viṣaya jñāna jam

original: mohanaṃ sarvadehinām /
analyzed: mohanam sarva dehinām

original: moho viparyayajñānam;
analyzed: mohaḥ viparyaya jñānam

original: viparyayajñānahetur ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: viparyaya jñāna hetuḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tat tamaḥ pramādālasyanidrāhetutayā taddvāreṇa dehinaṃ nibadhnāti /
analyzed: tat tamaḥ pramāda ālasya nidrā hetutayā tad dvāreṇa dehinam nibadhnāti

original: pramādaḥ kartavyāt karmaṇo 'nyatra pravṛttihetubhūtam anavadhānam /
analyzed: pramādaḥ kartavyāt karmaṇaḥ anyatra pravṛtti hetu bhūtam anavadhānam

original: ālasyam karmasv anārambhasvabhāvaḥ;
analyzed: ālasyam karmasu anārambha svabhāvaḥ

original: stabdhateti yāvat /
analyzed: stabdha tā iti yāvat

original: puruṣasyendriyapravartanaśrāntyā sarvendriyapravartanoparatir nidrā;
analyzed: puruṣasya indriya pravartana śrāntyā sarva indriya pravartana uparatiḥ nidrā

original: tatra bāhyendriyapravartanoparamaḥ svapnaḥ;
analyzed: tatra bāhya indriya pravartana uparamaḥ svapnaḥ

original: manaso 'py uparatiḥ suṣuptiḥ // BhGR_14.8 //
analyzed: manasaḥ api uparatiḥ suṣuptiḥ

original: sattvādīnāṃ bandhadvārabhūteṣu pradhānāny āha
analyzed: sattva ādīnām bandha dvāra bhūteṣu pradhānāni āha

original: sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata /
analyzed: sattvam sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata

original: jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde sañjayaty uta // BhG_14.9 //
analyzed: jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde sañjayati uta

original: sattvaṃ sukhasaṅgapradhānam;
analyzed: sattvam sukha saṅga pradhānam

original: rajaḥ karmasaṅgapradhānam;
analyzed: rajaḥ karma saṅga pradhānam

original: tamas tu vastuyāthātmyajñānam āvṛtya viparītajñānahetutayā kartavyaviparītapravṛttisaṅgapradhānam // BhGR_14.9 //
analyzed: tamaḥ tu vastu yāthātmya jñānam āvṛtya viparīta jñāna hetutayā kartavya viparīta pravṛtti saṅga pradhānam

original: dehākārapariṇatāyāḥ prakṛteḥ svarūpānubandhinaḥ sattvādayo guṇāḥ;
analyzed: deha ākāra pariṇatāyāḥ prakṛteḥ svarūpa anubandhinaḥ sattva ādayaḥ guṇāḥ

original: te ca svarūpānubandhitvena sarvadā sarve vartante iti parasparaviruddhaṃ kāryaṃ kathaṃ janayantīty atra āha
analyzed: te ca sva rūpa anubandhi tvena sarvadā sarve vartante iti paraspara viruddham kāryam katham janayanti iti atra āha

original: rajas tamaś cābhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati bhārata /
analyzed: rajaḥ tamaḥ ca abhibhūya sattvam bhavati bhārata

original: rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaś caiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā // BhG_14.10 //
analyzed: rajaḥ sattvam tamaḥ ca eva tamaḥ sattvam rajaḥ tathā

original: yady api sattvādyas trayaḥ prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭātmasvarūpānubandhinaḥ,
analyzed: yadi api sattva ādyaḥ trayaḥ prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭa ātma svarūpa anubandhinaḥ

original: tathāpi prācīnakarmavaśād dehāpy āyanabhūtāhāravaiṣamyāc ca sattvādayaḥ parasparasamudbhavābhibhavarūpeṇa vartante /
analyzed: tathā api prācīna karma vaśāt dehā api āyana bhūta āhāra vaiṣamyāt ca sattva ādayaḥ paraspara samudbhava abhibhava rūpeṇa vartante

original: rajastamasī kadācid abhibhūya sattvam udriktaṃ vartate;
analyzed: rajaḥ tamasī kadācid abhibhūya sattvam udriktam vartate

original: tathā tamassattve abhibhūya rajaḥ kadācit;
analyzed: tathā tamaḥ sattve abhibhūya rajaḥ kadācid

original: kadācic ca rajassattve abhibhūya tamaḥ // BhGR_14.10 //
analyzed: kadācid ca rajaḥ sattve abhibhūya tamaḥ

original: tac ca kāryopalabhyaivāvagacched ity āha
analyzed: tat ca kāryā upalabhya eva avagacchet iti āha

original: sarvadvāreṣu dehe 'smin prakāśa upajāyate /
analyzed: sarva dvāreṣu dehe asmin prakāśaḥ upajāyate

original: jñānaṃ yadā tadā vidyād vivṛddhaṃ sattvam ity uta // BhG%_14.11/
analyzed: jñānam yadā tadā vidyāt vivṛddham sattvam iti uta

original: sarveṣu cakṣurādiṣu jñānadvāreṣu yadā vastuyāthātmyaprakāśe jñānam upajāyate,
analyzed: sarveṣu cakṣuḥ ādiṣu jñāna dvāreṣu yadā vastu yāthātmya prakāśe jñānam upajāyate

original: tadā tasmin dehe sattvaṃ pravṛddham iti vidyāt // BhGR_14.11 //
analyzed: tadā tasmin dehe sattvam pravṛddham iti vidyāt

original: lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā /
analyzed: lobhaḥ pravṛttiḥ ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā

original: rajasy etāni jāyante vivṛddhe bharatarṣabha // BhGR_14.12 //
analyzed: rajasi etāni jāyante vivṛddhe bharata ṛṣabha

original: lobhaḥ svakīyadravyasyātyāgaśīlatā;
analyzed: lobhaḥ svakīya dravyasya a tyāga śīla tā

original: pravṛttiḥ prayojanam anuddiśyāpi calanasvabhāvātā;
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ prayojanam an uddiśya api

original: ārambhaḥ karmaṇām phalasādhanabhūtānāṃ karmaṇām ārambhaḥ;
analyzed: ārambhaḥ karmaṇām phala sādhana bhūtānām karmaṇām ārambhaḥ

original: aśamaḥ indriyānuratiḥ;
spṛhā viṣayecchā /
analyzed: spṛhā viṣaya icchā

original: etāni rajasi pravṛddhe jāyante /
analyzed: etāni rajasi pravṛddhe jāyante

original: yadā lobhādayo vartante,
analyzed: yadā lobha ādayaḥ vartante

original: tadā rajaḥ pravṛddham iti vidyād ityarthaḥ // BhGR_14.12 //
analyzed: tadā rajaḥ pravṛddham iti vidyāt iti arthaḥ

original: aprakāśo 'pravṛttiś ca pramādo moha eva ca /
analyzed: aprakāśaḥ apravṛttiḥ ca pramādaḥ mohaḥ eva ca

original: tamasy etāni jāyante vivṛddhe kurunandana // BhGR_14.13 //
analyzed: tamasi etāni jāyante vivṛddhe kuru nandana

original: aprakāśaḥ jñānānudayaḥ;
apravṛttiś ca stabdhatā;
analyzed: apravṛttiḥ ca stabdha tā

original: pramādaḥ akāryapravṛttiphalam anavadhānam;
mohaḥ viparītajñānam /
analyzed: mohaḥ viparīta jñānam

original: etāni tamasi pravṛddhe jāyante /
analyzed: etāni tamasi pravṛddhe jāyante

original: etais tamaḥ pravṛddham iti vidyāt // BhGR_14.13 //
analyzed: etaiḥ tamaḥ pravṛddham iti vidyāt

original: yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti dehabhṛt /
analyzed: yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayam yāti dehabhṛt

original: tadottamavidāṃ lokān amalān pratipadyate // BhGR_14.14 //
analyzed: tadā uttama vidām lokān amalān pratipadyate

original: yadā sattvaṃ pravṛddhaṃ tadā,
analyzed: yadā sattvam pravṛddham tadā

original: sattve pravṛddhe dehabhṛt pralayaṃ maraṇaṃ yāti cet,
analyzed: sattve pravṛddhe dehabhṛt pralayam maraṇam yāti ced

original: uttamavidām uttamatattvavidām ātmayāthātmyavidām lokān samūhān amalān malarahitān ajñānarahitān,
analyzed: uttama vidām uttama tattva vidām ātma yāthātmya vidām lokān samūhān amalān mala rahitān ajñāna rahitān

original: pratipadyate prāpnoti /
analyzed: pratipadyate prāpnoti

original: sattve pravṛddhe tu mṛtaḥ ātmavidāṃ kuleṣu janitvā ātmayāthātmyajñānasādhaneṣu puṇyakarmasv adhikarotīty uktaṃ bhavati // BhGR_14.14 //
analyzed: sattve pravṛddhe tu mṛtaḥ ātma vidām kuleṣu janitvā ātma yāthātmya jñāna sādhaneṣu puṇya karmasu adhikaroti iti uktam bhavati

original: rajasi pralayaṃ gatvā karmasaṅgiṣu jāyate /
analyzed: rajasi pralayam gatvā karma saṅgiṣu jāyate

original: rajasi pravṛddhe maraṇaṃ prāpya phalārthaṃ karma kurvatāṃ kuleṣu jāyate;
analyzed: rajasi pravṛddhe maraṇam prāpya phala artham karma kurvatām kuleṣu jāyate

original: tatra janitvā svargādiphalasādhanakarmasv adhikarotītyarthaḥ //
analyzed: tatra janitvā svarga ādi phala sādhana karmasu adhikaroti iti arthaḥ

original: tathā pralīnas tamasi mūḍhayoniṣu jāyate // BhGR_14.15 //
analyzed: tathā pralīnaḥ tamasi mūḍha yoniṣu jāyate

original: tathā tamasi pravṛddhe mṛtā mūḍhayoniṣu śvasūkarādiyoniṣu jāyate /
analyzed: tathā tamasi pravṛddhe mṛtā mūḍha yoniṣu śva sūkara ādi yoniṣu jāyate

original: sakalapuruṣārthārambhānarho jāyata ityarthaḥ // BhGR_14.15 //
analyzed: sakala puruṣa artha ārambha anarhaḥ jāyate iti arthaḥ

original: karmaṇaḥ sukṛtasyāhuḥ sāttvikaṃ nirmalaṃ phalam /
analyzed: karmaṇaḥ su kṛtasya āhuḥ sāttvikam nirmalam phalam

original: rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam // BhGR_14.16 //
analyzed: rajasaḥ tu phalam duḥkham ajñānam tamasaḥ phalam

original: evaṃ sattvapravṛddhau maraṇam upagamyātmavidāṃ kule jātenānuṣṭhitasya sukṛtasya phalābhisandhirahitasya
analyzed: evam sattva pravṛddhau maraṇam upagamya ātma vidām kule jātena anuṣṭhitasya sukṛtasya phala abhisandhiḥ rahitasya

original: madārādhanarūpasya karmaṇaḥ phalaṃ punar api tato 'dhikasattvajanitaṃ nirmalaṃ duḥkhagandharahitaṃ
analyzed: mad ārādhana rūpasya karmaṇaḥ phalam punar api tatas adhika sattva janitam nirmalam duḥkha gandha rahitam

original: bhavatīty āhuḥ sattvaguṇapariṇāmavidaḥ /
analyzed: bhavati iti āhuḥ sattva guṇa pariṇāma vidaḥ

original: antyakālapravṛddhasya rajasas tu phalaṃ phalasādhanakarmasaṅgikulajanmaphalābhisandhipūrvakakarmārambhatatphalānubhavapunarjanmarajovṛddhiphalābhisandhipūrvaka
analyzed: antya kāla pravṛddhasya rajasaḥ tu phalam phala sādhana karma saṅgi kula janma phala abhisandhi pūrvaka karma ārambha tad phala anubhava punarjanma rajaḥ vṛddhi phala abhisandhi pūrvaka

original: karmārambhaparamparārūpaṃ sāṃsārikaduḥkhaprāyam evety āhuḥ tadguṇayāthātmyavidaḥ /
analyzed: karma ārambha paramparā rūpam sāṃsārika duḥkha prāyam eva iti āhuḥ tad guṇa yāthātmya vidaḥ

original: ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam evam antyakālapravṛddhasya tamasaḥ phalam ajñānaparamparārūpam // BhGR_14.16 //
analyzed: ajñānam tamasaḥ phalam evam antya kāla pravṛddhasya tamasaḥ phalam ajñāna paramparā rūpam

original: tad adhikasattvādijanitaṃ nirmalādiphalaṃ kim ity atrāha
analyzed: tat adhika sattva ādi janitam nirmala ādi phalam kim iti atra āha

original: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca /
analyzed: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānam rajasaḥ lobhaḥ eva ca

original: pramādamohau tamaso bhavato 'jñānam eva ca // BhGR_14.17 //
analyzed: pramāda mohau tamasaḥ bhavataḥ ajñānam eva ca

original: evaṃ paramparayā jātād adhikasattvād ātmayāthātmyāparokṣyarūpaṃ jñānaṃ jāyate /
analyzed: evam paramparayā jātāt adhika sattvāt ātma yāthātmya āparokṣya rūpam jñānam jāyate

original: tathā pravṛddhād rajasaḥ svargādiphalalobho jāyate /
analyzed: tathā pravṛddhāt rajasaḥ svarga ādi phala lobhaḥ jāyate

original: tathā pravṛddhāc ca tamasaḥ pramādaḥ anavadhānanimittā asatkarmaṇi pravṛttiḥ;
analyzed: tathā pravṛddhāt ca tamasaḥ pramādaḥ anavadhāna nimittā asat karmaṇi pravṛttiḥ

original: tataś ca mohaḥ viparītajñānam;
analyzed: tatas ca mohaḥ viparīta jñānam

original: tataś cādhikataraṃ tamaḥ;
analyzed: tatas ca adhikataram tamaḥ

original: tataś cājñānam jñānābhāvaḥ // BhGR_14.17 //
analyzed: tatas ca ajñānam jñāna abhāvaḥ

original: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhvam gacchanti sattva sthāḥ madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ

original: jaghanyaguṇavṛttisthā adho gacchanti tāmasāḥ // BhGR_14.18 //
analyzed: jaghanya guṇa vṛtti sthāḥ adhas gacchanti tāmasāḥ

original: evam uktena prakāreṇa sattvasthā ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti krameṇa saṃsārabandhān mokṣaṃ gacchanti /
analyzed: evam uktena prakāreṇa sattva sthāḥ ūrdhvam gacchanti krameṇa saṃsāra bandhāt mokṣam gacchanti

original: rajasaḥ svargādiphalalobhakaratvād rājasāḥ phalasādhanabhutaṃ karmānuṣṭhāya tatphalam anubhūya punar api janitvā tad eva karmānutiṣṭhantīti  #
analyzed: rajasaḥ svarga ādi phala lobha kara tvāt rājasāḥ phala sādhana bhutam karma anuṣṭhāya tad phalam anubhūya punar api janitvā tat eva karma anutiṣṭhanti iti

original: madhye tiṣṭhanti /
analyzed: madhye tiṣṭhanti

original: punarāvṛttirūpatayā duḥkhaprāyam eva tat /
analyzed: punarāvṛtti rūpa tayā duḥkha prāyam eva tat

original: tāmasās tu jaghanyaguṇavṛttisthā uttarottaranikṛṣṭatamoguṇavṛttiṣu sthitā adho gacchanti antyatvam,
analyzed: tāmasāḥ tu jaghanya guṇa vṛtti sthāḥ uttara uttara nikṛṣṭa tamaḥ guṇa vṛttiṣu sthitāḥ adhas gacchanti antya tvam

original: tatas tiryaktvam,
analyzed: tatas tiryaktvam

original: tataḥ krimikīṭādijanma,
analyzed: tatas krimi kīṭa ādi janma

original: sthāvaratvam,
analyzed: sthāvara tvam

original: tato 'pi gulmalatātvam,
analyzed: tatas api gulma latā tvam

original: tataś ca śilākāṣṭhaloṣṭatṛṇāditvaṃ gacchantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_14.18 //
analyzed: tatas ca śilā kāṣṭha loṣṭa tṛṇa ādi tvam gacchanti iti arthaḥ

original: āhāraviśeṣaiḥ phalābhisandhirahitasukṛtaviśeṣaiś ca paramparayā pravardhitasattvānāṃ guṇātyayadvāreṇa ūrdhvagamanaprakāram āha
analyzed: āhāra viśeṣaiḥ phala abhisandhiḥ ahita sukṛta viśeṣaiḥ ca paramparayā pravardhita sattvānām guṇa atyaya dvāreṇa ūrdhvagamana prakāram āha

original: nānyaṃ guṇebhyaḥ kartāraṃ yadā draṣṭānupaśyati /
analyzed: na anyam guṇebhyaḥ kartāram yadā draṣṭā anupaśyati

original: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vetti madbhāvaṃ so 'dhigacchati // BhGR_14.19 //
analyzed: guṇebhyaḥ ca param vetti mad bhāvam saḥ adhigacchati

original: evaṃ sāttvikāhārasevayā phalābhisandhirahitabhagavadārādhanarūpakarmānuṣṭhānaiś ca
analyzed: evam sāttvika āhāra sevayā phala abhisandhiḥ ahita bhagavat ārādhana rūpa karma anuṣṭhānaiḥ ca

original: rajastamasī sarvātmanābhibhūya utkṛṣṭasattvaniṣṭho yadāyaṃ guṇebhyo 'nyaṃ kartāraṃ
analyzed: rajaḥ tamasī sarva ātmanā abhibhūya utkṛṣṭa sattva niṣṭhaḥ yadā ayam guṇebhyaḥ anyam kartāram

original: nānupaśyati guṇā eva svānuguṇapravṛttiṣu kartāra iti paśyati;
analyzed: na anupaśyati guṇāḥ eva sva anuguṇa pravṛttiṣu kartāraḥ iti paśyati

original: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vetti kartṛbhyo guṇebhyaś ca param anyam ātmānam akartāraṃ vetti sa madbhāvam adhigacchati mama yo bhāvas tam adhigacchati
analyzed: guṇebhyaḥ ca param vetti kartṛbhyaḥ guṇebhyaḥ ca param anyam ātmānam akartāram vetti sa mad bhāvam adhigacchati mama yaḥ bhāvaḥ tam adhigacchati

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati “ātmanaḥ svataḥ pariśuddhasvabhāvasya pūrvapūrvakarmamūlaguṇasaṅganimittaṃ vividhakarmasu kartṛtvam;
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati ātmanaḥ svatas pariśuddha svabhāvasya pūrva pūrva karma mūla guṇa saṅga nimittam vividha karmasu kartṛ tvam

original: ātmā svatas tv akartā aparicchinnajñānaikākāraḥ” ity evam ātmānaṃ yadā paśyati,
analyzed: ātmā svatas tu akartā aparicchinna jñāna eka ākāraḥ iti evam ātmānam yadā paśyati

original: tadā madbhāvam adhigacchatīti // BhGR_14.19 //
analyzed: tadā mad bhāvam adhigacchati iti

original: kartṛbhyo guṇebhyo 'nyam akartāram ātmānaṃ paśyan bhagavadbhāvam adhigacchatīty uktam;
analyzed: kartṛbhyaḥ guṇebhyaḥ anyam akartāram ātmānam paśyan bhagavat bhāvam adhigacchati iti uktam

original: sa bhagavadbhāvaḥ kīdṛśa ity ata āha
analyzed: sa bhagavat bhāvaḥ kīdṛśaḥ iti atas āha

original: guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī dehasamudbhavān /
analyzed: guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī deha samudbhavān

original: janmamṛtyujarāduḥkhair vimukto 'mṛtam aśnute // BhGR_14.20 //
analyzed: janma mṛtyu jarā duḥkhaiḥ vimuktaḥ amṛtam aśnute

original: ayaṃ dehī dehasamudbhavān dehākārapariṇataprakṛtisamudbhavān etān sattvādīn trīn
analyzed: ayam dehī deha samudbhavān deha ākāra pariṇata prakṛti samudbhavān etān sattva ādīn trīn

original: guṇān atītya tebhyo 'nyaṃ jñānaikākāram ātmānaṃ paśyan janmamṛtyujarāduhkhair vimuktaḥ
analyzed: guṇān atītya tebhyaḥ anyam jñāna eka ākāram ātmānam paśyan janma mṛtyu jarā duhkhaiḥ vimuktaḥ

original: amṛtam ātmānam anubhavati /
analyzed: amṛtam ātmānam anubhavati

original: eṣa madbhāva ityarthaḥ // BhGR_14.20 //
analyzed: eṣa mad bhāvaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: atha guṇātītasya svarūpasūcanācāraprakāraṃ guṇātyayahetuṃ ca pṛcchan arjuna uvāca
analyzed: atha guṇa atītasya svarūpa sūcana ācāra prakāram guṇa atyaya hetum ca pṛcchan arjunaḥ uvāca

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: kair liṅgais triguṇān etān atīto bhavati prabho /
analyzed: kaiḥ liṅgaiḥ triguṇān etān atītaḥ bhavati prabho

original: kim ācāraḥ kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate // BhGR_14.21 //
analyzed: kim ācāraḥ katham ca etān trīn guṇān ativartate

original: sattvādīn trīn guṇān etān atītaḥ kair liṅgaiḥ kair lakṣaṇaiḥ upalakṣito bhavati?
analyzed: sattva ādīn trīn guṇān etān atītaḥ kaiḥ liṅgaiḥ kaiḥ lakṣaṇaiḥ upalakṣitaḥ bhavati

original: kim ācāraḥ kenācāreṇa yukto 'sau?
analyzed: kim ācāraḥ kena ācāreṇa yuktaḥ asau

original: asya svarūpāvagatiliṅgabhūtācāraḥ kīdṛśa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: asya svarūpa avagati liṅga bhūta ācāraḥ kīdṛśaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: kathaṃ caitān kenopāyena sattvādīṃs trīn guṇān ativartate? // BhGR_14.21 //
analyzed: katham ca etān kena upāyena sattva ādīn trīn guṇān ativartate

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava /
analyzed: prakāśam ca pravṛttim ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava

original: na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati // BhGR_14.22 //
analyzed: na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati

original: ātmavyatirikteṣu vastvaniṣṭeṣu saṃpravṛttāni sattvarajastamasāṃ kāryāṇi prakāśapravṛttimohākhyāni yo na dveṣṭi,
analyzed: ātma vyatirikteṣu vastu aniṣṭeṣu saṃpravṛttāni sattva rajaḥ tamasām kāryāṇi prakāśa pravṛtti moha ākhyāni yaḥ na dveṣṭi

original: tathā ātmavyatirikteṣv iṣṭeṣu vastuṣu tāny eva nivṛttāni na kāṅkṣati // BhGR_14.22 //
analyzed: tathā ātma vyatirikteṣu iṣṭeṣu vastuṣu tāni eva nivṛttāni na kāṅkṣati

original: udāsīnavad āsīno guṇair yo na vicālyate /
analyzed: udāsīna vat āsīnaḥ guṇaiḥ yaḥ na vicālyate

original: guṇā vartanta ity eva yo 'vatiṣṭhati neṅgate // BhGR_14.23 //
analyzed: guṇāḥ vartante iti eva yaḥ avatiṣṭhati na iṅgate

original: udāsīnavad āsīnaḥ guṇavyatiriktātmāvalokanatṛptyā anyatrodāsīnavad āsīnaḥ,
analyzed: udāsīna vat āsīnaḥ guṇa vyatirikta ātma avalokana tṛptyā anyatra udāsīna vat āsīnaḥ

original: guṇair dveṣākāṅkṣādvāreṇe yo na vicālyate guṇāḥ sveṣu kāryeṣu prakāśādiṣu vartanta ity anusandhāya yas tūṣṇīm avatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: guṇaiḥ yaḥ na vicālyate guṇāḥ sveṣu kāryeṣu prakāśa ādiṣu vartante iti anusandhāya yaḥ tūṣṇīm avatiṣṭhate

original: neṅgate na guṇakāryānuguṇaṃ ceṣṭate // BhGR_14.23 //
analyzed: na iṅgate na guṇa kārya anuguṇam ceṣṭate

original: samaduḥkhasukhaḥ svasthaḥ samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ /
analyzed: sama duḥkha sukhaḥ svasthaḥ sama loṣṭa aśma kāñcanaḥ

original: tulyapriyāpriyo dhīras tulyanindātmasaṃstutiḥ // BhGR_14.24 //
analyzed: tulya priya apriyaḥ dhīraḥ tulya nindā ātma saṃstutiḥ

original: mānāvamānayos tulyas tulyo mitrāripakṣayoḥ /
analyzed: māna avamānayoḥ tulyaḥ tulyaḥ mitra ari pakṣayoḥ

original: sarvārambhaparityāgī guṇātītaḥ sa ucyate // BhGR_14.25 //
analyzed: sarva ārambha parityāgī guṇa atītaḥ saḥ ucyate

original: samaduḥkhasukhaḥ sukhaduḥkhayos samacittaḥ,
analyzed: sama duḥkha sukhaḥ sukha duḥkhayoḥ sama cittaḥ

original: svasthaḥ svasmin sthitaḥ /
analyzed: svasthaḥ svasmin sthitaḥ

original: svātmaikapriyatvena tadvyatiriktaputrādijanmamaraṇādisukhaduḥkhayos samacitta ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: svātma eka priya tvena tad vyatirikta putra ādi janma maraṇa ādi sukha duḥkhayoḥ samacittaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tata eva samaloṣṭāśmakāñcanaḥ /
analyzed: tatas eva sama loṣṭa aśma kāñcanaḥ

original: tata eva tulyapriyāpriyaḥ tulyapriyāpriyaviṣayaḥ /
analyzed: tatas eva tulya priya apriyaḥ tulya priya apriya viṣayaḥ

original: dhīraḥ prakṛtyātmavivekakuśalaḥ /
analyzed: dhīraḥ prakṛti ātma viveka kuśalaḥ

original: tata eva tulyanindātmasaṃstutiḥ ātmani manuṣyādyabhimānakṛtaguṇāguṇanimittastutinindayoḥ svāsaṃbandhānusandhānena tulyacittaḥ /
analyzed: tatas eva tulya nindā ātma saṃstutiḥ ātmani manuṣya ādi abhimāna kṛta guṇa aguṇa nimitta stuti nindayoḥ sva asaṃbandha anusandhānena tulya cittaḥ

original: tatprayuktamānāvamānayoḥ tatprayuktamitrāripakṣayor api svasaṃbandhābhāvād eva tulyacittaḥ /
analyzed: tad prayukta māna avamānayoḥ tad prayukta mitra ari pakṣayoḥ api sva saṃbandha abhāvāt eva tulya cittaḥ

original: tathā dehitvaprayuktasarvārambhaparityāgī /
analyzed: tathā dehi tva prayukta sarva ārambha parityāgī

original: ya evaṃbhūtaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ evaṃbhūtaḥ

original: sa guṇātīta ucyate // BhGR_14.24,25 //
analyzed: sa guṇa atītaḥ ucyate

original: athaivaṃrūpaguṇātyaye pradhānahetum āha
analyzed: atha evaṃrūpa guṇa atyaye pradhāna hetum āha

original: māṃ ca yo 'vyabhicāreṇa bhaktiyogena sevate /
analyzed: mām ca yaḥ avyabhicāreṇa bhakti yogena sevate

original: sa guṇān samatītyaitān brahmabhūyāya kalpate // BhGR_14.26 //
analyzed: sa guṇān samatītya etān brahma bhūyāya kalpate

original: “nānyaṃ guṇebhyaḥ kartāram” ityādinoktena prakṛtyātmavivekānusandhānamātreṇa na guṇātyayaḥ saṃpatsyate;
analyzed: na anyam guṇebhyaḥ kartāram ityādinā uktena prakṛti ātma viveka anusandhāna mātreṇa na guṇa atyayaḥ saṃpatsyate

original: tasyānādikālapravṛttiviparītavāsanābādhyatvasaṃbhavāt /
mām satyasaṅkalpaṃ paramakāruṇikam āśritavātsalyajaladhim,
analyzed: mām satya saṅkalpam parama kāruṇikam āśrita vātsalya jaladhim

original: avyabhicārena aikāntyaviśiṣṭena bhaktiyogena ca yaḥ sevate,
analyzed: avyabhicārena aikāntya viśiṣṭena bhakti yogena ca yaḥ sevate

original: sa etān sattvādīn guṇān duratyayān atītya brahmabhūyāya brahmatvāya kalpate;
analyzed: saḥ etān sattva ādīn guṇān duratyayān atītya brahma bhūyāya brahmatvāya kalpate

original: brahmabhāvayogyo bhavati /
analyzed: brahma bhāva yogyaḥ bhavati

original: yathāvasthitam ātmānam amṛtam avyayaṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_14.26 //
analyzed: yathā avasthitam ātmānam amṛtam avyayam prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: brahmaṇo hi pratiṣṭhāham amṛtasyāvyayasya ca /
analyzed: brahmaṇaḥ hi pratiṣṭhā aham amṛtasya avyayasya ca

original: śāśvatasya ca dharmasya sukhasyaikāntikasya ca // BhGR_14.27 //
analyzed: śāśvatasya ca dharmasya sukhasya aikāntikasya ca

original: hiśabdo hetau;
analyzed: hi śabdaḥ hetau

original: yasmād aham avyabhicāribhaktiyogena sevito 'mṛtasyāvyayasya ca brahmaṇaḥ pratiṣṭhā,
analyzed: yasmāt aham avyabhicāri bhakti yogena sevitaḥ amṛtasya avyayasya ca brahmaṇaḥ pratiṣṭhā

original: tathā śāśvatasya ca dharmasya atiśayitanityāiśvaryasya;
analyzed: tathā śāśvatasya ca dharmasya atiśayita nitya aiśvaryasya

original: eikāntikasya ca sukhasya “vāsudevaḥ sarvam” ityādinā nirdiṣṭasya jñāninaḥ prāpyasya sukhasyetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: ca sukhasya vāsudevaḥ sarvam ityādinā nirdiṣṭasya jñāninaḥ prāpyasya sukhasya iti arthaḥ

original: yady api śāśvatadharmaśabdaḥ prāpakavacanaḥ,
analyzed: yadi api śāśvata dharma śabdaḥ prāpaka vacanaḥ

original: tathāpi pūrvottarayoḥ prāpyarūpatvena tatsāhacaryādayam api prāpyalakṣakaḥ /
analyzed: tathā api pūrva uttarayoḥ prāpya rūpa tvena tad sāhacaryāt ayam api prāpya lakṣakaḥ

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati pūrvatra “daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā /
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati pūrvatra daivī hi eṣā guṇa mayī mama māyā duratyayā

original: mām eva ye prapadyante” ity ārabhya guṇātyayasya tatpūrvakākṣarair bhagavatprāptīnāṃ
analyzed: mām eva ye prapadyante iti ārabhya guṇa atyayasya tad pūrvaka akṣaraiḥ bhagavat prāptīnām

original: ca bhagavatprapattyekopāyatāyāḥ pratipāditatvād ekāntabhagavatprapattyekopāyo guṇātyayaḥ
analyzed: ca bhagavat prapatti eka upāya tāyāḥ pratipādita tvāt ekānta bhagavat prapatti eka upāyaḥ guṇātyayaḥ

original: tatpūrvakabrahmabhāvaś ceti // BhGR_14.27 //
analyzed: tad pūrvaka brahma bhāvaḥ ca iti

original: kṣetrādhyāye kṣetrakṣetrajñabhūtayoḥ prakṛtipuruṣayoḥ svarūpaṃ viśodhya viśuddhasyāparicchinnajñānaikākārasyaiva
analyzed: kṣetra adhyāye kṣetra kṣetrajña bhūtayoḥ prakṛti puruṣayoḥ svarūpam viśodhya viśuddhasya aparicchinna jñāna eka ākārasya eva

original: puruṣasya prākṛtaguṇasaṅgapravāhanimitto devādyākārapariṇataprakṛtisaṃbandho 'nādir ity uktam /
analyzed: puruṣasya prākṛta guṇa saṅga pravāha nimittaḥ deva ādi ākāra pariṇata prakṛti saṃbandhaḥ anādiḥ iti uktam

original: anantare cādhyāye puruṣasya kāryakāraṇobhayāvasthaprakṛtisaṃbandho guṇasaṅgamūlo
analyzed: anantare ca adhyāye puruṣasya kārya kāraṇa ubhaya avastha prakṛti saṃbandhaḥ guṇa saṅga mūlaḥ

original: bhagavataiva kṛta ity uktvā guṇasaṅgaprakāraṃ savistaraṃ pratipādya guṇasaṅganivṛttipūrvakātmayāthātmyāvāptiś
analyzed: bhagavatā eva kṛtaḥ iti uktvā guṇa saṅga prakāram sa vistaram pratipādya guṇa saṅga nivṛtti pūrvaka ātma yāthātmya avāptiḥ

original: ca bhagavadbhaktimūlety uktam /
analyzed: ca bhagavat bhakti mūlā iti uktam

original: idānīṃ bhajanīyasya bhagavataḥ kṣarākṣarātmakabaddhamuktavibhūtimattām,
analyzed: idānīm bhajanīyasya bhagavataḥ kṣara akṣara ātmaka baddha mukta vibhūtimat tām

original: vibhūtibhūtāt kṣarākṣarapuruṣadvayān nikhilaheyapratyanīkakalyāṇaiktānatayā atyantotkarṣeṇa visajātīyasya bhagavataḥ puruṣottamatvaṃ ca vaktum  #
analyzed: vibhūti bhūtāt kṣara akṣara puruṣa dvayāt atyanta utkarṣeṇa visajātīyasya bhagavataḥ puruṣottama tvam ca vaktum

original: ārabhate /
analyzed: ārabhate

original: tatra tāvad asaṅgarūpaśastracchinnabandhām akṣarākhyavibhūtiṃ vaktuṃ chedyarūpabandhākāreṇa vitatam acitpariṇāmaviśeṣam aśvatthavṛkṣākāram
analyzed: tatra tāvat asaṅga rūpa śastra chinna bandhām akṣara ākhya vibhūtim vaktum chedya rūpa bandha ākāreṇa vitatam acit pariṇāma viśeṣam aśvattha vṛkṣa ākāram

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: ūrdhvamūlam adhaśśākham aśvatthaṃ prāhur avyayam /
analyzed: ūrdhva mūlam adhas śākham aśvattham prāhuḥ avyayam

original: chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yas taṃ veda sa vedavit // BhG_15.1 //
analyzed: chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yaḥ tam veda sa veda vid

original: yaṃ saṃsārākhyam aśvatham ūrdhvamūlam adhaś śākham avyayaṃ prāhuḥ śrutayaḥ,
analyzed: yam saṃsāra ākhyam aśvatham ūrdhva mūlam adhas śākham avyayam prāhuḥ śrutayaḥ

original: “ūrdhvamūlo 'vākchākha eṣo 'śvatthas sanātanaḥ“,
analyzed: ūrdhva mūlaḥ avāc śākhaḥ eṣaḥ aśvatthaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: “ūrdhvamūlam avākchākhaṃ vṛkṣaṃ yo veda saṃprti” ityādyāḥ /
analyzed: ūrdhva mūlam vṛkṣam yaḥ veda ityādyāḥ

original: saptalokopariniviṣṭacaturmukhāditvena tasyordhvamūlatvam /
analyzed: sapta loka upari niviṣṭa caturmukha ādi tvena tasya ūrdhva mūla tvam

original: pṛthivīnivāsisakalanarapaśumṛgakrimikīṭapataṅgasthāvarāntatayā adhaś śākhatvam /
analyzed: pṛthivī nivāsi sakala nara paśu mṛga krimi kīṭa pataṅga sthāvara anta tayā adhas śākha tvam

original: asaṅgahetubhūtād a samyagjñanodayāt pravāharūpeṇācchedyatvenāvyayatvam /
analyzed: asaṅga hetu bhūtāt samyak jñanā udayāt pravāha rūpeṇa ācchedya tvena avyaya tvam

original: yasya cāśvatthasya chandāṃsi parṇāny āhuḥ /
analyzed: yasya ca aśvatthasya chandāṃsi parṇāni āhuḥ

original: chandāṃsi śrutayaḥ,
analyzed: chandāṃsi śrutayaḥ

original: “vāyavyaṃ śvetam ālabheta bhūtikāmaḥ“,
analyzed: vāyavyam śvetam ālabheta bhūti kāmaḥ

original: “aindrāgnam ekādaśa kapālaṃ nirvapet prajākāmaḥ” ityādiśrutipratipāditaiḥ kāmyakarmabhir vardhate 'yaṃ saṃsāravṛkṣa iti chandāṃsy evāsya parṇāni
analyzed: aindrāgnam ekādaśa kapālam nirvapet prajā kāmaḥ ityādi śruti pratipāditaiḥ kāmya karmabhiḥ vardhate ayam saṃsāra vṛkṣaḥ iti chandāṃsi eva asya parṇāni

original: parṇair hi vṛkṣo vardhate /
analyzed: parṇaiḥ hi vṛkṣaḥ vardhate

original: yas tam evaṃbhūtam aśvatthaṃ veda, sa vedavit /
analyzed: yaḥ tam evaṃbhūtam aśvattham veda sa veda vid

original: vedo hi saṃsāravṛkṣacchedopāyaṃ vadati;
analyzed: vedaḥ hi saṃsāra vṛkṣa cheda upāyam vadati

original: chedyavṛkṣasvarūpajñānaṃ chedanopāyajñanopayogīti vedavid ity ucyate // BhGR_15.1 //
analyzed: chedya vṛkṣa sva rūpa jñānam chedana upāya jñanā upayogī iti veda vid iti ucyate

original: adhaś cordhvaṃ ca prasṛtās tasya śākhā guṇapravṛddhā viṣayapravālāḥ /
analyzed: adhas ca ūrdhvam ca prasṛtāḥ tasya śākhāḥ guṇa pravṛddhāḥ viṣaya pravālāḥ

original: tasya manuṣyādiśākhasya vṛkṣasya tattatkarmakṛtā aparāś ca adhaḥ śākhāḥ punar api manuṣyapaśvādirūpeṇa prasṛtā bhavanti;
analyzed: tasya manuṣya ādi śākhasya vṛkṣasya tad tad karma kṛtāḥ aparāḥ ca adhas śākhāḥ punar api manuṣya paśu ādi rūpeṇa prasṛtāḥ bhavanti

original: ūrdhvaṃ ca gandharvayakṣadevādirūpeṇa prasṛtā bhavanti /
analyzed: ūrdhvam ca gandharva yakṣa deva ādi rūpeṇa prasṛtāḥ bhavanti

original: tāś ca guṇapravṛddhāḥ guṇaiḥ sattvādibhiḥ pravṛddhāḥ,
analyzed: tāḥ ca guṇa pravṛddhāḥ guṇaiḥ sattva ādibhiḥ pravṛddhāḥ

original: viṣayapravālāḥ śabdādiviṣayapallavāḥ /
analyzed: viṣaya pravālāḥ śabda ādi viṣaya pallavāḥ

original: katham ity atrāha
analyzed: katham iti atra āha

original: adhaś ca mūlāny anusaṃtatāni karmānubandhīni manuṣyaloke // BhG_15.2 //
analyzed: adhas ca mūlāni anusaṃtatāni karma anubandhīni manuṣya loke

original: brahmalokamūlasyāsya vṛkṣasya manuṣyāgrasya,
analyzed: brahma loka mūlasya asya vṛkṣasya manuṣya agrasya

original: adho manuṣyaloke mūlāny anusantatāni;
analyzed: adhas manuṣya loke mūlāni anusantatāni

original: tāni ca karmānubandhīni karmāṇy evānubandhīni mūlāni adho manuṣyaloke ca bhavantītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tāni ca karma anubandhīni karmāṇi eva anubandhīni mūlāni adhas manuṣya loke ca bhavanti iti arthaḥ

original: manuṣyatvāvasthāyāṃ kṛtair hi karmabhiḥ adho manuṣyapaśvādayaḥ,
analyzed: manuṣya tva avasthāyām kṛtaiḥ hi karmabhiḥ adhas manuṣya paśu ādayaḥ

original: ūrdhvaṃ ca devādayo bhavanti // BhGR_15.2 //
analyzed: ūrdhvam ca deva ādayaḥ bhavanti

original: na rūpam asyeha tathopalabhyate nānto na cādir na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā /
analyzed: na rūpam asya iha tathā upalabhyate na antaḥ na ca ādiḥ na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā

original: asya vṛkṣasya caturmukhāditvenordhvamūlatvam,
analyzed: asya vṛkṣasya catur mukha ādi tvena ūrdhva mūla tvam

original: tatsantānaparamparayā manuṣyāgratvenādhaś śākhatvam,
analyzed: tad santāna paramparayā manuṣya agra tvena adhas śākha tvam

original: manuṣyatve kṛtaiḥ karmabhir mūlabhūtaiḥ punar apy adhaś cordhvaṃ ca prasṛtaśākhatvam iti yathedaṃ rūpaṃ nirdiṣṭam,
analyzed: manuṣya tve kṛtaiḥ karmabhiḥ mūla bhūtaiḥ punar api adhas ca ūrdhvam ca prasṛta śākhā tvam iti yathā idam rūpam nirdiṣṭam

original: na tathā saṃsāribhir upalabhyate /
analyzed: na tathā saṃsāribhiḥ upalabhyate

original: manuṣyo 'haṃ devadattasya putro yajñadattasya pitā tadanurūpaprigrahaś cety etāvanmātram upalabhyate /
analyzed: manuṣyaḥ aham devadattasya putraḥ yajñadattasya pitā tad anurūpa prigrahaḥ ca iti etāvat mātram upalabhyate

original: tathā asya vṛkṣasya antaḥ vināśo 'pi guṇamayabhogeṣv asaṅgakṛta iti nopalabhyate /
analyzed: tathā asya vṛkṣasya antar vināśaḥ api guṇa maya bhogeṣu asaṅga kṛtaḥ iti nā upalabhyate

original: tathā asya guṇasaṅga evādir iti nopalabhyate /
analyzed: tathā asya guṇa saṅgaḥ eva ādiḥ iti na upalabhyate

original: tasya pratiṣṭhā ca anātmani ātmābhimānarūpam ajñānam iti nopalabhyate;
analyzed: tasya pratiṣṭhā ca anātmani ātma abhimāna rūpam ajñānam iti na upalabhyate

original: pratitiṣṭhaty asminn+eveti hy ajñānam evāsya pratiṣṭhā // BhGR_15.2 //
analyzed: pratitiṣṭhati asmin eva iti hi ajñānam eva asya pratiṣṭhā

original: aśvattham enaṃ suvirūḍhamūlam asaṅgaśastreṇa dṛḍhena chitvā // BhG_15.3 //
analyzed: aśvattham enam su virūḍha mūlam asaṅga śastreṇa dṛḍhena chitvā

original: tataḥ padaṃ tat parimārgitavyam yasmin gatā na nivartanti bhūyaḥ /
analyzed: tatas padam tat parimārgitavyam yasmin gatāḥ na nivartanti bhūyas

original: enam uktaprakāraṃ suvirūḍhamūlam suṣṭhu vividhaṃ rūḍhamūlam aśvatthaṃ samyagjñānamūlena dṛḍhena guṇamayabhogāsaṃgākhyena śastreṇa chitvā,
analyzed: enam ukta prakāram su virūḍha mūlam suṣṭhu vividham rūḍha mūlam aśvattham samyak jñāna mūlena dṛḍhena guṇa maya bhoga asaṃga ākhyena śastreṇa chitvā

original: tataḥ viṣayāsaṃgād dhetoḥ tat padaṃ parimārgitavyam anveṣaṇīyam,
analyzed: tatas viṣaya āsaṃgāt hetoḥ tat padam parimārgitavyam anveṣaṇīyam

original: yasmin gatā bhūyo na nivartante // BhGR_15.3 //
analyzed: yasmin gatāḥ bhūyas na nivartante

original: katham anādikālapravṛtto guṇamayabhogasaṃgaḥ tanmūlaṃ ca viparītajñānaṃ nivartata ity ata āha
analyzed: katham anādi kāla pravṛttaḥ guṇa maya bhoga saṃgaḥ tad mūlam ca viparīta jñānam nivartate iti atas āha

original: tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadyed yataḥ pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā purāṇī // BhG_15.4 //
analyzed: tam eva ca ādyam puruṣam prapadyet yatas pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā purāṇī

original: ajñānādinivṛttaye tam eva ca ādyam kṛtsnasyādibhūtam,
analyzed: ajñāna ādi nivṛttaye tam eva ca ādyam kṛtsnasya ādi bhūtam

original: “mayādhyakṣeṇa prakṛtiḥ sūyate sacarācaram“,
analyzed: mayā adhyakṣeṇa prakṛtiḥ sūyate sacarācaram

original: “ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattas sarvaṃ pravartate“,
analyzed: aham sarvasya prabhavaḥ mattaḥ sarvam pravartate

original: “mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiñcid asti dhanañjaya” ityādiṣūktam ādyaṃ puruṣam eva śaraṇaṃ prapadyet tam eva śaraṇaṃ prapadyeta /
analyzed: mattaḥ parataram na anyat kiñcid asti dhanañjayaḥ ityādiṣu uktam ādyam puruṣam eva śaraṇam prapadyet tam eva śaraṇam prapadyeta

original: yataḥ yasmāt kṛtsnasya sraṣṭur iyaṃ guṇamayabhogasaṅgapravṛttiḥ,
analyzed: yatas yasmāt kṛtsnasya sraṣṭuḥ iyam guṇa maya bhoga saṅga pravṛttiḥ

original: purāṇī purātanī prasṛtā /
analyzed: purāṇī purātanī prasṛtā

original: uktaṃ hi mayaitatpūrvam eva,
analyzed: uktam hi mayā etat pūrvam eva

original: “daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mam māyā dūratyayā /
analyzed: daivī hi eṣā guṇa mayī mam māyā dūratyayā

original: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te” iti /
analyzed: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etām taranti te iti

original: prapadyeyataḥ pravṛttir iti vā pāṭhaḥ;
analyzed: prapadyeyataḥ pravṛttiḥ iti vā pāṭhaḥ

original: tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prpadya śaraṇam upagamya,
analyzed: tam eva ca ādyam puruṣam prpadya śaraṇam upagamya

original: iyataḥ ajñānanivṛttyādeḥ kṛstnasyaitasya sādhanabhūtā pravṛttiḥ purāṇī purātanī praṛtā /
analyzed: iyataḥ ajñāna nivṛtti ādeḥ kṛstnasya etasya sādhana bhūtā pravṛttiḥ purāṇī purātanī

original: purātanānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ pravṛttiḥ purāṇī /
analyzed: purātanānām mumukṣūṇām pravṛttiḥ purāṇī

original: purātanā hi mumukṣavo mām eva śaraṇam upagamya nirmuktabandhās saṃjātā ityarthaḥ // BhGR_15.4 //
analyzed: purātanāḥ hi mumukṣavaḥ mām eva śaraṇam upagamya nirmukta bandhāḥ saṃjātāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: nirmānamohā jitasaṅgadoṣā adhyātmanityā vinivṛttakāmāḥ /
analyzed: nirmāna mohāḥ jita saṅga doṣāḥ adhyātma nityāḥ vinivṛtta kāmāḥ

original: dvandvair vimuktās sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñair gacchanty amūḍhāḥ padam avyayaṃ tat // BhG_15.5 //
analyzed: dvandvaiḥ vimuktāḥ sukha duḥkha saṃjñaiḥ gacchanti amūḍhāḥ padam avyayam tat

original: evaṃ māṃ śaraṇam upagamya nirmānamohāḥ nirgatānātmātmābhimānarūpamohāḥ,
analyzed: evam mām śaraṇam upagamya nirmāna mohāḥ nirgata anātma ātma abhimāna rūpa mohāḥ

original: jitasaṅgadoṣā jitaguṇamayabhogasaṅgākhyadoṣāḥ /
analyzed: jita saṅga doṣāḥ jita guṇa maya bhoga saṅga ākhya doṣāḥ

original: adhyātmanityāḥ ātmani yaj jñānaṃ tad adhyātmam,
analyzed: adhyātma nityāḥ ātmani yat jñānam tat adhyātmam

original: ātmajñānaniratāḥ /
analyzed: ātma jñāna niratāḥ

original: vinivṛttakāmāḥ vinivṛttataditarakāmāḥ sukhaduḥkhasajñair dvandvaiś ca vimuktāḥ,
analyzed: vinivṛtta kāmāḥ vinivṛtta tad itara kāmāḥ sukha duḥkha sajñaiḥ dvandvaiḥ ca vimuktāḥ

original: amūḍhāḥ ātmānātmasvabhavajñāḥ,
analyzed: amūḍhāḥ ātma anātma sva bhava jñāḥ

original: tad avyayaṃ padaṃ gacchanti anavacchinnajñānākāram ātmānaṃ yathāvasthitaṃ prāpnuvanti;
analyzed: tat avyayam padam gacchanti anavacchinna jñāna ākāram ātmānam yathā avasthitam prāpnuvanti

original: māṃ śaraṇam upagatānāṃ matprasādāder evaitāḥ sarvāḥ pravṛttayaḥ suśakāḥ siddhiparyantā bhavantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_15.5 //
analyzed: mām śaraṇam upagatānām mad prasāda ādeḥ eva etāḥ sarvāḥ pravṛttayaḥ su śakāḥ siddhi paryantāḥ bhavanti iti arthaḥ

original: na tad bhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ /
analyzed: na tat bhāsayate sūryaḥ na śaśāṅkaḥ na pāvakaḥ

original: yad gatvā na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama // BhG_15.6 //
analyzed: yat gatvā na nivartante tat dhāma paramam mama

original: tad atmajyotir na sūryo bhāsayate,
analyzed: tat atma jyotiḥ na sūryaḥ bhāsayate

original: na śaśāṅkaḥ,
analyzed: na śaśāṅkaḥ

original: na pāvakaś ca /
analyzed: na pāvakaḥ ca

original: jñānam eva hi sarvasya prakāśakam;
analyzed: jñānam eva hi sarvasya prakāśakam

original: bāhyāni tu jyotīṃṣi viṣayendriyasaṃbandhavirodhitamonirasanadvāreṇopakārakāṇi /
analyzed: bāhyāni tu jyotīṃṣi viṣaya indriya saṃbandha virodhi tamaḥ nirasana dvāreṇa upakārakāṇi

original: asya ca prakāśako yogaḥ /
analyzed: asya ca prakāśakaḥ yogaḥ

original: tadvirodhi cānādikarma /
analyzed: tad virodhi ca anādikarma

original: tannivartanaṃ coktaṃ bhagavatprapattimūlam asaṅgādi /
analyzed: tad nivartanam ca uktam bhagavat prapatti mūlam asaṅga ādi

original: yad gatvā punar na nivartante,
analyzed: yat gatvā punar na nivartante

original: tat paramaṃ dhāma paraṃ jyotiḥ mama madīyam;
analyzed: tat paramam dhāma param jyotiḥ mama madīyam

original: madvibhūtibhūtaḥ mamāṃśa ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: mad vibhūti bhūtaḥ mama aṃśaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: ādityādīnām api prakāśakatvena tasya paramatvam /
analyzed: āditya ādīnām api prakāśaka tvena tasya parama tvam

original: ādityādīni hi jyotīṃṣi na jñānajyotiṣaḥ prakāśakāni;
analyzed: āditya ādīni hi jyotīṃṣi na jñāna jyotiṣaḥ prakāśakāni

original: jñānam eva sarvasya prakāśakam // BhGR_15.6 //
analyzed: jñānam eva sarvasya prakāśakam

original: mamaivāṃśo jīvaloke jīvabhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ /
analyzed: mama eva aṃśaḥ jīva loke jīva bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ

original: manaṣṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi prakṛtisthitāni karṣati // BhG_15.7 //
analyzed: manaḥ ṣaṣṭhāni indriyāṇi prakṛti sthitāni karṣati

original: ittham uktasvarūpaḥ sanātano mamāṃśa eva san kaścid anādikarmarūpāvidyāveṣṭito jīvabhūto
analyzed: ittham ukta svarūpaḥ sanātanaḥ mama aṃśaḥ eva san kaścid anādi karma rūpa avidyā veṣṭitaḥ

original: jīvaloke vartamāno devamanuṣyādiprakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣaśarīrasthāni manaṣṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi karṣati /
analyzed: jīva loke vartamānaḥ deva manuṣya ādi prakṛti pariṇāma viśeṣa śarīra sthāni manaḥ ṣaṣṭhāni indriyāṇi karṣati

original: kaścic ca pūrvoktena mārgeṇāsyā avidyāyāḥ muktaḥ svena rūpeṇāvatiṣṭhate /
analyzed: kaścid ca pūrva uktena mārgeṇa asyāḥ avidyāyāḥ muktaḥ svena rūpeṇa avatiṣṭhate

original: jīvabhūtas tv atisaṃkucitajñānāiśvaryaḥ karmalabdhaprakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣarūpaśarīrasthānām indriyāṇāṃ manaṣṣaṣṭhānām īśvaraḥ tāni karmānuguṇam  #
analyzed: jīva bhūtaḥ tu ati saṃkucita jñāna aiśvaryaḥ karma labdha prakṛti pariṇāma viśeṣa rūpa śarīra sthānām indriyāṇām manaḥ ṣaṣṭhānām īśvaraḥ tāni karma anuguṇam

original: itas tataḥ karṣati // BhGR_15.7 //
analyzed: itas tatas karṣati

original: śarīraṃ yad avāpnoti yac cāpy utkrāmatīśvaraḥ /
analyzed: śarīram yat avāpnoti yat ca api utkrāmati īśvaraḥ

original: gṛhītvaitāni saṃyāti vāyur gandhān ivāśayāt // BhG_15.8 //
analyzed: gṛhītvā etāni saṃyāti vāyuḥ gandhān iva āśayāt

original: yac śarīram avāpnoti,
analyzed: yat śarīram avāpnoti

original: yamāc charīrād utkrāmati,
analyzed: yamāt śarīrāt utkrāmati

original: tatrāyam indriyāṇām īśvaraḥ etāni indriyāṇi bhūtasūkṣmais saha gṛhītvā saṃyāti vāyur gandhān ivāśayāt /
analyzed: tatra ayam indriyāṇām īśvaraḥ etāni indriyāṇi bhūta sūkṣmaiḥ saha gṛhītvā saṃyāti vāyuḥ gandhān iva āśayāt

original: yathā vāyuḥ srakcandanakastūrikādyāśayāt tatsthānāt sūkṣmāvayavais saha gandhān gṛhītvānyatra saṃyāti,
analyzed: yathā vāyuḥ sraj candana kastūrikā ādi āśayāt tad sthānāt sūkṣma avayavaiḥ saha gandhān gṛhītvā anyatra saṃyāti

original: tadvad ityarthaḥ // BhGR_15.8 //
analyzed: tadvat iti arthaḥ

original: kāni punas tānīndriyāṇīty atrāha
analyzed: kāni punar tāni indriyāṇi iti atra āha

original: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca /
analyzed: śrotram cakṣuḥ sparśanam ca rasanam ghrāṇam eva ca

original: adhiṣṭhāya manaś cāyaṃ viṣayān upasevate // BhG_15.9 //
analyzed: adhiṣṭhāya manaḥ ca ayam viṣayān upasevate

original: etāni manaṣṣaṣṭhānīndriyāṇi adhiṣṭhāya svasvaviṣayavṛttyanuguṇāni kṛtvā,
analyzed: etāni manaḥ ṣaṣṭhāni indriyāṇi adhiṣṭhāya sva sva viṣaya vṛtti anuguṇāni kṛtvā

original: tān śabdādīn viṣayān upasevate upabhuṅkte // BhGR_15.9 //
analyzed: tān śabda ādīn viṣayān upasevate upabhuṅkte

original: utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam /
analyzed: utkrāmantam sthitam vā api bhuñjānam vā guṇa anvitam

original: vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti paśyanti jñānacakṣuṣaḥ // BhG_15.10 //
analyzed: vimūḍhāḥ na anupaśyanti paśyanti jñāna cakṣuṣaḥ

original: evaṃ guṇānvitaṃ sattvādiguṇamayaprakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣamanuṣyatvādisaṃsthānapiṇḍasaṃsṛṣṭam,
analyzed: evam guṇa anvitam sattva ādi guṇa maya prakṛti pariṇāma viśeṣa manuṣya tva ādi saṃsthāna piṇḍa saṃsṛṣṭam

original: piṇḍaviśeṣād utkrāmantaṃ piṇḍaviśeṣe 'vathitaṃ vā,
analyzed: piṇḍa viśeṣāt utkrāmantam piṇḍa viśeṣe avathitam vā

original: guṇamayān viṣayān bhuñjānaṃ vā kadācid api prakṛtipariṇāmaviśeṣamanuṣyatvādipiṇḍād vilakṣaṇaṃ jñānaikākāraṃ vimūḍhā nānupaśyanti /
analyzed: guṇa mayān viṣayān bhuñjānam vā kadācid api prakṛti pariṇāma viśeṣa manuṣya tva ādi piṇḍāt vilakṣaṇam jñāna eka ākāram vimūḍhāḥ na anupaśyanti

original: vimūḍhāḥ manuṣyatvādipiṇḍātmatvābhimāninaḥ /
analyzed: vimūḍhāḥ manuṣya tva ādi piṇḍa ātma tva abhimāninaḥ

original: jñānacakṣuṣas tu piṇḍātmavivekaviṣayajñānavantaḥ sarvāvastham apy enaṃ viviktākāram eva paśyanti // BhGR_15.10 //
analyzed: jñānacakṣuṣaḥ tu piṇḍa ātma viveka viṣaya jñānavantaḥ sarva avastham api enam vivikta ākāram eva paśyanti

original: yatanto yoginaś cainaṃ paśyanty ātmany avasthitam /
analyzed: yatantaḥ yoginaḥ ca enam paśyanti ātmani avasthitam

original: yatanto 'py akṛtātmāno nainaṃ paśyanty acetasaḥ // BhG_15.11 //
analyzed: yatantaḥ api akṛtātmānaḥ na enam paśyanti acetasaḥ

original: matprapattipūrvakaṃ karmayogādiṣu yatamānās tair nirmalāntaḥkaraṇā yogino yogākhyena cakṣuṣā ātmani śarīre 'vasthitam api śarīrād viviktaṃ  #
analyzed: mad prapatti pūrvakam karmayoga ādiṣu yatamānāḥ taiḥ nirmala antaḥkaraṇāḥ yoginaḥ yoga ākhyena cakṣuṣā ātmani śarīre avasthitam api śarīrāt viviktam

original: svena rūpeṇāvasthitam enaṃ paśyanti /
analyzed: svena rūpeṇa avasthitam enam paśyanti

original: yatamānā apy akṛtātmānaḥ matprapattivirahiṇaḥ tata evāsaṃskṛtamanasaḥ,
analyzed: yatamānāḥ api akṛtātmānaḥ mad prapatti virahiṇaḥ tatas eva asaṃskṛta manasaḥ

original: tata eva acetasaḥ ātmāvalokanasamarthacetorahitāḥ nainaṃ paśyanti // BhGR_15.11 //
analyzed: tatas eva acetasaḥ ātma avalokana samartha cetaḥ rahitāḥ na enam paśyanti

original: evaṃ ravicandrāgnīnām indriyasannikarṣavirodhisaṃtamasanirasanamukhenendriyānugrāhakatayā
analyzed: evam ravi candra agnīnām indriya sannikarṣa virodhi saṃtamasa nirasana mukhena indriya anugrāhaka tayā

original: prakāśakānāṃ jyotiṣmatām api prakāśakajñānajyotir ātmā muktāvastho jīvāvasthaś ca
analyzed: prakāśakānām jyotiṣmatām api prakāśaka jñāna jyotiḥ ātmā mukta avasthaḥ jīva avasthaḥ ca

original: bhagavadvibhūtir ity uktam,
“tad dhāma pramaṃ mama“,
analyzed: tat dhāma pramam mama

original: “mamaivāṃśo jīvaloke jīvabhūtas sanātanaḥ” iti /
analyzed: mama eva aṃśaḥ jīva loke jīva bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ iti

original: idānīm acitpariṇāmaviśeṣabhūtam ādityādīnāṃ jyotiṣmatāṃ jyotir api bhagavad vibhūtir ity āha
analyzed: idānīm acit pariṇāma viśeṣa bhūtam āditya ādīnām jyotiṣmatām jyotiḥ api bhagavat vibhūtiḥ iti āha

original: yad ādityagataṃ tejo jagad bhāsayate 'khilam /
analyzed: yat āditya gatam tejaḥ jagat bhāsayate akhilam

original: yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam // BhG_15.12 //
analyzed: yat candramasi yat ca agnau tat tejaḥ viddhi māmakam

original: akhilasya jagato bhāsakam eteṣām ādityādīnāṃ yat tejaḥ,
analyzed: akhilasya jagataḥ bhāsakam eteṣām āditya ādīnām yat tejaḥ

original: tan madīyaṃ tejaḥ tais tair ārādhitena mayā tebhyo dattam iti viddhi // BhGR_15.12 //
analyzed: tat madīyam tejaḥ taiḥ taiḥ ārādhitena mayā tebhyaḥ dattam iti viddhi

original: pṛthivyāś ca bhūtadhāriṇyā dhārakatvaśaktir madīyety āha
analyzed: pṛthivyāḥ ca bhūta dhāriṇyāḥ dhāraka tva śaktiḥ madīyā iti āha

original: gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmy aham ojasā //
analyzed: gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmi aham ojasā

original: puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvās somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ // BhG%_15.13 //
analyzed: puṣṇāmi ca oṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somaḥ bhūtvā rasa ātmakaḥ

original: ahaṃ pṛthivīm āviśya sarvāṇi bhūtāni ojasā mamāpratihatasāmarthyena dhārayāmi /
analyzed: aham pṛthivīm āviśya sarvāṇi bhūtāni ojasā mama apratihata sāmarthyena dhārayāmi

original: tathāham amṛtarasamayas somo bhūtvā sarvauṣadhīḥ puṣṇāmi // BhGR_15.13 //
analyzed: tathā aham amṛta rasa mayaḥ somaḥ bhūtvā sarva oṣadhīḥ puṣṇāmi

original: ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ /
analyzed: aham vaiśvānaraḥ bhūtvā prāṇinām deham āśritaḥ

original: prāṇāpānasamāyuktaḥ pacāmy annaṃ caturvidham // BhGR_15.14 //
analyzed: prāṇa apāna samāyuktaḥ pacāmi annam caturvidham

original: ahaṃ vaiśvānaro jāṭharānalo bhūtvā sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ tair bhuktaṃ khādyacūṣyalehyapeyātmakaṃ caturvidham annaṃ prāṇāpānavṛttibhedasamāyuktaḥ  #
analyzed: aham vaiśvānaraḥ jāṭhara analaḥ bhūtvā sarveṣām prāṇinām deham āśritaḥ taiḥ bhuktam khādya cūṣya lehya peya ātmakam caturvidham annam prāṇa apāna vṛtti bheda samāyuktaḥ

original: pacāmi // BhGR_15.14 //
analyzed: pacāmi

original: atra paramapuruṣavibhūtibhūtau somavaiśvānarau ahaṃ somo bhūtvā,
analyzed: atra paramapuruṣa vibhūti bhūtau soma vaiśvānarau aham somaḥ bhūtvā

original: vaiśvānaro bhūtvā iti tatsāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiṣṭau /
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ bhūtvā iti tad sāmānādhikaraṇyena nirdiṣṭau

original: tayoś ca sarvasya bhūtajātasya ca paramapuruṣasāmānādhikaraṇyanirdeśahetum āha
analyzed: tayoḥ ca sarvasya bhūta jātasya ca paramapuruṣa sāmānādhikaraṇya nirdeśa hetum āha

original: sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi sanniviṣṭo mattaḥ smṛtijñānam apohanaṃ ca /
analyzed: sarvasya ca aham hṛdi sanniviṣṭaḥ mattaḥ smṛti jñānam apohanam ca

original: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyo vedāntakṛd vedavid eva cāham // BhGR_15.15 //
analyzed: vedaiḥ ca sarvaiḥ aham eva vedyaḥ vedānta kṛt veda vid eva ca aham

original: tayoḥ somavaiśvānarayoḥ sarvasya ca bhūtajātasya sakalapravṛttinivṛttimūlajñānodayadeśe hṛdi sarvaṃ matsaṃkalpena niyacchan aham ātmatayā sanniviṣṭaḥ
analyzed: tayoḥ soma vaiśvānarayoḥ sarvasya ca bhūtajātasya sakala pravṛtti nivṛtti mūla jñāna udaya deśe hṛdi sarvam mad saṃkalpena niyacchan aham ātma tayā san niviṣṭaḥ

original: tathāhuḥ śrutayaḥ,
analyzed: tathā āhuḥ śrutayaḥ

original: “antaḥ praviṣṭaś śāstā janānāṃ sarvātmā“,
analyzed: antar praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām sarva ātmā

original: “yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ tiṣṭhan“,
analyzed: yaḥ pṛthivyām tiṣṭhan

original: “ya ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmano 'ntaro ..... yamayati“,
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmanaḥ antaraḥ yamayati

original: “padmakośapratīkāśaṃ hṛdayaṃ cāpy adhomukham“,
analyzed: padma kośa pratīkāśam hṛdayam ca api adhomukham

original: “atha yad idam asmin brahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma” ityādyāḥ /
analyzed: atha yat idam asmin brahma pure daharam puṇḍarīkam veśma ityādyāḥ

original: smṛtayaś ca,
analyzed: smṛtayaḥ ca

original: “śāstā viṣṇur aśeṣasya jagato yo jaganmayaḥ“,
analyzed: śāstā viṣṇuḥ aśeṣasya jagataḥ yaḥ jagat mayaḥ

original: “praśāsitāraṃ sarveṣām aṇīyāṃsam aṇīyasām“,
analyzed: praśāsitāram sarveṣām aṇīyāṃsam aṇīyasām

original: “yamo vaivasvato rājā yas tavaiṣa hṛdi sthitaḥ” ityādyāḥ /
analyzed: yamaḥ vaivasvataḥ rājā yaḥ tava eṣa hṛdi sthitaḥ ityādyāḥ

original: ato matta eva sarveṣāṃ smṛtir jāyate /
analyzed: atas mattaḥ eva sarveṣām smṛtiḥ jāyate

original: smṛtiḥ pūrvānubhūtiviṣayam anubhavasaṃskāramātrajaṃ jñānam /
analyzed: smṛtiḥ pūrva anubhūti viṣayam anubhava saṃskāra mātra jam jñānam

original: jñānam indriyaliṅgāgamayogajo vastuniścayaḥ;
so 'pi mattaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ api mattaḥ

original: apohanaṃ ca /
analyzed: apohanam ca

original: apohanam jñānanivṛttiḥ /
apohanam ūhanaṃ vā;
analyzed: apohanam ūhanam vā

original: ūhanam ūhaḥ;
analyzed: ūhanam ūhaḥ

original: ūho nāma idaṃ pramāṇam itthaṃ pravartitum arhatīti pramāṇapravṛttyarhatāviṣayaṃ sāmagryādinirūpaṇajanyaṃ pramāṇānugrāhakaṃ jñānam;
analyzed: ūhaḥ nāma idam pramāṇam ittham pravartitum arhati iti pramāṇa pravṛtti arhatā viṣayam sāmagrī ādi nirūpaṇa janyam pramāṇa anugrāhakam jñānam

original: sa coho matta eva /
analyzed: sa ca ūhaḥ mattaḥ eva

original: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyaḥ /
analyzed: vedaiḥ ca sarvaiḥ aham eva vedyaḥ

original: ato 'gnisūryavāyusomendrādīnāṃ madantaryāmikatvena madātmakatvāt tatpratipādanaparair api sarvair vedair aham eva vedyaḥ,
analyzed: atas agni sūrya vāyu soma indra ādīnām mad antaryāmika tvena mad ātmaka tvāt tad pratipādana paraiḥ api sarvaiḥ vedaiḥ aham eva vedyaḥ

original: devamanuṣyādiśabdair jīvātmaiva /
analyzed: deva manuṣya ādi śabdaiḥ jīvātmā eva

original: vedāntakṛd vedānām “indraṃ yajeta“,
analyzed: vedānta kṛt vedānām indram yajeta

original: “varuṇaṃ yajeta” ity evam ādīnām antaḥ phalam;
analyzed: varuṇam yajeta iti evam ādīnām antaḥ phalam

original: phale hi te sarve vedāḥ paryavasyanti;
analyzed: phale hi te sarve vedāḥ paryavasyanti

original: antakṛt phalakṛt;
analyzed: anta kṛt phala kṛt

original: vedoditaphalasya pradātā cāham evetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: veda udita phalasya pradātā ca aham eva iti arthaḥ

original: tad uktaṃ pūrvam eva,
analyzed: tat uktam pūrvam eva

original: “yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati” ity ārabhya “labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān hi tān” iti,
analyzed: yaḥ yaḥ yām yām tanum bhaktaḥ śraddhayā arcitum icchati iti ārabhya labhate ca tatas kāmān mayā eva vihitān hi tān iti

original: “ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca” iti ca /
analyzed: aham hi sarva yajñānām bhoktā ca prabhuḥ eva ca iti ca

original: vedavid eva cāham vedavic cāham eva /
analyzed: veda vid eva ca aham veda vid ca aham eva

original: evaṃ madabhidhāyinaṃ vedam aham eva veda;
analyzed: evam mad abhidhāyinam vedam aham eva veda

original: ito 'nyathā yo vedārthaṃ
analyzed: itas anyathā yaḥ veda artham

original: brūte na sa vedavid ity abhiprāyaḥ // BhGR_15.15 //
analyzed: brūte na sa veda vid iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: ato matta eva sarvavedānāṃ sārabhūtam artham śṛṇu
analyzed: atas mattaḥ eva sarva vedānām sāra bhūtam artham śṛṇu

original: dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca /
analyzed: dvau imau puruṣau loke kṣaraḥ ca akṣaraḥ eva ca

original: kṣaras sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭastho 'kṣara ucyate // BhGR_15.16 //
analyzed: kṣaraḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni kūṭasthaḥ akṣaraḥ ucyate

original: kṣaraś cākṣaraś ceti dvāv imau puruṣau loke prathitau /
analyzed: kṣaraḥ ca akṣaraḥ ca iti dvau imau puruṣau loke prathitau

original: tatra kṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭaḥ puruṣo jīvaśabdābhilapanīyabrahmādistambaparyantakṣaraṇasvabhāvācitsaṃsṛṣṭasarvabhūtāni /
analyzed: tatra kṣara śabda nirdiṣṭaḥ puruṣaḥ jīva śabda abhilapanīya brahma ādi stamba paryanta kṣaraṇa svabhāva acit saṃsṛṣṭa sarva bhūtāni

original: atrācitsaṃsargarūpaikopādhinā puruṣa ity ekatvanirdeśaḥ /
analyzed: atra acit saṃsarga rūpa eka upādhinā puruṣaḥ iti ekatva nirdeśaḥ

original: akṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭaḥ kūṭasthaḥ acitsaṃsargaviyuktaḥ svena rūpeṇāvasthito muktātmā /
analyzed: akṣara śabda nirdiṣṭaḥ kūṭasthaḥ acit saṃsarga viyuktaḥ svena rūpeṇa avasthitaḥ mukta ātmā

original: sa tv acitsaṃsargābhavād acitpariṇāmaviśeṣabrahmādidehāsādhāraṇo na bhavatīti kūṭastha ity ucyate /
analyzed: sa tu acit saṃsarga abhavāt acit pariṇāma viśeṣa brahma ādi deha asādhāraṇaḥ na bhavati iti kūṭasthaḥ iti ucyate

original: atrāpy ekatvanirdeśo 'cidviyogarūpaikopādhinābhihitaḥ /
analyzed: atra api ekatva nirdeśaḥ acit viyoga rūpa eka upādhinā abhihitaḥ

original: na hi itaḥ pūrvam anādau kāle mukta eka eva /
analyzed: na hi itas pūrvam anādau kāle muktaḥ ekaḥ eva

original: yathoktam, “bahavo jñānatapasā pūtā madbhāvam āgatāḥ“,
analyzed: yathoktam bahavaḥ jñāna tapasā pūtāḥ mad bhāvam āgatāḥ

original: “sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca” iti // BhGR_15.16 //
analyzed: sarge api nā upajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca iti

original: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ /
analyzed: uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ tu anyaḥ paramātmā iti udāhṛtaḥ

original: yo lokatrayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ // BhGR_15.17 //
analyzed: yaḥ lokatrayam āviśya bibharti avyayaḥ īśvaraḥ
