original: uttamaḥ puruṣas tu tābhyāṃ kṣarākṣaraśabdanirdiṣṭābhyāṃ baddhamuktapuruṣābhyām anyaḥ arthāntarabhūtaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ sarvāsu śrutiṣu
analyzed: uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ tu tābhyām kṣara akṣara śabda nirdiṣṭābhyām baddha mukta puruṣābhyām anyaḥ artha antara bhūtaḥ paramātmā iti udāhṛtaḥ sarvāsu śrutiṣu

original: paramātmeti nirdeśād eva hy uttamaḥ puruṣo baddhamuktapuruṣābhyāṃ arthāntarabhūta ity avagamyate /
analyzed: paramātmā iti nirdeśāt eva hi uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ baddha mukta puruṣābhyām artha antara bhūtaḥ iti avagamyate

original: katham? yo lokatrayam āviśya bibharti /
analyzed: katham yaḥ lokatrayam āviśya bibharti

original: lokyata iti lokaḥ;
analyzed: lokyate iti lokaḥ

original: tattrayaṃ lokatrayam /
analyzed: tat trayam loka trayam

original: acetanaṃ tatsaṃsṛṣṭaś cetano muktaś ceti pramāṇāvagamyam etat trayaṃ ya ātmatayā āviśya bibharti,
analyzed: acetanam tad saṃsṛṣṭaḥ cetanaḥ muktaḥ ca iti pramāṇa avagamyam etat trayam yaḥ ātma tayā āviśya bibharti

original: sa tasmād vyāpyād bhartavyāc cārthāntarabhūtaḥ /
analyzed: sa tasmāt vyāpyāt bhartavyāt ca artha antara bhūtaḥ

original: itaś coktāl lokatrayād arthāntarabhūtaḥ;
analyzed: itas ca uktāt loka trayāt artha antara bhūtaḥ

original: yataḥ so 'vyayaḥ,
analyzed: yatas saḥ avyayaḥ

original: īśvaraś ca; avyayasvabhāvo hi vyayasvabhāvād acetanāt tatsaṃbandhena tadanusāriṇaś ca cetanād acitsaṃbandhayogyatayā pūrvasaṃbandhino muktāc  #
analyzed: īśvaraḥ ca avyaya svabhāvaḥ hi vyaya svabhāvāt acetanāt tad saṃbandhena tad anusāriṇaḥ ca cetanāt acit saṃbandha yogyatayā pūrva saṃbandhinaḥ muktāt

original: cārthāntarabhūta eva /
analyzed: ca artha antara bhūtaḥ eva

original: tathaitasya lokatrayasyeśvaraḥ,
analyzed: tathā etasya lokatrayasya īśvaraḥ

original: īśitavyāt tasmād arthāntarabhūtaḥ // BhGR_15.17 //
analyzed: īśitavyāt tasmāt artha antara bhūtaḥ

original: yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ /
analyzed: yasmāt kṣaram atītaḥ aham akṣarāt api ca uttamaḥ

original: ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ // BhGR_15.18 //
analyzed: atas asmi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ

original: yasmād evam uktaiḥ svabhāvaiḥ kṣaraṃ puruṣam atīto 'ham,
analyzed: yasmāt evam uktaiḥ svabhāvaiḥ kṣaram puruṣam atītaḥ aham

original: akṣarān muktād apy uktair hetubhir utkṛṣṭatamaḥ,
analyzed: akṣarāt muktāt api uktaiḥ hetubhiḥ utkṛṣṭatamaḥ

original: ato 'haṃ loke vede ca puruṣottama iti prathito 'smi /
analyzed: atas aham loke vede ca puruṣottamaḥ iti prathitaḥ asmi

original: vedārthāvalokanāl loka iti smṛtir ihocyate /
analyzed: veda artha avalokanāt lokaḥ iti smṛtiḥ iha ucyate

original: śrutau smṛtau cety arthaḥ /
analyzed: śrutau smṛtau ca iti arthaḥ

original: śrutau tāvat,
analyzed: śrutau tāvat

original: “paraṃ jyotir upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇābhiniṣpadyate,
analyzed: param jyotiḥ upasaṃpadya svena rūpeṇa abhiniṣpadyate

original: sa uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ” ityādau /
analyzed: saḥ uttamaḥ puruṣaḥ ityādau

original: smṛtav api, “aṃśāvatāraṃ puruṣottamasya hy anādimadhyāntam ajasya viṣṇoḥ” ityādau // BhGR_15.18 //
analyzed: api aṃśa avatāram puruṣottamasya hi an ādi madhya antam ajasya viṣṇoḥ ityādau

original: yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam /
analyzed: yaḥ mām evam asaṃmūḍhaḥ jānāti puruṣottamam

original: sa sarvavid bhajati māṃ sarvabhāvena bhārata // BhGR_15.19 //
analyzed: sa sarva vid bhajati mām sarva bhāvena bhārata

original: ya evam uktena prakāreṇa puruṣottamaṃ mām asaṃmūḍho jānāti kṣarākṣarapuruṣābhyām,
analyzed: yaḥ evam uktena prakāreṇa puruṣottamam mām asaṃmūḍhaḥ jānāti kṣara akṣara puruṣābhyām

original: avyayasvabhāvatayā vyāpanabharaṇāiśvaryādiyogena ca visajātīyaṃ jānāti,
analyzed: avyaya svabhāva tayā vyāpana bharaṇa aiśvarya ādi yogena ca visajātīyam jānāti

original: sa sarvavin matprāptyupāyatayā yad veditavyaṃ tat sarvaṃ veda;
analyzed: sa sarva vid mad prāpti upāya tayā yat veditavyam tat sarvam veda

original: bhajati māṃ sarvabhāvena ye ca matprāptyupāyatayā madbhajanaprakārā nirdiṣṭāḥ taiś ca sarvair bhajanaprakārair māṃ bhajate /
analyzed: bhajati mām sarva bhāvena ye ca mad prāpti upāya tayā mad bhajana prakārāḥ nirdiṣṭāḥ taiḥ ca sarvaiḥ bhajana prakāraiḥ mām bhajate

original: sarvair madviṣayair vedanair mama yā prītiḥ,
analyzed: sarvaiḥ mad viṣayaiḥ vedanaiḥ mama yā prītiḥ

original: yā ca mama sarvair madviṣayair bhajanaiḥ,
analyzed: yā ca mama sarvaiḥ mad viṣayaiḥ bhajanaiḥ

original: ubhayavidhā sā prītir anena vedanena mama jāyate //
analyzed: ubhayavidhā sā prītiḥ anena vedanena mama jāyate

original: ity etat puruṣottamatvavedanaṃ pūjayati
analyzed: iti etat puruṣottama tva vedanam pūjayati

original: iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha /
analyzed: iti guhyatamam śāstram idam uktam mayā anagha

original: etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaś ca bhārata // BhGR_15.20 //
analyzed: etat buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca bhārata

original: itthaṃ mama puruṣottamatvapratipādanaṃ sarveṣāṃ guhyānāṃ guhyatamam idaṃ śāstram,
analyzed: ittham mama puruṣottama tva pratipādanam sarveṣām guhyānām guhyatamam idam śāstram

original: “tvam anaghatayā yogyatamaḥ” iti kṛtvā mayā tavoktam /
analyzed: tvam anagha tayā yogyatamaḥ iti kṛtvā mayā tava uktam

original: etad buddhvā buddhimāṃs syāt kṛtakṛtyaś ca māṃ prepsunā upādeyā yā buddhiḥ sā sarvā upāttā syāt:
analyzed: etat buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaḥ ca mām prepsunā upādeyā yā buddhiḥ sā sarvā upāttā syāt

original: yac ca tena kartavyam,
analyzed: yat ca tena kartavyam

original: tat sarvaṃ kṛtaṃ syād ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tat sarvam kṛtam syāt iti arthaḥ

original: anena ślokena,
analyzed: anena ślokena

original: anantaroktaṃ puruṣottamaviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ śāstrajanyam evaitat sarvaṃ karoti,
analyzed: anantara uktam puruṣottama viṣayam jñānam śāstra janyam eva etat sarvam karoti

original: na tatsākṣātkārarūpam ity ucyate // BhGR_15.20 //
analyzed: na tat sākṣātkāra rūpam iti ucyate

original: atītenādhyāyatrayeṇa prakṛtipuruṣayor viviktayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayoś ca yāthātmyaṃ tatsaṃsargaviyogayoś ca guṇasaṅgatadviparyayahetutvam,
analyzed: atītena adhyāya trayeṇa prakṛti puruṣayoḥ viviktayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭayoḥ ca yāthātmyam tad saṃsarga viyogayoḥ ca guṇa saṅga tad viparyaya hetu tvam

original: sarvaprakāreṇāvasthitayoḥ prakṛtipuruṣayor bhagavadvibhūtitvam,
vibhūtimato bhagavato vibhūtibhūtād acidvastunaś cidvastunaś ca baddhamuktobhayarūpād avyayatvavyāpanabharaṇasvāmyair arthāntaratayā puruṣottamatvena  #
analyzed: vibhūtimataḥ bhagavataḥ vibhūti bhūtāt acit vastunaḥ cit vastunaḥ ca baddha mukta ubhaya rūpāt avyaya tva vyāpana bharaṇa svāmyaiḥ artha antara tayā puruṣottama tvena

original: yāthātmyañ ca varṇitam /
analyzed: yāthātmyam ca varṇitam

original: anantaram, uktasya kṛtsnasyārthasya sthemne śāstravaśyatāṃ vaktuṃ śāstravaśyatadviparītayor devāsurasargayor vibhāgaṃ
analyzed: anantaram uktasya kṛtsnasya arthasya sthemne śāstra vaśya tām vaktum śāstra vaśya tad viparītayoḥ deva asura sargayoḥ vibhāgam

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: abhayaṃ sattvasaṃśuddhir jñānayogavyavasthitiḥ /
dānaṃ damaś ca yajñaś ca svādhyāyas tapa ārjavam // BhG_16.1 //
analyzed: dānam damaḥ ca yajñaḥ ca svādhyāyaḥ tapaḥ ārjavam

original: ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntir apaiśunam /
analyzed: ahiṃsā satyam akrodhaḥ tyāgaḥ śāntiḥ apaiśunam

original: dayā bhūteṣv aloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam // BhG_16.2 //
analyzed: dayā bhūteṣu a loluptvam mārdavam hrīḥ acāpalam

original: tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā /
analyzed: tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adrohaḥ na atimāni tā

original: bhavanti saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhi jātasya bhārata // BhG_16.3 //
analyzed: bhavanti saṃpadam daivīm abhi jātasya bhārata

original: iṣṭāniṣṭaviyogasaṃyogarūpasya duḥkhasya hetudarśanajaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhayam,
analyzed: iṣṭa aniṣṭa viyoga saṃyoga rūpasya duḥkhasya hetu darśana jam duḥkham bhayam

original: tannivṛttir abhayam /
analyzed: tad nivṛttiḥ abhayam

original: sattvasaṃśuddhiḥ sattvasyāntaḥkaraṇasya rajastamobhyām aspṛṣṭatvam /
analyzed: sattva saṃśuddhiḥ sattvasya antaḥkaraṇasya rajaḥ tamobhyām a spṛṣṭa tvam

original: jñānayogavyavasthitiḥ prakṛtiviyuktātmasvarūpavivekaniṣṭhā /
dānam nyāyārjitadhanasya pātre pratipādanam /
analyzed: dānam nyāya arjita dhanasya pātre pratipādanam

original: damaḥ manaso viṣayonmukhyanivṛttisaṃśīlanam /
yajñaḥ phalābhisandhirahitabhagavadārādhanarūpamahāyajñādyanuṣṭhānam /
svādhyāyaḥ savibhūter bhagavatas tadārādhanaprakārasya ca pratipādakaḥ kṛtsno veda ityanusandhāya vedābhyāsaniṣṭhā /
analyzed: svādhyāyaḥ sa vibhūteḥ bhagavataḥ tad ārādhana prakārasya ca pratipādakaḥ kṛtsnaḥ vedaḥ iti anusandhāya veda abhyāsa niṣṭhā

original: tapaḥ kṛcchracāndrāyaṇadvādaśyupavāsāder bhagavatprīṇanakarmayogyatāpādanasya karaṇam /
analyzed: tapaḥ kṛcchra cāndrāyaṇa dvādaśī upavāsa ādeḥ bhagavat prīṇana karma yogya tā āpādanasya karaṇam

original: ārjavam manovākkāyavṛttīnām ekaniṣṭhatā pareṣu /
analyzed: ārjavam manaḥ vāc kāya vṛttīnām eka niṣṭha tā pareṣu

original: ahiṃsā parapīḍāvarjanam /
analyzed: ahiṃsā para pīḍā varjanam

original: satyam yathādṛṣṭārthagocarabhūtahitavākyam /
analyzed: satyam yathā dṛṣṭa artha gocara bhūta hita vākyam

original: akrodhaḥ parapīḍāphalacittavikārarahitatvam /
tyāgaḥ ātmahitapratyanīkaparigrahavimocanam /
analyzed: tyāgaḥ ātma hita pratyanīka parigraha vimocanam

original: śāntiḥ indriyāṇāṃ viṣayaprāvaṇyanirodhasaṃśīlanam /
analyzed: śāntiḥ indriyāṇām viṣaya prāvaṇya nirodha saṃśīlanam

original: apaiśunam parānarthakaravākyanivedanākaraṇam /
analyzed: a paiśunam para anartha kara vākya nivedana a karaṇam

original: dayā bhūteṣu sarvabhūteṣu duḥkhāsahiṣṇutvam /
analyzed: dayā bhūteṣu sarva bhūteṣu duḥkha a sahiṣṇu tvam

original: aloluptvam alolupatvam /
analyzed: a lolupa tvam a lolupa tvam

original: alolutvam iti vā pāṭhaḥ;
analyzed: iti vā pāṭhaḥ

original: viṣayeṣu nisspṛhatvam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: viṣayeṣu nisspṛha tvam iti arthaḥ

original: mārdavam akāṭhinyam,
analyzed: mārdavam a kāṭhinyam

original: sādhujanasaṃśleṣārhatetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: sādhu jana saṃśleṣa arha tā iti arthaḥ

original: hrīḥ akāryakaraṇe vrīḍā /
analyzed: hrīḥ akārya karaṇe vrīḍā

original: acāpalam spṛhaṇīyaviṣayasannidhau acañcalatvam /
tejaḥ durjanair anabhibhavanīyatvam /
analyzed: tejaḥ durjanaiḥ an abhibhavanīya tvam

original: kṣamā paranimittapīḍānubhave 'pi pareṣu taṃ prati cittavikārarahitatā /
analyzed: kṣamā para nimitta pīḍā anubhave api pareṣu tam prati citta vikāra rahita tā

original: dhṛtiḥ mahatyām apy āpadi kṛtyakartavyatāvadhāraṇam /
analyzed: dhṛtiḥ mahatyām api āpadi kṛtya kartavya tā avadhāraṇam

original: śaucam bāhyāntarakaraṇānāṃ kṛtyayogyatā śāstrīyā /
analyzed: śaucam bāhya antara karaṇānām kṛtya yogya tā śāstrīyā

original: adrohaḥ pareṣv anuparodhaḥ;
analyzed: a drohaḥ pareṣu an uparodhaḥ

original: pareṣu svacchandavṛttinirodharahitatvam ityarthaḥ /
nātimānitā asthāne garvo 'timānitvam;
analyzed: na atimāni tā asthāne garvaḥ atimāni tvam

original: tadrahitatā /
analyzed: tad rahita tā

original: ete guṇāḥ daivīṃ saṃpadam abhijātasya bhavanti /
analyzed: ete guṇāḥ daivīm saṃpadam abhijātasya bhavanti

original: devasaṃbandhinī saṃpad daivī;
analyzed: deva saṃbandhinī saṃpad daivī

original: devā bhagavadājñānuvṛttiśīlāḥ;
analyzed: devāḥ bhagavat ājñā anuvṛtti śīlāḥ

original: teṣāṃ saṃpat /
analyzed: teṣām saṃpad

original: sā ca bhagavadājñānuvṛttir
analyzed: sā ca bhagavat ājñā anuvṛttiḥ

original: eva / tām abhijātasya tām abhimukhīkṛtya jātasya,
analyzed: eva tām abhijātasya tām abhimukhīkṛtya jātasya

original: tāṃ nivartayituṃ jātasya bhavantītyarthaḥ // BhGR_16.1_3 //
analyzed: tām nivartayitum jātasya bhavanti iti arthaḥ

original: dambho darpo 'timānaś ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca /
analyzed: dambhaḥ darpaḥ atimānaḥ ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca

original: ajñānaṃ cābhijātasya pārtha sampadam asurīm // BhG_16.4 //
analyzed: ajñānam ca abhijātasya pārtha sampadam asurīm

original: dambhaḥ dhārmikatvakhyāpanāya dharmānuṣṭhānam /
analyzed: dambhaḥ dhārmika tva khyāpanāya dharma anuṣṭhānam

original: darpaḥ kṛtyākṛtyāvivekakaro viṣayānubhavanimitto harṣaḥ /
analyzed: darpaḥ kṛtyā akṛtyā viveka karaḥ viṣaya anubhava nimittaḥ harṣaḥ

original: atimānaś ca svavidyābhijanān anuguṇo 'bhimānaḥ /
analyzed: atimānaḥ ca sva vidyā abhijanān anuguṇaḥ abhimānaḥ

original: krodhaḥ parapiḍāphalacittavikāraḥ /
pāruṣyam sādhūnām udvegakaraḥ svabhāvaḥ /
analyzed: pāruṣyam sādhūnām udvega karaḥ svabhāvaḥ

original: ajñānam parāvaratattvakṛtyākṛtyāvivekaḥ /
ete svabhāvāḥ āsurīṃ saṃpadam abhijātasya bhavanti /
analyzed: ete svabhāvāḥ āsurīm saṃpadam abhijātasya bhavanti

original: asurāḥ bhagavadājñātivṛttiśīlāḥ // BhGR_16.4 //
analyzed: asurāḥ bhagavat ājñāti vṛtti śīlāḥ

original: daivī saṃpad vimokṣāya nibandhāyāsurī matā /
analyzed: daivī saṃpad vimokṣāya nibandhāya āsurī matā

original: daivī madājñānuvṛttirūpā saṃpad vimokṣāya bandhān muktaye bhavati /
analyzed: daivī mad ājñā anuvṛtti rūpā saṃpad vimokṣāya bandhāt muktaye bhavati

original: krameṇa matprāptaye bhavatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: krameṇa mad prāptaye bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: āsurī madājñātivṛttirūpā saṃpan nibandhāya bhavati adhogatiprāptaye bhavatītyarthaḥ //
analyzed: āsurī mada ajñāti vṛtti rūpā saṃpad nibandhāya bhavati adhogati prāptaye bhavati iti arthaḥ

original: etac chrutvā svaprakṛtyanirdhāraṇād atibhītāyārjunāyaivam āha
analyzed: etat śrutvā sva prakṛti anirdhāraṇāt ati bhītāya arjunāya evam āha

original: mā śucas saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijāto 'si pāṇḍava // BhG_16.5 //
analyzed: mā śucaḥ saṃpadam daivīm abhijātaḥ asi pāṇḍava

original: śokaṃ mā kṛthāḥ;
analyzed: śokam mā kṛthāḥ

original: tvaṃ tu daivīṃ saṃpadam abhijāto 'si /
analyzed: tvam tu daivīm saṃpadam abhijātaḥ asi

original: pāṇḍava /
analyzed: pāṇḍava

original: dhārmikāgresarasya hi pāṇḍos tanayas tvam ityabhiprāyaḥ // BhGR_16.5 //
analyzed: dhārmika agresarasya hi pāṇḍoḥ tanayaḥ tvam iti abhiprāyaḥ

original: dvau bhūtasargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca /
analyzed: dvau bhūta sargau loke asmin daivaḥ āsuraḥ eva ca

original: daivo vistaraśaḥ prokta āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu // BhG_16.6 //
analyzed: daivaḥ vistaraśaḥ proktaḥ āsuram pārtha me śṛṇu

original: asmin karmaloke karmakarāṇāṃ bhūtānāṃ sargo dvividhau daivaś cāsuraś ceti /
analyzed: asmin karma loke karmakarāṇām bhūtānām sargaḥ dvividhau daivaḥ ca āsuraḥ ca iti

original: sargaḥ utpattiḥ,
analyzed: sargaḥ utpattiḥ

original: prācīnapuṇyapāparūpakarmavaśād bhagavadājñānuvṛttitadviparītakaraṇāyotpattikāla eva vibhāgena bhūtāny utpadyanta ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: prācīna puṇya pāpa rūpa karma vaśāt bhagavat ājñā anuvṛtti tad viparīta karaṇāya utpatti kāle eva vibhāgena bhūtāni utpadyante iti arthaḥ

original: tatra daivaḥ sargo vistaraśaḥ proktaḥ devānāṃ madājñānuvṛttiśīlānām utpattir yadācārakaraṇārthā,
analyzed: tatra daivaḥ sargaḥ vistaraśaḥ proktaḥ devānām mad ājñā anuvṛtti śīlānām utpattiḥ yad ācāra karaṇa arthā

original: sa ācāraḥ karmayogajñānayogabhaktiyogarūpo vistaraśaḥ proktaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ ācāraḥ karma yoga jñāna yoga bhakti yoga rūpaḥ vistaraśaḥ proktaḥ

original: asurāṇāṃ sargaś ca yadācārārthaḥ,
analyzed: asurāṇām sargaḥ ca yad ācāra arthaḥ

original: tam ācāraṃ me śṛṇu mama sakāśāc chṛṇu // BhGR_16.6 //
analyzed: tam ācāram me śṛṇu mama sakāśāt śṛṇu

original: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca janā na vidur āsurāḥ /
analyzed: pravṛttim ca nivṛttim ca janāḥ na viduḥ āsurāḥ

original: na śaucaṃ nāpi cācāro na satyaṃ teṣu vidyate // BhG_16.7 //
analyzed: na śaucam na api ca ācāraḥ na satyam teṣu vidyate

original: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca abhyudayasādhanaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ ca vaidikaṃ dharmam āsurā na viduḥ na jānanti /
analyzed: pravṛttim ca nivṛttim ca abhyudaya sādhanam mokṣa sādhanam ca vaidikam dharmam āsurāḥ na viduḥ na jānanti

original: śaucam vaidikakarmayogyatvaṃ śāstrasiddham;
analyzed: śaucam vaidika karma yogya tvam śāstra siddham

original: tad bāhyam āntaraṃ cāsureṣu na vidyate /
analyzed: tat bāhyam āntaram ca asureṣu na vidyate

original: nāpi cācāraḥ tad bāhyāntaraśaucaṃ yena sandhyāvandanādinā ācāreṇa jāyate,
analyzed: nā api ca ācāraḥ tat bāhya antara śaucam yena sandhyā vandana ādinā ācāreṇa jāyate

original: so 'py ācāras teṣu na vidyate /
analyzed: saḥ api ācāraḥ teṣu na vidyate

original: yathoktam, “saṃdhyāhīno 'śucir nityam anarhas sarvakarmasu” iti /
analyzed: yathā uktam saṃdhyā hīnaḥ aśuciḥ nityam anarhaḥ sarva karmasu iti

original: tathā satyaṃ ca teṣu na vidyate yathājñātabhūtahitarūpabhāṣaṇaṃ teṣu na vidyate // BhGR_16.7 //
analyzed: tathā satyam ca teṣu na vidyate yathā a jñāta bhūta hita rūpa bhāṣaṇam teṣu na vidyate

original: kiṃ ca
analyzed: kim ca

original: asatyam apratiṣṭhaṃ te jagad āhur anīśvaram /
analyzed: asatyam apratiṣṭham te jagat āhuḥ anīśvaram

original: aparasparasaṃbhūtaṃ kim anyat kāmahetukam // BhG_16.8 //
analyzed: a paraspara saṃbhūtam kim anyat kāma hetukam

original: asatyam jagad etat satyaśabdanirdiṣṭabrahmakāryatayā brahmātmakam iti nāhuḥ /
analyzed: asatyam jagat etat satya śabda nirdiṣṭa brahma kārya tayā brahma ātmakam iti na āhuḥ

original: apratiṣṭham tathā brahmaṇi pratiṣṭhitam iti na vadanti /
analyzed: apratiṣṭham tathā brahmaṇi pratiṣṭhitam iti na vadanti

original: brahmaṇānantena dhṛtā hi pṛthivī sarvān lokān bibharti /
analyzed: brahmaṇā anantena dhṛtā hi pṛthivī sarvān lokān bibharti

original: yathoktam, “teneyaṃ nāgavaryeṇa śirasā vidhṛtā mahī /
analyzed: yathā uktam tena iyam nāga varyeṇa śirasā vidhṛtā mahī

original: bibharti mālāṃ lokānāṃ sad evāsuramānuṣām” iti /
analyzed: bibharti mālām lokānām sat eva asura mānuṣām iti

original: anīśvaram /
analyzed: anīśvaram

original: satyasaṃkalpena pareṇa brahmaṇā sarveśvareṇa mayaitanniyamitam iti ca na vadanti /
analyzed: satya saṃkalpena pareṇa brahmaṇā sarva īśvareṇa mayā etat niyamitam iti ca na vadanti

original: “ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattas sarvaṃ pravartate” iti hy uktam /
analyzed: aham sarvasya prabhavaḥ mattaḥ sarvam pravartate iti hi uktam

original: vadanti caivam aparas parasaṃbhūtam; kim anyat /
analyzed: vadanti ca evam para saṃbhūtam kim anyat

original: yoṣitpuruṣayoḥ parasparasaṃbandhena jātam idaṃ manuṣyapaśvādikam upalabhyate;
analyzed: yoṣit puruṣayoḥ paraspara saṃbandhena jātam idam manuṣya paśu ādikam upalabhyate

original: anevaṃbhūtaṃ kim anyad upalabhyate ?
analyzed: anevaṃbhūtam kim anyat upalabhyate

original: kiṃcid api nopalabhyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kiṃcid api na upalabhyate iti arthaḥ

original: ataḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat kāmahetukam iti // BhGR_16.8 //
analyzed: atas sarvam idam jagat kāma hetukam iti

original: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya naṣṭātmāno 'lpabuddhayaḥ /
analyzed: etām dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya naṣṭa ātmānaḥ alpabuddhayaḥ

original: prabhavanty ugrakarmāṇaḥ kṣayāya jagato 'śubhāḥ // BhG_16.9 //
analyzed: prabhavanti ugra karmāṇaḥ kṣayāya jagataḥ aśubhāḥ

original: etāṃ dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya avalambya,
analyzed: etām dṛṣṭim avaṣṭabhya avalambya

original: naṣṭātmānaḥ adṛṣṭadehātiriktātmānaḥ,
analyzed: naṣṭa ātmānaḥ adṛṣṭa deha atirikta ātmānaḥ

original: alpabuddhayaḥ ghaṭādivaj jñeyabhūte dehe jñātṛtvena dehavyatirikta ātmopalabhyata iti vivekākuśalāḥ,
analyzed: alpabuddhayaḥ ghaṭa ādi vat jñeya bhūte dehe jñātṛ tvena deha vyatiriktaḥ ātmā upalabhyate iti viveka akuśalāḥ

original: ugrakarmāṇaḥ sarveṣāṃ hiṃsakā jagataḥ kṣayāya prabhavanti // BhGR_16.9 //
analyzed: ugra karmāṇaḥ sarveṣām hiṃsakāḥ jagataḥ kṣayāya prabhavanti

original: kāmam āśritya duṣpūraṃ dambhamānamadānvitāḥ /
analyzed: kāmam āśritya duṣpūram dambha māna mada anvitāḥ

original: mohād gṛhītvāsadgrāhān pravartante 'śucivratāḥ // BhG_16.10 //
analyzed: mohāt gṛhītvā asat grāhān pravartante aśuci vratāḥ

original: duṣpūram duṣprāpaviṣayaṃ kāmam āśritya tatsisādhayiṣayā mohād ajñānāt,
analyzed: duṣpūram duṣprāpa viṣayam kāmam āśritya tad sisādhayiṣayā mohāt ajñānāt

original: asadgrāhān anyāyagṛhītaparigrahān gṛhītvā,
analyzed: asat grāhān anyāya gṛhīta parigrahān gṛhītvā

original: aśucivratāḥ aśāstravihitavratayuktāḥ dambhamānamadānvitāḥ pravartante // BhGR_16.10 //
analyzed: aśuci vratāḥ aśāstra vihita vrata yuktāḥ dambha māna mada anvitāḥ pravartante

original: cintām aparimeyāṃ ca pralayāntām upāśritāḥ /
analyzed: cintām aparimeyām ca pralaya antām upāśritāḥ

original: kāmopabhogaparamā etāvad iti niścitāḥ // BhG_16.11 //
analyzed: kāma upabhoga paramāḥ etāvat iti niścitāḥ

original: adya śvo vā mumūrṣavaḥ cintām aparimeyām aparicchedyāṃ pralayāntāṃ prākṛtapralayāvadhikālasādhyaviṣayām upāśritāḥ,
analyzed: adya śvas vā mumūrṣavaḥ cintām aparimeyām a paricchedyām pralaya antām prākṛta pralaya avadhi kāla sādhya viṣayām upāśritāḥ

original: tathā kāmopabhogaparamāḥ kāmopabhoga eva paramapuruṣārtha iti manvānāḥ,
analyzed: tathā kāma upabhoga paramāḥ kāma upabhogaḥ eva parama puruṣa arthaḥ iti manvānāḥ

original: etāvad iti niścitāḥ ito 'dhikaḥ puruṣārtho na vidyata iti saṃjātaniścayāḥ // BhGR_16.11 //
analyzed: etāvat iti niścitāḥ itas adhikaḥ puruṣa arthaḥ na vidyate iti saṃjāta niścayāḥ

original: āśāpāśaśatair baddhāḥ kāmakrodhaparāyaṇāḥ /
analyzed: āśā pāśa śataiḥ baddhāḥ kāma krodha parāyaṇāḥ

original: īhante kāmabhogārtham anyāyenārthasañcayān // BhG_16.12 //
analyzed: īhante kāma bhoga artham anyāyena artha sañcayān

original: āśāpāśaśataiḥ āśākhyapāśaśatair baddhāḥ,
analyzed: āśā pāśa śataiḥ āśā ākhya pāśa śataiḥ baddhāḥ

original: kāmakrodhaparāyaṇāḥ kāmakrodhaikaniṣṭhāḥ,
analyzed: kāma krodha parāyaṇāḥ kāma krodha ekaniṣṭhāḥ

original: kāmabhogārtham anyāyenārthasaṃcayān prati īhante // BhGR_16.12 //
analyzed: kāma bhoga artham anyāyena artha saṃcayān prati īhante

original: idam adya mayā labdham imaṃ prāpsye manoratham /
analyzed: idam adya mayā labdham imam prāpsye manoratham

original: idam astīdam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam // BhG_16.13 //
analyzed: idam asti idam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam

original: idam kṣetraputrādikaṃ sarvaṃ mayā matsāmarthyenaiva labdham,
analyzed: idam kṣetra putra ādikam sarvam mayā mad sāmarthyena eva labdham

original: nādṛṣṭādinā;
analyzed: na a dṛṣṭa ādinā

original: imaṃ ca manoratham aham eva prāpsye,
analyzed: imam ca manoratham aham eva prāpsye

original: nādṛṣṭādisahitaḥ /
analyzed: na adṛṣṭa ādi sahitaḥ

original: idaṃ dhanaṃ matsāmarthyena labdhaṃ me asti,
analyzed: idam dhanam mad sāmarthyena labdham me asti

original: idam api punar me matsāmarthyenaiva bhaviṣyati // BhGR_16.13 //
analyzed: idam api punar me mad sāmarthyena eva bhaviṣyati

original: asau mayā hataḥ śatrur haniṣye cāparān api /
analyzed: asau mayā hataḥ śatruḥ haniṣye ca aparān api

original: asau mayā balavatā hataḥ śatruḥ /
analyzed: asau mayā balavatā hataḥ śatruḥ

original: aparān api śatrūn ahaṃ śūro dhīraś ca haniṣye /
analyzed: aparān api śatrūn aham śūraḥ dhīraḥ ca haniṣye

original: kim atra mandadhībhir durbalaiḥ parikalpitenādṛṣṭaparikareṇa //
analyzed: kim atra manda dhībhiḥ durbalaiḥ parikalpitena adṛṣṭa parikareṇa

original: tathā ca
analyzed: tathā ca

original: īśvaro 'ham ahaṃ bhogī siddho 'haṃ balavān sukhī // BhG_16.14 //
analyzed: īśvaraḥ aham aham bhogī siddhaḥ aham balavān sukhī

original: īśvaro 'ham svādhīno 'ham;
analyzed: īśvaraḥ aham svādhīnaḥ aham

original: anyeṣāṃ cāham eva niyantā /
analyzed: anyeṣām ca aham eva niyantā

original: ahaṃ bhogī svata evāhaṃ bhogī;
analyzed: aham bhogī svatas eva aham bhogī

original: nādṛṣṭādibhiḥ /
analyzed: na a dṛṣṭa ādibhiḥ

original: siddho 'ham svatassiddho 'ham;
analyzed: siddhaḥ aham svatas siddhaḥ aham

original: na kasmāccid adṛṣṭādeḥ /
analyzed: na kasmāccid adṛṣṭa ādeḥ

original: tathā svata eva balavān;
analyzed: tathā svatas eva balavān

original: svata eva sukhī // BhGR_16.14 //
analyzed: svatas eva sukhī

original: āḍhyo 'bhijanavān asmi ko 'nyo 'sti sadṛśo mayā /
analyzed: āḍhyaḥ abhijanavān asmi kaḥ anyaḥ asti sadṛśaḥ mayā

original: yakṣye dāsyāmi modiṣya ityajñānavimohitāḥ // BhG_16.15 //
analyzed: yakṣye dāsyāmi modiṣye iti ajñāna vimohitāḥ

original: ahaṃ svataś cāḍhyo 'smi;
analyzed: aham svatas ca āḍhyaḥ asmi

original: abhijanavān asmi svata evottamakule prasūto 'smi;
analyzed: abhijanavān asmi svatas eva uttama kule prasūtaḥ asmi

original: asmin loke mayā sadṛśaḥ ko 'nyaḥ svasāmarthyalabdhasarvavibhavo vidyate?
analyzed: asmin loke mayā sadṛśaḥ kaḥ anyaḥ sva sāmarthya labdha sarva vibhavaḥ vidyate

original: ahaṃ svayam eva yakṣye dāsyāmi,
analyzed: aham svayam eva yakṣye dāsyāmi

original: modiṣye ityajñānavimohitāḥ īśvarānugrahanirapekṣeṇa svenaiva yāgadānādikaṃ kartuṃ śakyam ityajñānavimohitā manyante // BhGR_16.15 //
analyzed: modiṣye iti ajñāna vimohitāḥ īśvara anugraha nirapekṣeṇa svena eva yāga dāna ādikam kartum śakyam iti ajñāna vimohitāḥ manyante

original: anekacittavibhrāntā mohajālasamāvṛtāḥ /
analyzed: aneka citta vibhrāntāḥ moha jāla samāvṛtāḥ

original: prasaktāḥ kāmabhogeṣu patanti narake 'śucau // BhG_16.16 //
analyzed: prasaktāḥ kāma bhogeṣu patanti narake aśucau

original: adṛṣṭeśvarādisahakāram ṛte svenaiva sarvaṃ kartuṃ śakyam iti kṛtvā,
analyzed: adṛṣṭa īśvara ādi sahakāram ṛte svena eva sarvam kartum śakyam iti kṛtvā

original: evaṃ kuryām,
analyzed: evam kuryām

original: tac ca kuryām,
analyzed: tat ca kuryām

original: anyac ca kuryām ity anekacittavibhrāntāḥ,
analyzed: anyat ca kuryām iti aneka citta vibhrāntāḥ

original: evaṃrūpeṇa mohajālena samāvṛtāḥ,
analyzed: evaṃrūpeṇa moha jālena samāvṛtāḥ

original: kāmabhogeṣu prakarṣeṇa saktāḥ,
analyzed: kāma bhogeṣu prakarṣeṇa saktāḥ

original: madhye mṛtāḥ aśucau narake patanti // BhGR_16.16 //
analyzed: madhye mṛtāḥ aśucau narake patanti

original: ātmasaṃbhāvitāḥ stabdhāḥ dhanamānamadānvitāḥ /
analyzed: ātma saṃbhāvitāḥ stabdhāḥ dhana māna mada anvitāḥ

original: yajante nāmayajñais te dambhenāvidhipūrvakam // BhG_16.17 //
analyzed: yajante nāma yajñaiḥ te dambhena a vidhi pūrvakam

original: ātmanaiva saṃbhāvitāḥ /
analyzed: ātmanā eva saṃbhāvitāḥ

original: ātmanaivātmānaṃ saṃbhāvayantītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: ātmanā eva ātmānam saṃbhāvayanti iti arthaḥ

original: stabdhāḥ paripūrṇaṃ manyamānā na kiṃcitkurvāṇāḥ /
analyzed: stabdhāḥ paripūrṇam manyamānāḥ na kiṃcid kurvāṇāḥ

original: katham ? dhanamānamadānvitāḥ dhanena vidyābhijanābhimānena ca janitamadānvitāḥ,
analyzed: katham dhana māna mada anvitāḥ dhanena vidyā abhijana abhimānena ca janita mada anvitāḥ

original: nāmayajñaiḥ nāmaprayojanaiḥ yaṣṭetināmamātraprayojanair yajñaiḥ yajante /
analyzed: nāma yajñaiḥ nāma prayojanaiḥ yaṣṭā iti nāma mātra prayojanaiḥ yajñaiḥ yajante

original: tad api dambhena hetunā yaṣṭṛtvakhyāpanāya,
analyzed: tat api dambhena hetunā yaṣṭṛ tva khyāpanāya

original: avidhipūrvakam ayathācodanaṃ yajante // BhGR_16.17 //
analyzed: a vidhi pūrvakam a yathācodanam yajante

original: te cedṛgbhūtā yajanta ity āha
analyzed: te ca īdṛś bhūtāḥ yajante iti āha

original: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ /
analyzed: ahaṃkāram balam darpam kāmam krodham ca saṃśritāḥ

original: mām ātmaparadeheṣu pradviṣanto 'bhyasūyakāḥ // BhG_16.18 //
analyzed: mām ātma para deheṣu pradviṣantaḥ abhyasūyakāḥ

original: ananyāpekṣo 'ham eva sarvaṃ karomītyevaṃrūpam ahaṃkāram āśritāḥ,
analyzed: an anya apekṣaḥ aham eva sarvam karomi iti evaṃrūpam ahaṃkāram āśritāḥ

original: tathā sarvasya karaṇe madbalam eva paryāptam iti ca balam,
analyzed: tathā sarvasya karaṇe mad balam eva paryāptam iti ca balam

original: ato matsadṛśo na kaścid astīti ca darpam,
analyzed: atas mad sadṛśaḥ na kaścid asti iti ca darpam

original: evaṃbhūtasya mama kāmamātreṇa sarvaṃ saṃpatsyata iti kāmam,
analyzed: evaṃbhūtasya mama kāma mātreṇa sarvam saṃpatsyate iti kāmam

original: mama ye aniṣṭakāriṇas tān sarvān haniṣyāmīti ca krodham,
analyzed: mama ye aniṣṭa kāriṇaḥ tān sarvān haniṣyāmi iti ca krodham

original: evam etān saṃśritāḥ,
analyzed: evam etān saṃśritāḥ

original: svadeheṣu paradeheṣu cāvasthitaṃ sarvasya kārayitāraṃ puruṣottamaṃ mām abhyasūyakāḥ pradviṣantaḥ,
analyzed: sva deheṣu para deheṣu ca avasthitam sarvasya kārayitāram puruṣottamam mām abhyasūyakāḥ pradviṣantaḥ

original: kuyuktibhir matsthitau doṣam āviṣkurvanto mām asahamānāḥ /
analyzed: ku yuktibhiḥ mad sthitau doṣam āviṣkurvantaḥ mām a sahamānāḥ

original: ahaṃkārādikān saṃśritā yāgādikaṃ sarvaṃ kriyājātaṃ kurvata ityarthaḥ // BhGR_16.18 //
analyzed: ahaṃkāra ādikān saṃśritāḥ yāga ādikam sarvam kriyā jātam kurvataḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān /
analyzed: tān aham dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu nara adhamān

original: kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu // BhG_16.19 //
analyzed: kṣipāmi ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣu eva yoniṣu

original: ya evaṃ māṃ dviṣanti,
analyzed: ye evam mām dviṣanti

original: tān krūrān narādhamān aśubhān aham ajasraṃ saṃsāreṣu janmajarāmaraṇādirūpeṇa parivartamāneṣu saṃtāneṣu,
analyzed: tān krūrān nara adhamān aśubhān aham ajasram saṃsāreṣu janma jarā maraṇa ādi rūpeṇa parivartamāneṣu saṃtāneṣu

original: tatrāpy āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu kṣipāmi madānukūlyapratyanīkeṣv eva janmasu kṣipāmi /
analyzed: tatra api āsurīṣu eva yoniṣu kṣipāmi mada ānukūlya pratyanīkeṣu eva janmasu kṣipāmi

original: tattajjanmaprāptyanuguṇapravṛttihetubhūtabuddhiṣu krūrāsv aham eva saṃyojayāmītyarthaḥ // BhGR_16.19 //
analyzed: tad tad janma prāpti anuguṇa pravṛtti hetu bhūta buddhiṣu krūrāsu aham eva saṃyojayāmi iti arthaḥ

original: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani /
analyzed: āsurīm yonim āpannāḥ mūḍhāḥ janmani janmani

original: mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim // BhG_16.20 //
analyzed: mām a prāpya eva kaunteya tatas yānti adhamām gatim

original: madānukūlyapratyanīkajanmāpannāḥ punar api janmani janmani mūḍhāḥ madviparītajñānā
analyzed: mad ānukūlya pratyanīka janma āpannāḥ punar api janmani janmani mūḍhāḥ mad viparīta jñānā

original: mām aprāpyaiva “asti bhagavān sarveśvaro vāsudevaḥ” iti jñānam aprāpya tataḥ tato
analyzed: mām a prāpya eva asti bhagavān sarva īśvaraḥ vāsudevaḥ iti jñānam a prāpya tatas

original: janmano 'dhamām eva gatiṃ yānti/20 //
analyzed: janmanaḥ adhamām eva gatim

original: asyāsurasvabhāvasyātmanāśasya mūlahetum āha
analyzed: asya asura svabhāvasya ātma nāśasya mūla hetum āha

original: trividhaṃ narakasyaitad dvāraṃ nāśanam ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: trividham narakasya etat dvāram nāśanam ātmanaḥ

original: kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etattrayaṃ tyajet // BhG_16.21 //
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ tathā lobhaḥ tasmāt etat trayam tyajet

original: asyāsurasvabhāvarūpasya narakasyaitat trividhaṃ dvāram,
analyzed: asya āsura svabhāva rūpasya narakasya etat trividham dvāram

original: tac cātmano nāśanam;
analyzed: tat ca ātmanaḥ nāśanam

original: kāmaḥ krodho lobha iti trayāṇāṃ svarūpaṃ pūrvam eva vyākhyātam /
analyzed: kāmaḥ krodhaḥ lobhaḥ iti trayāṇām svarūpam pūrvam eva vyākhyātam

original: dvāram mārgaḥ;
analyzed: dvāram mārgaḥ

original: hetur ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: hetuḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tasmād etattrayaṃ tyajet;
analyzed: tasmāt etat trayam tyajet

original: tasmād atighoranarakahetutvāt kāmakrodhalobhānām,
analyzed: tasmāt ati ghora naraka hetu tvāt kāma krodha lobhānām

original: etattritayaṃ dūrataḥ parityajet // BhGR_16.21 //
analyzed: etat tritayam dūratas parityajet

original: etair vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamodvārais tribhir naraḥ /
analyzed: etaiḥ vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamaḥ dvāraiḥ tribhiḥ naraḥ

original: ācaraty ātmanaḥ śreyas tato yāti parāṃ gatim // BhG_16.22 //
analyzed: ācarati ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ tatas yāti parām gatim

original: etaiḥ kāmakrodhalobhaiḥ tamodvāraiḥ madviparītajñānahetubhiḥ vimuko naraḥ ātmanaḥ śreya ācarati labdhamadviṣayajñāno madānukūlye prayatate
analyzed: etaiḥ kāma krodha lobhaiḥ tamaḥ dvāraiḥ mad viparīta jñāna hetubhiḥ vimukaḥ naraḥ ātmanaḥ śreyaḥ ācarati labdha mad viṣaya jñānaḥ mad ānukūlye prayatate

original: tato mām eva parāṃ gatiṃ yāti // BhGR_16.22 //
analyzed: tatas mām eva parām gatim yāti

original: śāstrānādaro 'sya narakasya pradhānahetur ity āha
analyzed: śāstra anādaraḥ asya narakasya pradhāna hetuḥ iti āha

original: yaḥ śāstravidhim utsṛjya vartate kāmakārataḥ /
analyzed: yaḥ śāstra vidhim utsṛjya vartate kāmakārataḥ

original: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim // BhG_16.23 //
analyzed: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukham na parām gatim

original: śāstraṃ vedāḥ;
analyzed: śāstram vedāḥ

original: vidhiḥ anuśāsanam /
analyzed: vidhiḥ anuśāsanam

original: vedākhyaṃ madanuśāsanam utsṛjya yaḥ kāmakārato vartate svacchandānuguṇamārgeṇa vartate,
analyzed: veda ākhyam mad anuśāsanam utsṛjya yaḥ kāmakārataḥ vartate svacchanda anuguṇa mārgeṇa vartate

original: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na kām apy āmuṣmikīṃ siddhim avāpnoti;
analyzed: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na kām api āmuṣmikīm siddhim avāpnoti

original: na sukhaṃ kiṃcid avāpnoti /
analyzed: na sukham kiṃcid avāpnoti

original: na parāṃ gatim /
analyzed: na parām gatim

original: kutaḥ parāṃ gatiṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_16.23 //
analyzed: kutas parām gatim prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: tasmāc chāstraṃ pramāṇaṃ te kāryākāryavyavasthitau /
analyzed: tasmāt śāstram pramāṇam te kārya akārya vyavasthitau

original: jñātvā śāstravidhānoktaṃ karma kartum ihārhasi // BhG_16.24 //
analyzed: jñātvā śāstra vidhāna uktam karma kartum iha arhasi

original: tasmāt kāryākāryavyvasthitau upādeyānupādeyavyavasthāyāṃ śāstram eva tava pramāṇam /
analyzed: tasmāt kārya akārya vyvasthitau upādeya anupādeya vyavasthāyām śāstram eva tava pramāṇam

original: dharmaśāstretihāsapurāṇādyupabṛṃhitā vedāḥ yad eva puruṣottamākhyaṃ paraṃ tattvaṃ tatprīṇanarūpaṃ tatprāptyupāyabhūtaṃ ca karmāvabodhayanti,
analyzed: dharma śāstra itihāsa purāṇa ādi upabṛṃhitāḥ vedāḥ yat eva puruṣottama ākhyam param tattvam tad prīṇana rūpam tad prāpti upāya bhūtam ca karma avabodhayanti

original: tac śāstravidhānoktaṃ tattvaṃ karma ca jñātvā yathāvad anyūnātiriktaṃ vijñāya,
analyzed: tat śāstra vidhāna uktam tattvam karma ca jñātvā yathāvat anyūna atiriktam vijñāya

original: kartuṃ tvam arhasi tad evopādātum arhasi // BhGR_16.24 //
analyzed: kartum tvam arhasi tat eva upādātum arhasi

original: devāsuravibhāgoktimukhena prāpyatattvajñānaṃ tatprāptyupāyajñānaṃ ca vedaikamūlam ityuktam /
analyzed: deva asura vibhāga ukti mukhena prāpya tattva jñānam tad prāpti upāya jñānam ca veda eka mūlam iti uktam

original: idānīm aśāstravihitasyāsuratvenāphalatvam,
analyzed: idānīm a śāstra vihitasya āsura tvena aphalatvam

original: śāstravihitasya ca guṇatas traividhyam,
analyzed: śāstra vihitasya ca guṇataḥ traividhyam

original: śāstrasiddhasya lakṣaṇaṃ cocyate /
analyzed: śāstra siddhasya lakṣaṇam ca ucyate

original: tatrāśāstravihitasya niṣphalatvam ajānan aśāstravihite śraddhāsaṃyukte yāgādau sattvādinimittaphalabhedabubhutsayā arjunaḥ pṛcchati
analyzed: tatra a śāstra vihitasya niṣphala tvam a jānan a śāstra vihite śraddhā saṃyukte yāga ādau sattva ādi nimitta phala bheda bubhutsayā arjunaḥ pṛcchati

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: ye śāstravidhim utsṛjya yajante śraddhayānvitāḥ /
analyzed: ye śāstra vidhim utsṛjya yajante śraddhayā anvitāḥ

original: teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajas tamaḥ // BhG_17.1 //
analyzed: teṣām niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajaḥ tamaḥ

original: śāstravidhim utsṛjya śraddhayānvitā ye yajante,
analyzed: śāstra vidhim utsṛjya śraddhayā anvitāḥ ye yajante

original: teṣāṃ niṣṭhā kā ?
analyzed: teṣām niṣṭhā kā

original: kiṃ sattvam ?
analyzed: kim sattvam

original: āhosvid rajaḥ ?
analyzed: āhosvit rajaḥ

original: atha tamaḥ ?
analyzed: atha tamaḥ

original: niṣṭhā sthitiḥ;
analyzed: niṣṭhā sthitiḥ

original: sthīyate 'sminn iti sthitiḥ sattvādir eva niṣṭhety ucyate /
analyzed: sthīyate asmin iti sthitiḥ sattva ādiḥ eva niṣṭhā iti ucyate

original: teṣāṃ kiṃ sattve sthitiḥ ?
analyzed: teṣām kim sattve sthitiḥ

original: kiṃ vā rajasi ?
analyzed: kim vā rajasi

original: kiṃ vā tamasītyarthaḥ // BhGR_17.1 //
analyzed: kim vā tamasi iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ pṛṣṭo bhagavān aśāstravihitaśraddhāyās tatpūrvakasya ca yāgāder niṣphalatvaṃ
analyzed: evam pṛṣṭaḥ bhagavān aśāstra vihita śraddhāyāḥ tad pūrvakasya ca yāga ādeḥ niṣphala tvam

original: hṛdi nidhāya śāstrīyasyaiva yāgāder guṇatas traividhyaṃ pratipādayituṃ śāstrīyaśraddhāyāḥ
analyzed: hṛdi nidhāya śāstrīyasya eva yāga ādeḥ guṇataḥ traividhyam pratipādayitum śāstrīya śraddhāyāḥ

original: traividhyaṃ tāvad āha
analyzed: traividhyam tāvat āha

original: śrībhagavān uvāca
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca

original: trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehināṃ sā svabhāvajā /
analyzed: trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehinām sā svabhāva jā

original: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti tāṃ śṛṇu // BhG_17.2 //
analyzed: sāttvikī rājasī ca eva tāmasī ca iti tām śṛṇu

original: sarveṣāṃ dehināṃ śraddhā trividhā bhavati /
analyzed: sarveṣām dehinām śraddhā trividhā bhavati

original: sā ca svabhāvajā svabhāvaḥ svāsādhāraṇo bhāvaḥ,
analyzed: sā ca svabhāva jā svabhāvaḥ sva asādhāraṇaḥ bhāvaḥ

original: prācīnavāsanānimittaḥ tattadruciviśeṣaḥ /
yatra ruciḥ tatra śraddhā jāyate /
analyzed: yatra ruciḥ tatra śraddhā jāyate

original: śraddhā hi svābhimataṃ sādhayaty etad iti viśvāsapūrvikā sādhane tvarā /
analyzed: śraddhā hi sva abhimatam sādhayati etat iti viśvāsa pūrvikā sādhane tvarā

original: vāsanā ruciś ca śraddhā cātmadharmāḥ guṇasaṃsargajāḥ;
analyzed: vāsanā ruciḥ ca śraddhā ca ātma dharmāḥ guṇa saṃsarga jāḥ

original: teṣām ātmadharmāṇāṃ vāsanādīnāṃ janakāḥ dehendriyāntaḥkaraṇaviṣayagatā dharmāḥ kāryaikanirūpaṇīyāḥ sattvādayo guṇāḥ sattvādiguṇayuktadehādyanubhavajā  #
analyzed: teṣām ātma dharmāṇām vāsanā ādīnām janakāḥ deha indriya antaḥkaraṇa viṣaya gatāḥ dharmāḥ kārya eka nirūpaṇīyāḥ sattva ādayaḥ guṇāḥ sattva ādi guṇa yukta deha ādi anubhava jā  /

original: ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: iti arthaḥ

original: tataś ceyaṃ śraddhā sāttvikī rājasī tāmasī ceti trividhā /
analyzed: tatas ca iyam śraddhā sāttvikī rājasī tāmasī ca iti trividhā

original: tām imāṃ śraddhāṃ śṛṇu;
analyzed: tām imām śraddhām śṛṇu

original: sā śraddhā yat svabhāvā,
analyzed: sā śraddhā yat svabhāvā

original: taṃ svabhāvaṃ śṛṇv ityarthaḥ // BhGR_17.2 //
analyzed: tam svabhāvam śṛṇu iti arthaḥ

original: sattvānurūpā sarvasya śraddhā bhavati bhārata /
analyzed: sattva anurūpā sarvasya śraddhā bhavati bhārata

original: śraddhāmayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yacchraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ // BhG_17.3 //
analyzed: śraddhā mayaḥ ayam puruṣaḥ yaḥ yad śraddhaḥ saḥ eva saḥ

original: sattvam antaḥkaraṇam /
analyzed: sattvam antaḥkaraṇam

original: sarvasya puruṣasyāntaḥkaraṇānurūpā śraddhā bhavati /
analyzed: sarvasya puruṣasya antaḥkaraṇa anurūpā śraddhā bhavati

original: antaḥkaraṇaṃ yādṛśaguṇayuktam,
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇam yādṛśa guṇa yuktam

original: tadviṣayā śraddhā jāyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tad viṣayā śraddhā jāyate iti arthaḥ

original: sattvaśabdaḥ pūrvoktānāṃ dehendriyādīnāṃ pradarśanārthaḥ /
analyzed: sattva śabdaḥ pūrva uktānām deha indriya ādīnām pradarśana arthaḥ

original: śraddhāmayo 'yaṃ puruṣaḥ /
analyzed: śraddhā mayaḥ ayam puruṣaḥ

original: śraddhāmayaḥ śraddhāpariṇāmaḥ /
analyzed: śraddhā mayaḥ śraddhā pariṇāmaḥ

original: yo yacchraddhaḥ yaḥ puruṣo yādṛśyā śraddhayā yuktaḥ,
analyzed: yaḥ yad śraddhaḥ yaḥ puruṣaḥ yādṛśyā śraddhayā yuktaḥ

original: sa eva saḥ sa tādṛśaśraddhāpariṇāmaḥ /
analyzed: saḥ eva saḥ sa tādṛśa śraddhā pariṇāmaḥ

original: puṇyakarmaviṣaye śraddhāyuktaś cet,
analyzed: puṇya karma viṣaye śraddhā yuktaḥ ced

original: puṇyakarmaphalasaṃyukto bhavatīti śraddhāpradhānaḥ phalasaṃyoga ityuktaṃ bhavati // BhGR_17.3 //
analyzed: puṇya karma phala saṃyuktaḥ bhavati iti śraddhā pradhānaḥ phala saṃyogaḥ iti uktam bhavati

original: tad eva vivṛṇoti
analyzed: tat eva vivṛṇoti

original: yajante sāttvikā devān yakṣarakṣāṃsi rājasāḥ /
analyzed: yajante sāttvikāḥ devān yakṣa rakṣāṃsi rājasāḥ

original: pretān bhūtagaṇāṃś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ // BhG_17.4 //
analyzed: pretān bhūta gaṇān ca anye yajante tāmasāḥ janāḥ

original: sattvaguṇapracurāḥ sāttvikyā śraddhayā yuktāḥ devān yajante /
analyzed: sattva guṇa pracurāḥ sāttvikyā śraddhayā yuktāḥ devān yajante

original: duḥkhāsaṃbhinnotkṛṣṭasukhahetubhūtadevayāgaviṣayā śraddhā sāttvikītyuktaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: duḥkha asaṃbhinna utkṛṣṭa sukha hetu bhūta deva yāga viṣayā śraddhā sāttvikī iti uktam bhavati

original: rājasā yakṣarakṣāṃsi yajante /
analyzed: rājasā yakṣa rakṣāṃsi yajante

original: anye tu tāmasā janāḥ pretān bhūtagaṇān yajante /
analyzed: anye tu tāmasāḥ janāḥ pretān bhūta gaṇān yajante

original: duḥkhasaṃbhinnālpasukhajananī rājasī śraddhā;
analyzed: duḥkha saṃbhinna alpa sukha jananī rājasī śraddhā

original: duḥkhaprāyātyalpasukhajananī tāmasītyarthaḥ // BhGR_17.4 //
analyzed: duḥkha prāyā ati alpa sukha jananī tāmasī iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ śāstrīyeṣv eva yāgādiṣu śraddhāyukteṣu guṇataḥ phalaviśeṣaḥ. aśāstrīyeṣu tapoyāgaprabhṛtiṣu madanuśāsanaviparītatvena na kaścid api sukhalavaḥ,
analyzed: evam śāstrīyeṣu eva yāga ādiṣu śraddhā yukteṣu guṇataḥ phala viśeṣaḥ aśāstrīyeṣu tapaḥ yāga prabhṛtiṣu mad anuśāsana viparīta tvena na kaścid api sukha lavaḥ

original: api tv anartha eveti hṛdi nihitaṃ vyañjayan āha
analyzed: api tu anarthe eva iti hṛdi nihitam vyañjayan āha

original: aśāstravihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ /
analyzed: a śāstra vihitam ghoram tapyante ye tapaḥ janāḥ

original: dambhāhaṅkārasaṃyuktāḥ kāmarāgabalānvitāḥ // BhG_17.5 //
analyzed: dambha ahaṅkāra saṃyuktāḥ kāma rāga bala anvitāḥ

original: karśayantaḥ śarīrasthaṃ bhūtagrāmam acetasaḥ /
analyzed: karśayantaḥ śarīra stham bhūta grāmam acetasaḥ

original: māṃ caivāntaśśarīrasthaṃ tān viddhy āsuraniścayān // BhG_17.6 //
analyzed: mām ca eva antar śarīra stham tān viddhi āsura niścayān

original: aśāstravihitam atighoram api tapo ye janāḥ tapyante /
analyzed: a śāstra vihitam ati ghoram api tapaḥ ye janāḥ tapyante

original: pradarśanārtham idam /
analyzed: pradarśana artham idam

original: aśāstravihitaṃ bahvāyāsaṃ yāgādikaṃ ye kurvate,
analyzed: a śāstra vihitam bahu āyāsam yāga ādikam ye kurvate

original: dambhāhaṃkārasaṃyuktāḥ kāmarāgabalānvitāḥ śarīrasthaṃ pṛthivyādibhūtasamūhaṃ karśayantaḥ,
analyzed: dambha ahaṃkāra saṃyuktāḥ kāma rāga bala anvitāḥ śarīra stham pṛthivī ādi bhūta samūham karśayantaḥ

original: madaṃśabhūtaṃ jīvaṃ cāntaśśarīrasthaṃ karśayanto ye tapyante,
analyzed: mad aṃśa bhūtam jīvam ca antar śarīra stham karśayantaḥ ye tapyante

original: yāgādikaṃ ca kurvate;
analyzed: yāga ādikam ca kurvate

original: tān āsuraniścayān viddhi /
analyzed: tān āsura niścayān viddhi

original: asurāṇāṃ niścaya āsuro niścayaḥ;
analyzed: asurāṇām niścayaḥ āsuraḥ niścayaḥ

original: asurā hi madājñāviparītakāriṇaḥ;
analyzed: asurāḥ hi mad ājñā viparīta kāriṇaḥ

original: madājñāviparītakāritvāt teṣāṃ sukhalavasaṃbandho na vidyate;
analyzed: mad ājñā viparīta kāri tvāt teṣām sukha lava saṃbandhaḥ na vidyate

original: api tvananarthavrāte patantīti pūrvam evoktam,
analyzed: api tu an anartha vrāte patanti iti pūrvam eva uktam

original: “patanti narake 'ścau” iti // BhGR_17.5 //6//
analyzed: patanti narake aścau iti

original: atha prakṛtam eva śāstrīyeṣu yajñādiṣu guṇato viśeṣaṃ prapañcayati /
analyzed: atha prakṛtam eva śāstrīyeṣu yajña ādiṣu guṇataḥ viśeṣam prapañcayati

original: tatrāhāramūlatvāt sattvādivṛddher āhāratraividhyaṃ prathamam ucyate /
analyzed: tatra āhāra mūla tvāt sattva ādi vṛddheḥ āhāra traividhyam prathamam ucyate

original: “annamayaṃ hi somya manaḥ“,
analyzed: anna mayam hi somya manaḥ

original: “āhāraśuddhau sattvaśuddhiḥ” iti hi śrūyate
analyzed: āhāra śuddhau sattva śuddhiḥ iti hi śrūyate

original: āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ /
analyzed: āhāraḥ tu api sarvasya trividhaḥ bhavati priyaḥ

original: yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu // BhG_17.7 //
analyzed: yajñaḥ tapaḥ tathā dānam teṣām bhedam imam śṛṇu

original: āhāro 'pi sarvasya prāṇijātasya sattvādiguṇatrayānvayena trividhaḥ priyo bhavati /
analyzed: āhāraḥ api sarvasya prāṇi jātasya sattva ādi guṇatraya anvayena trividhaḥ priyaḥ bhavati

original: tathaiva yajño 'pi trividhaḥ,
analyzed: tathā eva yajñaḥ api trividhaḥ

original: tathā tapaḥ dānaṃ ca /
analyzed: tathā tapaḥ dānam ca

original: teṣām bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu teṣām āhārayajñatapodānānāṃ sattvādibhedenemam ucyamānaṃ bhedaṃ śṛṇu // BhGR_17.7 //
analyzed: teṣām bhedam imam śṛṇu teṣām āhāra yajña tapaḥ dānānām sattva ādi bhedena imam ucyamānam bhedam śṛṇu

original: āyussattvabalārogyasukhaprītivivardhanāḥ /
analyzed: āyuḥ sattva bala ārogya sukha prīti vivardhanāḥ

original: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvikapriyaḥ // BhG_17.8 //
analyzed: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirāḥ hṛdyāḥ āhārāḥ sāttvika priyaḥ

original: sattvaguṇopetasya sattvamayā āhārāḥ priyā bhavanti /
analyzed: sattva guṇa upetasya sattva mayāḥ āhārāḥ priyāḥ bhavanti

original: sattvamayāś cāhārā āyurvivardhanāḥ;
analyzed: sattva mayāḥ ca āhārāḥ āyuḥ vivardhanāḥ

original: punar api sattvasya vivardhanāḥ /
analyzed: punar api sattvasya vivardhanāḥ

original: sattvam antaḥkaraṇam;
analyzed: sattvam antaḥkaraṇam

original: antaḥkaraṇakāryaṃ jñānam iha sattvaśabdenocyate /
analyzed: antaḥkaraṇa kāryam jñānam iha sattva śabdena ucyate

original: “sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānam” iti sattvasya jñānavivṛddhihetutvāt,
analyzed: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānam iti sattvasya jñāna vivṛddhi hetu tvāt

original: āhāro 'pi sattvamayo jñānavivṛddhihetuḥ /
analyzed: āhāraḥ api sattva mayaḥ jñāna vivṛddhi hetuḥ

original: tathā balārogyayor api vivardhanāḥ /
analyzed: tathā bala ārogyayoḥ api vivardhanāḥ

original: sukhaprītyor api vivardhanāḥ pariṇāmakāle svayam eva sukhasya vivardhanāḥ ;
analyzed: sukha prītyoḥ api vivardhanāḥ pariṇāma kāle svayam eva sukhasya vivardhanāḥ

original: tathā prītihetubhūtakarmārambhadvāreṇa prītivardhanāḥ /
analyzed: tathā prīti hetu bhūta karma ārambha dvāreṇa prīti vardhanāḥ

original: rasyāḥ madhurarasopetāḥ /
analyzed: rasyāḥ madhura rasa upetāḥ

original: snigdhāḥ snehayuktāḥ /
analyzed: snigdhāḥ sneha yuktāḥ

original: sthirāḥ sthirapariṇāmāḥ /
analyzed: sthirāḥ sthira pariṇāmāḥ

original: hṛdyāḥ ramaṇīyaveṣāḥ /
analyzed: hṛdyāḥ ramaṇīya veṣāḥ

original: evaṃvidhāḥ sattvamayā āhārāḥ sāttvikasya puruṣasya priyāḥ // BhGR_17.8 //
analyzed: evaṃvidhāḥ sattva mayāḥ āhārāḥ sāttvikasya puruṣasya priyāḥ

original: kaṭvamlalavaṇātyuṣṇatīkṣṇarūkṣavidāhinaḥ /
analyzed: kaṭu amla lavaṇa ati uṣṇa tīkṣṇa rūkṣa vidāhinaḥ

original: āhārā rājasasyeṣṭā duḥkhaśokāmayapradāḥ // BhG_17.9 //
analyzed: āhārāḥ rājasasya iṣṭāḥ duḥkha śoka āmaya pradāḥ

original: kaṭurasāḥ, amlarasāḥ,
analyzed: kaṭu rasāḥ amla rasāḥ

original: lavaṇotkaṭāḥ,
atyuṣṇāḥ,
analyzed: ati uṣṇāḥ

original: atitīkṣaṇāḥ,
analyzed: atitīkṣaṇāḥ

original: rūkṣāḥ,
analyzed: rūkṣāḥ

original: vidāhinaś ceti kaṭvamlalavaṇātyuṣṇatīkṣṇarūkṣavidāhinaḥ /
analyzed: vidāhinaḥ ca iti kaṭu amla lavaṇa ati uṣṇa tīkṣṇa rūkṣa vidāhinaḥ

original: atiśaityātitaikṣṇyādinā durupayogās tīkṣṇāḥ;
analyzed: atiśaitya atitaikṣṇya ādinā durupayogāḥ tīkṣṇāḥ

original: śoṣakarā rūkṣāḥ;
analyzed: śoṣa karāḥ rūkṣāḥ

original: tāpakarā vidāhinaḥ /
analyzed: tāpa karāḥ vidāhinaḥ

original: evaṃvidhā āhārā rājasasyeṣṭāḥ /
analyzed: evaṃvidhāḥ āhārāḥ rājasasya iṣṭāḥ

original: te ca rajomayatvād duḥkhaśokāmayavardhanāḥ rajovardhanāś ca // BhGR_17.9 //
analyzed: te ca rajaḥ maya tvāt duḥkha śoka āmaya vardhanāḥ rajaḥ vardhanāḥ ca

original: yātayāmaṃ gatarasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: yātayāmam gata rasam pūti paryuṣitam ca yat

original: ucchiṣṭam api cāmedhyaṃ bhojanaṃ tāmasapriyam // BhG_17.10 //
analyzed: ucchiṣṭam api ca amedhyam bhojanam tāmasa priyam

original: yātayāmam cirakālāvasthitam;
analyzed: yātayāmam cira kāla avasthitam

original: gatarasam tyaktasvābhāvikarasam;
analyzed: gata rasam tyakta svābhāvika rasam

original: pūti durgandhopetam,
analyzed: pūti durgandha upetam

original: paryuṣitam kālātipattyā rasāntarāpannam;
analyzed: paryuṣitam kāla atipattyā rasa antara āpannam

original: ucchiṣṭam gurvādibhyo 'nyeṣāṃ bhuktaśiṣṭam;
analyzed: ucchiṣṭam guru ādibhyaḥ anyeṣām bhukta śiṣṭam

original: amedhyam ayajñārham;
analyzed: amedhyam a yajña arham

original: ayajñaśiṣṭam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: a yajña śiṣṭam iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃvidhaṃ tamomayaṃ bhojanaṃ tāmasapriyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: evaṃvidham tamaḥ mayam bhojanam tāmasa priyam bhavati

original: bhujyata iti āhāra eva bhojanam /
analyzed: bhujyate iti āhāraḥ eva bhojanam

original: punaś ca tamaso vardhanam /
analyzed: punar ca tamasaḥ vardhanam

original: ato hitaiṣibhiḥ sattvavivṛddhaye sāttvikāhāra eva sevyaḥ // BhGR_17.10 //
analyzed: atas hita eṣibhiḥ sattva vivṛddhaye sāttvika āhāraḥ eva sevyaḥ

original: aphalākāṅkṣibhir yajño vidhidṛṣṭo ya ijyate /
analyzed: a phala ākāṅkṣibhiḥ yajñaḥ vidhi dṛṣṭaḥ yaḥ ijyate

original: yaṣṭavyam eveti manas samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ // BhG_17.11 //
analyzed: yaṣṭavyam eva iti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ

original: phalākāṅkṣārahitaiḥ puruṣaiḥ vidhidṛṣṭaḥ śāstradṛṣṭaḥ mantradravyakriyādibhir yuktaḥ,
analyzed: phala ākāṅkṣā rahitaiḥ puruṣaiḥ vidhi dṛṣṭaḥ śāstra dṛṣṭaḥ mantra dravya kriyā ādibhiḥ yuktaḥ

original: yaṣṭavyam eveti bhagavadārādhanatvena svayaṃprayojanatayā yaṣṭavyam iti manas samādhāya yo yajña ijyate,
analyzed: yaṣṭavyam eva iti bhagavat ārādhana tvena svayaṃprayojana tayā yaṣṭavyam iti manaḥ samādhāya yaḥ yajñaḥ ijyate

original: sa sāttvikaḥ // BhGR_17.11 //
analyzed: sa sāttvikaḥ

original: abhisandhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yaḥ /
analyzed: abhisandhāya tu phalam dambha artham api ca eva yaḥ

original: ijyate bharataśreṣtha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam // BhG_17.12 //
analyzed: ijyate bharata śreṣtha tam yajñam viddhi rājasam

original: phalābhisandhiyuktair dambhagarbho yaśaḥphalaś ca yo yajña ijyate,
analyzed: phala abhisandhi yuktaiḥ dambha garbhaḥ yaśaḥ phalaḥ ca yaḥ yajñaḥ ijyate

original: taṃ yajñaṃ rājasaṃ viddhi // BhGR_17.12 //
analyzed: tam yajñam rājasam viddhi

original: vidhihīnam asṛṣṭānnaṃ mantrahīnam adakṣiṇam /
analyzed: vidhi hīnam a sṛṣṭa annam mantra hīnam a dakṣiṇam

original: śraddhāvirahitaṃ yajñaṃ tāmasaṃ paricakṣate // BhG_17.13 //
analyzed: śraddhā virahitam yajñam tāmasam paricakṣate

original: vidhihīnam brāhmaṇoktihīnam;
analyzed: vidhi hīnam brāhmaṇa ukti hīnam

original: sadācārayuktair vidvadbhir brāhmaṇair yajasvetyuktihīnam ityarthaḥ;
analyzed: sat ācāra yuktaiḥ vidvadbhiḥ brāhmaṇaiḥ yajasva iti ukti hīnam iti arthaḥ

original: asṛṣṭānnaṃ acoditadravyam,
analyzed: a sṛṣṭa annam a codita dravyam

original: mantrahīnam adakṣiṇaṃ śraddhāvirahitaṃ ca yajñaṃ tāmasaṃ paricakṣate // BhGR_17.13 //
analyzed: mantra hīnam adakṣiṇam śraddhā virahitam ca yajñam tāmasam paricakṣate

original: atha tapaso guṇatas traividhyaṃ vaktuṃ tasya śarīravāṅmanoniṣpādyatayā svarūpabhedaṃ tāvad āha
analyzed: atha tapasaḥ guṇataḥ traividhyam vaktum tasya śarīra vāc manaḥ niṣpādya tayā svarūpa bhedam tāvat āha

original: devadvijaguruprājñapūjanaṃ śaucam ārjavam /
analyzed: deva dvija guru prājña pūjanam śaucam ārjavam

original: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate // BhG_17.14 //
analyzed: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīram tapaḥ ucyate

original: devadvijaguruprājñānāṃ pūjanam,
analyzed: deva dvija guru prājñānām pūjanam

original: śaucam tīrthasnānādikam,
ārjavam yathāmanaḥśarīravṛttam,
analyzed: ārjavam yathāmanas śarīra vṛttam

original: brahmacaryam yoṣitsu bhogyatābuddhiyuktekṣaṇādirahitatvam,
ahiṃsā aprāṇipīḍā;
analyzed: ahiṃsā aprāṇi pīḍā

original: etac charīraṃ tapa ucyate // BhGR_17.14 //
analyzed: etat śarīram tapaḥ ucyate

original: anudvegakaraṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priyahitaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: an udvega karam vākyam satyam priya hitam ca yat

original: svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ caiva vāṅmayaṃ tapa ucyate // BhG_17.15 //
analyzed: svādhyāya abhyasanam ca eva vāc mayam tapaḥ ucyate

original: pareṣām anudvegakaraṃ satyaṃ priyahitaṃ ca yad vākyaṃ svādhyāyābhyasanaṃ cety etad vāṅmayaṃ tapa ucyate // BhGR_17.15 //
analyzed: pareṣām an udvega karam satyam priya hitam ca yat vākyam svādhyāya abhyasanam ca iti etat vāc mayam tapaḥ ucyate

original: manaḥprasādaḥ saumyatvaṃ maunam ātmavinigrahaḥ /
analyzed: manaḥ prasādaḥ saumya tvam maunam ātma vinigrahaḥ

original: bhāvasaṃśuddhir ity etat tapo mānasam ucyate // BhG_17.16 //
analyzed: bhāva saṃśuddhiḥ iti etat tapaḥ mānasam ucyate

original: manaḥprasādaḥ manasaḥ krodhādirahitatvam,
saumyatvam manasaḥ pareṣām abhyudayaprāvaṇyam,
analyzed: saumya tvam manasaḥ pareṣām abhyudaya prāvaṇyam

original: maunaṃ manasā vākpravṛttiniyamanam,
analyzed: maunam manasā vāc pravṛtti niyamanam

original: ātmavinigrahaḥ manovṛtter dhyeyaviṣaye 'vasthāpanam,
analyzed: ātma vinigrahaḥ manaḥ vṛtteḥ dhyeya viṣaye avasthāpanam

original: bhāvaśuddhiḥ ātmavyatiriktaviṣayacintārahitatvam;
etan mānasaṃ tapaḥ // BhGR_17.16 //
analyzed: etat mānasam tapaḥ

original: śraddhayā parayā taptaṃ tapas tat trividhaṃ naraiḥ /
analyzed: śraddhayā parayā taptam tapaḥ tat trividham naraiḥ

original: aphalākāṅkṣibhir yuktaiḥ sāttvikaṃ paricakṣate // BhG_17.17 //
analyzed: a phala ākāṅkṣibhiḥ yuktaiḥ sāttvikam paricakṣate

original: aphalākāṅkṣibhiḥ phalākāṅkṣārahitaiḥ,
analyzed: a phala ākāṅkṣibhiḥ phala ākāṅkṣā rahitaiḥ

original: yuktaiḥ paramapuruṣārādhanarūpam idam iti cintāyuktaiḥ naraiḥ parayā śraddhayā yat trividhaṃ tapaḥ kāyavāṅmanobhis taptam,
analyzed: yuktaiḥ paramapuruṣa ārādhana rūpam idam iti cintā yuktaiḥ naraiḥ parayā śraddhayā yat trividham tapaḥ kāya vāc manobhiḥ taptam

original: tat sāttvikaṃ paricakṣate // BhGR_17.17 //
analyzed: tat sāttvikam paricakṣate

original: satkāramānapūjārthaṃ tapo dambhena caiva yat /
analyzed: satkāra māna pūjā artham tapaḥ dambhena ca eva yat

original: kriyate tad iha proktaṃ rājasaṃ calam adhruvam // BhG_17.18 //
analyzed: kriyate tat iha proktam rājasam calam adhruvam

original: manasā ādaraḥ satkāraḥ,
analyzed: manasā ādaraḥ satkāraḥ

original: vācā praśaṃsā mānaḥ,
analyzed: vācā praśaṃsā mānaḥ

original: śarīro namaskārādiḥ pūjā /
analyzed: śarīraḥ namaskāra ādiḥ pūjā

original: phalābhisandhipūrvakaṃ satkārādyarthaṃ ca dambhena hetunā yat tapaḥ kriyate,
analyzed: phala abhisandhi pūrvakam satkāra ādi artham ca dambhena hetunā yat tapaḥ kriyate

original: tad iha rājasaṃ proktam;
analyzed: tat iha rājasam proktam

original: svargādiphalasādhanatvenāsthiratvāc calam adhruvam /
analyzed: svarga ādi phala sādhanatvena asthira tvāt calam adhruvam

original: calatvam pātabhayena calanahetutvam,
adhruvatvam kṣayiṣṇutvam //
analyzed: adhruva tvam kṣayiṣṇu tvam

original: mūḍhagrāheṇātmano yat pīḍayā kriyate tapaḥ /
analyzed: mūḍha grāheṇa ātmanaḥ yat pīḍayā kriyate tapaḥ

original: parasyotsādanārthaṃ vā tat tāmasam udāhṛtam // BhG_17.19 //
analyzed: parasya utsādana artham vā tat tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: mūḍhāḥ avivekinaḥ,
analyzed: mūḍhāḥ avivekinaḥ

original: mūḍhagrāheṇa mūḍhaiḥ kṛtenābhiniveśena ātmanaḥ śaktyādikam aparīkṣya ātmapīḍayā yat tapaḥ kriyate,
analyzed: mūḍha grāheṇa mūḍhaiḥ kṛtena abhiniveśena ātmanaḥ śakti ādikam a parīkṣya ātma pīḍayā yat tapaḥ kriyate

original: parasyotsādanārthaṃ ca yat kriyate,
analyzed: parasya utsādana artham ca yat kriyate

original: tat tāmasam udāhṛtam // BhGR_17.19 //
analyzed: tat tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: dātavyam iti yad dānaṃ dīyate 'nupakāriṇe /
analyzed: dātavyam iti yat dānam dīyate anupakāriṇe

original: deśe kāle ca pātre ca tad dānaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam // BhG_17.20 //
analyzed: deśe kāle ca pātre ca tat dānam sāttvikam smṛtam

original: phalābhisandhirahitaṃ dātavyam iti deśe kāle pātre cānupakāriṇe yad dānaṃ dīyate,
analyzed: phala abhisandhi rahitam dātavyam iti deśe kāle pātre ca anupakāriṇe yat dānam dīyate

original: tad dānaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam // BhGR_17.20 //
analyzed: tat dānam sāttvikam smṛtam

original: yat tu pratyupakārārthaṃ phalam uddiśya vā punaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu pratyupakāra artham phalam uddiśya vā punar

original: dīyate ca parikliṣṭaṃ tad rājasam udāhṛtam // BhG_17.21 //
analyzed: dīyate ca parikliṣṭam tat rājasam udāhṛtam

original: pratyupakārakaṭākṣagarbhaṃ phalam uddiśya ca,
analyzed: pratyupakāra kaṭākṣa garbham phalam uddiśya ca

original: parikliṣṭam akalyāṇadravyakaṃ yad dānaṃ dīyate,
analyzed: parikliṣṭam akalyāṇa dravyakam yat dānam dīyate

original: tad rājasam udāhṛtam // BhGR_17.21 //
analyzed: tat rājasam udāhṛtam

original: adeśakāle yad dānam apātrebhyaś ca dīyate /
analyzed: a deśa kāle yat dānam apātrebhyaḥ ca dīyate

original: asatkṛtam avajñātaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtam // BhG_17.22 //
analyzed: asatkṛtam avajñātam tat tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: adeśakāle apātrebhyaś ca yad dānaṃ dīyate,
analyzed: a deśa kāle apātrebhyaḥ ca yat dānam dīyate

original: asatkṛtam pādaprakṣālanādigauravarahitam,
analyzed: asatkṛtam pāda prakṣālana ādi gaurava rahitam

original: avajñātaṃ sāvajñam anupacārayuktaṃ yad dīyate,
analyzed: avajñātam sa avajñam anupacāra yuktam yat dīyate

original: tat tāmasam udāhṛtam /22//
analyzed: tat tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: evaṃ vaidikānāṃ yajñatapodānānāṃ sattvādiguṇabhedena bheda uktaḥ;
analyzed: evam vaidikānām yajña tapaḥ dānānām sattva ādi guṇa bhedena bhedaḥ uktaḥ

original: idānīṃ tasyaiva vaidikasya yajñādeḥ praṇavasaṃyogena tatsacchabdavyapadeśytayā ca lakṣaṇam ucyate
analyzed: idānīm tasya eva vaidikasya yajña ādeḥ praṇava saṃyogena tad sat śabda vyapadeśya tayā ca lakṣaṇam ucyate

original: oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ /
analyzed: om tat sat iti nirdeśaḥ brahmaṇaḥ trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ

original: brāhmaṇās tena vedāś ca yajñāś ca vihitāḥ purā // BhG_17.23 //
analyzed: brāhmaṇāḥ tena vedāḥ ca yajñāḥ ca vihitāḥ purā

original: oṃ tat sad iti trividho 'yaṃ nirdeśaḥ śabdaḥ brahmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ brahmaṇo 'nvayī bhavati /
analyzed: om tat sat iti trividhaḥ ayam nirdeśaḥ śabdaḥ brahmaṇaḥ smṛtaḥ brahmaṇaḥ anvayī bhavati

original: brahma ca vedaḥ /
analyzed: brahma ca vedaḥ

original: vedaśabdena vaidikaṃ karmocyate /
analyzed: veda śabdena vaidikam karma ucyate

original: vaidikaṃ yajñādikam /
analyzed: vaidikam yajña ādikam

original: yajñādikaṃ karma oṃ tat sad iti śabdānvitaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: yajña ādikam karma om tat sat iti śabda anvitam bhavati

original: om iti śabdasyānvayo vaidikakarmāṅgatvena prayogādau prayujyamānatayā;
analyzed: om iti śabdasya anvayaḥ vaidika karma aṅga tvena prayoga ādau prayujyamāna tayā

original: tat sad iti śabdayor anvayaḥ pūjyatvāya vācakatayā /
analyzed: tat sat iti śabdayoḥ anvayaḥ pūjya tvāya vācaka tayā

original: tena trividhena śabdenānvitā brāhmaṇāḥ vedānvayinas traivarṇikāḥ vedāś ca yajñāś ca purā vihitāḥ purā mayaiva nirmitā ityarthaḥ //
analyzed: tena trividhena śabdena anvitāḥ brāhmaṇāḥ veda anvayinaḥ traivarṇikāḥ vedāḥ ca yajñāḥ ca purā vihitāḥ purā mayā eva nirmitāḥ iti arthaḥ

original: trayāṇām oṃ tat sad iti śabdānām anvayaprakāro varṇyate;
analyzed: trayāṇām om tat sat iti śabdānām anvaya prakāraḥ varṇyate

original: prathamam om iti śabdasyānvayaprakāram āha
analyzed: prathamam om iti śabdasya anvaya prakāram āha

original: tasmād om ity udāhṛtya yajñadānatapaḥkriyāḥ /
analyzed: tasmāt om iti udāhṛtya yajña dāna tapaḥ kriyāḥ

original: pravartante vidhānoktāḥ satataṃ brahmavādinām // BhG_17.24 //
analyzed: pravartante vidhāna uktāḥ satatam brahma vādinām

original: tasmād brahmavādinām vedādināṃ traivarṇikānāṃ yajñadānatapaḥkriyāḥ vidhānoktāḥ vedavidhānoktāḥ ādau om ity udāhṛtya satataṃ sarvadā pravartante
analyzed: tasmāt brahma vādinām veda ādinām traivarṇikānām yajña dāna tapaḥ kriyāḥ vidhāna uktāḥ veda vidhāna uktāḥ ādau om iti udāhṛtya satatam sarvadā pravartante

original: vedāś ca om ity udāhṛtyārabhyante /
analyzed: vedāḥ ca om iti udāhṛtya ārabhyante

original: evaṃ vedānāṃ vaidikānāṃ ca yajñādīnāṃ karmaṇām om iti śabdānvayo varṇitaḥ /
analyzed: evam vedānām vaidikānām ca yajña ādīnām karmaṇām om iti śabda anvayaḥ varṇitaḥ

original: om itiśabdānvitavedadhāraṇāt tadanvitayajñādikarmakaraṇāc ca brāhmaṇaśabdanirdiṣṭānāṃ traivarṇikānām api om iti śabdānvayo varṇitaḥ // BhGR_17.24
analyzed: om iti śabda anvita veda dhāraṇāt tad anvita yajña ādi karma karaṇāt ca brāhmaṇa śabda nirdiṣṭānām traivarṇikānām api om iti śabda anvayaḥ varṇitaḥ

original: athaiteṣāṃ tad iti śabdānvayaprakāram āha
analyzed: atha eteṣām tat iti śabda anvaya prakāram āha

original: tad ity anabhisandhāya phalaṃ yajñatapaḥkriyāḥ /
analyzed: tat iti an abhisandhāya phalam yajña tapaḥ kriyāḥ

original: dānakriyāś ca vividhāḥ kriyante mokṣakāṅkṣibhiḥ // BhG_17.25 //
analyzed: dāna kriyāḥ ca vividhāḥ kriyante mokṣa kāṅkṣibhiḥ

original: phalam anabhisandhāya vedādhyayanayajñatapodānakriyāḥ mokṣakāṅkṣibhis traivarṇikair yāḥ kriyante,
analyzed: phalam an abhisandhāya veda adhyayana yajña tapaḥ dāna kriyāḥ mokṣa kāṅkṣibhiḥ traivarṇikaiḥ yāḥ kriyante

original: tāḥ brahmaprāptisādhanatayā brahmavācinā tad iti śabdena nirdeśyāḥ;
analyzed: tāḥ brahma prāpti sādhanatayā brahma vācinā tat iti śabdena nirdeśyāḥ

original: “sa vaḥ kaḥ kiṃ yat tat padam anuttamam” iti tacchabdo hi brahmavācī prasiddhaḥ /
analyzed: sa vaḥ kaḥ kim yat tat padam anuttamam iti tad śabdaḥ hi brahma vācī prasiddhaḥ

original: evaṃ vedādhyayanayajñādīnāṃ mokṣasādhanabhūtānāṃ tacchabdanirdeśyatayā tad iti śabdānvaya uktaḥ /
analyzed: evam veda adhyayana yajña ādīnām mokṣa sādhana bhūtānām tad śabda nirdeśya tayā tat iti śabda anvayaḥ uktaḥ

original: traivarṇikānām api tathāvidhavedādhyayanādyanuṣṭhānād eva tacchabdānvaya upapannaḥ // BhGR_17.25 //
analyzed: traivarṇikānām api tathāvidha veda adhyayana ādi anuṣṭhānāt eva tad śabda anvayaḥ upapannaḥ

original: athaiṣāṃ sacchabdānvayaprakāraṃ vaktuṃ loke sacchabdasya vyutpattiprakāram āha
analyzed: atha eṣām sat śabda anvaya prakāram vaktum loke sat śabdasya vyutpatti prakāram āha

original: sadbhāve sādhubhāve ca sad ity etat prayujyate /
analyzed: sadbhāve sādhu bhāve ca sat iti etat prayujyate

original: praśaste karmaṇi tathā sacchabdaḥ pārtha yujyate // BhG_17.26 //
analyzed: praśaste karmaṇi tathā sat śabdaḥ pārtha yujyate

original: sadbhāve vidyamānatāyām,
analyzed: sadbhāve vidyamāna tāyām

original: sādhubhāve kalyāṇabhāve ca sarvavastuṣu sad ity etat padaṃ prayujyate lokavedayoḥ /
analyzed: sādhu bhāve kalyāṇa bhāve ca sarva vastuṣu sat iti etat padam prayujyate loka vedayoḥ

original: tathā kenacit puruṣeṇānuṣṭhite laukike praśaste kalyāṇe karmaṇi satkarmedam iti sacchabdo yujyate prayujyate ityarthaḥ // BhGR_17.26 //
analyzed: tathā kenacid puruṣeṇa anuṣṭhite laukike praśaste kalyāṇe karmaṇi sat karma idam iti sat śabdaḥ yujyate prayujyate iti arthaḥ

original: yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sad iti cocyate /
analyzed: yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sat iti ca ucyate

original: karma caiva tadarthīyaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate // BhG_17.27 //
analyzed: karma ca eva tad arthīyam sat iti eva abhidhīyate

original: ato vaidikānāṃ traivarṇikānāṃ yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ kalyāṇatayā sad ity ucyate /
analyzed: atas vaidikānām traivarṇikānām yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ kalyāṇa tayā sat iti ucyate

original: karma ca tadarthīyam traivarṇikārthīyaṃ yajñadānādikaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate /
analyzed: karma ca tad arthīyam traivarṇika arthīyam yajña dāna ādikam sat iti eva abhidhīyate

original: tasmād vedāḥ vaidikāni karmāṇi brāhmaṇaśabdanirdiṣṭās traivarṇikāś ca oṃ tat sad iti śabdānvayarūpalakṣaṇena avedebhyaś cāvaidikebhyaś ca vyāvṛttā  #
analyzed: tasmāt vedāḥ vaidikāni karmāṇi brāhmaṇa śabda nirdiṣṭāḥ traivarṇikāḥ ca om tat sat iti śabda anvaya rūpa lakṣaṇena a vedebhyaḥ ca a vaidikebhyaḥ ca vyāvṛttā

original: veditavyāḥ // BhGR_17.27 //
analyzed: veditavyāḥ

original: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat /
analyzed: aśraddhayā hutam dattam tapaḥ taptam kṛtam ca yat

analyzed: asat iti ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha

analyzed: kutas na ca tat pretya

original: no iha na mokṣāya,
analyzed: no iha na mokṣāya

analyzed: na sāṃsārikāya ca phalāya iti

analyzed: na anyat vaidikasya ca karmaṇaḥ sāmānya lakṣaṇam praṇava anvayaḥ

analyzed: mokṣa sādhanam ca karma phala abhisandhiḥ ahitam yajña ādikam

original: tadārambhaś ca sattvodrekād bhavati;

original: anantaraṃ mokṣasādhanatayā nirdiṣṭayos tyāgasaṃnyāsayor aikyam,
tyāgasya ca svarūpam,
analyzed: tyāgasya ca svarūpam

analyzed: tatra tāvat tyāga saṃnyāsayoḥ pṛthaktva ekatva nirṇayāya svarūpa nirṇayāya ca arjunaḥ pṛcchati

analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

analyzed: na karmaṇā na prajayā dhanena tyāgena eke amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ vedānta vijñāna su niścita arthāḥ saṃnyāsa yogāt yatayaḥ śuddha sattvāḥ

analyzed: kecid ca vicakṣaṇāḥ nityānām naimittikānām ca kāmyānām sarveṣām karmaṇām phala tyāgaḥ eva mokṣa śāstreṣu tyāga śabda arthaḥ iti prāhuḥ

original: tatra śāstrīyatyāgaḥ kāmyakarmasvarūpaviṣayaḥ;
analyzed: tatra śāstrīya tyāgaḥ kāmya karma svarūpa viṣayaḥ

analyzed: tathā niścayam śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharata sattamaḥ iti tyāga śabdena eva nirṇaya vacanāt

original: “niyatasya tu saṃnyāsaḥ karmaṇo nopapadyate /
analyzed: niyatasya tu saṃnyāsaḥ karmaṇaḥ na upapadyate

analyzed: mohāt tasya parityāgaḥ tāmasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

analyzed: aniṣṭam iṣṭam miśram ca trividham karmaṇaḥ phalam

analyzed: iti paraspara paryāya tā darśanāt ca tayoḥ eka artha tvam aṅgīkṛtam iti niścīyate

analyzed: eke manīṣiṇaḥ kāpilāḥ vaidikāḥ ca tad mata anusāriṇaḥ rāga ādi doṣa vat bandhaka tvāt sarvam yajña ādikam karma mumukṣuṇā tyājyam iti prāhuḥ

original: apare paṇḍitāḥ yajñādikaṃ karma na tyājyam iti prāhuḥ // BhGR_18.3 //
analyzed: apare paṇḍitāḥ yajña ādikam karma na tyājyam iti prāhuḥ

analyzed: niścayam śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharata sattama

analyzed: tyāgaḥ hi puruṣa vyāghra trividhaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ

analyzed: tatra evam vādi vipratipanne tyāge tyāga viṣayam niścayam mattaḥ śṛṇu

analyzed: tyāgaḥ kriyamāṇeṣu eva vaidikeṣu karmasu phala viṣaya tayā

analyzed: mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya adhyātma cetasā

original: nirāśīr nirmamo bhūtvā yuddhyasva vigatajvaraḥ” iti /
analyzed: nirāśīḥ nirmamaḥ bhūtvā yuddhyasva vigata jvaraḥ iti

analyzed: madīya phala sādhanatayā madīyam idam karma iti karmaṇi mamatāyāḥ parityāgaḥ karma viṣayaḥ tyāgaḥ

analyzed: api tu ā prayāṇāt ahar ahar kāryam eva

analyzed: kutas

analyzed: mananam upāsanam

analyzed: mumukṣūṇām yāvajjīvam upāsanam kurvatām upāsana niṣpatti virodhi prācīna karma vināśanāni iti arthaḥ

analyzed: mohāt tasya parityāgaḥ tāmasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

analyzed: niyatasya nitya naimittikasya mahāyajña ādeḥ karmaṇaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ tyāgaḥ na upapadyate

analyzed: te tu agham bhuñjate pāpāḥ iti a yajña śiṣṭa agha rūpa aśana āpyāyanam manasaḥ viparīta jñānāya bhavati
