original: smṛtilambhe sarvagranthīnāṃ vipramokṣaḥ //
analyzed: smṛti lambhe sarva granthīnām vipramokṣaḥ

original: BhGR_18.” iti brahmasākṣātkārarūpaṃ jñānam āhāraśuddhyāyattaṃ śrūyate /
analyzed: iti brahma sākṣātkāra rūpam jñānam āhāra śuddhi āyattam śrūyate

original: tasmān mahāyajñādinityanaimittikaṃ karma ā prayāṇād brahmajñānāyaivopādeyam iti tasya tyāgo nopapadyate /
analyzed: tasmāt mahāyajña ādi nitya naimittikam karma ā prayāṇāt brahma jñānāya eva upādeyam iti tasya tyāgaḥ na upapadyate

original: evaṃ jñānotpādinaḥ karmaṇo bandhakatvamohāt parityāgas tāmasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ /
analyzed: evam jñāna utpādinaḥ karmaṇaḥ bandhaka tva mohāt parityāgaḥ tāmasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: tamomūlas tyāgas tāmasaḥ /
analyzed: tamaḥ mūlaḥ tyāgaḥ tāmasaḥ

original: tamaḥkāryājñānamūlatvena tyāgasya tamomūlatvam /
analyzed: tamaḥ kārya ajñāna mūla tvena tyāgasya tamaḥ mūla tvam

original: tamo hy ajñānasya mūlaṃ,
analyzed: tamaḥ hi ajñānasya mūlam

original: “pramādamohau tamaso bhavato 'jñānam eva ca” ity atroktam /
analyzed: pramāda mohau tamasaḥ bhavataḥ ajñānam eva ca iti atra uktam

original: ajñānaṃ tu jñānavirodhi viparītajñānam;
analyzed: ajñānam tu jñāna virodhi viparīta jñānam

original: tathā ca vakṣyate,
analyzed: tathā ca vakṣyate

original: “adharmaṃ dharmam iti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā /
analyzed: adharmam dharmam iti yā manyate tamasā āvṛtā

original: sarvārthān viparītāṃś ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī” iti /
analyzed: sarva arthān viparītān ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī iti

original: ato nityanaimittikādeḥ karmaṇas tyāgo viparītajñānamūla evetyarthaḥ // BhGR_18.7 //
analyzed: atas nitya naimittika ādeḥ karmaṇaḥ tyāgaḥ viparīta jñāna mūlaḥ eva iti arthaḥ

original: duḥkham ity eva yaḥ karma kāyakleśabhayāt tyajet /
analyzed: duḥkham iti eva yaḥ karma kāya kleśa bhayāt tyajet

original: sa kṛtvā rājasaṃ tyāgaṃ naiva tyāgaphalaṃ labhet // BhG_18.8 //
analyzed: sa kṛtvā rājasam tyāgam na eva tyāga phalam labhet

original: yady api paraṃparayā mokṣasādhanabhūtaṃ karma,
analyzed: yadi api paraṃparayā mokṣa sādhana bhūtam karma

original: tathāpi duḥkhātmakadravyārjanasādhyatvād bahvāyāsarūpatayā kāyakleśakaratvāc ca manaso 'vasādakaram iti tadbhītyā yoganiṣpattaye jñānābhyāsa  #
analyzed: tathā api duḥkha ātmaka dravya arjana sādhya tvāt bahu āyāsa rūpatayā kāya kleśa kara tvāt ca manasaḥ avasāda karam iti tad bhītyā yoga niṣpattaye

original: eva yatanīya iti /
analyzed: eva yatanīyaḥ iti

original: yo mahāyajñādyāśramakarma parityajet,
analyzed: yaḥ mahāyajña ādi āśrama karma parityajet

original: sa rājasaṃ rajomūlaṃ tyāgaṃ kṛtvā tad ayathāvasthitaśāstrārtharūpam iti jñānotpattirūpaṃ tyāgaphalaṃ na labhate;
analyzed: sa rājasam rajaḥ mūlam tyāgam kṛtvā tat ayathā avasthita śāstra artha rūpam iti jñāna utpatti rūpam tyāga phalam na labhate

original: “ayathāvat prajānāti buddhis sā pārtha rājasī” iti hi vakṣyate /
analyzed: ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī iti hi vakṣyate

original: na hi karma dṛṣṭadvāreṇa manaḥprasādahetuḥ,
analyzed: na hi karma dṛṣṭa dvāreṇa manaḥ prasāda hetuḥ

original: api tu bhavagatprasādadvāreṇa // BhGR_18.8 //
analyzed: api tu bhava gat prasāda dvāreṇa

original: kāryam ity eva yat karma niyataṃ kriyate 'rjuna /
analyzed: kāryam iti eva yat karma niyatam kriyate arjuna

original: saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva,
analyzed: saṅgam tyaktvā phalam ca eva

original: sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ // BhG_18.9 //
analyzed: sa tyāgaḥ sāttvikaḥ mataḥ

original: nityanaimittikamahāyajñādivarṇāśramavihitaṃ karma madārādhanarūpatayā kāryaṃ svayaṃprayojanam iti matvā saṅgam karmaṇi mamatāṃ phalaṃ ca tyaktvā  #
analyzed: nitya naimittika mahāyajña ādi varṇa āśrama vihitam karma mad ārādhana rūpa tayā kāryam svayaṃprayojanam iti matvā saṅgam karmaṇi mamatām phalam ca tyaktvā

original: yat kriyate,
analyzed: yat kriyate

original: sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ,
analyzed: sa tyāgaḥ sāttvikaḥ mataḥ

original: sa sattvamūlaḥ,
analyzed: sa sattva mūlaḥ

original: yathāvasthitaśāstrārthajñānamūla ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: yathā avasthita śāstra artha jñāna mūlaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: sattvaṃ hi yathāvasthitavastujñānam utpādayatīty uktam,
analyzed: sattvam hi yathā avasthita vastu jñānam utpādayati iti uktam

original: “sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānam” iti /
analyzed: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānam iti

original: vakṣyate ca,
analyzed: vakṣyate ca

original: “pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kāryākāryaṃ bhayābhaye /
analyzed: pravṛttim ca nivṛttim ca kārya akāryam bhaya abhaye

original: bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī// ” iti //
analyzed: bandham mokṣam ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī iti

original: na dveṣṭy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale nānuṣajjate /
analyzed: na dveṣṭi akuśalam karma kuśale na anuṣajjate

original: tyāgī sattvasamāviṣṭo medhāvī cchinnasaṃśayaḥ // BhG_18.10 //
analyzed: tyāgī sattva samāviṣṭaḥ medhāvī chinna saṃśayaḥ

original: evaṃ sattvasamāviṣṭo medhāvī yathāvasthitatattvajñānaḥ,
analyzed: evam sattva samāviṣṭaḥ medhāvī yathā avasthita tattva jñānaḥ

original: tata eva cchinnasaṃśayaḥ,
analyzed: tatas eva chinna saṃśayaḥ

original: karmaṇi saṅgaphalakartṛtvatyāgī,
analyzed: karmaṇi saṅga phala kartṛ tva tyāgī

original: na dveṣṭy akuśalaṃ karma;
analyzed: na dveṣṭi akuśalam karma

original: śukale ca karmaṇi nānuṣajjate /
analyzed: śukale ca karmaṇi na anuṣajjate

original: akuśalaṃ karma aniṣṭaphalam,
analyzed: akuśalam karma aniṣṭa phalam

original: kuśalaṃ ca karma iṣṭarūpasvargaputrapaśvannādyādiphalam /
analyzed: kuśalam ca karma iṣṭa rūpa svarga putra paśu annādya ādi phalam

original: sarvasmin karmaṇi mamatārahitatvāt,
analyzed: sarvasmin karmaṇi mamatā rahita tvāt

original: tyaktabrahmavyatiriktasarvaphalatvāt,
analyzed: tyakta brahma vyatirikta sarva phala tvāt

original: tyaktakartṛtvāc ca tayoḥ kriyamāṇayoḥ prītidveṣau na karoti /
analyzed: tyakta kartṛ tvāt ca tayoḥ kriyamāṇayoḥ prīti dveṣau na karoti

original: aniṣṭaphalaṃ pāpaṃ karmātra prāmādikam abhipretam;
analyzed: aniṣṭa phalam pāpam karma atra prāmādikam abhipretam

original: “nāvirato duścaritān nāśānto nāsamāhitaḥ /
analyzed: na a virataḥ duścaritāt na a śāntaḥ na a samāhitaḥ

original: nāśāntamānaso vāpi prajñānenainam āpnuyāt //
analyzed: na a śānta mānasaḥ vā api prajñānena enam āpnuyāt

original: BhGR_18.” iti duścaritāvirater jñānotpattivirodhitvaśravaṇāt /
analyzed: iti duścarita avirateḥ jñāna utpatti virodhi tva śravaṇāt

original: ataḥ karmaṇi kartṛtvasaṅgaphalānāṃ tyāgaḥ śāstrīyatyāgaḥ,
analyzed: atas karmaṇi kartṛ tva saṅga phalānām tyāgaḥ śāstrīya tyāgaḥ

original: na karmasvarūpatyāgaḥ // BhGR_18.10 //
analyzed: na karma svarūpa tyāgaḥ

original: tad āha
analyzed: tat āha

original: na hi dehabhṛtā śakyaṃ tyaktuṃ karmāṇy aśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: na hi dehabhṛtā śakyam tyaktum karmāṇi aśeṣatas

original: yas tu karmaphalatyāgī sa tyāgīty abhidhīyate // BhG_18.11 //
analyzed: yaḥ tu karma phala tyāgī sa tyāgī iti abhidhīyate

original: na hi dehabhṛtā dhriyamāṇaśarīreṇa karmāṇy aśeṣatas tyaktuṃ śakyam;
analyzed: na hi dehabhṛtā dhriyamāṇa śarīreṇa karmāṇi aśeṣatas tyaktum śakyam

original: dehadhāraṇārthānām aśanapānādīnāṃ tadanubandhināṃ ca karmaṇām avarjanīyatvāt /
analyzed: deha dhāraṇa arthānām aśana pāna ādīnām tad anubandhinām ca karmaṇām avarjanīya tvāt

original: tad arthaṃ ca mahāyajñādyanuṣṭhānam avarjanīyam /
analyzed: tad artham ca mahāyajña ādi anuṣṭhānam avarjanīyam

original: yas tu teṣu mahāyajñādikarmasu phalatyāgī sa eva,
analyzed: yaḥ tu teṣu mahāyajña ādi karmasu phala tyāgī saḥ eva

original: “tyāgenaike amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ” ityādiśāstreṣu tyāgīty abhidhīyate /
analyzed: tyāgena eke amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ ityādi śāstreṣu tyāgī iti abhidhīyate

original: phalatyāgīti pradarśanārthaṃ phalakartṛtvakarmasaṅgānāṃ tyāgīti;
analyzed: phala tyāgī iti pradarśana artham phala kartṛ tva karma saṅgānām tyāgī iti

original: “trividhaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ” iti prakramāt // BhGR_18.11 //
analyzed: trividhaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ iti prakramāt

original: nanu karmāṇy agnihotradarśapūrṇamāsajyotiṣṭomādīni,
analyzed: nanu karmāṇi agnihotra darśa pūrṇamāsa jyotiṣṭoma ādīni

original: mahāyajñādīni ca svargādiphalasaṃbandhitayā śāstrair vidhīyante;
analyzed: mahāyajña ādīni ca svarga ādi phala saṃbandhi tayā śāstraiḥ vidhīyante

original: nityanaimittikānām api “prājāpatyaṃ gṛhasthānām” ityādiphalasaṃbandhitayaiva hi codanā /
analyzed: nitya naimittikānām api prājāpatyam gṛhasthānām ityādi phala saṃbandhi tayā eva hi codanā

original: ataḥ tattatphalasādhanasvabhāvatayāvagatānāṃ karmaṇām anuṣṭhāne,
analyzed: atas tad tad phala sādhana svabhāva tayā avagatānām karmaṇām anuṣṭhāne

original: bījāvāpādīnām iva,
analyzed: bīja āvāpa ādīnām iva

original: anabhisaṃhitaphalasyāpi iṣṭāniṣṭarūpaphalasaṃbandhaḥ avarjanīyaḥ /
analyzed: anabhisaṃhita phalasya api iṣṭa aniṣṭa rūpa phala saṃbandhaḥ avarjanīyaḥ

original: ato mokṣavirodhiphalatvena mumukṣuṇā na karmānuṣṭheyam ity ata uttaram āha
analyzed: atas mokṣa virodhi phala tvena mumukṣuṇā na karma anuṣṭheyam iti atas uttaram āha

original: aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ ca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam /
analyzed: aniṣṭam iṣṭam miśram ca trividham karmaṇaḥ phalam

original: bhavaty atyāgināṃ pretya na tu saṃnyāsināṃ kvacit // BhG_18.12 //
analyzed: bhavati atyāginām pretya na tu saṃnyāsinām kvacid

original: aniṣṭam narakādiphalam,
analyzed: aniṣṭam naraka ādi phalam

original: iṣṭam svargādi,
analyzed: iṣṭam svarga ādi

original: miśram aniṣṭasaṃbhinnaṃ putrapaśvannādyādi;
analyzed: miśram aniṣṭa saṃbhinnam putra paśu annādya ādi

original: etat trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam,
analyzed: etat trividham karmaṇaḥ phalam

original: atyāginām kartṛtvamamatāphalatyāgarahitānāṃ pretya bhavati /
analyzed: atyāginām kartṛ tva mamatā phala tyāga rahitānām pretya bhavati

original: pretya karmānuṣṭhānottarakālam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: pretya karma anuṣṭhāna uttara kālam iti arthaḥ

original: na tu saṃnyāsināṃ kvacit na tu kartṛtvādiparityāgināṃ kvacid api mokṣavirodhi phalaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: na tu saṃnyāsinām kvacid na tu kartṛ tva ādi parityāginām kvacid api mokṣa virodhi phalam bhavati

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati yady apy agnihotramahāyajñādīni tāny eva,
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati yadi api agnihotra mahāyajña ādīni tāni eva

original: tathāpi jīvanādhikārakāmādhikārayor iva mokṣādhikāre ca viniyogapṛthaktvena parihriyate /
analyzed: tathā api jīvana adhikāra kāma adhikārayoḥ iva mokṣa adhikāre ca viniyoga pṛthaktvena parihriyate

original: mokṣaviniyogaś ca,
analyzed: mokṣa viniyogaḥ ca

original: “tam etaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasānāśakena” ityādibhir iti /
analyzed: tam etam veda anuvacanena brāhmaṇāḥ vividiṣanti yajñena dānena tapasā anāśakena ityādibhiḥ iti

original: tad evaṃ kriyamāṇeṣv eva karmasu
analyzed: tat evam kriyamāṇeṣu eva karmasu

original: kartṛtvādiparityāgaḥ śāstrasiddhiḥ saṃnyāsaḥ;
analyzed: kartṛ tva ādi parityāgaḥ śāstra siddhiḥ saṃnyāsaḥ

original: sa eva ca tyāga ity uktaḥ // BhGR_18.12 //
analyzed: saḥ eva ca tyāgaḥ iti uktaḥ

original: idānīṃ bhagavati puruṣottame antaryāmiṇi kartṛtvānusaṃdhānena ātmani akartṛtvānusaṃdhānaprakāram āha,
analyzed: idānīm bhagavati puruṣottame antaryāmiṇi kartṛ tva anusaṃdhānena ātmani akartṛ tva anusaṃdhāna prakāram āha

original: tata eva phalakarmaṇor api mamatāparityāgo bhavatīti /
analyzed: tatas eva phala karmaṇoḥ api mamatā parityāgaḥ bhavati iti

original: paramapuruṣo hi svakīyena jīvātmanā svakīyaiś ca karaṇakalevaraprāṇaiḥ svalīlāprayojanāya karmāṇy ārabhate /
analyzed: paramapuruṣaḥ hi svakīyena jīvātmanā svakīyaiḥ ca karaṇa kalevara prāṇaiḥ sva līlā prayojanāya karmāṇi ārabhate

original: ato jīvātmagataṃ kṣunnivṛttyādikam api phalam,
analyzed: atas jīvātma gatam kṣudh nivṛtti ādikam api phalam

original: tatsādhanabhūtaṃ ca karma paramapuruṣasyaiva /
analyzed: tad sādhana bhūtam ca karma paramapuruṣasya eva

original: pañcaitāni mahābāho kāraṇāni nibodhe me /
analyzed: pañca etāni mahā bāho kāraṇāni nibodhe me

original: sāṃkhye kṛtānte proktāni siddhaye sarvakarmaṇām // BhG%_18.
analyzed: sāṃkhye kṛtānte proktāni siddhaye sarva karmaṇām

original: sāṃkhyā buddhiḥ,
analyzed: sāṃkhyā buddhiḥ

original: sāṃkhye kṛtānte yathāvasthitatattvaviṣayayā vaidikyā buddhyā anusaṃhite nirṇaye sarvakarmaṇāṃ siddhaye utpattaye,
analyzed: sāṃkhye kṛtānte yathā avasthita tattva viṣayayā vaidikyā buddhyā anusaṃhite nirṇaye sarva karmaṇām siddhaye utpattaye

original: proktāni pañcaitāni kāraṇāni nibodhe me mama sakāśād anusaṃdhatsva /
analyzed: proktāni pañca etāni kāraṇāni nibodhe me mama sakāśāt anusaṃdhatsva

original: vaidikī hi buddhiḥ śarīrendriyaprāṇajīvātmopakaraṇaṃ paramātmānam eva kartāram avadhārayati,
analyzed: vaidikī hi buddhiḥ śarīra indriya prāṇa jīvātma upakaraṇam paramātmānam eva kartāram avadhārayati

original: “ya ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmano 'ntaro yam ātmā na veda yasyātmā śarīraṃ ya ātmānam antaro yamayati sa ta ātmāntaryāmy amṛtaḥ“,
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan ātmanaḥ antaraḥ yam ātmā na veda yasya ātmā śarīram yaḥ ātmānam antaraḥ yamayati sa te ātmā antaryāmī amṛtaḥ

original: “antaḥpraviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānāṃ sarvātmā” ityādiṣu // BhGR_18.13 //
analyzed: antar praviṣṭaḥ śāstā janānām sarva ātmā ityādiṣu

original: tad idam āha
analyzed: tat idam āha

original: adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham /
analyzed: adhiṣṭhānam tathā kartā karaṇam ca pṛthagvidham

original: vividhā ca pṛthakceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam //
analyzed: vividhā ca pṛthak ceṣṭā daivam ca eva atra pañcamam

original: śarīravāṅmanobhir yat karma prārabhate naraḥ /
analyzed: śarīra vāc manobhiḥ yat karma prārabhate naraḥ

original: nyāyyaṃ vā viparītaṃ vā pañcaite tasya hetavaḥ // BhGR_18.15 //
analyzed: nyāyyam vā viparītam vā pañca ete tasya hetavaḥ

original: nyāyye śāstrasiddhe,
analyzed: nyāyye śāstra siddhe

original: viparīte pratiṣiddhe vā sarvasmin karmaṇi śarīre,
analyzed: viparīte pratiṣiddhe vā sarvasmin karmaṇi śarīre

original: vācike,
analyzed: vācike

original: mānase ca pañcaite hetavaḥ /
analyzed: mānase ca pañca ete hetavaḥ

original: adhiṣṭhānam śarīram;
analyzed: adhiṣṭhānam śarīram

original: adhiṣṭhīyate jīvātmaneti mahābhūtasaṃghātarūpaṃ śarīram adhiṣṭhānam /
analyzed: adhiṣṭhīyate jīvātmanā iti mahābhūta saṃghāta rūpam śarīram adhiṣṭhānam

original: tathā kartā jīvātmā;
analyzed: tathā kartā jīvātmā

original: asya jīvātmano jñātṛtvaṃ kartṛtvaṃ ca,
analyzed: asya jīvātmanaḥ jñātṛ tvam kartṛ tvam ca

original: “jño 'ta eva“,
analyzed: jñaḥ atas eva

original: “kartā śāstrārthavattvāt ” iti ca sūtropapāditam /
analyzed: kartā śāstra arthavat tvāt iti ca sūtra upapāditam

original: karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham vākpāṇipādādipañcakaṃ samanaskaṃ karmendriyaṃ pṛthagvidham karmaniṣpattau pṛthagvyāpāram /
analyzed: karaṇam ca pṛthagvidham vāc pāṇi pāda ādi pañcakam sa manaskam karmendriyam pṛthagvidham karma niṣpattau pṛthak vyāpāram

original: vividhā ca pṛthakceṣṭā /
analyzed: vividhā ca pṛthak ceṣṭā

original: ceṣṭāśabdena pañcātmā vāyur abhidhīyate tadvṛttivācinā;
analyzed: ceṣṭā śabdena pañca ātmā vāyuḥ abhidhīyate tad vṛtti vācinā

original: śarīrendriyadhāraṇasya prāṇāpānādibhedabhinnasya vāyoḥ pañcātmano vividhā ca ceṣṭā vividhā vṛttiḥ /
analyzed: śarīra indriya dhāraṇasya prāṇa apāna ādi bheda bhinnasya vāyoḥ pañcātmanaḥ vividhā ca ceṣṭā vividhā vṛttiḥ

original: daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam atra karmahetukalāpe daivaṃ pañcamam paramātmā antaryāmī karmaniṣpattau pradhānahetur ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: daivam ca eva atra pañcamam atra karma hetu kalāpe daivam pañcamam paramātmā antaryāmī karma niṣpattau pradhāna hetuḥ iti arthaḥ

original: uktaṃ hi, “sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi sanniviṣṭo mattaḥ smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca” iti /

original: vakṣyati ca,
analyzed: vakṣyati ca

original: “īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśe 'rjuna tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ sarva bhūtānām hṛd deśe arjuna tiṣṭhati

original: bhrāmayan sarvabhūtāni yantrārūḍhāni māyayā//
analyzed: bhrāmayan sarva bhūtāni yantra ārūḍhāni māyayā

original: ” iti /
analyzed: iti

original: paramātmāyattaṃ ca jīvātmanaḥ kartṛtvam,
analyzed: paramātma āyattam ca jīvātmanaḥ kartṛ tvam

original: “parāt tu tacchruteḥ” ityādyupapāditam /
analyzed: parāt tu tad śruteḥ ityādi upapāditam

original: nanv evaṃ paramātmāyatte jīvātmanaḥ kartṛtve jīvātmā karmaṇy aniyojyo bhavatīti vidhiniṣedhaśāstrāṇy anarthakāni syuḥ //
analyzed: nanu evam paramātma āyatte jīvātmanaḥ kartṛ tve jīvātmā karmaṇi aniyojyaḥ bhavati iti vidhi niṣedha śāstrāṇi anarthakāni syuḥ

original: idam api codyaṃ sūtrakāreṇa parihṛtam,
analyzed: idam api codyam sūtrakāreṇa parihṛtam

original: “kṛtaprayatnāpekṣas tu vihitapratiṣiddhāvaiyārthyādibhyaḥ” iti /
analyzed: kṛta prayatna apekṣaḥ tu vihita pratiṣiddha a vaiyārthya ādibhyaḥ iti

original: etad uktaṃ bhavati paramātmanā dattais tadādhāraiś ca karaṇakalebarādibhis tadāhitaśaktibhiḥ
analyzed: etat uktam bhavati paramātmanā dattaiḥ tad ādhāraiḥ ca karaṇa kalebara ādibhiḥ tad āhita śaktibhiḥ

original: svayaṃ ca jīvātmā tadādhāras tadāhitaśaktis san karmaniṣpattaye svecchayā karaṇādyadhiṣṭhānākāraṃ
analyzed: svayam ca jīvātmā tad ādhāraḥ tad āhita śaktiḥ san karma niṣpattaye sva icchayā karaṇa ādi adhiṣṭhāna ākāram

original: prayatnaṃ cārabhate;
analyzed: prayatnam ca ārabhate

original: tadantaravasthitaḥ paramātmā svānumatidānena taṃ pravartayatīti jīvasyāpi svabuddhyaiva pravṛttihetutvam asti;
analyzed: tad antar avasthitaḥ paramātmā sva anumati dānena tam pravartayati iti jīvasya api sva buddhyā eva pravṛtti hetu tvam asti

original: yathā gurutaraśilāmahīruhādicalanādiphalapravṛttiṣu bahupuruṣasādhyāsu bahūnāṃ hetutvaṃ vidhiniṣedhabhāktvaṃ ceti
analyzed: yathā gurutara śilā mahīruha ādi calana ādi phala pravṛttiṣu bahu puruṣa sādhyāsu bahūnām hetu tvam vidhi niṣedha bhāktvam ca iti

original: tatraivaṃ sati kartāram ātmānaṃ kevalaṃ tu yaḥ /

original: paśyaty akṛtabuddhitvān na sa paśyati durmatiḥ // BhGR_18.16 //
analyzed: paśyati akṛtabuddhi tvāt na sa paśyati durmatiḥ

original: evaṃ vastutaḥ paramātmānumatipūrvake jīvātmanaḥ kartṛtve sati,
analyzed: evam vastutas paramātma anumati pūrvake jīvātmanaḥ kartṛ tve sati

original: tatra karmaṇi kevalam ātmānam eva kartāraṃ yaḥ paśyati,
analyzed: tatra karmaṇi kevalam ātmānam eva kartāram yaḥ paśyati

original: sa durmatiḥ viparītamatiḥ akṛtabuddhitvād aniṣpannayathāvasthitavastubuddhitvān na paśyati na yathāvasthitaṃ kartāraṃ paśyati // BhGR_18.16
analyzed: sa durmatiḥ viparīta matiḥ akṛtabuddhi tvāt aniṣpanna yathā avasthita vastu buddhi tvāt na paśyati na yathā avasthitam kartāram paśyati

original: yasya nāhaṃkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate /
analyzed: yasya na ahaṃkṛtaḥ bhāvaḥ buddhiḥ yasya na lipyate

original: hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate // BhGR_18.17 //
analyzed: hatvā api saḥ imān lokān na hanti na nibadhyate

original: paramapuruṣakartṛtvānusaṃdhānena yasya bhāvaḥ kartṛtvaviṣayo manovṛttiviśeṣaḥ nāhaṃkṛtaḥ nāhamabhimānakṛtaḥ /
analyzed: paramapuruṣa kartṛ tva anusaṃdhānena yasya bhāvaḥ kartṛ tva viṣayaḥ manaḥ vṛtti viśeṣaḥ na ahaṃkṛtaḥ na aham abhimāna kṛtaḥ

original: ahaṃ karomīti jñānaṃ yasya na vidyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: aham karomi iti jñānam yasya na vidyate iti arthaḥ

original: buddhir yasya na lipyate asmin karmaṇi mama kartṛtvābhāvād etatphalaṃ na mayā saṃbadhyate,
analyzed: buddhiḥ yasya na lipyate asmin karmaṇi mama kartṛ tva abhāvāt etat phalam na mayā saṃbadhyate

original: na ca madīyaṃ karmeti yasya buddhir jāyata ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na ca madīyam karma iti yasya buddhiḥ jāyate iti arthaḥ

original: sa imān lokān yuddhe hatvāpi tān na nihanti;
analyzed: saḥ imān lokān yuddhe hatvā api tān na nihanti

original: na kevalaṃ bhīṣmādīn ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: na kevalam bhīṣma ādīn iti arthaḥ

original: tatas tena yuddhākhyena karmaṇā na nibadhyate /
analyzed: tatas tena yuddha ākhyena karmaṇā na nibadhyate

original: tatphalaṃ nānubhavatītyarthaḥ // BhGR_18.17 //
analyzed: tad phalam na anubhavati iti arthaḥ

original: sarvam idam akartṛtvādyanusandhānaṃ sattvaguṇavṛddhyaiva bhavatīti sattvasyopādeyatājñāpanāya karmaṇi sattvādiguṇakṛtaṃ vaiṣamyaṃ prapañcayiṣyan  #
analyzed: sarvam idam akartṛ tva ādi anusandhānam sattva guṇa vṛddhyā eva bhavati iti sattvasya upādeya tā jñāpanāya karmaṇi sattva ādi guṇa kṛtam vaiṣamyam prapañcayiṣyan

original: karmacodanāprakāraṃ tāvad āha
analyzed: karma codanā prakāram tāvat āha

analyzed: jñānam jñeyam parijñātā trividhā karma codanā

original: kāraṇaṃ karma karteti trividhaḥ karmasaṃgrahaḥ // BhGR_18.18 //
analyzed: kāraṇam karma kartā iti trividhaḥ karma saṃgrahaḥ

original: jñānam kartavyakarmaviṣayaṃ jñānam,
analyzed: jñānam kartavya karma viṣayam jñānam

original: jñeyaṃ ca kartavyaṃ karma,
analyzed: jñeyam ca kartavyam karma

analyzed: parijñātā tasya boddhā iti trividhā karma codanā

original: bodhaboddhavyaboddhṛyukto jyotiṣṭomādikarmavidhir ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: bodha boddhavya boddhṛ yuktaḥ jyotiṣṭoma ādi karma vidhiḥ iti arthaḥ

original: tatra boddhavyarūpaṃ karma trividhaṃ saṃgṛhyate karaṇaṃ karma karteti /
analyzed: tatra boddhavya rūpam karma trividham saṃgṛhyate karaṇam karma kartā iti

original: karaṇam sādhanabhūtaṃ dravyādikam;
analyzed: karaṇam sādhana bhūtam dravya ādikam

original: karma yāgādikam;
analyzed: karma yāga ādikam

original: kartā anuṣṭhāteti // BhGR_18.18 //
analyzed: kartā anuṣṭhātā iti

original: jñānaṃ karma ca kartā ca tridhaiva guṇabhedataḥ /
analyzed: jñānam karma ca kartā ca tridhā eva guṇa bhedataḥ

original: procyate guṇasaṃkhyāne yathāvac chṛṇu tāny api // BhGR_18.19 //
analyzed: procyate guṇa saṃkhyāne yathāvat śṛṇu tāni api

original: kartavyakarmaviṣayaṃ jñānam,
analyzed: kartavya karma viṣayam jñānam

original: anuṣṭhīyamānaṃ ca karma,
analyzed: anuṣṭhīyamānam ca karma

original: tasyānuṣṭhātā ca sattvādiguṇabhedatas trividhaiva procyate guṇasaṃkhyāne guṇakāryagaṇane /
analyzed: tasya anuṣṭhātā ca sattva ādi guṇa bhedataḥ trividhā eva procyate guṇa saṃkhyāne guṇa kārya gaṇane

original: yathāvac chṛṇu tāny api tāni guṇato bhinnāni jñānādīni yathāvac chṛṇu // BhGR_18.19 //

original: sarvabhūteṣu yenaikaṃ bhāvam avyayam īkṣate /
analyzed: sarva bhūteṣu yena ekam bhāvam avyayam īkṣate

original: avibhaktaṃ vibhakteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi sāttvikam // BhGR_18.20 //
analyzed: avibhaktam vibhakteṣu tat jñānam viddhi sāttvikam

original: brāhmaṇakṣatriyabrahmacārigṛhasthādirūpeṇa vibhakteṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu karmādhikāriṣu yena jñānenaikam ātmākhyaṃ bhāvaṃ,
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kṣatriya brahmacāri gṛhastha ādi rūpeṇa vibhakteṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu karma adhikāriṣu yena jñānena ekam ātma ākhyam bhāvam

original: tatrāpy avibhaktam brāhmaṇatvādyanekākāreṣv api bhūteṣu sitadīrghādivibhāgavatsu jñānākāre ātmani vibhāgarahitam,
analyzed: tatra api avibhaktam brāhmaṇa tva ādi aneka ākāreṣu api bhūteṣu sita dīrgha ādi vibhāgavatsu jñāna ākāre ātmani vibhāga rahitam

original: avyayaṃ vyayasvabhāveṣv api brāhmaṇādiśarīreṣu avyayam avikṛtaṃ phalādisaṅgānarhaṃ ca karmādhikāravelāyām īkṣate,
analyzed: avyayam vyaya svabhāveṣu api brāhmaṇa ādi śarīreṣu avyayam avikṛtam phala ādi saṅga anarham ca karma adhikāra velāyām īkṣate

original: taj jñānaṃ sāttvikaṃ viddhi // BhGR_18.20 //
analyzed: tat jñānam sāttvikam viddhi

analyzed: pṛthaktvena tu yat jñānam nānā bhāvān pṛthagvidhān

original: vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi rājasam // BhGR_18.21 //
analyzed: vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu tat jñānam viddhi rājasam

original: sarveṣu bhūteṣu brāhmaṇādiṣu brāhmaṇādyākārapṛthaktvenātmākhyān api bhāvān nānābhūtān
analyzed: sarveṣu bhūteṣu brāhmaṇa ādiṣu brāhmaṇa ādi ākāra pṛthaktvena ātma ākhyān api bhāvān nānā bhūtān

original: sitadīrghādipṛthaktvena ca pṛthagvidhān phalādisaṃyogayogyān karmādhikāravelāyāṃ yaj jñānaṃ vetti,
analyzed: sita dīrgha ādi pṛthaktvena ca pṛthagvidhān phala ādi saṃyoga yogyān karma adhikāra velāyām yat jñānam vetti

analyzed: tat jñānam rājasam viddhi

analyzed: a tattva arthavat alpam ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: yat tu jñānam,
analyzed: yat tu jñānam

analyzed: ekasmin kārye ekasmin kartavye karmaṇi preta bhūta gaṇa ādi ārādhana rūpe ati alpa phale kṛtsna phala vat saktam

analyzed: ahetukam vastutas tu akṛtsna phalavat tayā tathāvidha saṅga hetu rahitam atattva arthavat pūrvavat eva ātmani pṛthaktva ādi yuktatayā mithyā bhūta artha viṣayam

original: atyalpaphalaṃ ca pretabhūtādyārādhanaviṣayatvād alpaṃ ca,
analyzed: ati alpa phalam ca preta bhūta ādi ārādhana viṣaya tvāt alpam ca

original: taj jñānaṃ tāmasam udāhṛtam // BhGR_18.22 //
analyzed: tat jñānam tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: evaṃ kartavyakarmaviṣayajñānasyādhikāravelāyām adhikāryaṃśena guṇatas traividhyam uktvā anuṣṭheyasya karmaṇo guṇatas traividhyam āha
analyzed: evam kartavya karma viṣaya jñānasya adhikāra velāyām adhikāri aṃśena guṇataḥ traividhyam uktvā anuṣṭheyasya karmaṇaḥ guṇataḥ traividhyam āha

original: niyataṃ saṅgarahitam arāgadveṣataḥ kṛtam /
analyzed: niyatam saṅga rahitam a rāga dveṣataḥ kṛtam

analyzed: a phala prepsunā karma yat tat sāttvikam ucyate

analyzed: niyatam sva varṇa āśrama ucitam

analyzed: saṅga rahitam kartṛ tva ādi saṅga rahitam

analyzed: a rāga dveṣataḥ kṛtam kīrti rāgāt a kīrti dveṣāt ca na kṛtam

original: adambhena kṛtam ityarthaḥ;
analyzed: adambhena kṛtam iti arthaḥ

original: aphalaprepsunā aphalābhisandhinā kāryam ity eva kṛtaṃ yat karma,
analyzed: a phala prepsunā a phala abhisandhinā kāryam iti eva kṛtam yat karma

original: tat sāttvikam ucyate // BhGR_18.23 //
analyzed: tat sāttvikam ucyate

original: yat tu kāmepsunā karma sāhaṅkāreṇa vā punaḥ /
analyzed: yat tu kāma īpsunā karma sa ahaṅkāreṇa vā punar

original: kriyate bahulāyāsaṃ tad rājasam udāhṛtam // BhGR_18.24 //
analyzed: kriyate bahula āyāsam tat rājasam udāhṛtam

analyzed: bahula āyāsam yat karma kriyate

original: tad rājasam bahulāyāsam idaṃ karma mayaiva kriyata ity evaṃrūpābhimānayuktena yat karma kriyate,

original: tad rājasam ityarthaḥ // BhGR_18.24 //
analyzed: tat rājasam iti arthaḥ

original: anubandhaṃ kṣayaṃ hiṃsām anavekṣya ca pauruṣam /

original: mohād ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate // BhGR_18.25 //
analyzed: mohāt ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate

analyzed: kṛte karmaṇi anubadhyamānam duḥkham anubandhaḥ

original: kṣayaḥ karmaṇi kriyamāṇe arthavināśaḥ;
analyzed: kṣayaḥ karmaṇi kriyamāṇe artha vināśaḥ

original: hiṃsā tatra prāṇipīḍā;
analyzed: hiṃsā tatra prāṇi pīḍā

analyzed: pauruṣam ātmanaḥ karma samāpana sāmarthyam

original: etāni anavekṣya avimṛśya,
analyzed: etāni an avekṣya a vimṛśya

original: mohāt paramapuruṣakartṛtvājñānād yat karmārabhyate,
analyzed: mohāt paramapuruṣa kartṛ tva ajñānāt yat karma ārabhyate

original: tat tāmasam ucyate // BhGR_18.25 //
analyzed: tat tāmasam ucyate

original: muktasaṅgo 'nahaṃvādī dhṛtyutsāhasamanvitaḥ /
analyzed: mukta saṅgaḥ an ahaṃvādī dhṛti utsāha samanvitaḥ

original: siddhyasiddhyor nirvikāraḥ kartā sāttvika ucyate // BhGR_18.26 //
analyzed: siddhi asiddhyoḥ nirvikāraḥ kartā sāttvikaḥ ucyate
