analyzed: mukta saṅgaḥ phala saṅga rahitaḥ an ahaṃvādī kartṛ tva abhimāna rahitaḥ

original: dhṛtyutsāhasamanvitaḥ ārabdhe karmaṇi yāvatkarmasamāptyavarjanīyaduḥkhadhāraṇaṃ dhṛtiḥ;
analyzed: dhṛti utsāha samanvitaḥ ārabdhe karmaṇi yāvat karma samāpti avarjanīya duḥkha dhāraṇam dhṛtiḥ

original: utsāhaḥ udyuktacetastvam;
analyzed: utsāhaḥ udyukta cetaḥ tvam

original: tābhyāṃ samanvitaḥ,
analyzed: tābhyām samanvitaḥ

original: siddhyasiddhyor nirvikāraḥ yuddhādau karmaṇi tadupakaraṇabhūtadravyārjanādiṣu ca siddhyasiddhyor avikṛtacittaḥ kartā sāttvika ucyate // BhGR_18.26
analyzed: siddhi asiddhyoḥ nirvikāraḥ yuddha ādau karmaṇi tad upakaraṇa bhūta dravya arjana ādiṣu ca siddhi asiddhyoḥ avikṛta cittaḥ kartā sāttvikaḥ ucyate  /

original: ragī karmaphalaprepsur lubdho hiṃsātmako 'śuciḥ /
analyzed: ragī karma phala prepsuḥ lubdhaḥ hiṃsā ātmakaḥ aśuciḥ

original: harṣaśokānvitaḥ kartā rājasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // BhGR_18.27 //
analyzed: harṣa śoka anvitaḥ kartā rājasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: rāgī yaśo'rthī,
analyzed: rāgī yaśaḥ arthī

original: karmaphalaprepsuḥ karmaphalārthī;
analyzed: karma phala prepsuḥ karma phala arthī

original: lubdhaḥ karmāpekṣitadravyavyayasvabhāvarahitaḥ,
analyzed: lubdhaḥ karma apekṣita dravya vyaya svabhāva rahitaḥ

original: hiṃsātmakaḥ parān pīḍayitvā taiḥ karma kurvāṇaḥ,
analyzed: hiṃsā ātmakaḥ parān pīḍayitvā taiḥ karma kurvāṇaḥ

original: aśuciḥ karmāpekṣitaśuddhirahitaḥ,
analyzed: aśuciḥ karma apekṣita śuddhi rahitaḥ

original: harṣaśokānvitaḥ yuddhādau karmaṇi jayādisiddhyasiddhyor harṣaśokānvitaḥ kartā rājasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ // BhGR_18.27 //
analyzed: harṣa śoka anvitaḥ yuddha ādau karmaṇi jaya ādi siddhi asiddhyoḥ harṣa śoka anvitaḥ kartā rājasaḥ parikīrtitaḥ

original: ayuktaḥ prākṛtaḥ stabdhaḥ śaṭho naikṛtiko 'lasaḥ /
analyzed: ayuktaḥ prākṛtaḥ stabdhaḥ śaṭhaḥ naikṛtikaḥ alasaḥ

original: viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate // BhGR_18.28 //
analyzed: viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasaḥ ucyate

original: ayuktaḥ śāstrīyakarmāyogyaḥ,
analyzed: ayuktaḥ śāstrīya karma ayogyaḥ

original: vikarmasthaḥ,
analyzed: vikarma sthaḥ

original: prākṛtaḥ anadhigatavidyaḥ,
analyzed: prākṛtaḥ anadhigata vidyaḥ

original: stabdhaḥ anārambhaśīlaḥ,
analyzed: stabdhaḥ anārambha śīlaḥ

original: śaṭhaḥ abhicārādikarmaruciḥ,
naikṛtikaḥ vañcanaparaḥ,
analyzed: naikṛtikaḥ vañcana paraḥ

original: alasaḥ ārabdheṣv api karmasu mandapravṛttiḥ,
analyzed: alasaḥ ārabdheṣu api karmasu manda pravṛttiḥ

original: viṣādī atimātrāvasādaśīlaḥ dīrghasūtrī abhicārādikarma kurvan pareṣu dīrghakālavartyanarthaparyālocanaśīlaḥ,
analyzed: viṣādī atimātra avasāda śīlaḥ dīrghasūtrī abhicāra ādi karma kurvan pareṣu dīrgha kāla varti anartha paryālocana śīlaḥ

original: evaṃbhūto yaḥ kartā,
analyzed: evaṃbhūtaḥ yaḥ kartā

original: sa tāmasaḥ // BhGR_18.28 //
analyzed: sa tāmasaḥ

original: evaṃ kartavyakarmaviṣayajñāne kartavye ca karmaṇi anuṣṭhātari ca guṇatas traividhyam uktam;
analyzed: evam kartavya karma viṣaya jñāne kartavye ca karmaṇi anuṣṭhātari ca guṇataḥ traividhyam uktam

original: idānīṃ sarvatattvasarvapuruṣārthaniścayarūpāyā buddher dhṛteś ca guṇatas traividhyam āha
analyzed: idānīm sarva tattva sarva puruṣa artha niścaya rūpāyāḥ buddheḥ dhṛteḥ ca guṇataḥ traividhyam āha

original: buddher bhedaṃ dhṛteś caiva guṇatas trividhaṃ śṛṇu /
analyzed: buddheḥ bhedam dhṛteḥ ca eva guṇataḥ trividham śṛṇu

original: procyamānam aśeṣeṇa pṛthaktvena dhanaṃjaya // BhGR_18.29 //
analyzed: procyamānam aśeṣeṇa pṛthaktvena dhanaṃjaya

original: buddhiḥ vivekapūrvakaṃ niścayarūpaṃ jñānam;
analyzed: buddhiḥ viveka pūrvakam niścaya rūpam jñānam

original: dhṛtiḥ ārabdhāyāḥ kriyāyā vighnopanipāte 'pi dhāraṇam,
analyzed: dhṛtiḥ ārabdhāyāḥ kriyāyāḥ vighna upanipāte api dhāraṇam

original: tayos sattvādiguṇatas trividhaṃ bhedaṃ pṛthaktvena procyamānaṃ yathāvac chṛṇu // BhGR_18.29 //
analyzed: tayoḥ sattva ādi guṇataḥ trividham bhedam pṛthaktvena procyamānam yathāvat śṛṇu

original: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kāryākārye bhayābhaye /
analyzed: pravṛttim ca nivṛttim ca kārya akārye bhaya abhaye

original: bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī // BhGR_18.30 //
analyzed: bandham mokṣam ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī

original: pravṛttiḥ abhyudayasādhanabhūto dharmaḥ,
analyzed: pravṛttiḥ abhyudaya sādhana bhūtaḥ dharmaḥ

original: nivṛttiḥ mokṣasādhanabhūtaḥ,
analyzed: nivṛttiḥ mokṣa sādhana bhūtaḥ

original: tav ubhau yathāvasthitau yā buddhir vetti;
analyzed: tau ubhau yathā avasthitau yā buddhiḥ vetti

original: kāryākārye sarvavarṇānāṃ pravṛttinivṛttidharmayor anyataraniṣṭhānāṃ deśakālāvasthāviśeṣeṣu “idaṃ kāryam,
analyzed: kārya akārye sarva varṇānām pravṛtti nivṛtti dharmayoḥ anyatara niṣṭhānām deśa kāla avasthā viśeṣeṣu idam kāryam

original: idam akāryam” iti yā vetti;
analyzed: idam akāryam iti yā vetti

original: bhayābhaye śāstrātivṛttir bhayasthānaṃ tadanuvṛttir abhayasthānam,
analyzed: bhaya abhaye śāstra ativṛttiḥ bhaya sthānam tad anuvṛttiḥ abhaya sthānam

original: bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca saṃsārayāthātmyaṃ tadvigamayāthātmyaṃ ca yā vetti;
analyzed: bandham mokṣam ca saṃsāra yāthātmyam tad vigama yāthātmyam ca yā vetti

original: sā sāttvikī buddhiḥ // BhGR_18.30 //
analyzed: sā sāttvikī buddhiḥ

original: yathā dharmam adharmaṃ ca kāryaṃ cākāryam eva ca /
analyzed: yathā dharmam adharmam ca kāryam ca akāryam eva ca

original: ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī // BhGR_18.31 //
analyzed: ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī

original: yathā pūrvoktaṃ dvividhaṃ dharmaṃ tadviparītaṃ ca tanniṣṭhānāṃ deśakālāvasthādiṣu kāryaṃ cākāryaṃ ca yathāvan na jānāti,
analyzed: yathā pūrvoktam dvividham dharmam tad viparītam ca tad niṣṭhānām deśa kāla avasthā ādiṣu kāryam ca akāryam ca yathāvat na jānāti

original: sā rājasī buddhiḥ // BhGR_18.31 //
analyzed: sā rājasī buddhiḥ

original: adharmaṃ dharmam iti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā /
analyzed: adharmam dharmam iti yā manyate tamasā āvṛtā

original: sarvārthān viparītāṃś ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī // BhGR_18.32 //
analyzed: sarva arthān viparītān ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī

original: tāmasī tu buddhiḥ tamasāvṛtā satī sarvārthān viparītān manyate /
analyzed: tāmasī tu buddhiḥ tamasā āvṛtā satī sarva arthān viparītān manyate

original: adharmaṃ dharmaṃ,
analyzed: adharmam dharmam

original: dharmaṃ cādharmaṃ,
analyzed: dharmam ca adharmam

original: santaṃ cārtham asantam,
analyzed: santam ca artham a santam

original: asantam cārthaṃ santaṃ,
analyzed: asantam ca artham santam

original: paraṃ ca tattvam aparam,
analyzed: param ca tattvam aparam

original: aparaṃ ca tattvaṃ param /
analyzed: aparam ca tattvam param

original: evaṃ sarvaṃ viparītaṃ manyata ityarthaḥ // BhGR_18.32 //
analyzed: evam sarvam viparītam manyate iti arthaḥ

original: dhṛtyā yayā dhārayate manaḥprāṇendriyakriyāḥ /
analyzed: dhṛtyā yayā dhārayate manaḥ prāṇa indriya kriyāḥ

original: yogenāvyabhicāriṇyā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī // BhGR_18.33 //
analyzed: yogena avyabhicāriṇyā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī

original: yayā dhṛtyā yogenāvyabhicāriṇyā manaḥprāṇendriyāṇāṃ kriyāḥ puruṣo dhārayate;
analyzed: yayā dhṛtyā yogena avyabhicāriṇyā manaḥ prāṇa indriyāṇām kriyāḥ puruṣaḥ dhārayate

original: yogaḥ mokṣasādhanabhūtaṃ bhagavadupāsanam;
yogena prayojanabhūtenāvyabhicāriṇyā yogoddeśena pravṛttās tatsādhanabhūtā manaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ kriyāḥ yayā dhṛtyā dhārayate,
analyzed: yogena prayojana bhūtena avyabhicāriṇyā yoga uddeśena pravṛttāḥ tad sādhana bhūtāḥ manaḥ prabhṛtīnām kriyāḥ yayā dhṛtyā dhārayate

original: sā sāttvikītyarthaḥ // BhGR_18.33 //
analyzed: sā sāttvikī iti arthaḥ

original: yayā tu dharmakāmārthān dhṛtyā dhārayate 'rjuna /
analyzed: yayā tu dharma kāma arthān dhṛtyā dhārayate arjuna

original: prasaṅgena phalākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī // BhGR_18.34 //
analyzed: prasaṅgena phala ākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī

original: phalākāṅkṣī puruṣaḥ prakṛṣṭasaṅgena dharmakāmārthān yayā dhṛtyā dhārayate, sā rājasī /
analyzed: phala ākāṅkṣī puruṣaḥ prakṛṣṭa saṅgena dharma kāma arthān yayā dhṛtyā dhārayate sā rājasī

original: dharmakāmārthaśabdena tatsādhanabhūtā manaḥprāṇendriyakriyā lakṣyante /
analyzed: dharma kāma artha śabdena tad sādhana bhūtāḥ manaḥ prāṇa indriya kriyāḥ lakṣyante

original: phalākāṅkṣīty atrāpi phalaśabdena rājasatvād dharmakāmārthā eva vivakṣitāḥ /
analyzed: phala ākāṅkṣī iti atra api phala śabdena rājasa tvāt dharma kāma arthāḥ eva vivakṣitāḥ

original: ato dharmakāmārthāpekṣayā manaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ kriyā yayā dhṛtyā dhārayate,
analyzed: atas dharma kāma artha apekṣayā manaḥ prabhṛtīnām kriyā yayā dhṛtyā dhārayate

original: sā rājasīty uktaṃ bhavati // BhGR_18.34 //
analyzed: sā rājasī iti uktam bhavati

original: yayā svapnaṃ bhayaṃ śokaṃ viṣādaṃ madam eva ca /
analyzed: yayā svapnam bhayam śokam viṣādam madam eva ca

original: na vimuñcati durmedhā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī // BhGR_18.35 //
analyzed: na vimuñcati durmedhāḥ dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī

original: yayā dhṛtyā /
analyzed: yayā dhṛtyā

original: svapnaṃ nidrām /
analyzed: svapnam nidrām

original: madaṃ viṣayānubhavajanitaṃ madam /
analyzed: madam viṣaya anubhava janitam madam

original: svapnamadav uddiśya pravṛttā manaḥprāṇādīnāṃ kriyāḥ durmedhā na vimuñcati dhārayati /
analyzed: svapna madau uddiśya pravṛttāḥ manaḥ prāṇa ādīnām kriyāḥ durmedhāḥ na vimuñcati dhārayati

original: bhayaśokaviṣādaśabdāś ca bhayaśokādidāyiviṣayaparāḥ;
analyzed: bhaya śoka viṣāda śabdāḥ ca bhaya śoka ādi dāyi viṣaya parāḥ

original: tatsādhanabhūtāś ca manaḥprāṇādikriyā yayā dhārayate,
analyzed: tad sādhana bhūtāḥ ca manaḥ prāṇa ādi kriyāḥ yayā dhārayate

original: sā dhṛtis tāmasī // BhGR_18.35 //
analyzed: sā dhṛtiḥ tāmasī

original: sukhaṃ tv idānīṃ trividhaṃ śṛṇu me bharatarṣabha /
analyzed: sukham tu idānīm trividham śṛṇu me bharata ṛṣabha

original: pūrvoktāḥ sarve jñānakarmakartrādayo yac cheṣabhūtāḥ,
analyzed: pūrva uktāḥ sarve jñāna karma kartṛ ādayaḥ yat śeṣa bhūtāḥ

original: tac ca sukhaṃ guṇatas trividham idānīṃ śṛṇu //
analyzed: tat ca sukham guṇataḥ trividham idānīm śṛṇu

original: abhyāsād ramate yatra duḥkhāntaṃ ca nigacchati // BhGR_18.36 //
analyzed: abhyāsāt ramate yatra duḥkha antam ca nigacchati

original: yat tad agre viṣam iva pariṇāme 'mṛtopamam /
analyzed: yat tat agre viṣam iva pariṇāme amṛta upamam

original: tat sukhaṃ sāttvikaṃ proktam ātmabuddhiprasādajam // BhGR_18.37 //
analyzed: tat sukham sāttvikam proktam ātma buddhi prasāda jam

original: yasmin sukhe cirakālābhyāsāt krameṇa niratiśayāṃ ratiṃ prāpnoti,
analyzed: yasmin sukhe cira kāla abhyāsāt krameṇa niratiśayām ratim prāpnoti

original: duḥkhāntaṃ ca nigacchati nikhilasya sāṃsārikasya duḥkhasyāntaṃ nigacchati //
analyzed: duḥkha antam ca nigacchati nikhilasya sāṃsārikasya duḥkhasya antam nigacchati

original: tad eva viśinaṣṭi yat tat sukham,
analyzed: tat eva viśinaṣṭi yat tat sukham

original: agre yogopakramavelāyāṃ bahvāyāsasādhyatvād viviktasvarūpasyānanubhūtatvāc ca viṣam iva duḥkham iva bhavati,
analyzed: agre yoga upakrama velāyām bahu āyāsa sādhya tvāt vivikta svarūpasya ananubhūta tvāt ca viṣam iva duḥkham iva bhavati

original: pariṇāme 'mṛtopamam /
analyzed: pariṇāme amṛta upamam

original: pariṇāme vipāke abhyāsabalena viviktātmasvarūpāvirbhāve amṛtopamaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: pariṇāme vipāke abhyāsa balena vivikta ātma svarūpa āvirbhāve amṛta upamam bhavati

original: tac ca ātmabuddhiprasādajam ātmaviṣayā buddhiḥ ātmabuddhiḥ,
analyzed: tat ca ātma buddhi prasāda jam ātma viṣayā buddhiḥ ātma buddhiḥ

original: tasyāḥ nivṛttasakaletaraviṣayatvaṃ prasādaḥ,
nivṛttasakaletaraviṣayabuddhyā viviktasvabhāvātmānubhavajanitaṃ sukham amṛtopamaṃ bhavati;
analyzed: nivṛtta sakala itara viṣaya buddhyā vivikta svabhāva ātma anubhava janitam sukham amṛta upamam bhavati

original: tat sukhaṃ sāttvikaṃ proktam // BhGR_18.37 //
analyzed: tat sukham sāttvikam proktam

original: viṣayendriyasaṃyogād yat tad agre 'mṛtopamam /
analyzed: viṣaya indriya saṃyogāt yat tat agre amṛta upamam

original: pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukhaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam // BhGR_18.38 //
analyzed: pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukham rājasam smṛtam

original: agre anubhavavelāyāṃ viṣayendriyasaṃyogād yat tad amṛtam iva bhavati,
analyzed: agre anubhava velāyām viṣaya indriya saṃyogāt yat tat amṛtam iva bhavati

original: pariṇāme vipāke viṣayāṇāṃ sukhatānimittakṣudādau nivṛtte tasya ca sukhasya nirayādinimittatvād viṣam iva pītaṃ bhavati,
analyzed: pariṇāme vipāke viṣayāṇām sukhatā nimitta kṣudh ādau nivṛtte tasya ca sukhasya niraya ādi nimitta tvāt viṣam iva pītam bhavati

original: tat sukhaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam // BhGR_18.38 //
analyzed: tat sukham rājasam smṛtam

original: yad agre cānubandhe ca sukhaṃ mohanam ātmanaḥ /
analyzed: yat agre ca anubandhe ca sukham mohanam ātmanaḥ

original: nidrālasyapramādotthaṃ tat tāmasam udāhṛtam // BhGR_18.39 //
analyzed: nidrā ālasya pramāda uttham tat tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: yat sukham agre cānubandhe ca anubhavavelāyāṃ vipāke ca ātmano mohanaṃ mohahetur bhavati;
analyzed: yat sukham agre ca anubandhe ca anubhava velāyām vipāke ca ātmanaḥ mohanam moha hetuḥ bhavati

original: moho 'tra yathāvasthitavastvaprakāśo 'bhipretaḥ;
analyzed: mohaḥ atra yathā avasthita vastu aprakāśaḥ abhipretaḥ

original: nidrālasyapramādottham nidrālasyapramādajanitam,
analyzed: nidrā ālasya pramāda uttham nidrā ālasya pramāda janitam

original: nidrādayo hy anubhavavelāyām api mohahetavaḥ /
analyzed: nidrā ādayaḥ hi anubhava velāyām api moha hetavaḥ

original: nidrāyā mohahetutvaṃ spṛṣṭam /
analyzed: nidrāyāḥ moha hetu tvam spṛṣṭam

original: ālasyam indriyavyāpāram āndyam /
analyzed: ālasyam indriya vyāpāram āndyam

original: indriyavyāpāram āndye ca jñānam āndyaṃ bhavaty eva /
analyzed: indriya vyāpāram āndye ca jñānam āndyam bhavati eva

original: pramādaḥ kṛtyānavadhānarūpa iti tatrāpi jñānam āndyaṃ bhavati /
analyzed: pramādaḥ kṛtyā anavadhāna rūpaḥ iti tatra api jñānam āndyam bhavati

original: tataś ca tayor api mohahetutvam /
analyzed: tatas ca tayoḥ api moha hetu tvam

original: tat sukhaṃ tāmasam udāhṛtam /
analyzed: tat sukham tāmasam udāhṛtam

original: ato mumukṣuṇā rajastamasī abhibhūya sattvam evopādeyam ity uktaṃ bhavati // BhGR_18.39 //
analyzed: atas mumukṣuṇā rajaḥ tamasī abhibhūya sattvam eva upādeyam iti uktam bhavati

original: na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā punaḥ /
analyzed: na tat asti pṛthivyām vā divi deveṣu vā punar

original: sattvaṃ prakṛtijair muktaṃ yad ebhiḥ syāt tribhir guṇaiḥ // BhGR_18.40 //
analyzed: sattvam prakṛti jaiḥ muktam yat ebhiḥ syāt tribhiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: pṛthivyāṃ manuṣyādiṣu divi deveṣu vā prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭeṣu brahmādiṣu sthāvarānteṣu prakṛtijair ebhis tribhir guṇair muktaṃ yat sattvaṃ prāṇijātam,
analyzed: pṛthivyām manuṣya ādiṣu divi deveṣu vā prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭeṣu brahma ādiṣu sthāvara anteṣu prakṛti jaiḥ ebhiḥ tribhiḥ guṇaiḥ muktam yat sattvam prāṇi jātam

original: na tad asti // BhGR_18.40 //
analyzed: na tat asti

original: “tyāgenaike amṛtatvam ānaśuḥ” ityādiṣu mokṣasādhanatayā nirdiṣṭas tyāgaḥ saṃnyāsaśabdārthād ananyaḥ;
analyzed: tyāgena eke amṛta tvam ānaśuḥ ityādiṣu mokṣa sādhanatayā nirdiṣṭaḥ tyāgaḥ saṃnyāsa śabda arthāt ananyaḥ

original: sa ca kriyamāṇeṣv eva karmasu kartṛtvatyāgamūlaḥ phalakarmaṇos tyāgaḥ;
analyzed: sa ca kriyamāṇeṣu eva karmasu kartṛ tva tyāga mūlaḥ phala karmaṇoḥ tyāgaḥ

original: kartṛtvatyāgaś ca paramapuruṣe kartṛtvānusaṃdhānenety uktam /
analyzed: kartṛ tva tyāgaḥ ca paramapuruṣe kartṛ tva anusaṃdhānena iti uktam

original: etat sarvaṃ sattvaguṇavṛddhikāryam iti sattvopādeyatājñāpanāya sattvarajastamasāṃ kāryabhedāḥ prapañcitāḥ /
analyzed: etat sarvam sattva guṇa vṛddhi kāryam iti sattva upādeya tā jñāpanāya sattva rajaḥ tamasām kārya bhedāḥ prapañcitāḥ

original: idānīm evaṃbhūtasya mokṣasādhanatayā kriyamāṇasya karmaṇaḥ paramapuruṣārādhanaveṣatāṃ
analyzed: idānīm evaṃbhūtasya mokṣa sādhana tayā kriyamāṇasya karmaṇaḥ paramapuruṣa ārādhana veṣa tām

original: tathānuṣṭhitasya ca karmaṇas tatprāptilakṣaṇaṃ phalaṃ pratipādayituṃ brāhmaṇādyadhikāriṇāṃ
analyzed: tathā anuṣṭhitasya ca karmaṇaḥ tad prāpti lakṣaṇam phalam pratipādayitum brāhmaṇa ādi adhikāriṇām

original: svabhāvānubandhisattvādiguṇabhedabhinnaṃ vṛttyā saha kartavyakarmasvarūpam āha
analyzed: svabhāva anubandhi sattva ādi guṇa bheda bhinnam vṛttyā saha kartavya karma svarūpam āha

original: brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ śūdrāṇāṃ ca paraṃtapa /
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kṣatriya viśām śūdrāṇām ca paraṃtapa

original: karmāṇi pravibhaktāni svabhāvaprabhavair guṇaiḥ // BhGR_18.41 //
analyzed: karmāṇi pravibhaktāni svabhāva prabhavaiḥ guṇaiḥ

original: brāhmaṇakṣatriyaviśāṃ svakīyo bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ brāhmaṇādijanmahetubhūtaṃ prācīnakarmety arthaḥ;
analyzed: brāhmaṇa kṣatriya viśām svakīyaḥ bhāvaḥ svabhāvaḥ brāhmaṇa ādi janma hetu bhūtam prācīna karma iti arthaḥ

original: tatprabhavāḥ sattvādayo guṇāḥ /
analyzed: tad prabhavāḥ sattva ādayaḥ guṇāḥ

original: brāhmaṇasya svabhāvaprabhavo rajastamo'bhibhavenodbhūtaḥ sattvaguṇaḥ;
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya svabhāva prabhavaḥ rajaḥ tamaḥ abhibhavena udbhūtaḥ sattva guṇaḥ

original: kṣatriyasya svabhāvaprabhavaḥ tamassattvābhibhavenodbhūto rajoguṇaḥ;
analyzed: kṣatriyasya svabhāva prabhavaḥ tamaḥ sattva abhibhavena udbhūtaḥ rajaḥ guṇaḥ

original: vaiśyasya svabhāvaprabhavaḥ sattvarajo'bhibhavenālpodriktas tamoguṇaḥ;
analyzed: vaiśyasya svabhāva prabhavaḥ sattva rajaḥ abhibhavena alpa udriktaḥ tamaḥ guṇaḥ

original: śūdrasya svabhāvaprabhavas tu rajassattvābhibhavenātyudriktas tamoguṇaḥ /
analyzed: śūdrasya svabhāva prabhavaḥ tu rajaḥ sattva abhibhavena atyudriktaḥ tamaḥ guṇaḥ

original: ebhiḥ svabhāvaprabhavair guṇaiḥ saha pravibhaktāni karmāṇi śāstraiḥ pratipāditāni /
analyzed: ebhiḥ svabhāva prabhavaiḥ guṇaiḥ saha pravibhaktāni karmāṇi śāstraiḥ pratipāditāni

original: brāhmaṇādaya evaṃguṇakāḥ,
analyzed: brāhmaṇa ādayaḥ evaṃguṇakāḥ

original: teṣāṃ caitāni karmāṇi,
analyzed: teṣām ca etāni karmāṇi

original: vṛttayaś caitā iti hi vibhajya pratipādayanti śāstrāṇi // BhGR_18.41 //
analyzed: vṛttayaḥ ca etāḥ iti hi vibhajya pratipādayanti śāstrāṇi

original: śamo damas tapaś śaucaṃ kṣāntir ārjavam eva ca /
analyzed: śamaḥ damaḥ tapaḥ śaucam kṣāntiḥ ārjavam eva ca

original: jñānaṃ vijñānam āstikyaṃ brāhmaṃ karma svabhāvajam // BhGR_18.42 //
analyzed: jñānam vijñānam āstikyam brāhmam karma svabhāva jam

original: śamaḥ bāhyendriyaniyamanam;
damaḥ antaḥkaraṇaniyamanam;
tapaḥ bhoganiyamanarūpaḥ śāstrasiddhaḥ kāyakleśaḥ;
analyzed: tapaḥ bhoga niyamana rūpaḥ śāstra siddhaḥ kāya kleśaḥ

original: śaucaṃ śāstrīyakarmayogyatā;
analyzed: śaucam śāstrīya karma yogya tā

original: kṣāntiḥ paraiḥ pīḍyamānasyāpy avikṛtacittatā;
analyzed: kṣāntiḥ paraiḥ pīḍyamānasya api avikṛta citta tā

original: ārjavaṃ pareṣu mano'nurūpaṃ bāhyaceṣṭāprakāśanam;
analyzed: ārjavam pareṣu manaḥ anurūpam bāhya ceṣṭā prakāśanam

original: jñānaṃ parāvaratattvayāthātmyajñānam;
vijñānaṃ paratattvagatāsādhāraṇaviśeṣaviṣayaṃ jñānam;
analyzed: vijñānam para tattva gata asādhāraṇa viśeṣa viṣayam jñānam

original: āstikyaṃ vaidikasya kṛtsnasya satyatāniścayaḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ;
analyzed: āstikyam vaidikasya kṛtsnasya satyatā niścayaḥ prakṛṣṭaḥ

original: kenāpi hetunā cālayitum aśakya ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: kena api hetunā cālayitum aśakyaḥ iti arthaḥ

original: bhagavān puruṣottamo vāsudevaḥ parabrahmaśabdābhideyo nirastanikhiladoṣagandhaḥ svābhāvikānavadhikātiśayajñānaśaktyādyasaṅkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇo
analyzed: bhagavān puruṣottamaḥ vāsudevaḥ para brahma śabda abhideyaḥ nirasta nikhila doṣa gandhaḥ svābhāvika anavadhika atiśaya jñānaśakti ādi asaṅkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇaḥ

original: sa eva nikhilajagadekakāraṇaṃ nikhilajagadādhārabhūtaḥ;
analyzed: saḥ eva nikhila jagat eka kāraṇam nikhila jagat ādhāra bhūtaḥ

original: nikhilasya sa eva pravartayitā;
analyzed: nikhilasya saḥ eva pravartayitā

original: tadārādhanabhūtaṃ ca vaidikaṃ kṛtsnaṃ karma;
analyzed: tad ārādhana bhūtam ca vaidikam kṛtsnam karma

original: tais tair ārādhito dharmārthakāmamokṣākhyaṃ phalaṃ prayacchatīty asyārthasya satyatāniścaya āstikyam;
analyzed: taiḥ taiḥ ārādhitaḥ dharma artha kāma mokṣa ākhyam phalam prayacchati iti asya arthasya satya tā niścayaḥ āstikyam

original: “vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyaḥ“,
analyzed: vedaiḥ ca sarvaiḥ aham eva vedyaḥ

original: “ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattas sarvaṃ pravartate “,
analyzed: aham sarvasya prabhavaḥ mattaḥ sarvam pravartate

original: “mayi sarvam idaṃ protam“,
analyzed: mayi sarvam idam protam

original: “bhoktāraṃ yajñatapasāṃ ..... jñātvā māṃ śāntim ṛcchati“,
analyzed: bhoktāram yajña tapasām jñātvā mām śāntim ṛcchati

original: “mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiñcid asti dhanañjaya“,
analyzed: mattaḥ parataram na anyat kiñcid asti dhanañjaya

original: “yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam /
analyzed: yatas pravṛttiḥ bhūtānām yena sarvam idam tatam

original: svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ“,
analyzed: sva karmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhim vindati mānavaḥ

original: “yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram” iti hy ucyate /
analyzed: yaḥ mām ajam anādim ca vetti loka mahā īśvaram iti hi ucyate

original: tad etad brāhmaṇasya svabhāvajaṃ karma // BhGR_18.42 //
analyzed: tat etat brāhmaṇasya svabhāva jam karma

original: śairyaṃ tejo dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ yuddhe cāpy apalāyanam /
analyzed: śairyam tejaḥ dhṛtiḥ dākṣyam yuddhe ca api apalāyanam

original: dānam īśvarabhāvaś ca kṣātraṃ karma svabhāvajam // BhGR_18.43 //
analyzed: dānam īśvara bhāvaḥ ca kṣātram karma svabhāva jam

original: śairyaṃ yuddhe nirbhayapraveśasāmarthyam,
analyzed: śairyam yuddhe nirbhaya praveśa sāmarthyam

original: tejaḥ parair anabhibhavanīyatā,
analyzed: tejaḥ paraiḥ an abhibhavanīya tā

original: dhṛtiḥ ārabdhe karmaṇi vighnopanipāte 'pi tatsamāpanasāmarthyam,
analyzed: dhṛtiḥ ārabdhe karmaṇi vighna upanipāte api tad samāpana sāmarthyam

original: dākṣyaṃ sarvakriyānirvṛttisāmarthyam,
analyzed: dākṣyam sarva kriyā nirvṛtti sāmarthyam

original: yuddhe cāpy apalāyanam yuddhe cātmamaraṇaniścaye 'py anirvartanam;
analyzed: yuddhe ca api apalāyanam yuddhe ca ātma maraṇa niścaye api anirvartanam

original: dānaṃ ātmīyasya dhanasya parasvatvāpādanaparyantas tyāgaḥ īśvarabhāvaḥ svavyatiriktasakalajananiyamanasāmarthyam;
analyzed: dānam ātmīyasya dhanasya para sva tva āpādana paryantaḥ tyāgaḥ īśvara bhāvaḥ sva vyatirikta sakala jana niyamana sāmarthyam

original: etat kṣatriyasya svabhāvajaṃ karma // BhGR_18.43 //
analyzed: etat kṣatriyasya svabhāva jam karma

original: kṛṣigorakṣyavāṇijyaṃ vaiśyaṃ karma svabhāvajam /
analyzed: kṛṣi gorakṣya vāṇijyam vaiśyam karma svabhāva jam

original: kṛṣiḥ satyotpādanaṃ karṣaṇam /
analyzed: kṛṣiḥ satya utpādanam karṣaṇam

original: gorakṣyam paśupālanam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: gorakṣyam paśu pālanam iti arthaḥ

original: vāṇijyam dhanasañcayahetubhūtaṃ krayavikrayātmakaṃ karma /
analyzed: vāṇijyam dhana sañcaya hetu bhūtam kraya vikraya ātmakam karma

original: etad vaiśyasya svabhāvajaṃ karma //
analyzed: etat vaiśyasya svabhāva jam karma

original: paricaryātmakaṃ karma śūdrasyāpi svabhāvajam // BhGR_18.44 //
analyzed: paricaryā ātmakam karma śūdrasya api svabhāva jam

original: pūrvavarṇatrayaparicaryārūpaṃ śūdrasya svabhāvajaṃ karma /
analyzed: pūrva varṇa traya paricaryā rūpam śūdrasya svabhāva jam karma

original: tad etac caturṇā varṇānāṃ vṛttibhis saha kartavyānāṃ śāstravihitānāṃ yajñādikarmaṇāṃ pradarśanārtham uktam /
analyzed: tat etat caturṇām varṇānām vṛttibhiḥ saha kartavyānām śāstra vihitānām yajña ādi karmaṇām pradarśana artham uktam

original: yajñādayo hi trayāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ sādhāraṇāḥ /
analyzed: yajña ādayaḥ hi trayāṇām varṇānām sādhāraṇāḥ

original: śamādayo 'pi trayāṇāṃ varṇānāṃ mumukṣūṇāṃ sādhāraṇāḥ /
analyzed: śama ādayaḥ api trayāṇām varṇānām mumukṣūṇām sādhāraṇāḥ

original: brāhmaṇasya tu sattvodrekasya svābhāvikatvena śamadamādayaḥ sukhopādānā iti kṛtvā tasya śamādaya svabhāvajaṃ karmety uktam /
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya tu sattva udrekasya svābhāvika tvena śama dama ādayaḥ sukha upādānāḥ iti kṛtvā tasya svabhāva jam karma iti uktam

original: kṣatriyavaiśyayos tu svato rajastamaḥpradhānatvena śamadamādayo duḥkhopādānā iti kṛtvā na tat karmety uktam /
analyzed: kṣatriya vaiśyayoḥ tu svatas rajaḥ tamaḥ pradhāna tvena śama dama ādayaḥ duḥkha upādānāḥ iti kṛtvā na tat karma iti uktam

original: brāhmaṇasya vṛttir yājanādhyāpanapratigrahāḥ;
analyzed: brāhmaṇasya vṛttiḥ yājana adhyāpana pratigrahāḥ

original: kṣatriyasya janapadaparipālanam;
analyzed: kṣatriyasya janapada paripālanam

original: vaiśyasya ca kṛṣyādayo yathoktāḥ;
analyzed: vaiśyasya ca kṛṣi ādayaḥ yathā uktāḥ

original: śūdrasya tu kartavyaṃ vṛttiś ca pūrvavarṇatrayaparicaryaiva //
analyzed: śūdrasya tu kartavyam vṛttiḥ ca pūrva varṇa traya paricaryā eva

original: sve sve karmaṇy abhiratas saṃsiddhiṃ labhate naraḥ /
analyzed: sve sve karmaṇi abhirataḥ saṃsiddhim labhate naraḥ

original: svakarmaniratas siddhiṃ yathā vindati tac chṛṇu // BhGR_18.45 //
analyzed: sva karma nirataḥ siddhim yathā vindati tat śṛṇu

original: sve sve yathodite karmaṇy abhirato naraḥ saṃsiddhiṃ paramapadaprāptiṃ labhate /
analyzed: sve sve yathā udite karmaṇi abhirataḥ naraḥ saṃsiddhim parama pada prāptim labhate

original: svakarmanirato yathā siddhiṃ vindati paramapadaṃ prāpnoti,
analyzed: sva karma nirataḥ yathā siddhim vindati parama padam prāpnoti

original: tathā śṛṇu // BhGR_18.45 //
analyzed: tathā śṛṇu

original: yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam /
analyzed: yatas pravṛttiḥ bhūtānām yena sarvam idam tatam

original: svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ // BhGR_18.46 //
analyzed: sva karmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhim vindati mānavaḥ

original: yato bhūtānām utpattyādikā pravṛttiḥ,
analyzed: yatas bhūtānām utpatti ādikā pravṛttiḥ

original: yena ca sarvam idaṃ tatam,
analyzed: yena ca sarvam idam tatam

original: svakarmaṇā taṃ mām indrādyantarātmatayāvasthitam abhyarcya matprasādān matprāptirūpāṃ siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ /
analyzed: sva karmaṇā tam mām indra ādi antarātma tayā avasthitam abhyarcya mad prasādāt mad prāpti rūpām siddhim vindati mānavaḥ

original: matta eva sarvam utpadyate,
analyzed: mattaḥ eva sarvam utpadyate

original: mayā ca sarvam idaṃ tatam iti pūrvam evoktam,
analyzed: mayā ca sarvam idam tatam iti pūrvam eva uktam

original: “ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā /
analyzed: aham kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ tathā

original: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiṃcid asti dhanañjaya /
analyzed: mattaḥ parataram na anyat kiṃcid asti dhanañjaya

original: “, “mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā“,
analyzed: mayā tatam idam sarvam jagat avyakta mūrtinā

original: “mayādhyakṣeṇa prakṛtiḥ sūyate sacarācaram“,
analyzed: mayā adhyakṣeṇa prakṛtiḥ sūyate sacarācaram

original: “ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattas sarvaṃ pravartate” ityādiṣu // BhGR_18.46 //
analyzed: aham sarvasya prabhavaḥ mattaḥ sarvam pravartate ityādiṣu

original: śreyān svadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmāt svanuṣṭhitāt /
analyzed: śreyān svadharmaḥ viguṇaḥ para dharmāt su anuṣṭhitāt

original: evaṃ tyaktakartṛtvādiko madārādhanarūpaḥ svadharmaḥ /
analyzed: evam tyakta kartṛ tva ādikaḥ mad ārādhana rūpaḥ svadharmaḥ

original: svenaivopādātuṃ yogyo dharmaḥ;
analyzed: svena eva upādātum yogyaḥ dharmaḥ

original: prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭena hi puruṣeṇendriyavyāpārarūpaḥ karmayogātmako dharmaḥ sukaro bhavati /
analyzed: prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭena hi puruṣeṇa indriya vyāpāra rūpaḥ karma yoga ātmakaḥ dharmaḥ sukaraḥ bhavati

original: ataḥ karmayogākhyaḥ svadharmo viguṇo 'pi paradharmāt indriyajayanipuṇapuruṣadharmāj jñānayogāt sakalendriyaniyamanarūpatayā sapramādāt kadācit  #
analyzed: atas karma yoga ākhyaḥ svadharmaḥ viguṇaḥ api para dharmāt indriya jaya nipuṇa puruṣa dharmāt jñāna yogāt sakala indriya niyamana rūpa tayā sa pramādāt kadācid

original: svanuṣṭhitāc śreyān /
analyzed: su anuṣṭhitāt śreyān

original: tad evopapādayati
analyzed: tat eva upapādayati

original: svabhāvaniyataṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam // BhGR_18.47 //
analyzed: svabhāva niyatam karma kurvan na āpnoti kilbiṣam

original: prakṛtisaṃsṛṣṭasya puruṣasya indriyavyāpārarūpatayā svabhāvata eva niyatatvāt karmaṇaḥ,
analyzed: prakṛti saṃsṛṣṭasya puruṣasya indriya vyāpāra rūpa tayā svabhāvataḥ eva niyata tvāt karmaṇaḥ

original: karma kurvan kilbiṣaṃ saṃsāraṃ na prāpnoti;
analyzed: karma kurvan kilbiṣam saṃsāram na prāpnoti

original: apramādatvāt karmaṇaḥ /
analyzed: a pramāda tvāt karmaṇaḥ

original: jñānayogasya sakalendriyaniyamanasādhyatayā sapramādatvāt tanniṣṭhas tu pramādāt kilbiṣaṃ pratipadyetāpi // BhGR_18.47 //
analyzed: jñāna yogasya sakala indriya niyamana sādhya tayā sa pramāda tvāt tad niṣṭhaḥ tu pramādāt kilbiṣam pratipadyeta api

original: ataḥ karmaniṣṭhaiva jyāyasīti tṛtīyādhyāyoktaṃ smārayati
analyzed: atas karma niṣṭhā eva jyāyasī iti tṛtīya adhyāya uktam smārayati

original: sahajaṃ karma kaunteya sadoṣam api na tyajet /
analyzed: sahajam karma kaunteya sa doṣam api na tyajet

original: sarvārambhā hi doṣeṇa dhūmenāgnir ivāvṛtāḥ // BhGR_18.48 //
analyzed: sarva ārambhāḥ hi doṣeṇa dhūmena agniḥ iva āvṛtāḥ

original: ataḥ sahajatvena sukaram apramādaṃ ca karma sadoṣaṃ saduḥkham api na tyajet;
analyzed: atas sahaja tvena sukaram apramādam ca karma sa doṣam sa duḥkham api na tyajet

original: jñānayogayogyo 'pi karmayogam eva kurvītetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: jñāna yoga yogyaḥ api karmayogam eva kurvīta iti arthaḥ

original: sarvārambhāḥ,
analyzed: sarva ārambhāḥ

original: karmārambhāḥ jñānārambhāś ca hi doṣeṇa duḥkhena dhūmenāgnir ivāvṛtāḥ /
analyzed: karma ārambhāḥ jñāna ārambhāḥ ca hi doṣeṇa duḥkhena dhūmena agniḥ iva āvṛtāḥ

original: iyāṃs tu viśeṣaḥ karmayogaḥ sukaro 'pramādaś ca,
analyzed: iyān tu viśeṣaḥ karma yogaḥ sukaraḥ apramādaḥ ca

original: jñānayogas tadviparītaḥ iti // BhGR_18.48 //
analyzed: jñāna yogaḥ tad viparītaḥ iti

original: asaktabuddhis sarvatra jitātmā vigataspṛhaḥ /
analyzed: asakta buddhiḥ sarvatra jita ātmā vigata spṛhaḥ

original: naiṣkarmyasiddhiṃ paramāṃ saṃnyāsenādhigacchati // BhGR_18.49 //
analyzed: naiṣkarmya siddhim paramām saṃnyāsena adhigacchati

original: sarvatra phalādiṣu asaktabuddhiḥ,
analyzed: sarvatra phala ādiṣu asakta buddhiḥ

original: jitātmā jitamanāḥ,
analyzed: jita ātmā jita manāḥ

original: paramapuruṣakartṛtvānusaṃdhānenātmakartṛtve vigataspṛhaḥ,
evaṃ tyāgād ananyatvena nirṇītena saṃnyāsena yuktaḥ karma kurvan paramāṃ naiṣkarmyasiddhim adhigacchati paramāṃ dhyānaniṣṭhāṃ jñānayogasyāpi  #
analyzed: evam tyāgāt ananya tvena nirṇītena saṃnyāsena yuktaḥ karma kurvan paramām naiṣkarmya siddhim adhigacchati paramām dhyāna niṣṭhām jñāna yogasya api

original: phalabhūtam adhigacchatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: phala bhūtam adhigacchati iti arthaḥ

original: vakṣyamāṇadhyānayogāvāptiṃ sarvendriyakarmoparatirūpām adhigacchati // BhGR_18.49 //
analyzed: vakṣyamāṇa dhyāna yoga avāptim sarva indriya karma uparati rūpām adhigacchati

original: siddhiṃ prāpto yathā brahma tathāpnoti nibodha me /
analyzed: siddhim prāptaḥ yathā brahma tathā āpnoti nibodha me

original: samāsenaiva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā // BhGR_18.50 //
analyzed: samāsena eva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā

original: siddhiṃ prāptaḥ āprayāṇādaharaharanuṣṭhīyamānakarmayoganiṣpādyadhyānasidddhiṃ prāptaḥ,
analyzed: siddhim prāptaḥ ā prayāṇāt aharahar anuṣṭhīyamāna karmayoga niṣpādya dhyāna sidddhim prāptaḥ

original: yathā yena prakāreṇa vartamāno brahma prāpnoti,
analyzed: yathā yena prakāreṇa vartamānaḥ brahma prāpnoti

original: tathā samāsena me nibodha /
analyzed: tathā samāsena me nibodha

original: tad eva brahma viśeṣyate niṣṭhā jñānasya yā pareti /
analyzed: tat eva brahma viśeṣyate niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā iti

original: jñānasya dhyānātmakasya yā parā niṣṭhā paramaprāpyam ityarthaḥ // BhGR_18.50 //
analyzed: jñānasya dhyāna ātmakasya yā parā niṣṭhā parama prāpyam iti arthaḥ

original: buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto dhṛtyātmānaṃ niyamya ca /
analyzed: buddhyā viśuddhayā yuktaḥ dhṛtya ātmānam niyamya ca

original: śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā rāgadveṣau vyudasya ca // BhGR_18.51 //
analyzed: śabda ādīn viṣayān tyaktvā rāga dveṣau vyudasya ca

original: viviktasevī laghvāśī yatavākkāyamānasaḥ /
dhyānayogaparo nityaṃ vairāgyaṃ samupāśritaḥ // BhGR_18.52 //
analyzed: dhyāna yoga paraḥ nityam vairāgyam samupāśritaḥ

original: ahaṅkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigraham /
analyzed: ahaṅkāram balam darpam kāmam krodham parigraham

original: vimucya nirmamaś śānto brahmabhūyāya kalpate // BhGR_18.53 //
analyzed: vimucya nirmamaḥ śāntaḥ brahma bhūyāya kalpate

original: buddhyā viśuddhayā yathāvasthitātmatattvaviṣayayā yuktaḥ,
analyzed: buddhyā viśuddhayā yathā avasthita ātma tattva viṣayayā yuktaḥ

original: dhṛtyā ātmānaṃ niyamya ca viṣayavimukhīkaraṇena yogayogyaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā,
analyzed: dhṛtyā ātmānam niyamya ca viṣaya vimukhīkaraṇena yoga yogyam manaḥ kṛtvā

original: śabdādīn viṣayān tyaktvā asannihitān kṛtvā,
analyzed: śabda ādīn viṣayān tyaktvā asannihitān kṛtvā

original: tannimittau ca rāgadveṣau vyudasya,
analyzed: tad nimittau ca rāga dveṣau vyudasya

original: viviktasevī sarvair dhyānavirodhibhir vivikte deśe vartamānaḥ,
analyzed: vivikta sevī sarvaiḥ dhyāna virodhibhiḥ vivikte deśe vartamānaḥ

original: laghvāśī atyaśanānaśanarahitaḥ,
analyzed: laghu āśī atyaśana anaśana rahitaḥ

original: yatavākkāyamānasaḥ dhyānābhimukhīkṛtakāyavāṅmanovṛttiḥ,
analyzed: yata vāc kāya mānasaḥ dhyāna abhimukhīkṛta kāya vāc manaḥ vṛttiḥ

original: dhyānayogaparo nityam evaṃbhūtas san ā prāyāṇād aharahardhyānayogaparaḥ,
analyzed: dhyāna yoga paraḥ nityam evaṃbhūtaḥ san ā prāyāṇāt ahar ahar dhyāna yoga paraḥ

original: vairāgyaṃ samupāśritaḥ dhyeyatattvavyatiriktaviṣayadoṣāvamarśena tatra tatra virāgatāṃ vardhayan,
analyzed: vairāgyam samupāśritaḥ dhyeya tattva vyatirikta viṣaya doṣa avamarśena tatra tatra virāga tām vardhayan

original: ahaṃkāram anātmani ātmābhimānaṃ,
analyzed: ahaṃkāram anātmani ātma abhimānam

original: balaṃ tadvṛddhihetubhūtavāsanabalaṃ,
analyzed: balam tad vṛddhi hetu bhūta vāsana balam

original: tannimittaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigrahaṃ vimucya,
analyzed: tad nimittam darpam kāmam krodham parigraham vimucya

original: nirmamaḥ sarveṣv anātmīyeṣv ātmīyabuddhirahitaḥ,
analyzed: nirmamaḥ sarveṣu anātmīyeṣu ātmīya buddhi rahitaḥ

original: śāntaḥ ātmānubhavaikasukhaḥ,
evaṃbhūto dhyānayogaṃ kurvan brahmabhūyāya kalpate sarvabandhavinirmukto yathāvasthitam ātmānam anubhavatītyarthaḥ // BhGR_18.51 53 //
analyzed: evaṃbhūtaḥ dhyāna yogam kurvan brahma bhūyāya kalpate sarva bandha vinirmuktaḥ yathā avasthitam ātmānam anubhavati iti arthaḥ

original: brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati /
analyzed: brahma bhūtaḥ prasanna ātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati

original: samas sarveṣu bhūteṣu madbhaktiṃ labhate parām // BhGR_18.54 //
analyzed: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu mad bhaktim labhate parām

original: brahmabhūtaḥ āvirbhūtāparicchinnajñānaikākāramaccheṣataikasvabhāvātmasvarūpaḥ,
analyzed: brahma bhūtaḥ āvirbhūta aparicchinna jñāna eka ākāram accheṣa tā eka svabhāva ātma svarūpaḥ

original: “itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām” iti hi svaśeṣatoktā /
analyzed: itas tu anyām prakṛtim viddhi me parām iti hi sva śeṣa tā uktā

original: prasannātmā kleśakarmādibhir akaluṣasvarūpo madvyatiriktaṃ na kaṃcana bhūtaviśeṣaṃ prati śocati;
analyzed: prasanna ātmā kleśa karma ādibhiḥ akaluṣa svarūpaḥ mad vyatiriktam na kaṃcana bhūta viśeṣam prati śocati

original: na kiṃcana kāṅkṣati;
analyzed: na kiṃcana kāṅkṣati

original: api tu madvyatirikteṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu anādaraṇīyatāyāṃ samo nikhilaṃ vastujātaṃ
analyzed: api tu mad vyatirikteṣu sarveṣu bhūteṣu an ādaraṇīya tāyām samaḥ nikhilam vastu jātam

original: tṛṇavan manyamāno madbhaktiṃ labhate parām mayi sarveśvare nikhilajagadudbhavasthitipralayalīle
analyzed: tṛṇa vat manyamānaḥ mad bhaktim labhate parām mayi sarveśvare nikhila jagat udbhava sthiti pralaya līle

original: nirastasamastaheyagandhe 'navadhikātiśayāsaṃkhyeyakalyāṇaguṇagaṇaikatāne lāvaṇyāmṛtasāgare
analyzed: nirasta samasta heya gandhe anavadhika atiśaya asaṃkhyeya kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa ekatāne lāvaṇya amṛta sāgare

original: śrīmati puṇḍarīkanayane svasvāmini atyarthapriyānubhavarūpāṃ parāṃ bhaktiṃ labhate // BhGR_18.54 //
analyzed: śrīmati puṇḍarīkanayane sva svāmini atyartha priya anubhava rūpām parām bhaktim labhate

original: tatphalam āha
analyzed: tad phalam āha

original: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ /
analyzed: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaḥ ca asmi tattvataḥ

original: tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tadanantaram // BhGR_18.55 //
analyzed: tatas mām tattvataḥ jñātvā viśate tad anantaram

original: svarūpataḥ svabhāvataś ca yo 'ham;
analyzed: svarūpataḥ svabhāvataḥ ca yaḥ aham

original: guṇato vibhūtito 'pi yāvāṃś cāham,
analyzed: guṇataḥ vibhūtitaḥ api yāvān ca aham

original: taṃ mām evaṃrūpayā bhaktyā tattvato 'bhijānāti;
analyzed: tam mām evaṃrūpayā bhaktyā tattvataḥ abhijānāti

original: māṃ tattvato jñātvā tadanantaram tattvajñānānantaraṃ tataḥ bhaktitaḥ māṃ viśate praviśati /
analyzed: mām tattvataḥ jñātvā tad anantaram tattva jñāna anantaram tatas bhaktitaḥ mām viśate praviśati

original: tattvatas svarūpasvabhāvaguṇavibhūtidarśanottarakālabhāvinyā anavadhikātiśayabhaktyā māṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tattvataḥ svarūpa svabhāva guṇa vibhūti darśana uttara kāla bhāvinyā anavadhika atiśaya bhaktyā mām prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: atra tata iti prāptihetutayā,
analyzed: atra tatas iti prāpti hetutayā

original: nirdiṣṭā bhaktir evābhidhīyate;
analyzed: nirdiṣṭā bhaktiḥ eva abhidhīyate

original: “bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakyaḥ” iti tasya eva tattvataḥ praveśahetutvābhidhānāt // BhGR_18.55 //
analyzed: bhaktyā tu ananyayā śakyaḥ iti tasya eva tattvataḥ praveśa hetu tva abhidhānāt

original: evaṃ varṇāśramocitanityanaimittikakarmaṇāṃ parityaktaphalādikānāṃ paramapuruṣārādhanarūpeṇānuṣṭhitānāṃ vipāka uktaḥ /
analyzed: evam varṇa āśrama ucita nitya naimittika karmaṇām parityakta phala ādikānām paramapuruṣa ārādhana rūpeṇa anuṣṭhitānām vipākaḥ uktaḥ

original: idānīṃ kāmyānām api karmaṇām uktenaiva prakāreṇānuṣṭhitānāṃ sa eva vipāka ity āha
analyzed: idānīm kāmyānām api karmaṇām uktena eva prakāreṇa anuṣṭhitānām saḥ eva vipākaḥ iti āha

original: sarvakarmāṇy api sadā kurvāṇo madvyapāśrayaḥ /
analyzed: sarva karmāṇi api sadā kurvāṇaḥ mad vyapāśrayaḥ

original: matprasādād avāpnoti śāśvataṃ padam avyayam // BhGR_18.56 //
analyzed: mad prasādāt avāpnoti śāśvatam padam avyayam

original: na kevalaṃ nityanaimittikāni karmāṇi,
analyzed: na kevalam nitya naimittikāni karmāṇi

original: api tu sarvāṇi kāmyāny api karmāṇi,
analyzed: api tu sarvāṇi kāmyāni api karmāṇi

original: madvyāśrayaḥ mayi saṃnyastakartṛtvādikaḥ kurvāṇo matprasādāc chāśvataṃ padam avyayam avikalaṃ prāpnoti /
analyzed: mad vyāśrayaḥ mayi saṃnyasta kartṛ tva ādikaḥ kurvāṇaḥ mad prasādāt śāśvatam padam avyayam avikalam prāpnoti

original: padyate gamyata iti padam;
analyzed: padyate gamyate iti padam

original: māṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ // BhGR_18.56 //
analyzed: mām prāpnoti iti arthaḥ

original: yasmād evam, tasmāt
analyzed: yasmāt evam tasmāt

original: cetasā sarvakarmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparaḥ /
analyzed: cetasā sarva karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya mad paraḥ

original: buddhiyogam upāśritya maccittas satataṃ bhava // BhGR_18.57 //
analyzed: buddhi yogam upāśritya mad cittaḥ satatam bhava

original: cetasā ātmano madīyatvamanniyāmyatvabuddhyā /
analyzed: cetasā ātmanaḥ madīya tva mad niyāmya tva buddhyā

original: uktaṃ hi, “mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasyādhyātmacetasā” iti /
analyzed: uktam hi mayi sarvāṇi karmāṇi saṃnyasya adhyātma cetasā iti

original: sarvakarmāṇi sakartṛkāṇi sārādhyāni mayi saṃnyasya,
analyzed: sarva karmāṇi sa kartṛkāṇi sa ārādhyāni mayi saṃnyasya

original: matparaḥ aham eva phalatayā prāpya ity anusaṃdhānaḥ,
analyzed: mad paraḥ aham eva phala tayā prāpyaḥ iti anusaṃdhānaḥ

original: karmāṇi kurvan imam eva buddhiyogam upāśritya satataṃ maccitto bhava // BhGR_18.57 //
analyzed: karmāṇi kurvan imam eva buddhi yogam upāśritya satatam mad cittaḥ bhava

original: maccittaḥ sarvadurgāṇi matprasādāt tariṣyasi /
analyzed: mad cittaḥ sarva durgāṇi mad prasādāt tariṣyasi

original: atha cet tvam ahaṃkārān na śroṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi // BhGR_18.58 //
analyzed: atha ced tvam ahaṃkārāt na śroṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi

original: evaṃ maccittaḥ sarvakarmāṇi kurvan sarvāṇi sāṃsārikāṇi durgāṇi matprasādād eva tariṣyasi /
analyzed: evam mad cittaḥ sarva karmāṇi kurvan sarvāṇi sāṃsārikāṇi durgāṇi mad prasādāt eva tariṣyasi

original: atha tvam ahaṃkārād aham eva kṛtyākṛtyaviṣayaṃ sarvaṃ jānāmīti bhāvān maduktaṃ na śroṣyasi cet,
analyzed: atha tvam ahaṃkārāt aham eva kṛtya akṛtya viṣayam sarvam jānāmi iti bhāvāt mad uktam na śroṣyasi ced

original: vinaṅkṣyasi vinaṣṭo bhaviṣyasi /
analyzed: vinaṅkṣyasi vinaṣṭaḥ bhaviṣyasi

original: na hi kaścin madvyatiriktaḥ kṛtsnasya prāṇijātasya kṛtyākṛtyayor jñātā praśāsitā vāsti // BhGR_18.58 //
analyzed: na hi kaścid mad vyatiriktaḥ kṛtsnasya prāṇi jātasya kṛtyā akṛtyayoḥ jñātā praśāsitā vā asti

original: yady ahaṅkāram āśritya na yotsya iti manyase /
analyzed: yadi ahaṅkāram āśritya na yotsye iti manyase

original: mithyaiṣa vyavasāyas te prakṛtis tvāṃ niyokṣyati // BhGR_18.59 //
analyzed: mithyā eṣa vyavasāyaḥ te prakṛtiḥ tvām niyokṣyati

original: yadi ahaṃkāram ātmani hitāhitajñāne svātantryābhimānam āśritya manniyogam anādṛtya na yotsya iti manyase,
analyzed: yadi ahaṃkāram ātmani hita ahita jñāne svātantrya abhimānam āśritya mad niyogam an ādṛtya na yotsye iti manyase

original: eṣa te svātantryavyavasāyo mithyā bhaviṣyati;
analyzed: eṣa te svātantrya vyavasāyaḥ mithyā bhaviṣyati

original: yataḥ prakṛtis tvāṃ yuddhe niyokṣyati matsvātantryodvignaṃ tvām ajñaṃ prakṛtir niyokṣati // BhGR_18.59 //
analyzed: yatas prakṛtiḥ tvām yuddhe niyokṣyati mad svātantrya udvignam tvām ajñam prakṛtiḥ niyokṣati

original: tad upapādayati
analyzed: tat upapādayati

original: svabhāvajena kaunteya nibaddhaḥ svena karmaṇā /
analyzed: svabhāva jena kaunteya nibaddhaḥ svena karmaṇā

original: kartuṃ necchasi yan mohāt kariṣyasy avaśo 'pi tat // BhGR_18.60 //
analyzed: kartum nā icchasi yat mohāt kariṣyasi avaśaḥ api tat

original: svabhāvajaṃ hi kṣatriyasya karma śauryam /
analyzed: svabhāva jam hi kṣatriyasya karma śauryam

original: svabhāvajena śauryākhyena svena karmaṇā nibaddhaḥ,
analyzed: svabhāva jena śaurya ākhyena svena karmaṇā nibaddhaḥ

original: tad evāvaśaḥ,
analyzed: tat eva avaśaḥ

original: parair dharṣaṇam asahamānas tvam eva tad yuddhaṃ kariṣyasi,
analyzed: paraiḥ dharṣaṇam a sahamānaḥ tvam eva tat yuddham kariṣyasi

original: yad idānīṃ mohād ajñānāt kartuṃ necchasi // BhGR_18.60 //
analyzed: yat idānīm mohāt ajñānāt kartum na icchasi

original: sarvaṃ hi bhūtajātaṃ sarveśvareṇa mayā pūrvakarmānuguṇyena prakṛtyanuvartane niyamitam; tac chṛṇu /
analyzed: sarvam hi bhūtajātam sarva īśvareṇa mayā pūrva karma ānuguṇyena prakṛti anuvartane niyamitam tat śṛṇu

original: īśvaraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśe 'rjuna tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ sarva bhūtānām hṛd deśe arjuna tiṣṭhati

original: bhrāmayan sarvabhūtāni yantrārūḍhāni māyayā // BhGR_18.61 //
analyzed: bhrāmayan sarva bhūtāni yantra ārūḍhāni māyayā

original: īśvaraḥ sarvaniyamanaśīlo vāsudevaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ hṛddeśe sakalapravṛttimūlajñānodayapradeśe tiṣṭhati /
analyzed: īśvaraḥ sarva niyamana śīlaḥ vāsudevaḥ sarva bhūtānām hṛd deśe sakala pravṛtti mūla jñāna udaya pradeśe tiṣṭhati

original: kathaṃ kiṃ kurvaṃs tiṣṭhati ?
analyzed: katham kim kurvan tiṣṭhati

original: yantrārūḍhāni sarvabhūtāni māyayā bhrāmayan /
analyzed: yantra ārūḍhāni sarva bhūtāni māyayā bhrāmayan

original: svenaiva nirmitaṃ dehendriyāvasthaṃ prakṛtyākhyaṃ yantram ārūḍhāni sarvabhūtāni svakīyayā sattvādiguṇamayyā māyayā guṇānuguṇaṃ pravartayaṃs  #
analyzed: svena eva nirmitam deha indriya avastham prakṛti ākhyam yantram ārūḍhāni sarva bhūtāni svakīyayā sattva ādi guṇa mayyā māyayā guṇa anuguṇam pravartayan

original: tiṣṭhatītyarthaḥ /
analyzed: tiṣṭhati iti arthaḥ

original: pūrvam apy etad uktam,
analyzed: pūrvam api etat uktam

original: “sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi sanniviṣṭo mattaḥ smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca” iti;
analyzed: sarvasya ca aham hṛdi sanniviṣṭaḥ mattaḥ smṛtiḥ jñānam apohanam ca iti

original: “mattas sarvaṃ pravartate” iti ca /
analyzed: mattaḥ sarvam pravartate iti ca

original: “ya ātmani tiṣṭhan” ityādikā śrutiś ca // BhGR_18.61 //
analyzed: yaḥ ātmani tiṣṭhan ityādikā śrutiḥ ca

original: etan māyānivṛttihetum āha
analyzed: etat māyā nivṛtti hetum āha

original: tam eva śaraṇaṃ gaccha sarvabhāvena bhārata /
analyzed: tam eva śaraṇam gaccha sarva bhāvena bhārata

original: tatprasādāt parāṃ śāntiṃ sthānaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam // BhGR_18.62 //
analyzed: tad prasādāt parām śāntim sthānam prāpsyasi śāśvatam

original: yasmād evam,
analyzed: yasmāt evam

original: tasmāt tam eva sarvasya praśāsitāram,
analyzed: tasmāt tam eva sarvasya praśāsitāram

original: āśritavātsalyena tvatsārathye 'vasthitam,
analyzed: āśrita vātsalyena tvad sārathye avasthitam

original: “itthaṃ kuru ” iti ca śāsitāraṃ sarvabhāvena sarvātmanā śaraṇaṃ gaccha /
analyzed: ittham kuru iti ca śāsitāram sarva bhāvena sarva ātmanā śaraṇam gaccha

original: sarvātmanānuvartasva /
analyzed: sarva ātmanā anuvartasva

original: anyathāpi tanmāyāpreritenājñena tvayā yuddhādikaraṇam avarjanīyam /
analyzed: anyathā api tad māyā preritena ajñena tvayā yuddha ādi karaṇam avarjanīyam

original: tathā sati naṣṭo bhaviṣyasi /
analyzed: tathā sati naṣṭaḥ bhaviṣyasi

original: atas taduktaprakāreṇa yuddhādikaṃ kurv ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: atas tad ukta prakāreṇa yuddha ādikam kuru iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ kurvāṇas tatprasādāt parāṃ śāntiṃ sarvakarmabandhopaśamaṃ śāśvataṃ ca sthānam prāpsyasi /
analyzed: evam kurvāṇaḥ tad prasādāt parām śāntim sarva karma bandha upaśamam śāśvatam ca sthānam prāpsyasi

original: yad abhidhīyate śrutiśataiḥ,
analyzed: yat abhidhīyate śruti śataiḥ

original: “tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ,
analyzed: tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ

original: “te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacante yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ“,
analyzed: te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacante yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ

original: “yatra ṛṣayaḥ prathamajā ye purāṇāḥ“,
analyzed: yatra ṛṣayaḥ prathama jāḥ ye purāṇāḥ

original: “pareṇa nākaṃ nihitaṃ guhāyām“,
analyzed: pareṇa nākam nihitam guhāyām

original: “yo 'syādhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman“,
analyzed: yaḥ asya adhyakṣaḥ parame vyoman

original: “atha yad ataḥ paro divo jyotir dīpyate“,
analyzed: atha yat atas paras divaḥ jyotiḥ dīpyate

original: “so 'dhvanaḥ pāram āpnoti tadviṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padam” ityādibhiḥ //
analyzed: saḥ adhvanaḥ pāram āpnoti tat viṣṇoḥ paramam padam ityādibhiḥ

original: iti te jñānam ākhyātaṃ guhyād guhyataraṃ mayā /
analyzed: iti te jñānam ākhyātam guhyāt guhyataram mayā

original: vimṛśyaitad aśeṣeṇa yathecchasi tathā kuru // BhGR_18.63 //
analyzed: vimṛśya etat aśeṣeṇa yathā icchasi tathā kuru

original: iti evaṃ te mumukṣubhir adhigantavyaṃ jñānaṃ sarvasmād guhyād guhyataraṃ karmayogaviṣayaṃ jñānayogaviṣayaṃ bhaktiyogaviṣayaṃ ca sarvam ākhyātam
analyzed: iti evam te mumukṣubhiḥ adhigantavyam jñānam sarvasmāt guhyāt guhyataram karmayoga viṣayam jñānayoga viṣayam bhaktiyoga viṣayam ca sarvam ākhyātam

original: etadaśeṣeṇa vimṛśya svādhikārānurūpaṃ yathecchasi,
analyzed: etat aśeṣeṇa vimṛśya sva adhikāra anurūpam yathā icchasi

original: tathā kuru karmayogaṃ jñānayogaṃ bhaktiyogaṃ vā yatheṣṭam ātiṣṭhetyarthaḥ // BhGR_18.63 //
analyzed: tathā kuru karmayogam jñāna yogam bhakti yogam vā yathā iṣṭam ātiṣṭha iti arthaḥ

original: sarvaguhyatamaṃ bhūyaḥ śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ /
analyzed: sarva guhyatamam bhūyas śṛṇu me paramam vacaḥ

original: iṣṭo 'si me dṛḍham iti tato vakṣyāmi te hitam // BhGR_18.64 //
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ asi me dṛḍham iti tatas vakṣyāmi te hitam

original: sarveṣv eteṣu guhyeṣu bhaktiyogasya śraiṣṭhyād guhyatamam iti pūrvam evoktam “idaṃ tu te guhyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave” ityādau /
analyzed: sarveṣu eteṣu guhyeṣu bhakti yogasya śraiṣṭhyāt guhyatamam iti pūrvam eva uktam idam tu te guhyatamam pravakṣyāmi anasūyave ityādau

original: bhūyo 'pi tadviṣayaṃ paramaṃ me vacaḥ śṛṇu /
analyzed: bhūyas api tad viṣayam paramam me vacaḥ śṛṇu

original: iṣṭo 'si me dṛḍham iti tatas te hitaṃ vakṣyāmi // BhGR_18.64 //
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ asi me dṛḍham iti tatas te hitam vakṣyāmi

original: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru /
analyzed: mad manāḥ bhava mad bhaktaḥ mad yājī mām namaskuru

original: mām evaiṣyasi satyaṃ te pratijāne priyo 'si me // BhGR_18.65 //
analyzed: mām eva eṣyasi satyam te pratijāne priyaḥ asi me

original: vedānteṣu, “vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt /
analyzed: veda anteṣu veda aham etam puruṣam mahāntam āditya varṇam tamasaḥ parastāt

original: tam evaṃ vidvān amṛta iha bhavati nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya” ityādiṣu vihitaṃ
analyzed: tam evam vidvān amṛtaḥ iha bhavati na anyaḥ panthāḥ vidyate ayanāya ityādiṣu vihitam

original: vedanaṃ dhyānopāsanādiśabdavācyaṃ darśanasamānākāraṃ smṛtisaṃtānam atyarthapriyam
analyzed: vedanam dhyāna upāsana ādi śabda vācyam darśana samāna ākāram smṛti saṃtānam atyartha priyam

original: iha manmanā bhaveti vidhīyate /
analyzed: iha mad manāḥ bhava iti vidhīyate

original: madbhaktaḥ atyarthamatpriyaḥ /
atyarthamatpriyatvena niratiśayapriyāṃ smṛtisaṃtatiṃ kuruṣvetyarthaḥ /
analyzed: atyartha mad priya tvena niratiśaya priyām smṛti saṃtatim kuruṣva iti arthaḥ

original: madyājī /
analyzed: mad yājī

original: tatrāpi madbhakta ity anuṣajyate /
analyzed: tatra api mad bhaktaḥ iti anuṣajyate

original: yajanaṃ pūjanam /
analyzed: yajanam pūjanam

original: atyarthapriyamadārādhanaparo bhava /
analyzed: atyartha priya mada ārādhana paraḥ bhava

original: ārādhanaṃ hi paripūrṇaśeṣavṛttiḥ /
analyzed: ārādhanam hi paripūrṇa śeṣa vṛttiḥ

original: māṃ namaskuru /
analyzed: mām namaskuru

original: namaḥ namanam /
analyzed: namaḥ namanam

original: mayy atimātraprahvībhāvam atyarthapriyaṃ kurv ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: mayi atimātra prahvī bhāvam atyartha priyam kuru iti arthaḥ

original: evaṃ vartamāno mām evaiṣyasi /
analyzed: evam vartamānaḥ mām eva eṣyasi

original: etat satyaṃ te pratijāne tava pratijñāṃ karomi;
analyzed: etat satyam te pratijāne tava pratijñām karomi

original: nopacchandanamātram;
analyzed: na upacchandana mātram

original: yatas tvaṃ priyo 'si me /
analyzed: yatas tvam priyaḥ asi me

original: “priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ” iti pūrvam evoktam /
analyzed: priyaḥ hi jñāninaḥ atyartham aham sa ca mama priyaḥ iti pūrvam eva uktam

original: yasya mayy atimātratā prītir vartate,
analyzed: yasya mayi atimātra tā prītiḥ vartate

original: mamāpi tasmin atimātrā prītir bhavatīti tadviyogam asahamāno 'haṃ taṃ māṃ prāpayāmi /
analyzed: mama api tasmin atimātrā prītiḥ bhavati iti tad viyogam asahamānaḥ aham tam mām prāpayāmi

original: ataḥ satyam eva pratijñātam,
analyzed: atas satyam eva pratijñātam

original: mām evaiṣyasīti // BhGR_18.65 //
analyzed: mām eva eṣyasi iti

original: sarvadharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja /
analyzed: sarva dharmān parityajya mām ekam śaraṇam vraja

original: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ // BhGR_18.66 //
analyzed: aham tvā sarva pāpebhyaḥ mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ

original: karmayogajñānayogabhaktiyogarūpān sarvān dharmān paramaniśśreyasasādhanabhūtān,
analyzed: karma yoga jñāna yoga bhakti yoga rūpān sarvān dharmān parama niśśreyasa sādhana bhūtān

original: madārādhanatvena atimātraprītyā yathādhikāraṃ kurvāṇa eva,
analyzed: mad ārādhana tvena atimātra prītyā yathā adhikāram kurvāṇaḥ eva

original: uktarītyā phalakarmakartṛtvādiparityāgena parityajya,
analyzed: ukta rītyā phala karma kartṛ tva ādi parityāgena parityajya

original: mām ekam eva kartāram ārādhyaṃ prāpyam upāyaṃ cānusaṃdhatsva /
analyzed: mām ekam eva kartāram ārādhyam prāpyam upāyam ca anusaṃdhatsva

original: eṣa eva sarvadharmāṇāṃ śastrīyaḥ parityāga iti,
analyzed: eṣaḥ eva sarva dharmāṇām śastrīyaḥ parityāgaḥ iti

original: “niścayaṃ śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharatasattama /
analyzed: niścayam śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharata sattama

original: tyāgo hi puruṣavyāghra trividhaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ //
analyzed: tyāgaḥ hi puruṣa vyāghra trividhaḥ saṃprakīrtitaḥ

original: BhGR_18.” ityārabhya,
analyzed: iti ārabhya

original: “saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sa tyāgas sāttiviko mataḥ //
analyzed: saṅgam tyaktvā phalam ca eva sa tyāgaḥ sāttivikaḥ mataḥ

original: ... na hi dehabhṛtā śakyaṃ tyaktuṃ karmāṇy aśeṣataḥ /
analyzed: na hi dehabhṛtā śakyam tyaktum karmāṇi aśeṣatas

original: yas tu karmaphalatyāgī sa tyāgīty abhidhīyate //
analyzed: yaḥ tu karma phala tyāgī sa tyāgī iti abhidhīyate

original: BhGR_18.” iti adhyāyādau sudṛḍham upapāditam /
analyzed: iti adhyāya ādau su dṛḍham upapāditam

original: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi evaṃ vartamānaṃ tvām matprāptivirodhibhyo 'nādikālasaṃcitānantākṛtyakaraṇakṛtyākaraṇarūpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ  #
analyzed: aham tvā sarva pāpebhyaḥ mokṣayiṣyāmi evam vartamānam tvām mad prāpti virodhibhyaḥ anādi kāla saṃcita ananta ākṛtya karaṇa kṛtyā karaṇa rūpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ

original: pāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi /
analyzed: pāpebhyaḥ mokṣayiṣyāmi

original: mā śucaḥ śokaṃ mā kṛthāḥ /
analyzed: mā śucaḥ śokam mā kṛthāḥ

original: atha vā, sarvapāpavinirmuktātyarthabhagavatpriyapuruṣanirvartyatvād bhaktiyogasya,
analyzed: atha vā sarva pāpa vinirmukta atyartha bhagavat priya puruṣa nirvartya tvāt bhaktiyogasya

original: tadārambhavirodhipāpānām ānantyāt tatprāyaścittarūpair dharmaiḥ parimitakālakṛtais
analyzed: tad ārambha virodhi pāpānām ānantyāt tad prāyaścitta rūpaiḥ dharmaiḥ parimita kāla kṛtaiḥ

original: teṣāṃ dustaratayā ātmano bhaktiyogārambhānarhatām ālocya śocato 'rjunasya śokam apanudan
analyzed: teṣām dustara tayā ātmanaḥ bhakti yoga ārambha anarha tām ālocya śocataḥ arjunasya śokam apanudan

original: śrībhagavān uvāca sarvadharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajeti /
analyzed: śrī bhagavān uvāca sarva dharmān parityajya mām ekam śaraṇam vraja iti

original: bhaktiyogārambhavirodhyanādikālasaṃcitanānāvidhānantapāpānuguṇān tattatprāyaścittarūpān
analyzed: bhaktiyoga ārambha virodhi anādi kāla saṃcita nānāvidha ananta pāpa anuguṇān tad tad prāyaścitta rūpān

original: kṛcchracāndrāyaṇakūśmāṇḍavaiśvānaravrātapatipavitreṣṭitrivṛdagniṣṭomādikān nānāvidhān
analyzed: kṛcchra cāndrāyaṇa kūśmāṇḍa vaiśvānara vrātapati pavitreṣṭi trivṛt agniṣṭoma ādikān nānāvidhān

original: anantāṃs tvayā parimitakālavartinā dūranuṣṭhānān sarvān dharmān parityajya bhaktiyogārambhasiddhaye
analyzed: anantān tvayā parimita kāla vartinā dūra anuṣṭhānān sarvān dharmān parityajya bhakti yoga ārambha siddhaye

original: mām ekaṃ paramakāruṇikam anālocitaviśeṣāśeṣalokaśaraṇyam āśritavātsalyajaladhiṃ śaraṇaṃ prapadyasva /
analyzed: mām ekam parama kāruṇikam an ālocita viśeṣa aśeṣa loka śaraṇyam āśrita vātsalya jaladhim śaraṇam prapadyasva

original: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyaḥ yathoditasvarūpabhaktyārambhavirodhibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ mokṣayiṣyāmi; mā śucaḥ // BhGR_18.66 //
analyzed: aham tvā sarva pāpebhyaḥ yathā udita sva rūpa bhakti ārambha virodhibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpebhyaḥ mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ

original: idaṃ te nātapaskāya nābhaktāya kadācana /
analyzed: idam te na atapaskāya na abhaktāya kadācana

original: na cāśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ na ca māṃ yo 'bhyasūyati // BhGR_18.67 //
analyzed: na ca aśuśrūṣave vācyam na ca mām yaḥ abhyasūyati

original: idaṃ te paramaṃ guhyaṃ śāstraṃ mayākhyātam atapaskāya ataptatapase tvayā na vācyam;
analyzed: idam te paramam guhyam śāstram mayā ākhyātam atapaskāya a tapta tapase tvayā na vācyam

original: tvayi vaktari,
analyzed: tvayi vaktari

original: mayi cābhaktāya kadācana na vācyam /
analyzed: mayi ca abhaktāya kadācana na vācyam

original: taptatapase cābhaktāya na vācyam ityarthaḥ /
analyzed: tapta tapase ca abhaktāya na vācyam iti arthaḥ

original: na cāśuśrūṣave /
analyzed: na ca a śuśrūṣave

original: bhaktāyāpy aśuśrūṣave na vācyam /
analyzed: bhaktāya api a śuśrūṣave na vācyam

original: na ca māṃ yo 'bhyasūyati /
analyzed: na ca mām yaḥ abhyasūyati

original: matsvarūpe madaiśvarye madguṇeṣu ca kathiteṣu yo doṣam āviṣkaroti,
analyzed: mad svarūpe mad aiśvarye mad guṇeṣu ca kathiteṣu yaḥ doṣam āviṣkaroti

original: na tasmai vācyam /
analyzed: na tasmai vācyam

original: asamānavibhaktinirdeśaḥ tasyātyantapariharaṇīyatājñāpanāya // BhGR_18.67 //
analyzed: asamāna vibhakti nirdeśaḥ tasya atyanta pariharaṇīya tā jñāpanāya

original: ya idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣv abhidhāsyati /
analyzed: yaḥ idam paramam guhyam mad bhakteṣu abhidhāsyati

original: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyaty asaṃśayaḥ // BhGR_18.68 //
analyzed: bhaktim mayi parām kṛtvā mām eva eṣyati asaṃśayaḥ

original: idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣu yaḥ abhidhāsyati vyākhyāsyati,
analyzed: idam paramam guhyam mad bhakteṣu yaḥ abhidhāsyati vyākhyāsyati

original: saḥ mayi paramāṃ bhaktiṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyati;
analyzed: saḥ mayi paramām bhaktim kṛtvā mām eva eṣyati

original: na tatra saṃśayaḥ // BhGR_18.68 //
analyzed: na tatra saṃśayaḥ

original: na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣu kaścin me priyakṛttamaḥ /
analyzed: na ca tasmāt manuṣyeṣu kaścid me priya kṛttamaḥ

original: bhavitā na ca me tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi // BhGR_18.69 //
analyzed: bhavitā na ca me tasmāt anyaḥ priyataraḥ bhuvi

original: sarveṣu manuṣyeṣv itaḥ pūrvaṃ tasmād anyo manuṣyo me na kaścit priyakṛttamo 'bhūt;
analyzed: sarveṣu manuṣyeṣu itas pūrvam tasmāt anyaḥ manuṣyaḥ me na kaścid priya kṛttamaḥ abhūt

original: ita uttaraṃ ca na bhavitā /
analyzed: itas uttaram ca na bhavitā

original: ayogyānāṃ prathamam upādānaṃ yogyānām akathanād api tatkathanasyāniṣṭatamatvāt //
analyzed: ayogyānām prathamam upādānam yogyānām a kathanāt api tad kathanasya aniṣṭatama tvāt

original: adhyeṣyate ca ya imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃvādam āvayoḥ /
analyzed: adhyeṣyate ca yaḥ imam dharmyam saṃvādam āvayoḥ

original: jñānayajñena tenāham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ // BhGR_18.70 //
analyzed: jñāna yajñena tena aham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ

original: ya imam āvayor dharmyaṃ saṃvādam adhyeṣyate,
analyzed: yaḥ imam āvayoḥ dharmyam saṃvādam adhyeṣyate

original: tena jñānayajñenāham iṣṭas syām iti me matiḥ asmin yo jñānayajño 'bhidhīyate,
analyzed: tena jñāna yajñena aham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ asmin yaḥ jñāna yajñaḥ abhidhīyate

original: tenāham etad adhyayanamātreṇeṣṭaḥ syām ityarthaḥ // BhGR_18.70 /
analyzed: tena aham etat adhyayana mātreṇa iṣṭaḥ syām iti arthaḥ

original: śraddhāvān anasūyuś ca śṛṇuyād api yo naraḥ /
analyzed: śraddhāvān anasūyuḥ ca śṛṇuyāt api yaḥ naraḥ

original: so 'pi muktaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām // BhGR_18.71 //
analyzed: saḥ api muktaḥ śubhān lokān prāpnuyāt puṇya karmaṇām

original: śraddhāvān anasūyuś ca yo naraḥ śṛṇuyād api,
analyzed: śraddhāvān anasūyuḥ ca yaḥ naraḥ śṛṇuyāt api

original: tena śravaṇamātreṇa so 'pi bhaktivirodhipāpebhyo muktaḥ puṇyakarmaṇāṃ madbhaktānāṃ lokān samūhan prāpnuyāt // BhGR_18.71 /
analyzed: tena śravaṇa mātreṇa saḥ api bhakti virodhi pāpebhyaḥ muktaḥ puṇya karmaṇām mad bhaktānām lokān samūhan prāpnuyāt  /

original: kaścid etacchrutaṃ pārtha tvayaikāgreṇa cetasā /
analyzed: kaścid etat śrutam pārtha tvayā ekāgreṇa cetasā

original: kaccid ajñānasaṃmohaḥ pranaṣṭas te dhanañjaya // BhGR_18.72 //
analyzed: kaccit ajñāna saṃmohaḥ pranaṣṭaḥ te dhanañjaya

original: mayā kathitam etat pārtha tvayā avahitena cetasā kaccic śrutam,
analyzed: mayā kathitam etat pārtha tvayā avahitena cetasā kaccit śrutam

original: tavājñānasaṃmohaḥ kaccit pranaṣṭaḥ,
analyzed: tava ajñāna saṃmohaḥ kaccit pranaṣṭaḥ

original: yenājñānena mūḍho na yotsyāmītyuktavān // BhGR_18.72 //
analyzed: yena ajñānena mūḍhaḥ na yotsyāmi iti uktavān

original: arjuna uvāca
analyzed: arjunaḥ uvāca

original: naṣṭo mohaḥ smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta /
analyzed: naṣṭaḥ mohaḥ smṛtiḥ labdhā tvad prasādāt mayā acyuta

original: sthito 'smi gatasaṃdehaḥ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava // BhGR_18.73 //
analyzed: sthitaḥ asmi gata saṃdehaḥ kariṣye vacanam tava

original: mohaḥ viparītajñānam /
analyzed: mohaḥ viparīta jñānam

original: tvatprasādān mama tad vinaṣṭam /
analyzed: tvad prasādāt mama tat vinaṣṭam

original: smṛtiḥ yathāvasthitatattvajñānam /
analyzed: smṛtiḥ yathā avasthita tattva jñānam

original: tvatprasādād eva tac ca labdham /
analyzed: tvad prasādāt eva tat ca labdham

original: anātmani prakṛtau ātmābhimānarūpo mohaḥ,
analyzed: anātmani prakṛtau ātma abhimāna rūpaḥ mohaḥ

original: paramapuruṣaśarīratayā tadātmakasya kṛtsnasya cidacidvastunaḥ atadātmābhimānarūpaś ca,
analyzed: paramapuruṣa śarīra tayā tad ātmakasya kṛtsnasya cit acit vastunaḥ a tad ātma abhimāna rūpaḥ ca

original: nityanaimittikarūpasya karmaṇaḥ paramapuruṣārādhanatayā tatprāptyupāyabhūtasya bandhakatvabuddhirūpaś ca sarvo vinaṣṭaḥ /
analyzed: nitya naimittika rūpasya karmaṇaḥ paramapuruṣa ārādhana tayā tad prāpti upāya bhūtasya bandhaka tva buddhi rūpaḥ ca sarvaḥ vinaṣṭaḥ

original: ātmanaḥ prakṛtivilakṣaṇatvatatsvabhāvarahitatājñātṛtvaikasvabhāvatāparamapuruṣaśeṣatātanniyāmyatvaikasvarūpatājñānam,
analyzed: ātmanaḥ prakṛti vilakṣaṇa tva tad svabhāva rahita tā jñātṛ tva eka svabhāva tā parama puruṣa śeṣa tā tad niyāmya tva eka svarūpa tā jñānam

original: nikhilajagadudbhavasthitipralayalīlāśeṣadoṣapratyanīkakalyāṇaikasvarūpasvābhāvikānavadhikātiśayajñānabalāiśvaryavīryaśaktitejaḥprabhṛtisamastakalyāṇaguṇagaṇamahārṇavaparabrahmaśabdābhidheyaparamapuruṣayāthātmyajñānaṃ
analyzed: nikhila jagat udbhava sthiti pralaya līlā śeṣa doṣa pratyanīka kalyāṇa eka svarūpa svābhāvika anavadhika atiśaya jñāna bala aiśvarya vīrya śakti tejaḥ prabhṛti samasta kalyāṇa guṇa gaṇa mahārṇava para brahma śabda abhidheya paramapuruṣa yāthātmya jñānam

original: evaṃrūpaparāvaratattvayāthātmyavijñānatadabhyāsapūrvakāharaharupacīyamānaparamapuruṣaprītyekaphalanityanaimittikakarmaniṣiddhaparihāraśamadamādyātmaguṇanivartyabhaktirūpatāpannaparamapuruṣopāsanaikalabhyo
analyzed: evaṃrūpa parāvara tattva yāthātmya vijñāna tad abhyāsa pūrvaka aharahar upacīyamāna paramapuruṣa prīti eka phala nitya naimittika karma niṣiddha parihāra śama dama ādi ātma guṇa nivartya bhakti rūpa tā āpanna paramapuruṣa upāsana eka labhya

original: vedāntavedyaḥ paramapuruṣo vāsudevas tvam iti jñānaṃ ca labdham /
analyzed: vedānta vedyaḥ parama puruṣaḥ vāsudevaḥ tvam iti jñānam ca labdham

original: tataś ca bandhasnehakāruṇyapravṛddhaviparītajñānamūlāt sarvasmād avasādād vimukto gatasaṃdehaḥ svasthaḥ sthito 'smi /
analyzed: tatas ca bandha sneha kāruṇya pravṛddha viparīta jñāna mūlāt sarvasmāt avasādāt vimuktaḥ gata saṃdehaḥ svasthaḥ sthitaḥ asmi

original: idānīm eva yuddhādikartavyatāviṣayam tava vacanaṃ kariṣyati yathoktaṃ yuddhādikaṃ kariṣyati ityarthaḥ // BhGR_18.73 //
analyzed: idānīm eva yuddha ādi kartavyatā viṣayam tava vacanam kariṣyati yathoktam yuddha ādikam kariṣyati iti arthaḥ

original: dhṛtarāṣṭrāya svaputrāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca yuddhe kiṃ kariṣyantīti pṛcchate
analyzed: dhṛtarāṣṭrāya sva putrāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ ca yuddhe kim kariṣyanti iti pṛcchate

original: sañjaya uvāca
analyzed: sañjayaḥ uvāca

original: ity ahaṃ vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ /
analyzed: iti aham vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ

original: saṃvādam imam aśrauṣam adbhutaṃ romaharṣaṇam // BhGR_18.74 //
analyzed: saṃvādam imam aśrauṣam adbhutam roma harṣaṇam

original: iti evaṃ vāsudevasya vasudevasūnoḥ,
analyzed: iti evam vāsudevasya vasudeva sūnoḥ

original: pārthasya ca tatpitṛṣvasuḥ putrasya ca mahātmanaḥ mahābuddhes tatpadadvandvam āśritasyemaṃ romaharṣaṇam adbhutaṃ saṃvādam ahaṃ yathoktam aśrauṣam  #
analyzed: pārthasya ca tad pitṛṣvasuḥ putrasya ca mahātmanaḥ mahābuddheḥ tad pada dvandvam āśritasya imam roma harṣaṇam adbhutam saṃvādam aham yathoktam aśrauṣam  /

original: śrutavān aham // BhGR_18.74 //
analyzed: śrutavān aham

original: vyāsaprasādāc chrutavān etad guhyam ahaṃ param /
analyzed: vyāsa prasādāt śrutavān etat guhyam aham param

original: yogaṃ yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam // BhGR_18.75 //
analyzed: yogam yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam

original: vyāsaprasādād vyāsānugraheṇa divyacakṣuśśrotralābhād etat paraṃ yogākhyaṃ guhyaṃ
analyzed: vyāsa prasādāt vyāsa anugraheṇa divya cakṣuḥ śrotra lābhāt etat param yoga ākhyam guhyam

original: yogeśvarāj jñānabalāiśvaryavīryaśaktitejasāṃ nidher bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇāt svayam eva
analyzed: yogeśvarāt jñāna bala aiśvarya vīrya śakti tejasām nidheḥ bhagavataḥ kṛṣṇāt svayam eva

original: kathayataḥ sākṣāc śrutavān aham // BhGR_18.75 //
analyzed: kathayataḥ sākṣāt śrutavān aham

original: rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam /
analyzed: rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam

original: keśavārjunayoḥ puṇyaṃ hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhuḥ // BhGR_18.76 //
analyzed: keśava arjunayoḥ puṇyam hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhur

original: keśavārjunayor imaṃ puṇyam adbhutaṃ saṃvādaṃ sākṣāc chrutaṃ smṛtvā muhur muhur hṛṣyāmi //
analyzed: keśava arjunayoḥ imam puṇyam adbhutam saṃvādam sākṣāt śrutam smṛtvā muhur muhur hṛṣyāmi

original: tac ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam atyadbhutaṃ hareḥ /
analyzed: tat ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam ati adbhutam hareḥ

original: vismayo me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ // BhGR_18.77 //
analyzed: vismayaḥ me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punar punar

original: tac cārjunāya prakāśitam aiśvaraṃ harer atyadbhutaṃ rūpaṃ mayā sākṣātkṛtaṃ saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya hṛṣyato me mahān vismayo jāyate;
analyzed: tat ca arjunāya prakāśitam aiśvaram hareḥ ati adbhutam rūpam mayā sākṣātkṛtam saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya hṛṣyataḥ me mahān vismayaḥ jāyate

original: punaḥ punaś ca hṛṣyāmi // BhGR_18.77 //
analyzed: punar punar ca hṛṣyāmi

original: kim atra bahunoktena ?
analyzed: kim atra bahunā uktena

original: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo yatra pārtho dhanurdharaḥ /
analyzed: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇaḥ yatra pārthaḥ dhanuḥ dharaḥ

original: tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir dhruvā nītir matir mama // BhGR_18.78 //
analyzed: tatra śrīḥ vijayaḥ bhūtiḥ dhruvā nītiḥ matiḥ mama

original: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛtsnasyoccāvacarūpeṇāvasthitasya cetanasyācetanasya ca vastuno ye ye svabhāvayogāḥ,
analyzed: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛtsnasya uccāvaca rūpeṇa avasthitasya cetanasya acetanasya ca vastunaḥ ye ye svabhāva yogāḥ

original: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ yogānām īśvaraḥ,
analyzed: teṣām sarveṣām yogānām īśvaraḥ

original: svasaṃkalpāyattasvetarasamastavastusvarūpasthitipravṛttibhedaḥ,
kṛṣṇaḥ vasudevasūnuḥ,
analyzed: kṛṣṇaḥ vasudeva sūnuḥ

original: yatra ca pārtho dhanurdharaḥ tatpitṛṣvasuḥ putraḥ tatpadadvandvaikāśrayaḥ,
analyzed: yatra ca pārthaḥ dhanuḥ dharaḥ tad pitṛṣvasuḥ putraḥ tad pada dvandva eka āśrayaḥ

original: tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir nītiś ca dhruvā niścalā iti matir mameti // BhGR_18.78 //
analyzed: tatra śrīḥ vijayaḥ bhūtiḥ nītiḥ ca dhruvā niścalā iti matiḥ mama iti
